name: Casa Soares - Estúdio Amor Perfeito
summary: Studio inside Casa Soares with one big bed, kitchen, wc, private deck with access to gardens and swimming pool, cable TV, free WIFI, parking. In the country side, where you can find silence and peace in nature environment.
description: Studio inside Casa Soares with one big bed, kitchen, wc, private deck with access to gardens and swimming pool, cable TV, free WIFI, parking. In the country side, where you can find silence and peace in nature environment.

host.host_about:
A Casa Soares é uma Casa de Campo que foi recuperada e oferece agora vários alojamentos para turismo em espaço rural.
Constituída por 3 estúdios e 2 apartamentos, possui ainda uma sala de estar comum, piscina na propriedade e um grande jardim.

reviews.comments:
j ai reserve ce charmant endroit pour ma soeur et son compagnon qui mont fait part de ce commentaire : 

#Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse. Nous avons été très bien accueillis, très bien conseillés pour les restaurants aux alentours.

La chambre est agréable et le petit déjeuner très bon.

Seul petit bémol, l insonorisation de la chambre avec la cour intérieure.

Sandrine et Fabrice.#


they were very happy to enjoy this Day With you so i thank you so much ! 
Luc

name: Casa Soares - Sobrado Velho
summary: Apartment inside a Country House, 2 rooms, family, couch/bed for extra person (charged separately), kitchen, living room, cable TV, free WIFI, Parking, swimming pool, gardens. Peaceful place for family to relax in the nature.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
description: Apartment inside a Country House, 2 rooms, family, couch/bed for extra person (charged separately), kitchen, living room, cable TV, free WIFI, Parking, swimming pool, gardens. Peaceful place for family to relax in the nature.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_about:
A Casa Soares é uma Casa de Campo que foi recuperada e oferece agora vários alojamentos para turismo em espaço rural.
Constituída por 3 estúdios e 2 apartamentos, possui ainda uma sala de estar comum, piscina na propriedade e um grande jardim.

reviews.comments:
The place is marvellous. Is even much better than is expected after reading airbnb and watching fotos.
Everything is very clean and cleaned every day. The house is the combination of old house and modern design, I like it. Garden with the pool very calm and huge.
I loved very good breakfast which you can eat in the garden

name: few step taksim square cozy flat
summary: 1 mins to taksim square.Close to taksim metro station and buses stations.Also in central area trams and kabataş center just few min with walking and close to touristic place and also near historical place karaköy sultanahmet and  eminönü.
space: just few min taksim square to easy come to our flat.
description: 1 mins to taksim square.Close to taksim metro station and buses stations.Also in central area trams and kabataş center just few min with walking and close to touristic place and also near historical place karaköy sultanahmet and  eminönü. just few min taksim square to easy come to our flat. ı had balcony
neighborhood_overview: Center in İstanbul what kind of trip you want can found easy and quickly many option about restaurant , club or historical place and bosphorus to
transit: Airport transport havataş ,Metro , bus station .
access: ı had balcony
house_rules: I m living a apartment and ı have neighbors so from all my  guest ı have expectation  dont do uncomfortable stuation for other person.

host.host_about:
merhabalar,
Yeni insanlari tanimak onlarla tecrubelerimi ortak anilari paylaşmayı seviyorum yemek yapmayı kitap okumak ayrıca hobilerim.

reviews.comments: It was good, very close to all but four floors up on stairs

Recep (Zafer) is a wonderful host. I did not know a word of Turkish and he did not know a word of English and we seemed to still have no problem communicating. He came and found me when I arrived from the airport, which was great. He was always offering delicious coffees and he made several wonderful meals (he is a chef) On my second day, he walked me around and was eager to share his city with me. If you are on a budget, like I was, then this is an excellent option for you. The location can not be beat, especially for the price.

This is the perfect location and host for budget travellers to Istanbul. On less popular side of Taxim Square you go up a not very well kept stairwell to find a surprisingly pleasant, super small but well organized apartment with a very accomodating host. Zafer doesnt speak English but he makes use of translator and is really helpful. Can't find a better place in a better location for such a deal.

Recep was a great host, his home is in the best location and so easy and convient to go out and about from taksim square everyday, even tho he doesn't speak English and we didn't speak turkish we communicated through a translator on our phones and it was fine! He has an adorable kitten to keep you company also! Will Definatley reccomend recepa home!

Zafer is one of the most welcome and sincere host i have ever seen. He picked me up earlier than the check in time and immediately I went in the house i liked it! The location is very near Taksim square, a little bit difficult to find but very convenient. There are several animals in the house and they are very cute. Zafer doesn't speak English but it was very fun talking to him using the mobile phone. I felt lucky to find this place with Zafer during my stay in Istanbul.
Everything fine! Zafer is really kind and polite! The room  was really clean as the rest of the house. For that price you can't find nothing better.
Recep is really a good man, he is so welcoming and kind

Very friendly and helpful and he took care of all the details.
The location is perfect, I would highly recommend this place

We arrived in Istanbul at 2 p.m. and had asked Zafer beforehand if it was and he said it was. But when we arrived at his place, he was asleep and didn't hear us call. So the first night we were paniqued because we didn't know where to sleep. We eventually found another hotel at 4 p.m... 
Zafer did apologize the next morning...
The room is very very tiny (the bed too) and if you're allergic to cats then this isn't the place for you because the cats is very playful and jumps on your bed, pillow, shoes and stuff... 
The good thing was the location. At walking distance from Taksim. Very convenient. 
If you don't need luxury then you're good. We were never in the appartment as we were sightseeing the whole time and went out a lot.

Recep and Zafer were terrific hosts. Our language barrier was overcome by the use of a great phone app. Recep carried our heavy bags up quite a few stairs then made us coffee and walked us into town to show us around. We really enjoyed their hospitality. We had to move on a couple of days earlier than we thought due to wifi connectivity (we were working), but other than that, we would recommend Zafer and Recep's flat as a cozy place to stay. Great location. Thank you!

The place was nice and cozy (as described). Recep's cat is really cute. I did find it a bit difficult to communicate with translating via phone, I would ask him some stuff but it took to long to get the correct the right answer. Check out is strict, not flexible :) Other than that, he's a nice guy

What can we say, we had a great stay at Recep's place. The location is great, really a few steps from Taksim square, and everything we wanted was therefore near. Though there is perhaps little privacy, since you do share the appartement with Recep, it is absolutely no problem as he is a very kind and easy-going person. And of course for that price one can only be happy. Mind you, as others had written, that Recep does not speak English so communication goes through (Hidden by Airbnb) translate, though for us that was not a problem whatsoever, at times it was even pleasant for it didn't force us to socialise. Also, Recep makes great Turkish coffee!

In sum, if you are looking for a nice, cheap place that is centrally located, we recommend a stay at Recep's place!
apartment centrally located, very nice host. Thank you for all
Good place for its price, the room is tiny and you seem to have very less privacy but Recep is very welcoming and friendly. we had a good time.
The place is lovely and the host is kind. He goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. Lovely stay, would definitely stay there again.
Recep отличный человек! Поможет во всех вопросах, очень гостеприимный хозяин. Квартира не большая, но очень уютная и есть все необходимое. До Таксима 5 минут пешком.

name: Cozy Apt 10 minutes to Central Park
summary: Enjoy a quiet stay at my new fully furnished private apartment. 1 minute walk to the N/Q train line which takes you to Midtown in less than 10 minutes.  Comfortable one bedroom apartment, large closet, living area.
space: Comfortable one bedroom apartment for two with a Memory foam mattress, large closet, living area, full kitchen and full bathroom. Full access to the apartment facilities including high speed internet, your own private kitchen. Astoria is a very diverse neighborhood with a large variety of ethnic restaurants. Plenty of bars and supermarkets in walking distance. There is a beer garden and movie theater 4 short blocks from the house. There are enough things open late or 24 hours.
description: Enjoy a quiet stay at my new fully furnished private apartment. 1 minute walk to the N/Q train line which takes you to Midtown in less than 10 minutes.  Comfortable one bedroom apartment, large closet, living area. Comfortable one bedroom apartment for two with a Memory foam mattress, large closet, living area, full kitchen and full bathroom. Full access to the apartment facilities including high speed internet, your own private kitchen. Astoria is a very diverse neighborhood with a large variety of ethnic restaurants. Plenty of bars and supermarkets in walking distance. There is a beer garden and movie theater 4 short blocks from the house. There are enough things open late or 24 hours. Full Apartment Once, my apartment is available here, its mean that I'm traveling around, but I'm leaving 2 people to help in any emergency or help in need. Also right after booked I will provide a contact number, or (Hidden by Airbnb) so that the guest can have full communication with me at any time.
access: Full Apartment
interaction: Once, my apartment is available here, its mean that I'm traveling around, but I'm leaving 2 people to help in any emergency or help in need. Also right after booked I will provide a contact number, or (Hidden by Airbnb) so that the guest can have full communication with me at any time.
house_rules: RENTAL AGREEMENT, CONSIDERED ACCEPTED BY GUEST AT RESERVATION PLACEMENT: 1. CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT TIMES – Check-in time is 12:00 P.M. (ET) or later. Check-out time is 12:00 A.M. (ET) or earlier. If Guest requires an early check-in time or late check-out time, Guest must receive written approval in advance from Owner. 2. SMOKING – This is a non-smoking Apartment. There is a fee of $150 that will be charged, via the damage deposit, for deep cleaning if smoking is noticed. 3. RECYCLING – According to New York City law, all plastic, aluminum, glass, and paper items must be recycled. If recycled products are not disposed in correct bins, a fine of up to $500 can be received. 4. PETS – Pets are not permitted in Apartment under any conditions, with the exception that the pet is a certified service animal. 5. HEAT – Provided in the Apartment from October 1 to May 31. According to New York City heating law:  - the inside temperature is required to be at least 68 degrees Fahrenheit if the outside

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Had a lovely experience staying in Andre's apartment for our first time in New York! Alex was friendly and easygoing no issues at all. Apartment was in a great location, very close to subway station, clean, good size as pictured and had everything that we could have needed. I would stay here again and I can recommend it very highly.
Thank you Andre
a well-equipped and proper appartment and a good temporary home which has everything one needs for a work and leisure trip to New York, appreciate the welcoming and care-taking attitude of the host

My friend and I stayed at Andre's apartment for 3nights and had a great time in NYC. Andre is a very flexible and helpful host. Answer us all the questions in a prompt way. The apartment  is perfect for 2 or 3 plp,clean, cozy and have full equipment even umbrellas :). Location is very convenient even for first time visitors like us. Subway is in 2 min walking distance. Transportation from the Airports is easy,too. The only thing that bothers me at first when I walked  in was the noise but then you just get used to it and do not pay that much attention . Overall great experience,  nice place,  helpful host. Thank you very much Andre! Definitely will recommend it to family and friends!

Had a good week in Andres appartment. It is fully equipped - had everything I needed and was nice and clean when I got there. It is in a nice neighbourhood with loads of shops and food and there is a subway station just at the corner of the street so it is easy to get to anywhere in New York really and also easy to get there from both JFK and La Guardia. The only downside was the elevated subway passing by the appartment every 5-10 minutes. That was quite noisy. I only met Andre when I arrived. But he seemed like  a good guy and readily got back to me whenever I contacted him and always answered my questions.

Andre è stato davvero gentile con noi anche se non lo abbiamo incontrato. ..purtroppo siamo arrivate in ritardo all'incontro per le chiavi perché il nostro volo era molto in ritardo! 
L'appartamento è davvero confortevole e vicinissimo alla metro e in un quartiere tranquillo!  Lo consiglio assolutamente!
Everything was perfect and andre was sooo helpful ,the apartment was soo clean and right next to the subway and a lot of restaurants around and grocery stores

name: The Porto Concierge  Mesquita Lodge
summary: Very comfortable and peaceful small house, located in Vila Nova de Gaia, very near Calem port wine cellar and walking distance to all the main attractions in Porto! Just besides famous The Yeatman Hotel! Fully renewed and fully equipped!
space: Bright and aired small and functional house, with all you might need for an excellent getaway after enjoying the city. Very comfortable and peaceful small house, located in Vila Nova de Gaia, very near Calem port wine cellar and walking distance to all the main attractions in Porto! Just besides famous The Yeatman Hotel! Fully renewed and fully equipped!
description: Very comfortable and peaceful small house, located in Vila Nova de Gaia, very near Calem port wine cellar and walking distance to all the main attractions in Porto! Just besides famous The Yeatman Hotel! Fully renewed and fully equipped! Bright and aired small and functional house, with all you might need for an excellent getaway after enjoying the city. Very comfortable and peaceful small house, located in Vila Nova de Gaia, very near Calem port wine cellar and walking distance to all the main attractions in Porto! Just besides famous The Yeatman Hotel! Fully renewed and fully equipped! Guests have access to all the amenities of the house. When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. Located in a quiet pedestrian street, has great exposure to sun all day long. Right beside the Yeatman Hotel 4 minutes walk to General Torres metro and train station 10 minutes
neighborhood_overview: Located in a quiet pedestrian street, has great exposure to sun all day long. Right beside the Yeatman Hotel
notes: Extra Services upon request:  • Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 25€/ up to 4 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals)  • Tours in classic cars  • Sightseeing in classic cars •Transfer service by bus from Airport to the apartment (and return ):  - 1 or 2 persons: 8€/trip each  - 3+ persons: 6€/trip each  • City tours with tour guide  • Travel Around Northern Portugal (Private sedan will pick you up at the apartment) • Home groceries delivery  • Babysitting  • Bike rental  • Taxi  • Other services as requested
transit: 4 minutes walk to General Torres metro and train station 10 minutes walk to Ribeira and Porto main attractions 4 minutes walk to supermarkets, shops and restaurants 6 minutes walk to Calem Port wine cellar
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the house.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment’s equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment’s appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own.  Check out time is at 11h. If requested and

host.host_location: Porto Alegre, State of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
host.host_about:
Easy and outgoing!
I simply love to travel!

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments:
Tout simplement top. Petite maison entièrement rénové à deux pas du pont Luis II (le pont Eiffel), la maison est dans une ruelle récemment réaménagée et entièrement piétonne. 
Le service de The Porto Concierge excellent également. 
Je recommande vivement.

We zijn vriendelijk ontvangen en duidelijk uitgelegd over de buurt/stad. Dit is een fijne en schone B&B met 3 slaapkamers, keuken in de prachtige buurt met het uitzicht naar Yeatman hotel douro en Taylor port wijn proeverij en Douro rivier.
Appartement bien situé pour faire Porto à pieds. Très propre et fonctionnel. Quartier calme. Facilité pour se garer dans le quartier en bas de la rue Mesquita.

Boa tarde Maria do céu.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans votre logement. Proche des caves et non loin de Porto à pied ou par le métro. Nous avions tout le confort nécessaire. J adore votre ville.
Casa muy tranquila. Perfecta para familias con niños. Muy bien comunicada con centro histórico.
L'appartement est propre et bien placé. Fidèle au photos

Tivemos uma ótima acolhida! 
E a casa é bem agradável e bem próxima dos locais à visitar na cidade do Porto!!!
Recomendo!!!
Nice place, close to the riviera. Very reasonably priced. The staff were friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again.
très bon séjour à Porto, nous avons été bien accueillis dans un appartement propre ,  confortable et suffisamment spacieux. le quartier est très agréable.
Buena situación para disfrutar de oporto. Pegado al puente Luis I. Muy acogedora y cómoda. Con zonas libres cercanas para aparcar el coche.

We had a wonderful stay. In fact we enjoyed Porto and the accommodations so much  that we extended for an additional night. We were met by the concierge staff as pre planned to show us the place  and provide us with the keys. Location was straight up the hill and a beautiful 5-10 min walk down to the river. The unit was very clean and comfortable. Would def stay here again if I were to return. There was a great restaurant down the street that we would stop for coffee in the morning that I would highly  recommend to all.

Es un apartamento nuevo, bien cuidado y próximo al puente de Luis I. Las fotos y descripción del apartamento son correctas, salvo el tema calefacción. Sí tiene agua caliente, pero no calefacción. Hacía algo de frío en el apartamento, y en la sala de estar que es como un anexo al apartamento es donde notas más el frío sobre todo cuanto estas desayunando o cenando. Se lo comente al propietario, Maria, y sin ningún problema nos llevó al apartamento tres calefactores.

A descrição do anuncio era adequada, no entanto o aquecimento da casa são 3 termoventiladores, que se têm que desligar durante a noite, porque secam muito o ar. Contudo, a casa e as imagens correspondiam à descrição.

The accommodation is basic, but clean, comfortable and in a good location to the local sights. The living room is in a converted Garage space, which is very cold when we stayed there in March 2016. I'm sure in the summer months it will be warm. But for the price, this is a very good option. The only downside is that the address isn't clear so most taxi drivers believe it's located outside Porto and on arriving we gave the address Maria gave us to to a taxi driver. The first one told us it was outside Porto, knowing it was centrally located, we tried another taxi driver who programmed the address into the sat nav. Unfortunately there are two streets named the same and we were taken to the furthest away. Even though the driver realised his mistake he charged us 27 euros and got very nasty about it. It should've been a 6 euro journey!! The other issue we had in the apartment was that the fuse box kept tripping. We were able to fix it ourselves but just a word of caution. The accommodation is a great choice though if you're on a budget and you get a taxi driver who knows where he's going!

Nous avons été bien reçu la maison est très propre par contre difficile a trouver et pas accessible en voiture c'est une petite rue
le préciser dans l'annonce mais je peux recommander la maison aux voyageurs.

Sehr saubere und süße Unterkunft mit einem schönen Blick vom Wohnzimmer auf Porto. Man braucht etwa 20 min zu Fuß ins Stadtzentrum und 5 min zur Metro. Supermärkte und alle Dinge des täglichen Gebrauchs (Drogerie, Gemüse-Laden, Bäcker) gibt es in direkter Umgebung. Unsere Ankunft war unproblematisch und die Schlüsselübergabe konnte pünktlich stattfinden. Das Wohnzimmer, ein Anbau getarnt als gemauerter Wintergarten war durchaus gewöhnungsbedürftig aber entwickelte seinen eigenen Charme. In der Offseason dringend die Heizventilatoren im Wohnzimmer aufstellen, sonst wird es kalt :) Würden jederzeit wieder kommen!

We were well-hosted, the flat was very pleasant and we had everything we needed!

The location was peaceful and central.
A very good trip, thank you !

My boyfriend and me stayed 2 weeks in porto. The location was great! You are in just 5mins walking distance at the metro station general torres! From there you can reach every important place in porto! Maria was very friendly and Carlos as well. They allways helped and supported us and we really appreciated that. The prize-performance ratio is very good! For the prize was the appartment great and very big! The only thing was the standard of the appartment is not high class as well as the surroundings.

We stayed in Mesquita Lodge for a long weekend. Place is really nicely located, in the area called Gaia with chilled local vibe and many porto vine cellars around. City center is just across the bridge, easy to walk, we didn't use any public transport to get there. Apartment is spacious with 3 bedrooms, very clean and cool, all windows have proper blinds so you won't be sweating at night after hot sunny day.  We did not use the kitchen but it had all the facilities for cooking and appliances. Our flight was delayed, we informed about it and information was passed to the driver who met us at the airport and stay manager who was nice to come and meet us after midnight on Saturday. Highly recommended!

Le logement de Maria est grand et refait à neuf mais si je devais revenir à Porto je choisirais un logement avec la clim, car au bout de 2 nuits blanches nous avons failli migrer à l'hôtel.  Porto est une ville encaissée où tout raisonne et quand l'hôtel Yeatman fait la fête impossible de laisser les fenêtres ouvertes. Le petit mobilier (chaises, tables de nuit ...) très disparate gagnerait à être de meilleure qualité. La plus belle vue à l'arrière de la maison a été occultée par la construction d'une pièce supplémentaire réservée au repas, quel dommage.

À notre arrivée, après un stationnement difficile, nous nous situons dans un quartier pauvre, habité par des personnes gentilles et discrètes mais composé de maisons délabrées. Belle surprise de voir ce logement entre tous, très propre, en excellent état, tout fraîchement rénové et très accueillant. A l'entrée la maison est certes assez petite mais très fonctionnelle, décorée avec goût et contenant tout le nécessaire pour passer un bon séjour, a 10mn à pied de Porto. La literie est sommaire, et la télévision datée mais cela n'empêche pas de passer un bon séjour. Le logement n'est pas situé à Porto mais à Vila Nova de Gaia juste en face de Porto de l'autre côté du Douro. Tout ou presque est accessible à pied et le reste est très bien desservi en transports en commun. La qualité du logement permet de se reposer sereinement et calmement des virées de la journée. Ce logement gagne à être connu et après 1 semaine à 4 personnes passée dans ce dernier, nous vous le conseillons !
Una casa bastante acogedora aunque no me gusto mucho el barrio por lo demás bastante bien la experiencia

It was a nice and clean place, located on a narrow and quiet street. 5 minutes walking till Ponte Luis I. We always stopped on the way home to enjoy the view at Belini (expensive but nice restaurant).

Ha sido perfecto! Desde la ubicación hasta el apartamento. Hemos estado muy cómodos los 4. Las fotos son tal cual el apartamento. Merece la pena. A 10 min andando del centro. El coche lo pudimos dejas cerca sin tener que pagar aparcamiento (casi toda la zona es de aparcamiento de pago 24 hs).
Claramente repetiremos cuando volvamos a oporto!

Excellent location, close to the downtown area. A quick walk to public transport, downtown, and nightlife. 

The apartment was very clean and tidy upon arrival. We were also surprised with a nice welcome gift - a bottle of Port wine!
El apartamento perfecto, la ubicación muy bien, la única pega que la calle es peatonal perp cerca se encuentran zonas de aparcamiento.

Staying in Maria DO Ceu apartment was really nice! Fatima was very kind during our stay and he helped us with  transport and with luggages. The apartment was really comfortable and clean and it was easy to reach the storic city centre and public transport too. We hope to come back soon

Logement très bien situé dans une ruelle piétonnière, donc au calme, et à quelques minutes du Pont Dom Luis, des quais de Vila Nova de Gaia, et du centre historique de Porto. Appartement fonctionnel. Bon accueil malgré notre arrivée tardive. Nous recommandons !

Die Beschreibung war gefühlsmäßig passend, auch wenn wir nicht genau darauf geachtet haben ob alles vorhanden war. Die Räume sind ordentlich und sauber zu Verfügung gestellt worden, die Küche und das Bad funktionierten einwandfrei und waren mit dem allernötigsten ausgestattet.

Très bon accueil, elle nous a donné de très bons renseignements et toujours disponible.
La chambre est petite et propre le ménage et le lit refait tout les jours.
Petit déjeuner excellent, partagé avec les autres occupants. Très belle vu de la terasse et de la piscine.
La piscine est très simpa.
Bom espaço. Limpo. Arejado. Bom custo benefício.

I had a really good experience at Maria's place. Host was extremely helpful and responded really quickly when I had queries. The location was really good as I could easily walk to the main sights in Porto.

The apartment is clean, beautiful, cosy. I'll lovely to stay in this apartment again. But I think it's little bit small for 6 person.
Thank you Maria !!!

L'appartement correspond bien aux photos. Les 3 chambres sont spacieuses et bien équipées. La salle de bain et la cuisine sont nickels. Rue très calme et toute proche des caves. Il faut tout de même marcher un petit peu pour rejoindre le centre mais tram pas loin.

We was in Porto four days. The aprtment woas located very good - ca. ten minutes by foot to the Louis Bridge :)
Place is comfortable and clean. Quiet area.  
Thanks ;)
Appartement propre et bien situé
Nous recommandons cet endroit calme, propre, typique. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Allez y!
Segunda vez, y todo perfecto como la primera!!!!
Muy confortable y buena comunicación
Apartamento acogedor y muy bien situado:)

A 5 minutes à pied des quais de Gaia où se trouvent les caves de Porto, à 2 minutes de métro, cette maison dans une ruelle pietonne est très bien équipée pour un séjour en famille.
Un très bon suivi avant le séjour mais aussi pendant de la part de Maria.
Au top !!!
Eine super Unterkunft mit tollem Service

La casa está bien. Limpia, en un barrio peculiar... a pie a unos 20 minutos del centro. Para ir hacia Oporto se hace más pesado por las cuestas pero para bajar en un paseo agradable. La única pega, que La Cocina está poco equipada (no hay horno, no tostadora, ni exprimidor...) Tampoco muchos útiles de limpieza (bayeta, trapo...) Lad almohadas también son un poco incómodas, muy pequeñas y poco mullidas. En general, económica y recomendable

House Maria Do Céu is the perfect place to stay during the trip in Porto! It's in Vila Nova de Guia - very close to Porto wine caves and very close (10 min by walk) to St Luis bridge - the view on Porto is wonderful! To get to the Old Town of Porto from the house takes 20 min by walk through the beautiful St Luís Bridge and beautiful Douro River. The localization of the house is truly perfect ! The house was nice, very clean. The price of the house was really competitive. To sum up, I didn't expect that perfect time in this place I had. I recommend the Maria do Céu House for everybody with no doubt! Thank you one more time for your hospitality ;)
Céntrico. Con todas las comodidades, buen apartamento para pasar unos días en Oporto

The localization of the house is perfect! Close to the wine caves and city center, very close to the metro station and to the train station (General Torres). The house was clean and nice. I definitely recommend the Maria do Céu House!
We appreciated the apartments much. Nice location and quiet neighbourhood with good transport connection.
The location is very good. Appartment is clean and well equipped. I truly recommend

Maria's place provided three separate bedrooms, a kitchen, and a covered patio with a dining table and TV.  It was perfect for three guests!  The apartment was clean and it was easy to communicate with Maria and her property management company throughout our stay (including booking a transfer to the property from the airport and arranging luggage storage).  The location was within walking distance to the Yeatman Hotel and wineries, and the WiFi was fast.  Many thanks for a great stay!
Everything was perfect. Clean apartement with a lot of space, very close to the center. Contact to host was easy and friendly. Highly recommended!

Excellent séjour chez Maria! C'est un logement agréable, au calme dans une rue piétonne. La maison est située dans un quartier très charmant, sur la rive sud du Douro, où le coucher de soleil sur Porto est remarquable. Je recommande!

Ottima ubicazione, vista mozzafiato, casa spaziosa, completa di tutto. Non lontano dal centro.  Anche se la via è pedonale e nn ci si arriva con l'auto, ma nei dintorni si trova un parcheggio a pagamento. Da consigliare a tutti, Sapendo Che Gaia e Porto sono tutto un saliscendi. Ma la loro bellezza e unicità merita moltissimo.

This home is so lovely and clean, and very spacious. Everything was modern, and though it is across the river, it was very easy to cross the bridge into the main city center (the bridge leads into the middle of it all, including the cathedral). We loved it!
The check in was amazing, even though we arrived late they were very helpful in receiving us. The house is very clean and very close to the river Douro.

Impresionante. El apartamento tiene de todo. Como para una instancia corta como larga. El apartamento esta en una zona muy tranquila y el vecindario muy amable y siempre dispuestos a ayudar. El apartamento estuvo impoluto. Vamos no puedo decir nada negativo.Todo inmejorable. Os lo recomiendo.
Great location. Clean, and beds comfortable. Bedrooms very small. Rather old-fashioned but will be renovated, I'm sure. Newly fitted shower room very nice.

Perfect location and nice atmosphere. 

Superb communication from the agency.
Great value and well located, close to the top of the cable-car. Thoroughly enjoyed our short stay and would be happy to return.
bonita casita, muy comoda y limpia  en un barrio tranquilo.  muy buena impresion.

Le logement est situé dans une rue piétonne. Il est parfaitement adapté pour un séjour en famille. Les transports publics sont à proximité. Tout le nécessaire pour séjourner quelques jours est présent. Nous avons été accueilli à l'heure que nous souhaitions et tout s'est très bien passé.
Great value for money, great location, good access. Spacious and comfortable, fully equipped for self catering. The house is better than the photos suggest. Could do with a sofa in communal area.

The apartment was perfectly located for us, not in the busy city center but just on the other side of the river, so walking to ribeira is only +/_ 15min, and it is close to the port houses in gaia. Also the metro is only a 5min. Walking. The apartment was nice and clean and we really enjoyed our time in Porto from here!
Comfortable, convenient, and clean! Would stay again
Great location near Douro river and city center. Clean and comfortable apartament. Everything was perfect.

Host was late and was not reachable through the App and Mobile phone. Appeared only after 40 minutes after discussed time.
Host was not responding to letters regarding any services neither through email nor through AirBnb Messages.
Appartment is not suitable for 4 people. Only 1 double bed and 2 single beds.
One of us was sleeping on a matras that was taken from one of the beds.
A lot of ants in the kitchen

Endroit calme et bien situé. Très proche du métro qui vous emmène dans le centre ville en moins de 5 Minutes. Rapport qualité prix très bon. Il manquait un peu de place au niveau de la cuisine pour 5 personnes mais mis à part cela l'espace commun est assez grand.

Two of the bedrooms have a extra matress that you put on the floor. In terms if cleanliness it could be more tidy. 

On the plus side, it is close to the cellars and very quiet.
Sehr saubere Wohnung insgesamt gute Unterkunft

It was a very nice stay. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures. The service is really good. We accidentally locked the Keys inside the apartment and our host arrived in half an hour to help us. That was extremly kind! Thanks once again!

The location is perfect - Vila Nova de Gaia, in front of Porto old town, A lot of cafes, restaurants and also wineries. Get to the metro station - 5 min, get to old town - 10-15 min. 
The apartment inside is big, cozy and comfortable for a few people.
I recommend to keep in touch via official e-mail (Porto Concierge), as the replies at Airbnb mostly automatically and don't contain the information you asked.

Logement  très proche du centre ville.
Terrasse agréable qui compense le manque de luminosité à l'intérieur.
Chambres spacieuses mais sans placard.

Accueil très sympathique avec des marques d'attention, description des lieux de visites de Porto, logement conforme aux attentes et très propre.Logement super , proche des transports en commun, situé à Vila Nova de Gaia quartier calme, séjour inoubliable. A recommander.
Espaço muito porreiro. Tem tudo o que é preciso para passar uns bons dias na zona do porto.

Fantastic place! The accommodation was clean, well-organized, safe and had great service. The hosts were friendly and willing to help with any issues or questions. Slightly smaller than expected. The cards and checkers made for a nice surprise. The location is perfect just a few minutes from the River Douro and Ponte Dom Luis I with lots of great traditional Portuguese cafes within a couple minutes walking distance. 
The Apartment itself is on a narrow street, which can be a bit complicated to find, but really lets you feel as if you are a Porto resident. 

An overall great experience.
This is a lovely accommodation in Porto - central location, quiet and comfortable, and great value.
everything fine!

The apartment it is worth the price. Good localization and very good communication with host :)

We will always recommend this apartment:)

Dom jest położony w fajnej dzielnicy nieco oddalonej od masowej turystyki. Jest blisko stacji kolejki "General Torrez". Na rogu znajduje się fajna miejscowa knajpka (tania). Dom wygodny, jest w nim duży pokój dla wspólnej posiadówy. Nie ma miejsca na samochód. Blisko jest sklep Pingo Doci. Czysto, są ręczniki, garnki i sztućce. Jedyny mankament - to brak otwieracza do wina. Z rana przychodzi przyjazny kot. Gorąco polecamy!
Don’t stay there if you’re not a smoker
Situation géographique idéale près du Douro. Propreté impeccable et une hôte toujours disponible. Logement adapté à la famille. Nous recommandons vivement.
A estadia foi muito boa. O imóvel é bem interessante e a localização é ótima. Mas não obtive resposta da empresa de Concierge.

El alojamiento se encuentra a 5 minutos andando de una estación de metro, y en dos paradas estás en en el centro de Porto. Sino te importa andar son 20 minutos hasta la plaza de la Ribera. Si viajas en coche hay un parking descubierto y vigilado 24 horas por 10 euros al día a 2 minutos del apartamento. Recomiendo utilizar parking. Durante nuestra estancia vimos como a un coche español le rompieron la ventana trasera para robar en el interior. Los vecinos nos comentaron que era bastante habitual. Por lo demás el apartamento es como aparece en las fotos y se accede por una calleja peatonal o bien por unas escaleras desde la calle General Torres. Si viajas en invierno la calefacción son 2 radiadores y una estufa de aire. Suficientes para estar a gusto. Sin lujos pero confortable. Nosotros viajamos con 2 hijos.

La casa está muy bien, muy limpia y con todo tipo de artículos básicos necesarios. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca del puente de Luis I. La única pega que le pongo es el acceso a la vivienda, puesto que se encuentra en medio de una cuesta empinada y cuesta llegar a ella con mucho equipaje. A pesar de eso, volveré sin duda en otra visita a la ciudad.

Apartmán má ideální polohu do centra a v blízkosti je obchod, restaurace i bar.  Je menší než se zdá z fotek, ale  na přespání je vyhovující.  Je spíše vybaven na slunečné počasí, ale přikrývek bylo dostatek.  Hostitel O.K. jen bych doporučil lépe vyladit předávání klíčů k apartmánu. Čekali jsme více než půl hodiny než bylo domluveno.  Jinak se nám v Portu moc líbilo :)
Perfect location, easy access to everywhere. Beds were comfy and hosts were really helpful. Porto itself is possibly my new favourite city in the world!
En una muy buena zona. Perfecto para 4 personas, no para 5 como dice el anuncio

+ The appartment is well located.
+ The check-in & check-out people were very nice.
+ It was clean and well prepared.

- For the check-in we had to wait for an about hour outside - in contrast to others, we were lucky it wasn't raining.
- We struggled a lot to contact the office of this company for a late check out - which we requested in advance and several times. "Sorry this number is off during weekends" was the answer two days after the check out.
- The appartment is smaller than expected. 
- Black mildew in the bathroom.

I guess this is the result when a company does airbnb, or some people wanna earn a good amount of money. Completely commercialised and standardised, still not well organised. 

Don't support this at all.
Super logement proche du vieux porto. Idéal en famille avec enfant en bas âge.
Residência com ótima (Website hidden by Airbnb) ótimas condições. Recomendo

Espaço amplo, limpo e bem localizado. O check-in foi flexível e facilitado pelo anfitrião. Para ser impecável, faltou melhorar a comunicação durante a estadia, para resolução de pormenores. Recomendo o espaço.
Bon emplacement, cohérent avec les photos. Calme et salon extérieur bien utile quand mauvais temps. Je recommande. William
Very nice B&B for 4 persons with a great location to explore the city.
Localisation parfaite ! La maison est bien équipée, il y a tout le confort nécessaire.

Le logement est conforme à la description, bien équipé, très propre et très bien situé (proche du pont Louis Ier et des transports). Idéal pour une famille. Un accueil chaleureux, avec de bons conseils pour visiter Porto et une belle attention à notre arrivée, sans oublier une disponibilité en cas de besoin. Tout le nécessaire pour passer un bon séjour...

La maison est vraiment à recommander. Nous sommes arrivés plus tôt que prévu. Et ils ont vraiment réagi très vite.
Sinon, nous avons pu visiter Porto à pied très facilement, soit en traversant le pont Don Luis par le haut ou le bas en fonction de ce que nous avions (Website hidden by Airbnb) faire.  L'appartement est très bien situé. 
C'était vraiment parfait. Nous avons trouvé l'essentiel dans la maison. 
Je reviendrai sans hésiter.
Logement très bien situé, proche du centre ville. Très propre. Très bon accueil. Commodités a proximité.

Nice place for your visit to Porto. Everything was clean and tidy. There was even a bottle of wine waiting for us. Just two negative  points. First one, lack of air conditioner. When we were there,  a heat wave was burning Portugal and it made hard to sleep. Second one, pics from the neighbourhood. Its a very old neighbourhood, though not dangerous nor bad conected to the center.

To sum up, I highly recommend this place for the money you pay

Appartement idéal pour des vacances sans voiture. Il est situé à l'entrée de PORTO, et à 5 minutes du métro pour rejoindre les périphéries de PORTO, et pourquoi pas la gare de SAO BENTO pour visiter le Portugal.

Bien équipé, avec des chambres spacieuses pour les enfants, on se sent à l'aise dans cette petite maison de rue piétonne dans le quartier historique de VILA NOVA DE GAIA.
La casa esta fenomenal, tiene de todo y está ubicada en un sitio muy céntrico, cerca de las bodegas. Tiene un parking muy cerquita. Para repetir
Super Unterkunft!
É uma rua pedonal. A rua é um bocado feia, mas a casa estava bem.

Residência bem cuidada, excelente localização em Vila Nova de Gaia, perto do metrô, da ponte D. Luiz, perto do centro histórico do Porto, das Caves de Vinho, da estação dos comboios,  de restaurantes  e de supermercados, rua da casa estreita e não entra veículos, somente esta ressalva.
Ótimo preço. Perto da baixa
Le quartier est très calme, le logement est très propre et bien équipé, proche du métro.    Nous recommandons.
Good location
Appartement idéalement situé, dans une rue piétonne, à quelques minutes du Pont Luis 1. Le service de conciergerie est aux petits soins. L'appartement était très propre et plaisant.
Séjour très agréable. Communication facile et réactivité. Appartement spacieux au calme.

Great convenient place. Enough space for 5 people. Incredible hospitality.  Paid parking was only 5Euro/day.
Will try to book the same next time.
La ubicación es perfecta, esta en una zona muy tranquila y muy cerca del centro.
Lugar muy correcto y acogedor. Recomendable totalmente
The location was great and Carlos & his team was very receptive and helpful. Thank you.
tutto perfetto
muy bien situado junto al río y cerca de el centro, bastante recomendable
El lugar es excelente!  es 100% recomendable.
El alojamiento estaba impecable con todo tipo de comodidades! Además, está muy cerca del centro (dos paradas en metro). Repetiríamos sin dudarlo!
très  bon accueil, très réactif, logement propre, sympa
très bon rapport qualité-prix, et très bon emplacement avec la tranquilité en prime!

Logement propre, agréable, bien placé et un très bon accueil. Malgré une demande d'intervention de la part du service technique, nous avons malheureusement passé notre séjour dans le froid car un appareil de chauffage ne fonctionnait pas.
Petite maison agréable pour un couple avec deux enfants. Attention par contre à l'accès au logement, rue piétonne et très en pente.

name: Bohéme 1BR steps from Prospect Park
summary: Beautiful, spacious 1 BR with 5 minutes walk to Prospect Park & 25 min. to Manhattan on the B/Q trains.  Or stay close to home and dine on Cotelyou Rd, visit the BK Museum, or catch a show at BAM!  1 bedroom, with additional NICE airbed for +2
space: This place was a labor of love! At this point, it's my happy place and will be yours, too.
description: Beautiful, spacious 1 BR with 5 minutes walk to Prospect Park & 25 min. to Manhattan on the B/Q trains.  Or stay close to home and dine on Cotelyou Rd, visit the BK Museum, or catch a show at BAM!  1 bedroom, with additional NICE airbed for +2 This place was a labor of love! At this point, it's my happy place and will be yours, too. You have full run of the space, including one closet. I am available to offer neighborhood highlights and give some suggestions. Either myself or my girlfriend will meet you to give you keys, etc.
access: You have full run of the space, including one closet.
interaction: I am available to offer neighborhood highlights and give some suggestions. Either myself or my girlfriend will meet you to give you keys, etc.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Felt very welcome. Description was accurate. Neighborhood was fine.

Ian is an outstanding host.  Friendly - kept in touch during our stay.  Very helpful.
Apartment was clean and comfortable.  He even left snacks for us.  Supportive and caring as we awaited the birth of our granddaughter. 
I will definitely call him the next time I come to visit my daughter and her family.

name: OPO.APT -  Art Déco Apartment 110-1
space: The OPO.APT – Oporto Apartments is a charming modernist building from 1936. The building is a noticeable example of the architecture Deco of the 30’s. This residence complex is the result of a restoration project at the year 2012, which recovered the exterior facades of the building and converted the interior spaces into practical and cozy holiday apartments.  This apartment is placed on the first floor of the building and integrates two bedrooms with two single beds each, living room with double sofa bed and TV, open kitchen to the dining room, and a bathroom with shower.  The maximum capacity is for 6 persons, and we provide you Internet (cable and Wi-Fi), air conditioning, heating, bed linen, towels, and a weekly cleaning. The OPO.APT – Oporto Apartments is located in the emerging Cedofeita´s area in Oporto’s center. It’s in the urban circuit between Oporto’s Downtown (“Baixa”), the old city center, and Boavista, the modern business center and hotel area. Although it’s placed in a c
description: The OPO.APT – Oporto Apartments is a charming modernist building from 1936. The building is a noticeable example of the architecture Deco of the 30’s. This residence complex is the result of a restoration project at the year 2012, which recovered the exterior facades of the building and converted the interior spaces into practical and cozy holiday apartments.  This apartment is placed on the first floor of the building and integrates two bedrooms with two single beds each, living room with double sofa bed and TV, open kitchen to the dining room, and a bathroom with shower.  The maximum capacity is for 6 persons, and we provide you Internet (cable and Wi-Fi), air conditioning, heating, bed linen, towels, and a weekly cleaning. The OPO.APT – Oporto Apartments is located in the emerging Cedofeita´s area in Oporto’s center. It’s in the urban circuit between Oporto’s Downtown (“Baixa”), the old city center, and Boavista, the modern business center and hotel area. Although it’s placed in a c
notes: No check-in, os hóspedes devem pagar a taxa  municipal de turismo: 2 euros por pessoa e por noite até um máximo de 14 € por pessoa. Crianças com até 13 anos de idade estão isentas deste pagamento.
house_rules: Não é permitido barulho, A partir das 20h é proibido fazer barulho no páteo ou na casa.

host.host_about: I'm an architect and I love traveling. This apartment is part of a small, but very interesting, modernist building in the city center of Porto. Rehabilitate this building allowed me to connect two of my main interests, architecture and travel.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Appartement très sympa et bien situé, petit souci de chauffage le premier soir , très vite réparé (nous étions les premiers locataires !!!) le lendemain. 
Quand l'appartement sera un peu plus équipé et décoré , il sera un lieu très agréable pour séjourner.

First of all, we would like to thank the owner of this apartment Joao for his hospitality and care. The apartment  is very comfortable, modern and stylish. It is located very close to the center and all main sights of the city.The apartment is situated in the perfectly renovated building which stands in the very cosy square with wonderful and also newly renovated buildings around.We also would like to mention that the walls of the apartment keep cool temptrature inside even during the very hot days that is very important and pleasant in the hot periods of summer. There are also very very comfortable beds and  may be the kitchen seems small in the pictures but it is very wisely organised and has everything for pleasant cooking.We highly recommend this apartment!!!!!

simple, clean apartment only 10 minutes walk out of the main part of town. Host was welcoming and arrived within 15 minutes to fix a small issue. Neighbourhood was quiet and peaceful, would recommend this apartment for up to 4 adults.
The apartment was in a great neighbourhood. Joao was a great host. There was an internet problem and he got it quickly fixed. I would return.

Appartement conforme à l'annonce : décoration sobre et contemporaine, équipement complet et de qualité .L’accès depuis l’aéroport est direct et simple ; le centre de Porto est accessible à pied . A recommander.

Joao - Art Deco apt is perfect !
We were 3 and it was very comfortable !
With everything we needed !
The location was great 2 min walk from metro 
Which ment the old part of the city was easy to reach  . We rented a car and parking was easy around the apt !
This will be my new and only place to stay in 
This Gorgeous city of Porto!

Nice, clean flat in art-deco house. It is located in the calm and green district of Porto, not very far from the center and metro station is realy close toit, so you can easily discover the city or go to the ocean. Had some minor problems with wi-fi and hot water, but Ihope they will be solved soon. Will love to return there once.

L'appartement est moderne et conforme à la description . Il est très bien situé , proche du métro et des bus : très simple à trouver . Idéal pour passer une semaine de vacances entre amies ! Aucune mauvaise surprise , je le recommanderai vivement !! Nous avons été très bien accueillis et informés par nos hôtes et avons passé une très bonne semaine dans ce magnifique pays !

Juste un petit soucis de chaudière réglé immédiatement par l'hôte .

Luogo perfetto in cui alloggiare. Siamo arrivati prima del checkin possibile (in teoria alle 16:00), ma Joao ci ha permesso di lasciare le nostre borse in modo che potessi iniziare a visitare la città senza fatica, per poi aver di nuovo l'appartamento agibile per le 12:00. Pulizia eccellente, e camere da letto confortevoli, con diversi cuscini a disposizione a seconda dei propri gusti. Essendo in 5, abbiamo arrangiato il divano come 5° letto, ma dato la buona dimensione si è rivelato comodo quanto un letto. In tutte le stanze è presente un condizionatore per tutte le evenienze, sia per un risveglio caldo la mattina sia per deumidificare l'ambiente. A soli 10 minuti dal centro a piedi e 5 da la casa de musica. Consiglio vivamente a tutti!

Après l'accueil par une dame très agréable, nous avons joui de cet appartement très bien placé en centre ville.

Un peu bruyant sur la chambre côté rue du fait d'une école située en face de la fenêtre, mais moindre mal du fait de l'emplacement parfait pour les visites

La salle de bain présentait quelques traces de moisissures et l'eau s'écoulait par terre pendant la douche, ce qui cause des problèmes de parquet

Malgré ces quelques détails, l'appartement est lumineux, propre et excellemment bien situé

Merci Joao
L'appartement était très propre et très bien place. Très bon accueil, mes parents ont été enchantés de leur séjour a Porto ! Super adresse a retenir !

appartement bien situé dans Porto, proche du centre ville, du métro, agréable, conforme aux photos.
très arrangeant pour les clés.

L'appartement est conforme à la description. Il est lumineux et très agréable. La chambre côté rue est la seule dans laquelle on entend la circulation, sans empêcher de dormir.
Le métro est très proche, le centre ville accessible à pieds, même avec des enfants. Notre avion ayant eu du retard, nous avons été tout de même accueillis avec le sourire..
A recommander.
La casa estaba muy limpia y todo en orden, dejo un mapa con puntos de referencia importante. Nos permitió dejar las maletas antes de la hora de entrada y después de la hora de salida.

Die Lage des Appartements liegt sehr zentral, das historische Zentrum ist zu Fuß in einigen Minuten erreichbar. Die Ausstattung des Appartements ist sehr gut. Empfang und Abreise problemlos.
Joao war telefonisch immer erreichbar und sehr freundlich. Sehr empfehlenswert!

Apartamento limpio y cómodo,tal y como aparece en las fotos.
Situado en un barrio tranquilo y a unos 20 minutos caminando del centro de la ciudad.
Sin duda ,una muy buena experiencia.
Absolutamente recomendable.

Appartement clair et bien situé. Aménagé avec goût. Quartier calme près du métro. Centre ville et musées accessibles à pied.
Pourquoi indiquer des prix différents à la semaine et par nuit ?
Nous sommes restés 18 nuits et n'avons pas pu bénéficier du prix par semaine.

Sehr schöne, modern eingerichtete Wohnung, genug Platz für 4 Erwachsene. Es war alles vorhanden, was wir brauchten. Außerdem lag sie sehr günstig, wenige Minuten von der U-Bahn entfernt, angenehmer Stadtteil, gute Restaurants und Geschäfte in der Umgebung, Bäckerei um die Ecke. Wir empfehlen diese Wohnung allen, die Porto ein paar Tage erkunden möchten und kommen gerne wieder.

Nous avons aimé l'appartement de Joao, nous y avons passé 3 nuits, nous le recommandons. La literie est confortable, y compris le clic-clac dans le salon. Il possède tout l'équipement nécessaire. Cet appartement est très bien situé à 5 mn à pieds du métro et on peut garer une voiture. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Joao mais il est facilement joignable.
Daniel et Nathalie.
L'acceuil était vraiment parfait, l'appartement très propre.
De buurt was heel dicht bij het centrum en het appartement was prachtig! Alles was schoon en voldeed precies aan de omschrijving.

Nos ha gustado todo! El piso es súper cómodo y céntrico. Nos han recibido las maletas antes de la hora del check-in y nos han recomendado un lugar para comer. Había una pequeña guía de servicios cercanos y lugares de interés, el piso estaba muy bien equipado (cocina, nevera, microondas, sscador de pelo, plancha y hasta toallas!) y con Internet funcionando perfectamente. 100% recomendado. Muchas gracias Joao!

l'appartement est fidèle aux photos, il est bien situé, l'endroit est calme (seul petit bémol pour la chambre coté rue, un peu bruyante). Il est très fonctionnel et spacieux. La proximité du métro et des commerces est idéal pour un séjour à Porto.
nous avons pu déposer nos affaires plus tôt dans l'appartement ce qui nous a bien arrangé. merci pour ce séjour

We spent 3 nights in this spacious and quiet apartment. Only 5 minutes walk to the Metro  station .Found everything we needed in the kitchen. Slept well in comfortable beds. Had our private carpark  right in front of the door  and enjoyed a friendly welcome frommen Joao and Maria. OBRIGADO for all this. Rudolf&Monika

Très bel appartement,agréable, spacieux, lumineux et très propre. Fidèle aux photos présentées. Linge de lit et de toilette fourni. Bien placé, à côté du métro et proche du centre ville. Seule la chambre située devant côté rue est un peu bruyante (rues pavées). Excellent séjour.

This appartment was very nice and comfortable! The beds were good. We had good nights. It was just big enough for 4 adults. We loved the neighbourhood, and the metro was also near the appartment. When I come back to Porto, I will take the same appartment again. Thanks for this clean and clear place in Porto!
A very, very nice flat just a few minutes from the subway station, with which you can easily get to the center of Porto. It has everything, that you need for a good city trip :)
Todo muy bien quedamos muy contentas con la estancia.El apartamento cuenta con todo lo básico y está bien situado. Ninguna sorpresa desagradable Lo recomiendo sin dudarlo!
El apartamento es tal cual se ve y está muy limpio. La experiencia en Oporto y en el apartamento de Joao ha sido estupendo.

Positiv: 
- von der Wohnung war fast alles gut zu erreichen
- die Wegbeschreibung war hilfreich
- Die Sauberkeit der Wohnung war zufriedenstellend
- Es war fast alles Notwendige vorhanden

Negativ:
- eines der Schlafzimmer war nur mit Ohrstöpseln zu benutzen, weil es zu einer stark befahrenen, mit Kopfsteinpflaster belegten Straße hinausging
- der Couchbezug war vielfach befleckt
- in den Duschecken war schwarzer Belag (vielleicht Schimmel?)
- der Wohnung fehlte jede Athmospäre - alles weiß gestrichen, kein Bild, keinerlei Decoration....vielleicht sollten die Deco-Elemente der Fassade als nichtssagender Purismus in der Wohnung fortgeführt werden.....
- Am Morgen des zweiten Tages wurden wir 07.45 Uhr von Hämmern, Bohren und Sägen aus der Wohnung über uns geweckt. 
Sie gehört dem gleichen Vermieter. 
Da es den ganzen Tag in Strömen regnete, mussten wir statt Ferienerholung den Lärm bis 18.00 Uhr ertragen.
Als Reaktion auf eine Beschwerdemail über den Krach der Umbauarbeiten teilte der Vermieter mit, dass die Arbeiten eigentlich vorher erledigt werden sollten und versprach, dass die lärmintensiven Arbeiten vorbei (Website hidden by Airbnb) nächsten Morgen um 07.30 Uhr ging es genauso laut wie am Vortag weiter.
Wir sind dann für anderthalb Tage und eine Nacht nach Lissabon "geflohen" und haben in einer weiteren Mail um einen Ausgleich für die Lärmbelästigung gebeten.....und auch dafür, dass er uns nicht nicht vorher informiert hatte und wir so keine Chance hatten, noch etwas anderes zu buchen.
Der Vermieter fand es angemessen, uns als Ausgleich für mehrere lärmvergiftete Urlaubstage ein paar Kekse an die Tür zu hängen......

We loved the house and it was our shelter after a hard day walking around Porto in the rain. The location is very good and we felt really confortable during our stay. 
We would highly recommend it to anyone who goes to visit Porto!!

La zona es muy céntrica  y queda a tan solo 2 min de la estación de metro.  El apartamento es muy funcional y limpio. La cocina está bien para uso ocasional  y el fregadero de los platos requiere cierta concentración por su pequeño tamaño .
El único inconveniente que tuvimos fueron las obras de la planta superior ya que los operarios nos despertaban con el ruido.
Nos tocaron unos días con lluvia y mucha humedad y se generaba cierta condensación.
Agradecer que a pesar de llegar después media noche nos estuvieron esperando para hacer la entrada.
Nos apetece regresar de nuevo en primavera.Gracias por todo.

Le logement de Joao est exactement semblable aux photos, propre, clair et accueillant. Deux serviettes étaient posées sur chaque lit à notre intention. 
 Un peu de bruit et de lumière dans les chambres à noter pour ceux et celles qui ont un sommeil léger ; pour moi sans conséquences!! :)
Proche du centre en métro, à pied c'est tout de même un peu plus long... 
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer notre hôte mais avons profité pleinement de cette ville magnifique !! 
Allez-y en toute confiance.

L'appartement correspondait aux photos, bien, propre.
Serviettes disponible et drap.
Un peu de bruit  dans une des chambres à cotés de la rue pavé.

A 6 minutes du métro (top)
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer notre hôte mais une dame nous attendais.
Ville paisible.

Located in the central of Porto with a nearby access to public transportation. Perfect starting point to experience this wonderful city. 

The apartment it self is very nice: it is clean, well equipped and very comfortable! I can highly recommend João's apartment!
Han sido unos días perfectos en Oporto. La casa está super bien, muy cerca del centro andando y del palacio de cristal. Volveremos seguro!

Even if we didn’t meet Joao in person we managed to communicate. Joao had arranged everything for our arrival and replied to my messages when we had questions to ask him.
The flat was clean and looked exactly like the pictures. 
The location was ok, only 10min walk to town. We particularly liked it because it was quite and not touristic.
Thank you Joao for your availability. 
Laura

El apartamento fue una excelente opción. Muy bien ubicado, cómodo y luminoso. 

Llegamos antes de que nos pudieran entregar el apartamento y no hubo ningún problema para dejar las maletas y recibir las llaves.

Totalmente recomendable.

Accueil souriant malgré un retard d'une heure de notre part. Appartement lumineux, agréable, bien équipé et situé à environ 20 minutes à pied de l'hypercentre. Jolie placette avec arbres et conservatoire de musique. Le métro est à 5 minutes à pied et permet de rallier rapidement l'aéroport (ligne E qui passe toutes les 30 minutes) ou le centre-ville.

Nous sommes venu à 5 en famille visiter Porto. L'appartement dans lequel nous étions nous a plus que convenu. Il est situé à 5 minutes du métro et permet d'accéder facilement au centre ville de Porto.
On note juste des légères nuisances sonores cote rue (deuxième chambre). Sinon rien a redire, l'appartement est tel qu'il est présenté dans l'annonce !!
Je recommande!

Votre accueil simple et ponctuel malgré la barrière de la langue met en confiance. Nous n'avons pas eu de difficulté à circuler en ville en voiture et l'appartement est facile à trouver. Pas de difficulté non plus pour stationner à proximité, mais pour ceux qui veulent laisser la voiture sur place, attention le parking est payant les journées ouvrables. Il est préférable de réserver un emplacement auprès de Joao. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter la ville à pied. Porto est une très belle ville ou se côtoient comme souvent en ville, mais peut être ici plus qu'ailleurs, beaux bâtiments et bâtiments abandonnés, luxe et pauvreté.  L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions et est très bien. Il y a tout (linges fournis, fer à repasser, grille pain....) Il ne manque rien. Il y a d'inévitables petits problèmes (chaise desserrée, poignée desserrée) qui ne gâchent pas le séjour. La chambre coté rue est effectivement passagère et donc un peu bruyante malgré la fenêtre double vitrage. La faute en revient à la ville qui continue de revêtir certaines rues passagères de pavés, là ou un béton bitumineux ferait l'affaire. Au final, le bilan est très positif. Le dépaysement est total pour. Nous y sommes allés pour les 50 ans de mariage de mes parents. Ils étaient ravis... Nous aussi !!!
The apartment looked exactly as on the photos and is very well situated and nicely furnished. The beautiful Art Deco building is generally quite impressive.

The stay was very good with no complication.  There was everything we needed and it was easy to communicate with João.
We enjoyed our stay! Thank you !
Accueil parfait , quartier très bien situé à 2 mn du métro et moins d'une minute du bus .

Notre hôte ne nous attendait pas aussi tôt, j'avais indiqué 16h lors de ma réservation, nous sommes arrivés vers 16h heure française, comme il y a 1 heure de décalage, nous étions effectivement en avance,surtout que lui nous attendait vers 17h heure locale !!! petit problème de compréhension !
Sinon, appartement très bien situé.
The appartment was perfect! Very clean and everything we needed was there. The host was also accomodating concerning our arrival time.

Our stay was excellent, Porto is a wonderful and amazing City, the apartment was very nice and very clean and comfortable, the host was always ready to answer our queries immediately. 
I do recommend it deeply, and surely if one day I return back to Porto will be a pleasure staying in the same apartment.

Très bel appartement à proximité du centre de Porto, environ 20mn à pieds,conforme à la description réalisée sur le site!propriétaire à l écoute , avons eu des nuisances sonores dues à des voisins indélicats, Joao a su régler le problème le jour meme! Je recommande!

Viaggio a Porto dal 8 all'11 Settmebre a casa Art Deco. Comunicazione eccellente prima del nostro arrivo con indicazioni più che precise.
Al nostro arrivo ci ha accolto una signora gentile che ci ha spiegato la casa e le zone limitrofe con supermarket, bar, ristoranti, etc.
Comoda sia ai mezzi pubblici che a piedi per raggiungere le zone nevralgiche della città.
Pulizia ottima.
La casa è proprio come da descrizione. Ci tornerei anche subito.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré notre hôte et il ne s'est pas manifesté lors de notre séjour : aucun conseil sur les attraits de Porto, les visites à ne pas manquer, les bonnes adresses !!
Apartment very comfortable and conveniently situated close to Metro and shops. Although across the road from the school, place is very quiet.
The apartment was great, clean and central to porto.

El apto es excelente, su ubicación muy buena, las habitaciones limpias. En términos generales se presentan condiciones que hacen agradable la estadía  en el apto. Recomiendo este apto para  otros viajeros

Very nice host with great communication. The apartment is as described and in a very nice location, very close to a metro stop with several lines that takes you all over. The apartment has all the items you need. Both bedrooms are a nice size. Clean and comfortable.

Super logement, très propre. 
A quelques minutes d un metro, la ville n est pas bien loin.
Sur place : des brochures et guide sur la ville. Sèche cheveux, serviettes de bain, fer a repasser, frigo, ... 
Côté négatif : la chambre côté rue est un peu bruyante et les lampadaires éclairent la pièce.
Je recommande !

Joao, was a perfect host, it was very easy to get in contact, the appartment was clean and is very good for 4 persons. Nice bedrooms, good beds.
Metro nearby. Everything was all right.
We had a perfect stay.

Ótima  experiência no Porto.  João super anfitrião estava nos esperando para o check in e foi mto amável, ótimo apartamento com todas as comodidades. Super equipado e moderno. Ótima vizinhança , tudo aquilo que se espera para uma boa estadia.  Na próxima vez voltaremos por aqui.
Nos encanto

Un piso excepcional y en zona tranquila pero cerca, a 25 minutos del centro. Amabilidad en el trato y además nos habéis dejado tener las maletas el último día para aprovechar nuestro viaje. Estamos encantadas, estaba todo limpísimo, en buen estado y la cocina totalmente equipada para poder comer en el apartamento, las camas muy cómodas y aires acondicionados y calefactores para adaptar la temperatura. 
Totalmente recomendado.
Muy limpio y acogedor,cerca del transporte publico

Die Wohnung ist vom Flughafen aus sehr gut mit der Metro zu erreichen. Man ist schnell (ca. 30 Minuten) zu Fuß in die Innenstadt gelaufen, hat also gleichermaßen eine ruhige wie zentrale Lage.
Die Küchenausstattung ist für 4 Personen ausreichend, es gibt viele Sitzmöglichkeiten, die Größe der Zimmer ist ausreichend und es gibt einen großen Esstisch zum Spiele spielen :)

Wir würden die Wohnung empfehlen, allerdings gibt es ein Manko: die Wohnungen darunter und darüber gehören ebenfalls dem Vermieter. Die Wände bzw. Decken und Böden sind sehr hellhörig, weshalb wir aufgrund der anderen Mieter keine wirkliche Nachtruhe hatten, da sie laut und lange Partys gefeiert haben. Wir würden empfehlen, die oberste Wohnung zu mieten, dann käme zumindest kein Lärm von oben.

El apartamento está muy limpio y está bastante bien equipado. Es moderno y para 4 personas está genial. El barrio es tranquilo y está a unos 15 min del centro andando. Muy bien comunicado.
Todo muy bien.
The apartment is on great location, very clean and
Buena estancia! Buena localización y todo muy limpio

Bardzo dobra lokalizacja
Dobre wyposazenie
We loved the apartment, wish we could have stayed longer! It was clean, well designed and well located.
Joao was a very good host, easy to contact and helpful. The apartment is located in safe and nice area. We really enjoyed our stay, highly recommended!
El apartamento muy limpio y bien situado. Tal y como muestran las fotos. Buen trato del propietario. Flexibilidad con el horario. Un 10.

João's apartment is spacious and clean! We enjoyed having three separate rooms and lots of space to hang out. It's possible to walk from the apartment to the main center (around 20-30 minutes), but the subway is also less than 5 minutes away. João was very helpful, and he even drove over to help us figure out the door lock!
El apartamento es perfecto para 5/6 personas, y João nos ha ayudado en todo. ¡Muy recomendable!
El apartamento es genial, tal y como se muestra en las fotografías. Es céntrico y muy bien comunicado! Es ideal para pasar unos días en Oporto.

Bij aankomt werden we meteen goed ontvangen. Makkelijk te bereiken met de metro vanuit zowel airport als het centrum. Alles zag er super netjes uit. Binnen 1 km zat een supermarkt, wat leuke restaurantjes en koffiewinkeltjes. Het centrum was op zo'n 15 min lopen of een paar minuten met de metro. Top vakantie gehad!
Modern appartement in a quit neigberhood. Totally worth its money!
This is a lovely, bright, clean, comfy, safe, apartment, close to Porto. great value for money. Great communication too. would recommend.
Perfecto! Ideal para ir en familia, céntrico, limpieza sobresaliente.

O apartamento do João é ótimo, muito organizado, confortável e limpeza exemplar.
A localização também é ótima e um lugar muito agradável!

Se eu voltar a Porto com certeza ficaria novamente neste lugar!!

We loved that the location is within a slow 20 minute walk to the centre of the old town and if required the Metro and Bus stops are a 5 minute walk. The apartment is well laid out for 4 people and very comfortable.

È stato un fine settimana molto piacevole.
Molto comodo per la metro ed anche per raggiungere il centro anche a piedi.
L'appartamento è bello, letti comodi e doccia ampia. Confortevole.
È dotato di punto cucina, c'è tutto quello che serve.
Soddisfatto!
Un apartamento magnífico a pocos minutos del centro.
Zona tranquila, ideal para ir caminando a los lugares más concurridos de Oporto, la casa es perfecta tiene todo lo necesario de una vivienda.

We liked apartment of João. It was clean, well equipped, great location and João had perfect communication. We could check in earlier and also when we where checking out we could stay a bit longer. If we go to Porto another time, we would stay in the same place :) Thanks João!

João's apartment was very pleasant to stay in. It had all the necessities and was very clean and modern. It also had plenty of useful information and was close to the centre of Porto and close to the Metro. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Struttura essenziale, pulita e fornita di tutto. Posizione abbastanza centrale (15 minuti dal centro) e a pochi minuti dalla metropolitana. Host cordiale e disponibile.
Local impecável, confortável, limpo e bem localizado. Ótima recepção.
We had a fantastic stay at João's apartment. The place is very clean, we were welcomed and the cleanliness of the apartment is outstanding.

We had everything we need in the apartment which is clean and spacious for 4 of us. We didn't try to walk to town centre but took Uber to (Clérigo tower) which cost only about 5€ as we had an aged mother and we didn't want her to deal with stairs to access the metro. It works out cheaper (for 4) than to buy a metro ticket for each trip. The bus-stop is just diagonally opposite and takes you to Trinidad. There's parking infront if you have a car.
We enjoyed the food court at Praça do Bom Sucesso which is a 10 mins walk from the flat. A part from that the upstairs neighbor were talking and walking around till past 1.30 am on our last night :(  
We had no problem the first 2 nights though.
All in all we are happy with our stay.
This place was great, brand new, very clean, comfortable beds and shower. Definitely recommend it.

Spędziliśmy w Porto czery dni, bylysmy z dwiema córkami 12 i 15 lat  mieszkanie super, mamy porównanie do warunków w Paryżu i Porto wypada dużo lepiej. W mieszkaniu czysto, pościel i ręczniki na 5-tkę. Lokalizacja bardzo dobra, gospodarze bardzo elastyczni jeżeli chodzi o przyjazd (byliśmy o 1 am) i wyjazd. 
Tylko można wymienić patelnię na nową; )
Krzysztof &Co (2+2)

Joao was a great host, very convenient. His apartment is exactly what I expected. Next to an Underground station. 
We had a great time !
Apartamento ótimo , bem localizado e  atendimento excelente!

El nombre de la plaza en donde se ubica el apartamento, no es muy conocida por los taxistas u otros transportes. Conviene dar la referencia de la Rua Bonavista  y del antigüo hospital (cerrado) María Pía

This place was exceptional in every way . Location was superb and the apartment was funky and functional . More than we expected. Our host was accomodation and very very good with communications. Highly recommended. 
I will definitely return to Portland stay in the exact apartment again .

Localização excelente. Perto da estação do metro e servido por diversas linhas de ônibus. Mercado, farmácia, igreja, hospital e outros serviços bem próximos. Apartamento claro, limpo, sinlencioso e bem mobiliado. Local seguro.
Everything was simply fantastic. We hope to stay again at João’s flat in the future!
Eu e minha família adoramos o apartamento, muito aconchegante com tudo aquilo que precisávamos, a localização é ótima, muito perto do metrô, o que facilitou bastante! recomendo!

We spent a magnificient week end. Very comfortable place and avaibility of the owner.
We recommand it !

Great location and nice apartment. You will enjoy your stay there. Just one watchout - there are two doors and no automatic option to open it (by code or ringing to neighbors) - if you forget the keys you need to contact with host.
Excellent location, very friendly hosts and beautifully clean and comfortable space. Thank you very much,
Todo muy limpio. Pudimos acceder antes de lo previsto
Really close to metro station - so easy access from airport
Boa localização. Quem não se importa de andar um pouquinho consegue chegar a um grande número de locais de interesse em meia hora ou menos.

We had a nice stay in this apartment.
Thank You!
Very nice apartment. Clean, spacious. Perfect communication! Highly recommended!
Very nice and clean flat in a calm and pretty neighborhood. Great communication with the host.

Propre / accueil au top / emplacement plus que correct.
Rien à dire je recommande les yeux fermés.

El apartamento impecable , bonito y bien situado.
Cumplió nuestras expectativas; lo recomendamos

The experience staying at Joao’s apartment was great, the location is very near to Carolina Michaelis metro station, about 5~10 mins walk, great connection to all attractions. Nearby shops sell delicious local pastries and Portuguese pastries. Joao responses very quickly to our questions too, the hospitality was excellent. I would recommend it to friends and family.
Great place. I recommend it
The apartment is perfect!! Thank you so much!!
A well located, very clean apartment. Would definitely recommend. Three boys stayed here for a 4 night stay in Porto and it provided an ideal base
Appartement très lumineux, calme tout en restant proche du centre ville
Boa localização, tranquila e a propriedade bem espaçosa.
Nice clean and spacious apartment! Nearby subwaystation so good transportation possible. Some noise of a road when you sleep with an open Window
It was a very nice appartement with a cozy atmosphere. We would recommend staying here!
Nice apartment to stay, very clean!
Wszystko zgodne z opisem. Na naszą prośbę Joao przygotował dziecięce łóżeczko turystyczne. Zdecydowanie polecam.

La experiencia en el apartamento de Joao ha sido muy buena . Apartamento espacioso , moderno y muy limpio . No hemos echado a faltar nada . 
No conocimos a Joao , nos atendio una chica , que nos explico el ap y nos dio las llaves . 
No tuvimos problema con la hora de llegada , se adaptaron al horario.
Sin duda , volveriamos
Olga

Wir hatten schöne und abwechslungsreiche Tage in Porto. Die Lage des Apartments ist sehr gut. Die Metro Station Carolina Michaelis ist in wenigen Gehminuten erreichbar. Auch das Stadtzentrum ist zu Fuß in 20 Minuten erreichbar. Das Apartment ist gut ausgestattet und sauber.  Die Betten war sehr bequem! Schlüsselübergabe hat bestens geklappt. Für einen Städtetrip sehr zu empfehlen.
Joâo a un appartement très bien placé, grand qui dispose de tous les accessoires nécessaires. Très bon rapport qualité prix.

O apartamento é bem espaçoso, confortável e aconchegante.  Próximo ao metrô e a alguns mini mercados. As camas só possuíam o lençol de elástico, sem o lençol de cima. Também não possuía as amenidades de banho ou cozinha (como sabonete, shampoo, azeite, café), como encontrei em outros apartamento do AirBnB. Apesar disso, recomendo muito o apartamento, voltaria sem dúvida!
Great stay with my family :) Big space and nice location!

Très bon accueil malgré une heure tardive d arrivée. La proximité du centre de porto et la proximité du métro. Quelques commerces et restaurants. Le bémol, La rue est un peu bruyante à cause du passage des voitures sur la route pavé. Mais très peu de passage la nuit.
logement bien placé et calme. Toutefois, les serviettes et le linge des chambres a coucher sont tachés ( eau de javel) et le seche linge promis etait absent...

Proche du métro, centre ville non loin à pied.
Appartement bien équipé, sécurisé et propre.
Es un lindo apartamento, con mucha luz, buenos espacios y con todo lo que necesitas para  sentirte a gusto. Muy bien localizado, vecindario tranquilo y cercano a muchos lugares. Muy recomendado!!
Place was spotless has all you need.
Geniaaaal
