summary: An ideal location for a big group, two apartments in the same building, one directly above the other.  Huge choice of stunning experiences can be included: Jet skis, Flyboard, Parasailing, Jet boat, Hoverboard, Sailing trips, Kayaks, Segways ...
space: NOTE: Local city tax is NOT included in the price paid to Airbnb and must be paid upon arrival. Currently the city tax is €2.48 per person per night up to a maximum of 7 nights for guests over 16 years old. NOTE: If you want to see all my properties and boats please have a look at: https://www.airbnb.com/s?host_id=135703. The apartments are situated on the second and third floors, at the front, in a traditional 1930’s apartment block, which has recently been fully restored to a high standard. You can also add different stunning activities:  - Jet Ski rides, €100 for 30 minutes, or 180€ for 60 minutes (no license required - up to 2 people). - Flyboard experience: €85 / 15 minutes (1 person), €160 / 30 minutes (up to 2 people), €300 / 60 min. (up to 4 people), or 450€ / 90 min. neighborhood_overview: What's nearby  This apartment is located in central Barcelona only 250m from the famous Sagrada Familia.  There are four supermarkets and all normal shops within a 100m radius as well as several secure public car parks. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants very close by.
notes: — How do you book instantly? — INSTANT BOOKING is active for this property, so you can book instantly and get INSTANT CONFIRMATION without having to make a request to me first. But of course, do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or special requirements about this apartment. That is what makes it all work! — What about late check ins? —  For scheduled arrivals after 21:00, there is an additional € 50 late check in fee that must be paid on arrival. This fee will only be charged for scheduled late arrivals not late arrivals caused be flight delays.  LOST KEYS: I always provide a minimum of two sets of keys for the property. However, in order to do that I must make a fixed charge of 30€ for each set of keys that are lost during your stay. Permit number: see first photo.
transit: I only takes five minutes to get the 'Sagrada Familia' metro station where you have direct access to the L2 (purple) and L5 (blue lines).  Street side parking is free in August but I can provide access to parking at cut prices all year round.
access: The whole apartment is for the unique use of my guests.
interaction: — What about me? —  I'm Nick your English host in Barcelona. My business is running several holiday rental apartments that are all within a few minutes walking of my own house. Consequently, I am available at all times to help you during your stay. I will be present to greet my guests and take whatever time necessary to provide the maximum information to ensure they have a pleasant stay in Barcelona. All my properties are licensed and officially registered with the 'Direccío General de Turisme of Catalunya'. I can also arrange other activities, such as sailing trips, jet ski rides, Segway tours, bike and scooter rental, and outlet shopping, to name but a few. I always send full arrival instructions as soon as I receive a reservation with details of how to get from your arrival point together with loads of other useful information.  I can also arrange airport pick up for up to ten people at very competitive rates:  - up to 4 people €49  - up to 6 people €69  - up to 8 people €79  - up t
house_rules: There are not any hard-and-fast house rules but please try to respect the following: Please treat the property as you would your own so it remains in a good state for future guests. WARNING: The apartment is in a residential block where local working people live, so late night noise  in the apartment and public areas MUST be avoided (after 22:00 and before 08:00 ).  If the neighbours call do call the Police because of noise, they will come because it's a tourist apartment, and they will level a fine of a minimum of €75.  This is common practice throughout Barcelona! Guests must not hang anything from the balcony because local by-laws in  Barcelona do not permit that and doing so can result in a visit from the Guardia Civil and possibly a fine. Please take care NOT to leave the key in lock on the inside of the front door because even if you have the other set of keys with you you will not be able to unlock the door from the outside. The only solution will be to call a locksmith, which w

host.host_about:
I'm Nick your English host in Barcelona.

I'm a full time host with several holiday rental apartments that are all within five minutes walking of my own home. Consequently, I am available at all times to help you during your stay.

All my properties are licensed and officially registered with the 'Direccío General de Turisme of Catalunya'.

I can also provide many optional services like, airport or cruise port pickup and garage parking, and activities such as, sailing trips, jet ski or fly board rides, Segway tours, and bike or scooter hire, to name but a few. If you need something special, just ask, and if I can organise it for you, I will.

If you are looking for a place in Barcelona that is centrally located and very well communicated, try one of my apartments or my yachts.

address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments: Nick is a wonderful, good natured, and accommodating host.  He met us at the apartments, showed us in, and explained the neighborhood to us.  The apartments are clean, nicely furnished, quiet, and in a fantastic neighborhood close to the Sagrada Familia, with all the necessary amenities.  The layout is really good for small groups or families. Every room has a door on it which means that even unrelated guests can have privacy.  I stayed in the apartments with a group of university students.  They were thrilled to have the combination of privacy with cooking facilities.

Great location, Saint Family Church is within 5 min walk. Easy to get around, by tube, by walk or bike. Modern and stylish furniture, clean bathroom, well-equipped kitchen, generous supply of quality coffee and tea.  A perfect place to stay.

Perfect.
12 people shared the two apartments. 
Supermarkets around the corner (take the one up the road to the right ;)
Fully equipped kitchen, coffee inclusive.
Absolutely recommended.
Thanks.

It was an wonderful experience staying at Nick's (Website hidden by Airbnb) place is really nice, well-furnished, well-equipped and clean.Very convenient location, a small walk from the one of the best attraction of Barcelona; the Sagrada Familia church.You can see it from balcony. There are many supermarkets, cafe, bakeries around. The metro station is very close and you will be well-connected to the major attractions.
Nicole was very friendly and helpful, he answered all our questions with patience.
Highly recommended!
The double apartment is comfortable and clean, supermarkets nearby, tram connection 5min away. Nick was a very nice host, gave us good information about the city.

Our first Airbnb experience (and first leg of a ten day Spain trip), fortunately we started w/ Nick who got us off on a good start! Fabulous location in a quiet elevator building under 300m from the Sagrada Familia (and its metro station), very easy to travel throughout Barca via metro, bus (for the braver few) or cabs (plentiful except on Sundays). Lots of little cafes, restaurants, delis, pharmacies nearby.

The apartment itself was very comfortable for the four of us in two bedrooms and could take another 1-2 easily through a pullout couch.  Big dining room that served as war room each morning as we plotted our schedule. Brilliant views of Gaudi's incomplete cathedral from the balcony.

Nick's a great host, very accessible both before and after our stay, and went out of his way to give us information about the apartment, its vicinity and Barca as a whole. Special thanks to him for giving us directions to the hospital during our last night, when one of us keeled over with food poisoning

Nick has been an excellent and a very warmful host.
His two apartments are really vast, well-furnished and very clean.
It is perfect either : 
- for a bunch of friends wanting to spend a week-end. 
- for a family (lots of space for children to play)

In a word, my friends and I fully recommend him and his apartment. 

Sylvain

Nick was an absolutely fantastic host. We rented two flats for 12 people. He met the guests on time, was very kind with recommending great restaurants and was easy to contact. Prior to travelling Nick was also very helpful with planning our stay there. 
The flats were clean and comfortable, including the pull out beds. The pictures do them justice.
Would definitely recommend the apartments and the host, thanks Nick!

The apartment was exactly as explained and it was in a fantastic location.  Like 4 blocks from Sagrad Familia or metro station.  There were 8 of us so we booked both apartment 2 & 3 and it was enough room for all of us.
Right across from a school so it seemed like a very safe, friendly neighborhood.  We enjoyed our 3 day 2 night stay immensely!
I would definitely rate Nick has helpful and very kind.  He left us restaurant recommendations and a city map.  He also arranged transportation from the cruise ship pick up area and then to the airport when we left.  Very reasonable prices and we didn't get ripped off.
I would stay here again if I get back to Barcelona.  Great price and customer satisfaction here.  Long live Airbnb!

We had a great time at Nick's place. These are in fact two apartments for the price of one, one on top of the other, so we had plenty of space for the 9 of us. Both apartments are fully equipped, there are even two computers for guests to use. If you're a tourist the location is perfect, in a quiet area but with plenty of commerce and restaurants around, just two blocks away from Sagrada Familia and very well connected to major attractions. Nick's a great host, very helpful and flexible!

We (four adults, four children) had a great stay in Nick's apartments. They were very clean and well stocked and we particularly appreciated the goodys left for us in the fridge.
Centrally located, the apartments were a great base to explore Barcelona.  Nick was a perfect, friendly, host and gave us lots of recommendations, several of which we followed up and enjoyed.  He was also able to provide a baby sitter (his lovely son) who got on fantastically with our kids and enabled us to have a grown up night out!
Thanks Nick, we will return!

Really nice apartments and warm welcome (instructions to get to the apartment, nice details such as milk in the kitchen, soap in the bathroom, clean towels... ) 
We were a group of ten people (five in each apartment) and we all enjoyed a lot our stay. :)

Nick was a great host - he came to meet us at the apartment at the agreed time, showed us around the apartment, gave us some useful tips, etc... exactly what you'd expect from your host. In addition, we even got to leave our luggage in one of the apartments which came in handy due to our late flights. The flats are very nice, close to the sagrada familia, and with all the necessary amenities nearby. Would visit again!
Excellent service from friendly host, clean apartments and nice surroundings.

We were seven members of a family occupying Nick's two apartments and we had a wonderful stay there. The location is excellent, close to shops, restaurants and metro. The aps are well equipped and Nick provided us with maps and useful information as well as arranged for our transport from the airport. Highly recommended!

Nick was a great host. He was a wonderful and considerate. We received warm email welcomes, lot of helpful advice on what to do in Barcelona and most importantly where to eat, and even where to buy  tickets for a football match. Our apartment was stocked with the essentials like coffee and milk, which was really nice. 

The apartment itself is clean neat and charming. The biggest plus is its proximity to the metro station- which made it very easy for us to explore all of Barcelona. There are also plenty of restaurants bars, and charming parks walking distance from the apartment.

We, 4 adults and 7 kids stayed in two of Nick´s apartments near La Sagrada Familia. Nick was a great host from the very beginning and helped us with all possible things. Nick's practical advise saved us a lot of time. Apartments were greatly located and ideal for two families travelling together. We had a great 9 days in Barcelona!

Nick apartment is absolutely great, both in term of location, style and space to host big groups of people. On top of this, Nick is a fantastic host and shared many useful tips about the neighborhood and the city in general. 101% recommended!

Séjour de 2 nuitées agréable avec vue sur la Sagrada Familia pour
un groupe d'amis de 11 personnes répartis sur 2 appartements avec
3 places de parkings à proximités réservés ,métro à 300m environ
Nick est trés sympa et parles français,il nous a reçu à notre arrivée 
l'appartement est correct draps et serviettes fournies,internet ,wifi
Estancia genial, todo limpio y ningún problema con Nick!! Recomendable!!

Great place near to Sagrada Familia, near to the metro station, baker shop, grocery shop. Clean and very comfortable. Nick- the owner helped us a lot, the comunication was great. We were with kids and we was surpriced when we find milk, coffe and flakes for the breakfast. So I recomend this place :). It was my firt trip with airbnb and it was great. :)

I would highly recommend Nick's apartments in Barcelona. There were ten of us and we stayed in two apartments in the same building. It was perfect for a big group. The apartments are lovely and have views of the Sagrada Familia. Nick was a brilliant host and even arranged taxis for us to and from the airport. Thanks for a great stay!
Nick was very helpfull, the flat was very good and clean.

El apartamento esta muy cómodo y equipado, en un céntrico barrio de Barcelona. Desde su puerta puedes ir caminando a la Sagrada Familia a 3min. Una muy buena opción para alojorte en la ciudad. El anfitrión Nick muy atento, con el no habrá ningún problema.

The appartments where we stayed were really gorgeous and very clean. The are located really close to the Sagrada Familia and two underground stations. Lots of really nice bars and shopping possibilities are also very close.
Nick was the best host you can imagine. He gave us a lot of useful information about where to get best Tapas, etc. He organized a taxi transfer from the airport and back without any problem. He was very nice and charming and we will absolutely stay with him.
tres bon quartier très bien situé hote très charmant mais nous aimerions dire que les appartements meriteraient un petit rafraichissement  séjour très agréable
Très beau Week end a Barcelone. Quartier agréable. Proche de tout. Appartement pratique. Nick a été très chouette et était toujours disponible pour nous aider. Merci pour tout
cumplió con las espectativas

We spent 3 days in Nick's appartment and we were very pleased with the facility and the location. Nick gave us some very good advices about restaurants and soghtseeing as this was our first stay in the city. We were 8 persons - 2 families travelling together and had 2 apartments in the same building. Very practical! The appartments vere spacious and cleen. Can definately recommend to other travellers!
Great

Lovely and clean appartment ! Great view on Sagrada familia ! 
The appartment was perfect. Very good locality with many shops around. It's easy to circulate via taxi and public transit.
Nick is a really helpful person. He gave us some tips on place to go.
We are 20 people and we had a wonderful stay. Thank you Nick.

La experiencia no ha sido del todo buena. Considero que las fotos no se corresponden con la realidad, pues la casa parece en perfecto estado y todo muy nuevo, y está todo muy usado y bastante sucio (paredes muy sucias, ducha rota, cisterna pierde agua, toallas blancas que ya no son blancas, sábanas hiper desgastadas que no huelen bien, muebles rozados, sofás con basura entre los cojines y grandes manchas...) La habitacion de las literas es bastante desagradable. Además llegamos a las 21.30 y por un incidente que el propietario no se percató, no estaba la casa limpia, camas usadas, etc. Este punto lo solucionaron enviando inmediatamente alguien que lo limpiara. Creo que la casa necesita un buen lavado de cara y ropa de hogar más higiénica. Detalles como un bote de jabón en el baño que usa todo el mundo, tampoco nos pareció bien, pues no cuesta nada poner unidosis o decir que cada uno lleve su gel. Las colchas no estaban recién lavadas, estaban usadas. Para alguien joven mochilero está bien por su situación, pero nosotros íbamos 12 personas de la misma familia de todas las edades, y todos opinamos que no se correspondía con lo que anuncian. La situación es muy buena, quizás la mejor de Barcelona.

I loved the location of the apartments. The beautiful view from the balcony really made it special. Also, the authentic feel of being in a traditional Spanish building really added to our experience along with the easy walking distance to transport, attractions and restaurants. Nick was very helpful with recommendations and made contact several times prior to the trip to ensure I was comfortable with the arrangements. A wonderful trip. Thank-you.

Communication with Nick was very straight forward. We made the booking via Airbnb and then we had to fill out a form he sent through with more details. There was a misunderstanding about our arrival times, but that was easily solved.

The flats are in a great location, close to supermarkets, transport, and walking distance to some of the main city spots. The first impressions as soon as you get there is that the flats do look better in the pictures, but you soon grow to love them and appreciate them.

There was 12 of us (we were celebrating my 30th) so the reason why we picked these flats is that we were concerned about being too noisy.  We looked at other locations and they all had very clear noise warnings, whereas there didn't seem to be any mention of that on this profile. However when we arrived we were told we had to make sure we kept our noise levels down, as neighbours didn't particularly enjoy tourists and  would call the police if it got too noisy (for which you'd have to pay a hefty fine). 

Having said that, no one complained. It's just something to keep in mind if this is something that as a potential guest is important to you. 

We had a fantastic time in Barcelona, and we'd definitely recommend staying in the flats!

Nick was very organized and helpfull. He responded immediately when i had a question. He could give is advice about everything like the public transport, how to get to the appartment etc. The appartments were perfect, clean and fully equiped. Our staying was very comfortable and I would recommend everybody his appartments!
Nick was great, really easy to communicate with and very flexible. He arranged a great sailing trip for us. The appartments were perfect, great location and everything we needed was there.
Nick was an awesome host. he was prompt and knowledgeable and the flats were lovely. Definitely would stay here again. Thanks Nick.

Nick est un très bon hôte. Il répond rapidement aux différentes demandes. Les appartements étaient conforme à l'annonce. Ils sont très proche de la sagrada familia, le quartier est résidentiel avec super marché (de jour comme de nuit) à proximité. L'accès au métro est à 5 min à pied.   
Nous étions à Barcelone pour un EVG, le standing qu'on recherchait était avec ces deux appartements largement conforme à nos espérances. Ne pas hésiter à demander à Nick d'autres prestations (segway,navette etc.), nous avons grâce à lui gagné du temps sur notre programme. 
Je le recommande sans problème.

Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Nick. Très arrangeant quant aux horaires.
Les appartements sont tout à fait conformes aux descriptions, en bon état, propres et bien équipés.. Ils sont également bien situés, à deux pas de la Sagrada Familia, facile d'accès. 
Le voisinage est calme.
Foncez sans hésiter.

right from the start Nick has been helpful, responsive and did everything he could to make our stay as pleasant as possible. When we arrived he spent 30 minutes chatting to us and answering all our questions about where to go and the best places to eat near by. The flat was lovely and having useful things like a dishwasher and washing machine made all the difference for our large group. would certainly stay again. thanks Nick!! -Thomas

Would highly recommend Nick and his team. The apartments were fantastic. Great location with a beautiful view of sagrada familia from the balcony. The apartments were very clean and tidy and very well kept. Nick well extremely friendly, helpful and informative on our arrival. We could not have asked for more. We had a brilliant trip. Many thanks.
Nous avons été bien reçus. L'appartement est accueillant, correspond bien à la description et aux photos publiées. A deux pas de la Sagrada Familia et 5 minutes en taxi de la plage. Je recommande.

Great time in Barcelona straying in Nick's place. Superb location and very clean and comfortable for our big group. Located close to some great restaurants and supermarkets if you want to self cater. I'd highly recommend

The appartments were very clean, exactly what you can see on the pictures. Nick was very nice and available for any requests.
The location is just next to the sagrada familia, around ~20 minutes walking from the center (barrio otico) but easily accessible in transport.
Great place. Exactly as described. Good value. Thank you!

Good place for a visit to central Barcelona. Two practical apartments close to Sagrada Familia, and within decent distance of public transport. Nick was very welcoming when we arrived, and spent lots of time with us giving us tips on where to go and how to go there. We also used the parking closest to the apartment, but to be honest a car in Barcelona is more a hindrance than an aid (as long as the city is your main target of interest). Overall good for its purpose: Sleeping and (some) eating. :-)

Eravamo un gruppo di 12 ragazzi, ci siamo trovati bene sia con il condominio che con la posizione. Quartiere molto tranquillo a due passi dalla sagrada familia vicino a supermercati e banca. L'accoglienza è stata ottima.
Hi Nick, of all, my family and I like your apartment very much and would like to introduce to every travelers with good experiences. The place is very nice and quite.

we enjoyed our stay very much !!! the location is great near sagrada familia. metro is not so far. local bakeries and supermarket in the area. free parking during august was great. the apartment was very practical and we highly recommend it.

Great apartments, everything we needed, great location. 
Nick and Dania were very helpful and good communication in the run up to the trip. 
Thanks

My team and I spent 2 lovely days in Barcelona in Nick's apartments. The flats are located right behind Sagrada Familia and the whole neighbourhood is very nice. It was also very close to our workshop location so we were able to walk there enjoying the warm weather. Both flats are basic but nice, there's plenty of space to host up to 7 people per flat and they were both very clean. Nick and Dania are great hosts and were very flexible allowing us an early check in and always available in case of questions.
Appartement très bien situé, propre et tout à fait conforme a la description. Les proprietaires Nick et dania sont très sympathiques et arrangeants. Je recommande.
I arranged through Nick a stay in Barcelona for some university researchers. The communication both before and after was really good. And we would for sure use his places again.

Buen amfitrion, servicial y atento en todo momento.
Apartamentos limpios, reabilitados y modernos.
Buena localización. Muy comodo para pasar unos días en Barcelona con familia o amigos.

Le logement est situé dans un quartier magnifique, central, où il est facile de faire ses courses et d'aller manger un morceau (je ne parle même pas de la Sagrada Familia, somptueuse, que l'on peut admirer du balcon!). Les deux appartements sont conformes aux photos : spatieux, bien aménagés, confortables et très propres. Nick est très accueillant, disponible, arrangeant... bref parfait!

Case come da descrizione a 5minuti a piedi dalla sagrada familia.
Appartamento pulito e con tutto il necessario per la permanenza.
Host molto disponibile, preciso e cordiale

Our stay with nick was great, on arrival he was very helpful and informative. He reassured us that he was there to help whenever we needed him. The apartment's were perfect, they were clean, spacious and were in a great location. Will definitely be back soon.

We and 11 of my friends stayed for 3 nights and it was perfect!
Just 2 blocks away from the beautiful Sagrada Familia, it is very easy to get anywhere in the city thanks to the different metro lines you can get directly from the Sagrada Familia.
The flat is spacious, everybody had a nice place to sleep, and for the price, I don't think there is a lot of competition.
To resume, if you want to gather with some friends for a nice week end in Barcelona, it is a perfect place.
Thanks to Nick :-)

This apartment has an excellent location. It's only a few minutes walking to sagrada familia and the subway. Nick is very nice and helped us a lot during our stay. Also the apartment is clean and big. I really recommend a big family choosing this apartment.

Appartement tres bien placé, à 5mn de la Sagrada Famiglia. Prestations conformes à la description et sincèrement, un hôte très sympa et ultra réactif ! 

On conseille !
Fue una estancia muy agradable. No tuvimos ningún problema con el alojamiento y nos gustó mucho, sobre todo su ubicación.

We went with a group of 10 people to stay a few nights there. The apartment was very correct and located in a perfect area. Literally 300M from the metro and the sagrada familia! The host is very friendly and flexible, he does this as his job so it is natural that everything goes smoothly. He helped us with a lof of different questions and different needs for our weekend away. He offers dozens of different services and is extremely helpful. One of the two apartments is a bit more luxurious then the other but in all very nice place to stay for a weekend. I would definitely recommend it!

Nick's apartments are in a great neighbourhood, just a couple of blocks from the Sagrada Familia. You'll never go hungry as there is a wide variety of both restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Although the apartments are not luxurious they are spacious, well-equipped and well-located. We had a fantastic stay in Barcelona. Thanks, Nick!
Nice and clean appartement, good location. Nick is a very friendly and caring host, he took care of everything we needed.

Nick was a legend. So accommodating throughout the whole booking process, in which our numbers constantly fluctuated. 

His communication was prompt and detailed and made the whole organisation of a 40th birthday for 20+ people effortless. 

As for the apartments, they were just as we expected. Absolutely perfect for us. Spacious, yet homely. We stayed across four apartments with roughly 5 people in each and it was ideal. There was scope to fit more people in but it may have become a bit cramped especially for the couples. But for groups of singles you could up the numbers as long as you don't mind a queue for the bathroom/shower.

We could walk between all Nicks apartments quickly and easily and he took us on a tour when we arrived so we all knew where the different apartments were. 

Bravo Nick.
Le quartier est très agréable, à quelques minutes à pied de la sagrada familia et les couchages étaient confortables

Nous sommes partis entre amis (un groupe de 12 personnes), les appartements sont idéals pour les groupes et très bien situés. En ce qui concerne Nick, il nous a extrêmement bien reçu, il a été sympathique et accueillant. Il a pris le temps de répondre à toutes nos questions (avant l'arrivée et le jour J), il nous a également donner des conseils pratiques pour l'organisation.

There isn't much to say, just that the two apartments were both great and we had an awesome time there. The places were clean and light, just like we hoped they would. We had a great view of the Sagrada Familia from the balcony, and around the street there are lots of little supermarkets and restaurants. The underground stop is also nearby. All together we had a great time here and I would surely recommend the apartments!
Apartment was in great condition and perfect location. Nick was very helpful at arrival given we were a big group and had to do multiple check-ins. Would 100% recommend!
The area is safe and convenient. The place is comfortable and spacious. We had a great time. The owner, Nick was very accommodating.

Nick made us feel very welcome and he responded quickly to all our questions.  He was also flexible with check in and check out where he was able to help.
The neighbourhood was great, the building and apartment was secure and it was an excellent location - a stones throw from Sagrada Familia and metro station.
The living space in the apartment was bright and the kitchen had dishwasher and a good range of cooking utensils.  The apartment was clean and reasonably comfortable.
The apartments were perfect. Just as described. Great location with great views. Perfect spot for trip to Barcelona. You can book with confidence.
Le séjour était top, nous avons été bien accueilli, à l'heure convenue. Les deux apparts étaient nickels, propres, confortables.

Nick was ok. Friendly and on time.
Gave me always all the info I have asked.
Nick was a great host. Extremely flexible and helpful. Highly recommend his place for large groups.

Séjour super. L'appartement est très beau et très bien équipé. Nick est un hôte très disponible et à l'écoute. Franchement, il n'y a que du positif à retenir. Nous avons tous était très  satisfait de l'appartement et de Nick. Merci encore.

Les logements sont parfaitement conformes aux descriptions, propres, confortables et bien equipes.
Nick nous a tres bien accueilli avec beaucoup de disponibilite. Le quartier est agreable, bien place (tout est accessible a pied grace au metro).
Une vraie bonne adresse pour visiter Barcelone en famille (et meme en groupe).

We stayed here for a little less then a week (there were about 10 of us) and it fit us well. We had two apartments (one floor apart) and it was great! The location is perfect to get anywhere in Barcelona. There were minor issues with the AC and Hot water - but nothing terrible or unbearable. The fridge and stove worked and served its purpose! And the host were very attentive when you needed them! I totally recommend this place!

During our journey in Barcelona we were provided with everything we needed, whenever we had a question Nick would always reply quickly. The neighborhood is quiet and well connected to the subway (40 minutes by subway to go to the beach). The 11 of us would recommend this flat to anyone who wish to have a good time in Barcelona !
Perfect location and clean house. Nick is extemely helpful in any way imaginable. Perfect service. Had a great time staying here.

We loved our stay here and the location was great.
The host was very accommodating and allowed us to check in as soon as we arrived in Barcelona which was 6 hours earlier than the check in time which was great. We also had some treats left for us in the fridge which was a lovely gesture.
I would recommend to anyone! It is so close to the Sagrada Familia you can see it from the balcony.
Only improvement I could suggest is air conditioning improvement as we were very hot at night (although what do you expect in 37 degree heat) although lots of fans were provided.
Would definitely come back and stay
Super logement, propre, tres bien place, tres bon rapport qualite-prix. Les peintures et la deco pourraient juste etre refaites, mais cela reste une excellente experience!

Appartement très agréable et très bien situé près de la Sagrada avec quelque commerce à côté. 
La literie était très confortable et tout était très bien. 
Merci à Nick de nous avoir attendu si tardivement avec le retard de notre avion. 
Nous recommandons!
Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt bei Nick und haben uns wohlgefühlt. Besonders die Kommunikation vor der Anreise war super. Gern wieder an diesem Ort.

Le logement est a coté de la sagrada familia, proche de restaurant, bars, du métro et du bus touristique de barcelone. Les deux appartements sont agréables, et assez grand pour 13 personnes. 
L'hote nous a attendu en bas de l'immeuble, a 23h, même si nous étions en retard.
Petit bémol sur les murs, qui selon nous pourrait être rafraîchit, avec la poussière un peu mieux nettoyée. Attention un supplément est appliqué après 23H.

Wij hebben een hele fijne vakantie gehad in Barcelona. Met twee gezinnen op vakantie en door de woning van Nick toch voldoende privacy, ruimte en gezelligheid. Fijne wijk om te logeren, op loopafstand van de Sagrada familia en de metro.
Nick heeft er voor gezorgd dat wij vooraf allerlei zaken konden regelen, bij aankomst zorgde hij er voor dat inchecken geen probleem was. Kortom.....een geweldige ervaring!
Dania was welcoming and helpful on arrival. Nick was helpful on the phone answering questions before we arrived

Très bon séjour entre amis sur Barcelone.
Appartement très bien placé, à 2 pas de la Sagrada Familia.
Seul bémol, le voisinage sensible au moindre bruit.
Appartement super bien placé près de la sagrada familia, très bien équipé ,propre, parfait pour un grand groupe comme le notre, rien à redire. Voisins ok si on les respecte .

We were a big group of 12 people and we stayed in these two really nice flats. 
The location was really good. It's close to the metro and other kind of public transport. The location is really close to Sagrada Familia and it has allowed us to explore the city without going too far from home, so it's really nice for families.

Le groupe d'amis que nous sommes a beaucoup
apprécié ces appartements, très confortables et
conformes aux descriptions. Très bien situés, proches du métro et des commerces. Lieu idéal pour visiter Barcelone, excellent accueil de Dania, en l'absence de Nick. Nous recommandons !
Fantástica ubicación y piso muy confortable, gracias! Y hasta la próxima!
Todo perfecto. Ubicación ideal, limpio y amable.  Fuimos todos muy contentos. Lo recomiendo

Excellent séjour dans ce 2 appartements, l'accueil par l'assistante de Nick à été parfait. Nous étions 11 personnes, tout s'est bien passé, l'appartement est bien disposé et globalement propre. L'accès se fait très bien, à 2min à pied de la Sagrada. Attention, le bruit peut vite poser problème, sans faire quoi que ce soit on entend vite ce qui se passe dans les appartements voisins. Je recommande vivement ces 2 appartements !
Des appartements très confortables idéalement situés, le quartier très sympa offre tous les besoins nécessaires. La disponibilité des hotes est parfaite. Je recommande!

Nick was great to communicate with - answering my many questions almost instantly. He was extremely accommodating with some of our last minute requests (transfers!)
Location of apartments were amazing - can see the Sagrada Familia from the balcony! Close to the metro and supermarket. Both very good value for money :)

Thank you!
Buena ubicacion. Para lo que necesitabamos suficiente.

Appartamento spartano ed essenziale, con arredamento un po' vecchio.  Ma tutto ben pulito e con organizzazione dell'Host molto buona. Zona tranquilla a due passi dalla Sagrada Famiglia e dalla metro. Ottima posizione.
Fantastic accommodation. Well equipped, comfortable and good location. The communication prior to our trip was fantastic. Would recommend to anyone.
Great location and axcomdation as described.  Recommend staying.
Fantastic location, Nick could not have been more accommodating, recommended.

This place is absolutely fantastic. It’s super close to La Sagrada Familia, which has a metro station which proved to be extremely useful to get around the city. It is also very close to a small grocery and convenience store, which was also useful. And it’s close to some restaurants, my favorite of which is el Meson de los Ancares.
 
We were a group of eleven and got two apartments, one right above the other, both of them with elevator access. The apartments were super comfortable for all of us. We didn’t really use the kitchen, so there’s not much I can say about that. But we used the washing machine, which proved to be invaluable. There is some space outside to hang the clothes dry, but a trick that helped us immensely was to simply hang it inside and use the provided floor fan. In just an hour or two, the clothes would be completely dry. We got our laundry done and it took us no time at all (quick tip, make sure you close the washer’s door tight; it won’t run otherwise :)).
 
The other super convenient thing was the wifi internet. It’s nothing super fast, but it proved to be very useful. The location is also very accessible via taxi. In fact, you can easily hail a taxi in a few minutes by walking around the block. Or you can use apps like mytaxi to get one on demand.
 
Overall, an extremely convenient apartment, and the check-in process was so smooth and delightful, that it really set a good tone for our stay. I highly recommend it. Me and my group are very happy with our choice, and it was a very relaxing and valuable place for a very busy schedule. I would definitely choose it again.

Great accommodation with loads of space for a gang to get together and enjoy Barcelona -the accommodation is spacious and practical with 2 bedrooms in each apartment -1double bed in 1room and 1triple bunk in the other -little balcony also makes a lovely addition 
Bathroom was traditional in style but hot water was plenty and it was clean -plenty of towels to take from also so home away from home for sure
Logement idéal pour un weekend Barcelonais !

This was a nice spacious place for larger groups. The location is fantastic for touring and for living like a local.

Nick was a really helpful host. He helped us arrange transportation from our cruise port and had lots of great advice for our stay.

It was a good location. Will come again.
Just one little thing: you can hear everyone in the building during the night. But that is normal for spanish buildings. 
It was clean. Next to Sagrada. The check in was perfect. Everything was fine. Thank you, nick & Ludmilla

Comfortable apartments located  200  meters from the Sagrada Familia, very well  communicated and in a neighborhood with multiple supermarkets and  places to eat. 

Nick has been a great host, always available to help us.
Nick is a very organized host and his place is in a very central location. Will definitely stay at his place again.

Appartements très spacieux bien placés, propres , literie confortable.
Nick est flexible et répond rapidement aux massages .

Great place. With a fabulous view of Sagrada Familia. A short walk from the metro so its ideal for city break. The apartment has everything you need and the beds are very comfortable. Communication through Nick and Ludmilla was excellent. We were a group of 9 and were all really impressed. Would highly recommend A+

The apartment is close to the famous Sagrada Familia and the train station in a quite residential neighborhood. It has a vast variety of places to eat and is comfortable for a family of four (we had two children under 11), it was comfortable place to stay while we were in Barcelona with the apartment block having an elevator which helps bring up the luggage.
Well air-conditioned for those hot Barcelona nights and the host Nick was exceptional, giving us local tips on Barcelona, where to eat and how to get around... even organised our transfer from the airport...

LOVED IT! It was clean, in a fantastic location and perfect for our needs. Nick is great at communicating and he was very accommodating. Check-in was a breeze as was checking out. I would stay here again and recommend this place to anyone.
Nicks place was seriously so awesome! A stones throw from Sagrada Familia and the apartments can comfortably hold 6 people. The orange cafe a cross the street is a MUST!
Good location! 2 minute walk to a the Sagrada Familia.
Communication with Nick was absolutely flawless. The place was according to description, we really enjoyed our stay.
Excellent emplacement pour un séjour au top !
Nice flats just next to Sagrada Familia

Apartments are exactly like the pictures. Forniture are fine and quite new. Location is fantastic. Clean and comfortable accommodation. Support and help by Nick and his team is absolutely perfect and fast. nick’s apartments will be for sure on my booking ideas in the future. Simply perfect.
Nice, central accommodation with everything in walking distance. Communication was excellent.

Thanks! Great balcony and wine bar downstairs! 

Will
Logement sympa et propre à proximité de la Sagrada Familia. Métro à 5 minutes à pieds.

We had a lovely weekend in Nick’s apartment.
Nick and Ludmillia were flexible with our check-in and check-out time. 

I recommend this flat for large groups.
Nick is a great host, replies always very fast and he's very reliable. The apartments were clean, well located and with a fantastic view on the Sagrada Familia.
Good location

We had a group of 10 stay between Nick's two apartments. Both apartments are in the same building. The location can't be beat as it is only a couple of blocks from the Sagrada Familia but in a quiet residential neighborhood with plenty of dining options. The bakery and supermarket on the same block were especially convenient for a quick breakfast before heading out to explore Barcelona for the day. It was perfect for our short 2 night stay and a great value given our large group.
We had a good stay, very friendly host!

Die Wohnung ist einer schönen Gegend nahe der Sagrada Famila gelegen. Drumherum finden sich diverse Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants. Die Anbindung zur Ubahn ist ebenso sehr gut. Das Appartment war selbst genau so, wie es auf den Bildern zu erkennen war. Einzig allein die direkte Nähe zu anderen Wohnungen im Innenhof war ein wenig störend, im Wohnzimmer war dies aber gar kein Problem. Alles in allem hatten wir einen guten Aufenthalt. Es war kein Luxus, aber die Beschreibungen der Wohnung trafen absolut zu.
Great location. everything you need there.
Cool location, easy communication! Everything was great!

Nick est très disponible (s'il ne l'est pas, ses "associés" répondront à vos demandes). 
Il est à l'écoute et les demandes sont prises en charge rapidement. 
Les remarques faites concernant la propreté ont été notées et prises en compte par Nick.

We had both flats - they are in the same building just on top of each other; It is a good place for a quick trip, meets the needs for two mid-sized families. 

The location is pretty good - being in walking distance to Sagrada Familia, and the check-in and communication went great. I was even lucky enough not to have any other guests checking in after us, so could stay there until I got my flight later in the afternoon.

All in all good value for money

I really would like to thank Nick and his co-worker Ludmilla for the great experience we had. The communication is perfect, they reply so quick on your questions or requests. The appartments are good for groups, everything that you need is available. Is close to not only sagrada familia, but also close to metro or nice spots around sagrada familia to visit! We had a really good weekend!

Many thanks to Nick and Ludmilla's quick and effortless support at all times. The apartments have a great location and are perfect for big groups. We very much appreciated the flexibility for early check in and late check out. 
We had a very good time.
Many thanks!
Denise
Vous ne serez pas déçu par l'emplacement, l'appartement est propre, par contre bruyant l'isolation est en-dessous , on entend les voisins.

LOCATION IS EVERYTHING!  The Sagrada Familia is only a short distance away.  

For specific « consumer » information about the lodging itself, write us an email outlining your questions:  (Email hidden by Airbnb)
Our crew truly enjoyed being in Nick's appartments. Communication was really easy and we got quick responses. Appartments were fresh and clean. Location was great also.
Quartier calme, appartements très sympa avec vue sur la Sagrada Família, très bon rapport qualité prix

Spacieuse and clean place , quite building , perfect location , safe surrounding ,near to no 1 city attraction plus supermarket , subway station and many good restaurants , fast hostcresponce ,  I and my family totally satisfied , thanks Nick and Lud .

name: 3 bedroom + 2 bathroom apt near MTR

space: There are 3 rooms 2 with double bed 1 with 1 double bed & 1 x single bedWe can provide a double sofa bed & extra mattress for 4 more people Also has 2 private bathrooms + FREE wireless internet. Convenient and allow you complete privacy三個房間 兩間各有一張雙人床, 一間有一張雙人床及一張單人床兩個獨立衛浴設備,以及免費無線上網｡Well-equipped kitchen with electric cooker & cooking amenities. Good for family travelers設備齊全的廚房,有電爐及煮食工具 適合家庭旅客Location is excellent. Just right next to Austin Exit A. Extremely convenient to travel to Hong Kong spots. reviews.comments:
Place as described on the pictures. Dan's staff delivered the keys and showed me the location and the inside of the place.
The place has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a kitchen, dining area. 
It can sleep 7 people in the bedrooms and 2 on the futon bed  next the TV and 1 on the sofa in the middle of the sitting room. Another one can possibly in sleeping bag on the floor. 
We are given 2 sets of keys.
The TV has only 4 local chanels.
Lots of restaurants in the streets and inexpensive. 10 mins walk to metro.
A little confusing to find the place but the experience is quite good:)))
房子不错,交通都几方便,唯一不满意的是套间的浴室炒坏了｡

Thank you very much!!! We Had great time!! 
The host was very detail in giving us a very clear instruction how to get to the place from airport. Very friendly lady who fetch us from the tunnel exit and brought us to the place we stay. The place was very convenient - walking distance to MTR stations and Hong Kong China port ( between 15 mins to 30mins depends on the station). 

There were lots of good eateries near where we stay. Tim Sum and the "cha chan Teng" we tried were all very delicious

Easy to find their place according to the guidelines given and i have my stay at Dan's place for 5 nights with my family.
Nearby also have lots of restaurants and is a convenient location.
Aircon,tv and wifi are all working well.
The host is certainly most helpful when I sms them for help.
Very close to hk express train station. Large apartment for hk standard. Very quiet too for hk standard. Host provides quick response. Good experience overall.

Stayed there with 6 other friends. Mostly we used Jordan station to go to places but both walks to Austin and Jordan stations are a little too far (for us). One of the bathrooms is super small and the entire room gets wet after a shower. Very very very close to Dimdimsum dimsum restaurant (Really good). The best part is the living room where everyone can sit and chill together after an adventurous day (not included in other places at this price). Also, they let us leave our bagges after our check-out at their office which is very appreciated for us as we still have another day-trip before going back home. Other than mentioned, nothing seems to be a problem. To sum up, it was worthwhile for this price and I would recommend it for a big group of travellers like us who don't wanna pay that much for accommodation.
房东服务很周到,地理位置很好,值得推荐

交通很方便 離柯士甸地鐵站真的很近 
到九龍站搭機場快線也只需步行約十分鐘
搭巴士從機場過來也方便 
雖然要走一點點路 但是是非常可以接受的範圍

香港的大樓很多都很舊
這也是舊大樓內的房子重新裝潢的
雖然走廊看起來比較舊 但是房間內部令人非常滿意
相較於香港房間都小小的
這一間空間相對感覺寬敞許多 很舒適的房子
之後來香港也一樣會考慮這裡的
謝謝Dan的房間喔!

另外這附近美食也不少
點點心 糖水雄都在附近 不怕找不到地方吃宵夜唷!
건물 밖은 좀 그랬지만 건물안은 깨끗함. 침구류의 청결 상태가 좀 아쉬운 듯. 수건 칫솔 등 꼭 챙기세요

The Host Dan was not very co-operative or welcoming. In fact after agreeing with him for the charge of a taxi pick-up, he did not bother to inform me that the taxi was cancelled. 

On reaching the apartment, we were shocked to see the amount of dirt, filth and the stench in the entire apartment originating from the bathrooms and kitchen. 

The lady sent to welcome  us did not speak a word of English. So we could not communicate to her that the apartment needed to be cleaned.

In fact the stench was so unbearable that we had to clean the bathrooms and kitchen ourselves. He did send someone to check after a few hours and she too confirmed the extent of filth and odour in the apartment.

The listing too is inaccurate. Dan lists a washing machine and dryer. However there was no clothes dryer. There was a hair dryer though!!!

The 2nd bathroom (attached to a bedroom) has a water logging issue. Have a bath and there is about 2 inches of water in the bathroom.

Dan did inform us that he would not be providing us towels. However he did not mention that he would not be providing us with washing machine detergent too.

When we pointed out the problems we were facing, he was very brusque and abrupt. 

The only saving grace is the location of the apartment. Walking distance to the subway, eateries, Nathan Road, Ferry station.

We followed the instructions as given by Dan and had not much problem meeting at the designated place. Checking in and out was very smooth.

There are a lot of nice eateries downstairs and we had supper at different eateries every night before going home. There is a 7-11 as well. 

Location wise, the place is perfect, about 10 min to Austin and 15min to Kowloon, Jordan and Yau Ma Tei for us (we have 2 very young kids so walking can be a little slow). 

Place wise... the house is big, for Hong Kong standard. We like the living room where the kids could play and the adults could gather for a talk. The double beds are slightly smaller than queen size. The kitchen seems quite well equipped but we didn't use anything else other than the kettle for boiling water. There is a washing machine but no washing powder. The bigger bathroom works fine but the smaller one (really small) does not drain so well but we really appreciate having 2 bathrooms so we need not have to wait so long for a shower etc. Cleanliness can be improved though. 

All in all, I will still recommend this place for bigger groups of 7 to 9 pax who are not too particular about cleanliness and older furniture. It's great value for its excellent location, convenience and space. 

Thank you for hosting us.
とても楽しく過ごせました｡連絡をすぐにいただけるのがとてもありがたく､安心しました｡大人数で行ったので､みんなが一緒に泊まれる､近所にｺﾝﾋﾞﾆやﾚｽﾄﾗﾝも多く､便利でした!
Nice place in a nice location, very close to 2 subway stations. Surrounded by lots of restaurants and convenient stores.

Great location, close to transport and food. Fairly spacious apartment for the area and clean, not sure sleeping 11 people would work though. 
The beds themselves weren't amazing, and were very creaky/broken. 

Remember to bring towels! - these were not provided. 

Overall a decent place to stay.
地点很便利｡离地铁很近,周围饭馆很多,深夜也有饭吃｡有洁癖的朋友不推荐,实在是不干净,卫生很不彻底,就是马马虎虎的表面干净,不能细看｡
地理位置不错,在香港这个价格能有这种房间也算不错了｡
房间特别好,房东非常nice……很适合5人居住,周边小吃也特别多,下次如果需要还会来住
So perfect apartment  and nice to stay and great  will visit next time
Great, affordable

房間跟照片完全附合,地方寬敞｡
地點描述準確,附近非常多食肆!

I don't feel I am most welcome. Firstly is not too convience cos the unit far from the MTR station. Secondly the unit is not well maintain. Nothing is clean in the units. Most important is the unit is illegal rented cos during our stay the is someone come and tell us they are from government office want to check the licence but we did not open the house. we call the owner someone tell me that if they happen to come again tell them we are friend or relative. First time I use Airbnb I don't like something illegal no more in future
Perfect!

Dan is swift and prompt in giving response and answering queries.
He also provide clear direction to the place.

The place is spacious but not that clean. Many furniture and goods are old, but it is ok actually if only they can maintain it. We are a bit taken aback looking at the exact bed sheet in each room as in the pictures provided on the website. It means either they have a lots of same design bed sheet or they seldom (or never) change it. 
The place in overall are good for the price we paid; but a little bit of simple maintenance would make it much better place. I think it is important for the owner to keep the standard as what they offer in the first place or else people will try to look for other options.

The neighbourhood surrounding is nice, a lot of shops, supermarket and eatery nearby. We also grateful for the buses operating near the place, it save us a lot of walking distant to the MTR station. The bus services not many for they go to central area so it's really recommended to take the bus instead.

Nice,  location good nearby Mrt. 
Downstairs alot restaurant and mart. 
Will recommend to friends. Thanks Dan and Eddy.
房子很大,离地铁也很方便,楼下有很多吃的
我不会推荐这个房东给任何一个人｡接我们的时候, 把我们的名字跟房源搞错, 被带到错误的地方｡ 住了3个晚上, 马桶不能冲水, 才被告知大楼在维修系统!  目前在跟airbnb 申请退款｡｡｡

Dan's space is great, and is recommended for short family gatherings and trips in Hong Kong. The place is also clean and well-prepared when we arrived. Since the space is not a hotel, please do not expect full convenience in terms of amenities. Bring towels, toiletries, and other personal hygienic requirements when you choose to book here. Its location near the Austin MTR station, convenience stores, mini-marts, and great restarurants is also a plus. An overall great experience considering the relatively cheap price.
The place is pretty decent and affordable. Everything is within reach, restaurants, 7-11, 2 MTR stations and an airport express station.

Very near to temple street so much variety foods for supper and very easy to get public transport especially to airport or expo. Quite stay not complicated area, not dangerous even walk back late. A very good choice if you bring a family!

Everything was as described. Eddy looked after us before during and after our stay. He organised us transport and gave us some great advice. The area is safe and in what I call real Hong Kong surrounded by retaurant, close to the amazing Temple Street Market and Austin MTR station. Eddy always replied to my texts and went above and beyond just providing accommodation. For the price this appartment is great value for money. Fully air conditioned, good wifi and hot shower. Nothing more to add but a big thank you!

I would definitely recommend Dan's place to anyone who will visit HongKong. It is very near the MTR station and convenient. The place is big enough for us to stay at. The kitchen is great even if the utensils are not enough. This is a great place to stay at. In addition, the host is very kind and responsive. The host answered all of my inquiries so fast and accurate. If I can rate the host I would rate more than 5 if that is possible. Stay at Dan's place and you'll be satisfied.

The host is good but the staff are not fine. From the airport as per directionwe need to use the courtesy call to inform Eddy that we arrive then buy sim at 7-11 so that we can contact Eddy when we are at the meeting point. Our first call to Eddy when we are at the airport his voice is not friendly, just fine. When we reach the place where we suppose to meet him he's no longer be contacted. We stayed at the meeting point for so long, we did not see Eddy or even contact him.... we are force to look for the place on our own, that even address is not clear... so disappointing

Pretty good experience when staying at Mr. Dan listing. Everything was as described, even though the apartment  was smaller than looking on the photos. If you need the very affordable place with convenient MTR, this is for you.

The place is nearby the restaurants and market. The apartment is clean and huge for HK type it has 2 CRs but unfortunately we were not able to use the other one due to drainage problem. I hope that can be fixed and improved.  

Overall it's good except for the other CR mentioned.

홍콩이라는 점을 감안했을 때, 적당한 가격에 다수의 인원이 머무를 수 있다는 점에서 추천합니다. 도보로 오스틴 역 5분 내외 조던역 10분 남짓 소요되는 점도 장점인 듯 합니다. 방별 에어콘, 거실 에어콘 개별로 설치되어 있어 온도조절도 용이했습니다. 

건물 외관은 홍콩 도심의 평범한(한국인 관점에서는 조금은 오래된듯한 ) 아파트 이지만 내부는 외관보다는 훨씬 좋습니다. Wifi는 굉장히 안정적이었습니다. 

인근 편의점, 식당 접근성이 좋으며, 중대형 슈퍼마켓도 있습니다.
House is very nice, clean and cozy. Transportation is also very convenient. Good choice for 6+ family stay, easy to find.
Dan's place was very convenient. stations are near and restaurants around it are good restaurants.

This house is great and comfortable, lacation also quite good. 
Besides that, the owner is good and friendly, even share me some information I need or the nice food around the place. Definitely will recommend to my friend.
Great location - 5 mins walking distance to Austin station and Temple street. The apartment is spacious and fit for 10ppl. Definitely will stay here again on our next trip.
Nice place and comfortable for family of 10.
Generally, the place is ok. Host and care taker are friendly and accomodating.
Very good, full with equipment including thermos bottle, microwave, fridge, washing machine, hair dryer, TV, air-con, heater and slipper. Very fast response when we got questions or need help.

The place is quite comfortable to stay, 2 bathroom are an ease to us to shorten our ques to take shower.
The surrounding is wonderful, walking distance to Mongkok, a lot of shopping there, and easy to find variety of food nearby.
Overall experience is great for staying here.

This is in what you might call "real Hong Kong" but is no worse for that. 10 minutes to MTR and you can get most places. Eddy who managed our stay was extremely helpful and provided lots of useful local knowledge.
附近很多吃的,也靠近地铁站,非常方便｡唯一不满意的是屋子没有照片上的阔大和干净,有点失望｡9人入住有点拥挤,行李箱放满客厅,没什么空间可以走路｡

가격대비는 좋았으나 좀 더 청결했으면 좋겠습니다.
감사합니다^^ㅋ
This place is perfect for family or a group travelling together. It is clean and compelete with everything that we might need. This is few steps away from the market and MTR station. Very convinient!
good place.. i like it so much
The apartment is small compared to the photos. The bathroom in one of the rooms is small (closet space) and the shower head was broken.
Good wifi connection. Easy to transact. Eddy and Dan are both helpful! House was big enough for us and big for HK standards.
구룡역에서 도보 10분거리라 공항이나 홍콩섬 이동이 편리. 근처 편의점도있어 좋았으나 욕실 한개가 물빠지는게 문제있어 다소 불편

This apartment its great! Close to MTR Austin and Jordan,You can walk.
Quick support by Eddy and Dan.
I just leave on 1 Mar17. If you fix about water drain in small toilet it would be perfect because it to slow.

The place was the same as the picture and the host has provided us the items he stated in the list. There is a working kitchen, fridge, TV, towels, hairdryer and extra pillows and blankets but the place need to be deep cleaned especially the bathrooms since there seems to be dirt or black mold growing on the walls and along the sides of the bathroom sliding door, near the trash can. The main door lock also needs to be upgraded because apparently you have to jiggle the key up and down to open it and it took us 30 minutes and a call to the owner to understand how to open the door the first time.

Good location! Close to subway station and Jordan street, about 10min walking. Room space is big with shops and restaurants around. Very convenient! Strongly recommend to group backpackers and families. 
地點佳,離地鐵站及佐敦街約10分腳程｡房間大,附近有商店及餐廳,很方便｡適合給團體背包客及家庭旅遊｡
We had a good time in Hong Kong. We were a group of 8 people. The apartment was okay for our short stay.
房子空间有点小,但是靠近地铁站和庙街所以还是不错的...

It was a great place to stay. All places are closest to public transportation, market, and destination. The place were meant to be for a family stay. We enjoy cooking inside the kitchen instead of eating in the restaurant. Great place, value for money, and clean. Reliable.

The apartment has a good location and accessible to lots of local food, supermarkets and 3 stations. Surroundings are safe too. Owner is very helpful and gives good advices. 
Highly recommended.

Okay stay for the group. Close to temple street, 5 min walk to airport shuttle bus stop and MTR. Took us some time to locate the building and cab driver was not familiar with the area. Linens and mattress can be better. If staying with a bigger group, you only have 1 bathroom.
reality vs expectation from the photo is different

The house and the hosts (Dan and Eddy) have been really very great and awesome!!! They are really easy to talk and have transactions with. Very accommodating people. Location's good, few minutes walk to Austin and Jordan station. Below the home is a 711 and so many restaurants that are opened 24 hours. Accessible to temple night market if you want to go shopping. Really safe area.

The house is great, we were 10 adults with 2 kids. Just needs improvement with the room in the middle (with the 2nd bathroom) as it floods and you need to mop all the water off. Good thing they have a sponge mop ready but it would be better if they fix the bathroom to avoid inconvenience. Also the hose of the shower leaks, so it kinda adds to the flood. But can be improved :)

They have refrigerator, every room has an ac, wifi is really fast, water kettle and also microwave, electric stove and washing machine. They also have extra matress so if some of you wants to sleep outside in the living room, it's still cold and comfortable. So really convenient. Just maybe they can add English channels for foreigners ;)

Overall, I'd recommend Dan and Eddy's place to my friends who would be planning to stay in HK. This is recommended for big groups. :) 5 stars!
The house looks smaller than photos. Needs a major clean up as dust are everywhere. Generally a good stay, location was indeed good and host is very responsive.
The place is walking distance from MTR station. Worth the price. :-)
The place was good. We had a comfortable stay. There was a night market nearby and 7/lls. It was also near a MTR station.
在物價高昂的香港,能夠入住這間房間,是很值得的｡位於住宅區,有樓管,附近餐廳很多,也很美味,特別推薦"點點心"｡附近有百佳超市及7-11便利商店,採買沒問題｡整體而言可以給予85/100的評價｡
Good

For travellers with low budget, big group and doesn't want to spend so much dining outside, Dan's place is recommended. Kitchen is equipped with the things you will be needing..you can rest well especially when tired though bed in one room is not that comfy..toilets are clean...overall, we had a good experience in Dan's place..value for money.
Value for money...
The place is near to austin mtr about 500 m and close to bus stop 300 m. Food is not a problem since restaurants are open 24/7 which is located just within the vicinity.
Not a bad place to stay.
Located near austin station and has a lot of convenient stores and restaurants. Unfortunately we were bitten by bed bugs during our stay so hopefully that gets resolved for the next guests.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

房內非常的髒,尤其床很多塵蟎,同行友人有三位身體都過敏
浴室和廚房都有異味,很髒亂
房東有事先提醒我們要關冷氣,有ㄧ天我們出去忘了關,是我疏忽,但房東在未告知我情況下,疑似自己開門進來,因為我們全部人ㄧ起行動,回房時~發現屋內冷氣和電燈被全關,剩ㄧ盞微燈
讓人非常的不舒服!完全不推薦人家來住,真的很糟!
唯一優點:屋子地點離地鐵很近,附近很多美食,吃很方便

Dan and Eddy are quickly responsive. They always answer my questions. Especially Eddy who allow us to leave our luggages in the room after check-out and help us to rent a mini van for airport pick up. The room has 3 bedrooms that convenience for big family as me (5 adults and 2 kids) there is small bathroom and toilet in a double bedroom and big bathroom and toilet in the living room but the furnitures are too old. They should change furnitures and renovate the bathrooms.

The neighbor is quiet. I highly recommend this room because the location is great! It near 3 MTR stations. (Austin, Kowloon and Jordan) You can walk to the stations within 10 minutes. It is very easy to go Disneyland within 30 minutes, Shopping area in 15 minutes and Hong Kong side just one station. There are many local restaurants, 7-11, minimart, fruits shop nearby. I love sugar fun, the dessert shop is located in the corner of opposite building and Dim Dim Sum restaurant.  

If I go to HK again, this room will be my list to stay again.
MTR and food is nice place...
Good location, near to 7eleven etc

집근처가 교통편이 좋음. Austin MTR station 에서 걸어서 5분. Jordan MTR station 에서 걸어서 10분, 78번버스로 침사츄이로 가기 편함. 주변에 딤딤섬레스토랑과 local  식당이 많음.편의점과 중형 슈퍼마켓 있음. 재랮시장과 야시장이 도보 8분거리내에 있음. 주변에 다수의 빵집과 저렴한 주점이 있음. 숙소는 더운물이 나옴. 1월달에 사용시 잠잘때 다소 춥기에 침낭이나 두터운 담요가 필요할 수 있음. 가성비 대비 훌륭함
Dan is so helpful and let us know how to reach the place. He response to my message so fast and cearly.

Suits our group of 8 with individual luggages. Place is fully furnished with everything you could possibly need including hair dryers, adaptors, and more mattresses & pillows. It’s easily accessible via train; very close to a convenient store, restaurants, drugstores, and bars. Dan and Eddie are both responsive to my queries too. Will totally recommend; will definitely stay here again! :)

문도 재대로 안 닫히고 에어컨에서도 남새가 나서 에어컨도 못 들었고 수건도 냄새가 심해서 구역질이 날 정도입니다. 

Airbnb에서 나오는 사진은 실제와 너무 다릅니다. 다른 방의 사진을 쓸것같은 느낌입니다. 

호스트는 메세지 답장 잘 해주시지만 방은 너무 실망스러워서 진짜 별로였습니다.

Airbnb 자주 사용하는데 이번은 진짜 어이가 없습니다. Airbnb 다시 믿을수 있겠는지 잘 모르겠습니다.
Close to MTR.
The place is accessible to Elements mall wherein the Kowloon MTR station is located. 10 - 15 mins walk.
Fair price
房间还是挺不错的,跟图片上基本吻合,出门在外要求也不能太高,个人认为比住酒店合算,一家人住在一个屋里也更方便互相照应｡房东人也挺好的,交通很方便,离尖沙咀购物很近,有直达的公交车,附近吃的东西也挺多的,总体还是很满意的!推荐楼下对街的那家甜品店,老板娘特别热情,哈哈哈~

Very good place to stay for big families. We were 10 but we never felt crowded, 3 rooms and 2 comfort rooms, great host and staff. Complete amenities, we can cook, since we are with children,  it is more comfortable to cook and eat at Dan's home just for dinner.  Walking distance to Austin MTR.
Not a good experience for my family

We had a great stay at Dan’s place. He was very responsive and helpful to us and had provided us with the right information about the place and where and what bus we can take.

The place is very near to MTR and Bus stop (to and from airport). We also are able to cook for our breakfast. Convenience stores (7-eleven and u-select)  are just downstairs.

We were 8 adults and have 3 children with us and we fit in the place. Extra mattress and pillows were provided.

Wifi connection is very strong. It also have a TV but the show are mostly local (it’s okay, as we don’t go there to watch TV)

Overall, value for money and we got extra for shopping! Thanks Dan!
总体不错,性价比不错

Dan's plcae is near Austin Station, restaurants and groceries. 7/11 and Park and Shop Grocery are blocks away. Jordan Station, McDonald's, Pizza Hut, other local restaurants and shops, and the Temple Street Night Market are also walking distance (like 10-15minute walk). 

What I liked most about Eddie (landlord) is that he allowed us to check-in early at 12nn (w/o additional fees) and check-out late at 5pm (w/ additional fee).

I highly recommend this place for families of 7-8 persons since it has 3 bedrooms and 2 toilet & bath.
Good stay

Overall are okay! Just abit different from photos. There have some spoiled furniture inside the rooms and cause the room have limited space. Near Mrt and quite convenient. Have a lot of food and restaurants at downstairs.
That was a good location only the place abit old overalls ok
Dan helped me a lot with useful information about the place and transportation. and the stuff helpful to handle the airlines baggage issues that we have on HK. Thanks a lot Dan!
Ed the owner is accommodating ..eh Help us Find the best place to eat and Help US with transportation
What you see is what you get. Eddy is very responsive whatever questions or request you ask him. He has a respond. Definitely would go back to Eddy and Dan's place if ever ill be in HK.
Handy location, and super responsive host

Perfect for large group/family. The unit has 2 bathrooms and they have everything we need (adapters, iron, blower, rice cooker, kitchen utensils, tableware, etc.)

Location: Near to MTR station, convenience stores, grocery stores, restaurants

Cleanliness: There are a lot of unnecessary things/stuff in the common area and kitchen. Pictures are not updated
A very good place for family to stay!!

There are many unused item/item left over by previous tenant in the unit. It was not recommended to stay in the unit during winter season as there is no heater, however the owner did offered more blanket. It was near to Austin station but 10 min walk to Jordan Station. Very near to temple street which is quite convenience.
Owner enter the premises during our stay period to do laundry and hang it at the living room without our permission which I don't think it was acceptable as our valuable item was just at the living room. One bag of our scallop brought was lost not to mention who took it as we do not have the prove.
Excellent service and easy check in. Got loads of help with transfer and dinner tips
Its all good

What you see is what you get. It was in a convenient location, at first it was difficult to find because we are arrived kind of late already but with a help of a friend we have found it. It was enough for the group and we have fun. Thanks to eddy and Dan for their help.
Good for family , convenience to walk to MTR Austin, many restaurants around the mansion.Dan and Eddy are answer quickly.

10 person,7 adults 3 kids under 10 yrs. Good location, lots of small stores to buy things you need. Near MTR austin, we back to airport by MTR with lots of luggage easy to go,just 30-40 minutes.for foods, across the apart gate there’s a small coffee shop can have breakfast set HK’s style. Many restaurants around apartment & there’s a playground across ferry street. For the entire apart,its nice for us to stay although the space not quite big for us to move around.kids sleep well,comfy beds,warm blankets,can cook simple foods also.thank you

A perfect location, very easy to get around with public transportation (Austin Station) and walking distance to the convenient store eg: 7E . Eddy was also very helpful since the beginning, available at all times whenever I had any questions. However, there are some stuff at the house that maybe belong to the owner that make the house look quite messy. Be careful with the crack wall tile at the bathroom as my husband got a deep cut on his finger because of that.

name: T2-Guest House-Triple Room
summary: We are licensed guest house, opened in 1987. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. We locate
space: We opened in 1987 and we are on the 21 st floor. The residence is also fitted with CCTV surveillance, 24-hour security services and smart card access to. All of these make your stay more comfortable and safe. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed. Traffic is also very convenient for the tourists. Very close train and airport bus station (3 mins walk).  Our room types are as follows : - Single bed Room without window : no window, one bed (1m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres room (no extra bed provided) - 1.2 Double-bed Room : with windows, one bed (1.2 m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres room (no extra bed provided) - Standard Double-bed Room : with windows, one bed (1.5 m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres

neighborhood_overview: We located in the central area of Mongkok. Very close to varies tourist hot spots. The lady market, sneaker street and Langham Place are not far form our house. It is very convenient to get to the Harbour City, Avenue of Stars,  Hung Hom Coliseum, airport and ferry terminal.
notes: -The check-in time is 2 P.M and the check-out time is noon 12:00.  - We provide 24 hrs reception services.  Booked rooms will be held for check-in until noon 12:00 of the scheduled check-out date. After which the booking will be deemed no-show. No refunds will be provided for the no-show booking. If you check-out beyond the stipulated time at our guest house of your stay, we reserves the right, without further notice to you, to charge you an additional fee or remove your belongings out of the room. We shall not be liable for any loss or damage to your belongings as a result of the action(s) taken. you need to provide a deposit of 200 dollar per room when you check-in, in either Hong Kong Dollar or Chinese Yan (cash only). Deposit will be refunded fully if there is not any extra fee or compensation (including fees for late check-out, damage items or extra cleaning cost and so on) needed to be charged.  It is free to for luggage storage at the front desk. Luggage storage is available onl
transit: Tourist spot in/around Mong Kok: * Sai Yeung Choi Street ( concentrates shops of electronic products, cosmetics, and discount books. ) * Tung Choi Street (also known as 女人街, Ladies' market,specializes in women's clothing, accessories, and cosmetics, and is open daily from noon to midnight. There are also food stalls selling noodles, seafood, and congee. An open-air market of fruits and vegetables is also located in the vicinity) * Sai Yee Street (with many sport shops) * Goldfish Street (There are a dozens of shops and hawkers selling tropical freshwater and marine fish, aquarium and accessories) * Flower Market * Langham Place (59-storey complex with a shopping mall, a hotel, and offices.) * Sino Centre (Shops sell comic books, VCDs and DVDs related to Japanese cartoons, and regular CD albums) * Temple Street (night market and one of the busiest flea markets at night in the territory)
access: In your room, you will have: * TV * Airconditioner * Free wifi * Conversion plugs * Electric kettle(We also provide bottle water, you can purchase at front desk) * Hair dryer * Personal hygiene products (toothpaste and toothbrush, shower gel and shampoo), hair dryer * Slippers,clothes hangers, toilet roll * Water glass * Separate bathroom(with shower, 24 hrs hot water) * towels * The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed.  * Comb (you can get it at front desk) We also have a mini common area for guest chat and a balcony to hang up their wet clothes. The opening hours for balcony are from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. It is also equipped with a refrigerator and microwave in lobby space.
interaction: We provide 24 hrs reception services. You are welcome to ask if you have any question. Early check-in / check in at night:  Check in time depends on the check out time of the previous guests. You may check in earlier if we have rooms free. Basically, the check in time is from 2 p.m. You can keep your belongings at the front desk if your room is not ready.      Booked rooms will be held for check-in until noon 12:00 of the scheduled check-out date.we have 24 hrs reception services, just come to our front desk at 21/F to get the keys even if you need to check in min-night.       Verified ID process  A ID verification is a must to successfully book a room through Airbnb   Please upload an image of your government-issued ID, such as your driver's license or passport. It could take you 1 to 6 hours to complete the process. please be patient. For details, please browse this site:  https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/450/what-is-verified-id?locale=en   or contact Airbnb directly at 852 5808 8
