host.host_about: 我是香港本地人,在台灣修的旅遊科,很喜歡交朋友,很高興能認識來自世界各地的朋友,我將盡力為你們提供最溫馨最真誠的服務和房間｡

address.street: 旺角, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 地段很好,在旺角地鐵站附近交通非常方便,生活機能也非常好｡只是房間稍嫌小一點,不過如果只是追求便宜可以睡一覺的地方是很OK的｡
Perfect location.

出行前,Ken将路线图发给我,所以还是挺好找｡在旺角,交通方便,而且旁边就是朗豪坊,购物很方便｡
check in 和check out都比较快,房间整齐干净｡
I had an interesting check-in timeline because of flight delays and logistics. Ken was great and helped us out! The location is awesome for hitting the town and exploring.
在20多层的大厦上,三人住有点挤,谁叫HK寸土寸金呢｡前台妹子很文静啊,态度好｡早到可以寄存行李后下楼逛,退房了也可以寄存行李出去逛,这一点很好｡
Good, reasonable, got the job done. Exactly what we were looking for.

les chambres sont comme sur les photos ,pas très grandes mais le luxe de Hong Kong c'est l'espace .les chambres sont propres et calmes.L'accueil est très sympathique et souriant et Ken a été très serviable .
 Proche du métro et des attractions du quartier.
nous sommes restés 6 nuits et nous reviendrons si nous avons l'occasion de repasser par Hong Kong.
Merci pour tout .
A recommander
He was very kind and friendly! You won't regret choosing his hospitality!

We stayed in this place only for day time as we needed place to rest after night flight and before other connection flight. Its a nice place to stay, perfect location, hot shower, little noisy but is a exact city centre so what you can expect. Wifi works perfect and the staff is nice
Ken的房间干净整洁,地理位置很棒,离旺角地铁站大约步行5分钟｡在香港属于性价比很高的房子了,很好的一次入住体验｡
乾淨,近地鐵,附近晚上熱鬧,員工態度良好

I'm totally fond of this place. the view outside the balcony is awesome, this place is like a little , cozy, homey place to stay. it gave me a little home feeling when I'd step into the house :)
 the location is great, there's bus stop just right outside and mrt at the corner ,shopping malls right behind and "nv ren jie" is just right behind somewhere (walking distance) . i'm surely will be back when i come to visit hong kong next time :) 
ps: the host is very friendly :))

The host was friendly and helpful in providing the assistance we need. Just that the heater has to be warm up every 20mins other than that the room was comfortable and clean. Will definitely choose to go back to stay as the price is much affordable and reasonable as compared to hotel !
好喜歡店店~風格很有特色,有家的感覺~留意到床鋪枕頭的有淡淡的清香,房間雖小,五臟俱全,下次還會再來的~店主還有店員都好nice~必須好評喔!
Great stay at Ken's hostel
房间挺小的  但是设备齐全
住的挺舒服的,态度都很好~~

Ken is very friendly and helpful, recommended some nice restaurant.  My friend and I stayed here for 3 nights, overall I think location is very good, close to shopping area, MTR, Food outlet and the market.   Bed room is clean with fresh bath towel and bed sheet.  Will definitely come back to stay here if I am coming to Hong Kong again.

Ken is a ball of happiness :D He welcomed us very warmly, and even we came before check-in time he let us in. The location was perfect, it was very close to MTR station and bus station, I was using the bus from and to the airport since it was cheaper, and the stops was just right there, and the bus going to China Ferry Terminal *if you want to go to Macau* was right in front of the place, and there was mall, convenience store and eating places right around the corner
Though the room was a bit small which I assumed was normal in HK, I and 2 of my friends felt the space was enough for the three of us

Thank you Ken, Lilly and the other girl *i forgot asking her name* :)
与图片有一点点的区别!

This place is all about Ken the host's family, and staff plus the location.
Right at Mong Kok MTR Station so access to every place on both sides of Hong Kong is right there. Perfect.
Ken and staff always had time to do anything and everything to help gladly.
Totally great hosts.
The newer renovated rooms are definitely the pick.
Perfect location.
公共區域佈置得非常有心❤️ 很有賓至如歸的感覺｡唯一缺陷是房間內設施有點殘舊,牆壁蛻皮之類⋯⋯但整體來說金門旅舍很不錯的,推薦❤️
住宿地地理位置非常好,交通十分方便｡楼下便利店和美食非常多｡一开始住的房间墙皮有点脱落,但是很快协调换房,房间非常舒服,老板还送了巧克力~值得考虑!

Ken and his staff were very kind. We had a problem with our room and ended up moving out in the middle of the night but his staff was very helpful and ken helped us getting my refund and deposit back in the coming days.
Very professional and accomodating
宾馆外面环境很好,后门出去很多餐厅｡在朗豪坊旁边,购物也很方便｡宾馆比较自助,毛巾什么的要自己换,洗手间比较小｡隔音效果一般｡房间外面有办公桌可以用,挺好的
地理位置优越,沟通顺畅,总体干净｡就是在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,面积实在过于局促,尤其是卫生间,台盆是迷你的,洗脸时水老是洒出来,如厕时头会撞到台盆,大家要有心理准备哦,其他OK
房東很親切,房子很乾淨｡雖然訂的時候看到的房型和到飯店看到的房型有點不一樣,讓我們小小的失望,不過大致上很滿意｡謝謝!
This is a terrific location, close to Mong Kok MTR, shopping and heaps of food. The room is small but that's to be expected in HK. Staff are always friendly.

Location is great. Just a 2min walk from Langham Place, Mong Kok. The room we stayed was expectedly small. We took a peep at Rm 106 and felt that it was better than the one we stayed (Rm 107). Our room was clean and bathroom facilities worked well. Shampoo and bath gel provided. We can change towels anytime we want and that's a plus point. Will be a great choice if you don't intend to spend a lot of time and money in hotel room and want to have a bit more budget for eating and shopping. Our 4-year old gal didn't mind the cramp space and we felt safe. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Thank you!
这家店真的很棒,出乎意料的整洁,位置绝佳,老板人很好,强烈推荐,以后到香港还来这家店｡
A good place to stay! Will definitely stay here if i get the chance to visit HK again!
Ken's place is cozy. If you want to stay somewhere near the MTR, shops, and stores but quiet at the same time, then Ken's place is for you.
非常享受的一次旅程｡
Very clean and nice hotel. Lobby open 24 hours. Front desk person is very helpful. We had an easy time staying in this hostel. Recommended!
Good place to go. Close to downtown and shopping
房主非常友善､尽职,整个沟通过程很流畅｡住处地理位置很好,店主也提供了很多帮助｡尤其是中间由于个人原因需要一些特别的安排,店主都及时帮忙解决,推荐!
It was clean and the host was kind and helpful.

It was nice!! Very cosy and comfortable. The lady there is very friendly and welcoming. Even allowed us to place our bags before check-in and after check out! The location is centralised. Near to mtr, a lot shops/food around that area. I think only downside is the walking space and the bathroom. Also, it is slightly creepy at the corridors but other than that, I would totally recommend!!

Best location! Very near to MTR station, bus station, food vendors, etc. The room is clean and comfy, though a bit smelly.. Ken is very nice, i love how he took great care of us while we were there. Good value for price! Definitely will come back to Kam Mun Guest House ☺️

Ken was very nice and helpful. Needed help finding the accommodation so I messaged him on airbnb and he replied very quickly. It was a great stay. Super close to the Mong Kok station which made our travels so much easier.

The place is clean. Hosts were really helpful. If you are going on budget and don't mind sacrificing some comfort (as the room is really small), this is a great place for you. Thanks for the good stay:)

Such a not good experiences in the last day of my stay , they just give me late check out until 12.15 , first they remind me time to check out at 12.00 and then i ask for the late check out , they gave me 15 minutes and around 12.02 they cut down my electric , so rude . I even didnt complain about their complementary just a small face towel and even no drink in the room.

Lage war sehr gut, zentral und konnte überall gut hinkommen. 
Das Zimmer war wirklich sehr sehr klein und es gab kaum die Möglichkeit große Koffer abzustellen. Man muss sich schon wirklich gut verstehen um mehrere Tage in dem Airbnb auszuhalten weil es wirklich winzig ist.
Wenn wir Probleme hatten war immer wer da, um uns zu helfen.
十分感谢ken的热心,在来之前 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上告诉我们该怎么走,一路上都保持密切的联系｡这次出行非常方便,居住的地方离地铁站很近,靠近朗豪坊｡在这个热闹的地方,晚上住宿却十分安静,不用担心会被吵到｡可以说是性价比十分之高了!并且房东很热心,每次出行都给了我们指引｡很愉快的一次旅途!十分感谢两位房东!
Great location. Host is friendly. However, can improve on Housekeeping/cleaning services.

Great location..and Ken and his assistant were very helpful and accomodating. The place was central, clean, dead handy for the airport bus and as described. No problem recommending this place as excellent value for money!

地点非常好的一家宾馆,就在旺角地铁站E2出口出来,前面那个路口转左直走,前面有间kfc,再走多几步注意看左手边“新兴大夏”,进去后上电梯直达21楼就是宾馆啦!地点非常方便,楼下满街都是24小时港式茶餐厅,还有几间711走几步路就到了｡一抵达的时候柜台男生很热情的招待我们,我们住的是三人房,由于行李太多,原本住的那间三人房过于拥挤,他主动提议换过另一间比较大的三人房给我们,很加分房间中规中矩,干净整齐,无异味,备有浴巾和基本梳洗用品,还有风筒｡
缺点:浴门口并没有抹脚布,使用浴室出来后脚都是湿的很不方便,希望日后可以改善这问题哦｡

To others this might be small in room size but given Hong Kong is a space premium country, the room is a good reflection of how HK people live. The hotel's location is centrally located to everything and easy access to bus train and any eatery. You can't go wrong staying at this place.
Second time staying here and just as great, clean, and convenient as last time. Ken is a great host, very thoughtful and considerate. This is a lovely little guest house in the heart of the city!
Ken's place has good location and valuable price.
Very small room, but Ken was very accommodating, other staff there was also very helpful! Location was superb!
Easy, accurate, quick response, clean & nice location.
地理位置非常不错,附近好吃的特别多
Perfect location.  Value for money.
总体还行吧,房间比较干净,就是外面的走廊很破旧的感觉｡可能香港都这样吧

1.首先交通真的很便利,旺角站出来根据房东的指示信息很顺利地找到了｡同层里有好几个宾馆,他家的门厅走廊最有特色
2.出门坐地铁坐公交或者打的都很方便,对面就是朗豪坊,稍微走几百米有夜市小吃摊
3.房间真的很小,只能勉强打开20来寸的行李箱,没法正常走动的那种,好在也只是回来睡觉｡洗手间更小了,马桶总是被弄湿,花洒的水出来很急,有点痛(不过后面住迪士尼出水也是一样的情况)
4.最后还是要感谢房东,第一天到的时候有个朋友发烧了,问她借温度计,虽然没有但是很贴心地说可以为我们介绍边上的诊所
位置很好,但是房間有點小

Fantastic place if you want to feel the city. Mong Kok is a commercial zone with facilities to move to any place in the city. However most of the bars are in the HKG Island but you can take any of the the transport method that the city offers and you can be there in few minutes. Ken was very kind with us. We recommend his place.
很不错的住宿,房间虽小,但是设施齐全,出行便捷!
旺角中心区,离地铁不远,都不错｡唯一觉得可提升的是房间较小(实际没法提升,呵呵),箱子打开整理东西都有些困难｡
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,地理位置很好,Ken人很可爱,给出了非常棒的出行建议｡
位置很好,离地铁口近｡床铺一大一小刚好可以住一家三口,是亲子游的好选择｡

非常棒的房東以及房間
Great!!!!

The location is oerfect in exploring Hongkong. It is in the center of the city and near the mtr! Walking along the area will also give you a sense of the city as it is very lively in the area! Near restaurants and malls and train and cinema. The area where his place is is also safe and very accessible. Thank you Ken! My friends and I enjoyed our stay! Til next time!
Ken是个很棒的房东,热情好客,房间很干净,地理位置也很好,我推荐大家来这里入住,会是很舒服的体验
It is accurately represented in the photos
Quick response from host. Useful room space.
訂了這間房⋯⋯我們期待著｡來之前,房東非常周到的給我們發行走路線,很準確的知道怎麼能到達住處!到了目的地,房東非常熱情,溝通與阻礙~想的很周到~住處交通便利,樓下購物餐飲一應俱全~性價比高~非常好的房東~屋裏打開行李需要放到床上~

We had a great stay at Ken's place. It is in a really good location, close to the Metro.
Room is tiny but clean.
This location is just in front the Hollywood  road with all the thing you need from restaurant, pharmacy and groceries....
ken很贴心,不明白的地方他都很清楚明白的告诉你路线｡很靠近旺角地铁, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都方便｡附近有很多商店餐厅,下来就有东西吃了｡房间虽小但是很干净,如有大行李可以寄放｡
Great hospitality from the host and very close proximity to train station, buses and good food.

Fantastic location at the heart of hong kong shopping district. Rooms may be slightly small but they are clean and newly refurbished. I had a fantastic stay during my week there and would highly reccomend this place to anyone looking for value and convinience.
Convenient location !
Good location and good for the price
Great place :)

房東非常熱心,提供很多香港美食與採購地點｡房間雖然比較小但乾淨､舒適｡
是趟非常愉快的旅程,有機會還會再去~

- Near MTR Station
- Near shopping area and food is just around the area
- clear instructions and house rules
- room is good and clean
- right bed size and also comfortable.
- thanks Sir Ken for the warm welcome and assistance til next time!

非常赞~房间超干净
老板人真的很好,给了我很多游玩攻略
很耐心的告诉我要怎么规划路线,真心好
下次来香港继续预定
房间虽然小但也五脏俱全,位置很好｡KEN人很好,告诉了我们很多附近的交通美食等注意事项,也很热情!

name: Double room in Gracia - Diagonal
summary: Nice room, capacity for two, located in a very calm and central area. Just 500m from Diagonal/Pg. de Gracia and metro with lines 3, 5, train station and ferrocarril.
description: Nice room, capacity for two, located in a very calm and central area. Just 500m from Diagonal/Pg. de Gracia and metro with lines 3, 5, train station and ferrocarril.

reviews.comments: Olivier est un hôte chaleureux qui a su nous conseiller judicieusement sur nos escapades barcelonaises! Son appartement est idéalement situé et il est très agréable d'y passer quelques jours. Nous vous recommandons vivement cet hôte  pour votre séjour à Barcelone :)

Olivier is a really great host ! His apartment is well located, tidy and nice ! 
Olivier provided us tips about the neighbourhood and the city! 
Staying at his place was really pleasant !

name: [4] New BedRm by C.Park and 1,B,C
summary: I just moved into this brand new apartment in July. It has two marble bathrooms and four sunny bedrooms (all full size beds). It's located near Columbia University. Two blocks away from subway B, C, 1, 2, and 3. Five minute walk to Central Park.
space: Recently furnished apartment with easy access to many restaurants near Columbia University. A super clean space with a very large living room. Includes a cable TV, kitchen tools, dishwasher, washing machine, and dryer. Close to two subway stations (trains 1, 2, 3, B, and C). 15 minute to Times Square and Midtown by train. The whole apartment is cleaned once every two days by professionals (after a few negative comments about cleanliness) , and clean bed sheets are guaranteed to be washed the day you arrived. Although the pictures can be slightly different from the real settings as I have multiple listings, cleanliness and comfort are guaranteed.  Regarding my availability, usually I am around the area as I work/live in this area. However, I have streamlined the checkin procedure using passcode, so you can check in and out 24/7 without letting me know. Usually professional cleaning service will do their work between 12-4, so feel free to leave your luggages 24/7 but the room is generall

neighborhood_overview: As what's said in the reviews, the neighbor is really quiet and safe. However you can always find interesting bar, restaurants, and convenient store nearby.
transit: It is close to line 1, B, C.
access: You will have the access to your room, both bathrooms, and the living room.
interaction: I live near by so usually I can help when you are in need. However you can check in and out as easily as possible. No need to let me know. I will make sure the place is clean by 4pm
house_rules: Just a few issues regarding shoes, key returning, checking in & out. I will send over when you confirm your booking

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi! I speak English and Mandarin well, and am working on my Spanish and French. Background? I went to a Liberal Arts school in Massachusetts and studied Economics, Computer Science and Philosophy. I am interested in Startups, Finance, Real Estate, Hotels, Political Philosophy.

reviews.comments: I had a great time staying at Rui's. The room was very clean and neat, s well as the bathroom. Great place, I would definitely stay there again! He was also very helpful. I couldn't ask for something better!

Apartment is in very good condition, in renovated building with elevator. Subway is within 2 blocks distance, as well as central park, which makes it very convenient location for exploring the city. Apartment has 2 bathrooms and 3 rooms, so you are likely to have good company while your stay.

The host, Rui, is very anticipating, he provided us with some good advice on what to see and what to do in the city. He also puts nice stickers with guests names on the room doors, which makes communication easier.

We had a very good stay, and will definitely consider visiting Rui again when in NYC
Very clean apartment, he's cool no complaints.  This was our first time using air bnb and we will use it again.  neighborhood is fine we'd go back if we're in the area.
Host responded quickly to my initial inquiries.  He was present when I arrived.  The location is good for the upper West Side.  Very close to public transport and some decent restaurants.
Rui  answered very quickly by email. Saw Rui when we arrived and when we left. The room was a bit small but ok for a few nights. Close to Central Park and subway.
Overall is good, clean room, kitchen and bathroom. Rui also cooked for us once. Thanks for Rui that my and I had wonderful NYC trip!

Rui's place was very calm and quiet. Mind you, my partner and I weren't really "home" too often, exploring the city by day and only arriving to sleep. He provided everything from towels to shampoo. The two bathrooms really came in handy as well so my partner and I could expedite the time it took for us to get out the door. I recommend staying with Rui, if only for a quiet place to stay!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived, the key was outside the door where he said it would be, the access worked, just as he said it would.  All great.  First floor was an added bonus.  Entering the apt. I removed shoes, as requested.  Floors are bright white.  There is a central room (pictured) and it connects to four bedrooms and two bathrooms.  

Everything looked very new!  So new that the TV still wasn't connected.  Not necessarily a bad thing.  Rui left notes around the apt. to point out bathrooms, bedrooms, shower operation, etc.

Location is terrific!  Walked to Central Park lake in AM.  Cab and subway connnections are easy.

This place has a unique vibe and look too it. We walked in and there are four bedrooms with two bathrooms. One bathroom being just for females and another for both female and male. The place is clean and has been renovated. The room was simple but had what is needed. A small desk with a chair and a full size bed with two pillows and comforter. The bathroom was clean and he provided towels for my room. The apartment is on the first floor so easy to access. I felt safe here but not much privacy because once you walk out of the bedroom your in the main area. I would consider staying here again because of the area it's in and I felt secure. His communication needs a bit of work but wasn't bad. I didn't get to personally meet him but wanted too. I don't think he lives here but just rents the place out to different people.

The apartment is really clean and quiet, good privacy, transportation is convenient  (<30min to anywhere in DT Manhattan), and Rui generously offered drinks and quality toiletries there. Wonderful experience.

Rui  (Ray) was very responsive to our needs.  The apartment has been totally redone from floor to ceiling; everything is new - there are  four sleeping rooms, two bathrooms, wi-fi, and a common room with kitchen and washer/dryer.  A TV too, but it didn't work, probably because he had just moved the rental rooms from a third floor apartment to a first floor apartment and the move was so recent that a few  details were  not finished.  The block is mostly residential and is very close to Amsterdam and Broadway for restaurants, groceries and subway/bus.  It is very convenient.

Location is very convenient and in a nice neighborhood.  It is a simple and clean place
just what we needed after a long days walking in the wonderful city. Will stay in the future
again.
The apartment is on a quiet street close to the Central Park, within walking distance to two subway stations. The rooms are cozy and clean. I'd choose to stay here next time I am in Manhattan.

Our stay at Rui's apartment was nice. Apartment was clean and location was good, there was everything that we needed for couple days stay. The pictures were from another apartment, eventhough the style was similar, I would say that it was apartment from the same building..

Fotoet er fra et lignende sted. Det er ikke fra det sted , vi boede. 
Omtalen passede nogenlunde, men der var ikke beskrevet, at der var 4 værelser og et mindre fællesrum. Vores vært dukkede op dagen efter, vi var ankommet for at spørge om alt var OK.
Der var sørget for vand og køkkenet fungerede, så vi selv kunne lave morgenmad.

Nos hemos sentido a gusto y seguros. Muy complacidos  con la habitación que nos asignó en general con todo el apartamento. Nuestro anfitrión   fue muy atento. El barrio muy seguro y agradable. Hay muchos servicios y comercios. Los medios públicos de movilidad al alcance de la mano. Rápidos y eficientes. Lo recomendamos.
Everything was great! The place was always very clean and the bedroom was really comfortable. We liked its location as it is only 10 minutes walking to the subway station.
The check-in procedure was really convenient. You can check in almost any time you want. The room was super clean. The location is easy to find as well.

It couldn't have been an easier transaction. Ray made it very convenient to access the apartment. The apartment is exactly as described and in great condition. The neighborhood is nice, quiet, and very close to Central Park. We had a great overall stay.
性价比很高的公寓｡位置在上城,离地铁近,出行方便,房间干净整洁｡推荐!

The room/apartment description is accurate. It was a clean, sparsely decorated place, with 4 small bedrooms, one common room/kitchen, and 2 tiny bathrooms. The location is convenient - close to 2 subway stops, various delis and restaurants, etc. I stayed with my 8 year old daughter and felt safe. The TV didn't seem to work, but not a big deal b/c we didn't spend much time at the place and we connected w/ the wifi. My only complaint is that the temperature was too warm - making the place seem very stuffy - but we ran the A/C unit while we slept and that made it more comfy. Rui was very responsive to all questions. A great deal for NYC!

Nice place to stay in New York, and the directions are very helpful.
Location is good on the upper west side. Very close to central park and just a few minutes away from the subway stop that takes you to central Manhattan.
It's a good experience
Comfortable room in great UWS location. Ideal for a short stay.

Die Wohnung war sauber und obwohl Rui abwesend war, hat alles hervorragend geklappt.
Die Gegend ist etwas laut und für zwei Frauen etwas unheimlich, da sich vor allem nachts wenige Touristen draussen aufhalten und der Weg von der U-Bahn zum Haus durch dunkle Gassen führt.
Die Wohnung ist im Erdgeschoss und man hat das Gefühl jedes Geräusch von draussen wahrzunehmen.
Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis stimmt sicher überein, würde mir aber das nächste Mal überlegen eher in Downtown zu buchen.
The room was very clean and very nice overall. It was a little cold the first night but then the heat seemed to kick on and everything was great! Would recommend
I would recommend him any day, good location, clean, everything ready and in place.

très bien location excellente à 10 minute en transport du centre de Manhattan, les chambres sont propres et toutes les informations nécessaires sont très bien communiquées merci je conseille vivement.
Great place. Clean area and comfy beds.

This was a great place to stay, a great location and a great price.  We needed a last minute place after being stranded in NYC after the snowstorm and Rui allowed us to check-in early and check out late the next day.  2 bathrooms made staying there an even better experience!

Thanks so much and you have a great place!

This was my very first Airbnb experience, and it went reasonably well!
The first thing we received was a long list of instructions on how to get into and use the apartment, which was really helpful. It was good to have these things (like door codes) on hand at any moment. 
The apartment itself was minimal, smallish, and clean. The building seemed nice, and the neighborhood had plenty of things in the area to see and shop at, especially with regards to food/coffee/groceries. 
Biggest pluses: the room was private and sparse, even if on the small side. We stayed in Room 01, which we learned was the smallest choice (it was a first come first served style, with three or four rooms available). The apartment was cleaned virtually every day. It was quiet indoors, and we were almost never bothered by anyone else. There were two shared bathrooms, which was nice when needed.
Biggest cons: The room is at ground level, and everyone walking by can be heard up and down the street. The room was SMALL but the other three rooms looked to be about twice the size (so choose them!). The living room space had a tiny couch and no chairs, so it wasn't really comfortable. The two bathrooms seemed less generous when there were six people in the apartment all at once. 
The toilets were specifically marked to not have ANY paper waste be deposited into them, which was annoying and gross. We were asked not to flush things like tampons and pads (a reasonable request) but also to throw out used toilet paper in the trash (which was not so great).

Overall, it was a nice place with a weird rule or two. Choose the bigger room, and you probably won't meet anyone else staying there.

My stay was absolutely amazing! It was my first time in New York and I wouldn't have had it any other way. The room was located perfectly with all my friends, access to the train, and local food spots. There was also instructions for everything and Rui was super responsive w/ any questions.  I will def. recommend to other guest!
It was great first time experience didn't know what to expect but when I walked thru the door I felt at home! Very quiet, clean and peaceful!

Ray was a very welcoming and attentive host! The reservation process and explanations for getting into the apartment was very clear and detailed. The place was very nice - super clean rooms and linens, uncluttered shared areas and conveniently located. It was almost like being in a private hotel room, but at a much better price!  We had a ton of privacy, only seeing other guests a couple of times in the evening. The type of guest that stays here is very responsible and friendly. 

It is conveniently located by the northern end of Central Park and very accessible to the subway systems - we traveled all of Manhattan from here easily. Plenty of great restaurants and shops in this area too. The keys and pass codes to the building, apt and rooms made us feel very safe.

Although we didn't meet Ray in person, he went was extremely responsive to our texts and very helpful in getting packages and mail sent to the apt - we had forgotten a few things at home and had them shipped. It was invaluable to be able to do this. 

My husband and I would highly recommend this place to any visitor to NYC. Thanks for all of your help, Ray!

The apartment is really nice, very close to Central Park and in a nice area. There are four bedrooms and two bathrooms which is usually enough. The kitchen could use a few more tools, there is really not much there for example no can opener and only four glasses.

Rui is exceptional at answering all of your questions quickly, and left detailed instructions so you can enter the apt on your own. The best thing about this listing is that it is flexible (for check-in and check-out), it is discreet, and it is in a convenient location close to the subway and to Columbia university.

The housekeeper came by daily so it was very clean. My room was spacious. However, I did originally reserve a room with a desk and my room did not come with one.

I arrived at check in time, no rooms were avaliable yet, but that was fine because I was planning on leaving and exploring. Ray helped clear that up which was awesome. When I came back, there was a room avaliable and there were clean sheets and towels. Bathrooms had extra soaps and stuff which was convenient since I forgot my shampoo. Great place to stay to stay! Wish he had more places in nyc!

Overall, had a great stay at Ray's place. The location is perfectly situated near public transportation. The place is small but comfortable and the fact that it has two bathrooms is a plus. The only downside is that it is located on the first floor and street noise can be loud at times. One other thing is the lock on the door of the apartment is very difficult to open. I realize the host probably doesn't have control over this and this is also something common with NYC apartments but it definitely made it a bit difficult to access the apartment. 

Regardless, I would definitely stay again at Ray's place. Check-in is the easiest I've ever encountered on airbnb.

The listing was very accurate ! The apartment was just as described and my boyfriend met the host and said he was great ! The location was amazing and it was amazingly clean . We will definitely stay here again if we travel back to NY!
Stayed at Ray's accommodation for three nights.  Extremely clean, great location and a very well organised host. Would highly recommend.
I never saw Ray, but he was very nice in finding me a steamer and the hose was clean and perfectly located!
Never met him in person but his guidelines and instructions were really helpful for us. The house was really clean and nice! Perfect location, absolutely recommended!

Thanks Ray for a good stay. Our room was quite small and unfortunately we were too late to move to the bigger room. Although we emailed a few times before and during our stay, you were not very responsive. The apartment is clean and well maintained. Excellent showers and luckily quiet co-guests. The location is walking distance from Columbia University which made it an ideal spot to attend the graduation of our son.

Wonderful experience! Very clear and easy check-in instructions and house rules (and explanations for things like how to operate the shower on cute post-its :), clean and pleasant apartment (especially the room and bathroom), and good location by multiple subway entrances and the park and a nice neighborhood. Couldn't have asked for better!
Great location, very nice apartment and room was nice and clean.  100% recommended!

The place was great! Perfect for 2 people - by cool people who stayed there as well. 

Couldn't complain. Thanks, Ray!

The location of this was great, very nice and very safe, however the apt was filthy and clearly hadnt been cleaned!! The apt was was much more like a hostel than an air bnb; the room was tiny (7 steps end to end to be exact) with no cups to drink out of and no plates or pots or pans to cook with, not to mention that the kitchen was little more than a fridge and a small line of cabinets. 

The Room
The pictures of the room were not of the room and the room was both filthy and tiny with the bed being little more than an old and very uncomfortable spring mattress on a flimsy fold out sofa type base. The pillows too were old and flat.

The Bathroom
The bathroom was modern but disgustingly filthy with hair all over the floor

All in all this was a hostel with the property owner not living in the property and instead renting out all the rooms!!
We spent a wonderful time in NY staying in Ray's apartment. It's very good located, close everywhere, especially to Central Park and subway. What's important for me the apartment was clean.
A room very handy, as described in the ad in a good location.

Ray's place was overall great. Upon booking a room, I was sent a document with all of the instructions I needed for check in and check out. It was very clear and detailed and everything worked or as it should have.

What I didn't realize was that the apartment was a four bedroom apartment; it felt a little like a hostel. However I only saw the other guests a couple of times very briefly. There were also two bathrooms so there was never a long wait for the bathroom (although I did have to wait a few times). 

Ray has a professional cleaning lady to clean the rooms before any guest stays and you will be provided with towels as well. I couple critiques I have is that the toilet paper in the bathroom could be better quality, and there should be hand towels and washcloths in addition to bath towels for guests. 

The apartment is on the upper west side so it takes about 30 minutes via MTA to get to Rockefeller center and closer to 45 to get to lower Manhattan. However transit is very close and we never had to walk far. 

Overall, I would recommend staying at Ray's place if you do not mind sharing the apartment with others.
Great space! The host was very communicative and made the process from start to finish smooth!

The location is great if you are looking for a residential non touristy neighbourhood. Central park is very close.
The appartment itself feels more like a hostel. We have met many different guests during our stay. There are very few kitchen tools (like 2 cups for a 4 bedroom appartment). Rooms are quite small with limited possibilities to open a window. There is AC, but it is quite noisy.
We appreciated that there are 2 bathrooms.

Unfortunately we never met or even spoke to Ray (even through text!-- we texted him which room we chose to stay in and received no response). The apartment was very clean and we were able to find free street parking right outside-- although I'm sure not everyone was so lucky. When we got to the apartment around 12:30, we were able to leave our things in the living room until the rooms had been cleaned, which was very convenient. We didn't get back until late at night, so we took the one available room. Somehow, we either couldn't figure out how to turn the electricity on in that room (the rest of the apartment was fine) or it just wasn't working. Which, of course, meant that it was very hot, as well as no lighting. There were also quite a few nitpicky things that Ray insists upon when people live there (no toilet paper in the toilets-- what???). But in spite of this, I had a good stay. The apartment is in a good location and easily accessible to the subway. Essentially, it was just a place to sleep, and that was all we really needed.

The room was as advertised. The location is fantastic, about 5-10 minutes away from the Subway lines. While I haven't met Ray personally, he left a very detailed and diligent note explaining all that was needed for the room. Overall, I would recommend this place for a short visit to NYC.

Check-in and check-out process was systematic and streamlined, I couldn't meet Roy in person during my stay, though. Safer location than I concerned before. I liked the neighbor, especially a shop that sells fresh carrot juice in the morning. Small room(I got room #1) and road construction from early in the morning were cons.
It was nice staying at Ray's place..the room was not that big but we managed it. The bathrooms were clean!
Excellent location in uptown west side. Great if you want to experience walking to and from Central Park. Just two blocks from Subway station and near many bars and restaurant.

The building is nice and requires code for entry. Something was up with the doorknob so we had difficulty getting in, luckily other renters were leaving so we were able to get in. The space is clean enough and I actually appreciate all the sticky note instructions because it makes things easier. Upon entry we smelled gas and realized someone had left the stove on so we turned it off. The bathroom was reasonably clean. The bedroom was very clean and he had a power strip so you can charge multiple things. You are meant to write your names and how long you'll be there on a sticky and put it on your door, but there were no working pens so we weren't able to do that. The next morning we woke up to cheese all over the kitchen counter and floor that my friend stepped in so that wasn't ideal. I guess the other renters were hungry in the middle of the night. Other than that our stay was great and I would definitely recommend staying in one of his apartments.

Ray was really reachable before we booked and since we arrived.
Once arrived in the place, we never met him, never received any call from him to inquire if everything was ok or not.

This place is more to compare to an hotel with no reception desk and no service except the cleaning.

It's just a business. Washing machine is out of order. All the old guest have left their food in the fridge but none knows because none cares. 
When we arrived TV was out of order but Ray can't know it as he doesn't come to his own place.

Then wifi and internet went to be out of order. Ray was called but didn't do anything until I called and said that I was there to work... No any commercial gesture for inconvenience.
He finally said that he has another apartment to rent in the 5th floor and sent us there to get wifi.

Only one room of the 4 in the apartment has a table to work. This the one on the picture.

One of the room had a door handle was broken which was not fixed...

I have pictures of all what I wrote... If necessary.

The spirit of Airbnb is to share with the owner or we can choose and hotel.  If you want to do a business hotel ... Have a real reception desk with real commodities...

You said that parking was easy, I spent 2 hours on arrival to find a park spot.

Please explain what the signs means to foreigners... This could be really helpful.

I m very sorry to have to write but this is the truth and reality
Everything was good on the appartment, it was clean, it has a great location. I recommend his place.

This is a good place. You get what you pay for. It's a bit far from tourist areas, although near Central Park. Check the instructions before you get here, the host is not present and it was a bit confusing. It is three blocks from two metro stations so moving was convenient. The cleaning lady was very nice and made sure we were comfortable.
Everything perfect

We spent a wonderful time in NY staying in Ray's apartment. Everything was great. The place was always clean and the bedroom was really comfortable. Very close to Central Park and just a few minutes away from the subway stop that takes you to central Manhattan. Thanks Ray for a good stay.

Everything was very straightforward and simple. It's a great place to stay if you want to be near Columbia, and also very convenient by subway to the rest of the city. It's clean, the other housemates mostly keep to themselves, and exactly what I needed. The neighborhood is busy basically at all hours, although the street is pretty quiet.
Ray's place has everything you need and more. Good location, clean room and everything you need for comfortable stay. Can't praise it enough!

My fiance and I stayed at Ray's place for one night. There was initially a mixup on Ray's end, and he sent us to the wrong apartment (he has two in the same area). I understand how this sometimes happens, but it was late when we arrived and the mixup caused a delay when we were already very tired, which is why I'm taking one star off an otherwise 4-star experience. 
Ray's place otherwise suited our need for a clean place to crash after a long day. It is conveniently located (15 min walk) from Columbia university, and the check-in/check-out process is easy. If you are a stickler for extreme cleanliness, I would not recommend it for you, but otherwise, it's a good place for people who will spend most of their day out of the house.
It was ok.
Ray was a great communicator and has a great little home. He was great for my one day stay.

The location is perfect! Room is clean, bed is nice to sleep in. Free wifi.
We really enjoyed staying here.
Thank you Ray, your room were so comfortable, clean and safe. I would recommend that all travelers to stay here.
Ray's place was a very smooth process, straightforward, nice. Cool digs very much like a swanky hostel.
The apartment was just as described. The location is great!
Strong recommend! Ray is a great host and love the place!
Nice place for short staying.
House a bit cluttered since photos were taken so take that into account. good location near central park and comfortable enough bed for 2
Good place at a great value for Manhattan.
great place to stay for the price

That the photos aren't exactly an accurate portrayal of what the place looks like. There were a lot of large boxes that took over the living room area. I understand it was all cleaning materials but this should be disclosed, as it didn't allow for a lot of breathing room. Felt very much like a hostel, which is fine but people should just be aware of that vibe. The bed was comfortable!

Ray is really nice guy and he gives good instruction about how to get to the building, how to check in, and how to check out. He answers to your message really quick. Overall, it was really good experience!!
Ray's spot was good, it was a nice location for moving to all NYC! Was great!
Estuvo bien
Cozy and comfortable. Very easy access. Very clean.

Ray's place was exactly what we needed for our 1 night stay in the city. It's close to several subway stations, and walking distance from Columbia and Central Park. Check in was very convenient and we were able to leave our bags there before we checked in and after we checked out which was nice. We would definitely stay here again!
整体还不错,有冰箱微波炉,出发可以做饭,交通很方便,卫生有待提高!

The room was small but very clean and smelled very pleasant. There were two bathrooms in the apartment, very clean with all the amenities needed. A cleaning lady came every day to take care of the apartment. The location is great, five minutes walking distance from Central Park and Columbia University. Price/quality is on a very good level. Ray was a great host, sent all the instructions prior to arrival as well as some tips on where to eat. There's a good bagel place nearby (Absolute bagels).
Muy buen lugar thank you ray
No unpleasant surprises, perfect for a quick trip to the big apple!

It's a professional AIRBNB place with all consequential amenities. Polyester sheets and a constant flow of people in your face, some less than savory. Also, cleaning ladies are there behaving like they live there (unless they do, then that would be awkward). Watching tv, cooking, lounging. Just annoying. Place is clean though.
Great spot, close to subways, very clean, perfect place to discover New-York!
Logement propre, confortable, sur une rue assez tranquille pour New York, près du transport en commun.
Consistently a great place to stay, strong recommend!
great apt! near to everything!

Ray's place was really good for the value. The key codes check-in method looks very complicated on papers but it is easy after all. Besides some spots of disorder, the apt was well located and we have had a nice stay to his property.
Very easy check-in/checkout process, highly recommended!
You get what you pay for - overall good location that was close to the subway/bus, but a little noisy (it's inside an apartment with three other rooms and 2 bathrooms)

Great place, with very concise instructions which makes the stay essentially completely automated, which is essentially very fortunate because they didn't respond to a single message or email from me in the entire time I was there, even when I was trying to extend my stay.
Apartamento pequeno mas muito bem organizado. Boa localização, próximo à estação de metrô e bem próximo ao Central Park.
Nice apartment that you share with other people.

We loved the location of Ray's place, it is centrally located to restaurants, subway, and markets. A block or so from the upper West side of Central Park,  yet far enough away that it is quiet at night.
Fue muy agradable la estancia y excelente ubicación.

Un bon coup de nettoyage en profondeur s'impose !!!
Sinon emplacement correct tout est faisable à pied ou bus sauf qu'il manque un peu de vie nocturne
The place it's perfect for a few days, also the instructions and options for check in and check our are amazing and really useful for people traveling!

Place was good, walkable to Columbia which we needed, close to central park and subway, and lots of food options nearby.  Check in and check out was contactless with lock boxes etc so don't expect to see the host, unless you have a problem I guess, but we didn't.
Excellent place to stay, good location and the apartment is in good state.
Looks great!

I didn't meet Ray but he answered to my messages quickly.  Everything was exactly as the desription.  It was close to subways and bus, Central park, and restaurants and stores.  The instruction Ray sent me before the trip was extremely helpful.  I thought I read it thorough but I realized not when I faced the door.  Don't forget that you need two different keys, one for the main gait and the other one for the apartment door.  Also the way unlock the door is very specific as written in the instruction.  So never enough to read the instruction before your trip!  However, Ray answered to my airbnb message promptly, so things went easy.  
It was nice to be able to leave my luggages after check out for late flight.  
Overall I had a good stay in Ray's place.
とにかく汚い
Great stay! Full bed was comfortable. A little bit noisy during the night but not too bad! If we had a mirror in our room, it could have been perfect !

Right there in manhattan, reachable to midtown, uptown and downtown.
Clean, tidy and well maintained.
It is a very cute location. Close to paid parking lot.

Great Wifi, Amazing AC, The space is almost too big to be true in the city. Super accessible to the public transportation! The room was a perfect home base for our NYC adventure, more space and way cheaper than any NYC hotel I've stayed in.
I love that it's an apt with only bnbs. I didn't need to meet up with the landlord to get the keys. It's a very basic apt.
Good communication, very affordable. It was a perfect experience if you are willing to stay with others.
It's Perfect worth the money.

We stayed at Ray's place because it was near the start line of an early race (triathlon) I had the next morning and also well priced. It was convenient in location and Ray's communication was clear, timely and he was very available. The apartment wasn't as clean as I had expected it to be, when you walk in there is a hallway full of shoes as if a family of 5 lived in the apartment and dishes in the sink. Bathroom and bedroom were standard. The apartment certainly served it's purpose, I slept well and had a great race.

appart bien organisé pour la collocation , on a jamais croisé ray mais grâce à un jeu de piste on trouve les clés de l'immeuble puis de l'appart. clim ok mais un peu bruyante... grand frigo congélateur utile!

Nice place, Quality of stay is high. Easy to reached the location and 200m to MRT . Only issue is owner is missing like not picking up the phone ever. Got reply after 1 day or more than 36hrs. Cleaning lady was very nice we met two days and she was helping us to find food places near area. i guess airbnb total business model is house/ room/ shared room  with some host to atleast to give the key of the house or room.
The check in process was difficult, the bathrooms were smaller than they looked in the pictures and the bed was a glorified cot. Wouldn't recommend to a friend.

It was Fine .The Location was ok.The main problem was service.  We had a problem with electricity in our room ,so the conditioner wasn't working .Ray didn't respond to any texts and emergency number either .The only one person who helped us was Elizabeth .The Bath was full of someone's hair . Wi-if wasn't working for a day either .(we stayed there for a week ).Also when we tried to cook something the Fire alarm has been turning on all the time . People there were coming and leaving everyday  ,and some of them were really loud ,and we couldn't sleep normally .
Great location, quiet neighborhood, easy to check in.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I gave this place five stars because I don't want to effect his listing, everything was good enough but far from five stars, and I wouldn't stay here again. This place is basically a four bedroom hostel. While I was there for two days many people came through. It's very basic and cluttered. The owner does not live here. It is also a thirty dollar Uber to downtown where most things I wanted to do were. One of the two showers was broken while I was there so the first morning I waited for two hours before I could get in the shower and leave. The second day I got up early and they had fixed the other shower. The advertised washer and dryer was broken and looked as though it had been for a long time. This is an Airbnb farm and for the money you can find much better in this area or, in my opinion, a better area.
It was very reasonable for NYC. You get what you pay for. The place is small, but updated. It was quite messy but not terrible. I would recommend it for a short, cheap, easy stay.

This was basically like staying in a mini-hotel, and I mean that in a good way. It was clean, check-in was a breeze thanks to the very detailed instructions that Ray sent, and the facilities were good - two bathrooms for four rooms, a common area and a kitchen in case you need to cook. It even offered hairdryers and stuff like that. It's close to the 103 St. stop off the 123, B and C, and surrounded by lots of little eateries and stuff like that. I'd def stay here again.

Rays place is good value and rather convenient location, it's great if you just need a place to sleep for a short visit as I did. The bed was comfortable and the place clean and it was a fairly quiet place and I did feel safe in that area. The only trouble was getting the first key out as it was high up and I'm small so I had to stand on my own suitcase to reach up to the lock as there was nothing else to stand on and it was hard to see at night. Other than that it was good.
overall, it was great.

If you're young and traveling on a budget, this place is a great option, especially if it's just for 2-3 days.  Older travelers or travelers looking to stay longer might want to look elsewhere.  I'd stay here again though.

Good location and good price. However, if you need a good bed to sleep on, as we do since we are seniors, on this bed you could feel the springs. Tolerable for a few nights but not great. Also, communal area is full of garbage cans and cleaning equipment. But if you could put up with that, this place is a good value.

Ray was great in promt communication. The access was also very smooth. The area is nice but quite remote, nevertheless it was perfect for us for that one night as had plans the next  day around there. The room we stayed at was clean but tiny, all the other 3 rooms were occupied that time. The common area was messy and cramped. Obviously once in NY one does not spend much time 'home' still I only can recommend this place for short layovers.
Great location , easy to find, check in  instruction are very clear.
Overall is good for staying a short time, but if someone lock apartment's door, you will be lock outside all night.

We had a good stay at Ray's. Convenient location, clean and tidy. We were locked outside the house for an hour, as the keys weren't left outside as per instruction sheet. Managed to find them with a little help from a neighbour. Would happily stay again.
A good little spot to meet new people that are out of New York and it has what you need to crash and just explore the city.
Departamento muy cómodo. Excelente ubicación cerca de varias líneas de metro. Lo único que no nos gusto fue el frío que entraba por la ventana de la habitación!
Ray is a great host. The apartment is cozy and very well located. We will definitely be staying with him again. Highly recommend.
Awesome!
Ray was great in providing details for check-in and during the stay. Great location for trip in NYC. Thank you!
Close to transport and very convenient.

Ray's place was good value and the room itself was clean. The location is excellent and very accessible. However the listing mentions free parking on premises which is not true. We had to find parking on streets and we couldn't find it and therefore had to pay 25 USD for the evening and 25 for the next morning. The house was a bit unorganised, and the bathroom was not clean. 

Overall, we got what we paid for. A little bummed about the parking inaccuracy in the listing though.

The room, toilet, and just the house itself were very clean. We had to book for one more night due to the snowstorm, and Ray immediately replied to my message to help me. Also, there are some things that you can use freely inside the house, which are very useful. My friend and I had such a comfortable and satisfying trip, and I highly recommend here!

Had a great experience here. This was my first time using AirBNB and I will 100% be using it again. I paid $60 a night to rent a room in manhattan, compared to the $200 market price for a typical room with half of the amenities. Ray's place had 3 other rooms for guests and 2 bathrooms- a lot nicer than I was expecting. It didn't even feel like there were other guests in the appt. He also included thoughtful touches like leaving shampoo and food for guests.
很好
Very clean!! Great location for getting downtown and for walking around

Ray was very nice with us. He was super friendly and easy to communicate with. The apt and room were very clean. Will definitely recommend this please. Easy public transportation and super close to Central Park!

Appartamento senza pretese ma molto carino, Ray è gentilissimo e super disponibile a qualsiasi ora del giorno e della notte.
La posizione è ottima, a 5 minuti dalla metro e altrettanti per Central Park.
L’unica nota stonata riguarda la pulizia, viene dato un solo asciugamano per tutta la vacanza, a prescindere dalla durata, e soprattutto i fornelli della cucina sono rimasti sporchi per tutta la settimana nonostante la donna delle pulizie venisse tutti giorni.
I bagni invece erano piuttosto puliti, così anche le lenzuola.
In generale però la pulizia della casa non è eccelsa.
Dovessi tornare a New York sicuramente soggiornerei di nuovo qui.

Ray’s place is a decent enough place to stay in for a couple of nights. The rooms are basic ( bed, night stand and desk) and a cleaner comes daily to clean the common areas like the bathroom and dining and living room area. The common areas aren’t well styled so don’t expect a fancy living and dining area. But all amenities you need are there. Table, chair, microwave, mini kitchen. The bathrooms are nicely done though, if not a little small. But at least there are 2 bathrooms to service the 4 rooms. 

Bring earplugs as the walls are thin and if you stay in the front rooms, you will hear the conversations of all the passers by on the street.

Ray is extremely helpful. Detailed description for check in and check out. Ray responds quickly and is always happy to assist in anyway possible. The room was as expected in a gear location and I would definitely book this room again!
As expected
Great place to stay for the night. Room was clean and location was ideal.

Very clean. Great location and accurate explanation for that.  Two full baths very new  modern and nice to have with four rooms sharing. Place is very small and tight. Room could hardly fit  two people and bed not very comfortable. Probably best for younger adults/backpackers than us middle aged B and B users.

Ray was super responsive and prompt in giving clear instructions. We didn’t get to meet him but he ensured our stay was as smooth as possible. The house was nice and clean and the bed was comfortable. What did it for us was the amazing AC system that saved us from the nyc heat. Definitely recommend others to stay here!
Ray was very quick to respond to our questions and he was very accommodating. The room was clean, comfortable, and easy to access. Overall, it was a great stay!
Rays place was everything as expected. Did not disappoint! Would recommend to a friend.
역과 가깝고 좋아용

I'm thankful all we did was sleep here. Aside from being in a good location, there were many things misleading about this listing.
First off, there is NO free parking on the premises. He is referring to the street parking outside his apartment. You do not learn about that until after you book and it is too late.
Secondly, the instructions the host sent us after booking were very long, poorly articulated, and left us with the impression that he wasn't suppose to be renting his place out as an airBnB. Getting in was like trying to get into an escape room. Many combinations and locks AND the door to the apartment was very janky and taped together.
Additionally, the space is not as nice as it appears in the pictures. The common space is messy, very dark, and NOT air conditioned. Not comfortable to be in. The room we booked was astonishingly smaller than the pictures. The only thing that I will say is the bathrooms are very nice and the only redeeming quality.
Last of all, the space is shared by many people, not including the host (which we never even saw by the way). There were at least three other people in the apartment in addition to my boyfriend and I. This became problematic in the morning when trying to get ready on a time crunch, even with the two beautiful bathrooms. It was quite frustrating.
Overall, I wish I read the reviews before booking this listing because I would have absolutely looked elsewhere. Because of the "free parking" LIE we had to pay $90 for a parking garage space which threw off my budget for my entire trip. Know what you're getting into if you book this listing.
Very close to metro. About 15 minutes from time square!
Muy buena ubicacion, cerca de la estacion de metro. Pasamos muy bien en casa de Ray. Me hubiera gustado conocer al anfiatrion.  Gracias.
The best choice I made!

We came in for the weekend to New York and this was the worst Airbnb stay we have ever had. We had an early flight and luggage so, we had clarified with Ray if it was okay that we checked in a little early and he confirmed that it was okay for us to keep our luggage in the common-area and keep our luggage there. An hour into us checking in the maintenance person showed up and yelled and swore at us for being in the common area. I mentioned that I had clarified this arrangement with Ray weeks ago and she said that she did not care. Things got so bad that my friend and I almost left the Airbnb and booked a hotel because we were worried things might get violent. This was at the very beginning of our trip and really put a damper on our entire trip.
Good location for those wanting to explore manhattan, especially Central Park. Easy access and good space for guests. Would recommend!
Muy cómodo  y cercano a el transporte
It’s great value and good for staying!
I do recommend Ray's place. It is very clean, well-organized, and safe. It is located in a convenient place since it is close to the subway station.
Es un espacio muy limpio, ordenado y respetuoso, ideal para moverte a cualquier parte de la ciudad ya que el metro está a unas cuadras.

Location was good but that was it. It didn’t feel the cleanest. Also it was very noisy outside and whenever someone was in the bathroom, you could hear the water pipes loudly and I could not sleep. I did appreciate the amenities in the bathroom (good soap, shampoo and conditioner)! Ray was very quick to respond to messages which I also enjoyed.
Nice amenities but didn't realize we'd be sharing the bathroom/ kitchen/ etc. with 3 other reservations
Good location, clean space, responsive host!

The apartment is in a very convenient location, only a short walk to public transportation, and easy to find. It was very clean. We were sharing the two bathrooms  with several other guests. Overall it was pretty quiet and everything went well. We would definitely come back.
Good Place
房间位于一楼,隔音不是很好,打电话或说话都能听到,外面马路的人走过说话都听得清楚,但门口可以免费停车,当然车位是很紧张的,我们停了2天车,出去都是坐地铁,比较方便!
Everything was impeccable! The place was nice and ray it’s amazing, and answers super fast and helpful! I would stay again!
Ray’s place was awesome and in a great location.  We parked in a nearby garage which I booked before hand.
Great place!

name: Spacious sunny suite, city center
summary: Spacious sunny suite with private bathroom, wide windows in a beautifully newly restored two-story house with view over the garden in a peaceful setting. We are two sisters who enjoy the art of hospitality and cooking healthy and exquisite meals.
space: Spacious sunny suite with private bathroom, wide windows in a beautifully newly restored two-story house with view over the garden in a calm and peaceful setting. We are two sisters who enjoy the art of hospitality and cooking healthy and exquisite meals. Our home, which we tend to wholeheartedly, has 4 large rooms and a common area with a living room, dinner hall, kitchen and a very sunny garden where you can enjoy your breakfast. We are located in the city center at a 15 minutes walking distance from the main historic touristic itineraries, in a very quiet neighborhood with parking area, several traditional Portuguese restaurants and supermarkets (13 minutes walk from the metro station of Polo Universitario and half minute walk from several bus stops).
description: Spacious sunny suite with private bathroom, wide windows in a beautifully newly restored two-story house with view over the garden in a peaceful setting. We are two sisters who enjoy the art of hospitality and cooking healthy and exquisite meals. Spacious sunny suite with private bathroom, wide windows in a beautifully newly restored two-story house with view over the garden in a calm and peaceful setting. We are two sisters who enjoy the art of hospitality and cooking healthy and exquisite meals. Our home, which we tend to wholeheartedly, has 4 large rooms and a common area with a living room, dinner hall, kitchen and a very sunny garden where you can enjoy your breakfast. We are located in the city center at a 15 minutes walking distance from the main historic touristic itineraries, in a very quiet neighborhood with parking area, several traditional Portuguese restaurants and supermarkets (13 minutes walk from the metro station of Polo Universitario and half minute walk from several
neighborhood_overview: Very peaceful neighbourhood close to a beautiful garden in the city center of Porto and at a walking distance from the main historic itineraries. You'll find plenty of restaurants and fine dinning places in our neighbourhood. There are 2 supermarkets at a 5 minutes walking distance from our house. Come and enjoy the real Porto, this is a very popular neighbourhood and it will give you a feel of how people live in this city!
transit: There are free parking areas around the house.  Polo Universitario is the closest metro station (13min walking). Buses in front of the house: 5 minutes to the historical center; 20 minutes to the beach (Foz)
access: We provide all bed linen and towels Living room with cable TV (with main international TV channels), comfortable couch, board games and small library Your own set of keys to the house and for your room (this ensures the safety of your belongings) Fully equipped kitchen.  Free wireless internet throughout the house Terrace - where you can enjoy your breakfast  Tips & advices - we are here to welcome you to Porto and help you discover it!
interaction: We'll be glad to welcome you upon your arrival and we'll be available to offer you advise and information about Porto. If you are around the house at dinner time we'll probably share a meal together! We're two sisters, so you'll probably always find one of us at home.
house_rules: Striclty non smoking (not even in the garden). Please make little noise after 10pm.  If you use the kitchen please keep it clean and wash the dishes after using.

host.host_about:
Hello, I'm Oriana from Portugal.
I love traveling and I'm also an Airbnb host!

reviews.comments: Oriana and her sister are the best hosts i ever had. They cared a lot if we needed something all the time. About the house, in my opinion, i felt very comfortable there, the room is as it is shown in the pictures with it private bathroom! Cosy house that i would strongly recommend to next travellers.

We spent a lovely time in Oriana's house. She and her sister was very listen to our needs and give us very good advices about visiting Porto and Portugal.
We take time to know each other around a cup of tea. It was very pleasant.
La maison d'oriana et de sa soeur est très accueillante tout comme les propriétaires et leur adorable chiot. Tout est raffiné et bien décoré. Plusieurs chambres sont dédiées au Rbnb .

thank you Oriana! it was good time in Porto... home is peaceful and comfortable in friendly neighborhood, room exactly expected: sunny, clean and nice arranged with private bathroom. Safety place for a car on street and half an hour walk to historical center. We can also used a good equipped kitchen and open for guests living room.

We spent a lovely stay in Oriana's home: our room and the house are very luminous and the furniture is beautiful, elegant and sober. The bedroom is totally faithfull to the photo and very pleasant.
The kitchen is well equipped and there is a very good bakery next to the house. The living room is also very nice.
Oriana is very thoughtful, discrete and speaks very well English.
She gave us nice suggestions to visit Porto.

Oriana was very kind to welcome us before the official change so we could leave our stuff at her place while waiting. Besides that she also gave us some quick tips about neighbourhood and the city - she was helpful with those anytime we had some questions.

Otherwise our room and bathroom were very clean and tidy and all the things described were provided and available. The neighbourhood is nice and calm and all things needed (coffee place/restaurant, bus and metro stations, stores) are in surroundings. In other words, if you are visiting Porto you should definitely consider staying at her place.

Nous avons été reçu par Oriana qui est très charmante,un peu de difficulté pour ce comprendre (nous ne parlons pas beaucoup l'anglais et pas du tout le portugais ,Oriana très peu le (Website hidden by Airbnb) chambre est très agréable,l'accès au centre de porto est très facile par le bus 600 ,il y a beaucoup de chose à voir
Yes, everything was ok

We had a nice stay in the house of Oriana. She is a good host and was  very kindly and If we needed some informations she was always very helpful. 

Thank you very much Oriana!

Orianas place is perfect for a stay in Porto. We were accomodated in an exceptionally clean environment and the room was exactly as described. The location is alright, 25 mins on foot to the old port.

Oriana is very kind and helped us a lot with restaurants and stuff like that.

We can only warmly  recommend this place and wish Oriana all the best for her future.

M&L

Wir waren 3 Nächte bei Oriana, um uns einen Eindruck von Porto zu verschaffen. Eine alles in allem gute Wahl. Nette Gastgeberin und cooles Haus in guter Lage. In der Nachbarschaft sind viele Geschäfte und mit dem Bus ist man schnell im historischen Center.

Nous avons eu un très bon accueil, son repas végétarien que nous avions réservé à notre arrivée était très bien et très copieux.
Nous ne regrettons pas d'avoir pris la chambre privée. C'est un endroit très calme. Très bon compromis par rapport au centre de Porto (ligne de bus, métro à proximité) mais nous avions pris l'option de faire de la marche durant ce week-end prolongé car les repas étaient très copieux.
Petit plus : Oriana se débrouille très bien en français.
Merci pour ce séjour. Ma petite fleur des îles se souviendra de ses 40 ans.

Oriana i jej rodzina, którą poznaliśmy, są bardzo gościnni i pomocni, z wielką przyjemnością spędziliśmy tam 7 nocy. Pokoje dokładnie takie, jak w ofercie, czyste i przyjemne. Okolica urocza, a ludzie wokół życzliwi. Również piękna pogoda pozwoliła nam spędzić wspaniały tydzień. A przy okazji poznaliśmy słodką Mel. Wierzcie mi - warto pojechać do Porto, to jedno z najpiękniejszych miast jakie zwiedziliśmy i przy tym relatywnie tanie.  A jakie porto - każdy rodzaj wart grzechu!

I had a lovely stay at Oriana’s home in Porto.  The room was bright, clean and quiet, in a recently renovated building so that you truly get the feel of old Porto along with the conveniences of modern living.  It is not far from the city center, yet has a bit more of a residential feel although there are shops, cafes and a supermarket in the immediate area along with the bus to downtown only two blocks away.   I was very pleased with the accommodation.

Everything about Oriana listing is 100% right on. We can also verify what others have said about her hosting are accurate. We would like to add that the architecture of the building is special as the ceilings are high and the stairways are majestic which adds to a special feeling for Oriana's home. She has created a oasis from the hustle and bustle of Puerto.

This is a beautiful house near Porto attractions. We visited Porto for New Year and it was pouring rain.
room was large and very clean, however a little cold/damp in the evenings. Great place to stay on our next visit!

We stayed at Orianna's place for two days, and it was a great experience! Our room was situated in the townhouse in the nice quiet part of Porto, close to the city centre and to all the places of interest and shops. 

Our room was on the 2nd floor, with a bathroom. It was very clean, with great bed. Window overlooked the courtyard. For the guests there is also a kitchen to cook and a dining room. 

So, we enjoyed our stay and highly recommend our host!
Muito boa a casa, tem charme. O quarto é bastante agradável também.

It was really a great choice to stay at Oriana's place while visiting Porto. Apartment is cosy and well equipped, we had enjoyed freshly made home breakfast, and felt atmosphere of the old Porto. Although Apartment is not located in historical center it was not too far, and as we had car there was no problem with parking nearby. We can definitely recommend staying at Oriana's place!

The house is authentic, clean, comfortable and you feel at home at Oriana's! The room is big and sunny, and you have access to your own bathroom, which is great. We couldn't meet Oriana, but our stay was great and we write each other just enough to feel fine in her house and in Porto. The townhouse was not in the city center, but some buses can take you there. The neighborhood is okay, but clearly not as beautiful as the center. 
A very nice place for a great price!
It was a pleasure to stay at Oriana's place.  The room is really comfortable and Oriana is a great host. She explained us everything we needed to know about the town.

Nos encantó la casa!! Nos quedamos en la sunny suite, grande y luminosa, muy agradable. Todo está muy limpio, tal y como sale en las fotos. El barrio es muy tranquilo, a unos 15-20 minutos andando del centro... 
Si vas en coche en la puerta de casa se puede aparcar muy bien y sin pagar.
Además Oriana es muy simpática. 
Sin duda Repetiríamos!!!
Muy recomendable.

Awesome, big and sunny house. We were treated as kings by Oriana.s mother while she was not there.
Well located and really easy to park if you travel with your own park.
100% recommended

Even though the weather was rainy we had awesome days in Oriana's house! Our suite was clean and very pretty and the people in the house were kind and lovely. The house is in half an hour walking-distance from the City Center, so we didn't need bus or taxi every day. We felt really comfortable and happy!

The house was beautiful, and really cosy.
It felt just like home.
Definitely will come back soon

Bonjour,
On a pas vu Oriana :-( notre chambre jumelée avec une seconde salle de bain il y avait beaucoup de bruits, le matelas n'est pas confortable, il y avait pas petit meuble pour déposé la trousse de toilette . Si non on à découvert un super restaurant juste en face. On reviendra !!!
Merci à Oriana pour notre séjour la maison est très belle et notre chambre avec sdb privée était très agréable, j'espère que nous aurons l'occasion de revenir sous le soleil!!!

Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit der Unterkunft von Oriana, die wir so vorgefunden haben wie abgebildet bzw. beschrieben. Sie hat uns herzlich begrüßt und uns alles im Haus erklärt. Genau gegenüber fanden wir einen Parkplatz für unser Mietauto und ebenfalls an der Ecke ein einfaches aber gutes Restaurant - zwei Ecken weiter eine sehr gute Pastelaria, die wir ausgiebig genutzt haben. Wir hätten in der Nähe einen Bus in die Innenstadt nehmen können, haben es aber vorgezogen, zu Fuß in die City zu gehen (ca. 30 min.). Wir können also den Aufenthalt bei Oriana gut weiterempfehlen.
Andrea und Bruno
Oriana was great host. The room was as good as on pictures. We highly recommended the place and would stay there again. :)

Oriana was very nice, she showed me around in the house when I arrived and I asked her a good few questions and she was very keen on helping me (: i can really really recommend to stay at her house. When I left we said goodbye and her mum was here too they were doing the garden and she cutted down one rose for me and said I should take care of myself (: very very lovely people (: thanks again Oriana (:

We had a great stay at Oriana's home. She is a great host and provided us with very clear instructions and everything we needed. The room was clean and neat and we had our own washroom. As it is a large older home, we had to make sure to be quiet during night hours. The house was close to a bus stop and it was easy to access the metro. I would recommend staying with Oriana in Porto! :)
Great accommodation! We enjoyed staying at this wonderful place. It's only 30 minutes walk from the city center. We highly recommend it!

We had a great time at Oriana's home. We were early on arriving, but she opened the doors to us anyway. She let us drop our luggage off and gave us some recommendations for lunch around the neighborhood. We came back to a beautiful and cozy room with a view of the garden. The room was very spacious, with a private bathroom and lots of wonderful natural light. Her home is about a twenty minute walk to the city center or a 5 minute Uber for only €3.65. There are also two bus lines that will take you as well. Oriana was very helpful, generous, and welcoming. We had a great time and we would definitely stay again!

Das Zimmer mit Bad hat alles was man sich wünscht. Es ist sehr schön eingerichtet. Leider hat nur meine Freundin Oriana persönlich kennen gelernt. 

Die Lage ist wie beschrieben sehr ruhig. Direkt gegenüber ist ein kleines Cafe, geführt von einem älteren sehr freundlichen Herren. Leider hat nur meine Freundin Oriana persönlich kennen gelernt. 

In der dritten Nacht gab es irgendwie einen ziemlichen Lärm im Haus. Ich weiß nicht warum, aber meine Freundin und ich sind um 2 Uhr Nachts aufgewacht und hatten erst das Gefühl, es sei jemand in das Haus eingebrochen. Ich habe in den Flur geschaut und nichts entdeckt. Weiß also nicht, was da los war. Insgesamt ist das Haus sehr hellhörig.

A lovely spaciously room in a beautifully restored home in  a quiet part of Porto. Public transport is close by. We never saw Oriana or anyone else in the house but she left the keys for us to collect which was no problem.

Tout d'abord Oriana est accueillante. Tres belle chambre avec salle de bain privative.maison calme et reposante .Le petit plus , allez prendre votre petit déjeuner au café d'en face ,la patronne est souriante et parle très bien l'anglais
A really fantastic room and a caring host. Very helpful with directions to and from the b&b, as well as to the uni I studied at. The room was light, airy and very comfortable. Thank you again!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour! La chambre et la salle de bain sont très propres, calmes, avec vue sur le jardin. La maison est à environ 30min de marche du centre mais ce n'est pas gênant, nous avons tout fait à pied, le trajet est agréable. Nous recommandons vivement !

Mi novio y yo nos quedamos dos días en casa de Oriana. La experiencia fue excelente. La casa es tal como se ve en las fotos. Nos quedamos en el sunny room. Todo muy limpio, con baño propio y muy ordenado! Hemos disfrutado mucho quedarnos acá. Muchas gracias por recibirnos! Totalmente recomendable
Das stilvoll eingerichtete Haus ,der kleine Garten und das helle ,komfortable Zimmer haben mir gut gefallen.  Auch die Begegnung mit anderen Reisenden in der Küche und im Esszimmer.

Oriana was a friendly host. The place is really nice and close to the center.
TIP: uber is cheaper than public transportation for reach the center or come back home late.
My wife and I stayed with Oriana for 3 nights. We both adored her and loved our stay. The house had a great atmosphere and our room was fantastic!

Great host, she was very helpful all the time.
Highly recomended

Oriana war sehr gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie wohnt in einem sehr schönen Haus und das Zimmer mit Bad war geräumig und sauber. Mit dem Bus, der sehr regelmässig fährt hat man etwa 10 Minuten in die Altstadt und die Fahrt kostet 1.20. Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit dem Aufenthalt

Oriana gave us a lovely warm welcome.
The room was spacious as described, clean & tidy.
Although a bit away from the river & city centre, the location for us was ideal. It gave us the ideal starting point for a walking tour of Porto, with friendly café's en route.
We would happily return, not just to Porto, but to Oriana's home.
The host was friendly and replied to my question quickly and the place was easy access to the city center. It was comfy and convenient.

A Oriana é um excelente anfitriã, discreta e calma, dando espaço para nos sentirmos em casa, num ambiente  tranquilo e sossegado. A casa, antiga e carismática, é acolhedora e tem muita luz. Os espaços, sala, quarto, cozinha e wc's têm o essêncial, são limpos e arejados. O bairro é sossegado, com boa vizinhança, tem por perto todo o tipo de lojas, lavandaria, restaurantes, cafés, etc. Fica perto do centro da cidade, o que permite deslocarmo-nos em visita sem grandes distâncias.

Thank you, Oriana, for this wonderful and comfortable stay at your beautiful house, I enjoyed it very much and would come back anytime. Oriana is a very friendly woman; I loved the peaceful house and that the rooms view is the houses' garden :).
The house was beautiful and the host was very helpful. She was gone the weekend we stayed but made sure to check in with us to make sure our time there went well.

We stayed 2 nights at Oriana's guest house and had a fantastic time in Porto. Oriana was very lovely, friendly and helpful...even checking us in at midnight which we were very appreciate of. We stayed in the room with its own ensuite bathroom rather than one of the other ones with the shared bathroom which had other guests, and the room itself was lovely and spacious, the bed comfortable, and it had a nice view out over the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was quite cold at night though, although Oriana did supply lots of extra blankets. Overall a very good experience and a lovely host.
Oriana was a great host. We had everythng we needed and only had to ask if we needed anything else. Lots of light in the room and the heater worked well plus great hot shower. Thanks for everything
Beautiful house and clean, Oriana is a friendly and helpful host.
We left two days in advance of our scheduled booking

We have traveled in Portugal and Spain for two weeks. And the most pleasant memories we have about Porto. And partly from the place where we have stayed, in the house of Orianna. It was very cozy, nice and comfortable. The house is ancient, but it was even more atmospheric and more interesting to be in it. As for convenience, the room is spacious and bright, the bed is large and comfortable, the bathroom room is clean and pleasant. In general, everything was super. The owner herself is a very interesting girl, pleasant in communication and always ready to help and suggest any trifle. We highly recommend this house for your stay in Porto.
