Oriana è stata molto accogliente e disponibile. La casa è molto bella, luminosa, pulita e accogliente. Dista 30 minuti a piedi dal centro (Ribeira) e 20 min a piedi dalla metro. Alla sera ho spesso usufruito del taxi per tornare a casa (dal centro) al costo di 5-6 euro. Consiglio assolutamente il posto!

We enjoyed our stay at oriana!
There was a good connection to the city centre by bus, on walking distance as well. We only stayed two nights but we might come back for more. Thanks!

I had a great stay in Oriana's house. My room was really comfortable and had a view of the gardens. The neighborhood is very local but also walking distance from the city centre. I would definitely stay here again!

Het verblijf licht heel goed voor bezoek aan de stad. Met ongeveer 25 minuten lopen ben je in het centrum. Je bent echter ver genoeg uit het centrum om toch nog je auto te kunnen parkeren.
Het huis is een oud pand met sfeer en goed genoeg opgeknapt om plezierig te zijn. 
We vonden het bed nogal hard en smal. Bovendien kraakte het. Verder is de kamer licht en prettig ruim.
Oriana's place was lovely as was she, would thoroughly recommend!

Es una hermosa casa antigua, cuarto con baño privado, ubicado a 2 min de la parada de camión o 20 min caminando del centro de la ciudad. Oriana fue muy amable, nos recomendó varios restaurantes muy buenos y nos oriento acerca de como movernos en la ciudad. :)
La habitacion esta muy bien, amplia, luminosa y perfecta para descansar, Ornella es muy amable y es facil comunicar con ella, seguramente regresaria.

Oriana was a great host! 
The room was perfectly cleaned and bright. We stayed 3 days in Porto, we could walk in 25min to the city center! I highly recommend it!

Estuve el fin de semana con mi madre y todo estupendamente. La habitación estaba muy limpia, organizada, muy bien cuidado todo. 
Oriana muy atenta, en cuanto pudo fue a preguntar si nos hacía falta algo, si estábamos cómodas. Muy atenta! 
En cuanto a la ubicación, está a unos 15—20 mim andando del centro. Muy contenta.
Oriana is a great host. I would toota
Charming old house with all modern conviniencies. Perfect place for stay !

la casa di Oriana è molto bella, 
la stanza in cui abbiamo dormito (quella col bagno privato) è silenziosa, spaziosa e luminosa
Oriana mette a disposizione la cucina e la sala da pranzo ai suoi ospiti, è poco presente in casa, ma è molto disponibile ad aiutare anche tramite mail nel sito di airbnb (risponde quasi subito).
la casa si trova a circa 2 km dal centro di Porto al quale è collegato da 2 linee di bus, la stazione di metro più vicina è a circa 500 mt, ma andare e tornare dal centro a piedi è una camminata piacevole.
Il quartiere è tranquillo e cis ono negozin di tutti i tipi e anche ristoranti tipici
Albergue próximo a Universidade Fernando Pessoa. Metro mais próximo fica 15-20 minutos de caminhada, na estação Marquês. Supermercado, cafeterias e restaurantes perto.

Nuestra estancia en casa de Oriana  fue genial, la casa es preciosa y muy limpia, la habitación era muy cómoda y con unas vistas muy bonitas. Está a pie a unos  20 minutos del centro turístico  de Oporto. 
Se puede aparcar fácilmente por la zona. 
Encantados con este Airbnb y con Oriana.

Estuvimos en un espacio lleno de encanto, limpio y en un barrio tranquilo en el que se puede comer más barato que en el centro, estando a 4/5 minutos del centro en autobus ( dependiendo del conductor del autobus). Oriana fue muy amable y nos aconsejo que ver y donde comer en Porto. 

Aconsejamos a todo el que quiera ver Porto que este en esta casa con tanto encanto!!
Una estancia muy agradable y Oriana ha sido una gran anfitriona

Oriana is a kind host, respects your privacy and provides useful information about the city. The house is very characteristic, quite old but comfortable. From the house it's easy to reach the historical center with the public transport.
A very fine house a good walk from the centre. Very good value for money.
Oriana's studio was lovely and as pictured. She was very kind and offered some great suggestions on where to eat. We would stay there again!

Oriana was very friendly and more than happy to answer me any questions or to help me with anything. The room was great and the house really lovely. I had a great time in Porto and would stay at Oriana's place again any time!!!

We had a wonderful stay at Oriana's apartment. The room is situated in a beautiful old building with a spaceous living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Our private bathroom was clean. Oriana's recommendations turned out to be amazing: we had the best dinner night at restaurant LSD in the city center, definitely go there if you have the time! Oriana herself is a very kind and loving host who made sure we felt at home anytime. Possibly the nicest host we've ever had. Only feedback we could think of is that it took us 30min to reach the city centre by foot instead of 20min, but it's a nice walk (and public transportation/taxi's are cheap) so that wasn't really a problem for us. All in all we had an amazing time and would definitely come back.

Belle maison rouge!!Fonctionnelle!Nous avons déjeuné tous les matins juste en face de chez Oriana pour3€!!Pain beurre muffins et 2grands café! Et pour les fins de soirées notre cantine,juste en face,sur l autre trottoire ,une brasserie  ou goûté  les plats typiques a moindre coût! Le patron parle un peu (Website hidden by Airbnb) aussi très bon accueil! !

Everything was great, very clean and atmospheric house. 
Oriana was able to meet and settle us at night, detailed about the city and the surrounding area, advised some places to visit.
Very pleased with the availability of drinking water in the room.
Oriana is kind, friendly and helpful and the room is beautiful. For sure come next time I'm in Porto.
A casa da Oriana é  precisamente como nas fotos, espaçosa, limpa e muito bonita. Oriana é  uma pessoa muito gentil, atende rapidamente quando a procuramos.
Oriana's home is beautiful and unique. I believe if you are looking for an authentic experience in Porto this is the place.
The house is stylish and clean.  The kitchen is a little bit small but enough for making breakfast or a snack. Oriana is nice and gave us good advices for restaurants.

Oriana's place is as described.  Spacious, bright, and close to the city center about 10 minutes ride by the city bus few blocks from the place.  Oriana was very pleasant and easy to communicate with.   If you return to Porto, Portugal we will definitely consider staying with Oriana.

Location in friendly neighborhood. Lots of small restaurants and bakeries. Bus stop close to location and straight to city center. 25 min walking distance from old town. Room was big and sunny with a private bathroom and totally meet our expectations. Oriana welcomed us at the arrival and gave us some good tips on what to see and where to eat. We can recommend this owner.
Always wanted to stay in an old place in a city.  This was the perfect place for that. It was easy to get around.  Oriana gave us good dining tips
Very beautiful house, with large rooms! Busstops to the city center at 1 min walking distance. Orianna was also very friendly!
Oriana ist eine liebe Gastgeberin und ihr Haus ist schön und gemütlich.
oriana's room is as true as described: sunny And spacious.location is also good.oriana's respose is alwsys in time And precise. very high performance cost ratio!

Oriana is a really nice person and always trying to help where she can. Unfortunately we only met once for a short moment. But I could reach her easily via airbnb and mobile. Check in worked perfectly out as her friend was waiting for us at night. 

The place is a really nice old house in a pretty quiet neighbourhood, north of the city center. You can walk there in round about 45 minutes or take the public transport. Option 1: bus to trinidade and then metro. Option 2: go directly by metro. Bus is ca. 2-3 min. from the house, metro ca. 15 min. Closeby are some supermarkets as well as a restaurant over the street. But you can aso use the kitchen, living and dining room what we did a few times for breakfast. 

The room we booked (suite) comes with a double bed, closet, commode, chair and its own bathroom. The room and bathroom themselves are relatively big. As the furniture is pretty old I didn´t like the smell and beside that the drawers had been dirty, so for me it was definitely too less space to put my stuff somewhere else - same in the bathroom. The door to the bathroom is hard to close/open which starts to get on the nerves anywhen. If you turn on the light a really noisy deduction starts working. 
I was traveling with my brother - so the bed was toooo small for the 2 of us. No idea which size it had - maybe 1.20m? Additionally the mattress is really uncomfortable, you can already feel the springs, and the bed makes a noise always when you are moving. I am sorry to say but I can´t recommend staying in that room (which is BTW the most expensive one of all 3 rooms Oriana offers).

After 3 nights we had the option to move in another room with 2 seperate beds (which is 5€ cheaper a night). The switch was the best decision ever as we had the first night we slept well over there. The  room has enough space for 2 people and also enough options to store your stuff somewhere. The only difference - it has no own bathroom and there is only a tiny window to let some light inside. As is it closer to the street also a bit louder if you prefer sleeping with an opened window.

In total I would not come back to Orianas house. For me it is too far away from the city center. Then I would prefer paying a bit more instead of loosing time in moving up and down and paying for public transport. I am also a bit disappointed about the room we first booked and also that Oriana didn´t offer to pay back some money after room changing (as the one was cheaper).

Oriana's place was very stylish and she was very nice to let me check in earlier than her normal check in time. The place is accurately described and amenities all worked fine. I was just disappointed by how cold the place was without central heating. Oriana did give me heating for my room but I could only be comfortable with many many layers during the the night time. I would say if you're visiting Porto in the winter time, definitely bring extra layers. Overall staying at Oriana's place was definitely an accurate way to experience life in Porto as a typical Portuguese and the place is very central to everything.

I stayed at Oriana's place for three nights. 
Basically the location is good you can either take bus (only 2mins walk to bus stop) or walk down to the old town in 20mins. The room is exactly as the photo shown, clean and spacious. 

Oriana is a lovely lady who provide me a good restaurant list, transportation information. I really had a great time in Porto, of course her place is definitely recommended! Thank you again, Oriana!

Oriana é super acessivel e flexível. Facilitou o checkin pois chegamos tarde e ela deixou tudo preparado para nos acomodar. A casa é super confortável localizada em  um local muito tranquilo. Levei 7 min de carro até a ponte Luiz I, restaurante e cafe a 100 mts da casa..

Would not stay there again. Hostel atmosphere instead of an AirBnB.
Very cold all the time.  Heating plak on the wall was sitting on the floor and giving minimal heat.  Had to sleep with clothes on. Furniture in the room was in poor condition and seems like it came from Goodwill.
Oriana was very nice, but not too helpful.  Location was pretty good with a short bus ride to historic center.

Oriana is awesome and her place is really cute, squeaky clean and located in a quiet neighborhood not far from the tourist spots in Porto.

That is the short and sweet version of the review.

And to expand a little more: 

She was really good at checking us in, showing the place and being super nice to list us a good variety of good restaurants to go. My wife and I are vegan, which tends to narrows down the restaurant options even more, haha, but that was not a problem at all. *(small review of a really good restaurant close to her place at the bottom of this review). 

Her place is a pretty cool but we didn't explore the amenities that much because we were out and about all the time during our stay. The room is super clean; the bed is really comfy (not extremely soft, which me and my wife like). Clean private bathroom with hot shower. 

Her place is great and Porto is beautiful. 

Enjoy your trip!
___________________________________
*Restaurante Rito  
Delicious food, super friendly staff and not expensive at all. It's a restaurant that locals go that serves more the traditional-like Portuguese plates (read: a lot of meat and seafood options) but Oriana herself suggested us to "Just go there and tell them that you are vegans. They might put something together for you that is not on the menu.", and sure enough, the chef came to our table and asked what we liked and he put together a delicious plate for us with the ingredients he had available that night. 
Pretty awesome experience.

Oriana is very nice and friendly. She answers quickly and you can contact her at any time. 
The room is a bit cold in winter but very lovely furnitured. Everything is clean and you feel like home.
Nice place to stay

Oriana was a very welcoming host and so we enjoyed our stay in her beautiful restored house! It´s not too far from the city centre, there a lots of shops around, the Location is great :) Highly recommendable!

Oriana is a lovely host who welcomed us to her home and city, providing some great tips for where to eat and drink in Porto. She made certain we were comfortable - and warm - in her beautiful home, which is within a short walk of Porto’s old town.
It was a pleasure to stay at Oriana's house. Very neat and spatious room in a nice old but well refurbished house. Pleasant and stylish.

Oriana's place is a big house in a nice and quiet neighborhood. Historical city center is close with bus, just near the house. The kitchen is good, all you need to cook. We were there in winter so yes, the house was cold, but in the room it was ok with the heaters. The bathroom was clean. It can be a little bit noisy into the house (kitchen, step on floor)  but the guest were nice and gently. We saw Oriana once, at our arrival and she was very nice. Very reactive when the gaz was out ! Porto is a great city, so enjoy !

Camera molto luminosa, accogliente e pulita.
Il letto è caldo e comodissimo.
Molto bello il pavimento in legno, così come il mobilio.
Il bagno è piccolo, ma fa sufficiente alle sue funzioni.
(Come spesso all'estero, non c'è il bidet, ma ci si arrangia...)
Anche la casa è accogliente e graziosa.
La fermata dell'autobus è a nemmeno 5 minuti ed è comoda per il centro.
Centro che si può raggiungere anche a piedi, ma in una cinquantina di minuti.
Oriana è un'ospite perfetta: gentilissima, disponibile ad aiutare, cortese e veloce nelle risposte. Tiene molto ai suoi ospiti.

Adorei ter tido a minha primeira experiência no airbnb na casa de Oriana. Ela foi muito atenciosa e prestativa. O local é de fácil acesso e tem comercio perto, isso ajuda muito. A única coisa que poderia melhorar é o aquecimento do quarto, achei fraco as placas de aquecimento. Passamos um pouco de frio no quarto.
Very accommodating host and beautiful location. Her local recommendations really helped make our trip

Oriana is very nice and the house is very clean / comfortable to live in. The only disadvantage I would say is the location, about 25min on foot to the city center. Compared its price, I recommend Oriana' place. She is very responsive to every question about the house and about the city.
Oriana is a very helpful and nice host. Her home is beautiful and clean. We spent a great time there. We highly recommend it! :)

O local é simples mas muito bom, ônibus para o centro com facilidade, é possível caminhar também até a Ribeira em  20 minutos. Perto de  padarias e supermercados. Oriana nos recomendou restaurantes do bairro, e outros um pouco mais distantes, com comida muito boa e bons preços. Gostamos, voltaríamos a nos hospedar com a Oriana.
Our stay in Oriana's flat was perfect! It's very lovely and very spacious, I deeply recommend it!

We had a very good time and great experience in Oriana's place.
The house is really nice and good location for the ones with or without car.
She is really friendly and helpful with recommendations. We recommend her place anytime.

Très bon séjour à Porto. Oriana est une hôte très sympathique. Malheureusement nous étions en "collocation" avec d'autres couples et nous n'avons pas passés une seule nuit tranquille. Beaucoup de bruit, leur salle de bain touchait notre chambre (douche à minuit pour certains), les portes claquaient à 00h comme à 2h du matin. En bref ce n'était pas très paisible. Malgré ça la maison est sympa. Merci à Oriana pour son accueil.

It was great to stay Oriana’s place:) before I arrive, she is very helpful, very quick response how to get the house. 
Also I did mistake for booking date, but she is very helpful and so kind. 

Oriana kindly gave me extra contact for just in case for check in. When  i arrived the house, her friend Maria helped me. She is also really helpful and kind too:)! She bring me near neighborhood food place, and helped me order food. also gave me many advice of Porto with map. 

Location is pretty safety area, 30min work to the downtown, 15min by bus. 
From airport 15min by drive and vey close. 

Thanks for everything! :)
Aya

Agréable séjour sur Porto. Oriana nous a bien reçu et expliqué les lieux à visiter ainsi que les restaurants à faire dans un anglais très compréhensible. La maison est propre et typique. Petit bémol sur la literie... Mais je recommande : bus 600 à 5 minutes à pied, pour aller dans le centre et en face de la maison, il y a un restaurant, pratique pour le petit déjeuner du matin pour 3 euros. Bon voyage.

예쁜 사진과 싼 가격에 3박 숙박을 하였는데 지금까지 체험한 곳 중 가장 최악이었어요
집이 오래되서 삐걱삐걱 소리가 나고 방음이 전혀 안되서 집에 머무는게 두려웠어요 전자렌지도 없고 필요한 주방 도구가 많지 않아서 음식을 해먹을수도 없어요
집은 너무 춥고  난방 기구는 틀어도 효과가 없으며 3박을 예약한게 너무나 후회스러웠습니다
결론은 싼게 비지떡 이었습니다
꼭 참고하세요~

The welcome of Oriana is really great, she give us good tips to visitig the city and good address for eat and drink.
The house is really nice and full of history.
A la prochaine.
Orianas place is great. Very well located. We enjoyed staying there. Good and quit neighborhood, cozy apartment. Highly recommended.
Good stay!
Los detalles de la casa

My wife and me were in Oriana's department, we really liked it, great to have private bathroom, Oriana was very kind and helpful, I loved the Francesinha in the Cafe de Santiago she recommended us, she was always aware to help us, her place is not to far from the city town (25-30 mins by foot), however the buses in oporto are too delayed, so we recommend to use Uber or taxy, it's very cheap........ Estuve con mi esposa en el apartamento de Oriana y de verdad que nos gustó, excelente haber tenido baño privado, Oriana nos ayudó y orientó muy bien, me encantó una Francesinha que nos recomendó comer en el café de Santiago, no está muy lejos del centro histórico (25-30 minutos a pié) sin embargo los buses en oporto son bastante demorados, así que si vas muy tarde lo mejor es que tomes un taxi o Uber, en oporto son muy económicos...  Obrigado Oriana :)

It was a delight to meet Oriana and to stay in her homey, clean, and charming home. She was very accommodating and responsive from the beginning, letting us check in early and giving us some amazing restaurant suggestions! The room was just as expected, comfortable, filled with sunlight and squeaky clean. Although we did not spend much time in the home, the public areas (living room and outdoor garden/yard) are simply great places to relax, drink tea or read a book. We thoroughly enjoyed our few days in Porto and Oriana's place made it feel like home away from home! Would definitely recommend to others.

Accueil très chaleureux de Oriana qui nous a mis tout de suite à l'aise avec des explications et des conseils clairs et précis. Notre chambre lumineuse donnait sur un jardin privé, donc pas de bruit de la rue. Comme annoncé par Oriana, trouver une place de stationnement pour notre voiture n'a pas été un problème. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour à Porto. Nous recommandons cette adresse.
Nettes altes Haus, liegt ca. 3km von der City Porto entfernt. Keine Metro direkt da, aber Busse möglich.

L’alloggio di Oriana è molto bello, all’interno di uno stabile storico con dettagli vintage. Gli spazi sono grandi e puliti. La distanza dal centro è percorribile anche a piedi (2km) oppure basta usare autobus con fermata a 300m.     Host disponibile e gentile. 
Consigliato.

Oriana nous à accueilli avec  beaucoup de simplicité et d'efficacité dans sa maison ancienne pleine d'authenticité, très propre et bien située. La chambre située cote jardin est très calme. Nous avons visité la ville à pied en partant de la maison.

Oriana has a beautiful home, big room with a private bathroom.A big plus is a free parking in the streets around which was very important for us.easy 20 minutes walk to city center. She gave us some tips, what to see or where to eat, very pleasent girl.We recommend this place if you are visiting Porto.
Accueil de qualité, superbe maison, un peu loins à pied du centre mais quand on aime la marche c est parfait pour visiter la ville et il y a des bus juste à côté.

I think this is one of the nicest Airbnbs I have ever stayed at -- the house is just so lovely (and beautifully decorated!) and Oriana was a great host. I was somewhat sick while staying at this place, so I was so happy to be in a nice, bright, comfortable room while recovering! Oriana was very sweet and caring as well. Next time I am in Porto I'd love to book this place again!

L’appartement de Oriana est très bien situé dans Porto, à environ 20 min à pied du centre ville. Nous avions notre salle de bain privée et la cuisine était partagée. La maison rouge a le charme de l’ancien, c’est top ! Oriana a été une hôte parfaite : communication, réactivité et hospitalité, rien à dire ! Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés :)
Lovely space and gracious host!
was a lovely stay in a lovely house a little outside the touristic city center
Oriana is super kind and a great host. We had a wonderful time staying at the apartment. Everything was perfect :)
We had a good time in Porto and the room in Orianas house was beautiful and quiet. In 20 minutes you can walk to the „Oldtown“ or you take the Bus!

Oriana is a really good host. She and her boyfriend gave us many useful tips while we were staying in Porto. Her house is really beautiful. Our room was spacious, light and with private bathroom, which was definitely an advantage. I recommend staying at Oriana’s house!

We had a great stay at Oriana’s place. Although the apartment is a bit of a walk (around 25 mins) to the city centre it was great value for the very reasonable price we paid. Was great to have an ensuite and Oriana was great at answering any questions throughout the trip. Maria who checked us in was also very helpful offering lots of tips on where to go.
beautiful house, nice and clean. we found everything we needed in the kitchen. nice cafe at the other side of the street. 30 min walk to touristic parts of the city. we'd come again.

Oriana é muito atenciosa com seus hóspedes. Nos orientou onde comer, como pegar transportes e por onde andar. A casa é um pouco afastada do centro, mas como em Porto tudo fica perto e as caminhadas são muito agradáveis, é possível fazer andando. Recomenda-se comer uma francesinha no Cenáculo, restaurante na redondeza do apartamento onde os garçons são ótimos e a comida é uma delicia. Nossa estadia em Porto foi bastante agradável e recomendaríamos.

Oriana foi muito rápida e atenciosa em todos os detalhes, minha avaliação não tão alta ficou por conta de que eu esperava um pouco mais de conforto com relação à cama, chuveiro e ao que a foto aparenta ser. No mais, nota 10.
Oriana is very nice host. Her house was very cozy and stylish.
Orianas house is very clean,very well decorated,bright and airy. We had a wonderful stay there,thanking Oriana for her help and generosity in sharing her house with us.Highly recommended.

We stayed at Oriana for 2 nights. She was very kind to meet us in the evening and explained everything (it’s our first time at Portugal). Apartment itself has nice charm with all Indian details. Though building is old and you can feel this in rooms (you can hear everything from another toilet over the wall). Bed is comfortable, room is full of natural light. Location is more or less good, you can get by feet to the center in 30 mins. 

Thank you for your hospitality !
Beautiful house, great atmosphere and amenities. Quite a walk to the water front/Gaia but we loved it any way :)

Everything was great. Oriana was responsive, helped with finding places and objects. We liked the place of landing. Everywhere we wanted to go was easily accessible by public transport. The old town can also be reached by walking. This is one of the places where we will come back next Year.
Très bien. Je recommande chez Oriana. Très disponible, sympa et arrangeante. Appart très propre et paisible.
A delightful apartment in a quiet street. Good public transport links into the central city. Good amenities and a nice cozy environment. Oriana is an excellent host.
Oriana’s place is super nice, I really enjoyed during my stay at her house! She was  really nice and gave me lots of tips when she welcomed me. Absolutely recommended!
une belle maison et une hôtesse discrète et accueillante

Very fast communication, precious suggestions on what to eat and where to go, detailed answers by Oriana that made our stay smooth. Very nice, old house with a nice vibe. Located 25min walk from city centre, local and cheap restaurants around. Quiet, calm and intimate place.

Casa antigua y acogedora. Habitación àmplia con baño privado completo. Espacios comunes acogedores y amplios.
A 20-30min andando del centro de Porto. Buena comunicación con transporte público.
Muy cerca de la casa hay supermercado, farmàcia y cafeterías donde poder desayunar muy bien!
Oriana es muy atenta y hospitalària.
Oriana was very friendly and gave us some tips what to visit and where to eat. The place is stylish, it also has a very cute and green garden. Absolutely recommend!
Oriana's house is very nice and clean. She's a great host and gave us some useful tips about Porto. The apartment is located about 20 mins walk from historic center. We enjoyed our stay!
Eu gostei muito do quarto, Oriana e uma pessoa muito atenciosa que sempre tentou ajudar. Indicarei para todos os meus amigos e familiares.
La casa está a media hora andando más bien

Oriana è una ragazza dolcissima e molto ospitale. 
La stanza è ben pulita e fornita di tutto ciò che serve per un soggiorno di qualche giorno a Porto. 
La stanza dista 20’ a piedi dalla metro (Lapa), mentre 20’/30’ a piedi circa dal centro. 
Visitare la città a piedi è stata una mia scelta, è comunque possibile usufruire della comodità del bus. 
Consigliato!

name: Ocean view near Hapuna & Spencer Beaches!
summary: Hale Alani, 3 bed/1 bath, comfortable home. Kawaihae is between Kona & Waimea (aka Kamuela). Spectacular view of the ocean and coastline. Less than a 5 minute drive, but not walkable, to the Big Island's best white sand beaches. Close to restaurants etc. Tropical decor. Very relaxing.
space: Hale ‘Alani features an expansive, blue ocean topped coastline view. An easy 30 minute drive from Kona International Airport (KOA), 10 minutes from Waimea, and 5 from the Waikoloa Hotels. Feel right at home in this adorable cottage. This 3 bedroom/ 1 bath home provides cozy, comfortable, accommodation for a family of six. Fully equipped with everything you need including WiFi. While it is usually breezy, keeping the temperature averaging a comfortable 75-80F year round, there is an air conditioner in the living room and fans in the bedrooms should the trade winds take a break during your stay.  Decorated with bright tropical colors, in a vintage style, Hale ‘Alani invokes fun memories from the sixties and seventies... the shag carpet is fun for some, but if you are looking for modern decor, this is not the place for you.  Grab the cooler, beach chairs, and be at the Big Island's best white sand beaches in about 3 minutes! It is a two minute drive to Kawaihae for a few groceries, a six
description: Hale Alani, 3 bed/1 bath, comfortable home. Kawaihae is between Kona & Waimea (aka Kamuela). Spectacular view of the ocean and coastline. Less than a 5 minute drive, but not walkable, to the Big Island's best white sand beaches. Close to restaurants etc. Tropical decor. Very relaxing. Hale ‘Alani features an expansive, blue ocean topped coastline view. An easy 30 minute drive from Kona International Airport (KOA), 10 minutes from Waimea, and 5 from the Waikoloa Hotels. Feel right at home in this adorable cottage. This 3 bedroom/ 1 bath home provides cozy, comfortable, accommodation for a family of six. Fully equipped with everything you need including WiFi. While it is usually breezy, keeping the temperature averaging a comfortable 75-80F year round, there is an air conditioner in the living room and fans in the bedrooms should the trade winds take a break during your stay.  Decorated with bright tropical colors, in a vintage style, Hale ‘Alani invokes fun memories from the sixties and
neighborhood_overview: Hale ‘Alani is located in a local neighborhood, very close to great beaches, shopping, restaurants and resorts.
notes: Note: There is some traffic noise from the highway nearby. Also, the house is a duplex with other similar homes nearby.
transit: You will need a rental car to get to our place and to look around.
access: Feel free to use the BBQ, hammock, beach chairs, etc.
interaction: I am not on island but have family close by to manage the upkeep and assist you if needed.
house_rules: Have fun, and leave Hale ‘Alani as you found it. Treat it as your own and conserve electricity when possible. A/C is only in the living room. Smoking allowed outside only. We have family close by to assist with any needs. If something is not to your expectations when you check in, I expect you to let me know within 24-hrs so that we can reach a mutually agreeable solution. Otherwise, I will presume you are happy. CONSERVATION OF UTILITIES - Please use due care in conserving the utilities.  The water should not be left running for an unreasonable length of time and please turn off the lights and electrical devices.  Please don't have the windows or doors open while operating the air conditioning.   DISCLOSURE OF FIRE HAZARDS & PROHIBITION AGAINST EXPLOSIVES AND OPEN FIRES -  Our property is in a fire hazard area and that occupants must use due care in handling any and all flammable substances.  Moreover, no explosives shall be allowed on the property, including without limitation, firew

host.host_about: Grew up on the Big Island of Hawaii... moved to Honolulu for college, lived there for many years and am now on the east coast. I am active in my community and am an avid outrigger canoe paddler.

reviews.comments:
Everything was as advertised. Nice, clean, comfortable. We had a very good stay and it it was a very nice base for our exploration of Big Island and preparation and relaxation before and after the Ironman.

Thanx
Dorthe and Jan
A very nice little house and well-equipped. The area is convenient to Hapuna Beach and not very far from north Kohala. The house is unpretentious and fairly comfortable.

We enjoyed a pleasant stay at this cozy home in a very pleasant setting. The location is outstanding - close to Waimea, Hawi, and Kona. The neighborhood is friendly and quiet and feels a bit like old Hawaii. We enjoyed the ocean view and outdoor patio area that allows for great sunset viewing.

Although we did not meet Rachel she communicated with us what we needed to know.the cottage was as it appeared online though some things were a little worn. The location and proximity to sights and beaches was very handy though the neighborhood the house was in was very dense(as in neighbors were very close by)

구글지도가 약간 잘못 알려줘서 처음에 좀 헤멘건 있는데 그거 말고는 아주 좋았습니다.
사진에 보이는 그물침대도 완전 편하고 특히나 침실이3개나 있는게 너무 좋았습니다.

Rachel did a great job of making sure the house was in good condition when we arrived. She was flexible with our early check-in and really made her house feel like a home for us. The house was right off the main road with the a awesome view of the ocean.

Rachel was great host for our week stay on the Big Island. She provided us an interactive map of nearby things to do. 3 miles from Hapuna Beach, 20 minutes from Pololu Valley, 2 minutes from Aloha Cafe for breakfast and about 10 minutes from Big Island Brewhaus for some craft beer and delicious food. The home was a bit difficult to find in the suburb which is nice since it is tucked away from the neighbors. Nice Patio with a hammock to relax after a long day. The house is fully stocked on just about everything from towels to beach chairs to boogy boards. There is 1 a/c unit in the living room which gets cold, the rooms however can get a bit warmer. Fortunately there were fans in each room to cool us down. I would recommend to anyone who is looking for a spot on the north end of the island.

Die Gastgeberin Rachel hat sich sehr gut um uns gekümmert und die Handhabe war sehr unkompliziert. Für unsere Familie war es eine optimale Unterkunft. Die kreative Einrichtung der Wohnung und ihre Ausstattung (Strandutensilien, Grill, Terrasse, etc.) bescherte uns schöne Tage hier. Die nahen Strände eignen sich für kleinere Kinder sehr gut. Für uns alles super!

GREAT LOCATION! Pretty much as close as you can get to the best beaches on the Big Island. Great restaurants are fairly close by. This is PERFECT for a family. It was awesome they had boogie boards and towels ready for us to use. Furniture was a bit older but it doesn't look drastically different than the pictures. No big deal though. Loved staying here. Thank you Rachel.

This is a lovely location to explore the northern end of the island.  Very close to some of the best white sandy beaches, within easy drive of interesting hiking, but far from major grocery stores.   House is a very nice, slightly rustic, patio home in a complex of similar homes.   (Think log cabin instead of ski resort as a winter comparison.)   Full kitchen was small (1 person only!) but very nicely appointed with all pots/pans/etc needed to cook for your vacation with a family-sized gas grill outside so you don't need to turn on the oven.   Washer/Dryer was VERY convenient for our travelling family, too.   Overall, this was a lovely start to our family vacation on the Big Island.
Close drive to Hapuna and other great areas. Rachel was very accommodating with anything that we needed. Would definitely stay again!

This was the perfect place for our family! Close to great beaches, beautiful yard and everything we needed, including geckos and coconuts and bananas that the kids loved finding in the yard! Fabulous stay
Our stay was for one night and Rachel was communicative, and very flexible with our arrival time. Thank you for the stay! Your place felt like a wrinkle in time ;-)
Thank you for sharing your home with us, Rachel! Great location and a good place to sleep. Many amenities including washer/dryer, hairdryer, iron, etc came in handy.

Thanks Rachel for your availibility 
We had a very good time in your house
Exactly what we need

Rachel was very quick in her responses! The photos accurately captured the property. The descriptions were on point. The location was great for us to head to the beach, shopping, dinner, and the airport. There were plenty of amenities but we didn't use much since we were only there for a day. Details like dish soap, towels, boogie boards, and more would be perfect for a longer stay! The air conditioner in the living room was dreamy and an absolute must for those not used to the hotter climate. It can get toasty there. The bedrooms are not air conditioned but there are fans available. The cleaning fee for one day was a bit high but I knew about it and accepted it because I needed a place that held 5 people.

Rachel dialed this experience in for us. She ensured we had the lock box code prior to arrival, immediately answered any questions we sent her way via email, and had all of the windows and doors open to provide us with a nice, cool welcome. There were several things that made our stay especially nice, including body boards, snorkeling fins, a beach cooler and a Brita water filter pitcher. All unexpected and much appreciated!

For those traveling with toddlers, we left our pack 'n play since we didn't want to pay the airline fee on the return flight, so rest assured that you'll have a mobile crib for your little ones at Rachel's place. :)
Great location for Hapuna Beach and Waimea at reasonable price

The house is in a good location - a short drive to 3 great beaches. The house was spacious (there were 3 of us) and is well equipped - bath and beach towels, chairs, a bbq, washer, dryer and indoor and outdoor eating areas. The beds were comfortable. It is a good value - nothing fancy -- but very comfortable. The photos are accurate. Rachael was always available - responded quickly to emails and made our stay easy. We recommend Rachael and this house.

Rachel was a great host and responded quickly to all of our questions. The house is in a perfect area for exploring the island and made a good home-base for our family. There are several towns nearby with stores and restaurants. You can drive to most attractions on the island in a few hours or just hang out on the beaches nearby. The house was clean and had plenty of towels and a nicely stocked kitchen. If you are looking for a luxury packed rental this might not be the spot you are after - but if you are looking for a good deal and plan on exploring the island you could not ask for more.

Rachel's place is great!  We stayed for a week, and loved it.  It has a great view and is perfectly situated to enjoy the Kohala beaches and everything the north end of the island has to offer.  The house itself is small but perfectly set up, with a well equipped kitchen, cute and kitschy Hawaiian decorations, and, of course, that incredible view of the ocean from the patio.

The photos and the description of the place are accurate and the close proximity to the beaches was very convenient for us. We did all of our cooking at home and found most of the things we need available in the kitchen. It is a residential area with Route 19 located right in front of the property so if you are sensitive to noise you might want to bring earplugs for night time.

If you're looking for a local place to stay with a great view and a short drive to the beach, this is IT.  Very reasonably priced. I felt like I lived here and did not want to leave.
5/5 stars.
Great location and value!  If want more local and less resort feel this is a great place.  Couple minor bathroom issues bit otherwise great stay!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Rachel's house while on the Big Island for a wedding. The house is great- clean, lots of room, nice backyard. The kitchen is well stocked and we cooked most of our meals there. There's also a great grill out back and a relaxing hammock. Volcanoes Nat'l Park was about a 2 hours drive. Kona was about 20 minutes away. The house is in a pretty secluded area off the main road, so no walking to stores or restaurants here. We had a great time and would love to stay here again!
Fantastic location to nearby beaches!

We had a great vacation staying here. This place is very conveniently located close to the best beaches in the island and had a very homely feel to it. We loved the garden overlooking the ocean and the host had equipped the kitchen and home with everything we needed which made it very convenient- beach toys, plenty of towels, washer/dryer, a fully equipped kitchen etc. The few things we found slightly less than ideal were
-There were a lot of cockroaches and ants roaming in the kitchen and even in bedrooms at night. This might be a norm in the tropical island.
-The property is adjacent to a very busy freeway and so the garden has a constant traffic noise. The house windows do an excellent job of blocking the noise though so we did not hear anything while indoors.
- There is only one AC in the living room and it takes about 3-4 hours for the bedrooms to cool down in April.
- The garden and the home looks like it needed a bit of tending, though with the fertile land and weather, things probably grow and weather very quickly here.

The house was clean and comfortable with a lovely backyard complete with grill, hammock, table, and even an outdoor sofa.  Dishes, soap, laundry detergent, towels were all provided.  A really nice place to stay.

This is a cute bungalow; not fancy, but comfortable and affordable.  Rachel was a great host and always responded right away.  The view on the back porch is lovely, as is the breeze and lovely aroma of all the tropical plants in the yard. I wished I could take them home with me. The condo is very convenient for the more northern beaches that are less populated, yet were gorgeous. We thoroughly enjoyed snorkeling at Hapuna state park (fabulous beach), the Black sand beach.  We liked the bungalo because it is removed from the big city tourist stuff, and not as uppity as the resorts; yet the drive isn't too bad to get to the Kona beach stuff either, such as a Luau and boat diving trips; but be aware of major delays near the airport until they finish the road construction, so add a half hour to your travel plans that go southward until the road work is finished. The other route across the Island or via Hilo might be best to get to the volcano park for now.

Great location and value for exploring the north end of the island.  Close to Mauna Kea and Hapuna, two very nice beaches.  The house was clean, comfortable, affordable and had everything we needed for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

This place was perfect for the half ironman race and our group! It was 7 minutes from Hapuna beach where the swim is and not far from fairmont. We had everything we needed to cook, relax outside on the grill or inside with cable. The ac worked well for the common areas. The place had lots of color and charm. It was clean and there were lots of extra towels, beach things to borrow and a washer with clothes line. This was perfect for our group! And a great price!

The apartment was nice. Directions were easy to follow. The window unit really didn't reach back to the furthest two rooms so we had to stay in the smaller bed which was equally fine since it was just two people for two nights. The amenities were very nice and current.

Cute little older style duplex decorated in 60's style. Very comfortable affordable  family accomodation. You Need a car. Close to beautiful Hapuna Beach- we spent 2 days there. We drove to observatory one night- took just over 1 hr. Not close supermarket/cafe. Good to have room to stretch out with kids. Soft sheets and towels. Very Clean. No dishwasher. Shag carpet. Neighbourhood quiet and residential. Good for short stay to check out white beaches.
This place is a decent value.  The host was great in communicating with us and remedying issues when there was a problem.  The inside is clean but dated.

We adored Rachel's place! Centrally located, you are just a short drive from countless beaches and resorts on the coast, and just 15 minutes from Waimea for groceries and restaurants. We loved this house as our home base for a wedding at Hapuna and exploring the whole island. The hammock, outdoor area, grill, and great kitchen make this the best deal on the island! 

Definitely rent a car, you will want to explore the whole island!
Cute bungalow, but noisy due to the nearby road. Not easy to get the bedrooms cooled. Nonetheless, we liked our stay because of the proximity to some stunning beaches and to the north.
Great place to stay!

This place is great! Three bedrooms with very comfortable beds. Great location overlooking the ocean. It’s up a ways from the Kona area but in a great location to see the island as everything is a reasonable driving distance. You will need a vehicle to get around the island and a parking spot right outside is available!

Comfortable and cozy house near some great beaches. Really enjoyed our stay and wish we could have stayed longer. Rachel and Debbie were great hosts and provided a great website with helpful local tips.

Rachel's place was truly amazing. I felt like I was walking into my 2nd home. The views are gorgeous and yet it's nestled away from the big hotels so you get the local experience. It was so peaceful and comfortable. The place is very spacious and would be great for a family or group of friends. I would absolutely stay there again. The back room on the right has a bed that's like sleeping on a cloud. Rachel gave very detailed directions that helped a lot for someone new to Hawaii. Rachel and Debbie were both readily available if I needed anything at all and I am so thankful.
Very comfortable space, decorated in a Beach type theme. The place is outfitted with just about anything you might need.
Nice, comfortable, and clean house.

We absolutely loved the place.  It has a very different from atmosphere from a resort, or central tourist areas. It's old Hawaii. Nearby beaches are top notch, snorkeling is fab, you can eat on a patio under the stars, and  the fact that the house is not far from a freeway and a part of a village just adds charm and a sense of realness.  The selection of places in Rachel's guide is right on, kitchen has everything needed to cook (not groceries, I mean amenities), boogies, beach chairs, beach mats, towels, etc. - all clean and ready. We are coming back!

We felt like we were staying at our Hawaiian grandma’s house! While a bit dated, the house was spotless and well stocked with absolutely everything we needed for our beach adventures. The only drawback was the noise from the highway- it was pretty loud, but we knew that going in and it was worth it for the super close proximity to amazing beaches and great food.
Great location.

Great value!  Location only a minute or two from Hapuna beach, restaurants, gas, and grocery stores.  Also a short drive into Hawi, Kailua, and Waimea.  We had a great time doing the flume tour, and walking in Kailua as,well.  You made our vacation affordable.  Thank you so much.

Our family of four: mom, dad and an eight year old boy and 10 year old girl spent two nights at Rachel's house. If you have a car, then this is a fabulous place to stay for relaxing days at the beach. Spencer Beach is just down the hill-5 minute drive. Hapuna Beach is a little further-maybe 15 minutes-but so worth it-one of the nicest beaches we have ever been to. Make sure you do your grocery shopping on the way, either in Waimea if coming from that direction, or Kailua-Kona, because there is nothing nearby. The listing is clear that there is car and truck noise from the road. This is true. But it is the only noise. Otherwise it is very quiet and peaceful. There is less traffic after 9:30pm and it only starts again around 5am. We slept with the windows open for a breeze and I closed them and turned on the a/c when the traffic started at dawn. The a/c really mutes the noise. I am a very light sleeper and I slept fine. The garden is quite big, the kids had fun playing in it. There is a hose out back to rinse off feet and beach stuff. The decor is pretty, it has a very hawaiian beach vibe. The beds are very comfortable, we slept very well. The shower has good water pressure. We recommend this place, just don't expect to eat out in restaurants or pick something up. Be prepared and you will have a relaxing time.

Rachel's place was great and she was very responsive and accommodating. It has a great Hawaiian vibe to the decoration and a spacious outdoor area that we wish we could have hung out in more. Rachel's place was in a great location with excellent beaches nearby (10 min drive), Kona was accessible (about 25 min drive), Waimea was close enough to go to dinner (20 mins), and there is a delicious shave ice window just up the road (5 min North).
This is a quaint, very clean, quiet accommodation with a fantastic location.

Rachel's place is fantastically located within a very short drive to all the big island's best beaches. Her place is comfortable, clean, and delightfully decorated with beach charm giving it the tropical island vibe. It had everything we needed along with fun beach gear to use. I would definitely recommend her place!!

Rachel was very kind and communicative before the trip. The unit is in a convenient location to explore Hapuna and the Kohala area. It is a very short drive to Hapuna beach and a relatively short drive to Waimea which had good grocery and restaurant options. All amenities listed were present including fully stocked kitchen and bathroom. Unfortunately, we were surprised by the condition of the unit. It is an older unit which has not been updated and the overall condition was not accurately represented in the photos.  The highway noise is quite loud. If the pictures had been more accurate, we would probably have chosen another airbnb for our stay.

The place is at prime and private location next to best beaches on the Big Island. Family who would stay will find all necessary and in clean condition. Safe and well maintained. If come to Big Island again we will definitely try to stay there again.  Mahalo.
A good location and host responds fast. However, this place really needs to be updated. The pictures are just not a very accurate depiction of the place.
Great location and an even better rate than the rest of the accommodations close by.

Rachel's home is a great place to stay especially if you prefer a real person's home compared to more luxurious but sterile condominium locations. Artwork throughout home was especially appealing. Rachel is very prompt and responsible about communications and helped us with having an earlier check-in. Hapuna Beach and Spencer Beach are great and very short drives from the home. Potential downside is having only one bathroom, but it was not a problem for our family of four.
Very well cleaned and plenty of sleeping space for everyone. Space is a little dated but the value is very good. Very close to Spencer Beach and Hapuna Beach.

We thoroughly enjoyed our week stay at Rachel’s cute beach house. The ocean view is gorgeous and it’s just minutes away from my favorite beach Hapuna. She is more then accommodating, The house is stocked with everything you need. Definitely recommend!!

Rachel’s place was the perfect family hale! Very inviting, we loved all of the colors, decor and character Rachel’s place has to offer!  The hammock offers breathtaking views to just relax after a fun filled day near Hawaii’s most beautiful beaches. Rachel is very quick in responding and goes above and beyond in hosting! Highly recommended Airbnb!

We were comfortable at this house, except that during the day the weather was hot but air conditioner is only in the living room. It is an old house, so there is wear and tare. It is comfortable and clean. Great outdoor space. It’s next to the main road, but noise did not bother us. The kitchen is old as well as some appliances so I was not inspired to cook much, only simple meals for kids. Liked spending time on outdoor patio backyard. The proximity to the great beaches and Waimea I liked a lot. Not sure it’s a best value for money though.
Lovely island flair and living

I imagine this place will be difficult to book so book now! The value is tremendous due to it's location, size and price. I am so grateful to have had the opportunity to book this place. It was nearly perfect.
Nice decor with Hawaiian feel. Space is a little bit tight though for group of 6.

Very hot with no curtains and AC only in living room, my parents and I had to leave immediately after arriving due to extreme heat. Not so nice after a whole day of driving. Remained hot the entire time in bedrooms, even at night with fans on and windows open. Right next to highway, very loud at all times. Not worth the amount we paid for it. Very outdated place.
We had a great time here! We recommend :)

Six of us stayed here. There was plenty of space for all of us. The beds were comfortable and space was nice. The kids loved the hammock outside. We had a great time, easy to relax and enjoy ourselves.
Rachel had some great recommendations of things to see and do, and was very easy to contact.
There is some road noise, but that was expected with the location, right next to the highway. Location also made it extremely easy to get to places. As well, there are great public beaches a few minutes away.

All in all we enjoyed our stay at Rachel's place. Close to some of my favorite beaches. There is no TV unless you have a computer with Netflix. They do have wifi. House is vintage as described and could use a little update on ceiling fans,  a Bluetooth speaker ( since no TV, music would be nice, and the stereo/ radio in bedroom is barely working. ) Old beds~ but nice sheets and mattress toppers! And shag carpet is definitely old and really should be replaced with flooring. Just my opinion.  And be prepared with earplugs....the road noise can definitely be heard as the home sits just above the highway. Rachel is a great host and quick to respond to any questions or needs. Thank you Rachel.
The view from the  back yard is  amazing.  We could  see wales. The location is  excellent,  a short  drive to  Spencer beach and  not too far to Waimea

If your expectations for accommodations are low, and considering that you are visiting Hawaii, not a third world country, and you don't mind staying in a poorly maintained property, you won't be disappointed.  We knew this home was not a luxury property but luxury has nothing to do with proper maintenance of a rental home.  AirBnB standard is to make the renters feel at home while staying at an AirBnB.  This was certainly not the case at this location.  We are not aware if there is an updated quality inspection from AirBnB
The condo is situated close to the main roads for the area making it easy to go anywhere on the northern part of the island.

Rachel's place was great. As advertised, it's not fancy or modern but had 3 bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen. we really enjoyed our stay. the location was great. view from the patio was awesome. only 3 minutes from the best beach on the island. I would stay here again.  Great price for the location.

name: Luxurious condo - Old Montreal
summary: You just find the best place where to stay in Montreal!!! This corner unit on the 14th floor offers wonderful sights on Montreal city and a lot of light. Perfectly well located in Old Montreal, this very modern and comfortable unit will make your stay memorable! Only few steps from the Conference Center (Palais des Congrès) where you find a metro station, you can also walk to the "Place des spectacles" and to down town.
description: You just find the best place where to stay in Montreal!!! This corner unit on the 14th floor offers wonderful sights on Montreal city and a lot of light. Perfectly well located in Old Montreal, this very modern and comfortable unit will make your stay memorable! Only few steps from the Conference Center (Palais des Congrès) where you find a metro station, you can also walk to the "Place des spectacles" and to down town. sports and exercises :  there is a small gym in the building, i can leave you an access card.  i can leave you an access card.  If you want to swin, the YMCA, only few steps from the building, has a swimming pool.  For the outdoor, climbing the Mont Royal- (any time of the year).  Ile ste-Helene with big outdoor swiming pools, nice track where to bike and online skating.  there are also winter sports (cross contry sky and big fat biking (you can rent the equipment on place) Only few restaurants suggestions (there are so many restaurants in Montreal) : At the Complex Des

Next to Place des Arts:  Brasserie T and Taverne F.   in Old Montreal: Olive and Gourmand, Méchang Boeuf, La creme de la creme (dessert and pub ambiance)...  The china town few steps fro the apartment offers a lot of restaurants  On St-Denis street :  Sushi st-denis (the best sushin in town), le st-houblon, Juliette

host.host_about:
I have a profile on airbnb website which is 
https://fr.airbnb.ca/users/show/5106041

reviews.comments: Claude's condo was great - and a perfect location for me - right next to the convention center and other hotels. Also Claude was helpful every step of the way.
Excellent space. Great location. No complaints, only praise. I am already planning to book here again when I return to town.

This was my first experience with AirBnB.  Everything that was described by Claude - luxurious condo in Old Montreal - was exactly that.  Claude was very welcoming, and he was very responsive in answering all of my questions about the location, condo, parking, restaurants etc.  The condo itself is very nice and well kept.  The condo comes with a full and modern kitchen, bathroom, and laundry room.  In addition, there is very nice natural light throughout the whole apartment especially in the morning.  Lastly, the location is block from the metro, and a 5 minute walk to the heart of Old Montreal.  Overall, it was a very positive experience, and I would highly recommend staying here if you can.
Claude was a great host. Everything was as depicted in the photos. The apartment has great views of the city, and is in an ideal location for exploring Old Montreal and Downtown.

Arrival was seamless. Claude made it very easy for us to get into the unit.  We appreciated him following up with us to make sure we got in okay.  The place was very clean and it was well stocked with coffee, extra towels & pillows.  Bed was comfortable, AC was great and he had an electric fireplace which came in handy too.  He was responsive throughout the process and  we never waited more than a minute to get an answer on an inquiry.  Location was outstanding!  Heart of Old Montreal, steps away from Notre Dame, Rue St Paul & the water.  A great breakfast spot called Tutti Frutti is very close by as well.  Will definitely be going back and will be recommending to others.

The apartment is in a great modern building very close to old Montreal/ Notre Dame etc. There is a subway/ metro station right across the road, so lots of shops, restaurants and supermarket close by. 

It is tastefully decorated, exactly like the pictures, and everything you could possibly need is catered for. Having the utility room with the washer and dryer in the apartment itself was very useful for us as we were on a long trip travelling with a baby.

Overall communication as well as check-in/ check-out were seamless. Very happy with the stay and would happily come back here

Thank you Claude.
This is my second airbnb on my first holiday in a long time.
It was so clean,modern and right in old montreal.
I love architecture,art,culinary arts and appreciated my stay as close to things I love.
Claude was quick in returning any questions during my stay.
Thank you Claude for making my stay fabulous!

Claude was an excellent host and extremely responsive during our stay. The apartment is located in prime real estate, just a few blocks from Notre Dame Cathedral, Old Montreal, The Old Port, and right across the street from the Place D' Armes Metro Station. From Place D' Armes, you can go anywhere in the entire city. Perfect apartment for a couple. Go there!

Great location; in downtown, right by the subway, and basically everything you need. The place was in a secure building attached to the Embassy Suites. Good size for 1 person and fine for a couple. Didn't meet Claude at all but he gave detailed instructions on how to get in okay. Parking garage attached for $25 a day which worked out well. Overall, a good place for 1 or 2 people!

As a Broadway performer who's constantly on the road in and out of hotels, I've stayed in my share of crummy hotels. So when I can I strive to find spaces that have a comfortable feeling like you were in your own  "home". Claude's condo felt like home and was absolutely fantastic. From the kitchen to the bathroom and bedroom, my partner and I have nothing bad to say about this place or the location. The location was absolutely fantastic and quiet. 
The condo was very clean and exactly as pictured. Washer and dryer in the apartment made laundry super convenient. Parking is located within the building as well for a fee. We had a great view from the corner apartment. Beautiful expansive windows. Neighbors were very quiet. Building itself was well kept and is a 5 min walk from the metro station, lots of great restaurants and bars and Notre-Dame Basilica. 

Be aware that most of OLD DOWNTOWN does close early. But it's defiantly not as busy and touristy as DOWNTOWN, which was a huge plus for my partner and I. 

We definitely look forward to staying here again.

Great location, on the edge of views Montreal, with Metro station right across the street. Bright, modern, clean apartment, with pretty much everything you will need.  Minor point, would have been nice to have a little kettle to boil water for tea etc.  Would definitely stay here again.
We would recommend staying here!

Communication facile par texto. Instructions claires.

Logement impeccable près de tout ! Rien à dire !

Claude was a great host and was very attentive to my needs. The place was exactly as advertised, right in Old Montreal. I would definitely stay here again the next time I am back in town! Thanks again Claude!!

Completely stress free travel! I cant sing enough praise for this rental. Everything was great: easy indoor parking, close proximity to attractions and walkable to nightlife; beautiful and spacious condo with a great modern vibe; great host- thanks, Claude!

We had to amend our travel plans at the last minute to avoid driving in a winter storm, but Claude was very understanding and accommodating. The condo is beautiful and in a wonderful location. The place was pristine and comfortable, especially the lovely little electric fireplace! The building was easy to access and super quiet. Parking instructions were a little unclear but Claude is extremely communicative and responded to our inquiries almost immediately.  

The condo is within walking distance to numerous little shops and cafes, and right around the corner from the Notre-Dame Basilica of Montreal. There is a metro stop within comfortable walking distance but we did not utilize that much. Overall I would definitely recommend staying here, and would consider visiting again the future.

Claude was a super host I extended my stay several times and he was able to accommodate without any issues. Loved the location close to metro station along with other necessities. Most definitely coming back again.

My husband and I stayed there for a one night romantic escape from the kids. The place was cozy and comfortable. The couch is to die for and the bed was so comfortable. The place is even nicer than the pictures and the view of the city at night is breathtaking.

Claude was a great host. The weather forecast changed to freezing rain on the night of our Arrival and Claude was very accommodating with changing the reservation to the following night. He met us upon arrival with the parking pass and door key. He also messaged us when we arrived and the following morning to make sure everything was alright. 

We would definitely recommend staying at this condo!
This spot is really as beautiful as it looks, and Claude is a thorough and gracious host.

I stayed in this apartment with my boyfriend for the New Years holiday . We had a great time, everything was perfect ! It was very clean and convenient ( location wise as well as having access to a kitchen and a gym in the building ). Claude was also very responsive when we contacted him with questions . Highly recommended!

We just stayed for two nights at Claude's lovely condo. It couldn't have been more convenient for our visit to the Montreal auto show. It is indeed a high end condo with lovely furnishings. Claude is a pleasure to deal with. He made both the arrival and departure super easy and stress free. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again. In fact I hope to be back.

Our stay at Claude's was everything we were hoping for. The apartment is exactly as described and as seen in the pictures. Claude was very easy to communicate with and was flexible with our plans as we were flying from NYC. The location in Old Montreal was fantastic - walking distance to metro, stores, restaurants, and beautiful sightseeing. Definitely recommend!
Best host ever no headaches
Wonderful experience! 5 stars for cleanliness, location, and all around experience.
Great experience throughout, lovely apartment with great views!

Le logement de Claude est exactement tel quel par rapport à la description. Un emplacement de choix en plein centre-ville, une superbe vue sur les gratte-ciel de la métropole puisque le logement est une unité de coin et un immeuble très tranquille.

Communication facile, flexibilité sur l'arrivée et le départ, que demandez de plus? Je retournerai à l'appartement de Claude sans hésiter lors de mon prochain séjour pour affaires à Montréal!
Beautiful place and great stay! Would stay again.

O apartamento é bem localizado, especialmente para aqueles que paticiparão de algum evento no Palais de Congrès. Mas seo  objetivo é curtir a cidade a passeio, o apartamento é também uma ótima opção, por permitir o acesso ao metrô,  a atrações turísticas e eventos no vieux-port. Claude fo muito gentil e estava pronto a ajudar qdo necessário.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I would highly recommend this apartment for a Montreal visit. The apartment itself was pristine and clearly very well maintained. The location was perfect - just a short walk to Old Montreal, Old Port, and multiple metro stations. Claude was also an excellent host and was extremely helpful and responsive to any of our needs.

Exactly as advertised. It's a beautiful, spacious, clean, well-kept, and Claude was a great host, answering all our questions promptly. It's a little pricey but it felt like staying at a brand new luxury hotel as opposed to a lived-in apartment, and it was in the same price range as all the decent hotels in the area but with much more space, a view, privacy, and a kitchen. Comfy bed, big bathtub, lovely for a little getaway for my boyfriend and me. Steps from beautiful Old Montreal but away from the crowds. We even got lucky and found street parking around the corner, which was free all night and most of Saturday/Sunday. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Great place near convention center and old town.
This is very nice apartment in the heart of Old Montreal.  We stayed here for 3 nights and the accommodations are perfect for 2 people.

The was my first experience booking with airbnb, Claude's apartment on the 14 floor was absolutely amazing! The place, the location the ease of the before and after for check in and check out and  the bed was so comfy too! I would go back in a heartbeat. I was very timid to book my vacation this way instead of a hotel but I am so pleased I did. The window views, the location was key, you had everything around you. Bring good shoes 3 nights and about 24miles of walking... it was great! Full kitchen if you like to pick up a few groceries or snacks. The only tiny thing I wish I had was a fan, it seem to get warm in the apartment and you couldn't adjust the air to your liking. Other then that no complaints and we can not wait to go back!  You must try this place.

The apartment is very comfortable and made my 5-night trip to Montreal for work much more homey. The kitchen is well-equipped with basics as well as coffee and the place had everything I needed. It was very clean and the bed and couch very comfy. Despite being downtown, the apartment was quiet. The only thing that was not great was the strong smell from the air fresheners the building has placed in the hallways. If you are scent-sensitive or prone to headaches from smells, I would caution you on this. If not, great because this is a fantastic spot to stay. :)
L’appartement était conforme aux photos. Location parfaite et cuisine bien équippée. Je recommenderais sans hésiter!
The location is perfect.  The place was clean & pleasant. Parking location is a must during winter seasons. Everything was exactly as described.

Claude’s apartment is a great space in Old Montreal. It is clean and in excellent condition, with a large bathtub, fireplace, comfortable couch, and kitchen space that makes it a good base for Montreal adventures. Metro and underground city access are very close, making it easy to get around. Claude was responsive and helpful, allowing us to store our bags for a few hours past check-out so we could enjoy a few more hours of exploring before heading to the airport.
The location was excellent. And the views and sun shine were awesome. Very easy to check-in, and very fast response from the host.
10 minutes walking distance to main areas of old montreal. Clean and easy to access space. Claude was very responsive and nice.
Claude is one of my favorite ABB hosts in the whole white world. Super cool and nice. Same can be said about his place. You wouldn't go wrong by choosing Claude!

GREAT place to stay ! It is in the heart of old Montreal making it within walking distance of cafes and points of interest. The condo felt like home and was impeccably clean! Claude was helpful and easy to communicate with. My friend and I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat !

This is such an amazing place, It was my first time visiting Montreal but I discover that Everything I wanted to do or everywhere I wanted to go were few mins walk away from this building, and with the fact that parking in this city is a pain, I literally just walked everywhere and appreciated the beauty of the City while I didn’t worry about driving. In addition, this apartment is a Lovely place, I really enjoyed my stay and the host was very helpful and available when there was anything I need to know or wanted, in general, my stay here was superb, Claude is a Great Host!

Claude's place was very clean and exactly as described. The area was great and things were very walkable! Claude was very fast to respond to any questions and was happy to let us store our bags in the room after checkout.

Claude was very helpful when we had a challenge. The view is great. The location is so close to all that is fun in Montreal. It's very close to the Metro, which makes it easy to check out other parts of Montreal. There a many taxis near by because of the proximity to hotels. We would definitely book again.
Loved it!
Beautiful condo in old Montreal. Excellent communication from the host, location and cleanliness. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

Claude's place was stunning. The corner apartment lets in a fantastic amount of light, and the place is spacious and welcoming. Claude was a wonderful host--very responsive and lovely to communicate with. I only wish my trip had been a bit longer so I could have spent more time appreciating the fantastic historic neighbourhood. Unfortunately, I was only on a quick work trip, but the apartment suited me perfectly nonetheless.
Situation géographique excellente. Condo en parfaite condition et bien insonorisé. Hôte très réactif aux messages. Beau séjour!
Claude's location was great as was the space. We would definitely stay here again.
Awesome place. Best possible location

Wow, can’t recommend this place enough! What a beautiful space, and in such a great part of the city.  The apartment is perfect, great amenities, and Claude was quick to respond to any of my questions. I fell in love with the city and will be back!
Claude is a great host.

This place was amazing!  It was exactly as listed on the site and VERY clean!.  It’s located in an amazing central location.  We walked everywhere, did not even need to take one cab / Uber.  We walked to the Old Port, Chinatown , St Catharine’s Street for shopping, downtown Montreal, etc.  We arrived late from Toronto and self check-in was super easy with no issues.  Claude was amazing with his communication and responsiveness to all our questions prior to and while we were there.  We highly recommend this place and we be coming back soon!

Good place, comfy bed and sofa , located in old Montreal, perfect for travelling around the area . A little difficult for finding the parking, especially that Montreal is mostly one way streets. Ac maxes out and cant be adjusted higher. a few bugs at night (uncontrollable)

This condo was in a great location in Old Port. I walked everywhere all weekend and went to some great spots. His recommendations were on point. Highly recommend! Be prepared to spend 45$ a day in parking fees
Le top du top ! Très propre et idéalement situé, je recommande ce logement !!! Claude est également très attentif et sympathique !!!
Great location. Nice space.

appartement très bien situé, calme avec tout le confort 
très agréable

Fantastic host with exceptional communication. We had an easy time following all the detailed information given to us. Place was cozy and clean with everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again!

L'appartement de Claude, de par son emplacement, est idéal pour visiter Montréal (à 2 pas de la basilique Notre-Dame!).
Claude est à la fois un hôte discret et très réactif dans les échanges!
Nous avons pleinement profité de notre séjour!

This apartment is right in the middle of Old Montréal. Great shops and restaurants within walking distance which was great. The apartment was clean and just as advertised - luxury! Claude was very responsive when we had questions and there is everything you need in this apartment. Highly recommend!!
Claude’s place is amazing! Treat yourself to amazing views while staying in beautiful old Montreal. Thank you, Claude! Bon Voyage, everyone!
Wonderful place with a great view.  Excellent host as well.
Claude's place is filled with light, located in a great spot, and has abundant space.  High quality mattress and overall excellent experience.  I highly recommend staying at his place.
Excellent location for walking to Bell Center, Old Montreal restaurants, walking along Le Fleuve, and don’t miss the hike from Fleuve to Mount Royal!
Claude's place is amazing in terms of location, cleanliness and his hospitality. He responds quickly and is very accommodating. The location is central and perfect for two people!

Luxurious appartment with beautiful view, at great location next to the old center.
Very clean, and easy communication
Excellent place to stay! Incredible views, central location and comfortable pad. The host was friendly and communicative as well. Highly recommended!

Claude’s flat was in a great location. Steps from the Basilica and surrounding points of interest. Great views of the city. The building is nice and clean and the apartment is very modern. Perfect for couples. Claude left coffee, cream and sugar for us as well as an big extra blanket. Would highly suggest this!

This is very easy, the place is PERFECT!!!! The cleanliness, the area, the view, ohhhh the view. The building is quiet with very friendly people. The value is beyond worth it and I would highly recommend for anybody. Thanks Claude
Clean, comfortable, great location. Would highly recommend.

Claude was an excellent host and the condo was everything we expected. Roomy for the two of us and had all the amenities we needed (we had breakfast and lunches there). Great location was lots to see and do in the area. I'd highly recommend this condo.
I had a great time in Claude's apartment. It was very clean, the communication with my host went smooth and the location is great. Couldn't have asked for more!
Merci pour le super accueil et ce nid douillet! Séjour parfait. :)

Claude’s home was beautiful and the perfect stay for exploring Montreal for the first time. It was extremely clean and had all the amenities for our stay. My brother and i would definitely stay here again. Thank Claude!
Everything as advertised. Sparkling clean, great location, parking on premises for a fee. Highly recommended!
Good location.
Clean, stylish, and accessible location to visiting hot spots in Montreal. Thank you!
5 star !
Merci Claude! You've got a repeat customer from Manitoba!
Absolument rien a dire tout etais parfait  ☆☆☆☆☆
Très belle vue. La décoration est belle et c’est proche du métro.
Wonderful place, great view, and amazing host!

name: Astoria 1 Bed, 2 Blocks to Train
summary: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath with optional couch/air mattress in quiet townhouse building, just 2 short blocks to the N/Q train at Broadway, 4 stops to city. Smartly decorated, kitchen, living room setup, dining table. Great neighborhood - restaurants, bars.
description: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath with optional couch/air mattress in quiet townhouse building, just 2 short blocks to the N/Q train at Broadway, 4 stops to city. Smartly decorated, kitchen, living room setup, dining table. Great neighborhood - restaurants, bars. You'll have access to the whole apartment, including kitchen, living room, bedroom and bath. We'll be available via phone throughout your stay should any issues or questions arise. Learn more about Astoria and the happenings here by visiting (website hidden). 2.5 quick blocks from the N/Q train, which is 4 stops (10 minutes) into the 59th/Lexington St. Station in Manhattan.
