host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

name: Sunrise room
summary: Watch the sunrise out of the ocean.  Fall asleep to the sounds of the tropical jungle. Enjoy the peace and simplicity of off grid, small farm living. 2 1/2 miles to ocean, 7 miles to town, close to hot springs, yoga, bodywork, markets.
space: The sunrise room offers genuine off grid, jungle living with many comforts.
description: Watch the sunrise out of the ocean.  Fall asleep to the sounds of the tropical jungle. Enjoy the peace and simplicity of off grid, small farm living. 2 1/2 miles to ocean, 7 miles to town, close to hot springs, yoga, bodywork, markets. The sunrise room offers genuine off grid, jungle living with many comforts. You have full access to your room and 1/2 bath as well as shared kitchen/social room, full bath with shower, lawns, gardens, fruit trees and all the beauty of nature in this lush tropical setting. There is no wifi password needed. I will be available physically or have a caretaker available to acquaint you with the layout of our home and how things work. I will also be available by phone or email if I am not onsite. We are 2 1/2 miles up from the ocean with a partial ocean view. A short drive to volcanic hot springs, the most recent lava flow, painted church, live music and dancing in Pahoa and also at Uncle Roberts Ava bar in scenic Kalapana, restaurants and shopping. We are clo
neighborhood_overview: We are 2 1/2 miles up from the ocean with a partial ocean view. A short drive to volcanic hot springs, the most recent lava flow, painted church, live music and dancing in Pahoa and also at Uncle Roberts Ava bar in scenic Kalapana, restaurants and shopping. We are close to 3 of the best farmers markets on the island, offering local produce, crafts, art, breakfast lunch or dinner, live music and a great chance to experience our local social scene. We are close to a black sand beach, an easy drive to Volcanoe National Park and Hilo. There is a popular local surfing, stand up paddle boarding and boogie boarding area near by, as well as excellent snorkeling options. We are close to Hawaii's largest retreat center which offers many classes and activities. There are many choices locally for yoga, massage and alternative healing modalities. This is a wonderful place to slow down, enjoy the island vibe, relax, get off the road and settle into your vacation.
notes: We do have the local all night lullaby/serenade of tree frogs to be aware of and possibly pack earplugs if this is a concern. We often have rain showers. A flashlight can be very handy.
transit: We are 2 and 1/2 miles from the local bus route. Having a rental car is your best transportation option here.
access: You have full access to your room and 1/2 bath as well as shared kitchen/social room, full bath with shower, lawns, gardens, fruit trees and all the beauty of nature in this lush tropical setting. There is no wifi password needed.
interaction: I will be available physically or have a caretaker available to acquaint you with the layout of our home and how things work. I will also be available by phone or email if I am not onsite.
house_rules: Check in time 4pm-7pm. $50 late check in fee after 8pm. Arriving during daylight is much easier! We are an off grid homestead and so are unable to use high power items such as a hair dryer. Our water is harvested from the rain and stored in cisterns and so it is important to only drink the filtered water we provide. Please make sure to clean up after yourself in all shared spaces. Please do not store or keep any food in your room. There is plenty of safe food storage in the kitchen in order to keep critters out of bedroom spaces. Thank you!

reviews.comments: The sunrise room was gorgeous and exactly what my mom and I were looking for. Grandma Jean and Suki did a wonderful job at making us feel welcome why Julia was away. We had our own private little bathroom off of the room and an outdoor shower nearby the community kitchen. The stay was so nice the first night that we decided to stay again! The property is amazingly beautiful, and sacred. I felt very welcomed and was invited to come back any time! We stayed bug free in the sunrise room (which I know is hard to do in Hawaii!) and were very comfortable. We had fresh towels and toiletries provided. Thanks so much Julia!!

Julia was a helpful and gracious host. The cabin was comfortable and clean, the surroundings rustic and beautiful! If you like camping out with a comfortable bed, this is place is for you. I recommend arriving during daylight, as the roads are narrow and road signs are few.
Great place to stay, the cottage is private and the open communal kitchen is great. Would stay there again, just be sure to get directions before going.

Very lovely location and property we enjoyed the local wildlife  very much.  We were only able to meet Julia and her husband at the end of our stay but they seemed very pleasent and we're nice enough let us stay an extra night. The care takers they had were very welcoming and helpful as well telling us about the island and good places to visit. We hope to return again in the future!

The Sunrise Room is named appropriately. We caught beautiful sights in the morning and appreciated their little homestead. Harry and Julia were very friendly and helpful in providing information on local events throughout the weekend.

I've stayed here and there all over the islands for decades and this place is truly a rare little gem. A gorgeous spot tucked away in what is locally notorious for being one of the most beautiful jungled areas on island. The great Hosts, Julia and Harry, are very carefully developing the site for a few fortunate travelers to be able to experience Hawaiian living at its simple best. 
The 'Sunrise Room' is one of the sweetest places I've ever stayed in - clean and comfy and cute. In fact, the small colorful and creative touches built into this room, into the large open-air kitchen, and found around the rest of the grounds and facilities, make the whole place feel fun and delightful throughout. In my view the pictures don't even do it justice. There is a sense of complete remoteness here that is soothing to be in as well - a 'far off the beaten track' feel. And yet, it is really only 10 or 12 minutes away from everything -- swimming at the coast or a meal in town. Highly recommended!

Julia and her husband were an absolute charm. The property had a very cool rustic/island vibe and the surrounding area was gorgeous. We especially loved the view of the stars at night and watching the sunrise from bed. I would recommend to anyone looking to experience more of the island life (not the resort life).

Julia was friendly and welcoming. This is a great place for adventurous types who want to experience the back woods of Hawaii in a rustic but comfortable place. Wonderful to hear the sounds of the jungle and the sun coming right into your screened in window. Basic, simple, sweet.

Julia's house was awesome! I really liked it.It was great experience sleeping srounded by wonderful nature. We stayed 2 nights and really enjoyed it. Julia is so kind and beautiful person. Her family is also very nice.I highly recomend to stay their house!

Our host, Julia was very attentive to helping us make our stay a good one. The environment was quiet and calm (the best part) and we loved staying in the jungle there. We would definitely recommend it!

Awesome place to stay way off the beaten path. It was so peaceful to go to sleep and awaken to the sound of frogs, crickets, and birds right outside the room. The room was neat, clean, and cozy. I also enjoyed checking out their off the grid systems for power and water. Way cool! Julia was a great host too!
I had so much fun staying in this cabin in the middle of the rainforest. It was a unique experience that brought me peace.

Julia and Harry have created a lovely, peaceful spot in the jungle.  If  you want to get way off the beaten path, this is the spot for you.  I loved watching the lizards hunt for bugs and the red-headed bird scavenge for crumbs.  And then there's Soji, the dog, who loves belly rubs.  This is a great place to get untethered from your cell phone as there is no service.  (There is service a short drive away, however.)  I took a yoga class at Kalani and would recommend a visit to Kalani for a class or to use the pool--there are beautiful grounds and a great vibe.

The sunrise room is basically a raised cottage with screening across the window openings.  The furniture is old and tired and should be replaced.  The half bath is down the stairs shown in the photo, and flashlights are furnished.  This is an off the grid experience if you are ready for it.  It wasn't bad, just that you need to know what to expect - an eco cottage off the grid in a rain forest with chirping frogs at night.  The kitchen building is also open air and larger, and we had it to ourselves on our stay.  WiFi was excellent and the outdoor shower was nice.  Julia wasn't there and Jean furnished us some freshly ground coffee, which we appreciated in the morning. Bring food for your needs as Pahoa is a good 15 minute drive away.

My family had a great stay at the Sunrise room.  Though Julia was out of town (her caretaker greeted us when we arrived), she reached out ahead of our visit with very clear directions - we were able to find the location even though we arrived after dark.  The space was clean and Julia left water bottles and fresh towels for us to use.  The Sunrise room is definitely off the grid - no cell service - but we liked the proximity to nature and falling asleep to the sounds of frogs.  We had access to wifi, and Julia's super-friendly dog greeted us every time we returned.  We noticed some mosquitos started coming out in the evenings (we visited mid-July) and suggest bringing bug spray for when you leave the cabin area. The Sunrise room was in a good location to see the current lava flows and visit nearby beaches and we would definitely return for our next visit to the Big Island!

name: Spacious NOMAD 1 BR for 4
summary: If you, your relatives, or friends want to wake up in a quiet, clean and spacious apartment as opposed to a cramped NYC hotel room, we believe our centrally-located apartment will delight you.
space: A clean, spacious apartment with high ceilings, a separate bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and dining area. The apartment is on the fifth floor of a full service prewar elevator building with a 24 hour doorman and laundry facilities in the basement. The apartment is ideal for those on temporary assignment, contract professionals, parents visiting children, wedding guests and relocating executives. It is equipped with linens, sheets, blankets, television, secure Wireless Internet, coffee maker, refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher (and other kitchen appliances), and includes utilities. We do not have local phone service available. No smoking is permitted and pets cannot be accommodated.  The space is suitable for two people on the double size bed and two on our L shape couch.
description: If you, your relatives, or friends want to wake up in a quiet, clean and spacious apartment as opposed to a cramped NYC hotel room, we believe our centrally-located apartment will delight you. A clean, spacious apartment with high ceilings, a separate bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and dining area. The apartment is on the fifth floor of a full service prewar elevator building with a 24 hour doorman and laundry facilities in the basement. The apartment is ideal for those on temporary assignment, contract professionals, parents visiting children, wedding guests and relocating executives. It is equipped with linens, sheets, blankets, television, secure Wireless Internet, coffee maker, refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher (and other kitchen appliances), and includes utilities. We do not have local phone service available. No smoking is permitted and pets cannot be accommodated.  The space is suitable for two people on the double size bed and two on our L shape couch. Our friends have agr
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and safe. Herald Square, the Empire State Building, Koreatown and Murray Hill are steps away. It is also blocks from Madison Square Park where restaurants such as Shake Shack, Tabla, and Eleven Madison Park are located. This is an extremely convenient location for any traveler.
transit: We are located just blocks from subway lines: N, Q, R, W, B, D, F, M, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 . Street parking is available but not guaranteed; garages are nearby. Penn Station and Grand Central train stations are in walking distance.
interaction: Our friends have agreed to manage the apartment in our absence, and can be reached in the event of emergencies.
house_rules: 4 guests max. The neighbors on our floor are respectful of privacy and are rarely seen. Nevertheless, we seek responsible people who would benefit from a short term stay in our apartment while we are away.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I love to travel and see/experience the many cultures and cities of the world. I have been an airbnb host and have used airbnb on several occasions in the US and Europe, and have received very positive reviews on both ends. I am married and have a 3 year old daughter.

reviews.comments:
Very convenient location. Right in the middle of the city - Manhattan. Minutes away from Fifth Ave, Empire State Building, Time Square, Central Park and else. I can eagerly state that the place totally met all our needs and requirements. 
Clean apartment with all necessary appliances.
And Alex is very kind host, that replies messages in minutes.

Guys! This place is STRONGLY recommended if you want to visit NYC and stay in Manhattan... Price/Convenience ratio is way low :)
Hey Alex, please keep it as is - LOL :)))

Sabri

name: 2RM High Floor w/ King & Queen Beds
summary: 2 adjoining studios high floor with Ocean/City/Canal/Mountain views. Two separate en-suite bathrooms, full kitchen, and walking distance to Waikiki beach (~10 minutes) and Hawaii Convention Center (~5 minutes). Very large pool and spa on large 5th floor sundeck.
space: Hawaiian Monarch is conveniently located at the entry to Waikiki with minutes walk to (0.6 miles) Hilton Hawaiian Village beach and 0.4 miles from the Hawaii Convention Center. Huge recreation deck on the 5th floor with salt water swimming pool, sun deck, barbecue area. Our unit is at 38th floor with ocean, City, Ala Wai Canal, and Mountain views. Our unit is newly renovated and tastefully furnished in August 2015: the entire unit is allergy free with no carpet; super comfortable brand new memory foam King size bed in one bed room, brand new memory foam queen size bed and a twin over full size bunk beds in the 2nd bedroom. Full small kitchen with stove, oven, microwave, full refrigerator.
description: 2 adjoining studios high floor with Ocean/City/Canal/Mountain views. Two separate en-suite bathrooms, full kitchen, and walking distance to Waikiki beach (~10 minutes) and Hawaii Convention Center (~5 minutes). Very large pool and spa on large 5th floor sundeck. Hawaiian Monarch is conveniently located at the entry to Waikiki with minutes walk to (0.6 miles) Hilton Hawaiian Village beach and 0.4 miles from the Hawaii Convention Center. Huge recreation deck on the 5th floor with salt water swimming pool, sun deck, barbecue area. Our unit is at 38th floor with ocean, City, Ala Wai Canal, and Mountain views. Our unit is newly renovated and tastefully furnished in August (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) : the entire unit is allergy free with no carpet; super comfortable brand new memory foam King size bed in one bed room, brand new memory foam queen size bed and a twin over full size bunk beds in the 2nd bedroom. Full small kitchen with stove, oven, microwave, full refrigerator. All ameniti
transit: Walking distance to beach, popular shopping, restaurants, etc. Public transportation (the bus) is very convenient, you can enter addresses to get the best route in their web site: (Website hidden by Airbnb) or just using (Hidden by Airbnb) map.
access: All amenities on the recreation deck accessed with room key; laundromat on 5th floor; Gym on lower lobby for $5 to purchase a gym card from security for the entire stay;
interaction: (Hidden by Airbnb) :shaojunchat

reviews.comments: The location is good, it close to the main shopping streets. Jane is also nice, she makes her effort to make us feel like at home.

Jane was an amazing host.  Everything was easy and effortless.  The condo is in a great location.  More importantly, the kitchen was completely stocked with everything we needed to prepare several meals in home, which is nice on the wallet compared to eating out every meal in Wikes.

We very much enjoyed our Airbnb experience with Jane. The apartment was in great shape, and Jane quickly responded to any correspondence  we had. We would definitely stay at her Airbnb again. A five star experience.

We were disappointed with our experience as it wasn't as listed. The listing said it was a 2bedropm apartment but it's actually 2 hotel rooms in what looks like a 3* hotel with an adjoining door with one of the rooms larger than the other. The larger room had a kitchenette. There is no separate living area and no laundry facilities in the room (there is a coin operated laundry on level 5). The apartment is clean and the beds are very comfortable.but the furniture and decor feels dated. The location is ok but it's a good 10-15 min from Waikiki.

Jane shared the true spirit of aloha with all of us - even extending a personal invitation for BBQ and tennis. The condo was exactly as described and Jane even went the extra mile to drop off a fan to help us cool down and added some wiggle room to our check out time. 
The view was amazing and my travel mates took time to enjoy the pool and hot tub. I definitely recommend Jane and her condo to other travelers.

My friends and enjoyed our stay in Jane's condo. Her pictures and descriptions are spot on. The interior was clean, including both bathrooms and a kitchenette. The beds were very comfortable. AC window units were more than enough to cool the units down during the day and especially at night. Wifi provided was faster than I expected, I got 40 Mbps down even over a VPN. We especially appreciated the towels and travel sized soap and shampoo left in the bathrooms. We did not need to use the kitchenette but did use some of the trash bags left as well as the paper towels. The fridge was useful. The unit is a couple of blocks away from the convention center and close to the rest of Waikiki. Overall, we enjoyed our stay there and would gladly stay again.
房間位於高樓層,窗外景色非常宜人,床睡起來舒適,謝謝房東幫忙訂附近便宜停車位,省下不少錢,讓我們玩一週都很順利且愉快!
Great place, spacious, beautiful views of the city.
good location.

非常好的位置,距离希尔顿酒店走路5分钟,每天没事就泡在沙滩上｡希尔顿有潜水艇,luao演出,值得推荐｡另外离购物中心也很近,公交车2站,愿意散步,大约是30分钟内｡
最好的是附近有一家中餐厅,非常棒,时间充裕就去那边吃龙虾大餐,龙虾是中餐厅招牌菜,便宜好吃｡楼下的小店,则是我们来不及吃饭时的最佳选择,麻婆豆腐很正宗｡
附近的7-11,ABC超市可以满足全部的日常需求｡
这次没有见到房东,在信箱拿到钥匙就顺利入住｡房间打扫的很干净,楼内的洗衣房非常方便｡Jane提供了非常周到的提示信息,让一切入住都很方便｡

장소와 시설 모두 기대한대로였습니다. 와이키키 메인 스트리트까지도 가깝고, 알라모아나 쇼핑 센터도 쉽게 갈 수 있었네요.
좋은 숙소였습니다.

Jane was extremely accomadating and the apartment was fantastic! Would highly recommenf staying here! We had a small issue with the cable (not Jane's fault) and she was over in a heartbeat to help out! 10/10

Only my wife and daughter met Jane in the laundry room. I never met her but I was the main communicator with her. She was very quick to respond to any texts, which was the best form of communication. Unfortunately she did not deliver on our 2 concerns. The shower head in the main bedroom only gave a straight pipe flow, which made it very uncomfortable to shower and was reported after our first night. A new shower head was required and it was never replace in our 8 nights there. The air conditioner in the main bedroom failed on the second night and was reported. We asked that it be looked into. It was never fixed but she did provide a fan. Again we were disappointed.

Beautiful experience!!
Lovely location, clean unit and a wonderful host! Jane did everything possible to make us feel very much at home. From providing us with a cheaper parking option to buying a brand new pack n play for our infant, she accommodated each of our requests. She would be prompt to answer all our questions and was available at every hour to respond to our calls. She fixed the broken head shower in one of the units bathroom  same day as we arrived. 

The condo is conveniently located at hop, skip, jump distance from local stores and the beach. We walked up to the beach twice in a weeks time. Also lucky to watch the Honolulu festival parade and the fireworks.

Jane was good with her communication via email prior to my arrival.  Upon arrival, the communication was very poor.  

I was confused with, 1. Retrieving the condo key from the confusing lockbox versus mailbox and 2. The parking situation.  I called Jane and she was unfriendly and screaming on the phone that she had already sent me directions and to follow the directions.  Since I was offered 2 parking options.  One to park in the hotel garage, which is much more convenient, for 25.00 cash per day, or park with her garage for 12.00 per day which was offsite.  Although I was on a budget and been flying all day, I chose to park at the hotel parking garage which charged 25.00 cash only per day.  The other garage was offsite and not convenient at all.  

I told Jane while I had her on the phone,  I didn't like how this was all set up and let her know that we had started off on the wrong foot.  I didn't speak to her the rest of my visit, only spoke to her by text as she requested.  

I like the view of the place.  It was nice.  With no window screens, this could be dangerous or huge liability for a family travelling with kids and wanting to open the window 38 floors up.  I would say the place was not very clean upon arrival.  Sand in my floor room along with hair in the bathroom.  The second bedroom, B unit, should have a television.  Also, having cable would be a good addition instead of Roku TV only.  The wi-fi worked well in the room.
Never saw Jane, but she made it really easy to do a self-check in and stay at the apartment, great location.  Good communication.  It was everything we expected.

We had a wonderful stay at this place. Great location within walking distance to beautiful beaches and fantastic restaurants. Jane was very responsive and kind throughout the trip. She gave us very clear instruction on how to access the room. Definitely recommend.

Overall, our stay here was decent. We did come across a few things but Jane was easy to communicate with. I rented this place with our friends and this is what we thought:

Pros:
Location is a bit further than the main touristy areas of Waikiki but it was still within walking distance. 
The view from the room is PHENOMENAL. 
The beds were comfortable.
The amenities are great and the coffee shop and breakfast place downstairs are delicious.
Renting a parking space instead of having to pay the hotel parking fee.
Jane was really easy to communicate with and she helped whenever possible.
Having 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms.

Cons:
The air conditioner was leaking in the 2nd bedroom so it was nice and cool in one room but toasty in the other. Jane came by to fix it but unfortunately not until a few days before the end of our stay. 
The bathrooms were dirty and there were some dirty dishes in the sink when we arrived. We used some cleaning supplies available but felt like we shouldn't have had to do that.

Like I said, the stay overall was decent.
I really enjoyed staying with Jane. The condo was beautiful, it was easy to get to, and such amazing views. I am recommending this place to my friends and family, and I will be back for sure!!

This was my first trip to Honolulu and getting to Jane's place was a breeze! It's right smack in Waikiki, an easy drive from the airport. The apartment was wonderfully clean when we arrived and everything was working! Thank god! After a 22 hour flight, it was so important that our stay was clean and functional and Jane hit the spot! There is a 7/11 and some small food shops (the foods are delicious by the way) on the ground floor which made it so convenient for us to grab food and supplies when we needed to. Some of my family members made use of the gym as well which made this stay so much more worth it. The beds were comfortable and the view is just amazing! Most especially at night when we turned out all the lights and just left the curtains open. The city lights were our night light. 

As for Jane, she was pleasant and easy to get in touch with whenever I needed help. No problems with communication and overall a wonderful hostess. If anyone is thinking of looking for a place to stay, Jane's place is it!

Thank you Jane!
Great as usual! Came back again to experience Oahu one last time before my trip back to Singapore.

Enjoyed our stay at Janes condo.  Great location and plenty of room.  Had some internet problems and Jane was very quick to help us. Perhaps the only thing missing may have been an armchair of some kind but that was a minor detail.  Could sleep 7 if you had a few people.  Amazing view. Thanks Jane

This is our first family trip to Oahu. Jane is very nice and responsive. Every question/request we asked she replied in couple minutes. Not just replied, she also gave us multiple recommendations which really helpful. The condo location is great, rooms were nice and clean. AC works great which very important to our little baby. Overall very good experience, thank you Jane.

Access to the unit involved key-cards, collected per the host's instructions, then notifying Security of our stay. After initial access,we then had some issues around key cards not working and Security needing more info from the host, before re-coding them, which became tedious.
We found the rooms to be clean and tidy, with a few cooking utensils and washing-up gear. items for cleaning dishes, etc. The available plates and cutlery did not fully cater for our party of 6, which meant taking turns with any meals we ate in the rooms.
The NW view faces a beautiful hotel about 75m away and overlooks the canal on the right, with the ocean visible to the left. The windows can be opened wide to allow better viewing or rapid airing of the rooms, but keep an eye on your young ones. Traffic noise is generally OK, although emergency services frequent the nearby access streets for Waikiki. Sirens are not so noticeable with the windows shut, so air-conditioning  was appreciated in both rooms for sleeping. There was also a tower fan unit, which worked well.
Bedding was adequate and comfortable, including a top bunk over a double, which is suited to the small and nimble (and someone who doesn't move around much in their sleep).
The wi-fi internet access worked well.
Lift access is efficient.
We used the pool a couple times and found it clean enough.
Overall, we enjoyed our stay. Thank you.
A little smaller space than we expected to stay by 6 person but I guess it is fair at the Hawaii. But security was excellent and Jane was nice to us.
Our stay here was wonderful! Everything was as listed and it was an ideal location for all of our needs!

We were quite happy with the 2 separate units.They had fantastics views and comfortable beds.It was great having more than 1 bathroom, especially with 2 teenagers.The wifi and TV( with Netflix) in the room with the multiple beds, worked out perfectly for our family. Quiet time for the Adults in the master bedroom(King bed room) and, didn't have to worry about the kids being bored in the evenings.We were in a perfect location to walk to all the great stores and beaches. We also went for a run in the morning and the canal was a great place to do this.The front desk and security were helpful for any enquiries we had as well.I found the 38th floor was absolutely perfect to see the city and all the great lights at night. Thank goodness there was air conditioning.We would love to stay at Janes condo again someday.

Vor unserer Ankunft konnte ich mich mit Jane austauschen, sie hat immer rechtzeitig zurückgeschriiben und ihre Informationen waren alle einwandfrei. Auch bei der Ankunft haben sich alle Anwesenden (security/help desk) um uns gekümmert. Haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Appartement war sehr sauber unddie Aussicht traumhaft, wie aus einem 5- Sternen Hotel. Einfach top von Anfang bis zum Schluss.
와이키키비치에서 걸어서 약15분정도 걸려요 숙소바로 앞에 편의점과 마트가 있어서 퍈리했습니다. 여자 6명이 지냈는데 편안하고 좋았어요. 가족여행 하기에 아주 좋습니다

Our stay at Jane's Condo was over all good but we did have pros and cons. she kindly let us check in early and check out a little late which accommodated to us with our baby and small/young children & we appreciated that. It is clean & tidy, beds are comfy & has most of what you need when in an apartment stay, nice to have a full size fridge, toaster & microwave work well. could possibly do with a few more plates, bowls, glasses, teatowels, better Hair dryer, etc: but good there is boogy boards, beach mats, snorkel gear to use. also requested more towels which was sent the next day.thank you.
We had a few issues with the key card which we had to sort out ourselves (more than once)through the security (who were really unfriendly).the kitchen waste disposal blocked up & a small water leakage problem under sink, we didn't hear back straight away & wasn't sure what to do, in the end i fixed it myself, so saved her getting a maintenance person in. prior to our stay we had arranged to book in the alternative car park for dates i had given her in advanced & was told highly likely & at $12night so was happy with that but the day we got our car she said she wasn't able to reserve the space and ended up having no choice to but to park in the apartment building at $25night it crushed our budget big time and was very disappointed.
The Location was perfect walking distance to Ala Moana (15-17mins found a short cut along Ala wai canel,lovely shaded walk) & 10mins down to Waikiki beach. eating places,shops,market stalls all around. didn't need to catch a bus at all. The Pool is lovely & the spa is nice at night. the air-con, fan & Wi-fi was a bonus. 
we never meet Jane which is a shame as it would have been nice too. before our stay she would some times respond straight away other times it would take a few days.when we arrived she would usually respond right away via txt or airbnb msg.
If your looking for affordable & DIY accommodation then look no further this would suit you well. would stay here again if there are just as many of us as it fit us well (7 +baby) & within our budget, however hoping things could be inproved in those areas which lacked as we were on our family holiday & it took time away from us.
Mahalo Jane

We had a great time and the view was absolutely sublime. Jane answered back very quickly and always gave us the information we needed. Wish we were told about the closed pool area but the view was fantastic!
Very clean. Great location. Nice view.

Great place to get the beach, cafe, restaurants and shopping malls.
Also our kids really enjoyed pool at the condo.

Jane was excellent with answering all our questions. I was booking 2 units for 11 family members and there was a lot to organise . She was very patient. the apartments were great. Excellent location and had a paid laundry facility. Only issue was there were only 2 key cards available and you had to pay $20US for extra keys. Which we needed. Close to alamona shopping but you needed a car to get yo grocery shop which was fine for us because we had one. Jane was very helpful with getting car parking cheaper for us.

Aloha
PROS: 
The stay for 10 days was comfortable. Jane responded very quickly to a couple queries that we had and resolved the issues immediately. The condor was available to us earlier than the check-in time.
Location is very good with the required bus stops for the tourist being close and convenient.
Easy walk to the main drag and shopping centers.
Lots of eating places close by.
Try the Chinese place across the canal.
Local pub on the lower level.
Reception staff were very helpful and pleasant.
Good, quick meals were available on the ground floor.
Deck chairs, ball, mat and boogie boards available in the condor to take to the beach.
Good, quick laundry.
Clean pool area.

CONS:
Condor caters for 4, but the cutlery and crockery was inadequate: 1 saucer, 2 plates, 2 bowls, no glasses for wine and water. An electric kettle would make life easier.
Overall: Good.

Ravin & Anne Ramasar

Stayed in the Condo.
Found it clean however not really suited for a family of 6...when arrived there was not enough cutlery, plates or glasses for 6...but rang Jane and she organised to buy and drop off a new dinner set and glasses.
Jane is very accomodating and easy to deal with.
The condo is in a good spot close to beaches and Ala Moana

Nice location for being near Waikiki, but still a good walk to the beach if you have kids.  The place didn't come with soap or shampoo, which wasn't very convenient, and it didn't have a tea kettle.  Not the cleanest place I've stayed, and seemed pricey for the quality, but that might be the going rate for Waikiki. It was nice that Jane offered a cheaper parking option.

위치는 좋지만 침구가 깨끗하지 않고 수건에
냄새가 났어요. 아이들과 함께라면 추천하고 싶지
않아요.

Place was as described, clean, suited our every need and most importantly Jane was a fantastic host! 
She was prompt, responsive and provided great suggestions on things to see and do. The small touches such as snorkel gear for two, and masks for four, as well as beach mats and chairs made it extra special. 
The place was perfect for four adults traveling as a group, and having two bathrooms made it even better. 
Overall, great value and location. 
Tips - check out King's Pub downstairs for a friendly bar with some great locals and visitors alike. Buy a blow up mattress and inflate it at any ABC store for a relaxing way to spend a day at the beach. Last tip, if you're an adult, hire a moped and go exploring! 
Jane's accommodation is a perfect base for the best of Waikiki offerings.

The Good: 1) Location: It is only about 4 blocks or a 15 min walk away from the main Waikiki beach. Not super close yet not bad. Location itself is not a deal breaker. Kitchen: You do have a small stove and sinks to cook, knifes, cups, plates and a fridge. Also there is beach mats in the closet for you to use. Parking: Parking is expensive in Waikiki ($25-30) a day so Jane did offer parking off site for a bargain of $12 a day. Jane was great with communication too. We didn't meet her at all as she gave us instructions on how to arrive and open the lockbox ourselves to get the keys an check in. We basically checked in and out ourselves by leaving the location keys back in the loop lockbox after we left. She also let us check in earlier which was nice too. The Bad: It's a VERY old apartment. Definitely NOT in a "newly remodeled" state. Not even close! Quite the contrary! Worst of all although: It's dirty and UNSANITARY :-( The whole apartment is in bad shape. Bed linens and comforters all seemed unwashed and had stains. They also smelled VERY funky. We were grossed out and were afraid of sleeping in them. Also all of the bathroom towels smelled so DIRTY and HUMID! They had obviously not been previously washed for us to use. We didn't bring our own towels so using dirty towels was so gross. We had to suck it up. This had never happened to us before and we have stayed in many Airbnb's over the years. The bathroom was full of mold and old; tiles were squishy and even falling apart ( one fell off to the back wall) The shower seems to have bad water damage. The old rusty shower hose even came off at one point and I had to screw it back on. It was soooo rusty and hard that it made it very hard to pull to turn the shower water on. The shower curtain was also soooo old and moldy. Chunks o "goo" and old plastic particles were coming off from it as we showered. Yuck yuck! We also didn't need to use the stove kitchen but we were so glad that we didn't have to because the cups and tea kettle smelled bad and the stove was greasy and was not properly cleaned. Only the fridge was clean inside. The apartment is also a 1 bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms. One is an actual bedroom with a sink and a bathroom and the other larger room is actually the kitchen and living room that other covered into "a room" by just adding 2 extra beds right in the kitchen and calling it a bedroom. So between the " newly renovated " listing description and the actual room setting, it was a bit deceiving this listing. Also the elevator takes forever but that was the least of our dislikes with this...

Jane is a lovely host, but we had a couple unfortunate events while staying at the apartment. The door lock broke down, and so our key cards stopped working and we had to spend a sweaty hour hanging out in the hall and going back and forth to the security desk to sort it out - not the end of the world, but certainly annoying. Also, we were told we could have cheaper parking next door which came together too late and we ended up paying the very expensive full rate - again, not the end of the world, just annoying. The apartment is very central and walking distance to a few great places to eat, but is super small - really just a place to sleep. If that's all you need, then, great. But if you are travelling with kids and need a place to hang out during the day, it is too cramped for that.
Todo perfecto! El apartamento es muy cómodo, muy bien ubicado y jane está disponible full time. Lo único que La Cocina está dentro de una habitación. Muy recomendable
Considering the price we paid to stay near Waikiki Beach, this was definitely 5 stars!

Rooms not big enough for 6 people. Not enough wardrobe space. 
Both rooms need a good clean and mop especially the bathrooms, showers were all greasy - shower curtain was mouldy.  No ventilation. The stove in the kitchen was disgusting - kettle was dangerous. 
Overall cleanliness  was bad
Need to supply complimentry welcome pack e.g. just basic things.
 washers are not in the room and have to pay with credit card
This location is incredible! Easy in and out!! The beach was only minutes away ! You wouldn't have to rent a car because you are right in the middle of it all!! We will be back !!!

Jane's place was clean and spacious enough for 6 people. Two bathrooms made it extremely convenient. A few blocks away from the main strip in Waikiki. Jane was super fast and helpful when responding to questions. Highly recommend booking a place with Jane!
Excellent location, amazing host, and a great time... what else is there to say? Btw, pool is open late!

Bath towels, sheets were clean and prepared for new things.
Thanks and I was able to spend comfortably.
At check-in, it was impossible to open the key from the key box immediately. I needed security help.

We loved staying at Jane's place it is in a fabulous location, the apartment was very clean and perfect for us 4 adults and one child. We loved the pool and got to use the gym, loved the closeness to the beach, shops and shopping centre. We would stay here again. It is such great value for money and Jane is a great host she got back to us straight away with any questions we had and let us have a late check out which we really appreciated. Thank you again Jane.

Jane was extremely helpful from the very  beginning right through to the end of my trip.

I had the pleasure of staying on level 38 with such an awesome view.

Location wise it is central to all the local shops and the busy part of the Waikiki Strip.
It is walking distance to all shops and even the Ala Moana Centre and Walmart.

If your looking for a place that isn't busy with tourist and still close to the shops this is the perfect place for you.

Pools and gym access was a bonus for the kids and I.

I would definitely recommend staying here if your looking for affordability and a friendly vibe.

5 Stars for me!

Jane was great. The unit was great for our family trip.  The view from the room was a bonus.  Jane was easy to reach whenever we needed.  Place was clean and had everything you needed for a vacation.  Highly recommend to book if your looking for a place for your family or even friends. Thanks Jane!!!

Jane place is simple, beautiful and the view was gorgeous. She was very helpful to work with me to let me check in early which was wonderful of her. The place was spotless and she had beach supplies available for use. I didn't end up using the hotel pool, but I will have a chance to try next time. Thank you Jane :)

Not a bad place for a couple of couples on a budget or a small family on a budget.  I was only there with a couple friends for one night and I know the islands well. The location is good for getting around, close to the center of things in Waikiki.  Staff seemed nice and unit was clean.
This house is super convenient to everything in Waikiki.  Jane was super responsive and helpful through out our stay.  Thank you so much for a wonderful first trip to Waikiki.
Good location. Ok apartment. The securitygards un the lobby were very helpful!
Great location and Jane was extremely helpful.

Thanks Jane for the great accommodation and amenities provided. Our families and kids enjoyed the stay. Being in such a wonderfully located part of Waikiki and in centre of all the activities, the accommodation allowed us easy access to all the nearby places. Will definitely recommend this place to friends.

This place couldn't have been more perfect for a four-day stay with two teenaged boys and a friend. The condo is near the Ala Wai canal on the edge of Wakiki, but It's a reasonable 15-min walk to beach/shopping/eating at Ala Moana in one direction or Wakiki beachfront and shopping/eating on the other. The bus to Diamond Head and Hanauma Bay stops nearby. There's a Seven-Eleven next door. The condo is not fancy, but works well for families. The  master suite has its own bath and provides some privacy; the kitchen, dining table, bunk beds and double bed are all in one room, but that wasn't a problem with teenagers who slept like the dead while I was in the kitchen --and they had a separate bath.  The pool was a great amenity and got a lot of use from the boys. The closet was full of beach gear, including multiple sets of snorkeling equipment. Check in/our was a snap and Jane was very prompt with her replies. Highly recommended.
Awesome place, would love to stay here again! Great location and great amenities!

This place is a great location, walking distance to everything in Waikiki, close to Hawaiian Village and Wailana Coffee House (24X7). 22 mins. walk to the Waikiki Trolley office in the DFS T Galleria, really recommend the 5 day ticket on this service. Ala Moana Mall is around a 30 min walk. The condo is well supplied with everything you need, clean and air conditioning works really well. We were 3 adults so had both rooms, plenty of room for us all to have a bed each. 7/11 is close by and there is a bar downstairs. Hope to get the chance to visit again.
Really nice place to stay during our vacation
Practical and affordable, walkable to waikiki beach. Jane was very responsive to our queries and made sure our stay was comfortable
The condo has a million dollar view and great location as (Website hidden by Airbnb) had all the amenities and convenient location. The building is old but well maintained.

家族5人で使わせて頂きました｡ﾚﾝﾀｶｰがあったので階下の駐車場を1日25で借りられます｡
ｾｷｭﾘﾃｨｰのためｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰやﾌﾟｰﾙ､ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰも全てｶｰﾄﾞで開けるので慣れるまで少し戸惑いました｡
Janeはﾒｰﾙのﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽが良いので助かりました｡
38Fのﾎﾉﾙﾙの夜景はとても素敵でした｡
また泊まりたいですね｡
First time to Waikiki. Jane was very response and helpful. Will definitely return.
once we circumvented all of the confusing streets, we were ready for a comfortable night sleep and boy did we get it.

Jane is an awesome host. She provided very detailed instructions for check in and the place was just as expected. The location was about a 10 min walk to the shopping strip and beach. There are several convenient stores and cafe just downstairs of this complex.
Jane was very communicative and helpful. The flat was as expected and perfectly adequate for our needs. Close to the beach, mall and the convention centre. Would recommend for travellers on a budget.
great location...the staff were friendly and always helpful and kind all in all a repeatable experience mahalo

Good things: Jane's apartment is very well located and Jane is a very helpful host.

Bad things. The apartment had not been cleaned well. The blinds do not close completely and there is no blackout. The air conditioner is poorly positioned as it is on the bed disturbing those who sleep there. There was no organization in the closets.

We were disappointed with our stay. Jane has to improve the aspects I described above so that the next travelers can have a decent stay.
Closed to all the places, great place to stay if you want to discover Wakiki
Great location but needs a very good clean. Bathroom standards poor.
Great place to be. Had everything even when we forgot things.

This condo with two separate studios was excellent for me and my two teenage kids. The location is very convenient to Waikiki Beach, Ala Moana mall, and many casual dining options. The condo is clean, quiet, well equipped (even with snorkelling gear and boogie boards), has a good sized pool and a gym, and awesome views. I definitely recommend it, particularly for families wanting the versatility that the two separate spaces provides.
Great host. Good location. Value for money.

If you need a place to stay in Waikiki for good value, I recommend Jane’s place. It was perfect for our group of 6 and we would probably try to stay here again if we found ourselves back on Oahu. Close to the beach and there’s a 7-eleven next door. It’s not a 5-Star resort that you’d spend most of your vacation in, but once you accept that and get over it, you’ll enjoy your stay as much as we did!
This place is in a great location.  Walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and the beach!
Nice location close to Waikiki but very limited with dishes and cookwear when cooking for your family.
A spectacular view, and an awesome pool area, we definitely enjoyed it.
Excellent place to stay for the value. Central. Easy access to the apartment, beach, restaurants, buses. Good communication with the host.
4 adults 2 small children, was perfect for 2 private rooms. We walked almost everywhere, beach was a 10-15 minutes. Would stay again when returning!! Thanks Jane!

We use bodyboard.
There are many towels! But we want hair conditioners.
Jane is very helpful and prompt responding to my questions and requests.  The place is a little small and old but neat and clean.

すごく良かったです｡
建物自体は古いですけど､そう感じさせることもなく､ﾚﾝﾀｶｰすれば立地もよく駐車場もあり､近くにﾚﾝﾀｶｰ屋もあるので便利でした｡
ｾﾌﾞﾝｲﾚﾌﾞﾝも近くて､1階にも軽食が食べれるところや小さなｺﾝﾋﾞﾆもあり､地下にはいい感じのﾌﾟｰﾙﾊﾞｰもあります｡
5階のﾌﾟｰﾙはよかったですが､ｼﾞｬｸｼﾞｰは少し物足りない感じです｡
38階の部屋なので向きは山側ですが景色もすごくよく大満足｡
ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙ､ﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰ､遊び道具も完備されていてﾄｰﾀﾙ的にも大満足でした｡
Good location, Jane is very responsive.
The host is great . Location is accessible to convention and stores walking distance, good location.
Great host with excellent communication. The place was great and it has all the amenities we need. She took her time to help us with the parking situation before we came.
No comment

Jane's place is located above the Hawaiian Monarch hotel. It's in a great location. Although the building is older-style the studios are more than adequate for 2 couples or a family, and way cheaper than staying at a Waikiki hotel.  The pool/spa on level 5 is very nice.   It's about a 7-minute walk to the beach and a 20-minute walk to Ala Moana shopping centre. Around the corner at 478 Ena St is a great cheap Vietnamese restaurant with delicious food; we ate there 3 times. For a goumet breakfast try Cream Pot in the hotel foyer.
Perfect if you've got teenagers. Close to the beach and shops. Clean, comfortable but tired. We thought it good value for money.

Beautiful view, perfect location, fast communication, etc.

I thing this is a place where people should go! and there are hot tub and pool at 6th floor!!

立地もよく､ｺｽﾊﾟもいいです｡
部屋の匂いだけは気になりましたが､ｼｬﾜｰ､ﾄｲﾚ等ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑも問題ないです｡
ｶｯﾌﾟﾙ二組や､4人家族にはいいと思います｡
ｺﾝｾﾝﾄ等､ﾀｺ足を持っていくことをおすすめします｡

Jane's place was very convenient, but it is dated. Cons: The hallway leading to the apartment had a strong odor, which cleared out of the apartment itself after we opened the windows for a few hours. The corridors in the apartment are a little cramped, so be aware if you have accessibility issues. The bathrooms are pretty lived in, with rust stains in the sink and tub. The AC units are also a bit noisy, so I had to turn one off to sleep. The unit that is the kitchen needs more light around the dining table/bunk beds. Pros: Super conveniently located to convenience stores, the beach near the Hilton Village (which I preferred to the "main" Waikiki beach), restaurants. The condo has two full bathrooms that are stocked with necessities. The kitchen is also stocked with utensils and appliances. 

All in all, if I had read the description more carefully, I would have noticed this condo is actually located in the Hawaiian Monarch hotel and wouldn't have booked it. It's conveniently located and the host has stocked it with everything a family would need, but the unit is older than I would have liked.
This condo is in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel, a 2 star property. The condos are 2 star as well.
It is a perfect place for accessing both Waikiki and downtown.  You can also enjoy the awesome view.
Location! Awesome views! Great for a large family.

name: Studio in Lincoln Sq - Columbus Cir
summary: Perfectly located between Central Park West and Broadway. 1 Min Walk to Lincoln Center, Restaurants and Night life. You are conveniently located by major subway lines. Queen bed, comfortable sofa bed (couch/bed), full kitchen & bath. Elevator bldg.
space: Studio is one room with a small cozy kitchen. This elevator building was previously a hotel. It's small, yet functional space.

Queen bed, comfortable sofa bed (couch/bed), full kitchen & bath. Elevator bldg. Studio is one room with a small cozy kitchen. This elevator building was previously a hotel. It's small, yet functional space. Closets will not available for use I would be happy to make any recommendations in the area. I love New York City!! I'll be available by phone if needed during your stay. Walk out of the apartment and see Central Park on one side of the street and the beautiful Lincoln Center to your right. Enjoy the liveliness of the city with the coziness of nature and park right at your doorstep. Half a block away from Central Park, located near convenient shops, restaurants, and transportation. notes: Pull out couch is extra comfortable, location is fantastic.
transit: Half a block away from Central Park, located near convenient shops, restaurants, and transportation. Columbus Circle is only 4 short street blocks away. Restaurants all around Broadway with many Taxis and other options. Right in between Central Park West and Broadway, location is ideal.
access: Closets will not available for use
interaction: I would be happy to make any recommendations in the area. I love New York City!! I'll be available by phone if needed during your stay.
house_rules: Clean and courteous. Pets are not allowed. Parties are not allowed.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Like many of you, I absolutely love to travel. Having lived in other countries and different states, with my family spread around the world, I appreciate the value of staying at a local home. It adds even more culture and hospitality to that given destination.

reviews.comments: My stay at Sholeh's apartment was perfect.  The apartment's location was exactly what I was looking for, very close to Central Park, Lincoln Center and the Upper West Side.  Sholeh was very communicative before my arrival and made sure I was comfortable during my stay.  I would highly recommend her home to anyone traveling to NYC.

Sholeh was a fantastic host. She was quick to respond to my messages, flexible with timing, and easy to contact throughout my stay. The apartment itself was everything I could hope for - clean, comfortable and perfectly located near Central Park, Lincoln Square, Columbus Circle and several subway lines! The building was quiet and the neighbourhood was lovely and safe, with lots of amenities and restaurants close-by.
I couldn't have asked for more, and would definitely return on my next trip to NYC!

name: Stylish Suit with balcony in Centre
summary: In Beyoğlu living 24 hours, settled selected high society of İstanbul over the French Street inhabiting 24 hours.  24 hours special security.

In a special segment of Beyoğlu as the center of culture and art in İstanbul, very selected street FRENCH STREET. Flats being restored entirely given a theme and opened into service in the year 2004 café-restaurant, boutique, fashion workshops and galleries over that street very elegant loft apartments are decorated. neighborhood_overview: It is a perfect getaway in the midst of the enchanting neighborhood of Cihangir, with restaurants and cafes just steps away. It  takes a short walk to reach Taksim, international center area of Istanbul. You can easily and quickly access some of the best  restaurants, cafes, shops, art scenes, and nightlife in the city! The apartment is very easy to find, as well as easily accessible  by all forms of public transportation – you can even reach Asian side in under half an hour via ferry.  Besides the option of walking around in this enchanting area, there are various methods of public transportation available around  the apartment. You can always take the tram from Tophane to get to the old part of Istanbul, or take the ferry from Karaköy to  cross the Bosphorus on to the Asian side, as well as take the nostalgic tram which runs along Istiklal Street.  There is always something exciting happening in this area, as it encompasses Taksim Square, Istiklal Street, Galata Tower, and  Karakoy.
transit: It is in the Beyoglu where the centre of business and entertainment. 10 minutes walk along to Taxim Square, 5 minutes walk along to Tunel, 8 minutes walk along to Galata, 10 minutes walk along to Taksim-4.Levent Metro Station, 10 minutes walk along to Şişhane Metro Station, 5 minutes walk along to Cihangir, 5 minutes walk along to Tophane Tram Station, you can prefer to walk 5 minutes to Karaköy tram station or by taxi for to go to Historical Peninsula ( Sultanahmet, Topkapı Palace, Hagi Sophia, Grand Bazaar). And also there is a 7/24 taxi station in the lower side of the French Street. It is also in the heart of art centers in İstanbul; it takes 3 minutes to go to İstanbul Modern by taxi, 2 minutes walk along to Museum of Innocence, 5 minutes walk along to Pera Museum, 5 minutes walk along to Tophane-i Amire.
access: Special made Denizli(the city famous in quality textile in Turkey) linen sheets, cases, pillows, bathroom towels and slippers. interaction: Upon your arrival we will meet you at the rental, check-you in, give you the keys and tell you about the neighborhood and the whole area for orientation and tips like a local friend. We will be also assisting you closely during your stay and in case of any needs or emergencies.

host.host_about: Besides spending lots of quality time with my lovely kids, I really like sports such as walking and running. Being a young dynamic mother goes along with the ability to organize - lucky me it's also part of my profession. :)

reviews.comments: Schöne Straße, aber viele Treppen. Wir waren im Winter da, ich denke im Sommer könnte es laut sein, da es sich mehrere kleine Bars sehr nah an dem Hotel befinden. Schöne Dachterrasse, freundliches Personal. Ich empfehle Neva.

We are pleased with our stay at Neva's place. We spend only one night at that place, but could make the reservation without any problems, with very good communication. 
Ogul was very friendly helpful before and during our stay. 
The place is very central, safe and at one of the most beautiful streets in Beyoglu. It can be noisy until late at Weekends (because of those local bars around) , but that did not concern us.

name: Double bed room for 2 travellers
space: The apartment situted in the centre part of Kowloon - Monkok. It is a famous shopinng district in Hong Kong. There is the fabulous shopping mall Langham Place at he back of the apartment. To the east with just a few minutes walk, you can reach the Ladies Street(the night market), Sportswear Street,Gold Fish Street. You can buy everything you want downstair in the street, such as watch and jewellery, fashion, sportswear, video and visual products and computer parts. Room provides one double bed 1200mm width with matress. Room facilities includes: 1. Independent washroom with shampoo, liquid soap, toilet paper, towels and cold and   hot water supply. 2. host.host_about: I am an ex-marine engineer and had travelled to countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, North and South America and Australia. I love travelling and making friend with people from all over the world. I Love collecting stamps and coins.

reviews.comments: Very good location, close to MTR station and Langham Place shopping mall. However, address of room is 607 Nathan Road and not 670 Nathan Road so please update the listing as we were surprised by the change of address. Building is a little dodgy but lobby is bright and relatively safe. Room is much smaller than it appears in the picture. Bedsheets are not fitted properly but other than that, it was acceptable if you do not plan to stay in the room. Don't intend to watch television as the reception is not good.

Albert's place lives RIGHT NEXT to the subway exit. An excellent spot for any transportation. 3 mins walk for airport shuttle.
Room is tiny, which should be expected when hitting HK. Although the building is aged, but the entire space inside the room is refurnished and kept tidy. 
Highly recommended!
It was a pleasant experience.

I'd recommend this place to others because the area is clean and the host is very accommodating. Though the room was small, which is very typical for a place to stay in hong kong,i'd still come back here for sure.also, it is very close to the MTR and other places that  tourists would like to go to like the ladies' market and others in Mongkok area.
The room is well situated and next to the metro station. Albert was very flexible with me and he let me change the dates how I wanted. Thank you I appreciate.

The location is really fabulous, v near the MTR station n has many shops n eateries downstairs. It was also v convenient with many buses just at the entrance of the building.
But the lift did not come up to our level n we could only take the lift to level 25 n take e stairs up/down.
Room is not big, but acceptable size. The bathroom door cannot be locked. We were not guided on how to use the water heater, so had to bathe in chilling water during the few days when HK was 16deg.
It was very cold at night as we stayed at the top floor.

Albert's place is perfect. It's clean. Great location. Close to metro and airport bus. I really enjoyed my stay there. He was quick in responding to my queries. My Xing who checked me in and out is a really nice person too.. I will recommend this place and will always go back if I visit Hk again. 
Thanks Albert and Xing.

We never met Albert but as some others wrote he gave us very detailed and easy to find directions and the contact of his cousin. He helped us get in the room even when it was very late (tip: left elevator to 13 and right elevator to 25. Elevator number 1 is only to 10pm) the building is by far the ugliest in the street so you can't miss it. But the rooms are very nice though small (heard some travelers like bigger rooms). The beds were quite hard in our room but we liked it. The bathroom was clean and a shared toilet/shower but that's also not a biggie. Albert answers every question in a very short time so that was a perfect stay. Fun thing: when going to the 25th floor hit also the 6th floor button and enjoy ;-)
Accommodation was very close to all the shops in Mon Kok. Albert's cousin was nice and very attentive and accommodating.

Albert was extremely fast to reply the emails and to help accommodate for our staying period. He also provided all instructions necessary to find the place. 

The place itself is extremely well located and inside a huge building full of small apartments, hostels and mini hotels. You will encounter many travelers and it leaves you with a safe feeling - lots of CCTV add to it. 

The room is small but has everything you need. If you stay longer and have a lot of luggage, you might end up missing a closet. Otherwise it's nice. Fresh bedsheets, towels and shower gel/shampoo and toothbrushes are provided. 
The best way to find it is to look for a little street vendor that is literally right in front of the entrance to the building on Nathan Road. 

We would always stay with Albert again and can recommend the place.

We didn't meet Mr. Albert but his relative Mr. Ying gave us the keys and made sure that everything was ok. It wasn't difficult to find the building, the instructions for the check in were clear and easy. Cleaning service was also excellent. I would definitely recommend this room: it's quite small but fair for Hong Kong standards, plus it is located in the heart of Mong Kok.

This place was very nice. Stayed here for over a month. 
Contact with the host was easy, he was very helpful through out.
Location is brilliant, right on the main road and close to Mongkok MTR. There are tons of convenience stores and banks, nearby, so you'll never run out of anything.
Would consider Albert's place anytime. 
Had no complaint, and Albert was very patient with all my queries.

Thank you for an absolutely wonderful stay.

Nice and clean room,and the host text back quickly:)
And it's the good location in the inner city:)so convenient to take bus and subway:)

Albert and Mr Ying are so nice!
Thanks for them!
Albert was so nice and very helpful due to complete any problems. He is also a trusworthy and honest
地點便利,很靠近地鐵站!

name: Long Island City- Furnished Studio
summary: Studio available in brand new building with doorman, fits 2, 7 minutes to Manhattan, fully furnished. Washer/dryer inside the building. Gym access. Rooftop access with breath-taking views of the city.  Steps away from N,Q,R,7. Close to E,M,R,F,G.
description: Studio available in brand new building with doorman, fits 2, 7 minutes to Manhattan, fully furnished. Washer/dryer inside the building. Gym access. Rooftop access with breath-taking views of the city.  Steps away from N,Q,R,7. Close to E,M,R,F,G. N,Q,R,7,F,M,E,G,Q60,Q32
house_rules: No smoking No pets Clean everything that you use (dishes, pots, silverware)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Wonderful Location in Queens near buses and subway. The studio was nice with a great rooftop getaway. Jess is new but I am sure will make the pleasant stay for future guests.

Unfortunately not as clean as required: long black hairs in the bathtub, dirty cups in the kitchen sink, multiple half-drunk bottles around the kitchen, dirty silverware, floors with dust and hair. Clearly NOT cleaned prior to my arrival. Shame

Jess's apartment is near by station,enough clean,good kitchen and bathroom.
I had a relax time in there, but there some noise in only daytime by under construction .
And there are no knife for kitchen so you must bring that.
Anyway it is good staying NYC.
Nice place. Wasn't able to meet Jess but she was easy to get a hold of to figure out the wifi password, etc.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The perfect stay, everything was as imagined plus useful added extras. The location was ideal!
Gracias!
Very nice place and a great location. Everything was as described and Jess was helpful and easy to get in touch with. I would def recommend this place for staying when visiting NYC.

Jess hat nicht zu viel versprochen. Das Studio befindet sich auf der Manhatten-nahen Seite von Queens, d.h. mit der Metro dauert es nur ca. 7 Minuten bis zum Time Square. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Neubau mit Portierservice. Super ausgestattet auch für einen längeren Aufenthalt. Das einzige was gefehlt hat, ist ein Fernseher. Wir waren eine Woche in New York und würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen.
Simple and comfortable apartment, easy communication, great stay.

name: Cozy apartment
summary: Spacious and elegant living area with industrial architecture. Our brand new apartment is located in Harbiye and it's only 5 min. walking distance to Taksim and all attractions. All the windows reach from the floor to the ceiling with French windows.
space: 35 square meters charming studios with wood floor,  brand new interior design , and really well equipped. The building was constructed in 2015. They are very well connected to all parts of İstanbul; they are only 5 minutes walking distance to Taksim and all attractions and have also a great airport connection. The area offers a great selection of Shops, Restaurants, Supermarkets, Pubs and a number of renowned health and fitness centers, to include yoga and Pilates. It`s a bright and open space studio flat that benefits of a modern bathroom and the kitchen comes fully furnished ( microwave, toaster, kettle, pans&pot ect. )

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is full of hotels and residences so it's a tourist-friendly area. It's near the subway and everything you need and/or want is within your arm's reach.
notes: We have everyday cleaning service with no cost at all.  Amenities Kitchen   Dishwasher, fridge, stove, kettle, aspirator, an American bar with two stands(The kitchen is fully equipped with all modern conveniences.) Room - Fiber-optic wireless internet  - TV (Satellite-Cable TV) -  Heating  - Air Conditioning - Double bed (inseparable) - Two French windows (So you can smoke if you want to.) Bathroom - All bathroom amenities (Towel, shampoo, conditioner, etc.) - Extra large shower - Hair dryer -Hot water for 24 hours Building - Elevator - Washer - Dryer - All day cleaning service (Sheets, towels can be changed every day by housekeeping. transit: Metro is 1 minute 12 seconds with my steps and bus stop is 30 seconds. You can walk to city centre with in 10 minutes.
access: It is near to Taksim (it takes only 5 min. by walking). You are in the middle of shopping area. You can reach everywhere easily by subway and the flat is near to subway station.
interaction: I am also the architect of the building and my office is at the entrance of it. So you are able to reach me easily. I am always available to reach out for question and/or help so you can also reach me via Viber and (Hidden by Airbnb) .  If you need more information or if you want you arrange a viewing, please send me an email with your number or phone me, even better text me your number.
house_rules: No partying and no smoking allowed.

host.host_about: I am an architect who loves to travel a lot :)

reviews.comments: Absolutely loved this place! This was my first ever visit to Istanbul and I rented the place for the whole month. The decor of the room is very clean and modern. Soft and comfy bed.  Felt like a hotel room with a lot of great natural light. Bathroom was fantastic as well, especially the shower. Super fast wifi. Helpful staff: there was one time I needed to make a reservation at a restaurant that only spoke Turkish, and they helped me with that. Location was very central, close to Taksim and Nisantasi where there are some great restaurants. Highly recommend!

My previous reservation with another host was cancelled the same day I was to check-in. Fortunately, Emrah responded quickly to my requests, answered all my questions and even allowed me a quick tour of the facility. His staff helped me with my luggage, laundry and all of my requests for the duration of my stay. The apartments are new, clean, modern, and avante-gardesque. Angular shaped space, concrete walls with clean white walls, tasteful furniture to match. So many things are in walking distance, metro is close by, centrally located to many of the sites to see in Istanbul. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a new, clean, hotel-serviced, apartment centrally located in Istanbul.

Handsomely designed studio with a very nice bathroom and a separated eating/cooking area. Perfect for one or a couple. The location in Harbiye is very convenient, just one street from the main avenue. Emrah is a great host and the apartments are perfect for a short-term stay.

Super Lage, Metro- und Bushaltestelle fußläufig erreichbar. Belebte Hauptstraße gleich nebenan trotzdem ruhige Unterkunft. Super Zimmerservice, sauber und ordentlich. Angestellte Frau Derya war stets freundlich und erreichbar und stets bemüht allen Wünschen nachzukommen. Ausstattung optimal- zwischendurch mal Schwierigkeiten mit der Internetverbindung, die aber auch schnell behoben wurden.
The Best host in Istanbul:)
