name: Luxury modern cozy condo Old Port w/ PARKING
summary: We have three unbeatable features: location, indoor parking and price! Very nice and beautiful brand new construction condo right in the heart of downtown Montreal-Old Port It's a few steps from 2 subway stations (Berry-UQAM and Champ-des-Mars).
description: We have three unbeatable features: location, indoor parking and price! Very nice and beautiful brand new construction condo right in the heart of downtown Montreal-Old Port It's a few steps from 2 subway stations (Berry-UQAM and Champ-des-Mars). Berri-UQAM subway   IGA grocery store, Pharmaprix and Jean-Coutu drugstores   Bars and restaurants at St-Denis Street  Old port of Montreal and La Fontaine Park  Last stop of 747 shuttle bus from the airport Parc Jean Drapeau
transit: Berri-UQAM subway   IGA grocery store, Pharmaprix and Jean-Coutu drugstores   Bars and restaurants at St-Denis Street  Old port of Montreal and La Fontaine Park  Last stop of 747 shuttle bus from the airport Parc Jean Drapeau
house_rules: No smoking  No pets  No loud music or noise after 10pm till 8am.  No parties

reviews.comments: Marcos was polite and very professional when we first arrived.  The condo was amazing and kept spotless.  We were in a great part of town and very close to the metro for areas that we a little further away.  Staying here was great.  An ideal area to get where you needed to go!

Marcos and Mari's apartment was a great location! The parking was clutch.  The apartment was modern, clean and comfortable. Walking around Old Montreal was easy and convenient. We will definitely be back!

Marcos & Mari were great hosts. Marcos replied by text within an hour whenever I had a question or concern.

The location was perfect. Two blocks from Rue Berri & St Catherine by the Berri-UQAM train station. Just far enough to not hear the crowds for Fierte, but close enough to walk out to the festivities.

The apt was immaculately clean! My friend said it was so clean, she was scared to walk in it haha. Also, I enjoyed the simple and modern furnishings. It would be as if I had furnished it myself, so I really felt at home :)

I really enjoyed having the privacy of the apt and being stress free in a safe building. The air conditioner worked perfectly against the scorching heat outside! The smart TV is great for bringing your own media to play. I had music and concerts in MP3, MP4, MKV, and AVI formats which all worked to my surprise! 

Also, the bed in the bedroom is a lot bigger than the photo looks! I think the photo "squished" the bed haha. It's at least a queen size I think.
Good place and excellent location. Would recommend.

Marcos & Mari's place is wonderful- clean, comfortable, and in a great location! Walking distance to a lot of great stuff. Getting in and out was a breeze with clear instructions from our hosts, and they were very responsive when we had questions! We absolutely loved our first visit to this amazing city!

Marcos and Mari's condo was super close to all the best restaurants on Saint Denis and just a few minutes walk to the core of Old Montreal! Check in and check out instructions were clear, excellent and flawless. The flat was modern, clean, and gorgeous! Thanks again for the stay! :)

Marco and Mari were very friendly and helpful. The check in and out were simple and everything went smoothly. This is a great condo in a great neighborhood, I honestly found it to be nicer in real life than in the photos.
Very clean place. Check-in was straight forward and simple. Convenient location with PARKING!

Marcos was an amazing host and very accomodating. The apartment was spotless and tasteful. The location was outstanding with tons of stuff to do within walking distance or a short cab ride. Would definitely stay here again!

Marcos was extremely helpful and flexible as we arrived and was quick to respond to emails if we had questions. We enjoyed the location as it was close to main Subway station and lots of restaurants on Saint Dennis. The apartment was clean as described. The garage felt secure and was very clean as well.

Great Experience! Marco's place was awesome! He wasn't able to meet us for check-in but he left detailed instructions even a baby could follow and he always responded to text messages within minutes!

The place is exactly as shown in the pictures. Really clean and cute. It's also in a great spot: Quiet but close to everything.

Would not hesitate to recommend Marco's place to anyone.
The apartment was perfect, great location in old port.  Marcos was a great host and very responsive, will stay there again!

We were visiting Montreal for a 3 day music festival that was happening in locations in Old Montreal and Place des Arts. This was a perfect location to either walk from or get the Metro 2 blocks away. The condo was exactly as described on the site and it was a pleasure to stay here: well equipped, very clean, and a quiet building. And given Montreal's confusing street parking rules, it was nice to have the indoor parking and not worry about tickets!   We would return.

Marcos and Mari's apartment was the perfect spot for our long weekend in the city -- clean, centrally located and conveniently close to a variety of transit. The pick-up instructions for the keys was extremely clear and well communicated. 

One small note: the residents do live here full time... from the photos we were not expecting to find a full fridge, computers, full closets. etc. Not a huge deal, but it took a bit of navigating to ensure we weren't unintentionally invading their privacy.

All in all, highly recommended!

The apartment was very clean and had plenty of amenities such as clean towels, sheets, and cookware. We enjoyed the easy walk to the downtown and Old Port area. Marcos and Mari were very responsive to questions and were helpful along the way! Parking inside was extremely helpful, considering the heavy snowstorm Montreal was experiencing. Thank you for a great stay!

Our stay at Marcos and Mari was truly a seamless and smooth experience! Conveniently located a 5mins walk to Old Montreal and 10min walk to downtown, every place was very accessible. A very clean and comfortable stay and indoor parking is a major plus. We would love to revisit and stay at Marcos and Mari again! Thank you.

A perfect 10/10 for Marcos and Mari.
Very easy to deal with. No issues what so ever. Very clean.
Do not hesitate to rent the apartment. The parking included is a huge plus.
Nous avons adoré notre séjour chez Marco & Mari. L'appartement était propre et fonctionnel et surtout bien localisé.

It was a very comfortable stay.. Everything was clean n neat, easily accessible. And they were just a phone call away for any assistance needed. 
My wife really loved the way the apartment was done and was kept so well organised. It looked n felt very pretty. It was our first AirBnB experience and it was v pleasent.

We enjoyed our stay here and would come back/recommend to others!
Marcos was easy to get a hold of prior to arrival and  for check in, and was patient in addressing my questions and helping me check in.
The apartment was clean, comfortable and well-furnished. Marcos and Mari were excellent hosts: they made sure to post the wi-fi password throughout the apartment; they laid out fresh towels, shampoo and soaps; they made up a tray of coffee and goodies; and they even left us a letter to welcome us and to wish us well on our trip. 
The neighbour is very well-situated (close to Chinatown, two Metro stops, Old Montreal, Rue St. Catherine and the highway). The closest grocery store is about a 10-15 minute walk away. The underground parking was very convenient. If you're planning to travel to Montreal over the summer (2016), be aware that there's tons of construction which will affect how you get to the underground parking and around the city (not a deal-breaker but make sure to plan ahead!).
Great place

Marcos and Mari's condo is in a great building at a convenient location to the Quartier des Spectacles and Old Montreal. Although we didn't get to meet in person, our check in was easy and the space was clean and well appointed.

Marcos & Mari's place is great. It is located in a quiet neighborhood, and its close to the Berri UQAM subway station, IGA supermarket, and the Old Port of Montreal. The place is clean and the amenities are complete. We did not get to personally meet Marcos and Mari, we were only communicating via Airbnb's messaging yet they were still very helpful and accommodating in our questions. My husband and I highly recommend the place. We will definitely pick this place if we ever go back to Montreal.

Marcos and Mari were great, they were very attentive and made sure we had a great experience. The apartment is in a great location and looks just in good in person as it does online. Highly recommend!

Marcos and Mari were responsive, helpful and generous. They were very prompt in responding to our questions. Before the day we arrived, they sent us another note with logistical details and directions to the parking, and left an awesome hand-written note in the apartment. 
The apartment itself was modern, well designed and clean. It had everything that we needed for our short stay, including the in-door parking. The location is great - we could walk to a majority of the places we wanted to check out. Highly recommend.

Marcos and Mari's condo is the perfect home-away-from-home! They are amazing hosts, responsive and available as needed, but completely unintrusive. The condo is modern and spotless, and with the parking and proximity to the metro, it can't be beat. We hope to visit again soon!

Wonderful hosts!! Apartment was in beautiful shape. They were very accessible and left great directions for getting settled. The whole trip was improved by the ease and warmth which we felt in sharing their place. We could not have imagined a better stay!

A great place to stay in Montreal ! You are close to all the hot spots by walking but still in a very secure emplacement. The condo was super clean and there is air conditioning. It is pretty small but perfect when you are 2 or less. The host are adorable (even if I didn't meet them) and always there to answer your questions.
Pleasant initial email, OJ, chocolate, crackers and water was available, and their apartment had interesting books and wall decorations.

My stay at Marcos and Mari's apartment was very comfortable and pleasant.  The apartment is modern and very centrally located.  The entire experience was enjoyable and the check-in/check-out was seamless and flawless.  They left a nice note and some chocolates to welcome me which was a nice touch.  It felt like a home away from home and I thank them for allowing me to stay!

Host communicated quickly and was responsive with questions.  The initial access to the apt was difficult, as the call buttons to be buzzed into the building were either not working correctly, or due to the late hour, the host did not hear their call.   The unit was clean, quiet and as described.  We enjoyed our stay.  Thank you!

Marcos and Mari were great hosts from the time we booked to the time we checked out -- i.e., they answered all our questions and made sure we were all set to "check in" and "check out". Also, without prompting, they provided us with information about getting to their place from the airport (take the 747 bus). Their place was clean and cool (temperature). The building is in a great location (close to two metro stations and within walking distance to the old town). Very positive experience.
Felt incredibly welcome and loved the apartment and location - would not hesitate to stay here again with great hosts!

name: Beautiful place in Taksim/Istanbul
summary: Less than 10 min Taksim metro st, quite central. You can go everywhere easily, Cihangir, Istiklal, Galata by walking. I have a lovely cute balcony. The flat is full of light and the neighborhood is based on a safe and well known place.
description: Less than 10 min Taksim metro st, quite central. You can go everywhere easily, Cihangir, Istiklal, Galata by walking. I have a lovely cute balcony. The flat is full of light and the neighborhood is based on a safe and well known place.

host.host_about: I am an easy going person and I like to be friendly. I am graduated with a bachelor degree of art and philosophy. Reading and writing are two things I love to do. Dancing Tango and doing yoga are my hobbies, usually I never have time for them. I care about the place I live in. I think, this reallly effects most part of our motivation while struggling with other things.

name: STUNNING BEACHFRONT 2BD (3 space) APARTMENT
summary: With beach across the road, this light & airy 2BDR apartment (3 sep spaces) is the perfect getaway! 1 Queen & 2 high loft singles. 4 ppl will enjoy the coastal Sydney lifestyle. Situated near public transport plus cafes/restaurants & shops everything you need is on the doorstep! As about rates for long term
space: Our open, bright and stylish 2 bedroom  apartment (3 separate spaces) is the perfect place for your next beach holiday! It’s directly across the road from Maroubra Beach and only a few minutes walk from great cafes, restaurants, parks and playgrounds. With wooden floorboards throughout and polished concrete floors in the kitchen, the living space is chic,  yet cosy, and is the perfect place to relax and unwind. It includes an open plan lounge, dining area and kitchen with everything you need to make yourself at home. The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, dishwasher, microwave, stovetop and oven, as well as all pots, pans, crockery and cutlery you need to make any meal at home. The lounge area is complete with TV, Wifi and Netflix available for use.  The master bedroom has a queen bed, and the second bedroom has 2 single high loft beds, leaving plenty of room for 4 to stay comfortably. The bathroom has a shower. There is also a Bosch washing machine & dryer downstairs if you need t
description: With beach across the road, this light & airy 2BDR apartment (3 sep spaces) is the perfect getaway! 1 Queen & 2 high loft singles. 4 ppl will enjoy the coastal Sydney lifestyle. Situated near public transport plus cafes/restaurants & shops everything you need is on the doorstep! As about rates for long term Our open, bright and stylish 2 bedroom  apartment (3 separate spaces) is the perfect place for your next beach holiday! It’s directly across the road from Maroubra Beach and only a few minutes walk from great cafes, restaurants, parks and playgrounds. With wooden floorboards throughout and polished concrete floors in the kitchen, the living space is chic,  yet cosy, and is the perfect place to relax and unwind. It includes an open plan lounge, dining area and kitchen with everything you need to make yourself at home. The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, dishwasher, microwave, stovetop and oven, as well as all pots, pans, crockery and cutlery you need to make any meal at home.
neighborhood_overview: Maroubra is roughly 10km from the centre of Sydney, in the Eastern Suburbs. We have lived in the area for around 6 years, and we absolutely love it! It has a great community atmosphere and it's hard to walk down the street to the beach without running into people we know. We know and love lots of the cafe and restaurant owners in the area, and have made friends with lots of the neighbours.  The beach is the highlight of the area, and it's right across the street! Maroubra beach is 1km long and is popular for surfing, swimming, a BBQ, a nice spot to sit and have lunch/dinner or just a walk to get some fresh air, space and relax. It's less crowded than its neighbour up in Bondi, but no less beautiful. To the south end there is a reserve with no buildings or houses, so it's particularly beautiful looking down the sand and waves to the trees and headland. Maroubra has plenty of cafes and there are several great options for a morning coffee or brunch/lunch. If you breakfast at Marini and en
notes: - Our apartment is on the ground floor, so there are no stairs to climb - Free car parking on the street  - Column heaters available to use if it gets cold - Toys and books suitable for kids - Private rear access to apartment.
transit: Transport is very accessible. There is a bus stop right in front of the building with buses that go directly into the city (around 30-40 minutes). There's also a bus that runs directly to Bondi Junction where there is a Westfield shopping centre, and also a train station that puts you in contact with train lines across the whole city and beyond.
access: You will have access to the entire  apartment
interaction: Please contact us on AirB&B or our mobiles if you need anything during your stay.
house_rules: We love our house and have put a lot of time and effort into making it a beautiful place. We would expect you to treat it with care and respect, so as such ask: • Absolutely NO smoking inside the  apartment or around the building. There are plenty of benches near the beach across the street that you can use. Just make sure you put any rubbish in the bin, to keep Maroubra beautiful! • NO parties - we live in a quiet,  small building and our neighbours treat us with great respect. We do the same for them, and so would expect you to do the same by keeping noise to a minimum at night. Within reason, you're welcome to have friends/family over, however absolutely no parties. We have a zero tolerance for this area.  • Please be nice to our plants!!

host.host_about: We love traveling & enjoy new spots.

reviews.comments: Beautiful clean home and in an excellent spot. Host was very quick to respond and helpful. Would recommend this place.

The main reason I chose Nathan's place was the kids bedroom. When we arrived and saw it, it exceeded our expectations indeed. For those that are traveling with kids, the kids room in this apartment is any child's dream wonderland which made settling our little girl in all that much easier. The location of the beach (just across the road) made it all the more fun. 

For a small apartment, I was very impressed with how Nathan has maximised the space. The apartment has obviously been updated with quality appliances. It was my first time using an induction stove top - it was most impressive. The heated master bed was also a great luxury.

Finally, it was all the little extras that Nathan provided that made it a memorable experience. We got a large box of chocolates, quality soap and well known brand name (eco and organic) hand wash and cleaning products.

Nathan kept in contact throughout the week and even recommended local places for us to check out which was very helpful for us. Check out was also very convenient for us which was great considering we were traveling with a child.
I felt very welcome by Nathan and we had a great weekend in the city. Very stylish and clean. Perfect for what we needed. Many thanks.

Nathan's place was just what we were looking for. We stayed only two nights and alreday now would go there back. It was really like a home away home. We loved it. It was clean, cozy and everything just like told and even more. Our kids loved the kids room! April, who we met at arrival gave wetsuits and boards for our kids to borrow. Thank you also nice treats left for us. We could recommend the place everyone who likes to stay near beach in cozy relaxing place.

Nathan's charming beach-style apartment was perfect for our family weekend get away. It had everything we needed, and Nathan even added little extra touches, like the chocolates and soaps. The bus stop, right out the front, was very convenient, allowing us access to all areas of Sydney. It was also wonderful to spend the day sightseeing, and come back to Maroubra beach to relax. A fantastic spot. Thank you again Nathan, for your hospitality.

This was our first experience using Airbnb and Nathan set the bar extremely high for other hosts during our trip. My husband and I are visiting Australia from the U.S., so after our 15 hour flight, Nathan so graciously offered us an earlier check-in time to freshen up and relax. Unfortunately, we didn't get to use the early check-in because 3 hours into our arrival in Sydney, we had an accident with a roundabout and a curb. Nathan was so thoughtful and checked in on us until we received a new rental car, and he was nice enough to leave us keys for when we arrived.  Nathan's home is beautiful and very comfortable. The bed was completely cozy and we slept well during our stay. The home is literally across the street from Maroubra  beach and you can enjoy the soft sand there while watching the surfers. It is also about a 0.5 mile beautiful scenic walk to Mahon Pool and an amazing cafe called Pool Cafe that has the best coffee and breakfast/lunch to start your mornings/days. At night we could walk to any of the restaurants and bars and felt very safe, and the locals were so friendly. Overall an incredible host, a beautiful home, and a wonderful area to enjoy your vacation.

This was our first time using Airbnb and we had a really positive experience.  Nathan was very quick to respond to our messages and was very easy to deal with.  We appreciated Nathan and April's recommendations, which were very helpful.  The apartment was exactly as described.  It has been set up really nicely and is light and airy, clean and comfortable.  The kids' room in particular is great.  The apartment is in a perfect location, being just across from the beach but still quiet at night.  We really enjoyed our stay here.  Highly recommended!

This was our first time using airbnb and it was made so easy with the help of Nathan.  His responses were always so quick and helpful. This was an absolutely lovely property and was everything it said in the listing.  We felt so welcome in this home and thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Maroubra!
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nathan was a very helpful and considerate host. The flat is in a fantastic location, full of lovely things and very comfortable. He left us chocolates and some fancy soap which were nice touches. Local transport is really good and the beach is amazing.

As we were at Maroubra for a  surf competition. The location was perfect opposite the beach. Bus stop right out the front and a quick walk to shops & restaurants. The unit was clean, tidy & had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again. Nathan was very helpful.

We absolutely loved staying here. Lovely unit, great for the kids and in the perfect position for where we needed to be, with everything we needed. Nathan is a wonderful host. Thank you for having us, we hope we can stay again one day.

Totaly good and clean house. But notify , no car park, you should park your car in 4 hours limited street car park, no washing and drying machine, no view to ocean, it is located in ground level and back of the building.  Oh the important one, the door lock does NOT work well, every time you have to stay behind the door and struggle with key and lots of stress for little kids. 
Good points: lots of toys for kids, ocean sound at night, clean sheet and beautiful kangaroo skin on sitting room, candles. 
There was a laundry  with old broken washing machine that if you are expert in repairing and plumbing, you can use that area.
Was a great stay at this little beach pad. We had all we needed well located to the best end of the beach. Simple clean private access made it more like a beach house
I had an awesome stay at Nathan's home. He was very easy to work with and I'm happy I got to stay here

Thank you Nathan! We stayed the 2nd time in Nathan's home, this time the whole week and we just enjoyed. We came again, because last time/year we spent just two days and already then we falled in love with Maroubra. House location is perfect, busses leaves to Sydney just front of the house, it's next to the beach (the most important), house itself is nice, cosy and beautiful, good coffee houses nearby - eveything just perfect!! No complains- nothing at all!! Thank you for letting us stay in your great place!  Cheers Sanna and family
PS. This time we saw, actually during various of days THE whales during our morning walks :)

It is obvious that the owner has put in much love and style into their apartment and we are fortunate to be able to share it at peak times of the holiday season. The location is so convenient with the beach right across the road.

This home is a hidden gem!! Directly across from the beautiful beach with great cafes and restaurant a few hundred meters away what more could you want. 

Nathan was a wonderful host and I wouldn't hesitate to highly recommend. Thanks for the great stay.
Great place! If you have kids, this is the place : The kids room is fantastic.
Great little apartment for a family to stay at. Convenient to everything! Beaches,cafes and restaurants. Very cosy and clean. Parking was quite easy to get across the road.

Very convenient to Maroubra beach, easy walk to so many great cafes and restaurants. 
The hosts go the extra mile with hotel style toiletries , chocolates and tea.
Very clean and comfortable.
Very relaxing environment.

The place is at great location and easily accessed. The host was friendly and helpful. It might be good to let the host know in advance if you have a fair bit of luggage so that they can empty out the robes and rooms. Otherwise everything is reasonable.
Great location, nice apartment and good communication. Thanks for having us Nathan
Had a great stay at Nathan’s , great location , would stay again

Nathan’s place was awesome. Very clean and tidy, lots of homely touches, modern kitchen and across the road from the beach. Also great recommendations from Nathan of where to eat and get good coffee. It was ideal  for our family with two boys. If you want a great value beach holiday this is ideal. Our family will definately be back!!
Had a great stay .Close to beach and cafes.Nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) was really cute.

This apartment was in a fantastic location. You really could not get any closer to the beautiful beach. The bus system was also very easy with a convenient stop right outside of the apartment. Maroubra is such a cute little beach subarb that I’d love to visit again.

The whole family loved our beach holiday at Nathans place - it is literally only steps away to the beach!  If you prefer ocean baths to the beach, these are only a short walk away as well. The apartment is not large, however it is very well set up to maximise the space available. Nathan was great to communicate with, and provided lots of suggestions about places to eat and things to see.  We loved El Tora Pizza and Tapa for dinner and Crazy Rays for a morning coffee.  Parking on the street was not difficult -  even on busy days it on took 5 minutes to find a spot.  We are looking forward to visiting again.
We had a great stay at Nathan's place. Ideal location and good communication. Would happily stay again
A lovely little gem right by the sea
A perfect place for our needs. Great location, perfectly clean and tidy and very stylish. Nathan was very accommodating, easy to communicate with,  and reply’s were very prompt. Highly recommended

Nathan’s place is stunning; the perfect beachside getaway for a couple or young family to enjoy long-term or for a long weekend. We loved our stay and after two months we were very sad to leave what felt like home. Nathan and his wife and kids are simply lovely, kind people who didn’t hesitate to help us with any issues or queries. I’m still blown away that after messaging Nathan with news that the dryer had broken, he replied right away and we had a replacement THE NEXT DAY. Our baby son loved all the little hiding spots around the house. We were impressed with the style of the place, plus the HUGE amount of storage available. But our favourite part? The ocean is so close you can hear it from anywhere in the house. Thank you for a truly wonderful and memorable stay!

Nathan and April are great hosts and their place is top notch. Beachfront with a bus stop that goes almost everywhere in Sydney is tough to find. If you love the beach and surfing this is the place to go!

I had a fantastic stay at Nathan’s place, with my two nieces and brother in law. We only stayed a weekend, but it felt much longer in a good way, with morning and afternoon trips to the beach which is literally across the road, and buses outside the door into the city, the location could not be any more convenient. 

Nathan and April were also great hosts, very accommodating, fast to respond, and did everything they could to make our experience great. 

I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone looking for a beach holiday!

Great place in excellent location. So close to the beautiful beach and bus stop right by the apartment made everything easy.

There was a small issue, but the excellent communication of the owners contacted us straight away and sorted it out promptly.

Thanks for the lovely stay.

Fantastic location!  We are half way through our 2 week stay and can’t wait to book again. Nathan & April are super hosts for a reason!  Beautiful Maroubra Beach is right across the street, saltwater pools are a 5 minute walk as are plenty of charming cafes. No need for a car, walk or use the bus that stops directly in front of the apartment.  Great for families & couples.

We cannot wait to return to this charming apartment!  Nathan and April go above and beyond as hosts.  Great location, easy public transport and excellent value. Amazing beach across the street, great for families and or couple retreat. Cafes galore, tics all the boxes for a great getaway.

name: #Old City#Authentic Duplex #Terrace
summary: The apartment is the loft style and it has 2 bedrooms + 1 living room + 1 big terrace +  2 bathroom .There are 2 air condition systems and 2 TV in the apartment. The terrace has a nice city view and this terrace is only for your usage,it is not shared with other residents of the building and it is safe, Sleeping Arrangements : 1 bedroom  1 doube bed 1 bedroom  2 single bed (bunk bed) 1 living room  2 sofabeds + 1 coach There is also folding bed. 1 person
space: Hello, There is an available dublex apartment located on Aksaray which is close to Sultanahmet,Blue Mosque,Hagia Sophia,Grand Bazaar and so on.The area is very central and quiet,the apartment is on the 4th floor , there is no elevator in building,it is newly furnished&designed and the theme of the apartment is inspried from the beauty of Istanbul.The apartment is exactly as it is seen from the pictures and you will also find it clean&tidy when you check-in. The apartment is the loft style and it has 2 bedrooms + 1 living room + 1 big terrace +  2 bathroom .There are 2 air condition systems and 3 TV in the apartment. The terrace has a nice city view and this terrace is only for your usage,it is not shared with other residents of the building and it is safe,there are steels that prevents entrance of here from other buildings.Once you look at the city,you can feel the soul of Istanbul among such old buildings that cover around the building. Sleeping Arrangements : 1 bedroom  1 doube bed 1
description: The apartment is the loft style and it has 2 bedrooms + 1 living room + 1 big terrace +  2 bathroom .There are 2 air condition systems and 2 TV in the apartment. The terrace has a nice city view and this terrace is only for your usage,it is not shared with other residents of the building and it is safe, Sleeping Arrangements : 1 bedroom  1 doube bed 1 bedroom  2 single bed (bunk bed) 1 living room  2 sofabeds + 1 coach There is also folding bed. 1 person Hello, There is an available dublex apartment located on Aksaray which is close to Sultanahmet,Blue Mosque,Hagia Sophia,Grand Bazaar and so on.The area is very central and quiet,the apartment is on the 4th floor , there is no elevator in building,it is newly furnished&designed and the theme of the apartment is inspried from the beauty of Istanbul.The apartment is exactly as it is seen from the pictures and you will also find it clean&tidy when you check-in. The apartment is the loft style and it has 2 bedrooms + 1 living room + 1 big t
neighborhood_overview: Tüm toplu taşımanın merkezinde.bütün turistik yerlere yürüyerek gitme imkanı.havvaalanı direkt metro var
notes: smoking only allowed on the balcony
transit: Eski şehir merkezi,turistik yerlere yürüyerek gitme imkanı
access: Tamamını
interaction: 7/24 iletişim kurup soru sorabilirler
house_rules: *smoking only allowed on the balcony * You should not bother the neighbours and you should act them respectful in the building. * You should use the apartment properly.

host.host_about: I am living in Istanbul. I just joined Airbnb a month ago and I am really excited to host international people in this great city.

reviews.comments: Central location, clean flat, nice terrace, kind people, very reactive... I recommend

This apartment itself is very beautiful, very clean and with beautiful furnitured, friendly colour, lovely decorated and warm welcoming its guest when arrived after some steps to climb (not problem for me but might be important for people to know). It made our stay very comfortable. The kitchen is nice and well equiped and ready to use. The bathrooms are great as there is a toilet on the first floor and an additional toilet with shower on the second floor next to the master bedroom. Also this room is very nice, I was very surprised and happy when I saw that beautiful room. But above everything else I loved the terrace which really provides enough space. It was so wonderful to enjoy breakfast in the morning there. Nice and typical shops around the apartment made it easy to get everything for preparing meals and also many restaurants around make it easy if you didn't want to be far away from your apartment in the night after a bustling day in the city. Although the surrounding of Aksaray is not what everyone wishes as it is well known to be a conservative place and also a meltingpot for certain illegals. Although I want to mention that I always at every time of the day and in the night felt very safe in this area where I stayed with my 13 years old son, that the apartment is on a good location, that I felt like being a part of Istanbul and not just a tourist, getting a bit of the feeling of a real life in that wonderful city and I would love to stay there again.

Great apartment within walking distance of all the main attractions. Its in a locals area so there's lots of great restaurants nearby which are really good value. There isn't a lift and the apartment is on the top floor. But you soon get used to it and my elderly mother coped ok. The outside terrace was a welcome place to decamp with a beer after a busy day in Istanbul.

This is a very nice loft apartment near the city center. My girlfriend and I were very impressed by the apartment itself, and absolutely loved the roof terrace in the mornings and evenings. The only drawback is that places were a bit further to walk to than advertised, but everything was still close enough that we never needed to take public transport or a cab.

The loft is quite nice and cozy place for our 5 girls staying for a night in Istanbul. it's easy to take 5min walk to the Airport Subway line and Tram station. We didn't meet Onur in person but made phone call with each other and his friend's father took care of us very well.
Thank you. We will visit again in future.

Симпатичная квартира в районе Аксарай. Удобная и просторная, места достаточно для двух человек. Тем не менее, можно разместить и три. 
Просторная терраса, уютная гостиная. Всегда горячая вода в душе - это очень важно. 
Проблем с заселением не было. Мы были хорошо приняты и нам все объяснили. 
Рядом красивая мечеть и видом на закат и город. 
   Из небольших минусов: нужна хорошая сковорода на кухне) для удобства приготовления пищи)) 
Хорошая, уютная квартира, рекомендую!

Onur was very friendly and very easy to reach, via email or What's app. We didn't meet but he had someone else at the apartment who met us there and gave us the keys. The apartment itself was nice, pretty much as shown in the photos. All in all we had a nice staying, even though I wouldn't recommend Aksaray as the perfect neighborhood for tourists in Istanbul.

we really liked it here: spacious, clean, well-decorated, right next to airport metro and main tram line 1, quiet at night, normal neighbourhood, good and responsive host, attractive price. Highly recommended. Just two small remarks: if you like your bedroom dark in the morning bring a sleeping mask as there are just sunshades/privacy screens. And the dinner table is on the terrace, wonderful in summer but maybe not in winter. Again, recommended. Best for 3 people, as there is a master bedroom for 2 and a small bedroom for 1. However there are extra beds.

The apartment is large enough to accommodate we six people. Rooms are clean and equipment with everything you need. Hence we can cook ourselves during the days. However, if you don't want to cook yourself, there are lots of restaurants and small shops. In addition,the location is not bad ( 15 min walking to grand bazaar and 30 min to blue mosque).

Clean flat where we felt good during our 8-days stay. Made to rent, not "owner's place". Nice terrace which we did not use (we stayed in December). Kitchen well equipped. Correct wifi. Tram and Subway to Airport very near to the flat. The area is not the safest or cleanest we know in Istanbul, but we never felt bad (3 women). A small market is open 24hours and other small Turkish and Kurdish restaurants are all around. 

We did not meet Onur in person, but he has been very responsive when we had questions (such as how to operate a machine where everything is written in Turkish). 

Bear in mind that the flat is on the 4th floor with no lift (especially if you are traveling with heavy luggage) and that there is a steep, uneven-stepped interior staircase leading to shower, main bedroom and terrace. There is one tiny one-bed bedroom downstairs, and a master's bedroom upstairs where the shower+toilet+sink is also located. One additional toilet+ sink downstairs. Decoration was not our favorite but all is clean and probably quite new, so this only an opinion, a matter of taste.. As everywhere in Istanbul, tap water is not drinkable, so you also have to carry water bottles upstairs. 

Recommended flat.. to people with good legs!

We were seven total persons (4 adults, 3 children [4, 6 & 9]) who stayed in the apartment. It was very roomy, and was very pleasant. All bedding and linens were clean and new. 

Onur and his friends were very helpful and very responsive. They helped arrange airport transport, and several of our local needs. I would definitely stay here again!

The apartment was very nice. The district was a very muslim one, but we haven't got any problems. It is very easy to reach from Ataturk airport (line red, Aksaray stop), a little more difficult from SAW airport. It is well connected with all Istanbul zones, for example the T1 line (blue) is very close and it takes you to Sultanahmet and Topkapi within few minutes.We never met Onur, but we were welcomed by Mr. Ibrahim father, a nice man. There is wi-fi in the apartment. The little terrace is very confortable and the view is very nice. We found the apartment kind of clean at our arrival, we only had some problems with a few ants in the kitchen and in the two bathrooms.

Très bon accueil, logement confortable et bien équipé, bien situé dans un quartier populaire mais tranquille, la terrasse est très agréable.
Le logement est à deux pas du métro vers Ataturk et du Tramway vers Sultanahmet, Galata ... .
Pour ceux qui aiment marcher on peut aussi aller à Sultanahmet à pied, une grosse demi heure de marche sur une avenue commerçante, à mi chemin on passe devant le grand bazar.
Une bonne adresse !

Very welcoming, comfortable and well equipped accommodation, located in a popular but quiet area, the terrace is very nice. 
The accommodation is close to the metro to Ataturk and the tram to Sultanahmet, Galata .... 
For those who enjoy walking you can also go to Sultanahmet on foot, around half-hour walking on a shopping street, halfway you can visit the Grand Bazaar. 
A good place!

merci à Ibrahim, Onur et son cousin pour l'accueil chaleureux dès notre arrivée. Appartement super sympa bien clean, et confortable. Dommage nous n'avons pas profité de la terrasse le début de notre séjour était vraiment très froid et pluvieux. Situation idéale métro, tram à côté, et surtout le quartier très populaire et peu touristique nous a emballées. nous avons mangé pour 3 fois rien dans une "petite cantine" c'était délicieux. Je recommande cet appartement, et j'ai déjà donné les coordonnées à 1 ami qui doit venir sur Istanbul. merci Ibrahim c'était super bien.
A bientôt si je reviens...Nicole

Ibranhim's place was clean, spacious and centrally located on top of a 5 story building.  It is in an ultra local neighborhood with lot of local restraurant, street food and fruit vendors and apprantly popular internet cafes. Truly local experience, though carrying lots of luggage all the way up was a bit work. Ibranhim himself is very communicative and went extra miles to order airport transportation for us, which saved us lots of hassle.

Everything was perfect. Ibrahim gave us full instructions to get to his flat, he also called me back and met us at the metro station. Very kind and very good person! The stay was perfect. No questions, no problems.

The apartment is amazing, it's super clean, beautiful, and spacious. The terrace is the best place to hang out when we are "home." The location is very convenient, less than 5 min walking distance to the red line subway, which is direct to Antarturk airport, 5 min walking distance to the tram, many buses around to Tuksim and other attractions. Many restaurants close by. The building is in safe area.  
Mr Ibrahim and his father are very friendly and helpful. I would love to go back to this apartment anytime I have chance to visit Istanbul.

Nice apartment in a nice area! Vibrate atmosphere, close to shops, metro and tramway. The apartement was clean, and quiet. The terrace was great!  Perfect for our long week end! The landlord was available and responsive.
Very nice flat, close to the centre of the city. The hosts are great and helpful.

The area was easily reachable from the airport by the Red line metro, but was a little difficult to find upon arrival. Definitely have a map and walking directions with you, and be sure to search for the Askaray METRO stop - there is also a nearby Aksaray TRAM stop, which is not the same! We did not meet Ibrahim, but were met outside and let into the apartment by his father who was very kind and helpful. The apartment was beautiful and clean, exactly as pictured in the photos and provided more than enough space for our three person group. The apartment also included two air conditioners, which cooled the apartment quickly and were great to come home to after a long, hot Istanbul summer day. The highlight of this place was definitely the lovely terrace. It was a perfect place to relax and overlook the city. The only real drawback about the apartment was its location - while the main sights of the old city were reachable by foot (25 minutes to Sultanahmet square) and by tram (5-10 minutes to Sultanahmet), the tram does not run all night and this made returning to the apartment after a long night out somewhat difficult. But the walk is easy, and passes right by the Grand Bazaar! Would recommend this apartment for guests who do not mind a little exercise (it is on the top floor, and you will be doing a fair bit of walking if you would like to skip the tram) and for whom outdoor space is a priority - I will repeat, the terrace really was spectacular. Thanks for everything, Ibrahim!

This is a perfect appartment for travelling with teenagers. After a long day of visiting the sites the terrasse is perfect for relaxing and watching life go by in a lively local neighbourhood.
The appartment is clean and comfortable and two tramway stations from historical centre. Also very quiet and well equiped

Le logement est bien situé par rapport aux principaux sites touristiques d'Istanbul .l'appartement est propre  et bien équipé. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié les dîners sur la terrasse!
Un grand merci à Ibrahim d'avoir organisé les transferts aller et retour du logement vers l'aéroport.

The flat was really nice and like it was written in the description. It was very close to the main sights and main means of transport. We liked the terrace very much for our meals and the washing machine was quite helpful during the hot days. 
The flat was clean and the interior lovely. WIFI was very fast and worked properly. There also were towels in the flat. 
The owner of the flat was very nice and answered our requests immediately.

Séjour sans problème. Appartement conforme à la description.
Une terrasse très agréable après une journée de visite.
L'appartement est très bien situé, au carrefour des grandes lignes de transport en commun. Merci à Ibrahim et son père pour leur accueil.

Очень благодарны Ибрагиму!! Отличная квартира, все, что нужно - есть, все работает, чистая и ухоженная, терраса бесподобна! Ни одно из ожиданий не было омрачено. Район хороший, не шумнее, чем весь остальной Стамбул и совсем рядом с линией трамваев, которые использовали как основной транспорт. До Султанахмета пешком не больше 20 минут легким шагом. Поначалу беспокоили хозяина телефонными звонками с различными вопросами, чтобы побыстрей освоиться в Стамбуле, всегда отвечал и помогал. Рекомендуем эту квартиру, надежная и приятная, можно было расслабиться и погрузиться в отдых.

We have had a splendid week in Istanbul. The flat is very well located close to tram and tube, and you easily get arround in the city from here. We were 4 persons in the flat, and appart from the low celing in the bath it was perfect for us, especially the roofterras we enjoyed. The neighbourhood is a little shabby, but when you get to know it, charming in it's own way. You can relay on Ibrahim - and his father mr. Memmet is friendly and abel to explain the basic thing without knowing one word english.

Well, just returned from Istanbul, apartment of mr. Ibrahim Yazici is very nice, very comfortable in any case. I estimate it as highest one! If I should visit Istanbul again, would be my pleasure to rent same apartment. Thank you mr. Yazici!

Ibrahim arranged for a car to pick us up at the airport which was very nice.  The apartment was pretty close to what was shown in the pictures.  The outdoor patio was not as nice as shown in the pictures.  It wasn't very clean and there was no grill.  The one major complaint that we had was that the apartment smelled like cigarettes...which wasn't helped by the fact that Ibrahim was smoking in it when we arrived.  There is no elevator and the apartment is on the top floor.  The neighborhood was ok...looked a little rough but we felt safe.  The train line is about a 5-10 minute walk from the apartment which was nice.

If we go back to Istanbul we would stay at Ibrahim's again.

My first try on Airbnb. It was amazing. The location is so perfect that we can easily find the transportation. I am so lucky to live in such a beautiful and spacious house with the low costs. Ibrahim is very easy going and kind to our family. Thanks a lot.

Many thanks to Ibrahim and his father for a lovely few days.  Breakfast on the balcony, the call to prayer, quiet rooms and a great area of the city all created a perfect stay.  We loved the fact that we were one of the few tourists in the area and the restaurant owners appreciated our attempts at Turkish.  Even when our daughter was ill on the last day he allowed us to rest in another apartment until we were ready to leave. Enjoy the beautiful city and accommodations.

First of all I would like to thank Ibrahim for hosting us.  I travelled with my friends (5 of us) and we just loved the apartment!  It was clean, we had everything we needed in the apartment.  It was cold outside the day we arrived (which was actually early in the morning) and the apartment was so warm and cozy.  Ibrahim was an amazing host.  He met us early in the morning, showed us around the apartment and explained everything.  After that we had the apartment all to ourselves. 
The apartment was exactly as described and exactly as you see in the pictures. It's a walk up apartment, you get a bit of exercise walking up and down, but it is worth every bit of it. The neighborhood is safe. 
Every public transportation that exists in Istanbul is in a short walking distance from Ibrahim's place. The apartment is less than 3-min-walk from Aksaray subway (metro), which by the way takes you straight to Ataturk Airport :) SOOO convenient.  Tram is less than 5-min-walk from the apartment and plenty of bus stops around going to different directions.  
If you need grocery shopping, stores are in the neighborhood. 

We've already recommended the apartment to others, and they already booked it.  Next time we are in Istanbul and in need of the apartment, definitely staying at Ibrahim's place. 
Thank you very much for such an amazing experience.  This was not my first time using AirBNB, but it was for all my friends and they were amazed how great everything worked out :) 
It was home away from home :)

Жили в этой квартире с 30 апреля по 6 мая. Квартира отличная, все что нужно есть. Понравилось, что отец Ибрагима встретил нас, проводил в кафе где очень вкусно и недорого кормят. Когда у нас забилась раковина, Ибрагим пришел и все исправил. И квартира и хозяин оставили только положительные впечатления. С удовольствием рекомендую эту квартиру. И если поедем еще раз в Стамбул, постараюсь остановиться именно тут.
Кстати фотографии настоящие. Посмотрели на них еще раз))

Genuine Turkish district Aksaray will make you love Turkey as it is. We were the only foreigners in the neighbourhood during our stay and almost no one around could speak English. Despite all that it's wonderful experience. 

Lots of food nearby will make your stomach happy and transportation will quickly move you to most of the places.

Останавливались в квартире Ибрагима на 10 дней в мае. Нам все очень понравилось, замечательная квартире в центре, уютная и приятная, там есть все, что нужно для жизни и даже больше! Веранда под крышей выше всяких похвал, очень понравилась! Большое спасибо Ибрагиму и его папе за гостеприимность и доброе отношение. Очень внимательные и радушные хозяева!
Really well located apartment, close to public transports, shops and restaurants. The terasse is just great. Ibrahim was on the spot to hand over the keys and explain us how it works. Thanks.

L'appartement d'Ibrahim était très bien.  Il est un peu à l'extérieur de la zone touristique, mais facilement accessible par le tramway (10 min).  Son père nous a gentillement accueilli dès notre sorti du métro. La seule chose qui nous a déplu c'est le confort du matelas.

If you want to feel like you have really lived in Turkey this is the place to stay.
5 of us stayed at the apt. for 6 nites.   The view from the terrace, the neighborhood, the complete furnishings in the apartment and the proximity to all public transport were the highlights.  Ibrahim was helpful in giving us information about metro and tram transportation so it was easy to move around Istanbul.  Everything you might ever want or need can be found within 2 blocks, even passport photos!
Once you have conquered the stairs the apartment is ideal.  Buy some bread, kofte, kabobs, hummus and wine and enjoy sunset on the terrace.

Beskrivningen var korrekt, , Ibrahims (familj) medhjälpare var trevliga, jag hade inte så mycket kontakt med Ibrahim själv. Omar tog emot oss när vi kom, hjälpte oss med väskorna.
Det är nära till det mesta  sevärdheter.
Vi hade problem med air kondition, tyvärr fixades det inte i god tid.
Lägenheten är fin men behöver lite uppfräschning.

Our apartment in Istanbul was everything we anticipated. Ibrahim's father met us at the nearby (5 minute walk) Aksaray Metro Station. The apartment was clean, cozy and a great balcony which we used to eat meals. The neighborhood was alive with people. Markets and shops were nearby for last minute needs.  The apartment was again close to public transportation, both Metro and Tram and we used it to get to locations of interest. BTW, we took the Metro from Ataturk Airport directly to our apartment. Very easy.

Ibrahim was very attentive when the air conditioning unit in the upstairs bedroom was not working effectively. He engaged a serviceman to repair the unit and although it wasn't fixed totally during our stay, we made the most of it by sleeping (four of us) downstairs where the air conditioning worked perfectly.

If you are looking for a nice unit in that area of Istanbul, Ibrahim's Airbnb is a good value.
great location

The location is really great as there is both subway and tramway in walking distance and then the historical center is only 15 minutes away. 
We appreciated also having breakfast on the roof of the duplex with an outstanding view on Istanbul ... even if we had to climb 4 flood by stairs ! Luckily Ibrahim's family was so helpful with our luggage.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed in this apartment together with 5 other people and we had a great time! 
Ibrahim is an attentive host, who turned our stay in a truly pleasant experience. Ibrahim also arranged a transfer from the airport which saved us lots of time and hassle. 
Apartment is exactly what it looks like on pics. Highly  recommend for big groups (5-6 people); good location; amazing terrace!

Были в Стамбуле с 4 по 9 сентября. Поскольку программа была достаточно насыщенной и мы предполагали пользоваться общественным транспортом, несомненный плюс - близость станций метро и трамвая. наслаждались прекрасным закатом, сидя на террасе. Квартира полностью соответствует представленным на сайте фотографиям. Ибрагим организовал нам по нашей просьбе трансфер, папа Ибрагима встретил. Все хорошо. Мы остались довольны.

Great apartment, Superb landlord and very good location.
My girlfriends and I stayed at Ibrahim's apartment for 2 nights. I arrived in the airport and took metro about 40 mins to the apartment. Ibrahim greets me in the front of station. The apartment has a very cute Terrance that you can enjoy your breakfast, have a glass wine at night to look out the city. Ibrahim was very helpful to give us recommendations of restaurants and places to go. Since my girlfriends' flight was 6 hours later to arrive. Ibrahim was very kind to stay with me and even ordered food, take me to local store. He was alway want to make sure that we are safe and willing to help with anything. This is very important to 3 girls who don't travel that much. The apartment is very clean and comfortable. wifi works great. The location is very convenient. You can walk to T1 station and go to everywhere. 
Anyway, Ibrahim's apartment is a must stay place in Istanbul.

Отдыхали в квартире Ибрагима с 1.10-05.10 компанией из 5 человек. Квартира полностью соответствует фотографиям и описанию - очень уютная и вместительная, со всем необходимым для бытовых нужд. А терасса на крыше великолепный бонус! Проблем с заселением не было никаких - папа Ибрагима встретил нас возле метро и проводил до дома (метро в 5 минутах ходьбы). Ибрагим разрешил ранее заселение, что очень помогло, т.к. прилетали в 7 утра. Моя личная рекомендация этого места!

The location was good to go everywhere. The facilities were a little old but convenient. The kitchen was spacious to cook a meal. Two problems were the hot watercontrolling and unlocking the door. As the weather is getting cold and I have two sons, we had difficulty controlling the water temperature while taking a shower and unlocking the door with the key. So I advise the host to change the lock and the key. But overall, the price was reasonable.
Ibrahim was most helpful and cooperative

房子地理位置很便利,位于aksaray站附近,周围有写小超市,可以买些生活必需品和食物,那里的人都很友善,硬是要帮忙把水背到五楼｡从机场坐地铁M1约40min,坐轻轨T1可到达各种景点,2站到达大巴扎,4-5站到达蓝色清真寺､圣玛利亚教堂,老皇宫,也可以坐到新皇宫等等｡房子有两层,虽然面积不大,但是家具设计可以充分利用空间,设备很齐全,厨房､洗衣机应有尽有,还有地图等提供｡房东也很友善,我们到的那天是房东慈祥的爸爸在地铁站接我们的,房东在一楼等着迎接我们,把行李箱扛上了五楼!我们那重重的四个行李箱子,扛得他满身是汗｡本来是因为阳台想来个火锅盛宴,但是因为11月天气太冷,最终只能窝在客厅草草了事了｡二楼有一件主卧,里面是一张大床,还有备用的折叠单人床,旁边就是很大的阳台,可以晾衣服,早上起来,去看看朝阳,风景不错哦,还时不时有海鸥飞过｡下一层就是厨房客厅,还有一个单人间,客厅的沙发可以摊开变成两张沙发床,另外一个沙发展开就是餐桌｡两层楼都有厕所,但是只有上面的带有浴室,水很大,24小时热水提供｡确实是外出旅游不错的选择!
kendi evimde gibi hissettim. ev sunulmuş fotoğraflarla aynıdır. semt olarak çok merkezidir. ulaşım her yere kolay tavsiye ederim.

Very good communication, very good locality - close to the public transportation, walking distance from the sight seeing.
Comfortable and good equiped flat. Only the second bedroom and its bed was too small for 2 people. But it was resolved with folding sofa in the living room.
I would highly recommend!

Очень хороший гостеприимный хозяин! Разрешил чуть раньше заселиться и чуть позже выселиться! Квартира полностью соответствует фото и описанию и очень теплая! Учитывая что мы были зимой, для Турции это очень актуально! Удобное транспортное сообщение, да и сам район удобен в плане наличия как маленьких магазинчиков, кафе и закусочных, так и наличием сетевых магазинов Бим и Мигрос.
Very nice, the flat is great and Ibrahim very kind

Очень приятно, когда в чужом городе тебя встречают с улыбкой и помогают в решении твоих проблем. Это дорогого стоит. Спасибо большое. Квартира нам понравилась. Соответствует описанию, к сожалению не смогли воспользоваться террасой из за погоды.

Nice apartment,  a bit small but for this price you can't get any better.  It was clean and the location is perefect.  You can walk to old part of istanbul and metro station is 100m from apartment and you can go everywhere.  At the time we were there safety was not an issue,  we felt that everything is normal.

We would be regretting if we had cancelled our trip do to recent suicide attacks in Turkey. 
The atmosphere was as good as we expected. Peaceful city and helpful people. That's why I love Istanbul more than anywhere else in the world. The hospitality, care, respect, food, sightseeing, transportation... all excellent. 
We have been collected from "Aksaray" Metro Station. All went well. Electricity, hot/cold water, everything is as advertised. We have been given the keys and nobody disturbed us during our stay. The home had all necessities, including cutlery, dishes, bed sheets, toiletries etc. 
The place is around 2-3 minutes walking distance to "Aksaray" Metro Station and around 7-9 minutes walking distance to "Yenikapi"-  "Marmaray" station where you can go to "Asian side" in 10 minutes by Marmaray Trains. 
There are many restaurants within 5 minutes walking distance to Ibrahim's house, open till midnight with selection of excellent Mediterranean cuisine. 
Terrace was lovely. Internet as well very fast. 
Whoever rents Ibrahim's place, please make sure you water the plants inside the premises and on the terrace. They should not be left unattended, because they are lovely flowers. :) 
Also the main entrance is secured and the doors are double doors with multiple locks. So, security is not an issue.
Réception délicate et aucun contact avec le propriétaire. la personne connaissait à peine l'appartement. Manque également de propreté sur les accessoires. Juste correct

The apartment located no so far from Aksarai station where you can easily get from airport. There are quiet at evening but just a little bit noisy at morning (I think it's connected with construction works). Apartment are clean and good equipped.
Ibrahim is a good host which is ready help you and to answer your question even when they aren't related to apartment.
Ibrahim's flat is really cool, with an amazing rooftop, the location is great as well. Everything was as seen on the pictures and very clean. Thanks again for letting us stay!

Très convenable, photos fiables. 
Nous ne sommes pas arrivés à faire fonctionner le wifi. 
L'échange de clés s'est fait avec le père d'Ibrahim qui ne parle pas anglais, dommage pour gagner des infos sur la ville.

The apartment is in a perfect location in Aksaray ; close to all the eating places ; the metro and all transportation options ; the Historia Mall with a Starbucks , Zara and Bershka is within walking distance ;   2 hammams close by; money changers are also close by and eating places and groceries everywhere you look; the blue line takes you to the grand bazaar in 2 stops, 4 stops to the Hagia Sophia and blue mosque; and 7 stops to the Galata bridge ;
The roof top terrace is great to watch the sunset and relax after a day of sightseeing ; although the apartment is on the 4th floor and does not have an elevator it is still worth it; Ibrahim's dad met out shuttle driver around the corner and guided our van to the apartment ; everyone in the neighborhood is nice and assisting ; would stay again

Good day All,
I would like to say for Ibrahim and his father.
Thank you very much for your support and help during my stay in your apartment.
They response very fast for any request, also they are very respectable
The apartment located in excellent location.
Near metro, tram and bus stations, also all services such as supermarkets, restaurants and markets are around the apartment a maximum of 5 minutes walk.

Communication with Ibrahim was superb every step of the way.  We were met as promised at the Metro Station by Ibrahim's friend and his father Mehmet.  In true Turkish helpful style Mehmet carried my case!! The apartment is in a superb location to discover the City.  Close to the metro, tram and bus routes which are very cheap and efficient services for exploring. The neighborhood is lively and vibrant.  The restaurant across the road (Mezlam Duner) is a must, great food, enormous quantities and friendly staff.  The apartment was very well equipped, clean and tidy and felt welcoming, and was exactly as described in the listing.  We loved the roof terrace, great advantage for a 180 degree view of the surrounding area.  A great stay and we would love to come back again.

Спасибо большое за гостеприимство!
Расположение жилья удобное относительно метро, транспорта и достопримечательностей.
Квартира уютная, чистая, и терраса - это супер, самое удачное в этом жилье это наличие террасы где можно отдохнуть.......только 5 этаж без лифта - это утомительно ...хотя есть своего рода фитнес)))))
Çok teşekkürler!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Great location!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Très bon séjour !

Ibrahim's place is located near several of Istanbul's most known attractions. His home was clean and cozy making it a good place to retreat at the end of a day full of sightseeing. Also located close to a market!

Excelente apartamento. Muy bie ubicado. Nos movimos a pie a algunos de los lugares más pintorescos de la ciudad (AgiaSofia, Blue Mosque, Gran Bazar,etc) Igualmente está realmente muy próximo a estaciones de metro, paradas de Omnibus y tranvía.

A su vez, Ibrahim estuvo muy atento a solucionar cualquier inconveniente que pudiera surgir.

MUY recomendable!

I loved staying in this apparent for many reasons specially the location.  The apartment is 5 minutes walk to Aksary metro station and also Aksary Tram station. Other public transportation is very close.  The location is very close to restaurants and shops.  You just get down on the street and you will find anything you want. The most thing I like is Ibrahim himself.  He is so helpful and kind and I can't thank him enough for the help and the time he gave  me during the 7days I stayed in the apparent.

It's a nice place with good location, close to Aksaray Metro station. Please be aware that the flat is on 4th floor, no elevator in this building, stairs are narrow. The host - Ibrahim is very friendly, helpful and easy to communicate.

La terrasse etait appreciable majs a été inondé de par l absence d évacuation d eau.

Le logement eqt au 4 eme sans ascenseur et ne disposait d aménagement poir personne a mobilite reduite.

Quartier populaire avec les inconvénients qui vont avec (station aksarai)

Place  is very very conveniently located, within few minutes walk to
Aksaray metro station and the Tram way. Apartment is well furnished and
is comfortable for a short stay. Highly recommended!

Good place .clean .safe area
Near from metro station 
Only -ve it's in 4 flour
Everything excelent
Apartment is accurate described. It has enough space with nice terrace, good location, not far from transportation. Thanks to Ibrahim for a good place, we had a good time.
Un bel appart au centre du quartier fatih. L'hôte (Ibrahim) est quelqu'un de super sympa. Nous avons eu des problèmes concernant notre heure d'arrivée mais tout s'est super bien passé.

ibrahim è stato con noi cortese e disponibile
la casa è nel cuore del quartiere di fatih
ideale per chi vuole conoscere la turchia più vera
francesca

Отдыхали вдвоем с женой. Попали в дни праздника Курбан Байрам. Если кто-то опасается шума, то это не для него. Рядом несколько мечетей, слышно все очень-очень хорошо, внизу гуляют, шумят, начиная с заходом солнца и, такое впечатление, что до утра! квартира на 4 этаже без лифта, лестничные пролеты очень узкие (для одного человека) - это надо учитывать! В квартире нам всего хватило, все , что было в описании. Большой плюс - терасса - там мы и проводили то время, когда возвращались домой. Состояние квартиры среднее, но с учетом, что это центр старого города, близко все исторические места - одно другим компенсировалось. Ибрагим встретил, разместил и даже позволил на несколько часов задержаться при выезде. За что ему отдельное спасибо!!

Muy bien ubicado, cerca de medioa de transportes variados, el barrio es una mezcla entre residencial y comercial, bastante pintoresco. Ibrahim fue un gran anfitrion que si bien no nos conocimos estuvo muy atento a lo que pudiesemos necesitar. Nos es un gran departamento, pero es comodo
房东人很好很热情,还帮我们订好去机场的车｡附近交通还算便利,走路去圣索菲亚大教堂和蓝色清真寺大概二三十分钟｡附近餐厅也很多｡
Recommended, but area does feel woman friendly.
Pics are totally deceiving.
Great & very central location that will allow you to easily access all the major tourist spots in Istanbul.
Рекомендую! Хорошее место и радушный хозяин! Удобная локация, отличный вид, тихие соседи! Обязательно приедем к Ибрагиму еще!
It is a good apartment.

Pasamos con 5 amigas tres hermosos días en Estambul, el departamento de Ibrahim es hermoso , luminoso, cálido, lindo decorado, con toallas y sabanas limpias, bien ubicado, zona segura. Ibrahin se encargo de nuestros traslados desde el aeropuerto a un muy bajo costo y personas muy amables ! 
Super recomendable
房东很友好 房子的地理位置很便利,离地铁站很近｡房东会告诉我们哪里买东西便宜 很热情｡
Все супер! спасибо большое! Очень приятный человек и приятное жилье!

Жили у Ибрагима больше недели, 4 взрослых и маленький ребенок. 
Очень удобное место. Все транспортные развязки рядом, достопримечательности 5 минут на трамвае и или 30 минут пешком. Рядом огромное количество кафе, несколько больших продуктовых магазинов. 
Большой плюс квартиры - терраса. 
Хозяин - очень общительный, приятный человек. Всегда был на связи. Отдельное спасибо за подарок в виде трансфера в аэропорт. Рекомендую.
Отзывчивый хозяин,отличное расположение квартиры.
Close to metro station. Quite and safe streets.

We really enjoyed our stay at Ibrahim's place. The apartment was as described and suited our family of 6 very well. The location was great with easy access to public transportation, and many restaurants and shopping within walking distance. Thanks for allowing us to stay in your place it made our Istanbul stay all the more memorable.

The apartment's location is very good - close to the old market,  2 minutes from metro - good stores and food are close by. We had 6 people - a little  more for that apartment but we accommodated well. The balcony is cool.  Apartment is safe. If we would go to Istanbul again we stay in the same apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Très bon accueil, logement confortable et bien équipé. Salle d’eau refait à neuf. 
Bien situer dans un quartier cosmopolite et tranquille. On n’a pas pu profiter de la terrasse en décembre. Le temps ne le permettait pas .
Logement prêt de ( Metro , tram et bus ). Logement pas adapter pour les handicapés. 
Je recommande vivement ce logement.

Clean appartement where we felt good during our-8 days stay.
Very good reception of Ibrahim, well intention and responsive.
The apartment is confortable and well equipped. Correct WiFi access.
Tram and metro to blue mosque very near to the flat.

name: QUIET SERENE GOLF COURSE KONA CCLUB
summary: At Keauhou's end of Alii Drive.  Golf course frontage condo on the ground level with large covered patio with your own personal BBQ and quiet serene setting on the golf course at Kona Country Club.  Near Sheraton, beaches, and Keauhou Bay.
space: This lovely Hawaiiana style ground level condo is very spacious.  A long wall of windows and sliders in the living and dining areas.  2 comfortable bedrooms, king, queen, each has an adjacent bath, and they are private from each other as the living room space separates them.  There is a queen sofabed in the living room for the kids if needed.
description: At Keauhou's end of Alii Drive.  Golf course frontage condo on the ground level with large covered patio with your own personal BBQ and quiet serene setting on the golf course at Kona Country Club.  Near Sheraton, beaches, and Keauhou Bay. This lovely Hawaiiana style ground level condo is very spacious.  A long wall of windows and sliders in the living and dining areas.  2 comfortable bedrooms, king, queen, each has an adjacent bath, and they are private from each other as the living room space separates them.  There is a queen sofabed in the living room for the kids if needed. Full use of the condo.  We provide you an access code for the lockbox prior to your arrival date, and you let yourselves in.  Private free assigned parking space. Really simple! The condo will be ready for you on your arrival date, and cleaned after your departure, its up to you in-between.  We leave you alone unless you need us! Quiet and safe neighborhood on the golf course at the Kona Country Club. A short wa
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and safe neighborhood on the golf course at the Kona Country Club. A short walk to the Sheraton Keauhou Hotel with some great restaurants and bars, spa facilities, etc.  Keauhou Bay is a pristine spot in walking distance, a favorite for kayaking access, or taking the Tradewinds snorkel tour to Kealakakua bay where you may be swimming with dolphins if you get lucky!
notes: TAT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) TAT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Most travelers rent a car at the airport, but there are cabs, shuttle busses, and tours around the islands.  Check (Website hidden by Airbnb) for things going on in the area during your stay.  For car rentals, we recommend booking online with (Website hidden by Airbnb)
access: Full use of the condo.  We provide you an access code for the lockbox prior to your arrival date, and you let yourselves in.  Private free assigned parking space. Really simple!
interaction: The condo will be ready for you on your arrival date, and cleaned after your departure, its up to you in-between.  We leave you alone unless you need us!
house_rules: NO SMOKING ON PROPERTY, NO PETS, 4 ADULTS + 2 KIDS MAX.  5 NIGHT MINIMUM BOOKING (YOU CAN STAY LESS IF YOU PAY FOR 5 NIGHTS, BUT THIS IS A HOMEOWNER ASSOCIATION RULE.) OBSERVE QUIET TIMES AND OTHER RULES, THANKS!

host.host_about: I am a California Bay Area native, now living in Hawaii for 20+ years.  What do I like to do?  Travel,  read,  cook,  decorate,  music ~ classical & country &   help guests find the right place to stay in Hawaii!

reviews.comments:
This was indeed a very quiet unit perfectly settled on the golf course with spacious bedrooms, large living room and two full bathrooms including washer and dryer. Unit is fully equipped with all vacation accessories, while kitchen has all necessary tools for fast meal preparation. Large patio has a gas grill that can be easily used and food could be served either inside or outside. Unit has WiFi and cable services that functioned very well. 
Overall experience was better than impression we could get from the posting, and we would highly recommend this place for the group up to six people.

Janet, we absolutely loved your condo!  It was more spacious than I imagined it would be, and it had everything we could have needed.  Thank you for being so accommodating with our late check out request, as well.  We will definitely be back!

The place is spacious, clean, toddler-friendly (no sharp corners),  very well equipped (supply of soap, dishliquid, paper towels; washer, dryer, coffee maker, blender, pots/frying pans, etc.) Location: you need a car or you can use a trolley ($2/person) to the closest beaches, shops, etc. Sheraton hotel is about 10 minutes walk. Swimming pool is clean and is about 1 min walk away. The host is helpful and not-visible :) 
Minus: T-Mobile was not working inside the condo, you had to go out to make a call (since you are on the first floor - it's not a problem).
Beautiful condo in a beautiful public golf course . Highly highly recommended!
Very nice place to stay. Quiet and peaceful. Full equipment to stay a long time. Thanks Janet.

name: golden horn
space: tek kat müstakil ikea eşyaları ile döşeli şirin çok güzel misafirlerin mümkün olabilecek bir çok beklentilerini gerçeklerştirebilirim sentimiz taksim meydana 3 km evet var 15 dakikada taksim şişli mecidiyeköy
