Robert's apartment was comfortable and convenient.  So many fun places within walking distance.  There's an awesome, old school Italian cheese shop and deli just 2 blocks away.  Several Italian restaurants on the same block.  China town is just half a block away, too.  We found the Metrograph, a vintage movie theatre and restaurant just a 7 block walk away, and spent a couple of afternoons/evenings there.  Robert and Allen were very responsive, and Allen met us at the apartment on arrival.  Highly recommend this listing!

I recommend this place whole heartedly. Very clean, comfortable and quiet, near plenty of restaurants and cafes, close to the subway, and the host could not have been more helpful and accommodating. Excellent value!

As just like all other previous posted comments, Robert is extremely friendly and attentive. Compared to our earlier experiences with other apapartments that we have stayed in NYC, Robert's apt. is very clean and especially the kitchen is fully equipped.
Highly recommended and will definitely coming back again.
Je recommande à 100% ce logement, très spacieux, très bien situé et une réactivité au top !

My best experience of accommodation in Nyc. Perfect apartment, equipped with everything you need, extremely clean, in a fun location in the days of good weather and quiet on rainy days. All essential services and transport are convenient. Robert and his assistants were extremely helpful, communicative and quick. Thanks Robert for the extraordinary experience!
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. L’appartement est agréable et proche des transports et commerces. Merci à Rob pour la communication. Je recommande.

Departamento súper recomendable, con muy buena predisposición y rápida respuesta por parte de Robert y su asistente Allan. El departamento esta muy bien equipado, con cocina súper completa y cama cómoda. La calle donde está ubicado es muy pintoresca, con restaurantes italianos donde comer. 
Sin dudas volveríamos a elegirlo.

Great location and really suited us
Shops around fantastic
Good value

The place is much larger than expected and so nice. Our home was on HGTV so I have high expectations. The kitchen has all full sized appliances including a dishwasher. We felt incredible safe! The place is nestled amongst all the cafes of Little Italy, so you never are on an empty street. Absolutely staying there again when we return!
Appartement très bien placé. Si vous marchez, vous pouvez visiter downtown sans métro. Et sinon, les lignes principales de métro passent à proximité. L’appartement est propre et bien équipé. Parfait!

Just like other previous reviews, Robert's place was an excellent area to stay in. It's definitely worth the extra money as it's convenient to every tourist attractive that we visited. The home is very clean and exactly what the pictures depicted. Unfortunately we were unable to meet Robert, but his assistant Allan was friendly, reliable and responsive. Excellent value and worth every dollar!

appartement propre, suffisamment équipé pour cuisiner.
métro pour Manhattan á 10 minutes à pied.
lit confortable.
Allan, l'assistant de Robert a été très réactif pour répondre á nos questions.
Je recommande ce logement.

Robert's apartment in located on the 4th floor right in the heart of Little Italy. The apartment is well appointed & allows for self catering (decent practical kitchen). Location is only 2 blocks from Canal St subway. Can get a bit noisy with the service vehicles collecting rubbish etc from the many restaurants below. Robert was very accommodating, kept in contact before & during our stay which shows us a genuine interest in his guests.

My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights and really enjoyed it. The apartment is as described and the pictures are accurate. It was very spacious and comfortable for the two of us. The location was fun and convenient for getting to anywhere in the city. There are two subway stations close by. There was some street noise but nothing that earplugs or light music can’t drown out. Rob was very helpful and responsive and a great host. We would definitely stay here again!
Comfortable apartment and good location. If you don’t like crowds, don’t go when the feast of San Gennaro is on. We thought it was great fun.

Rob’s place was huge and had everything we needed! It was walking distance to everything in Lower Manhattan and also close to Grand and Canal Street subway. You are right in the heart of little Italy but it’s very quiet for the amount of people around. The bed was comfortable, wifi great and the shower pressure fantastic! It was also nice to have a lift in the building and not have to walk up 4 stories every day! Boarding Chinatown there is heaps around to do see and eat. We would love to stay again in the future!

Robert made is feel very welcome and his place was very comfortable - better than the pictures and quite spacious for nyc. Amazing location as well. Would definitely love the chance to stay here again. Thank you, Robert!

This is a great apartment. Most one bedroom apartments in Manhattan are tiny. This is a "true" one bedroom. The bedroom is big enough to put your suitcases near the bed. The kitchen is full size, and runs into a full size living room. The apartment was very clean, with tons of towels and a well-equipped kitchen, TV with lots of channels, great living room couch, and the owner sent a wonderful rep to check us in, Allan, who was patient and gave us great restaurant recommendations.  This is beyond central--right on Mulberry Street 1.5 blocks from Canal. If you come into Grand Central, the 6 train leaves you only a 5 minute walk from the apartment. The area is a great one for walking around, and the nearby streets tend to be a bit less busy with cars. As to people, it was just Saturday that Little Italy and Mulberry St. got busy, but once you stepped off into a side street, no. Regarding noise, well, you are in the city. We stayed Thurs to Sun, and only Friday night did we pick up any late night noise. We recommend you looking around for restaurants, the ones right on Mulberry are friendly but they are the pricey tourist places and you can often find a place that's more interesting. Robert's place is highly recommended!!
Loved the apartment. Very comfortable. Helpful local tips. Quick responces. Would recommend & book again.

great host, great location, everything I needed was there including umbrellas! just a little hiccup with the lady downstairs who thought my baby's footsteps were too loud even though it was a weekend (?????).
Great place and great host.
Great location and Robert was such a great host. Would definitely recommend and would stay again!

This is a pretty nice and spacious apartment. The apartment is as described  and included everything that you need. The location was great and pretty (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was also fast and easy! Would definitely recommend!

Rob is a very friendly, responsive host. Although we arrived after midnight, he made sure someone was there to greet us. The apartment was clean and equipped with everything we needed, and the location was great. We really felt at home!

emplacement idéal sur little italy à 5 min du Subway. 
appartement charmant avec tout ce qui faut pour être comme a la maison

L"appartamento è molto più grande di come mi aspettassi e la posizione è eccellente, al centro di Little Italy a pochi passi da Soho, Tribeca, Nolita e, volendo, anche dal GreenwichVillage e dall'Est Village. Tre fermate della metro nel raggio di 500 metri. Asciugamani e lenzuola a disposizione senza limiti. Gentile e premuroso l'host. Forse il valore aggiunto sarebbe stato una pulizia maggiore degli interni, ma il prezzo, per gli standard di New York è veramente molto competitivo e quindi un po' di tolleranza in più è dovuta.
This place is a gem! Great location! Robert is an awesome host!
Great location!  Our plane landed  at 9am and we were extended an early check in which allowed us to go straight there from the airport which was so helpful.

Antes de hablar del departamento, vale la pena hacer una aclaracion y destacar la buena predisposición de Robert y el buen gesto que tuvo al dejarnos una gran bandeja con muchas cositas dulces, café y varias cosas más para la bienvenida.
En nuestro caso, desde el momento que llegamos y hasta cuándo fuimos, cada vez que necesitamos algo, nos respondió enseguida.
El departamento, tal como esta anunciado, está ubicado en el corazón de Little Italy, donde uno puede sentir el espíritu Italiano. No van a faltar unas buenas pizzas (ya sean de Lombardi, como de Champion's -- Hay miles!!)... ambas muy buenas, aunque me quedo con la ultima, unas excelentes pastas y algún que otro dulce. Todo esta muy cerca (inclusive el barrio chino, pero en nuestro caso supimos aprovechar las buenas comidas y los masajes en los pies). Lo mismo sucede con el subte, lo usamos muchísimo y se tiene a pocas cuadras varias estaciones. En concreto el departamento cumple con lo prometido. Excelente calefacciones (nosotros pasamos navidad y año nuevo), muy buena presión de agua, cocina super completa - con varias opciones de café-, cama del dormitorio muy buena y limpia. Sin dudas volvería a visitar la casa de Robert.
Clean, nice space, well lighted, good kitchen, great location.  Hopefully owner will eliminate clutter and add a bedroom dresser.

Robert's apartment is exactly as described, it's nothing luxurious but very clean, comfortable, spacious, it has everything you need to live and feel as if you were at home. What you see in the photos is exactly what you will find. Position is great, right in the heart of Little Italy, many subways within short walking distance. Apt is on 4th floor with efficient elevator. Robert was very kind to meet me on my arrival even if it was past 8pm. Communication was easy and fast. I hope to stay there again and would recommend to anybody.
Great location and terrific host!

name: Homy Cozy Place
summary: We have packages for New Years Eve and Carnaval. You can stay up to 9 nights/10 days. Ask for the price by sending me a message. Cozy Apartament just one block from the beach in a very nice street in the heart of Copacabana Beach!
space: Cozy Apartament just one block from the beach in a very nice street in the heart of Copacabana Beach! In the middle of the so called “Baixo Copa”, the apartment is well located and close to the best you can find in Copacabana, such as supermarkets, bars, nice restaurants, street shops and public transportation (subway and bus). The famous movie theater Roxi is just one block away. The apartment has a queen bed in the bedroom and one sofa-bed for a couple in the living room and it was decorate to make you feel home. There is also air conditioning, wireless internet and cable TV. We have towels and bed sheets also available. The kitchen is fully equipped and there are some additional conveniences such as washing machine, iron and CD player. The building is very secure and we have a 24hs doorman. If you want to feel like home while in Rio, this is the right place to stay. Please check the pictures and send me an email if you have further questions or comments. I will be happy to give you
description: We have packages for New Years Eve and Carnaval. You can stay up to 9 nights/10 days. Ask for the price by sending me a message. Cozy Apartament just one block from the beach in a very nice street in the heart of Copacabana Beach! Cozy Apartament just one block from the beach in a very nice street in the heart of Copacabana Beach! house_rules: I am also writing some tips regarding the apartment for a better and comfortable stay: 1 – The shower works with gas. If you turn on the tap, it automatically turns on the gas, but it is important to leave the window in the bathroom ALWAYS open for safety reasons, even when you leave the apartment. This is a rule of the gas company. 2 – There is an air conditioner in the bed room, it is very important that you turn off the air conditioner when you leave the apartment in order for it not to break. If the air conditioning breaks, it can take long to fix and you will ended up staying without cold temperature in the room. As soon as you turn it on, it will refrigerate the room very fast. Another tip is to leave the door of the bathroon always closed, so the bed room will be colder when the air conditioner is on.  3 – The fan in the ceiling is enough to refrigerate the living room.  4 – The window in the kitchen shall always be left open too because of the natural gas installation in the st

host.host_about: I am 44 years old, I have a baby who is 9 months old. I am a lawyer and I work for a multinational company. I love beach and travelling. I have leaved in the Us and Gemany and I speak 6 languages. Cultural exchange is a must in my life. I love to meet people.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Estive por 4 dias, na chegada fui super bem recebida pela pessoa indicada para fazer meu check in, quanto o apartamento é uma graça bem equipado e tudo bem alinhado com as especificações informadas.
E sua localização é excelente próximo a tudo que se possa precisar.

I spent almost one week there in Rio in Silva s place. I was there with my parents. The flat is really well situated, one street from the Copacaba beach and closed to the tube station or other facilties. The street is crowned in the evening but it s not too noisy in the flat. We were suprised that it was so calm because it s a busy area. We slept very well.
I didn t meet Silvia because she is not living in Rio but she has a friend who is taking care of everything. It s Tania. So Tania welcomed us very nicely, she is a very warm person and she is not living far from the flat if you need anything. Silvia called me when we arrived to be sure that everything is fine.
SO I would really recomand this place, nice, clean, safe, well situated and nice people taking care of you!

El apartamento es muy comodo y la ubicacion es excelente. Mi primo y sus amigos fueron quienes se hospedaron y quedaron muy contentos. El espacio en el apartamento esta muy bien aprovechado y el equipamiento es muy bueno. Gran anfitrion.

Foi ótimo. A localisacao do apartamento é perfeito, pertissimo de praia, ao lado de restaurantes, supermercados etc... O apartamento é bonitinho, com TV, AC, e  bem comfortavel. A Silvia foi muito atenciosa. Posso recomendar a todos que querem ficar la. 

Perfect place. The location of the appartente is great, just around the corner of the beach, and near restaurannts, supermarkets and more. The apartment is really nice, with TV, AC, and just comfortabel. Silvia is a very caring host, I just can recommend to anyone to stay in that place.

We had a very good stay in Rio, at Silvia's place. The location could not be better! The appartment is perfect for a couple, a bit tight for 3 though. Communication with Silva was excellent! A good place to stay in Rio!

Silvia was a great host and communication was easy via emails. The flat was clean and tidy. 
The location of the flat is perfect in Copacabana near shops and restaurants, 1 street from the beach. 
When I go back to Rio, I would stay in Silvia's place again

Excelente apartamento, ótima localização. Tamanho ideal para três pessoas. A proprietária foi muito solícita durante todo o período, assim como a pessoa que nos recebeu no apartamento.

Excellent apartment, great location. For three people, it's perfect. The owner was very helpful all the time, and so was the person who welcomed us to the apartment.

Accueil chaleureux, appartement super, situé près d'un coin de rue dynamique avec quelques resto et place pour prendre une biere en fin de journee, ideal pour 2 personne mais accomode tres facilement 4 personnes!
Merci pour le séjour,

Etienne

Silvia was so kind! She was very easy to contact, and respond so quickly and politely. She even help us find a taxi for our return to the airport.
We had a little problem with the kitchen but she solve it as soon as i told her, I recommend her and her so nice apartment for anyone who wants to know Rio. It is in a very nice place, full of bars near and a supermarket very close. It is one block away from the beach and very near bus and taxi stops.
I would surely go back.
muy linda experiencia, el dpto tal cual estaba en las fotos muy limpio, ordenado cerca de todo muy bien ubicado, muy lindo todo, tiene todo lo que se necesita para pasar unos dias especiales.

I left my heart in Rio.  What a great trip we had, and the homy cozy place helped make it a comfortable one.  Deborah was the person who showed us the apartment.  She's very sweet and eager to help with whatever you need, though we didn't need anything.  The apartment was perfect for me and my husband.  We found the bed very comfortable, the kitchen was equipped with what you need.  It's small, but fine.  It's nice to have a dining room/living room as well as a bedroom.  We didn't use the AC because we like the warm weather, but it was there if we needed it. The location is right near the beach, near good restaurants and shops of all types.  The metro isn't far either.  I would definitely go back. Thanks, Sylvia!

We were met by Deborah on behalf of Silvia and given a wonderful tour of the apartment and building. The place is indeed cozy and well located within Copacabana. Easy access to taxis and subway in addition to buses. Good layout and perfect for four people. Since this was during the FIFA Worldcup final weekend, the level of noise and excitement was off the scale and ran well into the early morning hours. The 24/7 security staff is courteous and professional. Would recommend Silvia's apartment for anyone visiting Rio de Janeiro.

La atención fue maravillosa, nos recibieron de forma oportuna y rápida. El servicio y seguridad del lugar son muy buenos. La ubicación es perfecta para disfrutar de la playa y del ambiente turístico. Tiene cerca muchos lugares para conocer y disfrutar de la ciudad. Fácil acceso a sistemas de transporte (Bus y Metro) y a supermercados, droguerías y cafés para disfrutar de lo mejor de Rio de Janeiro. El apartamento es muy cómodo y cuenta con todo lo necesario para disfrutar de unas vacaciones en la ciudad. Nos sentimos muy a gusto y cómodos durante nuestra estadía. Seguro que regresaremos a hospedarnos allá, cuando volvamos a Rio de Janeiro. Gracias por la oportunidad de acogernos.

The flat was perfect! Exactly what we needed. I was staying with a friend so the sofa bed was perfect - we effectively each had our own room.
Silvia was very reachable and Sandra who works for her was always available, giving recommendations for the area. Also, just steps away from the beach.
Everything was as described! We did not meet Silvia but she provided a lot of advice and her friend Sandra gave us a nice welcome. Both were always available for help! Recommended :)
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a great place to stay in Copacabana! The apartment has everything you need (including comfortable beds, a good shower and a well-equipped kitchen) and has a nice, cozy feel to it. The location is perfect: close to the beach, but in a (traffic-wise) quiet street. There are several bars and restaurants around, which make the neighborhood feel safe during the night. 

Sandra who received us was very nice and helpful, and easy to communicate with. 

We definitely recommend this place, and hope to stay here  again!

El departamento es excelente! Tal cual como se ve en las fotos, es amplio, limpio, bien equipado, y cuenta con todos los elementos necesarios para una óptima comodidad. Muy cercano a la playa, a supermercados, medios de transporte, y a la avenida principal de Copacabana. Rodeado de bares, restaurantes, y cafés. Nos recibió Sandra (amiga de Silvia) en el horario estipulado, ella es muy amable y nos dió consejos en todo momento durante nuestra estadía. Silvia siempre respondió nuestras inquietudes al instante. Sin duda si retornamos a Río de Janeiro, nos hospedaremos allí nuevamente. Muchas gracias por hacer nuestra estadía más placentera.

Our stay was excellent, and the place is exactly as described! 

The location is ideal, especially for young people. The street is pretty lively with several happening bars. It gets a bit loud at night, which we actually liked, but that's something to be aware of. It's one block from the beach, the grocery store, a taxi stand, and many many restaurants and stores. The area felt safe, even walking around at night. Obviously, we used caution, but it felt safer and more populated than some other neighborhoods we visited. Doorman always there and always friendly. 

Check in and out were simple. Silvia was helpful via text, and her associate lives in the building and was always accessible for questions (in person or via phone). 

The apartment looks just like the pictures. We were worried that there weren't windows, but there are! Everything worked nicely and it was very, very clean. There is a door that separates the bedroom and the living room, which was great because then we could both have our own private space. We stayed for 12 days, so this was helpful. 

One tip is to bring adaptors for plugs. We bought them easily at a nearby bookstore, but the plugs are 2 prong, Brazilian style, so our American electronics needed adaptors.

El departamento es tal cual lo descripto en las fotos, muy cómodo y muy bien distribuído y equipado con utensillos de cocina, electrodomésticos, tender, placard, aire acondicionado, ventiladores de techo en ambos ambientes, etc. En el sofá cama puede dormir una persona mayor o dos niños pequeños, pero el frío del aire no llega hasta ahí, solo el ventilador de techo. Lo mejor de este lugar es que está excelentemente ubicado, rodeado de supermercados, farmacias, restaurantes, bares, fastfood, buses, metro y el corazón de la playa de copacabana a una cuadra, en una zona muy segura de día y de noche. Silvia estuvo pendiente en todo momento aunque no pude conocerla en persona. Nos recibió y despidió Bruno con total amabilidad. Lo recomiendo 100%

A Silvia foi muita atenciosa durante todo o processo. Nos fomos recebidos pelo o Bruno que eh um amor de pessoa. O apartamento nos atendeu perfeitamente. Localizacao excelente em Copacabana. 1 bloco da praia. Amamos!!!

Ok, Silvia's place is exactly as described and how it appears.  The location is absolutely one of the best in Copacabana Beach.  It is close to the subway, one block from the beach, near plenty of restaurants, and has tons of places to go at night.  If you like to go to bed before 1030, you will need earplugs, as a live band will be playing across the street....not a problem for me.  Two supermarkets are within 2 blocks, the hot water is hot, and the WiFi is OK most days.  I had two periods of approximately 18 hours (in one month) where it slowed to almost unusable.  I'm sure it wasn't related to Silvia, but rather the provider or maintenance.  Otherwise, I could stream movies, sports and music just fine.  My girlfriend and I were there for NYE and it is in the center of that as well.  I've been traveling nonstop for 5 months and staying in Air BnB the entire time.  I'd return to Silvia's place any time, without question....
Excelente!! muy buena ubicacion a 1 cuadra de la playa, limpio y con todo los elementos necesarios para la estadia.

name: Private rooms in heart of Chelsea
summary: I have a 2BR, in the center of Manhattan, in the great neighborhood of Chelsea.  The 2nd Private bedroom is available with a shared renovated bathroom.
space: Great apartment share in the Center of Chelsea-- 8th Avenue between 18th and 19th Street.  Close access to Meat Packing and Gallery District as well as in the center of Chelsea Restaurant and Bar Scene. Share Sunny renovated apartment in 4th floor walk- up.  Have own private bed and share the Living room, Kitchen and Bathroom.  The second bedroom is in secluded wing of the apartment.
description: I have a 2BR, in the center of Manhattan, in the great neighborhood of Chelsea.  The 2nd Private bedroom is available with a shared renovated bathroom. Great apartment share in the Center of Chelsea-- 8th Avenue between 18th and 19th Street.  Close access to Meat Packing and Gallery District as well as in the center of Chelsea Restaurant and Bar Scene. Share Sunny renovated apartment in 4th floor walk- up.  Have own private bed and share the Living room, Kitchen and Bathroom.  The second bedroom is in secluded wing of the apartment. I am an easy going architect with an office in the neighborhood. Great neighborhood, centrally located with the best restaurants, bars, and Chelsea Art Galleries. A few blocks from the famous Highline park and a few blocks south is the trendy meatpacking district full of shopping, nightlife and more great restaurants. Close to the subway ACE and 123 making it easy to get around town and to and from the train station and/or JFK or LGA NYC airports.
neighborhood_overview: Great neighborhood, centrally located with the best restaurants, bars, and Chelsea Art Galleries. A few blocks from the famous Highline park and a few blocks south is the trendy meatpacking district full of shopping, nightlife and more great restaurants.
transit: Close to the subway ACE and 123 making it easy to get around town and to and from the train station and/or JFK or LGA NYC airports.
interaction: I am an easy going architect with an office in the neighborhood.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment please

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
42 year old architect.
friendly and polite. Between work and social commitments I am not around much.  I have friends and family stay at my place quite a bit and I enjoy having people stay, but also like to give people their space.  I enjoy meeting new people.

the apartment is set up on a way that I can stay out of your way for the most part-- but not entirely.

I have a two year old miniature schnauzer.  he is a very friendly happy dog.  He stays at day care during the day.  I will keep him at a distance-- but he will want to say hello.

reviews.comments: Erik was a great host! He resqued us from sleeping under a bridge. We booked an other appartement and 2 days bevor ariving told she to us that she cant host us. Erik made it happenend that we had an nice visit of New York. He was very privacy and we love his dog.

I stayed 11 nights here in Chelsea. Erik could not have made my experience any more enjoyable. New to airbnb and my first time in NYC as a solo traveller I was not entirely sure what to expect.
Firstly the apartment is in the best location, so central, on 7th Avenue close to fabulous restaurants, bars, cafes, clubs, shops and subway. Then short walk to the Highline, Chelsea Market, Meatpacking district, Flatiron district, Greenwich Village, or a short subway ride to Uptown, Midtown, Brooklyn, Lower Manhatten. Secondly the light filled apartment was big enough (given the little time I spent there), very clean and tidy, but homely and (Website hidden by Airbnb) bed was a fold out couch which was really comfortable, my room faced on to the street and though the window was double glazed at times it could be noisey but never a problem. My room was also very private and I felt very safe. The small but functional bathroom that was spotless with plenty of hot water and light.
Thirdly Erik was great, never intrusive but friendly and helpful. Always contactable, great with local information and tips, umbrella when it rained, WiFi,and was incredibly generous when on the day of departure things did not go to plan so Erik generously allowed me to stay an extra night!  Lastly was Augie, Erik's adorable little dog. Quiet, cute, friendly and very well behaved.
 I would definely recommend Great Space and would love to stay again on my next visit

Erik is super nice! The place was perfect for me, spacious, new, clean. Great Location! Next to meatpacking and walking distance to a lot of turist places, bars, restaurants, nail salons. I would stay again next trip!! Super recommended!!
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The location of the apartment is really great and Erik was the most excellent host! He stayed in the apartment for the first three days of the visit but it was really no problem having him there! Erik was really helpful and cooperative. Overall a nice apartment in a very nice neighborhood!

My boyfriend and I stayed 10 nights here in Chelsea,but we only met Erick the last night because he was out.He is really nice and polite!!The apartment and location is great! Close to the attractions such as High Line Park,Meadpacking distict and Chelsea Market. There are also many restaurantes and bars. Our room was quiet,big and the bed very comfortable! Super recommended!

Honestamente Erik nos salvo de quedarnos en la calle. Luego de tener una mala experiencia con un Host que nos canceló el mismo día que llegamos a New York, Erik nos ofreció ayuda y colaboración para poder usar sus instalaciones y obviamente pasar los días en su departamento. Realmente estamos muy agradecidos. Con respecto al hermoso departamento, se encuentra ubicado en Chelsea y es tal como se muestra en las imagenes. Todo super moderno y con todos los accesorios para sentirse cómodo. La habitación súper fresca y agradable como para descansar luego de un largo dia de caminatas y paseos. Luminoso y bien distribuido. Solo tener en cuenta (para la gente mayor) que se debe subir algunos pisos por escalera. Con respecto al barrio, muy divertido y agradable, muchisimas opciones para hacer por la noche, para comprar distintos tipos de comida. Lo mas importante, muy cerca de las estaciones de subte o incluso para llegar caminando a cualquier hora. Realmente Súper recomendable. Gracias por todo Erik!

La casa de Eric es perfecta, está muy bien ubicada en uno de los barrios más hermosos de NYC y accesible para desplazarse a otros lugares. Eric tiene la mejor disposición, nos ayudó con todo lo que le pedimos para hacer nuestra llegada y estadía más placentera, es un excelente anfitrión! Vamos a extrañar mucho Chelsea!

Erik's place is wonderful! Erik has great taste and the place looks even better then on the pictures. The location is the best you can probably get in Chelsea and Erik is a super host! He gives you the privacy you need but is always there and up for a chat. He's also always super helpful with anything you have, restaurant advice, what to do, where to go and he always helped me out with tons of other things that occurred during my stay. I stayed one month with Erik during a training I did in the city and he was a big part why my stay was so great! Really, if you want to stay in Chelsea stay with Erik!

Erik is attentive, easy-going and sweet host! And my stay at his place was so!
Erik great at giving you as much privacy as you wish and very helpful, communicative once you need anything. 

Apartement located at the vibrant and easy-to-access neighborhood which is helps to enjoy the city more, but it also takes a quiet side and you have a chance for a nice rest and a good sleep. With no extra 24h NYC noise :)

Guest bedroom has a great spike of sunshine during the day, and apartment itself is just very cosy, stylish and fresh! I'd definitely reccomend it and would love to stay there again on my next trips! :)

The apartment is located in the middle of Chelsea. Subway, shops and good restaurants are right around the corner and Erik helps you to find everything and loves to give tips. He was a very welcoming host and I couldn't imagine a better place to spend a few days in New York.

Erik was an incredible host! Very warm, super helpful, and has an amazing sense of style in the apartment. He's in a very convenient location, and while right on 8th Ave, room is in the back and gets minimal noise. Would love to stay here again!
Amazing apartment in NYC and Erik is a great host!

This is a fantastic, stylish apartment in a great area. The bedroom has a private entry, with wardrobe space and air conditioning. Noise levels were quite good, the bedroom does not back onto a street so mostly distant city noises.

The neighbourhood is very safe, with great options for local dining and bars. It is situated near numerous subway lines, making it convenient to travel within Manhattan, Brooklyn or beyond.

Erik was a wonderful host, our check-in was seamless and he always responded promptly to our requests. He spent most of the time away, but the time we did spend with him he generously passed on some great knowledge about the local art scene, restaurants, bars, jazz clubs and some good tips on getting around. This really enhanced our experience in NYC. 

Thanks for a wonderful time! I have no doubt in recommending Erik’s apartment to anyone!

Great apartment in a perfect location. Close proximity to the subway and to many great restaurants. Beautiful neighborhood and a clean room and comfortable bed. I would definitely stay there again and would recommend it to anyone traveling to New York.

We stayed at Erik's place for a long weekend. Communication was super quick and easy and we loved the apartment. It's in a great, vibrant location but none of the windows is facing the street so it's nice and quiet. We would definitely stay again and I highly recommend Erik's place. Thank you, Erik!!

Erik's place made for an ideal basecamp for my recent visit to NYC. I think this is one of the best located Airbnbs in NYC, and the price is a value compared to all hotels in the area. Erik was extremely accommodating and even offered his museum pass so we could enter the Whitney Museum for free. Definitely recommend!

name: Orient erleben zu Zweit
summary: Nahe dem Fährhafen gelegenes Haus mit sehr guter Infrastruktur. Sonstiges: Der Zusatzpreis gilt nur für Kinder bis 12 Jahre Die monateweise Anmietung ist nur auf Anfrage möglich. Reinigungspauschale bei Anmietung ab 2 Wochen 30 €, ab einem Monat 50 €
space: Die Wohnung ist schlicht in einem leichten mix von moderne und Orient eingerichtet.
description: Nahe dem Fährhafen gelegenes Haus mit sehr guter Infrastruktur. Sonstiges: Der Zusatzpreis gilt nur für Kinder bis 12 Jahre Die monateweise Anmietung ist nur auf Anfrage möglich. Reinigungspauschale bei Anmietung ab 2 Wochen 30 €, ab einem Monat 50 € Die Wohnung ist schlicht in einem leichten mix von moderne und Orient eingerichtet. Das Bad steht zur gemeinsamen Nutzung zur Verfügung. Die Küche steht eingeschränkt zur Verfügung und kann nach Absprache für die Zubereitung von kleinen Gerichten mitbenutzt werden. Tagsüber bin ich jederzeit telefonisch erreichbar. In Notfällen natürlich auch Nachts. Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Der Fährhafen liegt nur 5-10 Gehminuten vom Haus entfernt, von wo aus man bei frischer Meeresluft zügig auf die europäische Seite von Istanbul gelangt. Die letztes Jahr fertiggestellte Marmaray ist in gleicher Entfernung. Ebenso kommt man mit Bussen und Minibussen fast überall hin. Direkt vor der Haustür findet jeden Freitag einer der größ
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit.
notes: Direkt vor der Haustür findet jeden Freitag einer der größten Märkte Istanbul' s statt, dessen Aufbau bereits früh morgens beginnt. Ebenso ist der Muizin in der Wohnung gut zu hören. Deshalb sollte man den Geräuschspegel einer Großstadt gewöhnt sein.
transit: Der Fährhafen liegt nur 5-10 Gehminuten vom Haus entfernt, von wo aus man bei frischer Meeresluft zügig auf die europäische Seite von Istanbul gelangt. Die letztes Jahr fertiggestellte Marmaray ist in gleicher Entfernung. Ebenso kommt man mit Bussen und Minibussen fast überall hin.
access: Das Bad steht zur gemeinsamen Nutzung zur Verfügung. Die Küche steht eingeschränkt zur Verfügung und kann nach Absprache für die Zubereitung von kleinen Gerichten mitbenutzt werden.
interaction: Tagsüber bin ich jederzeit telefonisch erreichbar. In Notfällen natürlich auch Nachts.
house_rules: Ich bitte die Wohnung ohne Schuhe und nicht im Rauschzustand zu betreten. Nichtraucher Übliche Hausordnung

name: Right in the heart of Montreal!!
summary: Steps away from festivals, resto-bars & parks! View on beautiful Square St.Louis and its historic fountain. An oasis in "Le Quartier Latin". **À quelques pas des festivals, resto-bars & parcs. Avec vue sur le Carré St.Louis et sa fontaine historique! 2 BEDROOMS. 2 CHAMBRES
description: Steps away from festivals, resto-bars & parks! View on beautiful Square St.Louis and its historic fountain. An oasis in "Le Quartier Latin". **À quelques pas des festivals, resto-bars & parcs. Avec vue sur le Carré St.Louis et sa fontaine historique! 2 BEDROOMS. 2 CHAMBRES

host.host_about: I have lived in Toronto for 11 years, and in my condo for 5.  I work for a tv production company and i travel across Canada for work...  My place is artsy and cozy, and right beside High Park which is magical...  I hope you enjoy!

reviews.comments: The place is very nice. The location is perfect - the house was next to a park within a very quiet community, but also just one block away from a main street with lots of restaurants. The rooms are very clean and organized. We did not meet Micheline since we arrived late but still got the keys and every information we need.

We spent a lovely week at Micheline's beautiful apartment in one of Montreal's most engaging neighborhoods. The apartment was bright and spacious, and equipped with everything we needed. The bed was very comfortable and we slept soundly. I would have thought there would be more street noise right in town but it really was not noticeable.

The location was perfect - since the weather was fine we lingered often in the Square St Louis. The cafe on the square not only is convenient - it has the best coffee we've had in a long time and delicious sandwiches. Many many other restaurants were just a short walk. We also used the Bixi bike rental stand on the square to borrow bikes for an outing to nearby Parc la Fontaine, which is also within walking distance if you prefer not to bike.

Micheline was easily reached by phone and text. I would definitely stay here again.

It was a great experience staying at Micheline's place. The apartment was at a convenient location (3-5 mins walk to metro station); and with a lot of amazing restaurants around; Micheline replied message very fast, and they were very flexible and friendly.

name: Modern Apartment in NOHO / SOHO
summary: The apartment is fully furnished w/ hardwood floor, spacious living room, modern open kitchen, and a view overlooking Soho / Noho. As soon as you walk out of the building you are on Houston, seconds from the main subway lines and all shopping.
space: Spacious bedroom with natural light and city views. The apartment is a two bedroom but only one of the rooms is available to stay in. I will be in the other room. The couch is also large and can fit a couple of people on it. There is also an open kitchen that is stocked with food...feel free to help yourselves!  We also have a rooftop...which isn't bad when the weather is nice : )
description: The apartment is fully furnished w/ hardwood floor, spacious living room, modern open kitchen, and a view overlooking Soho / Noho. As soon as you walk out of the building you are on Houston, seconds from the main subway lines and all shopping. Spacious bedroom with natural light and city views. The apartment is a two bedroom but only one of the rooms is available to stay in. I will be in the other room. The couch is also large and can fit a couple of people on it. There is also an open kitchen that is stocked with food...feel free to help yourselves!  We also have a rooftop...which isn't bad when the weather is nice : ) Happy to offer recommendations of places to go and explore. I know a number of restaurant owners that can assist too. The B, D, F, M, 6, N, Q, R trains are all within 100 feet from my apartment. There is also a Wholefoods 3 minutes away. Washington Square park is also 5 minutes from my apartment. This is the best neighborhood in the city. Please refrain from smoking ins
notes: Please refrain from smoking inside.
transit: The B, D, F, M, 6, N, Q, R trains are all within 100 feet from my apartment. There is also a Wholefoods 3 minutes away. Washington Square park is also 5 minutes from my apartment. This is the best neighborhood in the city.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Location is super convenient. Last minute booking and Bobby responded right away. Very helpful and communicative. Would stay again for sure.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Bobby was in communication all the time, checking in to make sure things were going well. Blake his roommate was nice and helpful. Room has a full size bed, a dresser with space to hang clothes, A/C. Location was great for exploring NY; close to subways/buses. Towels were provided. I was mostly out exploring NY so I didn't utilize the kitchen, but it had the necessities. For my purpose and stay, this place worked well to play tourist. Great place to use as a launch pad, central and safe.

name: Large 1 Bedroom Bondi Apartment
summary: Perfectly located between Bondi Junction and Bondi Beach this roomy 1 bedroom apartment is not only very comfortable it is walking distance from shops and restaurants and close to the heart of a huge shopping centre and the iconic beach area
space: This 1 bedroom apartment is perfect for a couple or 1 person, featuring a master bedroom with built-in wardrobe,a medium sized bathroom, a huge kitchen space, large loungeroom and a balcony. The apartment is very light during the day, especially when using the balcony area off the loungeroom to enjoy those sunny afternoons in Bondi. The bedroom is large with a Queen size bed and storage inside a huge built in wardrobe. The lounge area features 2 lounges for additional (email hidden)rfect for entertaining or relaxing using the large flat screen TV or the free WIFI available during your stay. If you enjoy cooking the kitchen is a spacious area including a fridge, oven and stove with all the amenities you will need. The balcony is always sunny and great for having coffee in the morning or drinks in the afternoon....kicking back and enjoying the fresh air and sunshine. Parking is free on the street outside the block.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: The apartment was close to bondi junction shops and bondi beach. Only really suitable for two guests. The bed was comfy and there was plenty of storage for suitcases and clothes

We (myself and 2 of my young sons) stayed a week at George's. All good. Place was very clean and tidy when we arrived at around 9am. The place is small but sufficient for our needs, as we spent most of our time out-and-about. Great location, just a 2 minute walk to Bondi Road.

If you rent a car then plan to spend 5 minutes looking for a parking place along Penkivil St, and perhaps walk a few hundred yards to the building. We had no problems parking in the building's driveway to load/unload luggage.

I met George just once during the stay, when we locked ourselves out. He immediately responded to my message and I went to get spares from him. Worked out fine and we lost only the time it took me to drive to his work and back - around a half hour.

All my communications with George were very quick. Everything he told us was true and I would recommend staying at his place. Enjoy!

name: Lumière sur le plateau
summary: Appartement lumineux, moderne, rez de chaussée,  Cuisine ouverte sur la salle de séjour,  2 chambres à coucher, jardin arboré,  Dans un quartier calme du centre de Montréal, réputé pour ses animations (resto, bar, parcs) proche de toutes commodités.
description: Appartement lumineux, moderne, rez de chaussée,  Cuisine ouverte sur la salle de séjour,  2 chambres à coucher, jardin arboré,  Dans un quartier calme du centre de Montréal, réputé pour ses animations (resto, bar, parcs) proche de toutes commodités.

reviews.comments: The apartment is absolutely beautiful. Everything you could hope for in an AirBNB stay at more. The location is ideal, and Karine and her family are extremely accommodating and generous. Moreover, the apartment is pristine! I'd recommend it to anyone.

name: Cozy Cottage, Room #2
summary: Private room in bedroom 5br/1ba cottage tucked away on a tropical hillside just a 5 minute walk away from V-land beach and 1/2 mile from sunset beach. Private room with all shared living spaces.
space: Adorable cottage nestled mountainside of V-land beach. The home is bright and airy with a calming vibe. The bedroom is cozy with a queen size bed, accompanied with large closet space and ice cold AC. Kitchen and tv area is shared space with hosts and guests. The bathroom is shared with other guests, but is cleaned daily.
description: Private room in bedroom 5br/1ba cottage tucked away on a tropical hillside just a 5 minute walk away from V-land beach and 1/2 mile from sunset beach. Private room with all shared living spaces. Adorable cottage nestled mountainside of V-land beach. The home is bright and airy with a calming vibe. The bedroom is cozy with a queen size bed, accompanied with large closet space and ice cold AC. Kitchen and tv area is shared space with hosts and guests. The bathroom is shared with other guests, but is cleaned daily. Cozy area near V-land nestled mountainside of the highway with great friendly neighbors. Bus friendly location. A car is recommended if you plan to explore the rest of the island. Or speak with us directly- we may be able to help you out.
neighborhood_overview: Cozy area near V-land nestled mountainside of the highway with great friendly neighbors.
transit: Bus friendly location. A car is recommended if you plan to explore the rest of the island. Or speak with us directly- we may be able to help you out.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 1PM. -Please be tidy and clean up after any kitchen mess you make.  -Please clean off sand before entering the home. (or try to!) We know its hard. :) -No loud noise or music after 10:00 PM. on weekdays. -Our tropical location can sometimes bring in bugs- please be aware of that if leaving any dirty dishes around. :) -Please be courteous when using the bathroom and be sure to clean up any sand/hair left in the shower or sink as it is shared with multiple people -Please be respectful of our belongings and treat them as you would your own.  *Leave your worries at home and come with the aloha spirit!*

host.host_about:
We are a happy and active couple living on the North Shore! We are originally from NJ, love traveling and meeting new people.

We enjoy cooking, going to the beach, and hiking.

reviews.comments: That was my first experience Airbnb. It was great! I felt at home with Allison and Gary. The two and their homes are so loving. The beach is very close and usually you're there allone

Alison and Gary's place was the nicest shared accommodation I can think of. They are the loveliest most accommodating & chilled out people. It was just as simple as described and it was very easy to relax there especially after crazy Waikiki! The accommodation was simple & very clean! Gorgeous uncluttered energy (very little electro magnetism) and it was easy to sleep, read and chill out happily ! 
I traveled with my 14 yr old son and we both loved Alison and Gary's hospitality! We'd do it again for sure!!

This is the cutest little house. Gary and Allison were very hospitable and welcoming. We absolutely loved our stay. The location was wonderful we wanted to be away from Honolulu but close to things to do. And this was the perfect location all the beaches around were beautiful and it was just a short drive to historic Halei'wa and great local restaurants. We would stay here again in a heart beat!!

Allison and Gary are a lovely couple, very nice and warmhearted. The most wonderful thing in travel is getting to know a place better through the help of locals. Apparently, it is like this in Hawaii.

Allison & Gary are delightful hosts, chill, accommodating and made excellent suggestions for a super snorkeling spot and terrific Thai food truck dining. Stay with them! Excellent North Shore location, close to lots of cool stuff. Their space is super clean, private space, comfortable, with beautiful original art in every room, comfortable beds and great shower water pressure.

Allison & Gary have a dream beach style colourful home with very nice guestrooms! All the great North Shore beaches are very close by. Arriving was very easy - they left a key for me so I could settle in while they were away. We met in the evening of my stay and had a very nice talk in the kitchen! Thanks again for letting me stay at your wonderful place! :)
Allison and Gary are nice hosts. We felt very welcome. The room was nice and clean. The place is very quite at night. We liked it.

We truly enjoyed our stay at the Cozy Cottage. Allison and Gary were kind and gracious hosts - their communication was top notch and they were incredibly accommodating. Additionally, they provided great suggestions for eating and activities which led to some great adventures for the two of us!

What a great little beach get away.  We were headed to a North Shore wedding and made a last minute decision to stay the night and needed a nearby location.  Great beachy feel, great location and perfect hosts.   Mahalo.

This is a super nice airbnb! It's very close (2 min walking) to a beautiful beach, the house is tidy, clean and well equipped. Also the rooms are cosy. Bus Stop also just 1 Minute from the House to get you anywhere you like. Allison and Gary are super friendly and welcoming. We can totally recommend the place - we loved it!

We arrived later in the evening and were welcomed at the door by Gary - he was warm & inviting and made us very comfortable. The room was just what we needed - a bed with access to the bath & shower.  We were basically just making a pit stop but if we come back to Oahu, we would definitely stay again. Though we didn't take advantage of it, they were generous with their food, and the bathroom was well-stocked with high quality products. Thanks, Gary & Allison!

Allison and Gary are great hosts and they have a wonderful, charming little cottage on the North Shore with all the amenities. They're a young, adventerous couple that (had our schedules allowed) I would've loved to have hung out more with. The area is located to everything you would want on the north side. A qucik hop over to Haleiwa, Waimea Valley or the Dole Plantation - or cruise south to the Turtle Bay Resort area. The absolute best was just walking across the street to the beach. Great home, convenient location and wonderful hosts.

Alison and Gary were very warm and welcoming hosts. Their tidy, cozy home is perfect for a stay on the low-key North Shore. Very close to Ted's Bakery! Alison was very responsive by text for any questions that I had. Thanks for the hospitality!

wonderful experience! we already miss our home in North Shore area! Allison and Gary were so helpful, kind and cheerful all the time with us, responsive and cool!! their house is in a peaceful and amazing place, among nature and close to the most beautiful beaches in Ohau. Thank you guys for letting us leave this magic hawaian adventure!
Hosts were so kind and welcoming. The description was perfect, it really was cosy and beautiful. Neighborhood was fine also.

Gary and Allison are both very friendly and hospitable. They were willing to loan out their snorkel gear, canoe, bikes, towels, and surfboard.  They gave us good directions on how to find their home, its tucked away behind a few other homes on a dirt road so it can be tricky.   We enjoyed the location in the country, although with our windows open (to cool it down) we could hear the neighbors. It was windy at night and we fell asleep listening to the leaves moving in the wind and rain.  Occasionally we had to shut the window if the wind blew the rain in.  The a/c is in the living room/kitchen area so it doesn't help to keep the bedroom cool. With both windows open and the fan they provided, we were able to get the air moving in the room and cool the room down at night.  They have a Queen size bed in room #2.

The home is a few minutes away from Sunset, Shark's Cove and other beaches and about 15 minutes away from Hale'iwa.  We enjoyed being close to the North Shore Beaches. There is a 3 mile bike path close to the home that goes along the street and has some trees as a buffer from the street. 

The cottage is in the country and we enjoyed seeing the critters outside, but didn't enjoy them as much when they came inside our bedroom. The bathroom is shared with other guests.

Allison and Gary were awesome! We had a place reserved in Waikiki that canceled on us the day of our reservation so we had to scramble to find something. We came upon Allison and Gary's place and the responded right away!

They have the nicest little house just a block from the north shore. While we were only there for a short period of time, we had a great experience and would recommend their place for anyone looking for a chill spot on the north shore!

I had an amazing visit on the north shore, and Gary and Allison made me feel incredibly welcome. The accommodations were simple and clean, and the location couldn't have been better... So close to the beach and snorkeling in and around Sharks Cove. Gary and I kicked it back a bit, and I appreciated our time together. Made me want to stay in touch. Good people.

I enjoyed my stay in the Cozy Cottage.  Unfortunately I didn't get to meet my gracious hosts, having enjoyed the sights till late.  It was COZY yes!!  The place was very clean and homey.  I didn't see anyone at all, and it was like having the place to myself.  Mahalo for opening up your space to people like me!  It makes me feel so good about the world that there are people who still believe and experience ALOHA; it's people like Allison and Gary and the Airbnb community who shows the world, ALOHA is alive and well.  I appreciate it so very much!

Gary and Allison were great hosts, they made us feel like family. The accommodations were everything a North Shore experience should be. The house was kept clean each day. The kitchen and restroom were equipped with everything we needed including great water pressure in the shower.  The bed was very comfortable and the night breezes felt nice with the windows open. We were able to use their beach cruiser bikes for short rides to local surf beaches on the North Shore. Surf and snorkel gear were always available to use. It was nice to have a home base on the North side to stay while traveling around the Island. Coming back to the Cottage felt like coming back home.
Wonderful hosts, accommodating and friendly. Lovely bright house in a nice location.
Cozy spot on the north shore, made for a great stop.
Allison & Gary made us really welcome to their house. We got to borrow bikes and they even offered us rides. Me and my girlfriend warmly suggest to stay at their place.
The living room is lovely.
Thank you for your kindness :) i hope stay your house sometime.

I couldnt go  on this trip, my brother went  instead, with my newphew and they say Allisons place was beyond his expectations, the house is nice, is really close to sunset beach and Allison and Gary are great guys, we will definitely stay there next time.

Allison and Gary were welcoming, friendly, laid back hosts. The room was simple but clean, and the bed extremely comfortable with a nice fan to cool you as you sleep. There was a nice selection of tea, coffee, and cereals for breakfast, but we opted for the leftover waffles that were kindly offered to us. We enjoyed a beer and conversation with the hosts, and the guests in room #1 in the evening. Recommended as an affordable place to stay on the north shore! Check out Kawela Bay for swimming even in the winter (very close to the airbnb) It's relatively calm while the rest of the beaches are wild with waves...
Enjoyed our stay here. Very cordial hosts and provided info on local attractions & restaurants. Good access and adequate parking. Would recommend if you enjoy shared accommodation.

Great value and great atmosphere - thanks Gary and Alison for a troublefree and fun stay - seeing maxxing out Waimea Bay was icing on the cake of a great short stay, and the explanation of some of the mysteries of NFL was an added bonus!

Alison & Gary were great hosts! Checking in was a breeze and the room was exactly as described. Our favorite beach – Maleakahana – was just minutes away (by car), as are lots of other great beaches. We'd definitely stay here next time we're on Oahu!

Allison and Gary were great hosts! Although we only spent one night at their home, it was a very restful evening. They had a clean room waiting for us with clean towels for us to use. We chatted with Gary for a bit in the evening before bed and in the morning showered in their clean bathroom and were able to grab a quick bite to eat (cereal and a banana) before heading out. The directions they gave were clear ( I would suggest finding the place in the daylight because it could be tricky in the dark). There was great communication before our arrival. We didn't get to meet Allison but Gary was very helpful and accommodating. 
Mahalo!
I spent only one night at Allison and Gary's home but it was perfect, clean and cozy.

I had a great time and stay at Alison & Gary's place! It's really nice and the location is just perfect. They shared their home with me and gave support whenever i had a question. Can highly recommend to stay with them when you Plan your holiday at the North shore!  :)

Gary and Allison are genuine people and gracious and generous hosts. Their home is very cozy and clean. It's within walking distance to the beach but nestled in a quiet neighborhood off the main road. They have everything you need. I felt right at home and loved waking up to the sounds of birds outside. This is a great place to go to get out of the crowds of Waikiki.

Alison & Gary are great couple. Feel free to share the flat with such nice and easy-going couple. Gray is so nice introduce us where to go and shop, even bring us freshly made breakfast from famous bakery. Will definitely recommend friends to stay here again.

Allison and Gary we're excellent hosts. They were both very friendly and made us feel right at home. They both have a great sense for hospitality - we felt welcome, informed and had lots of space to orselves, despite them being just across the hall. Superb north shore location and great vibes. A solid deal.

Thanks for the hospitality.  It was perfect. We would definitely come back.  The snorkel gear was a nice perk.  Too bad The Eddie surf comp didn't go off.. Oh well. It was still a great sunrise regardless.  Mahalo

Gary was very friendly. Haven t met allison. They would provide everything needed beachtowels etc... Bed very comfi got a lot of good sleep that night. When u get to north shore, definetly worth a stay.

We loved staying with Allison and Gary!!! Their cozy cottage is located in a quieter part of the island, where the locals and surfers hang out. Allison and Gary are very easy-going, laid-back, welcoming and accommodating. We felt like we were staying with friends. They are fantastic hosts! They went above and beyond!
Their place is hard to find but you won't miss it if you follow the direction they sent by mssg. Nice and clean room, comfortable vibe.

Very casual and laid back atmoshere.  Gary and Allison are very welcoming host and have a great spot close to the beach and away from the hustle and bustle of the city.   Would definetely stay here again.

Great spot in a beautiful area! Just what we needed -- a clean and comfortable place to get some sleep after a long day. Didn't have time to socialize much but Allison and Gary were super friendly and welcoming. Thanks guys!
Our hosts were very nice and welcoming. Location was good, recommend having a car when staying in this area. Room was good for our 2 days on the north side of the island.
Great experience! Was only in Hawaii for 2 days so the space was Perfect.

Gary is the MAN!! we were super last minute and he went out of his way to accommodate us and make us feel comfortable. The place was immaculately clean and he had tons of little extras and amenities ready for us. Gary and Allison really have a cute little set up here. Great location, super close to Turtlebay. This was actually our first Airbnb experience and what a wonderful way to be introduced to it. Thank you both for a perfect stay.

A great place in north shore. Nice price for Hawaii. 
The room is nice and clean. Hosts are friendly and  helpful. The waves at north shore are spectacular!

My friend I had such a relaxing time on the north shore of Ohau taking in the beautiful sights. What topped our time off was coming home to Alison and Gary's cozy cottage. We would highly recommend a stay with Alison and Gary, not only was there a comfy bed on offer, but a warm shower with a guest basket with white fluffy towels, face washers and shower gel. The basket also had aloe Vera and mozzy replant just incase. They also had a selection of yummy breakfast options for guests, as well as snorkel hear on offer. We loved our stay and hope to return sometime soon in the near future!
This was my first Airbnb experience, and definitely not my last. Gary & Allison's place was quiet & friendly, and CLEAN! Loved the vibe and the other guests were an unexpected treat.

Staying with Alison and Gary was one of the best decisions we made on our trip to Hawaii. Their place is spacious and cozy at the same time, and one block from the beach and a great bike trail accessible with their cool bike cruisers. Best of all, A and G are awesome hosts, answering all our questions about the area and being great company in general. We highly recommend staying with these guys!

Wonderful experience. I had originally signed up for two nights but due to a delayed flight only made it for the second. It was a perfect place to rejuvenate. Close to hiking trails and across the street from the beach. Love country living and appreciate the aloha spirit felt here!
Easy going couple, made sure I had everything I needed. Thanks guys!
Nice house and fine facilities. Had a good sleep and the hosts were very friendly. I didn't get the chance to talk much to them as I was very tired.

What can be said about Allison and Gary that cant be deciphered from their status as superhosts? In fact, airbnb should make a category of super-duper hosts just for them. The house is perfectly situated on the north shore walking distance to amazing surf spots and beaches. They give you access to bicycles putting the grocery store well within reach. Their home is cozy and clean and the room is comfortable and private. They both are very accommodating and do everything in their power to make you feel welcomed. Definitely an essential stop for Any wayward travellers on oahu !

Allison and Gary were great. They were extremely welcoming and open during my stay and the location of their house was super convenient for getting around the north shore. They gave me a key and didn't sweat my coming and going. Would highly recommend their guest room if you're planning a trip to Oahu.

Gary and Allison were wonderful hosts! Knowledgable about the area and very welcoming . It was helpful to have beach cruisers and snorkel gear to be able to use. Room was cozy and bed was comfortable. I look forward to my next visit with them

Allison and Gary were very helpful settling into the North Shore. Apartment is clean and comfortable. Easy access to the beach whether you have a car or walking/bike.  I had a rental car, it was easy for parking in front of their home and safe. Would stay here again next time I am on the North Shore.

Staying at Allison and Gary´s house was perfect. The communication with them was fast and easy. Everything was clean. The room with a big bed was comfortable. Allison gave us suggestions were to go for a hike, surfing for beginners and dinner. The beach with beautiful waves is just across the street.
Great location on the North Shore. They had beach cruisers for use and the path was right across the street. The room is very bright and private. great spot on the North Shore.

Gary and Allison are very friendly and the place was just what we needed for a weekend packed with outdoor activities.  The room was clean and the bed was comfy.  Gary and Allison kindly offered up the food in the fridge and had extra sunscreen to share.  Parking is a bit tight and it's kind of hard to find, but once you get that down, it was all really convenient and nice.

Gary & Allison are two very warm and welcoming people. Their home is a basic setup with comfortable beds, and is only steps to beautiful beaches and surf spots. Parking is tight so I wouldn't recommend a large vehicle as there are several houses sharing a common drive that you parallel park along. This was our first Airbnb booking and we will be using it again and again.

Allison was there to greet us when we arrived. She was easy to communicate with prior to our arrival.  We felt very at home here and totally enjoyed the space and company.  The location was great for exploring the north shore.  We slept wonderfully in our room.  The bed was comfortable and fun.  We would gladly stay with these two again.  It was also very nice to have a french press available and some quick breakfast foods provided so we could get exploring quickly in the mornings.

Unbelievably well organized. We didn't get to meet them, there responded promptly to any requests.
The condo was exactly what we needed after a long hike. Well equipped and perfectly situated.

Allison and Gary were very welcoming! They were great hosts who were always ready to help us out and give us tips about what to do around the island. They are a very friendly couple. Their home was very clean and an awesome location on the North Shore. Loved staying there and would recommend it to anyone!

Great hosts. We loved our stay at Alison and Gary's place. Alison and Gary were both friendly.  Towels and bathroom were clean and comfortable. (They had a towel warmer!!). The room was cozy (They just installed an AC in the room). Just remember not to bring food into the room because ants might come very quickly.

Alison and Gary's home was a perfect landing spot on the North Shore, situated right between the town of Haleiwa and attractions such as Weimea and Turtle Bay. We had no issues parking our sedan directly in front of their home, but larger vehicles with poor turning radiuses may want to park on the street below as their street is narrow and could be difficult to turn around in. 

Their home and the space was LOVELY! Small touches such as towels (real talk: I used the towel warmer), guide books, sun screen/bug spray, and especially delicious breakfast options (we immediately ran out and bought the same giant mac, coconut, honey, PB A&G offer from North Shore Goodies) made us feel welcome and well cared for. 

We only met Alison briefly, but Gary was nice enough to stand and chat with us at length - both are wonderful young people! I will likely point friends and family visiting the island their way; everything was phenomenal!

Gary & Alison were very responsive each time I contacted them, whether by message or text. The location was perfect! Their directions to get to their home were clear. The whole cottage and room were adorable. I was able to meet them for a few minutes and their hospitality was great! The energy in the home is so positive! I felt comfortable and safe and my intention to get away from the busy city was fulfilled by staying here. I couldn't have asked for a better experience while staying at the North Shore. Mahalo Gary & Alison! Until next time, Aloha! :)

Allison and Gary were great hosts, really welcoming and gave us lots of tips on where to go! The room was perfect for us, clean, cool and the bed was really comfy. We didn't have a car so caught the bus everywhere which was super easy and the bus stop was a minute walk from the house. 
Thanks so much for everything :)
房东人很友善,周到,在email给出了详尽的地址｡这是我第一次通过Airbnb寻找旅行的落脚处｡感谢房东Alison & Gary, 他们还准备冲浪､潜浮和骑行的装备免费给旅行者｡夏威夷之行给我留下了非常美好的回忆｡

Highly recommend staying here fort your north shore visit. They know how to host! My girlfriend and I stayed there just to sleep after having a terrible experience at another Airbnb but this night made up for it. Air-conditioning and it was very clean. Allison and Gary were super sweet

Allison & Gary were super friendly! The house was easy to find with their thorough instructions. The room was comfortable and had A/C, which was wonderful after being out at the beach all day. Their place is in a great location – minutes away from some awesome food truck spots that we enjoyed. It was a really lovely night away on the North Shore! Mahalo guys!

Allison and Gary were very friendly and welcoming. Great location on the North Shore near private beaches with less people around. Best to have a car to get here, but bus can be possible, but not recommended. The house itself is a basic beach house not really meant for hanging out in all day in, but rather a place to sleep and eat. It was a plus that they made a shelf of breakfast items available to guests to have a small bite before going out for the day.

Allison & Gary are brilliant hosts - friendly, helpful and very engaging! Their cozy cottage is exactly that - cozy & inviting. Highly recommended for a few days to chill, swim and snorkel. It is best if you have a car/scooter to get to their place and get around the North Shore.

Allison and Gary are a wonderful host. They are very chill and I got to chat with both of them. I had a great stay in their place and good time in the north shore. They have snorkeling gears, towel, sunscreen, etc for beach activities.

Our stay here was great. We were occupied at a luau all day until 9:30pm and didn't not make it to the location until around 10:00pm and the host were helping with directions when we couldn't find the location the whole time. The place is clean and cozy. The host were awesome and talked with us a while!

Alison and Gary, along with their baby goat, couldn't have been more hospitable to my best friend and I. Really humble couple. And you're just minutes from Sunset Beach. They also had bicycles and snorkeling gear for us.
We had such a great weekend with Allison and Gary on the North Shore. Their new addition to the family (baby goat) made the time extra fun. Would definitely recommend others to stay there.

Allison and Gary are such a lovely couple, they made us feel very welcomed with a handwritten note, chocolates, clean room and towels! Thanks so much for a comfortable stay! I wish I had stayed longer with them so we could have more conversations =) 
Location on North Shore is good, no complaints at all.

Allison and Gary are both very welcoming and helpful.  It was awesome to stay up on the North Shore and have a short drive to all the different beaches up there.  Great place to stay and I'd highly recommend the room and the hosts!
Hosts were great!
Allison and Gary greeted me with smile even it was one of the busiest days of year - the 4th of July! I want to thank them for nice and clean room with Aloha!
Allison and Gary were awesome hosts, very friendly and really down to earth people. I would definitely stay at their place again. Small, simple and clean. Great people.
My stay was good. Hosts were really accommodating and let me do my laundry. Big clean room with nice cool AC running. The house was right across the street from the beach.

Allison and Gary were great hosts!  They were helpful and very welcoming.  The room was clean and very comfortable.  The house was within walking distance to the beach and in a great spot to explore the North Shore.  The check in process was easy.  It was a great place to stay that I would highly recommend!

Thank you Allison and Gary!! An awesome place to stay, friendly couple and great to chat to and gave me a bunch of local spots to visit on the north shore..also lent me snorkel gear and beach towel which made the trip for me..i would recommend this place to anyone. Cheers hope to see you again! Johnny

The room was perfect for our North Shore weekend. A beautiful, peaceful, seemingly private, beach is just a couple minutes walk across the street and several more are a short drive away. We enjoyed the proximity to activities we were interested in-Polynesian Cultural Center, Waimea Falls, surf lessons, snorkeling(they have equipment you may borrow). I stayed with my four year old daughter and Alison and Gary were very friendly to us,  even digging out some toys and coloring books for the little one. We felt welcome in the shared space and spent some down time hanging out in the living room watching TV or eating food we picked up at the grocery store nearby. The room is comfortable with plenty of closet space, good bed, and an AC unit. The hosts didn't mind that I arrived early and left a hidden key for me so that I could leave our bags and go off exploring. Overall, we had a great stay here and I'd recommend it, I liked staying here even better than the big Waikiki resort we went to for the rest of our Oahu vacation.

Allison & Gary are wonderful hosts and very welcoming. I had a great time at their house on the North Shore of Oahu. And Allison bakes delicious cupcakes. I slept well in the room with AC. I recommend !

Thank you very much for the warm welcome and the really nice stay! We enjoyed staying at your place, the beach is incredibly close and Allison and Gary are super nice hosts - a place to stay at north shore! :)
Great place and welcoming people. Would definitely recommend Gary and Allison as hosts!

Stayed there with my daughter and fiancé. Our stay was last minute. Had s family function to attend and Airbnb  was a life saver. Our car couldn't start when we checked out. And Gary gave us a jump! Great hosts and very relaxful atmosphere! Thanks for sharing your home with us G&A!
Gary was very friendly. He provided us with some good tips and lended us his snorkel gear. The place was fairly clean and the room even had AC!
The bedroom is clear,the air condition is perfect!The location is not easy to find,Car rental is need. The host is very kind.

Safe, clean and quiet is really all I need to make my stay great and Allison and Gary's place was a perfect place to crash at night after an adventurous day out. Patio was just so quiet and peaceful in the morning (I'm on Texas time so we woke up super early) - they're gracious and friendly travelers like us; I'd stay here again. For other travelers I'd suggest renting a car and shopping at farmers' markets to keep from spending money. Local Hawaiian beer is gooood :) Yelp for hiking spots and snorkeling at Shark's cove is best done SUPER early in the morning before the crowds come :) Thanks for opening your home to us!

I didn't have the opportunity to meet Gary but Allison was a great host. The vibe of the north shore is chill. And that is exactly what you'll find here. If you're looking for pristine, your best bet is a hotel. This is a great spot with easy access to the beach, some great local eats, and other outdoorsy activity. I would recommend it for solo travelers or couples but maybe not kids.
Allison was awesome and the room was really cozy and convenient!

Best Airbnb ever!!!
Very nice and friendly couple.
They offered us a free breakfast  every day and we could use the snorkel gear. 

It felt like at home.

Gary was a great host! My mum and I stayed with him (Allison was away) for 3 nights and loved our visit! Gary's super hospitable, made sure we felt at home, like temporary roommates. They've been hosts on AirBnB for a while now so the whole process was smooth, the room was great and the whole house is nice.
Thanks Gary!
Really nice room and great host Gary. Haven't seen Allison though. Thank them for housing.
Perfect little spot with fantastic AC.  Used their snorkels as well which were great. Thank you!
Great, clean, beautiful room in a secluded house close to the beach. Very comfortable, would definitely stay again! Some great snorkel gear/amenities to use at the house.

Great days right next to beach (6min) with beautiful room and house!
Gary was a very nice host & we'll be going Spearfishing :)

Just what I was looking for and exactly as described- cozy cottage set back from the road but within easy walking distance to quiet beautiful beach. Hosts were engaged when I showed interest to hang out and chat or completely understanding and non intrusive if I wanted to be on my own. It was the perfect blend of quiet time and interaction because it was at my pace and mutual respect.
Great couple they were very helpful and made me feel right at home.

I love staying here! Even though I didn't get to meet the hosts, finding the place was easy, getting in was easy, and I felt very welcome :-) I was really stoked to see that they had surfboards and a whole bunch of gear you could borrow to take down to the beach. Awesome! The room was very comfortable, Wi-Fi was fast, and the other guests were great too. Lovely experience! Thanks guys!
Our short stay was very nice.
Fantastic place which is within 15 minute drive of everything I wanted to do while on Oahu (swim, hike, lay on the beach, eat good food). Allison and Gary were both super friendly yet unobtrusive.

Very nice. Beaches near. The host prepared the place very well. Kitchen is completele where you can make, at least a complete breakfast. It is all for you - the guest. So you are well taken care of. 
I would highly recommend the place to anyone coming there. Perfect for a relaxed getaway. 0

Gary und Allison waren sehr freundliche, nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeber. Jedoch stimmte das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis nicht wirklich überein. Die Unterkunft war nicht wirklich sauber, aber es war auch eine eher kurzfristige Aktion dort zu nächtigen. Außerdem war es abends sehr laut, da es ein Samstagabend kurz vor Halloween war, und wir konnten uns von unserem Jetlag ohne ohropax kaum erholen. Alles in allem sehr freundliche Gastgeber und für eine Nacht okay.

Allison & Gary were very nice. We were only there for one night but the house was great. The pictures of the place were accurate. Their directions to get to the house definitely helped. We got to use beach towels, a beach chair, and snorkel gear, and a boogie board which was very convenient. There was a TV and AC in the room as well.  I recommend this place to everyone.

They were very welcoming and helpful with referring us to activities we wanted to do. Bright and clean spaces. Friendly! Wonderful location, right by Sunset and Pipeline beaches but quiet: off the main busy road. Nice AC, TV with Netflix. Good experience!

Allison and Gary are great hosts. Their house is very pretty and clean. Their house is very organized and they offer you everything you need.
I highly recommend it!

Nice Spot for surfers...
Good location to explore the north shore.
The hosts were very friendly. Our room was clean and spacious and offered nice amenities. We enjoyed the quiet relaxed setting.
