Allison & Gary were fantastic hosts! The cottage is in a prime location; I took one of their bicycle's and rode up and down the coast, it was a blast. They are also near public transportation and directly across the street from a beautiful beach. I would definitely recommend this one!

Lovely room, easy-going and super friendly hosts.
Thanks so much Allison & Gary, also for your support when I got sick!
EASY walk to beach. Peaceful neighborhood. Nice hosts.
nice hosts and the v-land beach is beautiful!
Lovely place to stay :-)

Allison and Gary's place is in prime location to do tons of fun stuff on the Northwest side of the island. It's about a 10-15 minute drive away from the touristy restaurants. Make sure to ask for snorkeling gear!

Alison and Greg are very laid back and friendly, everything was clean and the location is very ideal if you want to spend some time on the north shore. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks for having us guys.
Allison and Gary were great hosts. Clean room comfy bed and very accommodating.
Thanks for hosting us and having dinner with us it was great to chat and exchange. Also, you were very fast to respond and that is appreciated.

Gary and Allison are great.  They are young but very comfortable hanging out (we are old enough to be their parents). If you know the North Shore, then you know how great it is to rent a room and have it be comfortable.  There is one real hotel on the NS, and at $250-$400 a night- we just wanted to be home on the NS, so this was a great option.  We had to share a bathroom ( worked out well) and there was a full kitchen with refrigerator.  The parking was a little tight but very doable (also a plus on the NS). Air-conditioning was great!!!! Walking distance to V-Land, Ted's Bakery, and Sunset Beach. Public transit is available- also a great plus.
Host was very friendly and gave us a lot of information about the place.

Fantastic location and well set up for guests. Clean rooms and towels plus lots of activity gear to use. Our stay was pretty comfortable and the location was perfect for exploring the North Shore and beyond. Ted's Bakery was close by and delicious. Turtle Bay was a short drive away and had a full resort amenities many of which we could use. We also really enjoyed the tour of Kahuku Farms and the fantastic fresh food offered in their cafe.

Allison and Gary were not there, but their co-host Crystal was and she was the best host. I really enjoyed my stay there, I met some cool people. Only walking distance from Velzyland which is awesome too.
Allison and Gary were great hosts. Very relaxing and the beach is right across the street! Would recommend highly!
Great location.

Allison and Gary are open, welcoming, and wonderful people. The house was in such a remote location, it made me feel like I was really living in Hawaii for a couple days. This is a perfect place to stay on the North Shore and I would go again in a heartbeat.
Gary and Allison are fantastic hosts. Knowledgable of the area, accommodating, and social people. Excellent price and great value. Would definitely stay with them again!
Gary and Alison were super nice! Slept really well in their quiet cottage
Nice quiet place!
Gary and Allison were awesome. Very courteous and made me feel at home. The house was in a very quiet location off the main road.
Allison and Gary very helpful at check in and for restaurant recommendations.
Not much to say. Everything was as described, clean room and comfortable bed, very welcoming host.
This space is as indicated, room is very clean and comfortable bed. Alison and Gary were excellent hosts, would stay again.

Although we only stayed one night, Gary greeted us kindly and was fun to converse with while talking about other travel and air bnb experiences. The room was very clean and tidy and the house has a wonderful North Shore vibe! Highly recommend for any amount of stay! 8 minutes from Turtle Bay Resort where my friend and I attended Wanderlust!
Convenient location, hospitable friendly hosts, cute cozy home!  Would stay here again!
Nice location very close to sunset beach. Good for the price.
We had a great stay in the North Shore. Allison & Gary are welcoming and relaxed. We felt right at home.

This place is super nice and convenient to Pipeline, Waimea Bay Falls and all the North Shore. Allison and Gary are phenomenal hosts and super nice and friendly! Id definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a quite friendy stay! MAHALO!

Excellent communication. Very friendly and welcoming. Allison and Gary are happy people and my stay at their place was very pleasant. They were accommodating of my late check in after 9pm. I'd stay there again.

Thank you, Allison and Gary for your hospitality. We hope that the room addition turns out nicely. We want you to become SUPERHOSTS- At the good speed that you are developing, perhaps, you can rent out a larger home with 2-3 restrooms. Use the auto-feature to send accurate directions to guests who book and please include that the home is in the back of the alley. Especially after dark, guests can spend upto an hour trying to figure out the hyphenated address.
An investment into a new mattress will pay off in 4-7 nights' stay. 
The restroom and kitchen could use some TLC and elbow grease. I love your new refrigerator and the hardwood floors. Thank you for sharing your stories about your world travels.

This is the best airbnb we've ever stayed at! The couple was super chill and it wasn't awkward in the slightest. The rooms are nice and they just got all new bedding, towels, etc. They have everything you would want! We got
to borrow their snorkel equipment, boogie board, fins, etc. We would definitely stay here again, great location to all the best beaches.

Allison and Gary's place was perfect, both really friendly and gave me some good advice on what to see in Hawaii.

Room was nice and clean and comfy bed. I had everything I needed.

Highly recommend it if you want to explore the north shore while having a good base.

Our room was very clean and comfortable, the bed was plush and gave us a great nights rest. We were stoked on the location as it was well away from the busy downtown area and just 3 minutes from the beach. Gary is incredibly friendly and very accommodating. Highly recommend staying with Gary and Allison.
I had a great time at Allison and Gary's house. They were very welcoming and communication was good. The place was also neat and tidy with a great location on the North Shore.

Allison and Gary are lovely hosts. The place was homey casual which I liked. Surfing the North Shore has been a dream of mine for a long time and they literally live straight across the road from an amazing surf break. Their place is hard to find. It's tucked up a dirt road on a gentle hill.

Allison & Gary were super welcoming and so nice. I got there at night so the place was kind of tricky to find but once I did both Allison and Gary were there to greet me. You're close to many beaches both walking and driving distance and there's plenty of options for food a short drive away. Overall a fantastic stay and highly recommended if in the north shore.

Good room, comfy bed.  AC, wifi were perfect.  Definitely difficult to find, need to update markers in the add but Gary was great to text with us and come out to find us in the dark.  No complaints from us.

Not much to say that isn't in the listing. Fantastic location, clean room, and great hosts.  Read the house manual, it will tell you how to get there exactly how to get there and where to park. Hard to beat on the North Shore.
Nice people and a great location!
This place is a perfect spot in North Shore. The hosts are welcoming, helpful, and generous. The room was clean and bed was comfy. Certainly a place we would stay at again.
Mahalo

Allison & Gary were extremely friendly hosts who were responsible about communication and made checking in flexible and easy. Despite having other guests in the house, they made sure make you feel comfortable and welcome. I would definitely stay with them again!

Ich wurde im Haus von Allison und Gary freundlich und zuvorkommend aufgenommen und zum Abendessen (frisch gegrillter Lachs). Das Haus ist in einer Wohnsiedlung gelegen, 100m vom Strand entfernt. Für eine Erkundung der Nordküste Oahus sehr gut geeignet, allerdings ist die Gegend abends etwas verschlafen.
Falls man vorhat viel unterwegs zu sein, ist die Unterkunft bei Allison und Gary auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen.
Very nice and easygoing couple! Great place!
Multiple rooms with multiple people are being rented out with 1 bathroom to share

Allison and Gary are extremely kind people. They opened up their home to us and made us feel part of the family. I would highly recommend staying with them. Their house is clean, tidy, and comfortable.
Unser Aufenthalt bei Allison und Gary war gut und unkompliziert. Die Nähe zu den Stränden ist vorteilhaft.
Great place to stay.  Very personable hosts that go out of their way to help and accommodate you.  Even accommodated friends the last minute.

Great place to stay as an alternative to staying in Honolulu or a busier place. Gary and Allison were both very nice and easy to talk to. The room itself was very clean and nice. The place is super close to the beach and an authentic Hawaiian north shore stay.
Loved living like a local! Gary was awesome and very sweet. Great place to stay while exploring the north shore. Would love to come back!
Amazing place and expeience. Allison an and Gary are really sweet!! Inexpensive visit to the North Shore
Had a very pleasant stay in Allison & Gary's place.

I really like the place. 
Clean room, quiet, close to Sunset beach, so much better than Honolulu! 
Gary was really nice to me:) 
Thank you so much!!!
entspannt, ruhig, nah zum Strand

Allison & Gary are very nice people.  I just needed a place to crash while I explore the island during the day.

The room was nice and quiet. A pleasant stay overall. I would definitely recommend staying at this place.
Great host!
Great place and great location!

We had a pleasant short stay at Allison and Gary's. We felt very welcome and just simply at home. The room was fresh and had aircondition and a smart TV.  I highly recomend this place and these lovley hosts. 

Thank you, we had a great stat.

We
It was a plasant stay and everything was as mentioned! Bonus points for Velzy land beach, where it's right across the place and super private. Gary and Allison were super chill!
They are a very nice couple. The house is good and you can use the kitchen and the bathroom when you need.
I had a great stay at Allison & Gary's place. They have given me wonderful recommendations to beaches and places to see sunrise (so gorgeous!). Highly recommended their place!

Allison was accommodating upon arrival. She's shows you the house and where you'll be staying at. The room i stayed in was really neat.. I stayed in the whole night and tried to sleep early since i planned to be at the beach at sunrise, just a little bit of noise from the living room kept me from sleeping but since it was still early(8/9pm) i didnt pay much attention. 

I had quite a hard time looking for the house, you might have to call the host to find exactly where the house is. You will go through a drive way that leads to a dirt alley going up to their house. 
The location is very close to Sunset beach and Banzai Pipeline. Overall, I do recommend the place for a short stay.
We felt very welcome here. Allison and Gary are very friendly. Rooms were clean and bed was comfy. Close to everything on North Shore. Perfect hosts.

Allison and Gary both have a fantastic warm energy about them, and their set up and execution is just awesome.  The place felt very welcoming, clean, and relaxing.  I'd definitely stay again and highly recommend it.  This has easily got to be the best value on the North Shore.
Great people! Very polite and friendly. Enjoyed the quiet serene nature that's close by the beach. We were able to rest comfortably. We will definitely stay with them again.

Gary and Allison were great! Check-in was very easy and our room was everything we needed. Both of them had tips for what we could do during the day and places to eat in the area. I would highly recommend staying with them!

Alison and Gary are warm and inviting. They share conversation and a will to make your stay remarkable. Accommodating at every turn. Their place is near local beaches and public transportation. Recommended for those Hawaiian vibes.
Great value on the North Shore. The hosts are super friendly.

Great room in a cozy bungalow, just steps away from a secluded private beach. Really feels like you've stepped away from the crowd here, and Allison and Gary do a great job of being welcoming hosts and providing a real home atmosphere.  Room has great working AC, comfortable bed, and a TV for watching movies. A great choice for your beach stay.
This was a great place. There was at least 6 other people in the house which was pretty loud. Overall the hosts were great!

Good location, although it's not in Haleiwa. 15 mins out. our favorite thing we did was get to use the bikes they have at their house. across the street after you pass a few houses there's a bike trail under trees and you can make stops at the beach. We mostly talked to Gary and he was really friendly and engaging. he will like to hear about your stay and how to make it better. there's a shared bathroom between the owners and another air bnb room, so you have to wait your turn but it's usually available. the room has cold a.c. but no fresh air, which is not what we're used to at our home the wind is constantly blowing in. overall, we just wanted to spend time on the north shore for our first 3 nights and it was a good deal. :)
Great location and very friendly kind hosts. The room had ac, but sometimes I just used it as a fan or dehumidifier. Everything you needed you can use there. Will try and stay with them again.

The buses are a good way to travel on the north shore. There is a bus stop on their street. Very direct. Travel light and hopefully have an HBO or something. It was great going to the beach and coming back and watching game of thrones. They had other guests so be careful about when you want to use the bathroom. Nice rooms too.

Gary and Allison's place is a hideaway house just a short walk to the beach. Very lovely people and like minded travelers supporting other travelers looking to experience the O'ahu. Thanks for hosting us!
Great place

We really enjoyed our time here and would recommend it! Allison and Gary were really welcoming and provided extras like cereal to make it easy! As said in the instructions it can be tricky to find so read them carefully. Thanks for a great weekend!
This place is great for a stay near Oahu's North Shore area, the best deal you'll find, accompanied by extremely providing and generous hosts!
Thankyou :) everything was great.

Nice place, a lot of possibilities, nice and relaxed host, snorkel equipment for free. 
Quiet area and comfortable room.
Unfortunately Alison was not around, but we had a blast with Gary. We stayed for 3 nights, and on the last night he even grilled for us. Hope to see you again! Mahalo
Is always good to find people that open their house to strangers and treat them in such a nice way! House was beautiful, super clean and easy to find! Thank you very much Allison and Gary!

Gary and Allison were lovely hosts. Very easy to communicate with, generous, accommodating, and overall lovely people. The room was superclean and super cozy. Anything we needed, they were quick to offer.  Very much a community feel but also the privacy you would want.  We had a great time and I would highly recommend their place to anyone!
Really nice people, amazing bed. The hospitality was great!
Des hôtes fantastiques !!
Friendly place to stay.  Facilities and welcome great.
Warm hospitality, cozy place, friendly hosts and great location close to beaches.

This is a cozy place, near a bunch of great beaches. The room is comfortable and had ac and a TV with Netflix. There were towels to use, even for the beach. Gary and Allison are great hosts - really warm and inviting. We enjoyed staying with them.

Allison & Gary were so great!! I felt like we were friends by the end of the trip! They made sure all our needs were met and beyond and were so helpful in every way. The living quarters definitely served their purpose, it was a great location if you want to experience the North Shore authentically. Right down the street from the 7 mile & other great surf breaks if you’re a surfer (pipeline, sunset, v-land, etc.) I enjoyed talking to them & playing with their adorable dog. Will definitely stay here next year & whenever I make my way back to the North Shore. :) Thank you Allison & Gary!!
We only spent one night at Allisons & Garys place, but we felt very welcome and Allison prepared another room for us, so we could sleep with open window instead of AC. Thank for this.

While it's completely true that Allison and Gary are some of the friendliest and helpful AirBNB hosts that I've ever stayed with (they provided helpful advice on which beaches to visit, what to see on Oahu, snorkeling gear, etc.), it should also be said that their house did not live up to our expectations. Driving up to the house was difficult (up an unpaved road with potholes), parking was difficult (as close to the house as possible as there are about 5 or 6 other cars you have to contend with), and the house wasn't as clean as pictured. Though it's a given that houses near beaches will have some measure of sand, that doesn't excuse the amount of sand in the bathtub and general uncleanliness of the room/bathroom. If you're looking for proximity to beaches, and just a convenient place to sleep, this is the place for you. If you're looking for some measure of cleanliness and comfort (you will be sharing the bathroom with around 6 people), you might want to consider another location.

Awesome.  That's about it... Great hosts, honest people, genuine, comfortable beds, driven by straight forward services, they even lended us a car so we could buy groceries, WOW.  And a very cute dog.  Yes!  Go there.

Allison and Gary were quick to respond and easy to communicate with. Their place is lovely and was easy to find with their helpful directions. There is beautiful beach and surf spot just across the road. Overall  great experience.

Allison and Gary were perfect hosts! The room was very clean and comfortable. The living area is very inviting and the location was great for my north shore experience! I would definitely recommend it for someone wanting a good value and easy going experience.

Cute room with TV, great if you want to spend some time on the quieter side of the island. We didn't get to meet Gary, but Allison was there the whole time and she was super nice and accomodating with our needs. It's very nice that snorkel gears were provided. Also, the puppy was really cute and outgoing! Overall it was a great stay.

Es war für mich perfekt. Allison und Gary sind ganz reizend und tiefenentspannt. Kühlschrank, Bad, Waschmaschine, Schnorchelkram und überhaupt, irgendwie darf man alles mitbenutzen und man fühlt sich schnell wie zuhause. Shadow, ihr Welpe, ist zuckersüß und es war herzerwärmend , wie sie ihn trainieren. Ich fand die Lokation jetzt großartig, ein schöner Strand am anderen, und Profisurfer beim Wettkampf, aber ich hab jetzt abends auch sonst nichts gebraucht. Zum Partymachen ist es jetzt so nichts , aber ich hab auch nicht gesucht. Sicher wären rund um den Wettbewerb Events gewesen. Das Zimmer ist einfach , aber praktisch mit AC und das Bad teilt man sich, was aber nie ein Problem war.  Essen gehen war ich jetzt nicht, Foodland und  die vielen Foodtrucks waren gut für mich. Gerne wieder North Shore und dann bei Allyson, Gary und Shadow.

Gary and Alison are accommodating and easygoing hosts. Most of the guests staying there are active young people. It’s like staying in a private hostel, which is very fun. Although people living in four bedrooms share one bathroom, we were ok with that. The place is not very easy to be found, so it’s suggested to check-in during the daytime.
Amazing place. Very clean with great hospitality.
So welcoming and made us feel very comfortable in their home.

Great AirBnB experience due to super friendly hosts. We checked in very late which we felt badly about but Gary and Allison were most gracious about it. The accommodations are simple with a small room and shared bathroom, but were clean and completely met our needs. Great location on North Shore close to Weimea and not too far from BYUH. There is a nice bike path for biking or running too!
Parking issues

Comfortable room with shared bathroom and kitchen privileges and nice on the budget. Some common areas were not as clean as I expected (but I love clean spaces). I loved the location. Very easy to walk, bike and drive. Sunset beach is beautiful and quiet. The host was very friendly and helpful. Snorkeling gear available. I would recommend this place.
This place is perfect if you are looking for a place to relax and mellow out. Alison and Gary are exceptional hosts that respect people’s space.
Awesome hosts, will be back on this trip
Great stay. Very responsive and hospitable host. Nice to be near the beach. If you're afraid of dogs be aware you may encouter a few on the route so best to drive up to house.
A funky room for a good nights rest. Follow their location directions and you'll be fine.
Allison and Gary were very friendly and accomodating. Their place is a great location to explore the north Shore and surroundings. Room was very clean and exactly as listed.
a nice young couple who know about the surfing on the north shore... very friendly and we wish them luck...

We had a great time at Allison and Gary's! They made us feel right at home and gave us some great recommendations. Their house is in a great location and a nice bonus was having snorkeling equipment available for us to use!
Great spot, lovely hosts with a beautiful dog!

Allison and Gary's home was wonderful...we almost felt TOO at home. :) I would recommend their cute, quirky place to anyone. Allison and Gary's kind, laid back personalities made them perfect hosts. We also loved their dog!

We really enjoyed our stay here! The location is awesome, really nice neighborhood. The room was clean and the informations were easy to find (wifi password, emergency numbers, etc.). Very good experience! :)
Perfect place for travelers
Great place to stay!

Allison and Gary were amazing hosts! Very friendly, warm and welcoming. My husband and I spent a week at their Airbnb and it was perfect! Great location close to beaches, perfect north shore experience!

Great place minutes from the beach. The place is nice, has everything you may need. Gary and Allison are very welcoming and helpful. This place is minutes from sunset beach, pipeline. We enjoyed our stay here!

The Airbnb of Allison and Gary is really neat and located in a very quite neighbourhood across the street of the North shore. Allison and Gary are very relaxed and great hosts! The room is neat, clean and very cosy. Kitchen etc. can also be used and is equipped with everything needed. They also have a cute dog :)!
Sometimes when all the rooms are rented out, it can take some time to get to the bathroom, but still ok. All in all we really enjoyed the stay! Thank you!

Had a very short, rainy stay. Allison was very friendly and welcoming.  As mentioned in other reviews, the parking is a bit of an issue especially when cars need to be reshuffled in the rain... Amazingly there were no bathroom sharing issues even with a full house. Met some nice people and Shadow was an added bonus!

Very much appreciated my stay with Allison & Gary! Best part was their hospitality and quickness to respond when something was needed. Most challenging part for future guests might be the hostel-like atmosphere...five bedrooms sharing one bathroom. Also, potential cat/dog allergies. If you can handle that, what you see from their profile, and what you read from other reviews, you'll probably have a great stay here! Air conditioning in my room was fantastically effective! Thanks, Allison & Gary!

We had such a great time at Allison & Gary's place! We were only there for a night, but it was such a great experience, we would definitely stay again! Their home is so cute and they have also just added a new patio which is fantastic for hanging out on at night.

Allison & Gary (& Shadow) were amazing hosts. They went above and beyond to make sure everyone was comfortable and had everything they needed, are super friendly and flexible, and have nice pointers for the area :) They are genuinely kind and lovely people, happy to interact with guests or let them do their own thing. I had such a great stay, and a fun time chatting with the other guests as well!. Thank you Allison and Gary <3
Allison and Gary are friendly and welcoming. I enjoyed having my morning coffee on their outoor patio. All in all, a good value.

Place was awesome.
Very close to sunset beach and the famous Ted’s bakery.
Very nice host and will definitely stay again!

Allison & Gary were very friendly, and easy to talk to. They make you feel at home and welcome you, making your stay that much easier and better. Our room was exactly as pictured and described, and perfect for our plans and stay on the North Shore. Parking was simple. It was a great deal for what the place offers. I would definitely recommend Allison & Gary's Air BnB for future guests. We're hoping we can make it out there again, but hopefully next time a little longer so we cab enjoy the North Shore a little longer, and the fact that this place is literally right across the street but away enough from the main road. Very awesome place. Aloha.

This place was perfect for our trip. Nice bedroom, shared bathroom and kitchen but was for the most part clean. They have an Australian shepherd named shadow who is the sweetest pup ever and really well trained. The house is about 3 minutes away pipeline and pretty close to some awesome food and beach spots. Gary and Allison really made the place feel like home and we're super laid back. Would love to stay there again soon! And highly reccomend you do too

Definitely a weird experience. Place was smelly and damp inside. The Floors, tabletops, bathroom etc. were all pretty dirty.  We didn’t have bath towels provided. Outside had rusty, dangerous power tools everywhere in the rain. a lot of hazards. Bikes and beach gear also not provided. Would not recommend.

An adorable house with the sweetest pup, shadow! The location was calm and close to a lot of cool places in north shore. The only thing was that we couldn’t reach Allison and Gary when we couldn’t get in but once they arrived they were welcoming and kind. Overall a great place!
Good place to stay for the beach. I enjoyed staying and talking Gary and Allison!!

The rooms are in great shape and there are 4 of them all together in the house. Its a fun house to live and surf. One of a kind in this specific village. 

Allison is a wonderful host.

Perfect location at the north shore. Great hosts with a lot of good tips. 
And they have the biggest/sweetest puppy called Shadow entertaining the guests. 
Free WiFi and Netflix. Nice bonus. Highly recommend this place. Would love to stay there again.
Super nice hosts, perfect for next day Northshore water activities.  Couple other airb&b guests so nice to talk with them too.  Sweet puppy.

Allison and Gary were great! I loved their laidback, carefree way of hosting. Their place was easy to find if you follow the directions provided, and it’s in a fantastic location! Could not have asked more a more convenient spot!

Gary and Allison’s place was great! Clean, cozy, warm and friendly. Their dog shadow is super sweet. Gary and Allison were friendly hosts, offering whatever they could to make our stay welcome. Would def recommend!

For me, this place is the best quality/price you can get Northshore. Their dog is the kindest. The rooms are well equipped with AC and Netflix. And for surfers, it’s just a walking distance from the spot. The bathroom/toilet is shared with the hosts and the other guests.

Great value room near many amazing beaches! Simple but clean and comfy bedroom, quiet neighborhood. Definitely tricky to park in the small lot but with some maneuvering it worked out. Allison and Gary were quick to respond to my messages.

"Location" deserves 6/5 stars. This is a nice spot if you're visiting the northern side of the island - you can just about hit the ocean with a rock from here. Also being so close to Ted's Bakery meant we could easily hop over there for breakfast on our way to whatever in the morning. 
Sadly, we didn't get much of a chance to hang out and chat with our hosts (we were too busy exploring), but they were very warm and welcoming.

Allison and Gary’s house is in a nice location just across Kamehameha Hwy from the ocean. It is nestled into the foothills and was very quiet at night. It’s a bit of a hike from the town center of Haleiwa, and likely requires a car or bike to get there. However, there are coffee spots, bakeries, beaches, and hikes within walking distance. Gary and Allison weren’t there for our stay but their friend was staying at their place taking care of the guests, and she was wonderfully welcoming. The place needs a little bit more cleaning but it didn’t stop us from having a great time on the North Shore.

Bel emplacement, tranquillité. 
Merci à Allison et Gary
thank you so much:) it's nice place near the sunset beach.
Gary was a great host, easy check-in and -out. Recommendation for all future bookers: use the directions, Gary has on his AirBnB site, then you cannot miss the house!

Allison&Gary's home is cute and the perfect staying to calming down:)
 They are great hosts and super easy.
And shadow (dog) is such a sweetheart!
Great room for a great price.
Warm hospitality.  Low key and casual.  Pleasant accommodations.
Good place for one night. The a/c smelled a bit funky but worked great.
Absolutely fantastic stay- so close to the beaches and the house itself had every amenity you could ask for! I would definitely stay again.
Allison and Gary were great hosts. Very welcoming and their dog Shadow was so sweet too. Place was clean and super close to the beach.

Allison and Gary are the ultimate superhosts! Best place I stayed at during my entire trip and will be my go to Airbnb anytime I'm in Oahu. Their dog Shadow was the sweetest thing! I loved the decor and could have stayed in the house my whole trip and be more than content. 

I felt like a bother since I was checking in late in the evening and it was a bit hard to find the place, (they have written detailed instructions for this reason) but I had to call them anyways and Gary was nice and understanding about it! Thank you guys, and see you in the future!

Allision and Gary are great! They were both incredibly hospitable, responsive, and accommodating. The common spaces are shared with a few other bedrooms, so this is a good option if you like meeting other travelers as well as locals. I definitely recommend this airbnb!
Close to the beach and central to many north shore tourist spots. Allison and Gary are awesome! They are so welcoming and kind! Shadow is so sweet and quiet!  Great place to stay!

Super nice host, sweetest dog, and the AC unit in the room was a life saver. V-land beach is right down the street from the house and a really neat place to go explore. Very community like, which was great for me since I was traveling alone and enjoy the company of others.
Gary and Alison are nice, the place is good, i recommand for everyone

Allison und Gary are very friendly and helpful hosts. They can give you great tips on activities in the area. Their home is nicely decorated with spacious rooms. The house is located in walking distance to the beach and hiking trails and stores are also close by. 
I really enjoyed my stay with Allison and Gary.
Allison and Gary were awesome hosts. Travel buffs who enjoy sharing tips and experiences with their guests. I will definitely stay again if I visit that island gem again.

Allison and Gary are nice people. They told me where I can go hiking.
The house is very closed to the beach as well as the bus stop.
I feel like at home and the coffee was good:) and the bed very comfortable.
I recommend this place .
Had an great stay with Allison and Gary! Great location and very kind hosts! Thanks!

This place was great value for the north shore area. Minutes from the beach and Allison and Gary have a great place. They provided clear instructions so it was easy to find the house and nice that they had parking. Gary was very welcoming when I arrived. Would definitely stay here again.

EXCELLENT spot in North Shore. Less than a 5 minute walk to the beach and a 2 minute drive to local food spots. The home is potentially difficult to find as it is nestled into the mountainside, but the directions provided made it easy. Parking may be a bit cramp for a large truck. Everything inside was clean & welcoming. A/C in each room makes a huge difference too!
Cute place, great location!
Super nice people! & super chill! AC was always the life savor after days in the sun! Thank you!!

The house is a few miles away from Haleiwa town and right near beautiful coastline spots like the Banzai pipeline and Sunset beach.  I liked the convenience and location of this place for the value. The room was nice and tidy and they provided WiFi and Netflix. Parking by the house was easy.  Thanks Allison!
Comfortable room in a great town.  Great value and the hosts were very friendly.
Lovely home. Super close to the beach and delicious local eats. Allison and Gary were really friendly and welcoming.

This home was the perfect location! It was literally a 2 minute walk to the beach and absolutely beautiful! The room has an Swamp cooler wall unit which was amazing! The TV was nice as we could watch Netflix and Hulu at night. It is about 1/2 mile away from Ted’s Bakery which was so delicious!  Allison was super nice and texts is back really fast. Closet had some hangers for us and there’s a washer and dryer in the back. Definitely recommend!
Great room, great location, with friendly hosts!
Great spot if you are wanting to stay in the North Shore area by Turtle Bay.

They have a lot of snorkeling equipments and beach chairs. Alison is very nice and know many good travel informations. Shadow is very cute and smart. The house is very nice and the room and bed is comfortable.

Nous avons été très déçus de notre séjour. Il n'y a qu'une seule chambre de bain pour un total de 10 personnes possibles dans la maison.  C'est beaucoup trop. Il y des objets qui traînent un peu partout, dans et autours de la maison. Les hôtes manques de temps pour en faire une place bien et il y a un potentiel énorme ! C'est une maison louée qui à besoin de beaucoup de rénovations et surtout d'améliorations (plus de rangement). La salle de bain est à refaire. Ne soyez pas surpris de voir le robinet de la cuisine mal fixé. C'est un endroit parfait pour de jeunes gens en voyages et qui ne font que passer et qui ont un budget serré mais nous n'avons pas aimé. Nous avons discutés avec d'autres voyageurs présents et nous avions tous les même commentaires négatifs. Désolé mais ça ne respecte pas selon moi la philosophie airbnb.

Good value due to location, however the room and bathroom was not as clean as expected or pictured. There was also a gap in the window between room and air conditioner so we had to improvise and shove cardboard between for bugs/privacy.
Security was a slight concern because our room didn't have a lock. Location however is excellent, walking distance to beach and Ted's, etc.
Very accommodated and relaxful atmosphere. Right next to a secluded beach and walking distance to a very good bakery.

At first when pulling up to the house, we were a little unsure about the place, but once you get inside, it's incredible and they have the CUTEST dog named Shadow. Although we never got to meet Allison, Gary was a great guy and you could tell that he cared about us. We were welcomed to use anything in the house, just clean up after yourself of course. We were so excited to have an A/C unit in our room because of how hot it was there, and having the TV was a huge bonus as well. It was a great way to relax after the day. We had a great time staying here, and I would highly recommend to anyone who wants to stay on the North Shore. The location is perfect and right next to all the good beaches.
Everything is fine, the landlord is very friendly and the dog is very cute, but the room door can not be locked, it will be a little uneasy
Perfect little cottage to stay at while visiting the North Shore of Oahu.  Super clean and comfortable.  Shadow is adorable.  Thanks again for a great space.

Great spot! We really enjoyed our stay. The set up allows you to interact with other travelers while still having your private space. There’s a great outdoor hang out area and their pup Shadow is absolutely adorable.
Great spot! You get to interact with other travelers while still having your own private space. Shadow is adorable and they have a great outdoor hang out area
Loved staying here! They were super cool people and very hospitable! They’re dog was extremely friendly and super cute! Thanks again!

The location is amazing, didn’t think it was difficult to find just a bit off the beaten path. Right off many north shore beaches, Teds, etc. Just as pictured, loved having AC for a day. Met some of the other travelers staying there and one even shared their last breakfast with me. Always love places like this to meet people and swap stories. I only met Gary and he was awesome. Highly reco this place, would stay again if I’m back!
Good location. Nice hosts. A budget rental, keep that in mind.
a little hard to find, but i think thats because of how addresses work in the area. Everything was great, Allison and Gary were very nice and relaxed hosts

We couldnt have a better stay at the North Shore. Allison and Gary provided all we needed, even more... A cosy room with a great AC an lots of space for our backpacks; a really good equipped kitchen; loads of shampoo and soaps; free coffee, cereals and spices, a great location; a welcoming, chatty atmosphere; good directions to the place... We felt at home! Thank you!

선셋비치 부근에서 머물르고 싶었는데
좋은 호스트를 만나서 좋았어요~ 반려견 쉐이크도 귀여워요

Allison and Gary were amazing hosts! They were so generous from check in, where Gary explained that the kitchen and living room were shared spaces. We were able to use the entire kitchen which was so kind of them, we also had so much fun with their dog Shadow (beware, he might sneak a sock or two out of your room- but he’s such a good boy that he never actually eats them, and he is too cute to not be forgiven!). Gary offered us snorkeling gear and Allison allowed us to eat anything in the kitchen- we were going to buy cereal and she kindly offered what they had in the pantry! 

We would definitely come again, the beach across the road was by far our favourite on the North Shore (it was a very quiet beach too, not popular like Waimea or Sunset). Super close to the Bus stop (although you might be waiting a little while to catch it, once you’re on it’s great though!), walking distance to Ted’s bakery and Sunset Beach!

Thank you again Allison, Gary and Shadow!
Allison and Gary and Shadow, their puppy are all super nice. The place is cool, good location,  nice place, nice vibe. Thanks guys

we enjoyed our stay at Allison and Gary's, the room had a comfy bed, air-con and netflix. the house is in a great location, walking distance to the beach. Our hosts were very friendly and have a gorgeous dog!!

Allison & Gary are hardworking lovely couple. At our arrival, they had just recently moved to another house and were doing renovations, so our lodging was not as clean and tidy as it should have been, but everything else was good! It was great that there was plenty of extras like beach towels and lots of shampoo varieties. Location is nice and close to Ted’s bakery! And beaches. We wish them good luck on their renos!
Nice place to stay! I loved the porch and meeting other guests.
A useable living space for a decent price.

It was such a great stay, it is highly recommended for everyone who wants to visit the north shore. The location is perfect and I could easily take the bus to any famous beach of the north shore, like sunset or shark's Cove. Also the beds are very comfortable and it is a really relaxing place to stay. Moreover Allison and Gary are such nice hosts, I really felt like at home.

In general we enjoyed our stay. We were not aware that we would be sharing the place and the only bathroom with 4 other parties. It got a bit tight at times. The rooms are cute and Allison and Gary provide everything you need (incl. washer and dryer). There is a lot of trash underneath the house - hopefully this is a work in progress. We found the communication a bit difficult before we arrived, as we weren’t getting any responses to our questions, but once we were there they were very responsive and always friendly. The location is great (5 min walk to sunset beach).

Great value! Gary came out and help us know where to park and walk us in. The other guests were a little loud in the living room, but they were super nice and friendly to us. The noise should be expected if you’re gonna rent a room adjacent to others. Overall we were pleased with the experience.

Awesome space for the value! Be aware you are sharing bathroom and kitchen area with other guests and hosts, however, we only ever saw one other couple while we were there. Allison and Gary were amazingly communicative with finding the house and when our check-in schedule changed they were flexible. And the AC was SO COLD. (: There was an incident where the road was blocked the second night due to a crime scene and in order to get back to the house we would have had to drive 3 hours completely around the island. But our hosts offered to come to get us at the other side of the closure (though police wouldn't let us through). That was out of our hands and we had to find another place to stay the night. We would come back as its so close to the best beaches on the island, Sunset and Waimea Bay (:

A stunning area. So wonderful. The house is a rickety old building on stilts. Whenever someone closed a door the whole house reverberated! 8 people for 1 bathroom proved problematic! Nevertheless we really enjoyed it there.  Met some lovely people and enjoyed some wonderful sights.
Great location, amazing value!
This is an amazing location! Great hosts and good times :)
Great place ! 2 min of vezland beach.

Gary is a very nice guy, I never met Allison. I have never had a bad experience at an Airbnb until I stayed here. It was advertised as being a guest in Allison and Gary’s Home with their dog. Instead I am in a four bedroom house that is totally rented out thru Airbnb.

The WORST PART was having 7 people with one, yes ONE BATHROOM. It could have been 8 people with one bathroom but I was traveling on my own. Luckily everybody was fairly considerate and took short showers. 

ONE BATHROOM FOR 8 PEOPLE IS TOTALLY UNACCEPTABLE.  

I have traveled around the world and have stayed in many hostel situations that were far better than this place.

Logement très degeulasse, et non entretenu, les plante qui pour sur les murs exterieur de la maison, des espace qui laisse passer les insecte dans la maison et qui meurs partout a terre et sur les meuble, photo a l’appuie . Et l’hôte qui a répondu a aucun de mes texto

Allison and Gary’s place is very well equipped. Both the bathroom and the kitchen have very useful guest consumables. The room itself has a closet for storage and and AC. I’d definitely go back to stay when I’m on the north shore.

name: Mitchell Manor
space: Beautiful one bedroom apartment located in a historic Brooklyn Brownstone neighborhood. Prime location 20 minutes from Manhattan. One block from C train, 2 1/2 block from A train. 10 minutes from Barclay Center, we are also conveniently located to a multitude of restaurants and shops. Additionally, there is a grocery store conveniently located around the corner from the property. Apartment has hardwood floors throughout the bedroom features a regal sleigh bed and a slate fireplace. The room was built for relaxation. The kitchen is fully equip with all the necessities. The living room features a queen sofa bed couch, love-seat, flat screen TV and coffee table. The bathroom has an antique claw foot tub and petal stool sink. PLEASE NOTE:  7 nights (weekly rate) $800. Monthly Rate (28 Nights) $2800.     Refundable Security deposit $250.  Check-in time is 3pm check-out is 11am.  Should you need to check-in before 3pm there may be an additional charge.  Check-in before noon is an additional
description: Beautiful one bedroom apartment located in a historic Brooklyn Brownstone neighborhood. Prime location 20 minutes from Manhattan. One block from C train, 2 1/2 block from A train. 10 minutes from Barclay Center, we are also conveniently located to a multitude of restaurants and shops. Additionally, there is a grocery store conveniently located around the corner from the property. Apartment has hardwood floors throughout the bedroom features a regal sleigh bed and a slate fireplace. The room was built for relaxation. The kitchen is fully equip with all the necessities. The living room features a queen sofa bed couch, love-seat, flat screen TV and coffee table. The bathroom has an antique claw foot tub and petal stool sink. PLEASE NOTE:  7 nights (weekly rate) $800. Monthly Rate (28 Nights) $2800.     Refundable Security deposit $250.  Check-in time is 3pm check-out is 11am.  Should you need to check-in before 3pm there may be an additional charge.  Check-in before noon is an additional
neighborhood_overview: Friendly, clean, close to transportation, restaurants and shops.  Also, just 20 minutes from Manhattan.
transit: Subway one block away.
house_rules: Absolutely No Pets and No Smoking!  Only guests in the contract allowed to sleep over there will be an additional charge for other guests.  Maximum number of guests in apartment is four.  Please be mindful of other residents and keep noise to a minimum.  Any damage to the premises will result in a deduction of forfeit of security deposit.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: New Yorker project management professional.  I am free spirited and live life to the fullest.

reviews.comments:
The apartment is really great with all new, very nice. The bed is very comfortable and the perfect couch for two people. Excellent presentation. It really is like the apartment is in the photos. It is only two blocks from the metro, 15 minutes to Manhattan.

Nicole is very friendly. She was always aware of our calls and our arrival.

Really highly recommended.

We had an amazing time staying at Mitchell Manor. The home is beautiful and well maintained. The hosts were extremely generous and welcoming. Great neighborhood...easy access into Manhattan.
I will definitely stay there when I return to NY this summer or fall.
Nicole was an excellent host very professional and helpful. The apartment was exactly like the pictures. Very comfortable, clean and pretty. Would recommend to others.

This was the best Airbnb host I had. I was visiting my family that I haven't seen in over five years, and it was wonderful. The apartment was beautiful and completely immaculate. I would stay here again.

Nicole was wonderfull host and person) We adored all about our stay. Nicole was very helpfull and gave us a lot of information and advises we needed. The apartment has very good location (near subway-3 min).And the neighborhood is very nice and beautiful.  The apartment was very clean and just like on photos. There was everything you may need in travel. Thank you Nicole

The appartment was very clean, everything looked as shown in the www.
Nicole is very friendly and helpful.
We would definitely stay there for another time.

Appartement très agréable situé dans un quartier typique, bien entretenu et fonctionnel. Nous étions 2 adultes et 2 enfants. Time Square se situe à 30 mn en métro par la ligne C et l'on y accède en 5 mn à pieds depuis l'appartement. Nicole est une personne très serviable et conviviale. Cet appartement a un bon rapport qualité-prix, le supermarché situé à coté est pratique mais sans grand choix alimentaire mais il dépanne bien. 
Juillet /aout 2013

Nicole was realy nice and friendly. It was a pleasure to stay at her appartment. Everything was looking like at pictures shown in description. Flat was clean. Even when i dropped small thing and have to pick it up below the bad,  i found that it perfectly clean there :)

The flat was as shown in the pictures and its cleanliness was very good. Nicole was very nice and when we arrived she was keen on telling us about what is available in the neighbourhood as to supermarkets and restaurants. I would stay again at her place if I had to go back to NYC.

If you would like to have a wonderful time in New York City, come to 
Brooklyn and stay at Mitchell Manor! Not only the apartment in a nice and 
quiet neighborhood make you feel at home, but first of all the wonderful 
host Nicole. She helps you with all your questions and can give you 
important advice for the first days in city. 
The apartment looks the same as the photography, it is homelike, very 
clean and in the kitchen you will find all equipment you will need. The C 
train to Manhattan is five minutes away. And close to the apartment you 
will find lots of supermarkets and grocery stores. I think, Mitchell Manor 
is a good place to stay in New York – and to come back again!

Nicole was very welcoming and worked around our arrival schedule so she could be there to meet us. The apartment is immaculately clean but also very comfortable so you feel like home. Close to the subway and the neighbours are also friendly! Nicole also checked on us during the week of our stay to make sure we had everything we needed. Couldn't ask for more!

Nicole and her husband were realy nice and friendly. It was a pleasure to stay at the appartment. Everything was looking like at pictures shown in description. Flat was clean and tidy. 
Great neighborhood!

Nothing short of AMAZING!! Staying at Nicole's manor was everything I wanted it to be and more - relaxing, warm, comfy - just like home! Nicole and her husband Titus were so sweet and accommodating to my mom and I when we stayed in their place. The kitchen was fully stocked with all the cooking utensils one could need - a big deal for me! Only 20-25 minutes to the city on a very close subway, I would without a doubt stay here again - and again and again! 

The neighborhood had some yummy restaurants to offer (PEACHES) and eclectic little markets stores to check out.

Probably one of my best AirBNB experiences I've ever had.

Our stay at Nicole's was just great. The apartment had everything we needed and is as beautiful as it shows on the photos. Nicole even provided us with a little bed for our 1,5 year old daughter who was travelling with us. The neighbourhood was awesome too, with playgrounds just around the corner, the A-train just a 5-10min walk away and yummy restaurants like the Peaches or the Italian place with the great atmosphere on Lewis. Nicole was a wonderful host too, she was always there when we needed something or had an question, but she also always respected our privacy. This was our first AirBnB-experience and it certainly won't be our last. Thank you Nicole for the great week at your place!

Very clean and convenient location, C line direct to Manhattan.
Nicole and her husband were very friendly hosts.

Nicole was friendly & welcoming and her apartment was clean & tidy. Bed was very comfortable and the local subway was very close, with a supermarket in between. 
Would definitely recommend!

Très bon rapport avec Nicole et son mari qui nous a accueilli.
Très serviables et sympathiques.
L'appartement était très propre et fonctionnel.
Il faut juste savoir qu'il est à l'entre sol.
Le quartier très chouette, avec tous les magasins nécessaires et à 3 minutes à pieds d'une station de métro vers Manhattan.

Nocile es una persona muy amable y servicial. Nos dio todas las indicaciones necesarias para nuestra estadía y estuvo dispuesta ayudarnos con las inquietudes que teníamos. Estamos muy agradecidos con ella.
El apartamento es muy cómodo y agradable, tal como se ve en la fotografía, esta dotado con todas las cosas que uno puede necesitar.
La ubicación es muy buena, a 2 cuadras de una estación del metro y tiene líneas de buses a 1 cuadra, inclusive hay una que lleva directamente al aeropuerto JFK en caso de necesitarlo.

I spent a week in NYC visiting family with my wife and son.

The experience at Nicole's place was delightful.  She was very easy to get ahold of before and during our stay by phone so coordination in arriving and arranging things was perfect.

She lives upstairs with her family which is nice and takes very good care of everything.  

When we arrived she greeted us and helped us with orientation of the area and how to get around etc.

The location in Brooklyn was very convenient; a five minute walk to the subway which goes direct into Manhattan (about 20-25 minutes).

The were stores and place to get food and eat nearby.

The first night there was a huge storm and the power went out but it was fixed by the next morning and she refunded us one night as a gesture to cover the problem which was very kind.

We would definitely recommend others wanting to stay in NYC her place and would come back again.
Comfortable, well appointed apartment in Brooklyn, close to Metro. Knowable  bable, courteous and engaging hostess and host.  Unreservedly recommended.

Nicole is a great host. She's very helpful and attentive and truly cares about her guests, trying as much as she can - but without being too imposing - to attend to their needs and make their holidays an unforgettable time. The description of the apartment is accurate and reflects the reality. The only thing I could pick at is that it did not have as much as light as the photos show, but this was not a big deal for us as we spent all days out. Thanks Nicole for making our stay in NY an unforgettable time!

This was our first time using AIRBNB. We really enjoyed our experience. Nicole met us when we arrived and made us feel very welcome. She told us about several cafes and other businesses within easy walking distance from the apartment. Nicole was just a phone call away if we needed to get in touch with her. The apartment itself was well appointed and very clean. It was nice having a full kitchen so we didn't have to eat every meal out. The apartment is within easy walking distance of a subway station, making our sightseeing trips into Manhattan very convenient. We felt very safe walking around the neighborhood when meeting up with other family members and new found friends. I would have no reservations in recommending this rental to anyone.

Nicole was really a nice host. She explained everything you need to know and also some tips how to catch the metro and so on. The apart. was as described,nice And clean! The neighborhood was interesting and like you imagine Brooklyn to be :) really enjoyed the stay, a big Yes for anybody who wants to hsve a amazing time in Big Apple! Good connectionto metro.
Tres bon appartement bien situer a 20 min de manhattan petit magasin ouvert h24 juste a coter quartier tranquille et Nicole vraiment serviable et la si besoin.

My wife and I stayed here for a week and I'm baffled as to why Mitchell Manor has been given a 4.5 star rating by previous guests. The location is reasonable with good access to the bus and subway system with either being a only short walk away. Unfortunately the location is also at the corner of a main street that's light controlled and between the hours of 9pm and midnight the traffic noise was constant and loud. Music at full volume and acceleration at full throttle seems to be the norm. The bedroom is on the street side! There are numerous maintenance issues with the suite some of which I consider serious from a safety perspective. The wiring in the suite is questionable with lights dimming and switches/plugs installed incorrectly. The tub/shower arrangement needs a grab bar and a non-slip surface installed. A towel rack and a shelf or two would be helpful as well. The stove fan is falling down and the cupboard doors and drawers need handles! The mattress and the couches need to be updated. They've seen better days and are back breakers. The other issues are purely routine maintenance but ones that should be checked and addressed prior to each guests arrival. Aside from the traffic issue which the host can't control,  I couldn't recommend Mitchell Manor in it's present condition.

L'appartement que loue Nicole est très sympathique,propre,fonctionnel,situe dans un quartier de brooklyn anime .Il est proche de la station de Kingston  troop Metro et très près des commerces et lave automatique.Nous y avons passés un agréable séjour et les gens du quartier sont très accueillants et serviables.Nous garderons un très bon souvenir de ce lieu et nous le recommanderons à nos amis qui voudront venir ultérieurement visiter New York.

Nicole heeft ons hartelijk ontvangen in het appartement. En heeft ons allerlei tips gegeven over het openbaar vervoer, eetgelegenheden en supermarkten in de buurt. Het appartement was schoon en was goed voorzien van allerlei keuken en kookgerei en linnengoed.
De matrassen op het 2 persoonsbed lagen prima. 
De matras op de uitklapbed in de woonkamer was niet comfortabel meer en is aan vervanging toe. Nicole woont met haar gezin boven het appartement, maar liet ons volledig vrij en was beschikbaar voor vragen. De buurt waarin het appartement ligt voelde prima en wij hebben ons geen moment niet veilig gevoeld. Met de metro, op 1 blok loopafstand = 5 minuten, ben je binnen 20 minuten in downtown Manhattan. Wij hebben een prima verblijf gehad en bevelen het appartement ook van harte aan.
We enjoyed our stay at Mitchell Manor.  Nicole was very welcoming, and it's in a good location.  Plus, there's an awesome coffeeshop over the road.

Nicole made us feel really welcome upon arrival and through out or stay. The apartment was exactly as described in the picture; clean neat and comfortable. The neighbourhood was really safe in fact we found the people to be very friendly and helpful. The subway was just round the corner making our journeys into Manhattan very easy.  I would definitely visit again.

Nicole was very welcoming, explaining about the subway, places to eat and shop in the neighborhood. The location is great, and the flat it self was large and spaciuos, and very clean. Fully equipped kitchen including toaster, coffeemaker and blender was also very nice, as we cooked at home a few times. The wifi was fast and fully functioning, the well equipped deli literally across the street was open 24hrs, and the supermarket around the corner was a good spot for shopping groceries. All together a very pleasent stay.
Thank you Nicole :)

Le logement est conforme à la description et aux photos. La chambre est grande et agréable. Le canapé est un peu moins confortable mais fait l'affaire. L'appartement est propre et agréable.
Nicole et son mari ont été très accueillants, et facilement joignables.
La rue est très mignonne. Le quartier dans sa globalité un peu moins. Mais l'appartement est à 5 min à pied de l'arrêt de métro d'une ligne locale qui mène directement aux quartiers importants assez rapidement : pont de Brooklyn, wall street, Times Square, west central park et même Harlem. C'est très pratique.

Check in was a nightmare. After emailing Nicole four times to arrange check in we ended up arriving at the time I had stated we would. 
Knocking on door for a good 15 minutes, no answer even though she knew we were coming. Thankfully her lovely neighbour was leaving her house next door and tried calling Nicole for us to let her know we were standing out the front, still no answer! 
We then had to leave our luggage with her neighbour as I had also stated via email to Nicole that we had to be in manhattan as we had plans to meet friends from Australia who we only had the day to spend with after not seeing then for three years. 
We then had to go to a Starbucks in manhattan to see if I recieved a response from Nicole as we had no phones only email access. She then told me that she was home the whole time but couldn't hear us knocking?? And then told us to come back and check in at either 3pm or 8:30pm as they were the only times she could be available so after ruining our whole day and plans with our friends we then had to commute all the way from manhattan to brooklyn just to check in and get the keys! We then arrived at the door as Nicole had said she was home waiting for us, was knocking again for a further 15minutes and surely enough, no answer again!! At this point we thought someone was playing us for a joke! We then knocked on her neighbours door again to call her for us! 
I have never been so frustrated!!
Nicole arrived eventually and stated she had to 'pop' out quickly, seriously?? 
Nice place inside and friendly neighbourhood. Slept on fold out couch and was given sheets, the sheets and pillow cases were full of hair, emailed Nicole to let her know this and request new sheets, there was no 'sorry' just 'I'll bring them down later' 
Would have been an enjoyable stay had all of this not gone pear shaped so unfortunately I cannot recommend this place for that reason.

Me and my girlfriend had a wonderful time in Nicole's appartement. Check in was easy. Nicole answered every single text massage very quick and even provided some bottled water for those who don't like tap water. Everything was clean and safe even though the neighborhood seems a little bit "strange" when your origin is a typical german town. However, it took us like 2-3 days to get used to it and then we liked it. There's a small Deli right across the street. They have very delicious sandwiches for a god price. There's a hip coffeeshop and a grocery store right next to it. So that's fine.  
The subway is a 5 min walk and it takes you about 40 min to Times Square, 20 min to Lower Manhattan. 
The night trains don't stop at Kingston Throop Ave so that's a little minus. So you have to figure out a way to get home which is usually by taxi cap. 

So in conclusion: Nicole is a very very nice host. She lives in the house so if you need anything or just want to say Hello she's there for a small talk. 
The apartement is just fine. 
It does require a lot of subway traveling to get to Upper Manhattan. 
Bed Stuy is a family friendly part of Brooklyn. People are mostly helpful. However, there're some crazy people out on the streets, but hey, it's Brooklyn right. 

Thanx Nicole:-)

We had a great time at Nicole's. She is a very warm-hearted and helpful host who always gave us advice where to find whatever we were looking for. The rooms were clean and nice, hand-over of keys was easy and quick. The neihbourhood may seem strange in the beginning but it is quite safe with a church and a deli right across the street and the subway "Kingston Throop Ave" just around the corner. As former guests already said: Be careful which train to take since some trains do not stop at the subway. 
We were four people, two of us were using the couch which was less comfortable but totally okay.

I stayed about a month at Mitchell Manor with my family and they loved it. It was very clean and in a convenient location to us. We were able to commute to Manhattan easily and also liked the neighborhood of Brooklyn. Nicole kept communications channels open at all time and was easy to approach. Totally recommended.

Our experience at Mitchell Manor was wonderful. We love BedStuy and this place is in a great brownstone. It's very clean, equipped with everything you need plus more. Nicole and her family were wonderful hosts! They are very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this one!

We had a great time at Nicole's place. We really liked the neighbourhood, very laid back, with some nice cafes, restaurants and bars nearby. The subway to Manhattan is literally just around the corner so it was easy to go back and forth. Nicole was very helpful. Unfortunately there were some problems with the internet connection during the last 3 days of our stay but she helped us out and let us use her iPad in the meantime. Everything was clean, there were even fresh towels for us to use. The only downside for me was that the place is a little dark, but we spent most of our time outside anyway. We really enjoyed our stay!

Nicole communicated with us before we arrived and met us at the apartment. On the day of our departure she let us leave our luggage in the apartment and check out late. She also arranged transportation to the airport for us.

Nicole was great during the set up process and we even asked to drop our bags early so we could enjoy the sites.  Her sister was there to greet us and show you around, gave us directions and also train schedule etc.  Very nice!  The apartment was in a nice neighborhood and it was easy to access transportation to get to the city.  It was very clean and it had everything we needed from towels to kitchenware and everything in between.  When we were leaving, they met us and helped us with our things and to hail a cab!  I would highly recommend staying at Nicole's and will stay there again upon my next visit.  Very easy and responsive to all my questions and we had a great time.  Thank you!!

We were a family group of three staying 10 days in NYC seeking accommodation out of, but near, Manhattan to avoid its crazy prices and cramped living spaces.  Mitchel Manor met our requirements being only a 5 minute walk to the subway stop and taking just 20 minutes to lower Manhattan and about 40 minutes to mid town. We found the accommodation to be accurately described and Nicole responded promptly to any queries and was very friendly to deal with. We would readily recommend this apartment.

Some tips for visitors. The nearest subway is Kingston Throop, Turn right on leaving the apartment and then immediately right onto Marcus Garvey Glvd followed by a right on Fulton street. The subway is just past a McDonalds. Even if you are only staying for a few days it is worthwhile to buying an unlimited 7 day subway ticket for about 30 dollars as individual trips cost 3 dollars. Take the uptown C train to Manhattan. Late night trains do not stop at Kingston Throop. In this case take the downtown A or C train to the next stop at Utica. This is only a little further from Mitchel Manor, about 8 minutes walk. Make sure you visit the Brooklyn bridge for its spectacular views of NY, particularly at night. The C and A trains stops close by at High St. (keep a close lookout for the turn off for the bridge as it is very easy to miss)

I would also recommend trying two restaurants close to the apartment. Turn right on Decatur St and left on Lewis ave.  Peaches is almost immediately on the right and Saraghina is a few minutes on the left. Both have a great atmosphere, reasonable food and are great value.  There is a supermarket close by on Marcus Garvey and a larger one on Fulton street just up from the Kingston Throop stop.

Très bien accueillis par Nicole qui nous a montré des documents, des livres, un plan de métro sur New-York et qui nous a parlé  du quartier. Beau logement, propre et agréablement décoré. De plus, bien situé sur une ligne de métro et à proximité de plusieurs magasins d'alimentation.

Our family of three lived at Mitchell Manor for a week. We were welcomed warmly. Everything we needed was there, we could cook and shopping was easy in the area. We liked the neighbourhood and loved to walk through Brooklyn up to Brooklyn Bridge, but there was also easy access to public transport. The hosts live upstairs and we could have contacted them easily. We recommend this appartement for a great time in New York and a nice retreat away from the Razzle Dazzle of Manhattan.

Nicole met us on arrival and was very welcoming. She made sure that we had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. The apartment is excellent as a base to explore New York, it is well equipped whether you wish to simply have breakfast at home (which we did) and eat out or cook for yourselves. There is everything lolly that you could want from the 24 hour grocery stores to the subway that is at pst a 10 minute walk that also runs 24 hours....We will certainly be back as there is still a lot more of New York that we want to explore! Nicole was also very helpful with a late checkout.

It was a great experience. We were 15 days on NYC. When we arrived to NYC I called Nicolle and she anwered me that  she tried to stay at our arrival in the apartment but if she was not how we had to proceed. She was not there but her daugther was and 5 min later Nicollete arrived to the apartment and gave us some explanations to help us . She gave us some explantaions about the subway, about where we could buy, near restaurants and so on....whenever I sent her a message, she always answered me....Even more, in our departure day, she called a taxi on my behalf to the airport. Thaks a lot Nicollete.

We spend a week in Nicole's place in October and had a fantastic time. The apartment is well located, easy access to the metro and a comfortable neighbourhood. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Nicole was very welcoming and helped wherever possible. Would certainly recommend!
Appartement avec un espace agréable,  confortable avec tout le nécessaire à disposition,  très propre, un peu sombre. Dommage que nous n'ayons pas accès à la petite cour.

We had a great 4-night stay at Mitchell Manor! Nicole and Titus were very friendly and accommodating. The apartment was clean and comfortable, and exactly as shown in the listing photos. Location was nice, and easily accessible to Manhattan by subway.  We'll definitely try to stay here again upon our next trip to NYC!  Thanks, Nicole!
Hola, la casa donde estuvimos era muy amplia y confortable. Nicole es muy amable y servicial. Gracias por lo bien que lo hemos pasado.
Great person and host! Definitely recommended to all Airbnb world!
Nicole was great and we loved the apartment! I would definitely stay here again.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nicole and Titus were very hospitable and responsive.  Very clean.  The neighborhood was clean and we had no problems with the neighbors.  Mattress is firm.  Would not recommend the sofa bed to sleep in.  Nice and spacious flat and had a good amount of light for a bottom floor apartment.  Wifi and TV worked good.  Would have liked less light from the street lamp in the bedroom at night time.

Hi,
the apartment was exactly as described and we loved it. We walked all day in New York and it was great to come back to a quiet flat where we could close the door and just relax. It is in a residential neighbourhood and has a couple of recommended(by Lonely Planet) restaurants two streets away.

Nicole's place is wonderful! Very convenient and a safe neighborhood. We stayed there for 8 nights. The apartment is spacious, yet very cozy & comfortable. Nicole was very responsive & warm. She is extremely helpful & made our stay simple and memorable. Value for money is excellent considering how expensive NYC is. Highly recommend as its about 30 minutes from Manhattan, has accessible delis and stores plus the subway is just a block or two away.

Nicole was a lovely host, was always available to answer any questions over text and really attentive. The apartment is really lovely, spacious, comfortable, secure, homely and has everything you need. The area is great, 5 min walk from Kingston Throops station from which you can get the C train in to Manhattan and a 10 min walk from Utica station from which you can get the C and the express A train.  Also only a $30-40 Uber ride from JFK. There's a lovely cafe around the corner called the Brunswick Cafe which we had brunch at most mornings before heading in to the city. Definitely recommend Mitchell Manor, a really fab base for an NYC
We had a great experience!  Nicole was cordial and easy to communicate with.  The location is very close to transit. The space was quiet and comfortable. Highly recommended!
The best glad i chose her place

Nous avons été reçu par le fils de Nicole qui nous a donné toutes les informations pour occuper le logement. Le logement était conforme aux photos, propre et bien équipé. 
Nous avons apprécié la proximité avec manhattan et la facilité des transports (bus, métro kingston throop ).
Dans le quartier il y a de nombreux commerces superette et restaurants, gallérie d'art etc...
Nous avons eu aucun problème pour aller et venir.
Notre séjour c'est bien déroulé.

We really enjoyed our stay with Nicole.  As others have stated, it is a short walk from the subway and the street is lovely.  We bought a 7 day metro card for $32 and felt that it was an incredible value for our 5 day stay.   The C line goes to most of the areas we planned on visiting, so this was super convenient.  Also, you simply can't beat the price for this apartment.  It is much bigger than we expected which was a nice surprise.

Todo estuvo bien. Lindo departamento en Brookling, Tuvimos problemas con el wifi que dejó de funcionar un par de días pero pudieron solucionarlo. Nos permitió dejar nuestro equipaje hasta más tarde y dejar la llave luego. Gracias por todo Nicole

Nicole è stata precisa e gentile e al nostro arrivo ci ha fornito le notizie necessarie per gli spostamenti e ai negozi e ristoranti della zona. Il quartiere è gradevole e ben collegato. La casa è confortevole

As advertised. Amazing apartment in the best location in Brooklyn.  Short walk to train station and many hipster restaurants and bars in short walking distances. The host, and her husband were very welcoming and offered information about the neighborhood, and how to get the full NYC experience. Highly recommend this apartment to anyone. Amazing
Nicole is very friendly and welcoming. Her apartment is very cozy and it looks exactly like the pictures! There are really good restaurants around and theres always street parking.
Nicole oli erittäin avulias ja ystävällinen. Asunto oli siisti ja kodikas, juuri sellainen kuin kuvissa. Asunnon sijainti oli hyvä ja mertoasema lähellä. Voin suosittella kohdetta lämpimästi.

Nicole and Titus were friendly welcoming hosts. The neighbourhood was clean, friendly and quiet, where we felt comfortable and safe. We loved coffee at Sumner Cafe in Marcus Garvey Blvd around the corner. The apartment was very close to Kingston Throop subway station and busses along Fulton St were frequent. A metro card for the week was a great investment. 
Unfortunately, the bed was extremely uncomfortable: we improved our comfort only when we put the mattress on the floor! Cleanliness and a comfortable bed are the most important things in an airbnb, so this seriously let down our experience. In all other ways it was a good place to stay.

Nicole was a lovely host and we enjoyed (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication before the arrival was good and even though she couldn't meet us when we got there she made sure we got the key and didn't have to wait. The neighborhood was friendly and it was pretty quiet at night, which we appreciated since we went to sleep fairly early due to time difference. The subway to Manhattan is just a few blocks away and the C train took us to all the places we wanted to visit. All in all, I would recommend a stay at Nicole's.
lovely house!

Buena ubicación, cerca del metro. El departamento es bastante cómodo con todo lo necesario. 
Nicole es muy amable y está disponible cuando es necesario. Muy recomendable

This residence is very close to everything you need. Laundry restaurants subway and grocery store. Nicole made us feel very welcome. Internet and television stations were very good and apartment had a cozy homely feel that we wanted to spend Christmas in New York.

Todo perfecto. La limpieza, a dos cuadras del metro que en 25 minutos llegaba a Manhattan. Ellos muy amables tanto Nicole como su esposo, mas allá que no hablaban inglés y nuestro inglés es muy malo. 100 por ciento recomendable

Nicole est une personne charmante.
Le logement est bien. Bien situé. Proche du métro (5mn), d' une laverie et de supermarchés. Logement très propre.
Nicole n'était pas là à notre arrivée, mais il y avait Amber qui a été très gentille. Nicole est venue nous saluer des que possible et a été très arrangeante pour les valises pour le dernier jour. Très bon séjour

We had a great stay at Nicole's place, me and 3 other friends. The place is perfect for 4 people and the bed and couch were both comfortable. The place is very close to the subway, approximately 3 short blocks away. At the first, the neighborhood feels a bit strange (compared to other neighborhoods in nyc) but we felt safe in the end.
The apartment has cleans towels and sheets, which was perfect for us.
The only cons I would mention is that the place is booked every single day, so if you need a more flexible check in/out time, be aware of that. Nicole let us leave our bags before check in time. Additionally, sometimes you can hear the noise from the upper floors in the house, but nothing too loud, just steps.
I would definitely recommend Nicole's place, thanks for all support :)

This is not a quite street and as a garden apartment the bed is right at sidewalk level so you hear everything-  traffic and pedistrians throughout the night and early morning. Bring earplugs. Good coffee shop around the corner was nice, Sumners Cafe.

Our stay in Brooklyn was great and one reason for this was the good accommodation of Nicole. We felt well cared for. The area we lived in was quite authentic, we felt like in a movie, because our neighborhood looked like everyone knows from a New York movie. We liked it very much. Most of the time we travelled by Subway and that was comfortable, because the next station was approx. 8 minutes far away by feet.  There was a problem with the sofa, but Nicole was really understanding and gave her best to fix the situation. 
To put in a nutshell, I can say Nicole was a really caring and courteous host and we can really recommend visiting her.
Nicole is charming. The communication with her was excellent and effective. The apartment is cosy and suitable for our needs. Thank you for hosting us.

We liked the flat, although it is a little bit far from Manhattan midtown (downtown is closer, about 20 minutes, times square is about 45 minutes, central park is an hour.) The street itself where the flat is ok, traditional brownstone houses - the Subway station is very close, unfortunately the area around the station (fulton street) is quite bad. The flat itself is okay, the bed is comfortable (the sofa less), and Nicole is kind, helpful, correct. Thank you very much!
Nicole was a great host and very communicative. We really enjoyed our stay - would definitely recommend. Thanks again for having us!
