The place was beautiful- it was clean and tidy and comfortable to stay in. Great location and a very short walk to the subway! Great area to stay in with lots of food options and shops surrounding us. Nicole was a great host and very responsive to everything! Definitely recommend anyone to stay here!

We stayed at Nicole's for a week and the location was perfect since it was close to A and C lines and close to yummy food.  We were out most of the days (14 hours) everyday.  We used the place to sleep and shower. 

I informed Nicole about the lack of hand soap in the bathroom and squeaky/noisy bed on Wednesday morning.  She got the hand soap on Friday and ordered a new bed on Sunday.  

The only reason this place didn't get a 5 star is because of the bed which was really hard for both of us to sleep on.  But since she ordered a new bed, hopefully someone else will benefit and hopefully us in the future when we visit NYC and stay with Nicole again!

Wonderful place. Very close to the C & A trains. Great deli across the street with friendly dudes behind the counter. The unit is cute and has its own little patio which leads to the door and shared hallway, keep the doors closed! Open the windows if it gets too toasty. Everything was neat and tidy and looks just like the listing! They provided plenty of towels, however there is a laundry mat near by if you need to wash for whatever reason. The bed and sofa bed were fine, nothing to complain about comfort wise! The kitchen did its job, don’t over shop! we ended up leaving our left over groceries and toiletries as a donation to the church across the street. Nicole was very helpful and called our airport car for us at the end of the trip! Overall awesome place and I would definitely try to book here again for my next trip!

Close to public transportation. Close to the heart of Brooklyn. There was so much culture. Nicole was informative with regards to eateries and transportation. She was very accommodating. The space was quaint, cute, quiet, and clean. I would definitely stay again.

We loved staying at your home. It was quaint and cute. Perfect size for 3 people! We loved the old character and charm of your place. Thank you for your kind hospitality and for all the wonderful advice and tips for getting around the city! We only got lost a couple times.

Nicole was lovely and a great host from start to finish and was quick to respond to any queries before and during our stay.

The apartment was clean and tidy and was soooo warm it was amazing to come home to after being in the snow all the day! 

There was quite a bit of noise in the bedroom from the road outside but the bed was so comfortable it made up for it! The metro is also only a super quick walk away for easy access to Manhattan so although it’s quite far out it made the travelling to and from really easy. 

We would def stay again!
Buen lugar cercano a dos estaciones de metro. El departamento justo para 4 personas, con los servicios necesarios. Muy cómodo.

Nicole's place was amazing. A short walk from the Subway and close to a ton of restaurants and a nice coffee shop. I never felt unsafe walking home alone at night. The place was spotless and the bed was beyond comfortable. Will definitely stay here again!
The apartment was convenient and Nicole was flexible with our needs.
Pretty sweet place! We really enjoyed our stay here. Safe neighborhood, walking distance to C train, really convenient to commute to Manhatten.

Loved staying here. Nicole was a great host and always answered any questions. Super close to transit to the city. She had a wide variety of booklets to help you explore the city and also gives her own advice. She has this cute book for guests to write in, which I thought was the cutest thing ever. Make sure to leave a note before you go!
We enjoyed our trip to NYC. The apartment was similar to photos. Situated in a nice street and easy access to Manhattan.

We had a wonderful stay at Mitchell Manner. Free street parking and a subway station around the corner made this an ideal location to stay.  Nicole was a great host; very attentive and communicative.  We loved exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan!  Thank you!

I have nothing negative to say about our stay! The brownstone was everything that we imagined! We got to explore Brooklyn with new eyes. The kids and hubby were more than happy with the accommodations. It was pretty quiet at night...the location was great! Down the street from a bodega and around the corner from a grocery store. The hosts were friendly! We hope to stay here again! It felt like our home away from home. 
À la prochaine
Thanks again!

Un buen sitio, muy bien comunicado con manhatan (20 min al WTC) y con todos los servicios cerca para ir andando. Nicole es encantadora y hace la estancia muy agradable. A mejorar el sofa cama que es muy incomodo.

Very nice appartment, well located (quick access to Manhattan with Subway) and all conviniences close to the appartment.
Special thanks to Nicole that is a very kind host and helpfull
Bien comunicado para ir a Manhattan!!!
Really nice place, well located, clean and the hosts are really nice. Just 5 minutes walking to take the subway.

The apartment is great, real near to A and C subway line that takes you right to Manhattan. Comfortable, with all you need to spend some great days in NY. The bed was really comfortable. The neighborhood was great, quiet and at the same time full of stores and delis. We came back to the apartment late at night and was everything ok and safe. We are grateful with Nicole and her husband that let us leave our bags early and check them out late the day we were leaving. That allowed us to spent more time walking around the city. It's a great apartment to stay!

Nicole was a great host and very helpful. We would love to thank you for the hospitality. It was a pleasant experienced staying at Nicole’s place. Location was very good. Short walk to subway station, easy to commute to manhattan and heart of brooklyn as well. Groceries, laundry cafes, around the corner, and safe neighborhood. Apt was clean spacious and exactly as pictures. I would definitely recommend this apt.
House is in a good location, pretty clean and has a lot of space. Totally recommend it.

Bel appartement, agréable et surtout très bien placé. On accède à tout grâce au métro, 3 minutes à pied et ensuite tout Manhattan accessible facilement.
En plus, le métro est direct pour JFK airport. Je recommande sans problème.
Nicole’s place was great. It was clean, spacious, and central to everything I needed/wanted to do. Nicole was quick to respond whenever I contacted her.

Great apartment in an ideal location. Nicole was a great host, was fast at responding. Apartment was clean and had all the amenities you'd want. Be aware though that this is a ground floor apartment so the level of noise you hear from the street at night is much louder and pedestrians seem much closer to you than if you were higher up. Would recommend staying here!

The apartment was nice and close to the subway.
Price-benefits was good for NY .
By the way next time we would like to stay in Manhattan. 
Host lady don’t answer some questions and forgot to give us a second key.

name: Voyager House near Taksim square   Entire house
summary: A beautifully decorated, comfortable space, where you can call home right in the centre of Istanbul. The flat is located a short walk from Taksim Square. Enjoy this stylish and artistically decorated home & it's convenient location.
description: A beautifully decorated, comfortable space, where you can call home right in the centre of Istanbul. The flat is located a short walk from Taksim Square. Enjoy this stylish and artistically decorated home & it's convenient location. Happy to help in any way we can. Whilst your here we want you to feel at home as much as possible. Walking distance to everything. The neighborhood surrounding the flat is typical of a normal residential area with bakeries, convenience stores, take-aways, supermarkets, fruit and veg corner shops, pharmacies, all very welcoming. 12 minutes away metro station (Taksim). You can connect to anywhere you want to go with this line. Its the centre. Literally steps away bus station that you can take a bus to Historical peninsula in 20 minutes passing through Taksim. Taksim is a vibrant area with many different cultures and creeds. This is reflected in the street life. We have a farmers market, boutiques, cafes, groceries, hammams, a cinema, historical churches, yumm
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to everything. The neighborhood surrounding the flat is typical of a normal residential area with bakeries, convenience stores, take-aways, supermarkets, fruit and veg corner shops, pharmacies, all very welcoming. 12 minutes away metro station (Taksim). You can connect to anywhere you want to go with this line. Its the centre. Literally steps away bus station that you can take a bus to Historical peninsula in 20 minutes passing through Taksim.
notes: From this listing you will own the entire house but please don’t make too much noise and keep in mind that we have neighbors here :)
transit: Taksim is a vibrant area with many different cultures and creeds. This is reflected in the street life. We have a farmers market, boutiques, cafes, groceries, hammams, a cinema, historical churches, yummy bakeries and small restaurants along the street. These are the touristic attractions at walking distance with order: 1 min - Bus station, grocery, supermarket, restaurants, pharmacy, bakery, internet cafe/call shop, dry cleaner. 10-12 mins - Welcome to Taksim Square, not only centre of Istanbul, its the centre of Turkey! This colourful street is world famous and provides a glimpse of all of Istanbul's many tribes and fashions. 15 mins - Nisantasi. Lots of high end and mid range shops to choose and very good quality restaurants. None of the locals advises to come here as this area carries an expensive elite area status, but it is totally affordable for anyone from Europe.. It has also featured in many films. 25 mins - Macka Park, fresh green area, sometimes it might be good to take a f
interaction: Happy to help in any way we can. Whilst your here we want you to feel at home as much as possible.
house_rules: Guests wash dishes used by themselves. No shoes in the apartment - Bring your own slippers. Bathroom towels belong to flat. I try to respect others and the environment .. please try not to leave lights, electric appliances or water running unnecessarily .. thank you Just keep in your mind its a house not a hostel ;)

host.host_about: I enjoy meeting new people and would consider myself very friendly(URL HIDDEN)like watching movie ,walking ,cooking and chatting  with open minded people(URL HIDDEN) I'm a make up artist. I'm working for photo shootings of magazines or fashion weeks .

reviews.comments: Shahzad is a grat person,helpful and whenever we need her she was available for us.the Appartment is in a good location ,clean.10 minutes to taksim sq. wherever you want to go the bus stop is just a minut. We really enjoyed our stay in Sharzad Appartment . Hopefully we will see her again.

We simply loved staying at Sharzad's place! Everything is just as lovely as on the pictures. Sharzad and her boyfriend made sure that we had everything we needed. They gave us great advice about nice spots and places to go out to. Whenever we needed anything - they were there to help. We couldn't have asked for better hosts!
Our best experience with airbnb so far! We'll definitely stay there again the next time we are in Istanbul.

Host was amazing and calling on us everyday to make sure we was happy also left food for breakfast and the apartment was clean and tidy, the apartment is very close to the main city centre of Taksim in the summer a short walk and taxi can be found outside the apartment.
The listing was exactly what we needed.

Shahrzad war sehr nett und hat uns freundlich empfangen. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet. Vorallem das große Wohnzimmer lädt zum zusammensitzen und Musik hören (gute Anlage) ein. Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit der Wohnung und würden es immer wieder tun.
It was a great time, with a quiet place
Shahrzad is perfect host and home of Shahrzad is very sweet (:

Shahrzad is a great host. She was always helpful and she solved our problems easily. Me and my friends were totally satisfied.

House is great too. I couldn't find any single thing to say about the house. Great host & great house nothing more to say.
Her home is very sweat, comfortable and near to everywhere. We felt like we are in our homes. Everything is perfect :)

Shahrzad is a very kind and helpful person. She helped us with everything we needed to know in Istanbul.
The flat is cozy, clean and comfortable; its location is perfect; so close to public transport, shops, malls, restaurants, bakery... 
In sum, super host, perfect home!
It would be my pleasure to be Sharzad's guest in my future visits to Istanbul.
Highly recommended.
Great place for family

Nice place
Great host
Close to bus station amd taxis
Easy to reach with Shahrzad assist.
Very friendly host
Thank you Shahrzad. 
Soon we will be back.
Thank you Shahrzad
El apartamento muy bonito, comodo, el único problema fue la conexión del wifi, y se nos hizo imposible contactar al anfitrion para que lo solucionara.
Great host. One of the greatest experiences I ever had w Airbnb.  The host is always thee for you.  She is nice, respectful and beyond honest to deal with.  Big thanks again. Highly recommended.

التواصل مع شهرزاد كان ممتاز و ردها سريع ، لكن الشقة موقعها سيء جدًا في حارة غير مريحة أبدًا ، و مكانها على طلعة ، صعبة جدًا بالمشي و بالسيارة . 
الشقة نفس الصور تقريبًا ، لكنها مكتومة جدًا و فيها مكيف واحد صغير بالصاله ، مكانها بالدور الثاني و درجها صغير ومافيه اصنصير ، مدخل البناية ظلام و مكتوم و أبدًا مب حلو ، كعائلة خليجية أبدًا أبدًا غير مناسبة ، جيت مع عائلتي دخلنا الساعه ١٢ الظهر تقريبًا و الساعه ٤ طلعنا ندور فندق ثاني . 

تقريبًا هذي السلبيات اللي خلتني اطلع ادور مكان ثاني ، لو كان فيه ايجابيات فأنا ما جلست عشان أشوفها.

Shahrzad was a great host. She met us and checked us into the apartment. We had no issue finding its location. The apartment is exactly as explained and pictured. Super cute and the apt accommodated the 6 of us perfectly. The only thing I would caution other travelers about is the location. It's in a non-Turkish/non-touristy part of Taksim. Just felt a little uncomfortable walking in and out of the apartment, but no complications.
shahrzad is the best host we ever had very helpfull and kind! the house was really nice and clean very close to the centre of istanbul i would definetly recomend her place

Such a lovely place i 100% recommend if you want a cute place in the neighbourhood but still close to the main area taksim etc me and my family were welcomed straight away and felt very comfortable i will definitely be coming back to stay here again !! Shahrzad and her mum were the kindest people ever ^_^ xx

I really liked the place as it was spacious (two bed rooms and large sofa in living room on which you can sleep), equipped with everything I expect for air bnb(scissor, small knife, oil, towel, shampoo etc), and has good location. The location might seem difficult to find at first as it is on the hill, but it's quite convenient when you get used to it as it is  located in the middle of local town nearby Carrefour and tasty bakery shop, and in front of bus station. Also I appreciate that Shahrzad was always in contact when I needed her. Thank you so much for allow me a relaxed and decent start in Turkey :)
Many thanks for the wonderful apartment! Everything is clean, neat. The landlady helped us in all matters. Location is 10 minutes from Taksim Square. Good area!

Sherry was an amazing host and was always available to help us out when we needed. If you like walking, it takes about 15-20 mins to get to Taksim Square but there is a huge hill to walk up on the way up. Taxi was cheap in that case. Carrefour was around the corner and a few takeaway shops. The apartment is very roomy and we enjoyed our time there.

Shahrzad ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Apartment war genau wie Bilder. Sehr sauber und in der Lage Nähe des Zentrums. 
Alles ok. Vielen Dank Shahrzad.
Very spacious and clean apartment. Good location and great value.

If you want to stay in a stylish, relaxed, clean and comfortable apartment I cannot recommend this place enough! Shahrzad looked after us so well. She answered messages promptly and was always extremely helpful. Nothing was too much trouble for her. So when we arrived hours after we should have, when we needed to leave our bags, get food, book a taxi back to the airport, there she was! She actually made our time in Istanbul, with two children, very, very easy. I felt that we had a friend! Much nicer than staying in a hotel. A great little bohemian apartment that ticks all the boxes. We will be back!

Insgesamt waren wir mit der Unterkunft zufrieden. Shahrzad ist eine sehr hilfsbereite Person und war immer für uns da wenn wir sie gebraucht haben.
Die Unterkunft sieht genauso aus wie auf den Bildern, nur sind einige Kleinigkeiten wieder renovierungsbedürftig. Die Lage ist auch relativ Zentral, außer das die Unterkunft am Ende einer sehr steilen Straße liegt. In der unmittelbaren Umgebung findet man eigentlich so gut wie alles -  Supermarkt, Imbissbuden usw.

The location is great, very conveniently situated for catching a bus. There are many shops, restaurants and bakeries at walking distance. It is a stylish and comfortable space but there is no microwave in the kitchen.
Şehrazat güvenilir bir ev sahibi, mesajlara hızlı yanıt veriyor. Evi de güzel dekore edilmiş ve temiz. Mahalle birazcık kötü. Onun dışında tercih edebilirsiniz taksime yürüme mesafesinde.

Shahrzad is a great host. She is kind and helpful and very understanding. We needed to stay an extra night because of a medical situation, she was helpful and very accommodating. Thank you Shahrzad for your kindness! 
As a side note, we climbed the hill (on a few occasions), it is not for the faint of heart. Don’t try and negotiate with a cab to take you to the top. Get them to use the meter. It’s the best way (cheapest) and the easiest. There are lots of options for food at the top of the hill and loads of taxis as well.

L’endroit et bien situé proche des transports en commun pour  bien exploré la ville,
Le cartier et très vivant un café juste à côté,
Plein de magasins et restaurants à deux pas de l’appartement.

The location is great just a 5 minutes drive to Taksim Square. There is Carrefour close to the apartment. Taxis and buses across the street, many local kebab shops.
Shahrzad is a great host who was always there if we needed something, for example extra bed linens was given immediately and when the small hairdryer was broken she quickly replaced it with another one. She gave us some information about the taxi prices which was really helpful.
Her communication is really quick.
We enjoyed our stay at her place.

Shahrzad was an amazing host, very forthcoming in her communication and very accommodating for check-in and check-out. The home is stylish, clean, spacious and a short ride away from Taksim and definitely not in a touristy area.  The flat also has some nice amenities (extra iron! huge drinking water tank!).
Just as a note that when we were visiting the 5th and 6th person were sleeping on spare mattresses on the floor in the living room whilst there were two separate bedrooms, we didn't mind.

Appartement situé correctement mais celui-ci mériterai un petit rafraichissement.(peintures vieillies, fils électriques apparents, réparations sommaires) 
Sinon Shahrzad est disponible et la communication est très facile.

Shahrzads flat was very clean, she was easy to talk to and accessible.  Her flat was a decent size for me, my baby and my two friends. It was a bit difficult as it was on the second floor to get suitcases up and down but not the worst. When I found her fans weak she replaced them within 24hrs with stronger ones which really helped in the heat.
great apartment in heart of Istanbul. Shahrzad was very hospitable and accommodating. would definitely stay again. thank you

This accommodation is in a great location as the bus station is only 1 minute away! It is walkable to Taksim square which also offers great transport links to all the attractions. The property was clean and very spacious; all the facilities worked efficiently and the host is very helpful and welcoming.
Nice place . Well situated . Shahrzad very helpful.

I always try to find a place near tourist attractions wherever I travel and this house was exactly the one I was searching for.

The location is very close to the most important street of Istanbul  (Taksim sq) . It is convenient to the malls and shopping centers by taxi about 15 minutes .

The rooms and furniture are in perfect condition with many coaches , clean sheets and blankets to relax. In fact the rooms are spotlessly clean and large enough to feel yourself comfortable even for a long stay.

Shahrzad is very nice with a very gentle character of hospitality. She prepared everything we needed in no time. She couldn't have been more helpful with everything - airport transfers, money-changing advice, grocery shopping and excellent restaurant recommendation.

Agréable séjour. l'appartement est à 15min de marche de Taksim square et à 5min en Taxi! Propre, hyper grand et bien décoré ♡ shahrazad est à l'écoute et s'est rendu disponible pour toutes les fois ou nous avons fait appel à elle :D 
Je recommande fortement !
A very spacious apartment with a family bathroom and another separate toilet. The beds were comfortable. The location was lively but the apartment quiet.

Hi,

The place is centrally located with lots of shops around. Comfortable stay and good host.

Regards

Asif
All perfect

We really enjoyed stay at shahrzad place. She is so supportive and welcoming always gave us best response whenever we asked for something. Place is nice market is very near.Easy to access transportation. I will highly recommend this place.
Shahrzad's place is very nice and it's  in a very convenient location. She is amazing as a host. .Lovely person :)

I was there for last of november. The place was what I had expected. Because I have a child I was worry if the place is hot.But was totally warm enough. The location and the access to public transport was more than I thought. Shahrzad is an amazing host. I enjoyed to being there. I recommend this place.
Thahk you Shahrzad, we really enjoyed our stay! highly recommended!

Shahrzad's apartment is immaculately clean and stylish. We stayed as a family of 5 and felt right at home. Shahrzad even allowed us to checkout a bit later saving us lots of hastle. Would recommend without a doubt :)

The apartment it’s far from the center it’s very difficult place in Eads in Orthodox Islamic area is not for tourist I didn’t live in this apartment and I ask my money back. this what she write is not true
Because that she doesn’t give to cancel it
Je recommande !

name: Beautiful remodeled Ocean view Studio
summary: Remodeled studio with a ocean view, it is a about 10 min. walk to one of the most beautiful beach in the world Napili Bay .    Kapalua golf course 0.9 mile. Napili Ridge is more affordable than the bigger hotel chains.  Napili Bay great for snorkeling and Kapalua Bay is about a 20 min. walk or about  1 mile. Excellent snorkeling too.   Gazebo restaurant at Napili Bay  There is no air conditioning, there is a ceiling fan and one fan on a stand to help keep you cool.       No smoking and no pets
space: Napili Ridge is a quiet peaceful place that has 2 levels this unit is on the top overlooking the Ocean. Close to lots of Beaches, Grocery store, Golfing, Hiking, Restaurant's Swimming pool , BBQ and Laundry room onsite. There are some stairs to climb (no elevator)   Kapalua Hiking trail that goes along the coast for miles and is very beautiful! Snorkel just down the street at Napili bay or Kapalua bay where you will may see some Sea Turtles. Fleming beach is a good surfing beach. Enjoy fresh fruit when in season, there are banana trees, avocado and papaya. Enjoy beautiful fragrant plumaria trees on property. There are a few house rules within the condo you must (URL HIDDEN) smoking or drugs & pets are not allowed. The outside Lanai also has a shade you can pull down between 2pm-6pm, Awesome sunsets from your Lanai !
description: Remodeled studio with a ocean view, it is a about 10 min. walk to one of the most beautiful beach in the world Napili Bay .    Kapalua golf course 0.9 mile. Napili Ridge is more affordable than the bigger hotel chains.  Napili Bay great for snorkeling and Kapalua Bay is about a 20 min. walk or about  1 mile. Excellent snorkeling too.   Gazebo restaurant at Napili Bay  There is no air conditioning, there is a ceiling fan and one fan on a stand to help keep you cool.       No smoking and no pets Napili Ridge is a quiet peaceful place that has 2 levels this unit is on the top overlooking the Ocean. Close to lots of Beaches, Grocery store, Golfing, Hiking, Restaurant's Swimming pool , BBQ and Laundry room onsite. There are some stairs to climb (no elevator)   Kapalua Hiking trail that goes along the coast for miles and is very beautiful! Snorkel just down the street at Napili bay or Kapalua bay where you will may see some Sea Turtles. Fleming beach is a good surfing beach. Enjoy fresh frui
neighborhood_overview: Napili Ridge is walking distance to some of the most beautiful beaches in the world! Napili bay is a 10 min. walk, and Kapalua bay just a little further! Kapalua has some beautiful Golf courses and excellent restaurants. You can snorkel and see some amazing fish and sea turtles.  Fleming beach is great to watch surfers and enjoy some bigger waves. Kapalua Trail goes for miles overlooking the ocean, you can stop and have a picnic on the beach . Napili Market is close by and has a small deli , Times Market is a larger market about a 10 min. drive. Walk to the Gazebo restaurant for breakfast or Lunch 10 min. walk and then enjoy the beach.  Enjoy the fragrant smell of tropical flowers and delicious Mangos, Bananas, Passion fruit or Liliko'i, Papaya when in season.
notes: Fill out 2 forms, vehicle registration form and read house rules and sign. Drop off at Manager's office , leave forms in box outside the office. If you have any problems or questions contact me . Place Parking permit on the dashboard, permit is inside condo.
transit: If you want to see the island  you will need a car, unless you take the bus which is very slow but you can see things along the way. Taxis are available but are expensive. There are also Mopeds are available for rent. Cheapest car rental is in Kahului try EZ carrental, Hawaii discount car rental or go to (Website hidden by Airbnb)
access: You will receive instructions  by email and also print out Guest resources after booking for more details.
interaction: If you have any questions, feel free to call or email. ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) (EMAIL HIDDEN)
house_rules: This is a quiet and peaceful condo community , no smoking, no drugs and no pets are allowed. Designated parking, quiet hours are from 10pm-8am There are condo community rules guests can read before booking. Must be 21  or over

host.host_about:
We are a retired  couple and love to travel.
We are opening our little piece of paradise  for you to enjoy too.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 100 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The studio was great, quiet and well equiped. Everything seemed to be new. The bed was very comfortable. I had one specific need and it was there when I arrived.
Internet was jumping from time to time.
There was no AC but with doors open at night and the ceiling fan, it was fine.
The only negative point was that I had no contact with the owners despite sending them several emails to ask questions.

The condo was very nice and comfortable during our stay. It was a little bit of a walk to the beach, but quiet and with a distant view of the ocean as advertised. The condo was well stocked and we appreciated the flexibility of being able to check out a little later than usual on our last day there. Lori, our host, checked in with us by text to make sure we made it there and that all was good, and our stay there was everything we had hoped for. Thank you!

John and Jabke Buesseler

the place has a murphy bed (for two). all the amenities were available and well stocked. a sit down balcony has a nice view of the sunset with coconut trees. large screen TV. I was very happy with the place. Perfect for a stay in Maui. Mike and Lori made themselves available and accessible all the time, which is a good feeling to have. For a couple or a single person, I highly recommend this place.

Great option to stay in West Maui!

Our overall experience staying at Lori & Mike studio was great. Very proactive communication from the host, sharing useful details at the time we did the booking and replying any messages very fast and kind. 
Very good location, quiet and 10 minutes walking from a beautiful beach.
Comfortable bed with several pillows to choose from (soft or firm), a lot of towels, shampoo, hairdryer, first-aid kit,... beach stuff in excellent condition (chairs, bodyboard and also a couple of fins). Nice TV and a real full-kitchen, with oven and incredible complete equipment, everything looking new and with very good quality (not the usual Ikea stuff).
The condo also has a nice pool, with barbecue and a laundry center, which comes very handy being in a beach location!!!
I will recommend this Studio to my friends without hesitation... and if going back to Maui (which I hope!), will definitively stay here again :)

Lori and Mike's apartment is great! Clean, cosy, with all the necessary suppliance. Also, they have perfectly organized to help their guests with wifi, parking pass and so on. I needed some help to free up the parking lot taken by another car, I reached out to Mike and in a matter of second the car lot was free. Really friendly host! Definitely recommended!

This studio was fantastic! It came fully equipped with everything you could possibly need. It was super clean and very comfortable for 2 people. Lori and Mike were very organized and provide a full binder with all kinds of information. The location is great with beautiful beaches nearby and great tourist attractions a drive away. It is close to grocery stores and many reasonable restaurants. Mike and Lori were always easily accessible and very helpful. Would absolutely recommend this studio!

Over all the stay here was great. I had issues on arrival with the previous cleaning but I contacted the hosts and they were apologetic and fixed the situation as soon as they could. 
The place is nice and well equipt with everything you need for the beach as well as everything you need to make a nice meal.

Mike and Lori's apt was absolutely amazing. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen was full of everything we could ever need, and there were lots of towels and details we loved-we used the snorkel gear because it was even better than the ones we brought!. The location was close to everything we could possibly need in Napili and was a short walk away from Napili bay, where we swam and snorkeled almost every day. Also very close to our other favorite norkel spot at Honolua Bay!
There's also a grocery and shopping center close by.
I would highly recommend this place and this area over the bigger more touristy places like Kihei and Wailea.
We don't feel like at home. On arrival we had to wash bed linens because it didn’t look fresh – in fact there was a bloodstain on it. I hope it was just our bad luck.

We have an excelent experience at this Studio.
Lori and Mike made lots of contacs and were concerned of our staying.
The location was pretty close of our event X Terra.
The Studio has all we need to be confortable. Five Stars place !

Omgosh I can't say enough about Lori and Mike's little piece of heaven in Kanapili Maui. Even though Mike and Lori live in Vancouver, Washington I felt they were right next door for any inquires or support.  Their unit is perfect for one or two guests! The view is amazing and the sunset was so pretty from their deck!  Walking distance to the beach and market place.  The kitchen is so well stocked for cooking we didn't need anything other than our groceries.  The suite is so clean and has everything you possibly need for a fabulous stay in heaven ! The fans are amazing for keeping the place nice and cool! The beach chairs , boogie board and snorkelling equipment are such an added bonus!  The people that live around the complex are all so friendly!  I really can't say enough about how grateful and happy both my daughter and I feel about our stay! We celebrated Christmas, my daughters 30th birthday and New Years.  We will definitely be back and highly recommend this sweet place in paradise!  With much gratitude Debbie and Theresa

The place is perfect for two. Great location that allows you casual 10 min walk to gorgeous Napili Bay. The apartment has everything you need during your beach vacation. The kitchen and equipment is superb. We also absolutely loved breakfasts and dinners on the lanai overlooking Napili Bay. Thank you, Lori & Mike.

This condo was perfect for our stay. The location is quiet and beautiful, and the condo itself was clean and had everything we needed. Lori and Mike were also very communicative and responsive. I would recommend this condo, and would not hesitate to book again for future stays in West Maui.

Great place to stay. It was in the area we wanted and has all the necessities we were looking for. Plus it had snorkel, beach chairs, and cooler bag. Would recommend to any couple looking at this area. Plus a great price.

Ik was verrast wat een leuk plekje dit was! Een hele mooie omgeving, waar we konden zwemmen met schildpadden. Alles wat we nodig hadden was aanwezig, echt heel fijn. We hebben genoten van het zwembad en een heerlijke barbecue.
great studio close to many beautiful beaches and shops making staying there wonderful and very convenient.
It was quite and good place !
Great spot, very organized, beach gear is a huge plus.
Everything about this place exceeded our expectations. The view, the amenities, the quiet location and the little touches that Mike and Lori give to make this place amazing. 5 stars!

You are in good hands with Lori and Mike. Everything went smooth during our stay. Our hosts sent us all information we needed in advance and reached out to see if the check-in went well. They also reached out by text during the stay to see if everything was OK. We could see that they cared about our experience.
The studio offers everything that we needed, including kitchen and appliances. You access the unit using an external stair, so keep that in mind if you have mobility limitations. 
The place was clean, and according to the pictures. Walking distance to the beach and a short drive from a small supermarket. Plus, 808 Boards is close by and offers good options for rentals.
We rented a small car so I can't comment on the use of transit or walking distances. The complex has a small pool with a barbecue, but we stayed outside for most of the time. 
We would certainly stay in their place again in the future.

This place is really close to a great snorkeling spot. I got to see a sea turtle and it was amazing. Mike & Lori have great recommendations on things to do and see. The place is close to a few beaches. Good location.

Great location-- super close to the beach! It's a studio apartment with a fold out bed but can still comfortably host two people. Lori and Mike respond quickly to any questions or concerns you may have and there is the opportunity to use their snorkel and beach gear which is pretty nice if you're from out of town!

This condo is a great base for exploring the island and especially the western beaches. The kitchen has any supply imaginable and there is even a fully worked-up guidebook, apart from the efficient and thorough conversation. The bed is very comfy and everything super clean. 
And as if that wasn’t enough - Napili beach is super close and if you’re looking for turtles you need not look anywhere else. We’d return anytime to this cosy condo on that amazing island!

Mike & Lori’s place was fantastic! My husband and I stayed here for a week on our honeymoon, and we could not have picked a better place- it was super clean, comfortable, with a full kitchen and great views of palm trees and ocean from the lanai. They also provide beach essentials, towels, beach chairs, snorkel gear etc..which was a huge bonus. The location was amazing- we walked to Napili Bay and Kapalua Beach almost every single day. The condo was within walking distance to the Gazebo restaurant (white chocolate macadamia nut pancakes!!), and about a mile or so drive to a small shopping plaza and Napili Market. The hosts were very responsive and welcoming. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!
They were very quick in responding for any assistance. Truly appreciate them making this first trip to Hawaii special.
Had a lovely time in Maui at Mike’s and Lori’s place.
The condo was just right for us.  The only thing is that the weather was terribly hot and they didn't have AC and the fans didn't keep us cool.

Mike and Lori's place was perfect for our stay in Napili..Their condo was very clean and lots of ammentities for the beach and for a pleasant nights sleep..The parking spot was a little tight when the lot was full, but we managed..Overall, they were a great host and we will be back to book with them soon!
Great place, small but has everything.  5 minutes walk to Nspili beach which is great. Would definitely recommend.
Great stay at Lori and Mike's studio. affordable and clean!

My husband and I really enjoyed our 6 night stay at mike and lori’s condo! They left great notes and tips for us and were easy to get in touch with. Everything you need for the beach can be found in the condo. We also really loved the shampoo and conditioner! It worked miracles after being in salt water and wind all day. I would definitely recommend!
Mike and Lori’s place is great and in a good location as well. Really enjoyed the stay and would def recommend to others. The next time I’m in Maui, I’m staying here again! Mahalo Mike and Lori
Nice place and good price! Enjoyed our stay
Great place to stay will definitely book again when we come back.

name: Large Home near Manly and Northern Beaches
summary: Renovated 4 bedroom family home. Open living area with district views, opening to a covered entertaining deck with BBQ. Additional family room (Website hidden by Airbnb) garden with cubby, swings and trampoline. 5 minutes to beaches and short drive into Manly.
space: A comfortable, fully renovated family home.  Upstairs is an open plan living area with living, dining and kitchen areas. Wide sliding doors open to the verandah, back deck and garden. The kitchen window opens to the alfresco entertaining deck.  On this level  are two bedrooms with king-single beds and one bedroom with a single that can open out into a double. The main bathroom has a separate bath and shower.  Ceiling fans are in all bedrooms. Cupboard space plus access to books, toys and games for those young of heart. Downstairs is the master bedroom with queen bed and ensuite, the laundry and family room with large TV. Outside is the entertaining deck, BBQ, pizza oven and yard with a large trampoline, cubby, swings and slide.   Please note that there are 2 flights of stairs to enter the house, and one flight of stairs from downstairs to upstairs. There is always a lot of on-street parking available.
description: Renovated 4 bedroom family home. Open living area with district views, opening to a covered entertaining deck with BBQ. Additional family room (Website hidden by Airbnb) garden with cubby, swings and trampoline. 5 minutes to beaches and short drive into Manly. A comfortable, fully renovated family home.  Upstairs is an open plan living area with living, dining and kitchen areas. Wide sliding doors open to the verandah, back deck and garden. The kitchen window opens to the alfresco entertaining deck.  On this level  are two bedrooms with king-single beds and one bedroom with a single that can open out into a double. The main bathroom has a separate bath and shower.  Ceiling fans are in all bedrooms. Cupboard space plus access to books, toys and games for those young of heart. Downstairs is the master bedroom with queen bed and ensuite, the laundry and family room with large TV. Outside is the entertaining deck, BBQ, pizza oven and yard with a large trampoline, cubby, swings and slide.
neighborhood_overview: Located in the leafy suburb of Beacon Hill. District views. Coastal breezes. 5 minutes drive to Curl Curl and Dee Why beaches. 10 minutes to family favourite Freshwater Beach. 15 minutes to the centre of Manly. Restaurants, coastal walks, golf courses, bicycle trails, parks, bush walks, lakes and dam all nearby. Large shopping centre 10 minutes walk away. World famous Taronga Zoo only 25 minutes drive away.
notes: Guests need to know are that we have 2 pet cats living in the house normally. When we are away, they stay elsewhere and we clean the house prior to guests. However those with allergies need to consider this prior to booking.  We also have stairs leading directly to the main living room without a gate. We  do ask no gate be put up incase of damage to our property. We ask guests with toddlers or babies to please consider this prior to booking.  Thanks you
transit: 5 minute walk to bus stop, with regular buses for Manly wharf, the CBD and north along the Northern beaches to Palm Beach. Express buses take around 25 minutes to travel into the city. A ferry from Manly Wharf to the CBD is our favourite though. Only a 30 minute ride through the most beautiful harbour in the world. Manly Warringah Cabs are very quick to arrive at our home. There are multiple car hire agencies within the area with a range of cars for all types of needs.
interaction: If you need to contact us during your stay, we will leave a mobile number and email address. We will endeavour to return messages within the day. If you want any recommendations of things to do, places to visit or restaurants we are happy to answer any questions.
house_rules: Easy - we ask you to look after our home and leave it as you found it. We are very house proud and love our home, we are clean and tidy and would expect for you to treat our home with respect.  We are non-smokers. Please do not smoke on our premises.   All linen used be left in the laundry on departure. When you're leaving please don’t leave dirty dishes/glasses/cutlery etc in the sink. Wash them by hand or pack the dishwasher and turn it on before you go.  No loud parties (small dinner parties and gatherings are fine, but remember that you have neighbours who are more than likely not on holidays and may have to get up and go to work the next day)  We will ask you to pay for any damage that occurs during your stay.  If there are any problems, please contact us as soon as possible. Pets are unfortunately not able to stay. Thank you!

host.host_about:
Hi! I live in the beautiful Northern Beaches with my gorgeous family. 
We love living here with the closeness to beaches, national parks, parks, the zoo, restaurants and arguably the best hot chocolates and coffee in the country. 
We love our home and hope that we can share it and our beautiful patch of the world with you. If you have an questions - send through a message.
Love Mari xxx

reviews.comments:
We have just returned from our trip to Australia and our stay at Beacon Hill. From the moment we entered the property we knew we had found our home for 3 weeks. The house had been carefully prepared to make us feel that we were not intruding but feel at home. All spaces were organised clean and of a very high standard. Communication with Mari has always been fast and informative. Our stay in Mari and James home has been a pure pleasure and we are so happy that we had the opportunity to share in their home. We had full access to all the house which made our stay comfortable and relaxed. 
The outside space for entertaining was excellent and the beds, linen towels and use of washing machine, dishwasher etc made for a very comfortable sleep and stay. We have 2 teenage sons so the extra space the house gave was very important for our trip as were spending quality time with our sister who lives in the northern beaches.
We were met by Mari 's mother who was so very welcoming and there was no problems at all during our stay. We would all recommend this home as a choice on AIRBNB
WITH REGARDS JO AND PAUL STEVENS

Mari's home is a lovely family home that is looked after very well.

Location is great being such a short drive to various beaches, there's also bus stops a short walk away, as is the local shopping mall.

The house itself has everything you need, beautiful well kept gardens, a brilliant sheltered BBQ space complete with ceiling fan and speakers to hook music up to, lovely kitchen area, modern bathroom and main ensuite, plenty of towels, aircon works well on hot summer days!

Finally, Mari was very easy to deal with, quick to respond to messages and happy to help where she can. I do not have a single bad thing to say about this home and my family would gladly stay here again!

What a wonderful stay at Mari's place! The house is so close to shops and beaches and there are great connections to the city from Warringah Mall. Only 30 mins to the city by bus if you don't have a car. The garden is beautiful with a lovely treetop view and cubbyhouse that was a hit with the kids. Mari was fast to respond to any questions we had during our stay. Thank you for providing everything we needed Mari, we appreciate you sharing your home with us.

name: PORTO HAPPY FLATS - Sto. Ildefonso1
summary: Apartamento novo em edifício do século XIX totalmente reabilitado, situado no coração da cidade e a menos de 300 mt de todos os locais de interesse cultural e Património Mundial.  Informação útil:  2 Parking, 1 com desconto da Porto Happy Flats 6€/24H  2 supermercados a 100mt do apartamento, farmácia,  vários restaurantes e transportes, inclusive metro
space: O apartamento tem cerca de 70 m2 de área coberta e com um terraço exclusivo com 100 m2. Tem capacidade para 3 pessoas. Ideal para casal com 1 filho. Temos disponível cama de viagem para bebe. Quarto de banho e cozinha independente.
description: Apartamento novo em edifício do século XIX totalmente reabilitado, situado no coração da cidade e a menos de 300 mt de todos os locais de interesse cultural e Património Mundial.  Informação útil:  2 Parking, 1 com desconto da Porto Happy Flats 6€/24H  2 supermercados a 100mt do apartamento, farmácia,  vários restaurantes e transportes, inclusive metro O apartamento tem cerca de 70 m2 de área coberta e com um terraço exclusivo com 100 m2. Tem capacidade para 3 pessoas. Ideal para casal com 1 filho. Temos disponível cama de viagem para bebe. Quarto de banho e cozinha independente. Os hóspedes têm acesso ao terraço, onde podem desfrutar de pequenas refeições no exterior, com mesa, cadeiras, guarda-sol e espreguiçadeira para descanso e leitura. Disponibilizamos ainda: - Cozinha equipada/fogão;micro-ondas; frigorífico;torradeira;cafeteira (Website hidden by Airbnb) incluindo utensílios de cozinha  - Gel de Banho e Champô - Pequeno ferro de engomar - Secador de cabelo - Café / Chá - Açúcar
neighborhood_overview: Este apartamento está situado a 100 mt do centro histórico do Porto e da famosa artéria comercial de Sta. Catarina; Café Magestic, e menos de 200mt da muralha Fernandina, Sé do Porto, Ribeira, Estação de combóios de São Bento, Torre dos Clérigos, Livraria Lello, das Galeria de Paris e suas noites mágicas! Situa-se a 2 min. a pé de dois supermercados, farmácia e lavandaria. Nesta artéria, podem encontrar-se vários restaurantes onde é possível degustar da gastronomia típica do Porto e Norte, como a Francesinha, entre outras iguarias.
notes: Línguas faladas / Se habla / We speak / On parle : - Português - Espanhol - Inglês - Francês
transit: No Aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro toma o Metro direcção "Estádio do Dragão" e sai na estação "Campo 24 de Agosto". Está 800 mt do apartamento (5 min. a pé). Existem várias outras ligações para o local, através de autocarros dos STCP. GPS: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: Os hóspedes têm acesso ao terraço, onde podem desfrutar de pequenas refeições no exterior, com mesa, cadeiras, guarda-sol e espreguiçadeira para descanso e leitura. Disponibilizamos ainda: - Cozinha equipada/fogão;micro-ondas; frigorífico;torradeira;cafeteira (Website hidden by Airbnb) incluindo utensílios de cozinha  - Gel de Banho e Champô - Pequeno ferro de engomar - Secador de cabelo - Café / Chá - Açúcar ...
interaction: Estaremos sempre disponíveis para ajudar com informações úteis durante os horários diurnos, das 08:00 às 21:30, através dos nrs.: + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Paula) ou + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Miguel)
house_rules: We'll go to the apartment to check-in and check-out to exchange keys, check the apartment, give you information about the neighborhood and answer any questions you may have. Please  keep us informed as to your expected time of arrival.  A simple text updating us of when you are leaving the airport/train/metro station, for example, would be very helpful. No smoking indoors but on the terrace. IDs (Passport) may be checked upon check-in. Please report any breakages  Check in - after : 15:00  Check out: 11:00 - This is depending on your arrival/departure times and other guests coming or going and also to allow us time to clean the flat.  It would be much appreciated if you could keep the apartment clean and tidy. When you book this apartment you are accepting these rules. Make yourself at home and be HAPPY during your stay!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Everything is nice, the apartments has big terrace. Gustavo was helpful and understanding: we forgot some belongings after closing the apartment and he was helpful to help us within an hour even though it was rainy sunday.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We really enjoyed our stay for 5 days with our young son. Paola was really kind and helpful. The flat is fully equipped and has space. Another bonus is the great location - very easy to reach to metro / for airport - also to major sightseeing points. 
We would come back again and would recommend further.

The place was wonderful! Nicely located, clean, with useful tips and, for us as family with a 1 year old, a haven of peace and quiet after a strawl through the amazing city. 
Miguel, who kindly welcomed us after we arrived much later than planned, was very warm and helpful, with stories and "inside" information. 
The roof terrace is perfect. It's mostly in the shadow, which was very refreshing on the sunny days. 
The street is very noisy, but when closed, the windows keep it down to a minimum. 
The bed is comfortable and the whole place is warm; we felt welcome from the start. 
The kitchen is fully equipped.(We suggested replacing the simple coffeemaker with an electric model.)

L accueil de Miguel est très chaleureux et il nous donne plein de bon conseils ( restaurants, lieux à voir....). L appartement est bien situé proche de la rue commerçante Santa catarina, tout le centre de porto se fait à pied. 
À vos valise!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Convenient and allow you complete privacy房間有三張雙人床,獨立衛浴設備,以及免費無線上網｡另有一張沙發床和一張摺床,可最多住十人Well-equipped kitchen with electric cooker & cooking amenities. Good for family travelers設備齊全的廚房,有電爐及煮食工具 適合家庭旅客Location is excellent. Just 5 mins walk from Jordan MTR Exit B.
