house_rules: 当您在大楼的公共区域时,请保持安静,尤其是晚上10点以后｡ 如果我们收到邻居对噪音的投诉,我们保留取消预订的权利,且不会退款｡ 谢谢合作! Please be quiet when you are in the public area in the building, especially after 10:00 pm. If we get the complaints from neighbors about the noise, we reserve the rights to cancel the reservation without refund. Thanks for your cooperation!

reviews.comments: 各種一般!
Friendly staff who brought us to the apartment. The apartment is larger than our expected. We had more than 10 persons and it was comfortable to stay. (No extra cost is needed!)
房子很ok,下次再去香港住再找你家住

We had a nice and comfortable stay at this place. Aircon and heater were in good condition. This place is relatively clean; however, appliances and furniture need dusting. There are also visible stains on the linen especially pillow cases and comforter which need to be removed. They provided tissue and trash bags. Thanks!

총 4명 묵었습니다. 방이 3개 지만 정말 10명도 묵을 수 있겠더라구요. 넓은 거실에는 소파베드 1개, 일반 소파 1개, 간이 침대가 1개 있었어요. 근데 화장실은 1개이니 참고하세요.
냉장고가 2개인데 좀 약해요.
일행 전원이 가장 크게 만족한건 샤워기 수압이었어요 ㅎㅎ 온수도 잘 나오고 좋아요!

전화로 응답 받으시는 분은 영어를 하시는데, 실제 체크인 담당해주시는 분은 영어를 못하셔서 좀 불편했어요. 간단한 중국어를 공부했다면 더 좋았을 것 같아요.
地理位置不错,很方便｡房间算比较宽敞整洁
地理位置和环境都很好｡
Great location and nice place to stay with a group. Will definitely stay again.
其实房子是不错的~就那个带我们去房子的工作人员态度超级不好~讲话大小声~人家进去看房间也骂人~然后没看到问他是不是四间房间还骂人自己不会看啊~真是晕了

We called from the airport to say we were on our way. We got to the bus stop near the place at 1pm and no one was there to meet with us. I had to call once i got there and we were accommodated 20 to 25 minutes later upon our arrival. A big plus to this place is that it is just a few steps from Nathan Road. About 3 blocks away from jordan station. The place was very clean and spacious. There are restaurants, department stores and convenience store nearby if you need to get anything. My only comment during our stay was the fact that shampoo for bathing and laundry soap to wash the dishes was not adequate. I raised this issue on the first night as they visited the unit but their only reply to me was it can last for the duration of our stay. Well it did not. It ran out in the first 2 days fortunately we brought our own. I understand they are not a hotel but with the amount that they charge, they should at least refill this for the next guests that would be staying there. Refilling will not in any way hurt their income. There were only 2 sets of fork & spoon. The place could accommodate 10 guests and this is not enough. We were 4 adults. Although there were chopsticks, if you are not used to using them then its difficult to use.

The location of the apartment is very convenient, just 2 minutes walk to the Jordan station. Temple street is very near. A21 bus stop to-from airport is also 2 minutes walk. There are nearby places to eat and buy groceries if you want to cook. The apartment itself I think can accomodate up to 10 people as there are extra sofa beds. The beds in the room are quite hard and uncomfortable. There was a bit problem at the toilet plumbing, which was fixed immediately. We are also happy our request for early check-in and late check-out was allowed. I would definitely recommend the place again.
The apartment was clean and has a very good location in HongKong. Our host was very nice and helpful.

The host is very responsive to our question and the apartment is quite spacious (same with the pic). Located very near to MTR Jordan and bus stand. You can just walk from here to temple street night market.

Kitchen was not cleaned when we arrived.
Bathroom was moldy.
Building undergoing renovations so noisy. (Dec 2015)
2/3 of the beds were like sleeping on concrete.
No TV remote (remote for some other TV).
Busy/City area - recommend sleeping with ear plugs.
No curtains/blockouts so light pours in at dawn.
Good location, close to train and markets. Only one door key, other one was bent and snapped on first use. Place not well maintained.
Met us at bus stop and helped us inside.
Wouldn't stay here longer than a few days.

The location is convenient but the house looks old – there are unrepaired items like the lock of the room door. The security isn’t very good either. The house is spacious and is enough for 8-10 people. 

When we first arrived, the Middle-aged woman wasn’t very polite and was honestly a bit rude. The original contact person was much nicer but the one who picked us up wasn’t up to our expectation. 

First night the sprinkler had problem and only 5 of us (total of 10) could have a shower. It was fixed on the next day. 

The overall comment is okay and you cannot expect too much by paying this price.

The place was described as it was and was overall worth it! We are 6 members travelling together, and the 3 bedroom apartment is such a strategic choice to take! though the place was not that maintained and would have been better if there's another toilet and bathroom, our stay was more than perfect! I would recommend this to big groups with members on the go!

Very responsive host. The apartment is located at the mainroad with very convenient access to all sort of transports. MTR is just 3-5mins walking distance. Local varieties are all around. The building is undergoing some upgrading work which might look a bit messy especially the lift. However, the upgrading work does not cause much problem during the stay. It will be recommended if the host could upgrade some of the kitchen utensils as they are very old. As overall, very good and highly recommended if you are travelling in group or family

The place is "What you see is What you get" type. Easy to find the apartment just follow the instruction given to you. the building is under reconstruction but that's not a big deal as we leave the apartment early and comeback late at night.  Easy to communicate with the host.  Wi-Fi is fast , & the place is clean. Minus point for the bathroom as it's clogged. And the flash for the toilet bowl is not working. 
But still we will stay again to this apartment when we come back to HK.

The apartment is clean and neat, looks exactly like the photo. It's considered a large apartment given usual small space in Hk. The water supply in toilet flushing for the building was cut off during our stay, which we found out after checked in. However, we were given a pot where we can just fill the pot with water from toilet tap to flush. Location is very convenient, near to MTR station. Do try the Dim Sum at Chai Fook banquet level 2 (just across the building, next to Novotel) if you stay here. Overall a pleasant stay.
괜찮아욤 5명이서 묵었는데 방도 좋고 단지 1월에 갔는데 방이 약간 쌀쌀햇던..? 것빼고는 나쁘지않아요 숟가락젓가락 별로없고 주방용품 잘되어잇지않으니 숟가락젓가락 필수입니닼ㅋㅋㅋ종이컵돟ㅎㅎ 드라이기잇어요!

The man who should brought us to the apartment was late to present himself even that I called them in advance as per the host's message.
And it caused all my family waited for him under the weather of 3 degree include my Grandma who was shaking herself!

Finally the man came and show us the apartment with no manner attitude and acted like he is very busy and urgent to leave the apartment.

After a short briefing, he left but then we noticed that the toilet bowl cannot flush at all, I called the man again and told him what happened and he just asked me to flush it ourselves by filling water with a pail.

Luckily the apartment is spacious enough ,however as mentioned there is one sofa bed and one fold-able bed , the fold-able bed is spoiled. 

Thus, my brother who is 180cm needed to fit himself in a black sofa (not sofa bed)which is placed in the living room.
一个字形容“烂”,让我们等你们拿锁匙来等了一个小时多｡难道这就是欢迎我们的方式吗?

Yau was a great host who communicated well  before and during our stay.   We asked numerous questions.  Instructions from the airport to his property were very clear.  We were greeted upon arrival to a nearby bus stop and escorted to the unit.  A warm introduction and tour was included.  

The accommodations were spacious.  There is no heater in the unit, but blankets were provided. Our visit was in February and although cold and rainy outside, the home was suitable.  Late spring and summer are warmer months.  Yau was very accommodating as he addressed building issues (issues beyond his control) as well as any one could.  

The unit has the basics.  Nothing fancy and everything works.  There's a cook top, place settings to serve and cook a home cooked meal.  Refrigerator was of an appropriate size.  We didn't find a grocery store in the area but there was one one metro stop away. 

The unit is very convenient and 2 blocks north of the Jordan MTR station.  

On the negative side, the bathroom could have been cleaner.  Moisture control is difficult in a windowless room.  The tub had mildew and the floors were difficult to keep dry. Cleaning supplies and mop were accessible.  Yau had numerous pairs of slippers available.  Slippers and a mop fixed this issue.  I mention this one negative for fairness to Yau and future guests.  If you are expecting a level of polish typical of a franchise hotel in a western metropolis, you will be disappointed here.  This unit, despite this one issue, is a great value considering the location, price and size.   You will be able to pay more for other accommodations, but get less value.  We stayed at Yau's for five days in a group of 7 adults and two toddlers.  We were comfortable for the few hours per day that we were "home" between trips all over town.  Did I say it was only 2 blocks from the MTR?

Figuratively speaking, our stay was like staying with extended family members who were in college; the place had a functional minimalism.  At the same time it felt like Yau communicated and addressed issues to please as though accountable to a mutual family member.  I would stay at this property again, but after asking to stay at Grandma's.

- Great location, prompt response from host, friendly cleaner, very spacious, comfortable, fast internet connection, no curfew 
- Building is under renovation so it was noisy and appearance is not appealing, there was only one elevator which was small and covered with plywood
- Overall it was a nice stay
Good location and service! Highly recommended. We enjoy our HK trip very much! Thanks Yau for the nice accomodation. Surely we will miss this place. Hoping to come back again soon!

The apartment is setting in the central of Kowloon near subway station, however a bit hard to find so I advice to talk with Yau clearly about how to reach the room. The room is likely the photo but the kitchen isn't  perfectly enough to cook yourself. Don't worried, go out and fine some restaurant around the opposite side of the road there are the heaven of eat lover.

We were greeted very reliable at the bus stop near the apartment and shown around.  The building is under renovation and as such the outside looks quite scruffy as does the lobby and elevator however I think this should improve as the renovation completes.  It is a large apartment and certainly sleep 4 of us well and could have slept 6 but it is very basic and not very clean.  We would certainly not have cooked in the kitchen and the bedding was somewhat questionable with extremely hard beds.  It is in a lively part of Hong Kong very near the Temple Street Market which made eating out very easy and close and fun but the apartment is not somewhere to spend time.
nil

Location is good.

Close to MTR and buses. Taxi is easy to come by since there are two hotels on the same street as the entrance to the aprt. There are two airport buses A21 along Nathan Rd and A22 on Jordan Rd (we used this when we left to avoid using the underground pedestrian passage to cross Nathan Rd.... plus the A22 bus stop has cover, it was raining...) Also, a dry cleaner/laundry by the pound place one street up that has good and fast service - only 1 day to turn around dry cleaning!

Food Food everywhere!
HK style cafe... chinese restaurants.. congee shop (very busy, very good!).. japanese .. Western... starbucks... etc all within walking distance.

Spacious rooms and lounge. Included wifi was OK (we did have to reset once for it to work). Shower pressure was strong, but drainage a bit slow... so you gotta be conservative with water usage or risk overflowing.. recommend guests to turn tap off to lather!

BYO towels and toiletries... we even bought our own toilet rolls as we were only left one new roll for three people / three nights' stay. We also BYO extra towel for bath mat. 

Linen was a bit questionable. Stained linen..hmm.. 

A rack or even multiple hooks in the rooms would have been more convenient. As we needed places to hang up our evening dresses and suits for the wedding we were attending.

Toilet died on night of Day 2. Cistern will not fill up... water just flows continuously .. pressing flush button did nothing. We reported the issue to host/management. We then then told to call another colleague - who then told us nothing could be done until the next morning and wr should try to flush with the shower head or pot of water. Nobody contacted us to follow up nor came to fix the toilet up until we checked out and left.

The apartment was exactly as described on the listing... it was huge by HK standards - perfect for 3 single females, a 3 night stopover and a whole lot of luggage.  The location of the apartment was sensational - close enough to walk to many of the markets on the Kowloon side and really close to the Jordan MTR station.  The information provided to get from the airport to the apartment was accurate and we were met promptly by a lovely gentleman who showed us to the apartment.  The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.  The kitchen facilities were basic but we only ate breakfast in so it suited our needs perfectly. The beds were comfortable and clean - great for getting over a touch of jet lag!!

The location was great and near MTR station. The apartment was big enough for the 5 of us. Wifi was also handy. 

After just used Airbnb in Japan, we found key exchange in Hong King was not as easy. The 3 apartments we stayed in Japan, the keys would be in letter box or door handle key box, you just needed to put in the correct combustion to get the keys. We called 3 different numbers until we got the right lady to give us the key at bus station this time. 

Some maintenance is needed for this apartment. There was mould everywhere. The kettle lid was broken, and microwave machine was dirty. All the utensils were oily, and some cups had stains. The toilet water was nonstop running.
I am very satisfied with the apartment. It is clean and the hall quite big huge. The bathroom is clean. Very strategic to stay because 5 minutes walk to MRT Jordan Station.

Is a very good appartment, here is very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our holiday. Apt. have great location and bus stop near the bilding. Yau met us on time, no problems. Unfortunately only worked a small teapot, it is not enough for all, but it is not very important. Thanks)

This was our family's first airbnb experience and Yau did not disappoint. The place was huge, almost bigger than it appears in the pictures. It was complete with fast wifi Internet, a big TV, a refrigerator, a microwave oven, an induction cooker, utensils, plates, pots, and pans. The location was very ideal, just a few minutes walk to the Jordan MTR station. And the price we just about right. We would not hesitate to recommend this place to our friends.

Yau's place is ok. Their colleague though, was very late even if we called in advance from the airport. He was also a bit rude and hurried to leave. We also informed the host that we need 5 bedsheets as he has promised but only provided linens for three rooms--we were 7 adults at that time. Very convenient near Temple Street Night Market, McDonalds, Starbucks, etc. Value for money.

I appreciated the fact that someone met my son and I at the bus stop near the hotel. It was only steps from the bus stop. I would have appreciated knowing about the Express Train option from the airport to Kowloon Station and then cab or bus to the apartment. This is how we headed back.
The apartment was clean, spacious well located and much appreciated. Thank you!
Jan
The host is good and provide all the details on how to get in his place, the neighborhood is great near to all means of transportation in Hong kong

Very welcoming host. Perfect location for Nathan Road and MTR and across the road from a bus stop to airport. Food/markets/shops all right there (and the cheapest water in a shop below the apartment)!

On the host: very responsive and accommodating on all our queries regarding our booking and stay.
On the space: Big enough for ten (10) persons with three (3) double bedrooms and one (1) sofa bed. All bedrooms and dining area have A/C. Everything that a home needs were provided: kitchen utensils, ref, stove and more importantly nowadays, wifi. Secured place as there is 24 hour security with CCTV in the main lobby only though.
On the location: 5 minutes walk from MTR Jordan B1 Exit. Near Temple Street where you can buy small stuff as souvenirs and dai pai dongs for foods. If you're into walking, it's 1.5 KM from Victoria Harbour/Tsim Sha Tsui Area. Very accessible from the airport thru Cityflyer Bus A21.
We will definitely come back and recommend this place.

The place was humongous! Yau was very accommodating. I never had trouble with this reservation nor with the host. As my first Airbnb booking, I could say that the experience was awesome! Will definitely book again this listing if I get to HK again!
Perfect location in Nathan area.  Walking distance to MTR and night market. Our family of 10 stayed in Yau's place comfortably.   Kid's loved it.

Yau was very accommodating and quick to reply to our queries. The apartment location is also very convenient for quick transportation due to being near the mtr station and bus stop (including cityflyer). The room was quite spacious, well kept and enough for 8 people. Overall it was quite a pleasant experience, enough for being a place to just rest for the night, considering the cost.

Location is near the MTR. Description in listing is accurate. Building is shabby but the rooms were clean and water pressure is great. Kitchen is an added bonus as well. Yau responds to messages quickly. All in all, it's value for your money. Great for travelers on a budget.
Good and affordable accomodation for family or group of friends. Just few steps away from A21 (airport bus) stop. 5mins away by foot to MTR Jordan station.
We stay in 5 days. The apt is nice, clean and near Jordan mrt station and we can reach this apt with easy. Recomended to stay in here.

The host is very responsive, which I really appreciate. I was able to get the keys collected prior to my late arrival, and return of keys was pretty painless as well. Location is super-convenient, wi-fi and TV work at all times (which is great), and it's spacious by Hong Kong standard. My only complaint is the cockroaches that seem to come out at night from nowhere, particularly in the kitchen and bathroom. Host might have gotten cleaning services upon my complaint, and there were visibly less cockroaches crawling around  (but they were not eliminated completely). All in all, it's good value. I would use it again. Thank you.

숙소는 깨끗하고 위치도 역에서 가까웠고 체크인시간도 양해해주셔서 편리하게 이용할 수 있었습니다. 수압도 세고 물사용하는것도 불편하지 않았구요. 와이파이도 설치되어있고 건물 내 괸리인과 잠금장치가 되어있어 안전한것 같았습니다. 야시장, 재래시장이 길건너 바로라 야식먹기도 편했구요. 그러나 단 하나의 단점이 있다면 바퀴벌레가 있다는것입니다... 근데 홍콩 시장거리나 골목에가니 바퀴벌레가 3센치이상되는게 엄청 많더라구요. 그래서 그냥 그러러니 했습니다. 하여튼 잘 쉬고 편리하게 사용하고 왔습니다.

깔끔하고 방도 넓고 Nathan street에 위치한 건물이어서 인근 핫플레이스에 대한
접근성이 좋아요. 길 건너 바로 템플스트리트가 있고요.
홍콩국제공항에서 내려서 AEL 타고 카우롱(구룡)역에서  내려서 호텔 셔틀버스(K1 코스)
타고 Eaton hotel에서 내리면 5분 거리에 있어요.

We have stayed at yau's place last sept16-19. It was a wonderful experience.yau is very responsive and helpful to my queries. Also, the assigned person that was going to fetch us is very helpful as well. Yau is very kind to allow us to check in early. The place is good, exceeds my expectations. Its very near the jordan station and also restaurants and convenient stores. Just one comment, theres a problem with the wifi during our stay. But overall, i recomend this place especially to those travelling with their families. If i would visit hong kong again, i would stay in yau's place. Thanks yau.
Best Value!

it was a nice and good aptm. near from bus and MTR station, you can go anywhere from there. the host are good team to help solve some problem. when we checked-in, there was other guest stuf still in the living room it's been 6 o'clock in the evening but then we asked them to move all the luggage. how ever they give us good solution for many problem. oh, but we found 3 cockroach during our stay... plz do something for this, i hate cockroach. it was a good stay in there, we will recommended to our relation. thank you for good service...
Very accessible to MTR and bus from airport.

Communication with host was very easy and he will reply within few minutes. His apartment located at an old building next to Novotel Hotel in Nathan Street. Airport bus #A21 stop very near to the apartment. MTR Jordan is few blocks away. Same line as Tsim Sha Tsui and Mongkok stations.

The apartment itself is very basic. There are 3 rooms which can comfortably accomodate 6 people. There is a sofa bed but really in a bad shape. The bed is clean enough but the bedroom needed a cupboard - to hang the jacket and towel. One room doesn't even have a door knob! There's no curtains at the window so we just prayed that nobody saw us or secretly filming us changing the clothes...

I have no issues with the bathroom. Everything works just fine, and quite clean.

The kitchen really needed new / additional utensils. Only 2 forks and a spoon available so we have to take turn eating when dine in. There's a convenient store downstairs. However, one thing that puzzled me is that we can't find any store that sell egg within few blocks from the apartment! 

We would highly recommend this apartment for those who are planning to explore Kowloon area, Nathan Street in particular. Very easy to move around but make sure you are accompanied by male companion if you want to go out at night.

Overall I found this apartment worth the value. If you want a hotel type then this apartment is not for you.
Very spacious. Great for families. Definitely we'll stay here again.

I think this room is different from the photo. This room is not availble for 10people. The room is not clean.
If you want a clean and neat room, this room is not  a good choice.

Very helpful and thoughtful owner, fast response while ask any questions. 
Good location, near to mtr and airport bus station. Easy to find foods. 
The house is big enough to fit in 10ppl, quiet neighborhood. 
Definitely will come back here next time.
Yau was easy to communicate with and when I had problems with the Wifi he responded right away.

Upset about the met up. Called him at 11 from the airport. Need to wait for 40 minutes by the roadside with 4 kids. the room as the picture. clean..near mtr..bus stop..groceries..Very convenient with all the basic needs.

The place is at good location and easy to access with mrt.
But the cleanliness must be improve especially on the kitchen utilities. There also a lot of dust on the floor.
Great contact. Good organization. Apartment as described. Couldn't ask for more.
Good location to public transport.
접근성좋고 편한데 청결은좀..

交通方便 
整體寬敞
只是房間裡會有點潮濕味 開冷氣會好一些
洗澡的時候 熱水會斷掉 間隔10分鐘洗澡 會好一些

the place is the best and i will reccomend the place to all tourist like us. you will not regret it and MTR is everywhere and bus is just one feet away..Monkok shopping pls is walking distance
10 or 12 people will fit in this place

Overall the place is nice and spacious. Good location near downtown and train stations. Airport bus terminal is just across the road. Tons of shops and street food in the vicinity. Great place to rent for huge groups.
Very spacious for a family of four. Convenient location. Will definitely book this apartment for my next trip!

Yau place is great, clean and spacious. The location is very strategic as it close to Jordan station. Michelle the woman that meet us to handover the keys is very friendly and Yau took a quick action when we informed him that the bathroom was clog. For kitchen facilities, there is 1 induction cooker, small kettle, and microwave but unfortunately the microwave doesn't function properly. Yau place didn't provide iron so please bring clothes that didn't required to iron, bring tupperware/ container as there is no bowl, only plates is provided. Wifi is working great. During our stay, there were no cockroaches as mentioned in previous review. Overall, I'm satisfied and surely will recommend Yau place to my friends and if I'm going back to HK, Yau place will definitely be my choice.
The place is great, fits 10-12 people easily. Close to Jordan station, close to supermarket and most especially, close to Temple St. Great value for money. Thanks so much for having us :)
Right for the budget. Located in a central area so very accessible to all like public transport & shops. For me it feels like home.

Perfect location! Very near the Jordan MTR station exit B (about 5 minutes walk) and very accessible from & to the airport via  Citybus A21. Comfy beds and strong water supply were a plus and wifi connection was also good. But there were also few things that need improvements, particularly on the  cleanliness of the unit. It needs repainting of walls and tough cleaning on the toilet as well. It would also be better if the kitchen utensils (such as plates, glasses, etc.) be changed from plasticwares to chinawares. And additional spoons and forks also.
Nice place. Near mtr. Good value for money! :) will definitely book again when we come back to visit :)
适合一家大小
We paid extra charges which I don't expect to pay
Good location. Near to the MRT station.
the place is nice and comfortable.

We enjoyed our stay.  Yau was very helpful as we had a problem with hot water system, he send staff even late at night and teach us how to use it but hot water is not well functional.  The location is very close to MTR and 7Eleven which is next door.  The mattress need to be changed.
Nice place to stay and very spacious. Ideal for big groups. The place is very near to mtr station

A spacious room with 3 rooms, kitchen and a decent bathroom. Can accommodate up to 12 people. The apartment is in the heart of downtown Hong Kong which is Nathan Road. It is very near the shopping areas (Tsim Sha Tsui, Harbour City, etc.)  and is a 5 minute walk to Jordan Station. Food and access to convenience stores is not a problem. Our host; Mr. Yau, Mr. Liu and of course Ms. Chen were very helpful.

Within budget, leads us to the living place,and key handover, great for family trip. But the air con in the living area having some problem and the fabric sofa should do washing or cleaning because we got bug bite. Overall it is great for our experience. Thank you for the great offer.
It's spacious and close to the public transportation.

Place is near to Temple Street and Jordan Stn. We dont have much problem except 2 of the mattresses are quite high. Maybe a problem for shorter people to climb all the way to the other side. Gas stove was unable to use, but they provide electronic cooker. The rest of things are okay.

Comfortable, cheap, clean and at the center of the city(Kowloon). You can cook your own meal as rice cooker, induction cooker, fridge, and other kitchen utensils are provided. MTR is 2 minutes walk. Bus stop is at the front side of the building. Starbucks, Mcdonalds, and other shops is a minute away(by walking). Wellcome(grocery store) is around 4-5 minutes away. Park, money changers, night market, etc, is just in the backyard. We even just take a walk to the harbor. And we are eleven persons! Thanks Yau! We enjoyed Hong Kong and one reason is that your place is just amazing.

Yao was such a great host. I appreciate all the help when we were check in. I didnt know how the bus operate in HK that why i skipped the 10 stop. But Yao sent a nice lady to pick us up at 11 stop. It was quite a walk, not too far but not too near either. Thank you so much Yao and the lady (sadly forget to ask her name) Now for the apartment itself, wow it couldnt be better! The apt was exactly the same as the photo in airbnb and all the AC working just fine, the kitchen was complete, bathroom was clean and thank God i didnt find any cockroach lol ^^ WILL DEFINITELY BOOKED YAO'S APT AGAIN IN THE FUTURE~ lastly, thank you for making our holiday in HK amazing and memorable.
5 stars location with 1 star ammenities due to poorly maintained unit

My family enjoyed our stay in Yau's place. The location was very accessible, near to MTR, bus (with airport bus passing), markets, Starbucks. Temple street is also a few blocks away. Recommended especially for big groups/families!
总体还是很不错,厨房的清洁不太够!还是油油的!房间空调声音好吵,大厅的空调坏了!好热
Amazing location! Well- connected

airbnb is much better than guest house or hostel house. eddy our host is very nice and can communicate english well, the house is big more than i expected
very big place for 7 person. thank you again will surely recommend it to a friend.
位於市中心,地點方便,空間大
很好,设施齐全
当天我们入住时间比较晚,入住时有点小问题,还好都顺利解决了｡房子很大,适合家庭居住,各方面都很好,房子很干净,位置也很好,附近就是庙街,还去了吃宵夜｡总体来讲很不错
房子位置离地铁站很近,周围都是商铺,就是空调噪音大,房屋的设施略为陈旧,但这个价格也算物有所值吧｡
Nice location!
有三個睡房,合多人入住｡電梯衹一個,要耐心等候｡

Our stay was really great. Yau was really helpful and when we have issue Yau responds quickly to get it resolve or even if you just have a question. The house is clean and the description was accurate. The place was also close to the MtR and a lot of other place.

The only issue we had was finding the building as Yau's employee was getting to the bus stop late and the house is actually close to the building so we chose to go there ourself. If you choose this, turn left to Saigon st and the Kim tak building entrance is there
环境还可以,位置也在中心,出入很方便,离站口也近.
Great location for the flat. There's value for money if you in a large group.
Overall, it was an awesome experience!
Great location

The location of this Airbnb is great for access to subway stations, night markets and food. The place is spacious and the individual AC rooms are very cold, perfect for the humid Hong Kong weather. This is where the positives end. The pictures online are not accurate. The place felt dirty and grimey, lacked towels/toilet paper and even soap. We found small cockroaches too. The bathroom and rooms could use a deep cleaning. Be aware of these things when booking.

It is a very well connected place. Be it metro, bus, street shopping and the host had given all the necessary details to start our Hong Kong journey  without any hiccups. The flat is very huge and was more than enough for 6 of us. However, only one point to he mentioned is that, the apartment could have been better maintained in terms of dusting and kitchen utensils. But overall we had a comfortable stay.

As advertised.   Place is big and location is great - located a few mins from B1 exit of Jordan station.  Lots of things to do and see around there.  Easy walk down to Tsim Tsa Tsui or up to Mong Kok. Two elevators in the building - at each end.  Closest to the apartment has a ramp to wheel your suitcases as well as an underpass to cross over to Temple Street night market.  Across the street from the apartment is buss stop for A21 Airport express.
Very good location and nice stay at Yau'place

Mr Yau is responsive to all enquire and will try his best for it. 

The house is located between Jordan and YMT MTR making it great for shopping which we enjoy. 

It is also easy to take K1 airport express bus near Eaton hotel which is good as well. 

However, the house does indicate it needed some TLC to revamp to its previous glory. 

Firstly, th mattresses is due for change as when u sleep at the edge. It will bring u to center as the center will sink. It is for all 3 room. 

Secondly, the living room aircon smell mouldy which takes a while to go off to an acceptable level... 

Thirdly, toilet floor is dirty Andy needed some good scrub and bleach to remove the hidden dirt. 

Lastly, the aircon sound is a bit noisy as it is old school aircon...
Good location. Stop for Bus 21A to the airport located just across Nathan Rd. from the apartment. Elevator small and sometimes one has to wait in line to get on.
有待改進

Yau's place is pretty much how it looks on the photos but it's not as big as I expected it to be. Though our stay was okay, considering of it's good location near public transpo/MTR, shop marts and restos, what disappointed me with Yau's hosting was during the check in. He was supposed to meet us in Jordan MTR but he wasn't there. We had to ask for directions going to his place. Also, you'd expect the house to be ready upon arrival but in our case it wasn't. The previous guests were still there. The place was still a mess and had to be cleaned by his assistant. He should have made sure that everything was ready for us because that's what hosts should be doing. Please note that there are 2 Kim Tak Buildings - make sure to clarify with Yau the correct one before booking with him to avoid being lost and confused.

It was all good.. overall we had a great time and your listing location is very great, it seems everything is just a few steps away..also loved the part where the listing has ample space unlike the other places being rented on the area which is so small, really worth every dollar. Eventhough we really never met face to face everything went smoothly from checking in to checking out.. When I go back to Hongkong, this definitely is the place where I am staying again...
숙소에서 주변관광지 접근이 좋고, 식당 도 많음 시장야시장도 열려 볼거리 먹거리는도 괜찬음
這間太棒了,地點方便,靠近地鐵站,去哪裡都超方便,家裡清潔,屋主很和善｡以後我一定住這裡｡
Very Nice place to stay
Nice place to stay, family friendly, near to public transportation
The location is very strategic and near to shutle bus and MTR station... but i could not use the water heater. And i found cocroach in the kitchen and bedroom
都挺好的,离佐敦地铁站很近,走路快的话约3分钟左右｡是套间,适合家庭五六人入住
地方方便

If you just need a place to take shower, rest overnight, it is a good choice. Convenient location, very good price for travel with a group of 7 people, can’t find it anywhere else. Yau is friendly and responses to call and message. The only problem is no place to store the luggage after check out , because our flight is in night time.
Overall it was great to stay in yau's place. My only concern is the cleanliness.
地理位置很好
位置很不错,附近交通方便,房东安排很好｡
Good place to stay very spacious near MTR Jordan Station and Market. Although there are some issues in cleanliness  but all in all we enjoy our stay.
Not really
If you not look for much, then this is quite ok places to stay. Convenient. But host not so manners.
The place was big and we are very comfortable with it.. the comfort room was small but everything is okay. :)

I like this property because it is huge compared to HK standards. The linens and pillows were also clean. The host was also easy to contact. He also gave other contact names and numbers in case I was not able to reach him.

The property was also very accessible. I took A21 CityFlyer from the airport and the stop was just a few steps from the property.

My only problem was with the kitchen. The amenities were not complete. The kitchen area was clean but cupboards and under the counter cabinets were stocked with the junk.

I’d love to come back, but I hope they fix the kitchen then it would be a perfect location for a family visiting HK.
虽然环境不怎么样,但交通很方便,地铁,巴士出门2分钟到达

Yau’s place looks deceiving in the picture. It is not “huge” as described. It even looks clean and new in the picture but it is really not. It needs more cleaning especially the toilet and the kitchen. I am thankful that the linens are clean and dust free. The doorlock is not digitized like the other units we rented out and they only provided 1 key for a large group. We requested for another key and willing to make a deposit for it but my request was disregarded. The unit is old and dirty. The air conditioning is noisy. I only appreciate the beddings provided because they were clean.

The place is great very accesible to transpo mtr or bus, located in the center near tourist spots. Though we had certain miscommunication during check in due to our request for early check in but over all we really enjoyed our stay in yau's place. If were going back to hongkong maybe we will still choose to stay in his place...
位置絕對方便,空間感十足,此價錢亦化算,但對清潔要求高的話,就會有點失望
Spacious place, very near to MTR station. Food and shops are all nearby.
Great location and helpful host

We checked in after 12noon and the previous guests were still there. The place was dirty, we were told that the cleaners were still having their lunch. We waited for an hour and still no cleaners came. I called Eddie and he sorted everything for me. We went out from the apartment at 2pm and came back at 7pm and the apartments was clean and sheets were changed. I would still RECOMMEND the place because of its location and call Eddie if you have issues because he is reliable. The Internet was fast,  the LCD screen of the TV was broken but Mr. Yau said he will change it. The place is not spec and span  clean but will do when you are on a budget. The place was enough for 4 kids and 4 adults. Enjoy Hong Kong ☺
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝ､ﾎｽﾄの方はとても素晴らしい｡ただ､写真よりも実際は綺麗さ､広さはない｡

Yau is si accommodating and responsive. The place is spacious for us 11 guest and almost near to evrything, shoppong center, mtr, bus stops, wet market and convenience stores. Great value for money and perfect for large group.

Superb location. Just a few blocks from the Night Market, 7/11 is just downstairs. And near the popular tourist attractions. Rooms big enough to accommodate 6 adults and 4 kids. Thanks Ms Ayong for meeting us and thank you Mr. Yau for sharing your home with us.
Clean and in safe neighborhood. A few steps away from the MTR station. Great place to stay if you love shopping, night and ladies market is just minutes away.
place is accesible to transpo, shopping and restaurants :) yao was very easy to talk to. good for family or a group of friends:)
冲厕所冲不了真的很尴尬
Good very convenient
Good apartment and host very take care transport is convenient
Location was great very near to MTR, many shop and restaurants around, room was ok but cleanliness in kitchen need to be improve and only one toilet.
The place is very convenient and affordable.

Appartement très bien situé les indications sont très précises dommage que l’appartement est plein de cafards dans la cuisine et salle de bains et pas d’eau chaude pour un séjour de 3 jours impossible de se laver.
Place is near a night market and an MTR station. Very accessible location.

Everything (location, space, price, furniture, beds, wifi etc) was great except cleanliness. 
The space was big enough to accommodate all of us (9 adults + 1 child). 

Yau was very easy to communicate with. We had issues with incomplete utensils and broken hot water but these were resolved immediately. She had her staff buy new utensils and sent a repairman right away for the hot water problem. We had a misunderstanding with her colleague at first; as we thought she was very rude because she was shouting at us and even looked at us straight in the eyes with mad eyes, but was resolved by Yau immediately. Tip is, always download an app translator if you dont speak Cantonese as he staff dont speak English at all.

Maybe after serious general cleaning and  pest control (for the cockroaches), the unit would be a 10/10 :)

Overall, we are grateful for Yau's kindness, prompt responses, and assistance the whole week we stayed here. Thanks Yau
主要是地段好,房子真的很一般,沙发床,折叠床都睡上了｡而且接的人让我们等了好久才住进去,总之香港这个地段的房子就这样了｡
地理位置不错,和预期一样｡床很舒服,一家旅游不二之选

Wifi is working great with fast connection but tv didn’t work. We were just not happy about the pick up coz we had to wait at the bus stop for almost an hour with all our luggages and we had a senior with us and the lady that pick us up is very rude.
Overall, the place is ok. I would recommend the place due to its perfect location but would not recommend it for a large family.
地方挺大的,我们人多,住着很方便的!窗帘应该换新的啦,遮不住!一间卧室没有锁头!
lebih detil bertanya sebelum fix menyewa, lokasi nya sangat bagus, bisa kemana mana, akses sangat gampang, gedung nya bersih, jika berlibur sangat membantu untuk lokasi tempat nya.
总体不错,床够多张,交通也方便,要是厨房能改善更好

Wonderful location near mtr jordan station. Disappointed because the host said that they will pick us up on the bus station but they did not. We need local sim card to get in touch with them or else our time will be wasted. Also, we said to clean the place and they did not do it voluntarily. Still Great stay experience but they need to work on cockroaches.
overall it was a pleasant experience living in this apartment, only kitchen cleanliness needs to be improved. Location is good, close to stasiun, the host was very helpfull.

Yau’s house is on strategic location, there’s airport bus stop and MTR station nearby. Near Temple Street Night Market, Ladies Market only 1 station, and many stores nearby. The building has elevator so if you bring heavy luggage it makes you comfortable. The host was friendly and fast response.
Nice host! Convience location.
客廳和廚房區域清潔度不佳,會有許多小蟑螂!客廳的沙發下有蠻多垃圾和灰塵!晚上睡覺時樓上的冷氣滴水很大聲,冷氣的噪音也蠻大的,還有一間房間沒有喇叭鎖,浴室的下水道不太通,水會淹起來,要過一陣子才會消!
Everything was fine, apartment was big enough for 10 People. Great Location!
A great place to stay, near to everything.. hoping for a strong internet connection.

写真ほどの清潔感はありませんが､特に問題ない程度です｡
ﾊﾞｽ停･地下鉄が近いし船も割と近く､立地がとても良かったのでおｽｽﾒです!
迎えに来てくれたﾎｽﾄの方は日本語も英語も通じませんでしたが翻訳機でｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝとりました｡特に問題ないです｡
下の入り口が23時に閉まるｵｰﾄﾛｯｸなのですが､その番号を聞いてなかったので他の利用者に開けてもらいました｡出会えなかったら締め出されていたので､ちゃんと聞いておいた方がいいです｡
ｸﾞﾙｰﾌﾟ7人で利用しましたが､広さもちょうどよく快適に過ごせました!

Yau's place is spacious for 10 people. Only downside is that the place only has 1 bath and toilet so you've got to schedule who's gonna use and take turns. The kitchen smells funny too. Aircon is cold for all the rooms! Elevator and wifi are fast and reliable. Location is great, near the mtr and some budget marts. It was clean as well. Maybe add more tissues available for use. Overall, it was a great stay!
Location is perfect and place is big enough to accommodate a family. We had a relaxing time. Great for family bonding.
A good place to stay
房子地點尚算方便,離鐵路大約數分鐘的路程｡但房子的外觀與相片差別太大,相片顯示非常明亮乾淨,但實際房內比較殘舊,長身及地板位置亦見有殘缺未有修補｡入住當天仍然需要維修員即場進行關於電路的維修,如果知道有需要維修的情況,為何不在客人入住前進行?而在客人入住後再安排維修員即場進行維修?

Fantastic place to stay. I stayed here for a night with 5 of my friends. Really spacious apartment in a  great location. Everyone had a great time. If you are in a group and need 
a big place to stay in Kowloon then this is great. Thank you!
Thank you Mr. Yau for the great accommodation....
Host not so manners and the house cleanliness is like garbage dump.The mattress bed is dirtier than the floor.The owner,Miss Chen said it is accommodable,I dont think so

If I had two words to describe the experience I would say disgusting and frustrating. I had clearly communicated the time of arrival and that we would be coming from mainland China to the train station. He kept sending me messages about the airport and I would reply that we weren’t coming from the airport. When he finally understood we set a place and time to meet. We even called him from the train station to confirm we were on time. We stood in front of the metro station for almost an hour waiting. Then when we got there it was nothing like the pictures. It was filthy. Every surface was stained or covered in mold or dust. It had not been cleaned in months. The toilet stopped working one night because the tank wouldn’t fill with water. There kitchen was used for storage. Not providing towels was annoying. The only decent part of the place is that the beds were comfortable. The whole experience is confirms why I don’t like to use Airbnb. Too many issues with check in and false advertising.

Photos seem to be outdated. Place may be big enough for us family of 8 but the clutter in the area made it smaller to move comfortably around. 

We had everything we need though TV was broken when we arrive and wasnt fixed till we checked out.  

Location was ok. 5mins walk to MTR not bad. Night  market was near to our place.

The place is very accessible however,  it was untidy  even the ref it’s not clean. Tv  is not working. Many cockroaches specially in the kitchen. There’s a stinky smell coming inside the CR.  Many times when we arrived the place, the door been opened.  Aircon in one of the rooms comes out a black dust maybe need to be clean.

Nothing is good but the location.
DIRTY OLD PLACE
Misleading photos. Didn't actually stay the night. We were in the apartment for 20 minutes and booked a hotel. Furniture not as per images. Have raised issue with Air BnB.
地理位置的确方便,但是接待的廖先生真系不太友善,后来晚上11点到回民宿时楼下锁门,想私信房东,已经发不出信息,不知是否屏蔽啦,但都还没退房就没有服务了,反正还是整体觉得不友善
The host is very accommodating and responses quickly to all my queries.. The place is in a nice location and almost everything can be accessed by walking..

Yau is a responsive host. She was able to meet us in Bank of China. We had a great time in Yau’s unit. It feels like home. We are group of 10 ( 6 adults and 4 kids) and we stayed comfortably. We’re able to sleep well. Yau provided us daily beddings though we didn’t use it We’re okay with the beddings provided first. We’re able to prepare breakfast. The lift is okay, so far no long waiting time. We’re provided with hand soap and toilet paper. The hot and cold is working well. Wifi signal is fast. Yau’s place is located strategically. Near to MTR, bus Stop and restaurants (yey! Mcdo is just so near, my kids love it) and convenient stores like 7 eleven, watson etc. Walking distance to Temple Street Market where you can have the street food and night market. Yau’s place is worth recommended especially if you’re traveling with kids. It’s a big place compared to hostels.
The place is near to everything.
모든게 실망

name: One bedroom apartment in Istanbul
space: One bedroom with a double bed. The apartment has all the necessary furniture, kitchen, washing machine, air conditioning, kitchen utensils. Cleaning of the apartment is free and is to your liking.
description: One bedroom with a double bed. The apartment has all the necessary furniture, kitchen, washing machine, air conditioning, kitchen utensils. Cleaning of the apartment is free and is to your liking.

host.host_about: Merhaba ben Ömer. Ben Türkiye'de yaşıyorum. Gerçekten deniz ve güneşi seviyorum. Tüm aşıklar dairemde kalıyorum öneririz.

name: Funky, Quiet, Safe EV Walk-Up
summary: Our unit is a co-op in an older building, full of diverse, responsible, close-knit folks. The apartment itself is a small two-bedroom, suitable for a couple and child. Not a luxury apartment, but everything you need is here. Including toys.
space: Our apartment is a fourth floor walk-up in a co-op that was rehabbed by it's owners. It has not been made to feel suburban or generic - it's not a 'luxury apartment'. It's plenty of space, a quiet well-lived-in, well furnished place to relax after a day of pounding the pavement or a night on the town.  It's well lit, with one very large and one small bedroom (our six-year-old sleeps there), a bathroom (shower, no tub) and an open kitchen and living room, all with wood floors, some painted, some stained. The building has been a pillar of the neighborhood for many years, and most folks in the building are invested in keeping the area safe, affordable and diverse.  For three adults you can use our spare mattress instead of the kiddo bed.  Linens and towels are yours to use, and you do not need to wash them (though you are welcome to do your laundry in our washer.)
description: Our unit is a co-op in an older building, full of diverse, responsible, close-knit folks. The apartment itself is a small two-bedroom, suitable for a couple and child. Not a luxury apartment, but everything you need is here. Including toys. Our apartment is a fourth floor walk-up in a co-op that was rehabbed by it's owners. It has not been made to feel suburban or generic - it's not a 'luxury apartment'. It's plenty of space, a quiet well-lived-in, well furnished place to relax after a day of pounding the pavement or a night on the town. For three adults you can use our spare mattress instead of the kiddo bed.  Linens and to
neighborhood_overview: The East Village is diverse, vibrant and convenient. There are excellent coffee shops and restaurants nearby, Thompkins Square Park has movies and concerts (as well as great playgrounds and a kids' pool), and you can get just about anywhere from our place.
notes: If you rent from us this August, there is scaffolding on the exterior wall of the  building. Work usually starts up around 9 or 9:30 and is over by 4.
transit: We are a 10-minute walk from the 6, R, L and F trains. There are multiple Citibike stations within two blocks, and several bus lines run up and down Ave C and Ave A. Parking is manageable on the street, and safe.
access: We will block off a small section of the large bedroom, which functions as our office. Otherwise, it's all yours. Let us know if you'd like dresser space, and we'll store our clothes.
interaction: We'll be available by phone/email throughout the stay.
house_rules: The most important thing for us is that you take good care of our home - clean up after yourselves, and please respect our downstairs neighbors by not stomping on our floors. We are a shoes-off household, and hope you will be too. The building is quiet at night.  Otherwise, we hope you'll feel comfortable, convenient and welcomed. No pets, please. No smoking.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm a theater artist - 50, mature, non-smoking, easy to get along with. I live in New York City with my wife, Johanna Meyer, choreographer and Pilates instructor extraordinaire, and our son, Harold (9), denizen of The Earth School Thompkins Square Park, and other locales. We own a small apartment in the wonderful East Village. 

I travel a lot for work - sometimes to teach, sometimes to perform, sometimes to direct a play. I often use AirBnB to save money on housing costs when I go. 

Johanna and I are native midwesterners, and have lived in New York for 25+ years. We love it here. We know how to live with it's pace, and withdraw into quiet corners when we need to. Our home is evidence of that. Full of patterns, comforts and books.

name: Contemporary Loft near Plaza Cat.Sleeps 4- Coli 54
summary: Magnificent apartment with 75m2 of floor space, just off Las Ramblas and the Plaça Catalunya. It is spacious, comfortable, modern and furnished with impeccable taste. The building is very secure, it has a door opening system and lift.
space: In an unbeatable location, just 100 metres from the Plaça Catalunya and the famous Ramblas, this fantastic loft is perfect for couples and families wanting to enjoy Barcelona.
description: Magnificent apartment with 75m2 of floor space, just off Las Ramblas and the Plaça Catalunya. It is spacious, comfortable, modern and furnished with impeccable taste. The building is very secure, it has a door opening system and lift. In an unbeatable location, just 100 metres from the Plaça Catalunya and the famous Ramblas, this fantastic loft is perfect for couples and families wanting to enjoy Barcelona. This apartment has a parking space under request and availability. It has an extra cost of 10€/day from April to October, both included. The rest of the year the parking is free of charge. Near the apartment there's the green, purple, yellow and red subway lines which can take you
neighborhood_overview: Just a couple of minutes from Plaça Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gràcia (where you can find top-flight designer shops including Chanel, Louis Vuitton and others) and just 5 minutes from the city's Cathedral.
notes: HUTB-007306 Tourist taxt included in the total price. We kindly ask you to read carefully all descriptions and the amenities that are included in the property. It will help you choose the best accommodation for your holiday, according to your needs. Also, please read very carefully the "House Rules" section. There you will find very useful information regarding our policies and it will prevent any misunderstanding after your booking has been completed.
transit: Near the apartment there's the green, purple, yellow and red subway lines which can take you to any point of Barcelona City Center. There's also the Renfe which is part of the Public transportation and can be taken directly from the airport.

During your stay and at your departure. It will provide a free extra cleaning for all reservations of more than 6 nights, approximately at the middle of the stay.  Water, gas, electricity: Included  Sheets and towels: included Parking on availability. Free, except from June to October. It is not permitted for more people to stay in the apartment than the number stipulated in the reservation. Please do not throw anything onto the street or into the inner courtyards. Please dispose of the rubbish in the containers nearest your apartment.  Please remember to turn off the lights and the air conditioning whenever you leave the apartment. The apartment must be left in good condition: Please make sure that the kitchen is tidy, the utensils are c

host.host_about:
Enjoybcn offers a range of carefully selected apartments and vacational rentals, from elegant and modern to economic and functional, owning several apartment buildings spread through different neighborhoods.

Our company along with our experienced and qualified team are dedicated to giving you, our guests, the best possible experiences in Barcelona. 

We will be glad to help you to find the option that better suits your needs, from a local experience to a business trip, we will be here to assist you finding the best apartment for you. Furthermore, we have a free 24-hour emergency service to ensure complete peace of mind during your stay.

We look forward meeting you in your next visit to Barcelona!

_________

En Enjoybcn disponemos de una gran variedad de apartamentos, desde los más elegantes y modernos hasta los más económicos y funcionales. Somos propietarios de varios edificios repartidos por distintos barrios de la ciudad.

De la mano de nuestro calificado y experimentado equipo estaremos encantados de asesorarte y ayudarte a planificar las mejores vacaciones en Barcelona.

Estamos a tu entera disposición para encontrar el apartamento que mejor se ajuste a tus necesidades. Además, disponemos de un exclusivo servicio de emergencias 24 horas que te garantizan la máxima tranquilidad durante toda tu estancia.

¡Esperamos poder conocerte en tu próxima visita a Barcelona!

--------------

À Enjoybcn nous disposons d’une grande variété d’appartements, des plus modernes et élégants au plus bon marché et fonctionnels. 

Nous sommes propriétaires de plusieurs bâtiments répartis dans les différents quartiers de la ville.

Notre personnel qualifié et expérimenté  sera enchanté de pouvoir vous conseiller et vous aider à organiser les meilleures vacances possibles à Barcelone.

Nous sommes à votre entière disposition pour vous aider à trouver l’appartement qui répondra au mieux à votre attente.

De plus, nous disposons d’un service de téléphone d’urgence 24h/24 que vous garantit la plus grande tranquillité pendant tout votre séjour.

Nous espérons pouvoir vous connaître  lors de votre prochaine visite à Barcelone !

reviews.comments:
De communicatie vooraf, de ontvangst en het ophalen van de sleutels was goed geregeld. De ruimte is mooi, ruim en licht! En de locatie is super. De badkamer is een wat kille ruimte.
Aanrader !

The loft was really amazing! The decoration was great and the flat was really big! The location was close to everything! Just love it. Just be carful about the price they ask. Coz on Airbnb is not the full price, I had to put 70euros more. And no blacony or terraces to smoke.
Estuvimos un par de días en la casa que gestiona la agencia Sara. La ubicación de la casa es perfecta para levantarse y disfrutar del centro de Barcelona. Lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda.

Upon arriving there was a strong smell of cleaning supplies possibly coming from the couch. We opened the windows so air it out since it was giving us a headache. We were not aware of the holiday so we had to pay to store our luggage at a location a couple blocks away for a couple of hours until we could check in. Overall the place was in a good location and clean. The shower does not have much of a door so water gets on the floor. The beds were not super comfortable but were adequate. The apartment was quiet and dark once the shades were closed.

훌륭합니다. 
우선 위치가 까딸루냐 광장 바로 옆이고 교통이 편리했습니다. 공항버스, 지하철 모두 5분 거리입니다.
깨끗했으며 편의시설도 모두 준비되어 있었고 친절하게 응대해줬습니다.

It was nice room!
When i am back again, i will stay again!
Solo puedo decir.....PERFECTO

Muchas gracias!!!! Todo estaba muy bien. El loft tal y como se mostraba en las fotos, muy amplio y luminoso. Nosotros íbamos con dos niños pequeños y mucho espacio para que se movieran.

La ubicación perfecta, muy centrico, con muchas tiendas y bares  cercanos. Transporte publico, bus y metro a dos minutos andando.

Si volvemos a Barcelona y podemos repetiremos.
Muy buena atencion
Great & stylish appartment in ideal & save location in Barcelona. Many sights are within walking distance. I strongly recommend!
Un très bon emplacement et un super loft !
Location of apartment was excellent!! Spacious and great floor plan. Extremely clean and comfortable. Highly recommended!

O apartamento é maravilhoso, tudo super arrumado! Exatamente como nas fotos!
A localização é perfeita! Pertinho da praça da Catalunha, Pertinho de La Ramblas super fácil acesso a tudo! Super indico!

Lugar perfeito para 4 pessoas. 

Ótimo espaço, limpeza, decoração.

A localização é perfeita. Há poucos metros da Passeig de Gracia, Rambla Catalunya, Plaza Catalunya.

O metro Passeig de Gracia fica há 50 metros do apartamento e tem conexão com 03 linhas diferentes.

Nossa estadia foi perfeita! Recomento.
The location was very good. The room is spacious and clean, and I would highly recommend it if you come to Barcelona.

It was a wonderful and memorable stay at the Coli 54 apartment. The apartment was cozy and beautiful, fantastic location, walking distance to so many things ... just outstanding . Will highly recommend EnjoyBCN!
For the money you pay, you get a really good appartment. Highly recommend it!
THE APARTAMENT IS BIG AND COMFORTABLE. EXCELENT LOCALIZATION. THE HOST WAS VERY HELPFUL AND PROVIDED US WITH ALL WE NEED.I HIGHLY RECOMEND THIS SPOT.
Absolutamente todo maravilloso!!!!! Inmejorable ubicación, el espacio muy acogedor y las personas de Enjoybch increíbles.

El loft esta muy céntrico, muy cómodo, amplio, bien equipado y con todo lo necesario para la estancia.
Una agradable estancia
Esperamos repetir.

The flat is very clean and spacious, it looks exactly the same with the photos. The location is very central and convenient. There is a nice restaurant just downstairs called La Tramoia with great food and service. We really enjoyed our dinner there and our stay in the apartment.

El departamento es muy lindo y está en una ubicación excelente, se puede caminar a todos los puntos turísticos ya que se encuentra en el medio de todo. Y sino se quiere caminar están los transportes públicos también por la zona. 
El único problema que tuvimos fue que una de las dos camas es muy incómoda y nos despertábamos con dolor de espalda todos los días. La otra cama está bien.
非常优异的位置,里加泰罗尼亚广场非常近｡离米拉之家,巴特罗之家也是步行的距离｡热情周到的服务,公寓内的各种设施非常齐全,我们在巴塞罗那度过了一个完美的假期

Wonderful location - easy walking to so much of interest. Great apartment, quite unique décor & very well equipped. The Enjoybcn staff were extremely helpful & pleasant. I had a wonderful week there. Highly recommended.
Es una muy buena localización. El piso tal como está descrito en la página. Comunicación muy ágil. Lo recomendamos

muy recomendado, la informaicon es tal y como esta descrita en la pagina, los espacios son bastante confortables y la dotacion mucho mejor de lo esperado.

seguramente lo utilizaremos en futuras oportunidades, no lo duden.
Spacious, modern and comfortable studio in a very central location. We had a great stay here and would definitely recommend it.

the reason we enjoyed our stay at Barcelona is cause of this great location, you're exactly at the center of everything, other then that the place is very new and clean and everything was available from the washing machine to the dish washer. I would highly recommend to stay with them at your next visit.

The location of the apartment was great and the EnjoyBCN staff was very helpful and friendly. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed during our stay. We would definitely consider staying here again in the future. Thanks for everything.

Amazing place to stay in!!! we were a family with 3 children and the place was so convenient. first it has all the utensil that you will need for your stay. Second, we got a very clean apartment. third the apartment is very much in the center close to everything. The service was amazing whatever we needed we got. For sure will book this place again.

The apartment was amazing
More beautiful than the pictures even
Everything is new and clean
pierre and other staff place were charming and made our stay to be perfect!!!!!!
My next time in Barcelona will be only this apartment. 
Best location in Barcelona!!!!

Location was excellent, just a few meters from Catalunya Square, Ramblas, great shopping, and awesome restaurants. The apartment is exactly as described and photographed. The enjoyBCN office is right next door for any needs. You can even drop off your bags there easily if need be. Thank you to Liza and Pierre for excellent and friendly service!

The apartment was spacious, very clean, all the facilities you require when away from home, walking distance to central Barcelona, and its many tourist attractions, cafe's, bars, restaurants, shops, buses, trains and taxi's at your doorstep.  What more could you wish for!
thumbs up
Emplacement, propreté, confort tout était parfait !!! Merci

The experience we had at this place is nothing short of outstanding when it comes to location, decors, and allowing guests to experience BCN like a local in the heart of this city. Walking in this chic place will give you a wow-ing & relaxed feeling as you see the beautiful loft and overlook at the city from the 5th floor. Checking in was easy and the responses were quick and which provide easy instructions. Everything insidenis clean and functional. Would give this place over a 5 star for anyone looking for a premium location near shopping, sightseeing, and a short walking distance from Plaza Catalunya. Thank you!
Great stay, very good location (walked pretty much everywhere). Had very fast response rates when we emailed them with inquiries or request. Would recommend!

The house is so artistic and the level of convenience and usability is mere little .   The washing machine was a disaster and was not in order . The house was not cleaned before our arrival was so dusty . The bathroom door was a glass door  which dosnt work. . Overall was okay and was not worth the money paid. Just pay for the location . Check in wad smooth. Parking was included but have to park the car in another location.

Emplacement hyper central, appartement très calme néanmoins. Propre et fonctionnel. Néanmoins l'appartement est un peu impersonnel (il s'agit d'un appartement en location toute l'année) et c'est un peu un jeu de piste pour arriver (collecte des clés, appartement et parking à 3 adresses différentes !).

Super recomendo. Estava com medo por ser a primeira experiência no Airbnb. Muito bem localizado, checkin sem problemas e todas as nossas solicitações foram atendidas de imediato. Equipe muito atenciosa. Não tenho criticas, só elogios.

카탈루냐역에서 5분 거리라 공항이동 편하고  카르푸도 람블라스 거리에 있고 24시간 마트도 바로 밑에 있어 편했어요. 겨울이라 밤에 추울까 걱정했는데 난방이랑 온수 둘다 완벽했어요 1층에 경비 아저씨 있어서 안전하고 같은층에 enjoybcn 사무실 있어서 문의 직접할 수 있고 짐도 맡아주고 여러모로 좋았어요 저흰 유아동반 가족이어서 밥해먹고 다녔는데 조리시설 잘 되어 있어요 오일같은거나 샴푸 등은 없어요 참고하세요 
추천합니다^^
Estupendo apartamento, céntrico y muy comodo
위치도 위치이지만 호스트의 체계적인 관리가 돋보이는 숙소였음. 두 명이서 같이 투숙을 했는데 침대 공간이 완전 분리되어 있어 둘이지만 나만을 위한 공간처럼 활용이 가능했음. 출장, 친구끼리 여행시 강력히 추천할 수 있는 숙소였음.
The location was great. Staffs were very helpful and kind. It was great staying here.

The location is perfect and easy to get to. The apartment is central to many attractions and the metro. The location is also quiet at night. There are high ceilings and lots of light from the big windows, so the room feels bigger. The bathroom is also very big. The hosts have a very easy process for check in and were very helpful when we had a question.
L'appartement est super. Il est proche de tout et très bien équipé. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour. Super calme également. Il manque juste un extérieur.

El apartamento está ubicado en una zona que hace que todo sea cercano.
Los detalles de bienvenida y la rapidez en la respuesta hace que sientas una seguridad y disfrutes tu estadía en Barcelona
Sin dudas volvería a elegirlo!

Bellissimo, in una posizione strategica, molto gentile la ragazza responsabile dell'appartamento e ci ha fatto piacere il caffè e l'acqua minerale di benvenuto, sicuramente da consigliare, grazie ancora.

위치가 너무나 좋습니다!
엘리베이터가있어서 무거운 짐때문에 걱정했는데 정말 편리했어요!
Emplacement parfait et appartement/loft vraiment très sympa. Tranquille et silencieux, vraiment très agréable.

카탈루냐 광장에서 가깝기 때문에 위치는 상당히 좋습니다. 
가족여행일 경우, 왠만한 부엌도구들 다 갖추고 있어 해먹기도 좋아요. 세탁기와 세제, 빨래 널어 놓을 수 있는 행거가 모두 제공되어 편리합니다. 
오피스가 바로 옆에 있어 체크인/아웃 시간과 맞지 않을 경우, 오피스에서 짐을 무료로 맡아주셔서 상당히 편리했습니다. 
다만 한가지, 욕실 싱크대가 상당히 높아서 약간 불편해요. (일반 한국 성인 남자 키에도 불편한 높이 입니다.) 
샴푸/린스는 없으니 준비하셔야 해요.

SIamo stati a Barcellona 4 giorni, siamo una famiglia composta da due adulti, 2 bambine di 7 e 9 anni e un bambino di un anno. Il nostro giudizio sull'appartamento è molto positivo. La sua posizione è strategica, l'appartamento è provvisto di tutti i comfort. E' moderno, colorato e vivace, a tutta la famiglia è piaciuto tantissimo. Abbiamo apprezzato moltissimo il silenzio, notturno e l'accesso con ascensore! Grazie infinite!!
Amazing location, walking distance to all important attractions. Very central, easy check in. The room is modern yet cozy and spacious. Would stay again!
lovely place, good location. great staff. ok price.

El apartamento es fantástico! Amplio, agradable y luminoso. Aire acondicionado funciona muy bien. Ubicado en la quinta planta de un edificio al lado de la Plaza Cataluña. Los anfitriones estuvieron impecables y atentos de todos los detalles. Fueron muy amables en devolverme el dinero del Parking que había pedido y cuando llegué les dije q no iba a utilizar. Recomiendo ampliamente EnjoyBCN y este apartamento para una estancia maravillosa en Barcelona. Mi familia y yo volveremos con seguridad!!

The place was exactly as shown in the pictures--super cool loft space in a convenient location.  It was so nice to have full sized bathroom and kitchen facilities--a rarity in Europe!  But the hospitality was over the top. Sparkling clean, super professional and responsive management and even bottled water provided. I can't say enough. Anytime I can stay at an EnjoyBCN property I will!
It was great place!
Best place to stay in Barcelona.

Super airbnb! Très belle décoration et chouette accueil! Bonne situation géographique. Le seul petit - : le prix du nettoyage 70 euros! Assez élévé comme prix... Et le prix de l'appartement était quand meme cher mais après le service était de qualité.

Je ne conseille pas du tout cette agence!! En 5 jours nous avons dû deal avec la récupération des clés de l'appart qui n'est pas à la même adresse, quand on est seule avec des enfants ce n'est pas pratique du tout puis nos avons eu des bruits de travaux extrêmement violents pendant plusieurs heures, l'agence nous a changé d'appart ( bien sympa sauf que cela nous a fait perdre des heures précieuses sur Barcelone... de plus l'appart était inconfortable malgré les soit disant 100 m2 (????), à peine possible de bouger autour du lit et SdB minuscule avec les wc dedans, serviettes de bain , oui mais impossible de s'essuyer avec car comme si elles étaient neuves...(tjrs avec de l'après!), bref, mal dormi, difficile de profiter d'une bonne douche après une journée de visite par 35 degrés.... tout cela à un prix très élevé pour ce service, un hôtel est moins cher et le standing y est meilleur, pas de bruit ou de coupure d'eau intempestive dans un hôtel!!
Extrêmement déçue.....!!!
Super appartement très propre, idéalement situé. Parfait pour passer un bon séjour à barcelone !
Great location!

The location of the apartment is centrally located, near the main metro station, airport shuttle bus and several attractions. The unit is quiet since it is located on the top floor, facing away from the busy streets. Most kitchen and bathroom essentials were provided. The bed mattresses are medium firm with plenty of space for 2 adults each. Communication was easy. EnjoyBCN quickly fixed some minor issues with the appliances. I would recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to maximize their time in Barcelona.

Though the apartment is good looking (exactly as seen in the pictures), I wasn't quite satisfied with it and I don't think it was worth the price we paid. The best thing about it was definitely the location (very close to Pl. Catalunya, which makes it easy to go anywhere in the city by foot or public transport).
The check-in is not straight-forward, you receive instructions to go to a different place (10minutes away by foot, which can seem really long in the heat of the day and carrying backpacks and suitcases) to pick up the key to the apartment. The furniture looks nice but the quality is the same as the furniture from Ikea, and the 300€ deposit is way more than I think that furniture is worth. The kitchen is honestly the part of the apartment I disliked the most. Every cabinet you open smells, and that doesn't mean just the garbage under the sink and the dishwasher (and yes, it smells even though it's empty). The cabinet containing the dishes, bowls and glasses smelled so bad I swear we had to wash everything very thoroughly before using it. I also really don't like the fact that, considering the 70€ you have to pay for the cleaning service at the end of your stay, you also have to specifically leave the apartment in good conditions (they instruct you to actually clean the dishes and empty the garbage cans). I found this very stressful, considering the 300€ blocked on my credit card as a deposit (which the house rules state can be charged in full if you the rules and requirements are ignored). I would not stay in this apartment or any other by this agency again.

It was nice location to go where you want to go. It takes 5 mins to go Catalunya plaza. There are a lot of shopping store, thus it was very easy to buy something. The house is clean and well secured. The most equipments to cook are well prepared.

위치적으로 까탈루냐 광장과 가까워  일단 엄청 편리하구요
지하철도 바로 앞에 있습니다.

밤 늦게 귀가할 때도 까탈루냐 광장과 가까워 위험하지 않고 편리했습니다.
까르푸 매장과는 조금 거리가 있으나,

그 외 시설, 위치, 청결도 편의성 측면에 있어서는
제가 묵어본 숙소 중 최고이었습니다.

Apartment and facilities are exactly as described. The location worked out better than we thought. Washer was fine but had a bit of trouble locating the dryer in the building. Airconditioning works great, but blows a bit onto the second bed, as the vane position could not be changed by the remote. EnjoyBCN service was great. We managed to disable our locker with the passports five minutes before we were due to leave for a cruise. Thanks to cell phones, EnjoyBCN patiently helped us override the disabling, to huge relief. I would gladly use them again.
Very responsive host and helpful. Perfect location that you can walk to many touring spots. Beds were a bit too soft. But overall it’s a good choice for 1st time visitor!

Llegamos a la medianoche y tuvimos que retirar la llave a una cuadra del Loft. No hubo problema s para ingresar , está todo muy bien indicado.
Ubicación inmejorable, a metros de las mejores zonas de Barcelona.

Comment EnjoyBcn

El check in con Chiara y sus recomendaciones para lugares qué visitar fueron de mucha ayuda. El apartamento tal cual como en las fotos y la ubicación excelente, muy cerca de todo a pie y a 2 cuadras de Plaza Catalunya donde conectan las líneas de Metro y autobús para aeropuerto. Excelente opción para quedarte en Barcelona

Great location, close to great places to eat and an easy walk to the Rambla. Apartment was well equipped and very clean. It served us and our two children well as a great base for exploring the city. It’s close to the metro and an easy walk to catch the airport bus.

This place is awesome.  Location is superb, very close to all the metro and bus lines, plaça de Cantalunya and night spots.  Loft was clean, as pictured and there is a supermarket right downstairs which was very convenient.  Hosts were very responsive. We enjoyed our stay and will certainly recommend this space.

Excelent location. Quiet.
Very well equipped for a  4 person stay.
Would recommend it.

Fantastic location! The aerobus from the airport drops you minutes away from the apartment and everything is walking distance. It’s also located close to the subway line, so easy if walking is not your thing. Apartment was cute, clean and functional and super quiet. Sergio was very helpful to help us figure out the amenities and even gave us his phone number if we had more problems! That’s service! I recommend this Airbnb for a worry free holiday is Barcelona!

Séjour paisible dans un appartement très design, bien équipé et au confort maximal. Bonne localisation dans un immeuble sécurisé.
Great moment

Great appartment, great host and location is perfect.
i definitely recommend this place!

카탈루나 광장 바로 옆이어서 대부분의 목적지를 걸어서 갈 수 있고 공항 버스, 라 로카빌리지 버스 정류장도 바로 탈 수 있었으며 백화점, 까르푸, 보케리아 시장 등도 바로 옆에 있습니다 바르셀로나 최적의 위치에 있는 아름답고 깨끗한 숙소에서 우리는 최고의 시간을 보냈습니다 호스트는 매우 친절하고 우리를 위해 세심하게 배려해 주었으며 그것은 우리의 일정에 매우 큰 도움이 되었습니다 바르셀로나를 여행하고자하는 다른 분들께 적극 추천합니다

키를 따로 찾아서 숙소를 찾아가야하는 시스템이라서 짐이 많으면 좀 불편할수있다 
키가 전자식인데 키가 잘 작동하지않아 2시간 동안 숙소에 들어가지못해서 호스트업체와 계속 전화하면서 설명했지만 내가 키를 사용할줄 모르는줄알고 계속 기다리게했다 
알고보니 문이 고장나서 그런것이였고 호스트는 자기도 문제가 뭔지모르겠다고 하고 겨우 문을 여는 기계로 들어갔다 하지만 숙소가 방이없는 형태이고 큰 원룸 형태여서 많이 추웠다 하지만 이역시도 난방 시스템이 고장난 상태였다..너무춥다고 이불 가져다달라했더니 와보더니 난방이 고장난거여서 다시고치고 그다음날부터는 따뜻하게 잤다..우역곡절의 숙소 ㅠ
super rápida atención a nuestros pedidos sobre la calefación y amenities adicionales! Muchas gracias
Super easy check-in. Perfectly located. The flat is a really nice, open space.

We were a group of 4 girlfriends in our 30s meeting in Barcelona for a weekend. The communication was great with that team! Prompt responses and troubleshooting really fast. The place is very well located and you’d have no trouble finding restaurants and bars at walking distance. I drove from France to Barcelona and they gave me a free parking spot for the entire stay. That was perfect! There is an elevator and a doorman during the day. 

My only hiccup was the lighting of the place. At night, it is very dark even though they have lamps all over the place. Gives a romantic mood but it’s problematic if you have eyesight issues at night like me. The equipment (stove, washing machine) are a bit difficult to comprehend how they function. Short explanation would help.
Everything was very good! Perfect location!

name: Entire family home
summary: The photos you see on display are outdated, we have painted and got much more comfortable in our space, also had two children ... so we have a toddler bed and a crib set up upstairs, a king size bed downstairs and a pullout bed in the couch in the living room.  The house can comfortably sleep 4 adults and two toddler or infants,   We have a parking space in front of the house which you have access to. Wireless internet is included
space: It is a spacious 2 floor apartment, with an open entrance and living room, a big kitchen, one closed bedroom upstairs with a crib and a toddler bed and a bedroom downstairs with a king size bed, the living room couch is a hide-a-bed which pulls out to a comfortable queen size mattress, the bathroom is big and has a claw foot bathtub for relaxing bubble baths, the backyard with has a coal BBQ and patio table and chairs and twinke lights tucked in the trees that can be plugged in for ambient night time hanging out.  Laundry in the basement, as well as a separate studio space or workshop area.  We have a flat screen TV in the living hooked up to our computer so you can watch tv or movies streamed off the internet, we have apple tv and Natflix installed on our computer that has almost every movie and TV series ever made at the click of the mouse. The house can comfortably sleep 4-6 adults (depending on if you are comfortbale sharing beds) and a baby/small child in the crib. It is a 2 minut
