neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is called Rosemont Petit-Patrie, it is an up and coming Montreal hood, it has it's own little gems (La Soucoupe café on Fabre just south of Bélanger a few blocks from our house) has GREAT coffee and light food, Kitshy-Koo is a rad vintage stop just around the corner on Belanger, deleicious bread and pastries at La Miche Doré on Belanger corner of Boyer, keep walking a few more blocks and you are at the kitchy shopping street of St.Hubert a wide mix of stores but never have you seen so many bridal stores and place for wild prom dresses! Plenty of children's parks in the area, on Jean Talon and rue de la Nordière has a wadding pool and full park!
notes: It's a quiet residential area, with some cute coffee shops, restaurants and vintage stores .  We are a half block from the metro Fabre on the blue line, to get to the Mile End (hipster neighbourhood) you take the blue line 3 stops to Park, then take the 80 south and get off at St.Viateur takes about 20 minutes, or stay on the bus for another few stops and you are at Mount Royal park which has tam tam circles on Sunday, and beautiful walking trails up to the Belvadere where you can have a birds eye view of the city.
transit: We live half a block from the metro Fabre on the blue line. If you are coming into town by bus, you will get on the metro at Berri Uqam take the orange line north direction Montmorency, get off at Jean Talon and tranfer onto the blue line direction St.Michel and take it one stop to Fabre. If you are coming in from the airport there is a shuttle bus that will take you to the bus station you will get on the metro at Berri Uqam take the orange line north direction Montmorency, get off at Jean Talon and tranfer onto the blue line direction St.Michel and take it one stop to Fabre.  ** The shuttle bas pass is good for all public transport for a 24h period so hold on it! If you are coming in by train follow the signs to the Bonnaventure metro, take the orange line direction Montmornecy, get off at Jean Talon and transfer to the blue line direction St.Michel, take it for one stop to Mtro Fabre and we live half a block from there. If you are driving take the 40E and get off at the Papineau Sout
access: You will have access to the entire apartment including a private backyard!  We will be out of town, you will be greated by a friend of ours who will show you around.  There is a king size bed in the basement, a twin bed in the same room as a crib, there is also a hide-a-bed in the counch in the living room, 4-6 adults can sleep comfortably and a baby/small child in the crib. Washer and dryer in the basement, and free parking in out laneway so need to worry about parking tickets from street parking. The backyard is equipped with a coal BBQ and a patio table and chairs, you can also plug in the twinkle lights for ambient evening hanging out.
interaction: Our friend that will greet you will also be availbale if you have any questions or problems throughout your stay.
house_rules: No smoking inside, there is a nice balcony for smoking off the back of the house. Pet friendly.

host.host_about: I am friendly, festive,and I like to get know new people.  I teach English over the internet and yoga in person and have many years of contemporary dance experience.  I have a cuddly, chubby black cat named Didier after my boyfriends old roommate.  I like to talk about everything from art to politics, and share stories over a glass of wine.  I have traveled through a lot of Europe and South East Asia.  I love beach destinations but city life always calls me back.  What else can I say.... I love skiing, swimming, hiking, scuba diving, all kinds of music (electronic, Swedish pop, hiphop), curious objects, The Wire, Wes Anderson movies,  plants, composting, good coffee, poutine.

reviews.comments: We arrived late at night with two little kids and dead tired. To find a welcoming letter in the mailbox was warm and detail oriented and we appreciated it very much. Andrea did a great job explaining the neighborhood and as well as perks inside the house.
We had a great time at andrea's place. The appartement is well-located near metro fabre and a supermarket. The neighborood is really peaceful and charming.
We had a fantastic time at Andrea's place. It is conveniently located near a supermarket and the metro. She also wrote a letter, which was very detail oriented.
Amazing host!

While the host can work on dusting the place (and washbasin block) before a guest arrives the place is good as it is located close to shops  and accessible to public transport.
I would also recommend guests to carry their own kettle or microwave or a vessel if you are travelling with infants and want hot water.

Andrea's place is cozy and funky at the same time. It's an apartment in a standard 2 story older Montreal building and the usual issues with building age showing. We felt at home here, much better than a sterile hotel! The location is perfect, one block from a busy street, that we never heard any noise from. It's a quiet neighbourhood with little traffic on the street out front. A metro station and large grocery store and drug store are a 2 minute walk, so you can get any necessities and get anywhere in Montreal easily. You don't need a car to navigate the city from here. Andrea communicated clearly and accurately described her apartment and neighbourhood. Most enjoyable, thanks!

name: Porto Central Flat I
summary: This is a cozy two bedrooms apartment, very well located, close to the Douro river, Ribeira area and some of Porto's top attractions. You can also find great restaurants, museums and antique shops.
space: Cozy and comfortable two bedrooms apartment with a beautiful river view.  The apartment has two rooms, one with a single bed and other one with a double bed, a living room with a sofa bed (where two more people can sleep) and a bathroom. There's also a full-equipped kitchen. Nº 25495/AL
description: This is a cozy two bedrooms apartment, very well located, close to the Douro river, Ribeira area and some of Porto's top attractions. You can also find great restaurants, museums and antique shops. Cozy and comfortable two bedrooms apartment with a beautiful river view.  The apartment has two rooms, one with a single bed and other one with a double bed, a living room with a sofa bed (where two more people can sleep) and a bathroom. There's also a full-equipped kitchen. Nº 25495/AL The building is located in the historic Porto, just a few streets from the Douro River and the main historic and touristic buildings as S. Francisco church, Sé do Porto, Palácio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market (Hard Club). From our apartment you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, designer stores in Porto. This is one of the most typical neighborhoods in Porto, where the locals still live and make us all feel welcome and part of the everyday life that you can still witness. A confirmation
neighborhood_overview: The building is located in the historic Porto, just a few streets from the Douro River and the main historic and touristic buildings as S. Francisco church, Sé do Porto, Palácio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market (Hard Club). From our apartment you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, designer stores in Porto. This is one of the most typical neighborhoods in Porto, where the locals still live and make us all feel welcome and part of the everyday life that you can still witness.
notes: A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional services. Guests must pick-up the keys at the Welcome Centre located in Porto. Arrivals from 23:00 (11pm) to 06:00 (06am), a late check-in fee of EUR 30 shall be applied (paid in cash at check-in).  All guests must provide their ID or Passport Information at the time of check-in. Please note that a mandatory touristic tax will be included in the final price (2€/person/day). If it has not been charged at the moment of your reservation, it must be paid in cash at the check-in. All the remaining payments must be made in cash. Transfer Service - We can provide a transfer service for an additional cost. Lockers - We have lockers available at the Welcome Centre in Porto for an additional cost. Amenities - We provide toilet paper and shampoo only for the first day. Baby Friendly - We can provide a baby travel bed upon request.

host.host_about: We are Feels Like Home. We're a company born with a unique purpose: to bring you the best Portuguese experience you can imagine. We offer beautifully furnished, well located apartments and houses for your holiday or business stay. We're ideal for travellers who enjoy sleeping in comfortable homes at comfortable prices! We offer you options! Choose from more than 90 carefully selected properties in Portugal—suited for every taste and every occasion. We have a property that's right for you! From studios to castles. From Algarve to Lisbon and Porto.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: El apartamento está en perfectas condiciones y es muy agradable y luminosos. El barrio está ubicado en una zona excelente, tranquila pero en el centro de Oporto.
Everything at the apartment was great. Thanks for everything!

O apartamento é bastante central e de lá pode-se facilmente ir a pé até várias atracções turísticas (Clérigos, livraria Lello, Aliados, Ribeira). Para quem vai de carro, e estacionar na rua do apartamento é fácil e gratuito; tem também um parque pago perto. Na mesma rua há duas mercearias de bairro e cafés. O apartamento é bastante confortável; tem dois quartos (um com cama de casal e um com cama de solteiro) e no sofá dormem confortavelmente duas pessoas. Toalhas e lençóis estavam disponíveis. A Margarida recebeu-nos simpaticamente com um frasco de compota e deu-nos algumas informações sobre o apartamento e o bairro. O Joaquim esteve sempre disponível por telefone. Uma boa experiência e, sem dúvida, voltaríamos!

The flat was easy to find, as were the arrangements to meet and access the flat, which was as described on the information. The flat itself was spotlessly clean and utilitarian Ikea in feel. The flat does not feel like someone's private residence, more an apartment used specifically for efficient short term Airbnb lets, so don't expect any quirky individual character. You will find the kitchen and shower rooms at the other end of a long internal corridor, both were clean and efficient. 
We stayed for 4 nights in October when the weather was poor and rather chilly. N.B The apartment had no form of heating, as such, I would personally only suggest staying here when the climate is more predictably warm, to avoid having to wear as many clothes inside as you do out.  
The neighbourhood is one of the better parts in the historic district with some really nice restaurants and cafes in the same street as the apartment. In our experience here in Porto particularly, it's probably prudent to eat where others, particularly locals are eating. 
For those looking to get around greater Porto, we found the local bus system impressive with many services accessed locally. The Metro although impressive, serves other areas better than the apartments own neighbourhood, although was useful for getting to the airport.

The place is as good as the pictures show. Great location, close to everything you want to see in Porto. The apartment has a nice view of the river and the park. The beds were very comfortable and everything was clean and proper. Over all, great stay. The only thing is that it can get quite cold in the apartment and there are only two space heaters, but we got a nice bottle of wine from Ines that warmed us quickly.
Bien situé pour se promener mais quand même à 20 minutes du métro. Très bien mais on a eu froid (il y a des chauffages mais on ne peut en mettre qu'un à la fois sinon les plombs sautent !)
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The flat is just as beautiful as you can see it on the pictures and the location is perfect to discover the city :) Thanks a lot, we had a great time!

Apartamento muy buen equipado y en muy buena zona. La chica que nos entregó las llaves fue muy agradable. Todo perfecto, sin duda repetiríamos! Lo recomiendo a todo aquel que quiera pasar unos días en Oporto.

We loved the neighborhood and the host was great. The bathroom was below par however with mold in the shower grouting.  Otherwise the apartment was fine, not special but very spacious. 

Ask how to turn on the stove burners if you plan to use them!
O apartamento é ótimo, amplo, bem iluminado e muito bem localizado. A comunicação para o check-in e check-out se deu de forma muito clara e facil. Recomendo.

Margarida nous a bien accueillis et s'est montrée très disponible quand nous avons eu besoin d'elle. L'appartement est très agréable, lumineux, proche du centre-ville (10 minutes à pied de Ribeiro), avec la possibilité de garer gratuitement la voiture dans la rue, en août.

A nossa estadia correu bem. A Casa tinha as comodidades e aspecto que prevíamos pela descrição. Ficamos satisfeitos. No entanto alguns pontos menos positivos que poderiam ser melhorados:contactei o contacto que me foi fornecido na confirmação de reserva e tive de contactar 3 números de telefone/pessoas diferentes para quem iria ter a casa para check in; o exaustor da casa de banho parece estar a funcionar menos bem, com algum cheiro desagradável na casa de banho provindo de canalização que parece necessitar de manutenção.

El apartamento era espacioso, bien amueblado y cómodo, y muy bien situado. 
Internet funcionaba muy bien y la atención a la llegada muy buena
Excelente ubicación con posibilidad de aparcar el coche en zona libre
Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable
Apartamento céntrico y espacioso, perfecto para pasar unos días!
Alles gut bis auf Gestank und Schimmel im Bad/WC.
Schöne Wohnung mit perfekter Lage.

Tot molt be! Vem llegir alguns comentaris de que el pis era fred, però nosaltres vem estar a Porto uns dies bastant freds i a l'apartament vem estar molt bé de temperatura (ens van deixar tres estufes elèctriques que van ser més que suficients).

The place is perfectly located and very spacious - minus the bathroom which is small. However it is definitely not new and seems preety devastated. Now to be fair, it is also cheap, but even the cheap apartment should not include shower cabin covered all over in mold and especially a broken power socket in the bathroom - which resulted in constant short circuits and power switch tuning off. That seems even dangerous. Also the entrance door handle was broken and kept falling off all the time. Staying at this place has definitely worsened my Porto experience. And there are not even many things to be done to make this place perfect!

El piso es muy práctico, está en el centro y es grande. Pero nos esperábamos más. Piero el que nos entregó las llaves fue muy amable pero nos dio la sensación de que tenían un montón de apartamentos que entregar llaves a la vez, tuvimos que llamar varias veces aún habiendo avisado de nuestra hora de llegada. Nos desencantó un poco que no es la pura esencia de Airbnb. Finalmente nos dejaron ampliar el checkout y dejar las maletas en el apartamento. Muchas gracias.
Top !

Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, um Porto zu erkunden! Wir mochten die Wohnung, aber hatten leider auch einige Probleme. Die Kommunikation vor dem Check-In war sehr schlecht und man konnte uns vorher nicht sagen, um wie viel Uhr wir in die Wohnung können. Die Betten und das Sofa waren sehr bequem, aber wir hatten für das Schlafsofa nur eine normal große Decke für zwei Personen. Nachdem wir einen Feels Like Home Mitarbeiter kontaktierten und ihm das sagten, meinte es es wäre eine große Decke, was eindeutig nicht stimmte. Wir haben keine weitere Decke bekommen. Die Kommunikation war also nicht sehr gut. Das Bad ist nur sehr klein. Trotzdem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt in der Wohnung und für den geringen Preis war das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis gut. Für Menschen, die nicht so anspruchsvoll sind und günstig reisen wollen, ist die Wohnung sehr zu empfehlen!
very nice place, very central spot, very clean!
The apartment is in a perfect location and it is big and clean. We had an amazing experience and the host was very kind. I would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting this beautiful city.

This was a great location within walking distance to all major Porto city highlights. The accommodation was clean with a basic kitchen and nice living rooms. Enough space. Quiet. Top. Highly recommended.

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, muy cerca de la torre de los clerigos, hay mucho movimiento en la zona y esta rodeada de restaurantes y bares. Es un tercer piso con escaleras. El departamento es muy lindo con un living muy amplio con vista a la calle, el sofá cama es cómodo y la cocina es amplia pero el baño es bastante pequeño. El proceso de check in es en otro sitio que hace que te tengas que trasladar luego hacia la casa. Nos atendieron muy bien pero es como si fuese una inmobiliaria. Lo mejor, la zona, pero también hay bastante ruido los fines de semana.
Fantastic experience in this apartment! I can only recommend it. Great location, great flat, friendly staff here to help. Amazing - will return if we come back to Porto!
Alojamiento muy céntrico, se puede ir andando a todos los sitios. Apartamento limpio y cómodo
Apartamento céntrico y con buenos accesos a la ciudad, limpieza y buen atendimiento de los anfitriones.

El recibimiento y la entrega de llaves fue muy bien, el chico fue muy amable y atento en todo momento. Al llegar al apartamento me dio una sensación muy mala por el entorno, nada que ver con las fotos del anuncio. La calle está sucia y el pavimento  muy mal .Al subir, se oía la tarima del suelo que era horrible tanto el ruido que haces en el apartamento como el ruido que hacen los vecinos, tanto los de arriba como los de abajo, tanto que no pudimos dormir. 
El baño, a parte que están un poco oscuras las rayas de los azulejos, la ducha se sale y hace charcos y no hay ni fregona para recoger el agua, tuve que enviar dos mensajes para pedir que trajeran una. 
La ubicación es buena. 
La verdad, sinceramente no volvería a ese apartamento. Creo que con un poco de reforma ganaría mucho, la ubicación es muy buena. La pena es que no tiene ascensor.

name: ABSOLUTE BEACHFRONT Swim, Sun, Surf
summary: 30 day rental or more! Awake to the sound of the ocean , step right out on the sands of Makaha Turtle Beach.  Our customers have said "this is the real Hawaii". Slightly off the tourist path, this  location has it all, near to Kapolei and 5 star restaurants  but away from the hustle and bustle.  Home to beautiful sunsets, snorkeling, fishing and fun surf. These crystal clear waters let you spot turtles from our lanai!
space: Our beach spot has been our get-a-way for the past 15 years. Relax, swim, surf, boogie board, snorkle and paddle board. Enjoy pupus, drinks and dinners on the lanai bar top while watching gorgeous sunsets… Once the sun goes down you can sit back and enjoy the surround sound and Smart TV entertainment. Never miss your favorite shows!The building has direct beach access for you to enjoy snorkeling, bogie boarding or surfing right out your door!. Great for family, friends, or a special place for two. Ocean front lanai with dinning bar and (Website hidden by Airbnb) and fall asleep everyday to the sounds of the ocean. Our bedroom includes a multi-million dollar view! It's direct oceanfront with a queen sized bed (Tuft and Needle) and a queen sized pull out couch. Recently remodeled, with your comfort in mind.Professionally cleaned. Other amenities include a fully equipped kitchen,wireless internet, Hawaiian artwork throughout, luxury linens and bedding. Beach items are yours to use. Free p

Slightly off the tourist path, this  location has it all, near to Kapolei and 5 star restaurants  but away from the hustle and bustle.  Home to beautiful sunsets, snorkeling, fishing and fun surf. Ocean front lanai with dinning bar and (Website hidden by Airbnb) and fall
neighborhood_overview: One of the best beaches on the island. A world away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu, but within a hours drive to all that Oahu has to offer. The town Waianae has everything you need including fishing charters, dolphin and turtle tours. Shops we all know like Starbucks, Longs Drugs and local banks ,grocery stores and restaurants. Ko olina, Disney Resorts and world class dinning is 20 minutes away. 45 minutes to Honolulu and airport 9 excluding AM rush hour). One hour to Kaneohe and North Shore
notes: Please treat our beach home like your own. Things happen, so look over everything when you arrive. Report any damage upon arrival or at time of accident. That way our guests are assured of everything working properly.  Mostly relax and enjoy the aloha!
transit: Renting your own car is best. Bus stop is right out front too.
access: Entire condo. Beach, BBQ, laundry area and free parking.
interaction: The Space Remodeled extensively, giving you a clean and comfortable space to relax and enjoy your special Hawaiian holiday.  Only steps to the sand and un-interupted Ocean and Sandy beach views. This is a residential community, and we can only have one booking during any 30 day period. So, prices depend on season and length of stay. PRICE INCLUDES ALL TAXES!!!  Secure building, high speed elevators, Cameras & night-time security guard.  FREE parking, FREE internet Full Kitchen, including:  All utensils & cooking utensils, Stove, Oven, Microwave, French Press Coffee Maker, Blender, Rice Maker, toaster, etc.  Premium Linens and Towels. Other amenities, ironing board, iron, hair dryer and make up mirror. Use any of ur beach items including Beach Towels , Tommy Bahama chairs, umbrella, beach cooler and boogie board. Community Laundry on site  FREE wireless internet  FREE Parking Space  ** All Hawaii state taxes are included in the listed rates for your stay.
house_rules: No smoking, no pets. Quite hours are 8pm-10-am. BBQ in designated area only.

host.host_about: Aloha

reviews.comments:
I can't express how much I love this airbnb location. Trevor was a dream from check-in to check-out, he gave us a ton of tips. Not that we needed them, the biggest tip is walk out your front door! You can literally walk outside to one of the most amazing beaches we've ever seen. We've thought about buying a place for years, but we've just decided to make this our home one month a year, not only is it cheaper, everything's handled- the internet is fast, there's a big tv loaded with Netflix, the apartment's beautifully managed and furnished with a eye to ever last detail. 

Honestly I can't say enough good things. The only other thing you need to know is how wonderful it is to go to sleep and wake up with the gentle crash of the waves outside. WE WILL BE BACK! Thank you Trevor, really appreciated the stay.

My husband, adult daughter and I spent on month at the Makaha Beach Cabanos at Turtle Beach in Waianae. It is out of the tourist area; the building is a combination of locals living there and visitors renting for a month or so. The condo was clean and well supplied to make the stay comfortable. The beach chairs, umbrella and cooler were a big plus. The building was well kept and secure, always a security guard on duty.

Trevor and Joy were good to answer questions prior to the trip, checked in on us upon arrival, answered questions and made suggestions of activities in the area. When we contacted them they were always available.

Every morning we enjoyed coffee on balcony, overlooking the beach, often seeing turtles and dolphins. In early January whales were sighted several times.

The beach was beautiful. My daughter got in and out of the water easily even with the bigger waves. I was little more apprehensive, but did learn the trick of getting in and out of the water. We also visited other beaches close by and on the north and east coasts. .

Sunsets were lovely; we went to a couple of close by beaches to capture the different colours.

A car was necessary to get around; groceries shops about 10 minutes away, Costco about 25 minutes and a drive to the north shore about an hour and 20 minutes. Roads were excellent and well marked.

We enjoyed the walk around the point in the Ka’ena State Park- saw nesting albatross birds and monk seals lazing in a pool, drinks and food at the Sunset Cafe a couple of times, Dolphin Excursion trip with a breakfast/ lunch from the Spinners restaurant in the same location, Polynesian Culture Centre, Diamond Head, Pearl Harbour and the Swap market that happens on Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday, waterfall at Waimea Valley. Locally, there is a Farmer’s market on Saturdays just beyond Long’s. The trip was really a great combination of relaxation and sightseeing.

Amazing beachfront place. Great boogie boarding, we saw lots of turtles. The place is off the beaten path, but close enough to drive and sightsee the whole island. Loved the hie at the end of the road. Condo was very clean and comfortable. Even provided us with needed beach gear. It was so great to be right on the beach. Watched a fantastic sunset. Also loved that they had Netflix, Hulu and Pandora available.

Great condo tastefully decorated and stocked with everything we needed including beach gear. Very clean ! New comfortable bed loved waking up to the sounds of the ocean. Fantastic beach good swimming and snorkeling saw lots of turtles. Only only 15 min from Kapolei Disney resort with great food including 5 star Resturants. We will be back!

We loved this place! So much in fact that after a week there we extended another three weeks making our stay almost two months.  This is one of the most beautiful beaches we've stayed on and there have been many.  What we really loved about the area is that it was away from the tourist crowds and enriched by the friendly local vibe allowing for a true island feel.

The unit itself was very comfortable and had everything we needed to (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable bed, good wifi...the beachy, Hawaiian decor added to the easy breezy island feel...The Lanai, amazing...we call this vacation "49 Sunsets" and the Lanai provided just the perfect spot for viewing not only the sunsets but many whales, dolphins and turtles.

Our hosts Trevor and Joy were always quick to respond to any questions and help in any way to make our stay comfortable.

For us this was an awesome place to recharge, reconnect and fill up with the goodness that is Hawaii...we will be back :-)

We had a mixed experience at this property. The highlight of our time there was the beach, which is really good. Clear water, nice sand, amazing sunsets. It was never too busy, you could often see the turtles and we'd always sleep to the sound of the waves. There's an entrance to the beach from within the complex, so it couldn't be any easier to get to it.

The location is a bit far away from everything (on average, 30 minutes from Kapolei and 1h from Honolulu) but we knew that before, and it can be a good thing if you want to spend some time on your own. There's a supermarket and a few fast food restaurants nearby in Waianae. It seems to be a low income neighborhood but we didn't have any problems.

The apartment itself is not in great shape. The appliances and furniture are not new, but that didn't bother us much. The biggest problem we had with the property was that it wasn't clean. In fact, it seems like it hasn't been properly cleaned in a very long time. When we arrived, not even basic cleaning had been performed: even obvious surfaces like the front of the fridge were dirty. We contacted the host and they asked their cleaners to come back 2 days later. Unfortunately, it wasn't a professional cleaning crew. They lacked equipment (such as a decent vacuum cleaner) and materials (bleach and various specialized stain removers). They spent 2 hours cleaning the property, but after they left we still spent another day trying to do a proper clean up. Unfortunately, several spots remained dirty: curtains, carpets and all the hard-to-reach spots (corners, spaces under the furniture, closet).

Airbnb did its best to try to address our concerns, but after interacting with the cleaning crew (who hadn't even looked behind the sofa) we essentially gave up on trying to address the cleaning problem with our host, since there seemed to be a mismatch of expectations.

The host was flexible with our check-out time as a way of apologizing, and also offered to reimburse us for a few things we bought.

Overall I think I'd come back to this area, but not to this specific property.
Trevor’s place is cozy and in an outstanding location. He was always very accommodating and friendly. You absolutely cannot beat this view!

name: Porto Charming Studio
summary: This is a charming one bedroom studio, well located, close to some of Porto's top attractions. You can also find great restaurants, museums and antique shops.
space: Charming studio, with two single beds, a living room with a sofa bed (where one more person can sleep). There's also a bathroom and a full-equipped kitchenette. Nº 52367/AL.
