reviews.comments: The flat was beautiful and very large. It was also great to have a balcony and the place was decorated really nicely, with lovely period details like large shutters. It's in a great location, walking distance to the center and 5 minutes walk from the metro. The only (very minor) downside was that since the flat is facing the street, which has a bar a few doors down, it sometimes got a little noisy in the evening.
Ausser der Schlüssel Übergabe war alles tip top. Achtung noch mal genau nachfragen welche die richtige Kontaktadresse ist.

El apartamento es como aparece en las fotos, súper bonito, acogedor y situación inmejorable en pleno casco histórico. Hemos estado súper bien y lo recomendaré a cualquiera que vaya a Porto, hará la estancia más agradable :)
Hasta pronto!
Gracias por todo!
O apartamento é agradável, está tal e qual como se vê nas fotos e próximo do centro do Porto.
Très bel appartement, exactement comme sur les photos, bien équipé, pas très loin du centre. Point négatif : le bruit car faible isolation.

The room was really beautifull! Clean, spacious and also a lot amof cool features! The person who was at our arrival (Pedro?) was really friendly and helpfull! The location was also really good, it was at walking distance from the centers and there were many restaurants and shops nearby! But there is a cafe next to the air bnb with loads off people who were really loud on friday night.

Beautiful, clean , homely apartment. Location was perfect! I couldn’t recommend this apartment more . The host kindly allowed us to leave our bags in the apartment after check out which was amazing. Will definitely stay again !
Às Armas!!! VIVA PORTUGAL

En general genial! El apartamento es exactamente como en las fotos. La ubicación perfecta, a pie de cualquier zona del centro, incluida la estación de metro de Trindade (que es la principal), y fácil de encontrar. Muy limpio. Lo único a mejorar sería que al tratarse de un edificio antiguo si usabas o encendías varias cosas a la vez como por ejemplo el horno, el secador y los enchufes; los plomos saltaban. Pero solo nos pasó 2 veces en 4 días y la solución era sencilla: se volvían a subir los plomos y sin problema. Por lo demás, inmejorable
La estancia ha sido muy cómoda. El piso está muy céntrico y es igual que en las fotos. Nos ha gustado mucho.

Le logement est magnifique, superbement décoré, et très bien situé.  Nous avons grandement  apprécié les détails architecturaux : escalier grandiose pour mener à l'étage avec de beaux lustres, plafonds très hauts, grandes fenêtres avec volets, etc.  La salle de bain était impeccablement propre (comme le reste du logement, d'ailleurs).  Par contre, nous avons été déçus du fait que le logement était vraiment très froid !    Absolument inconfortable (séjour fin mars).  Et malgré le fait que j'ai écrit, rien n'a été fait pour venir réparer la chaufferette défectueuse, ou pour ajouter des couvertures...;  Je n'ai jamais reçu de réponse.  Mauvais service à ce niveau.
Este apartamento es espectacular! esta muy bien decorado y ubicado. Lo único fue que no había gel de ducha cuando si estaba listado en lo que ofrecían. Por lo demás, todo genial!
Don´t go just for the pictures.  The people behind this apartment don´t know I to host.  This house is just like some people......Having a pretty face is not enough.
Studio muy bien reciclado. Cómodo. Buena ubicación. La llegada y la comunicación fue buena. El lugar estaba limpio
Appartement conforme aux photos, lumineux , propre et spacieux. La literie est confortable. Il est cependant situé dans une rue très bruyante toute la nuit.
Flat was clean and well equipped for stay, we just had to bring own soap and toilet paper, which is not a big problem. Communication was very friendly and open, I can recommend this accommodation.

name: >>>Cozy Ocean View Getaway in Heart of Honolulu!
summary: Beautiful apartment with amazing ocean views. The private master bedroom has a super comfortable queen bed, a night table, a clean bathroom, and some closet space. Living room faces the mountains, the kitchen has everything guests need!
space: The apartment has a superb location. The room is perfect for 1~2 people. It has an amazing view (especially with the price of the apt!) of the ocean and the city. It's an intimate space, and you'll feel very comfortable -- I guarantee it!
description: Beautiful apartment with amazing ocean views. The private master bedroom has a super comfortable queen bed, a night table, a clean bathroom, and some closet space. Living room faces the mountains, the kitchen has everything guests need! The apartment has a superb location. The room is perfect for 1~2 people. It has an amazing view (especially with the price of the apt!) of the ocean and the city. It's an intimate space, and you'll feel very comfortable -- I guarantee it! You'll have access to the entire apartment, including the kitchen, the living room and extended ocean view outlet. You'll also have access to the pool and the jacuzzi. Easy walk to parks, supermarkets, shopping centers, downtown Honolulu, and to Ala Moana beach (20~25min walk).  Easy walk to Long Drugs (local CVS) on King street (approx 7min walk) and to the gas station right next to the apt (1min walk). Safeway, Walmart, Walgreens, and Ward Village (shopping centre with lots of restaurants and AMC movie theater) are a
neighborhood_overview: Easy walk to parks, supermarkets, shopping centers, downtown Honolulu, and to Ala Moana beach (20~25min walk).  Easy walk to Long Drugs (local CVS) on King street (approx 7min walk) and to the gas station right next to the apt (1min walk). Safeway, Walmart, Walgreens, and Ward Village (shopping centre with lots of restaurants and AMC movie theater) are all 15min drive/bus ride. There are also lots of restaurants in downtown, which is also about 15min drive/bus ride.
notes: Must respect neighbors, stay quiet, and cause no disruptions in the building. Parking spot available.
transit: Bus station right in front of the apartment, Uber and Lyft is easiest way.
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment, including the kitchen, the living room and extended ocean view outlet. You'll also have access to the pool and the jacuzzi.
house_rules: I just ask you to respect the place and turn the lights and AC off when you leave the house. No smoking!

host.host_about:
I'm a young professional commuting to and from Yucca and the Coast. 

I travel quite a bit so I understand the trouble of finding a good place to stay -- whether it's for a day, a weekend or for a couple of weeks! I have a pretty amazing place with a quiet, cozy master bedroom with an awesome ocean view. Contact me if you're ever passing through !

reviews.comments: Great place, and Sarah and Helen were great hosts!

I had a great stay at Sarah's. The apartment was clean and comfortable. Helen, her friend on the ground, was also very accommodating and helpful in getting me situated.  I think this is a great base camp for exploring the island, particularly if you are not too concerned with being in the dense craze of Waikiki.

Staying at Sarah's place was great. She has a spectacular view of the entire island. Her place has everything you would need for a comfortable visit including a washer and dryer! Helen was also super accommodating the entire time. It was like having a local tour guide with you :) I would definitely recommend it as a place to stay. The location was just a few miles from downtown Waikiki as well.
Was welcomed greatly to a beautiful home with a beautiful view. The space was great and had everything we needed. Great location to be for the island. Thank you for being accommodating.
We are welcome like family.

Loved loved loved Sarah's place! Awesome view, close to everything, amenities, clean and comfy bed. Helen, you are AWESOME for the record. She was super attentive to our arrival even though it was a late flight, made sure we knew how things worked before she departed and made us feel welcome. You rock, Helen! Smooth and easy arrival and departure. Lovely stay. Thank you Sarah for opening your home to Carlos and I. Hawaii has a part of both of our hearts. Until next time!

We enjoyed staying at Sarahs appartement. It was as  we expected it. The view from the balcony and bed is amazing. Also the pool and hot tube on 9th floor were great.
There were lots of recommendations what to do left on the counter. Also her friend Helen who made sure we got into the appartement gave us some helpful advice.

Helen was so great at meeting us, she was insanely enthusiastic in the best way possible! 
The space was far nicer than we had anticipated, the rooftop pool and jacuzzi were a lovely surprise that we definitely took full advantage of!! 
The air conditioning was also wonderful, and there was a fully stocked kitchen with a few surprises left behind from other guests (thank you Swedish guests for the chocolate). 
We loved it, and would definitely come back!
Perfect place to trevel with car. Room is very clean & comfortable. Kind host. If i revisit Hawaii, i'll stay here again.
This  apartment is very clean with awesome ocean view. Sarah and Steve are nice. We love the place and will definitely choose this apartment  if we visit Honolulu again.

Overall, we appreciate the apt provided by the host. The place is clean in general and host and his friend are nice and responsive. However, there are a few things didn't meet our expectation.

1. The WiFi mentioned in the info sent to us after booking was never working. Host mentioned he will ask the telecom to fix, but it never happened. Host provided us with a hotspot device on the second day. But it stopped working after two nights. Although host mentioned he called provider to fix, but the issue persisted till the end of our trip. Therefore, we didn't have WiFi for most time of the trip.

2. We found a couple small roaches in the shower space and kitchen. But honestly speaking, it might be the problem of the whole building or Hawaii.

3. The second bed is actually an air bed which is not mentioned in the info. And personally we feel it less comfortable than a real one.

4. Last, when we checked out, we were told to just leave the key in the kitchen. But the elevator requires the key to go to the garage. We had to ask the host in the last min to figure out how to leave and the solution was to hide the key in the garage. This might not be a big deal, but made us wondering how previous tenants handled the check out before that host never realized this issue?

It is a very nice apartment with great ocean view, especially when you get up in the morning, you could see the airplanes crossing and the blue ocean is the background. It is in the city center with high standard safety guard. The garage is very nice and they have a fix parking lot. We could add the gasoline easily. We could buy stuff easily. It is close to the shopping mall. The apartment has two rooms. The main bedroom is big enough with a nice bathroom. The second bedroom is an air bed. But do not worry because it is even better then the real bed I stayed in Maui, because it can be added the air very easily (not the pump you have to do by yourself, it is just a button on the wall. It can add the air automatically). There is a Guitar in the room. It’s a pity that I do not how to use it. We can cook by the way, they have a nice big open kitchen together with the living room. We like the apartment very much. It made us feel safe, clean and like a home. One suggestion, it would be better to add a hot water kettle for guests.
Sarah’s and Stevens place is amazing will rent again!

This Honolulu apartment is not described accurately. It is not luxurious, it is basic. Very minimal. In the business district. 
Our check in contact (which is offsite) was 5 hours late, the dishwasher was broken (the check in contact knew this before we arrived), the light in the master bedroom was broken due to wiring (the check in contact knew this before we arrived), the second bedroom at the time was not advertised as an AIR MATTRESS, no coffee maker until I went and bought one, not enough dishes for four people, no beach equipment/towels, it looks like they recently replaced the floor but did not finish the molding, kitchen was not bad but not sparkling clean, hooks in the walls from previous artwork but art is now gone. The place felt like a bachelor pad they decided to move out of one day and put it on Airbnb the next. 
This apartment has great potential with polishing, work, and repairs but as it was in Jan 2019 it fell short of the description. 
Also, there are weird rules about not being able to use the front door/lobby of the building. It did not feel like we were guests allowed to be renting the apartment, it felt like we were intruders staying there illegally. 
Sarah is nice on email, the contact (Lester) in Hawaii is a nice guy, but the place is less than luxurious and we felt uneasy staying there.
Great location and value

This is the perfect place for tourists that will spend most time outside of the place, and it will not be as great if you want to constantly enter and exit the place, as you need to be cautious about not exposing yourself or your airbnb experience to the community. Parking is also not too convenient as every time you need to drive up/down 6 floors/12 ramps for the 6 floor-parking structure. The location is by some electric company so you can hear some/little electric motors working all the time when you open the window.

name: TOP LOC PVT RM BCHFRNT NORTH SHORE HI $150 @ 2PAX
summary: Top beachfront location @ Pipeline North Shore, HI. A Hawaiian style comfort w/great amenities. Private Room (2 Twin Beds with private bathroom). All inclusive. SHARED use of kitchen, living & dining room, lanai & parking. WIFI/Internet ready.  Suited for single traveler or couple. The location is peaceful but not quiet. The sound of the surf can be quite loud in the winter but calm during summer. This is country, so there are roosters and some traffic noise.
space: Access top destinations in North Shore, Oahu - The Triple Crown International Surfing Competitions (seasonal), Rock Piles, Banzai Pipeline, Off The Wall, Rocky Point, Sunset Beach, Waimea Falls/Bay, Polynesian Cultural Center, Shark's Cove, Historic Haleiwa Town, Dillingham Glider Field & Skydiving and many more!!! Activities include international surfing, swimming, scuba diving, jet skiing, stand up/paddle boarding, shark tours, whale watching, hiking and trekking trails, fishing, sunset catamaran cruise, golfing, tennis, horseback riding, polo and more. Nearby Old Historic Haleiwa Town offers great food, international food trucks, various good shopping and access to all ocean activities. A perfect location to spend time with your special someone in Hawaii. The home is a plantation style house built in 1942 situated beach front in between Rock Piles and the famous surfing destination of Banzai Pipeline on the North Shore of Oahu next to Off The Wall, Rocky Point and Sunset Beach. You
description: Top beachfront location @ Pipeline North Shore, HI. A Hawaiian style comfort w/great amenities. Private Room (2 Twin Beds with private bathroom). All inclusive. SHARED use of kitchen, living & dining room, lanai & parking. WIFI/Internet ready.  Suited for single traveler or couple. The location is peaceful but not quiet. The sound of the surf can be quite loud in the winter but calm during summer. This is country, so there are roosters and some traffic noise. Access top destinations in North Shore, Oahu - The Triple Crown International Surfing Competitions (seasonal), Rock Piles, Banzai Pipeline, Off The Wall, Rocky Point, Sunset Beach, Waimea Falls/Bay, Polynesian Cultural Center, Shark's Cove, Historic Haleiwa Town, Dillingham Glider Field & Skydiving and many more!!! Activities include international surfing, swimming, scuba diving, jet skiing, stand up/paddle boarding, shark tours, whale watching, hiking and trekking trails, fishing, sunset catamaran cruise, golfing, tennis, horseba
neighborhood_overview: This is a private beachfront compound with lots of privacy and spacious parking. Close access to Turtle Bay Resort, Polynesian Cultural Center & Old Historic Haleiwa Town. We also have a cottage next to the main house @ $250 per night good for 2-3 guests max. All inclusive. Exclusive use. See our listings.
notes: North Shore lifestyle is lay back, easy  but can be full active or rigid due to the many amenities around to enjoy and take pleasure with. Activities are full and never ending. The beach shore stretch from Haleiwa down to Sunset and up to Laie (where Polynesian Cultural Center is located).  Btw, PCC tour is recommended for a whole day activity and don't miss the Luau and Night Show as part of your tour. Shrimp farm experience is also fun!
transit: There is a city bus, The Bus, that stops directly in front of the house. The Bus provides transportation every 30-minute interval. We recommend to rent a car to cut bus wait and to maximize your travel and vacation.
access: North Shore, Oahu If there is such a thing as a perfect wave, you’ll likely find it on Oahu’s North Shore. The big, glassy winter waves of this legendary surf mecca attract the best surfers in the world, while summer waves are far smaller and more gentle – all of which makes the North Shore the perfect surf spot for beginners and veterans alike. Stretching for more than 7 miles, the beaches of the North Shore host the world’s premier surfing competitions during the peak, winter months, including the Super Bowl of wave riding, the Vans Triple Crown of Surfing (November - December). Stroll in the thick sands of Waimea Bay, Ehukai Beach (Banzai Pipeline) and Sunset Beach — just leave the surfing to the pros. The months between November and February are the best times to watch big wave surfing. These massive waves can sometimes swell up to thirty feet or more and can even be dangerous for experienced surfers so please heed warning signs. From May to September, the waves subside, creating a
interaction: We will be happy to interact with the guests, give suggestions or answer any questions they might have about North Shore and other destinations in Oahu. We also give you your FULL PRIVACY. Airport shuttle pick-up & drop-off can be arrange base on schedule availability. UPON REQUEST by sending your flight info. Rental car is recommended.
house_rules: Welcome to North Shore! This is to remind our upcoming guests for some issues that you must know in making your vacation and stay with us worry-free and smooth sailing.  1. OLD HAWAIIAN PLANTATION HOUSE - do not expect new or modern fixtures or furnishings in the house. Local Hawaiian lifestyle and living. If you have any concern regarding the set-up, please inform us.  3. TROPICAL PLACE & LOCATION - the weather and climate varies and this is beachfront. The place is green all around due to vast varieties of plants and trees. You will find invasion of insects from time to time from outside (i.e. mosquitoes, bugs, geckos... etc). We suggest to bring insect repellant for protection. The house is screened.  5. KITCHEN & OTHER COMMON AREAS - All areas of the house aside from your private room and own bathroom are shared. The $150 per night is good for One Private Room (good for 2 guests only) and private bathroom. Please pitch-in. Maintain cleanliness. Expect the fixtures are old but intac

host.host_about:
"Someone who wants the best for you is what's best for you."
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Josh

JOSH, Operations & Maintenance 
Hospitality Management/HACCP. Ready to answer query and communicates with guests important details in making their vacation smooth and worry-free, comfortable and memorable. We deliver that Hawaiian spirit and warm Aloha!

We make our service unique by providing "Guest Request" on hand. You may arrange ahead of time any request to make your travel smooth sailing and vacation worry-free.

PAUL, Airbnb Host
Down-to-earth guy who loves the water, beaches and every thing about North Shore, Hawaii. From Malibu, California enjoying the life in Hawaii for many years & embracing a profession in teaching at a local middle school and a kumu hula as well.

reviews.comments:
Paul was fantastic. Him and his partner greeted us and carried our bags up. The room was stocked with snacks and drinks, you can really tell they care and want you to feel at home. They were the most welcoming hosts I have experienced. Their house is beautiful and the best location on the island, right on pipeline.  Their home was clean, and they made themselves available for anything my mom and I needed, including letting us use their surfboard! Their dog was a bonus as I was missing mine back home, and she was very well behaved. 

This was our first time staying on the north shore and I highly recommend it! It's only 30-45 min from the city, and has so much beauty and culture. 

I had to leave a few days early due to circumstances at home and Paul was very understanding and flexible with us. Great people. Beautiful home.

Amazing place and hosts! We've been welcomed by Paul & Josh very warmly! We had a wonderful time at their place. This looks exactly as the pictures do and the terrace is even more beautiful in real. Just on the beach in front of the ocean! For the ones who like surfing, litterally in front of pipeline! Paul& Josh are extremely nice and caring hosts. They really do everything for you to feel at your best at their place. I would strongly recommend their place to anyone who whishes to stay around! We'll definitely come back:-)

Great B&B! Location is top, top, top! A 60s surfers home, not luxurious but a beautifull interior. Minimalistic furniture which is great in this home. Paul and Josh are very warm and easy to communicate with. We had a great time at their place!

Place was exactly as advertised and the hosts were friendly and happy to suggest local places and give detailed transport advice. We left clothing behind and they promptly told us and organised sending them to us. Location was right on the beach and we would definitely stay there again. It was a happy, peaceful stay. Thanks.

We had a great time at Paul and Josh's place.  The interior of the house and bedroom are as advertised and the lanai is absolutely beautiful to watch the sunset or the waves come in.  The house is an open-air beach house, meaning the windows stay open all of the time allowing some insects to come in, this was not a problem for us and Josh sweeps the house every day.  The guys do provide earplugs for the night time noises outside (the roosters and the street traffic).  They were fantastic hosts and really went out of their way to help make our vacation a success.  Their dog is friendly and such a great companion!  Thanks for the fun time in Hawaii guys!
Amazing location! Friendly hosts!
This was a beautiful and place to stay and we felt very welcome.  Thank you Paul for sharing your home!
Great location, nice clean and airy room. Everything was as expected, and Paul was a pleasant and accommodating host.

We had a fantastic stay! I've been to the North Shore a few times by now and dare to state that this is the most beautiful place I've ever stayed. Paul is super nice and relaxed, balcony is with the best view right on Rock Piles, spacious rooms and a supercute dog. Highly recommended!!

This location is almost as fantastic as the hosts.  Its right on the Pipeline for world class surfing, the beaches are beautiful, great community, good food, excellent recommendations, fun and did I mention the host is great.  We had the best time and hope to trade visits.  East, laid back, helpful, fun and a great stay.  Thanks again Paul, all the best, Jeff & Michelle!

Aloha! Pauls home is the best home to stay at on the North Shore! Pipeline is directly in view from the deck and every little detail is looked after by Josh perfectly! 
We were very comfortable in Paul & Josh space and honestly didn't want to leave! We will stay here every time we visit from now on! Mahalo Guys X
Can't imagine a better location on the North Shore. Paul was a really nice guy - did not get to meet Josh as he was away. Will definitely be back

We love the patio and private beach experience. You can sit there all day watching surfers, pipeline waves and the beautiful sky. Room is big and clean. It gets a little bit humid during raining days. You will get your own bathroom. Be aware that this is in the tropical area so there will be some flies in the house. If you love the north shore and the beach, high recommended to stay here.

Location, location, location and one laid back host.  My son and I wanted a surf trip to remember. Paul's place was it. We spent three nights and the price was just right for the accommodations. The view from the lanai is a must for coffee mornings and evening cocktails. Thanks Paul for the great conversation.

Perfect location, incredible view, amazing host & beautiful Ehukai. 
Thank you for everything Paul.
Cheers Leigh :)

Paul was one of the best hosts I've ever had! We had a great stay and the house and location is absolutely amazing!! I strongly recommend this place and would always come back and stay there!! Thank you again!! :)
Paul was amazing! His place is absolutely perfect. Best week of our lives for sure. Paul was a great host! Highly highly recommend to all!

This place is just amazing. The location couldn't be better. You step out and you're at pipeline. The view from the patio is beyond beautiful and the house is super cozy.
In addition to that, Paul and Ehu (the dog) were very friendly and nice. Paul took really care of us and made us feel like home.
If I'll go back to Oahu, I would definitely want to stay there again.

The place was fantastic! Right in front of the beach and provides a relaxing ambience at night just hearing the waves. Perfect for those who also want to check out surf competitions in December. I enjoy walking along the beach, with Ehukai specially. I will definitely come back.

The Pipeline house is a fantastic stay. Paul and Josh are fantastic hosts. The house has a "real beach house" feel, a true getaway from the more crowded touristic experiences on Oahu. A surfers dream, the most awesome swells rolling in just off the beautiful Lanai( deck). We spent many hours just watching the beautiful sunsets and changes in swell thundering in. Sleeping was a dream, the room comfortable, clean and well provisioned. We chillaxed in a flash. 
Paul is an easygoing , well informed house mate/host. He's a long term resident and a Hawaiian culture specialist. Josh was away during our stay but is very good on communications. Use of the kitchen , laundry, dining and lounge areas made our family feel right at home, the  extra space and facilities gave us the choice of eating in, economising and extending our stay to 10days.
Ehukai (the Labrador) is a delight, her love for the beach and constant company whilst swimming and walking gave our kids a "pet experiment" and companionship. 
I'd some up our stay by saying we just didn't want to leave.... All our dreams were fulfilled!!
Nice location, very friendly host. North shore is ideal for professional surfers, a bit far from the resorts in honulolo.

Leo and I absolutely loved our stay at Paul’s beachfront house. The location and house are just as described and the backyard is the world-famous Banzai Pipeline on the North Shore of Oahu. When we first arrived, we were greeted with the sounds of the majestic North Shore waves. We were also welcomed by a wonderful host dog, a golden retriever named Ehukai, who is the friendliest and sweetest dog ever. Ehukai loves the beach and is an expert sand digger! We miss her already.

Paul (our human host) is very hospitable, responsive and easy going. He is also an academic expert on Hawaiian Studies and happy to share his knowledge. He indulged our curiosity about the cultural and political history of Hawaii. We're sad that we didn't have the opportunity to meet Josh, who corresponded with us about the booking, but maybe we will one day!

The lanai has a spectacular view of the beach. There's no bad view - on the left you could watch the sun go down, on the right, you can see surfers ride the Pipeline.

We had our own room, private bathroom and parking space. Our bedroom was closer to the highway side and overlooks the front yard. If you leave the windows open, you could still hear the waves crashing, which is awesome as a sleeping aid. The house is conveniently located. It's only a 5 minute drive to Foodland (a grocery serving world class Poke) and delicious shrimp trucks, 10 minutes to Shark's Cove and Waimea Bay, and 15 minutes to downtown Haleiwa and Kahuku. Take note that there's only one road so during sunset, there's a lot of traffic, especially near the beaches. 

Every moment of our trip was breathtaking and relaxing. Thank you so much Paul, Josh, and Ehukai!

Paul was an awesome host and was welcoming, friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our chats with him as he has so much local knowledge.
The room was very nice and quiet at night for sleeping. All you could hear was the crashing of the waves. Paul changed our double bed to a king-size while we were there and also changed the TV immediately after the older one died.
The house was right on the beach and the balcony was perfect! It is 10  yards from the ocean and close enough to Pipeline to watch the surfers. I took many photos  (with the zoom on my camera).  It was so wonderful to watch to the big waves crashing. It was a 10 minute walk to Pipeline and a two-minute walk to the beautiful beach next door. The Foodland is only about a mile and a half down the road and is an excellent supermarket. We used the kitchen every day which was well-equipped.
All in all, this was a little paradise!

It's all about the location, right in front of Pipeline. We enjoyed watching the ocean, surfers & sunsets from the lanai.
Paul was very accommodating & easy going. His knowledge of the Hawaiian culture & history made for interesting conversations.
Ehukai, the beautiful golden retriever accompanied us on many beach walks & slept by our bed at night.
We had an amazing time & great memories.
Thanks Paul, Josh & Ehukai

My husband and I feel so fortunate to have been able to stay in such a warm and friendly home in such an incredible location.  The Hawaiian style cottage is literally at the edge of the Pipeline shore break where you can sit on the deck and watch world class surfers perform.  We were mesmerized by the beauty of the aqua blue waves.  Our bedroom was very private with closet space, a very comfortable bed and great wifi and tv reception.  It was truly a private and relaxing place to be, next to the surf break, with a gracious host like Paul, and with his super friendly Golden Retriever Eukai.  We can't wait to go back!

We have spent a beatiful 12 days at Paul´s cozy beach side house and can the stay there only recommend. House is equipped with all needed fittings, you can park in the garden (own car is a must) and enjoy endless beach and have breakfest on the terrace. Its quite different accommodation and location than Waikiki, real Hawaii (no stereotyped uniform hotel at beach).

Paul is nice and discreet owner who is co-operative for advice and tips in various fields.

Matej and Marketa, Czech Republic

This stay was not what we expected it to be after seeing the airb&b ad. It was sooooo mutch more! Paul, his cat&dog were super caring, lovely, helpful and always respected our privacy. The place is not to put in words. If possible i would have moved in and stayed there for the rest of my life. We absolutely loved it. Recoment it truely and will definetly come back soon-as Paul accepts our company again. Thank you for having us. This was the best airb&b adventure ever and your place is absolutely priceless! Those memorys will always fill our hearts with great pleasure. Thank you! Mahalo and Aloha

10/10. We had a wonderful stay at Paul's place and did not want to leave. The location is amazing - literally beachfront at pipeline. We enjoyed learning about Hawaiian history and culture from Paul but also had privacy to relax.

What an amazing place, Paul is a great host, he is discret and available when needed. The location is perfect and the house very confortable. I really hope I will be able to come back. Aloha and Mahalo

We loved our stay at Paul's place. It is an incredible location, on the beach which means it's perfect for a relaxing break. Paul was away part of the stay so we met not only him but also Yvonne and Sabrina. Everyone was lovely; friendly, hospitable and helpful. The resident dog is BEAUTIFUL and we loved having her around! 
There are food trucks and a supermarket close by so everything is easy and enjoyable. The room itself is large, sunny with plenty of closet space and we loved the bed, very comfy! Having your own bathroom is also great, really gives you privacy. All in all we had a fantastic week and recommend Paul's place!

Paul made us feel very comfortable and welcome in his home. Bed very comfortable and nice size room with plenty of closet space. Private bath room right outside the room clean with good shower. Perfect location for the North Shore. Deck looking out on beach and surf ideal for watching boarders.

Thank you for a wonderful stay. The room was great- comfortable and quiet. We couldn't have asked for a better North Shore location. Lovely relaxed atmosphere created by Paul and of course his lovely dog Ehukai. I would recommend Paul's place for a quiet North Shore location with beautiful views and on-the-doorstep beach access.

We had a amazing time at pipeline. The beach is only few steps away. We enjoyed taking a walk in the morning and sunset, watching " live show" of surfers on big wave. We love to spend time at lanai, feeling breeze and sound of big wave. 

Paul is a very good person, gave us good advice of food, restaurants and place to see. His dog is super friendly, make relaxed atmosphere.
We must come back there.
Pauls place was perfect! The location was just what we wanted. The house was clean and cozy! Super close to all the rest of my favorite beaches and food trucks. We will be returning!

We had the most amazing time! Paul's house was clean (Hawaii standards), relaxing, and in the best spot possible! We felt comfortable being in the house when he was and wasn't there. Paul knows so much about Hawaii and the culture, that we really enjoyed talking and hanging out with Paul and his beautiful dog! We will definitely be going back and staying at Pauls property again! Aloha & Mahalo!

My experience with Paul was great! He made me and my friend feel right at home. The house was literally in the perfect location of the North Shore. It was amazing! The house was so clean and it truly felt like home. He made us feel welcome from the very beginning and was extremely helpful as far as recommendations for that side of the island. I cannot wait to go back!

Paul was an amazing host, welcoming. He is extremely knowledgable about culture of Hawaii and traditional Hawaiian HULA dance. The location of his place was perfect, like a dream come true. House and room was spacious with "good spirit in". Bed were very comfortable. What You see on photos is exactly out there. Kisses for lovely Ehukai (beautifull and really friendly dog). We strongly recomend this place to stay. MAHALO Paul, take care.

My partner Mark and I had the most wonderful stay at Paul's place on the North Shore. I cannot imagine a better location - it is right on the beach so we spent lovely mornings and afternoons on the deck soaking up the pristine beauty around us. Not only is the location on the beach perfect, ( almost directly in front of the Banzai Pipeline), you are also only a very short drive away from Sharks Cove, (great snorkeling place), Haleiwa (beaut historical little town filled to the brim with great places to eat, drink and shop), and also walking distance to local food trucks, grocery store (Foodland) and more! 
Paul is such a lovely, welcoming host, we felt like we were staying with family - our time at Paul's was very special. Paul teaches Hawaiian studies and hula at one of the local schools - his knowledge of Hawaiian culture and history made for memorable conversations and a true island experience - we were very lucky to also attend a hula competition where a group from Paul's class performed and this was one of the stand-out experiences of our trip - it was truly beautiful watching the group dance to Paul's chanting - we loved every second!

We have the best view of the beach. A really nice house. Enjoy the North Shore.

최고의 해변의 전망이있습니다. 정말 멋진 집입니다. 노스쇼어를 즐기세요.
Perfect location, beautiful house and very nice hosts. The room was perfect and the whole house is super clean. I highly recommend to stay at Paul's house.
Surroundings were beautiful, the company was nice, the dog Ehukai was lovely, the area is quite remote there are no ubers on the north shore so a hire car is needed. Overall a pleasant trip.
Such a beautiful Place. Paul was an awesome host.

We could not have asked for a better host than Paul. He was so welcoming and friendly and shared so much of his incredibly interesting knowledge about Hawaii and its culture with us. Paul is the go-to guy if you have any questions about the history of Hawaii and will answer them enthusiastically. The house is a perfect, simple, untouched beach house - picturesque location with easy bus access into Haleiwa or a short walk to Pupukea snorkelling and delicious food trucks! Also a five minute walk from the Ehukai Pillbox Hike. Speaking of Ehukai, what a gorgeous dog, we miss her already!

Thank you so much Paul for your very special hospitality! Would highly recommend this accommodation :)

The location of the beach house was awesome, the beach is great. We enjoyed our stay and it felt like home. It is an old house (I think the pictures were taken some time ago) and could use some renovation but it was nice and clean everywhere.

Our stay here was great! Paul was very nice and welcoming and the house was in the perfect location. The room was very clean and comfortable! The road noise was a little bit loud at night but we still slept great.

Paul's home is amazing, it is as close to the beach as you can get. Paul combines Ohana and the Hawaiian beauty in his home.  You immediately get the feeling for his love with the Hawaiian culture in his home.  It is decorated with various Hawaiian artifacts and other relics which bring you closer to the ocean that you can hear from every room in the house.  Paul is a wonderful host.  He is extremely knowledgable in the Hawaiian culture and will take the time to give you tips on things to go see and do during your visit.  Whether you want to see Hale'iwa, Sunset Beach or Banzai Pipeline, his home is situated right in the heart of the north shore.

paul's very nice host
perfect location
house was very clean and comfortable
ehukai friendly dog

We had a great time at Paul's place. We would have loved to have stayed much longer on this side of the island and started wishing we did once we got to Paul's. He is a great host who made us feel so at home and so welcome. I know some people worry about the host interaction. Paul is the kind of person who can talk story with anyone If your the type that wants your own space he will do that as well and won't take any offense to it. This place was perfect for us. We had our own private room and private bathroom and were steps from the beach...everything we wanted. We cannot say enough about how much we enjoyed our time here. We plan on having future vacations here at Paul's. Fa'afetai tele lava!

Words can not describe how perfect this place is..... Paul welcomed us and made us feel instantly at home and part of his and his beautiful dogs family. We were so sad to leave!!! The house, location and lovely company was just perfect. Thankyou so much Paul. We really enjoyed ourselves. You have just 'wrecked us' for any other air bnb experience as noone else will be able to compare.!!!! X

This was a great location for my trip to Hawaii for the wedding. Paul was super helpful and inviting and his dog was a hoot. The location was right on the beach, which was super empty so it felt like it was a private one. Plenty of areas to chill outside along with in the living room. I'd definitely come back if I came back.

It was our first experience with Airbnb...But we guess it can't be better. We had such great days in Pauls House we don't wanna miss.

The Place is awesome...beautiful...clean and Paul is that Host you wanna have When you Are far away from Home. We enjoyed Talking to him...a Really down to Earth Guy.

Right Now we Are thinking about Coming back someday...I guess it says everything about Our Time there.

Stefan & Tanja

Paul was a very friendly host. as he is working during the week we just were most of the time by ourselfes- that just made us really feel like home. the house is nice and cosy and just steps away from the amazing beach. the view from the house is just breathtaking. we were having breakfast on the terrace every morning sitting so close by the beach. paul helped us with all our questions and was really helpfull during our stay. 
the location ist great, other beautiful beaches are easy to reach by car. the bed is really comfortable and the house has everything you need.
we would stay with paul again! thank you again for the great stay!

Staying at Paul's and Josh's place was a real Hawaiian experience. The house is right at the beach, which is low frequented, at least during September. We saw a turtle in the water and the beach was really great. Paul can tell you lots of interesting things about Hawaii's history and he is great company. Also the place is a great starting point to discover the island. Best Sunset Salad at the fish trucks close by plus one of the most amazing sunsets we have ever seen! Thanks Paul, we have had a great time!
Location of The house is just perfect!! Beautiful oceanview!! Paul is a great host and so kind!!

This was my first trip to the North Shore (and my first Air bnb experience) and my stay with Paul added so much!  The location is INCREDIBLE - a private little slice of paradise.  I loved Ehukai - she is such a kind, loving and funny girl!  I especially enjoyed evening talks with Paul about the Hawaiian history and culture - thanks for the loan of the great books.  Thanks for everything Paul, I'll be back!!!

Paul met us down at the beach when he got home from work and chatted with us briefly, introduced us to his dog Ehu. We felt he was a great host. He would chat with us and answer any questions we had but also gave us lots of privacy even though we were guests in his home. You cannot beat the location of Paul's beachhouse. It really is directly on the beach and short distance to many of the North Shore's top spots for snorkelling and hiking. There are tons of food trucks and restaurants close by as well as a Foodland. Our only issue that we came across (which wasn't a reflection of Paul) would be that because it is an older home, the windows do not block much sound and the bedroom faces the road. So it was a little loud at night with trucks and cars passing as well as tons of chickens in the area that kept us awake. Otherwise our stay was excellent and comfortable. You cannot beat this location and the views are incredible!
Sehr angenehmer, zurückhaltender Gastgeber. Fantastiche Lage, grossartige Sonnenuntergänge auf der Terrasse genossen. Ausgesprochen lieber Hund Ehukai.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a fabulous stay here at Pauls place. Beachfront with wonderful views  of the sunset and pipeline. Really what more can you ask for? My husband surfed, I watched the waves, we walked along the beach. Fabulous food trucks are nearby. Big king size bed was very comfortable. Paul was a gracious host giving ample privacy whilst also being there as required. It's a good base for exploring nearby Turtle  Bay or Haleiwa or further afield. Cottage next door looks fantastic especially if you have kids. We will be back. Thanks Paul and Josh for a wonderful vacation.

This location was everything we expected and more. Paul is a very friendly host, who is happy to share his broad knowledge about Hawaii while still granting a lot of privacy. We enjoyed our talks with him and felt very welcome. The house provides everything you need for a magnificant stay, literally just steps from the water. The view is amazing and we enjoyed it with Ehukai, who is a super friendly and relaxed dog. We highly recommend this location and will definetly be back. Mahalo to Paul and Josh.

We had a fantastic time at Pauls beautiful and authentic North Shore beach house. We enjoyed every minute the outstanding location. The view from the deck on to the ocean and the winter swell is hard to put in words. Paul was a great host, very friendly and helpful in every kind of matter. We can’t wait to come back. Thanks Paul!

Long before I arrived on the North Shore I was in contact with Paul and Josh. They both were very clear on what I could expect and how I could enter the house all by myself. They made me feel at home from the beginning, if I needed something I just had to ask and they respected my privacy as well. Great people to stay with, would do it again for sure!

Everyone has different priorities when selecting a place to stay. For us it was location as well as getting a feel for the local vibe. If this is what you are after, then Paul's place hits the mark! Don't come here looking for a five star hotel as this is not what you will find, thank goodness. If you are into the richness of the culture of Hawaii, you can't do any better than staying with Paul and Josh in this original plantation home that is right on the beach at the Banzai Pipeline. 
We were fortunate to be staying on a weekend which allowed us a bit more time to chat with Paul. He is a master in all things Hawaiian and is incredibly interesting. 
The house, although quite old, is spotlessly clean. Josh is like the energizer bunny and keeps it clean to a fault. 
We had a private bedroom with a comfortable king size bed and a private bathroom. There is a large deck where you could spend an entire day being mesmerized by the ocean. The remainder of the house and deck are shared with Paul, Josh, and Ehukai, their adorable golden retriever. All are most respectful of privacy. Even the dog knows where she must not cross the line!
 The kitchen has everything you need to prepare your meals if you wish. Of course, you should clean up after yourself as there is no maid service.
We can't wait for our next visit and would likely plan a longer stay. Thank you Paul and Josh for your hospitality!

Mahalo Paul! Our stay at your beautiful home is forever unforgettable. The BEST location Northshore, Oahu! You made us feel so welcome & we enjoyed every minute of the 10 days we spent at your place. See you next year!

Other reviewers give fine descriptions of the property and location (three thumbs up).  My recommendation?  Utilize wealth of local experience from both Paul and Josh (where to eat, play, explore, learn).  Most important; just kick back and enjoy the most perfect location on AirBnB.

It was our first airbnb and it was fabulous.  Unbelievable location and two awesome hosts. Could not get any better. Felt very welcome and like home. Value: 7stars. Wouldn't turn in this place to stay in a regular top notch hotel. Thx for the farewell presents!
It's a great place to stay. The bed is very comfortable and we had a very relaxed sleep. Paul/Josh and Ehu are great hosts.

Our stay with Paul at his pipeline house was magical. Waking up every morning to thundering surf was an absolute dream come true. The room was wonderful and was very large with a huge king sized bed. If anyone wants to enjoy the north shore this is the place to stay.

Wonderful place and marvellous hosts! The best place to stay to enjoy your stay in North short. The place is very clean and confortable,  you can use the kitchen to feel Just at home. Paul and Josh are very nice guys,  helpfull, they make us feel as friend immediatly and they done every thing to make our stay unforgettable, many thanks, Vincent et Valérie (Québec)

We had such a great stay at Paul's clean, spacious and comfortable home which is full of character and history. In original condition, Paul's descriptions of his well-loved old Hawaiian plantation house are accurate, and detailed information is clearly set-out and included in the 'House Rules'.  Clear driving directions and easy communication from our hosts who also provided great recommendations and suggestions. Super comfortable bed. We LOVED staying here, the setting of Banzai Pipeline is stunning, and we loved sitting on the lanai watching the waves and the surfers.  Walks along the beach were glorious. We had a rental car and driving to so many highlights of North Shore life was easy.  Mahalo Paul, Josh and Ehukai. A hui hou.

The location is incredible. Right on the beach. Right down the beach from the Banzai pipeline (we saw surfers all day every day) and right down the road from Waimea Bay and Falls and Sharks Cove (great spot for snorkeling in the summer). Not far from Haleiwa which is a quaint little town with a nice shopping area. Paul and Josh were very welcoming and friendly. The only drawback is the wild chickens. They're all over the North shore and the roosters started crowing at about 4:30/5 am every morning. We got used to it, but don't plan on sleeping in! The patio overlooking the ocean is amazing.
Not what I expected but was pleasantly surprised. Paul and Josh were super friendly and great hosts. Great location on the beach walking distance from Pipeline!
Beautiful house right on the beach next to pipeline. An amazing place to stay and great hosts.

Great location 
Charming house 
Helpful hosts

First things first - if you plan a trip to Hawaii make sure to stay at least 3 days at Paul & Josh's house. We were 5 days at the Airbnb and this was the most beautiful place that we have ever encountered when being on holidays. 
The house is directly at the beach - we took our breakfast coffee for a walk at the North Shore. Everything was amazingly clean and the house has an awesome decoration & atmosphere. 
Paul, Josh and Ehukai are completely friendly and heartwarming hosts - they made our stay even more unforgettable. 
If we ever have the chance to visit Hawaii again we will make sure to visit Paul, Josh and Ehukai again!

Paul and Josh were absolutely wonderful. The place is beautiful, and we could not have asked for a better stay during our trip (or a place for our engagement! Their front porch is stunning!) We did a Costco run and cooked about half of our meals in their kitchen, and this was easy and not a problem at all. It saved us a lot on eating out! 

Paul and Josh gave us plenty of tips about where to eat and what to see. They also lent us snorkel gear, and Josh even made me some tea when I was sick! Truly lovely people. Bonus: Their dog is very calm and nice to pet. I definitely recommend staying here!

Die Lage der Wohnung ist absolut traumhaft, direkt am Strand. Das Zimmer ist sehr gemütlich eingerichtet, das Bett sehr bequem und die gesamte Wohnung super sauber. Paul und Josh sind sehr nette und unaufdringliche Gastgeber. Insgesamt hatten wir einen perfekten Aufenthalt und können die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.

Such an amazing way to end our honeymoon. Thank you so much for being so cool, funny, approachable and for allowing us to share your house. We will be back and we will be telling our friends about how awesome your hospitality is. Much love❤

Paul and Josh's place is in the most amazing location, right on the beach. Both Paul and Josh were very welcoming, and we had a great stay at their place. Waking up in the morning and walking out onto the lanai right on the beach with the ocean just metres away was incredible. The room was great and the bed was super comfy. We loved our time there!

This is a perfect Hawaiian experience ! Incredible ocean front spot, beautiful beach, relaxing atmosphere, and hosts are top notch.   Hosts are full of resident Hawaiian knowledge and overall embody the relaxed lifestyle, which is quite contagious! I would recommend this place to anyone.
great!! thank you :)
Paul's place was fantastic.  Right on the beach in a great location. Paul was a very welcoming.  Will definitely try stay here again in the future!

Paul and Josh are fantastic hosts. The room and bathroom are clean with great water pressure, a really comfy bed, beautiful views, and amazing right-off-the-porch beach access. I would agree with other reviews that the road noise can be disturbing if you're a light sleeper - but we aren't so it was no bother to us at all. This is a fantastic oasis and departure from the hubbub of Waikiki - if you want to experience a local Hawaii don't hesitate to book with Paul.

Both the place as well as the hosts were really special. Starting with the place, neither myself nor my wife have ever felt so close to the sea as we felt sitting on the lanai (back porch) of the house... and imagine we both grew up in Greece :-) !!! It was a fantastic experience. This was the image of Hawaii you have as a kid. Now, regarding the hosts, Paul and Josh manage to run a very professional business while being very friendly and chilled at the same time. Their knowledge of Hawaii is really impressive. The maintainance of the place is at the level of a many-stars hotel, including ammenities that you would never expect in an airbnb. Overall we felt very comfortable the entire time (like being at home) and we will definitely try to go back.
This home is right on the beach! If you love the beach this is a great value!
Josh and Paul! Thank you so very much for everything! We had such a great time! Really enjoyed the quaintness, location, doggies, and good vibes. Definitely recommend.

Dette sted er indbegrebet af Hawaii. 
Der er den smukkeste udsigt fra terrassen, utrolig fredfyldt og afslappende atmosfære.
Der er gode områder i nærheden hvis man vil snorkle og gå på opdagelse og der er ikke overrendt af tourisme. 

Paul og Josh er fantastiske værte. 
De er nogle af de mest venlige og behagelige mennesker der findes. Som får en til at føle sig hjemme og giver en plads til at være private i deres hjem. 

Mangler i informationer om hvilke ting der er værd at se, historie om øen eller hvor der er godt at spise - endelig spørg , de kan med sikkerhed svare . 

Skal man besøge Oahu , skal det være her fra . Det er det hele værd og mere til.
Perfect place to stay while adventuring around North Shore. Even though you share the living space, a spacious bedroom and bathroom provide comfort and privacy.

Place is somewhat nice 
It great views and good host
Die Unterkunft hat eine tolle Lage, nahe bei den Foodtrucks und direkt am Strand. Wir haben uns vor allem in die Veranda verliebt.

Paul and Josh's home is in a stunning location...right on the beach, and walking distance to Sunset Beach through to Waimea Bay, and close to great food outlets. It was an old home, but very clean with lovely touches in the room. They are rebuilding soon, and I would love to return to stay after this has been completed. Their 2 dogs are adorable and were fun to have them about.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We love this place! The view is amazing, josh and paul - and the dogs kanaloa & ehukai aswell :) - are great hosts. i highly recommend a stay there.

name: Sunny private room: Newtown terrace
summary: Enjoy your time in a sunny Newtown terrace. One private room with queen bed is available, can accomodate two! The terrace house features a stunning kitchen, two bathrooms and is only metres from King St, with its hundreds of restaurants and bars:)
description: Enjoy your time in a sunny Newtown terrace. One private room with queen bed is available, can accomodate two! The terrace house features a stunning kitchen, two bathrooms and is only metres from King St, with its hundreds of restaurants and bars:) Only 200m walk to Macdonaldtown station.
transit: Only 200m walk to Macdonaldtown station.

reviews.comments: Unfortunately Isabella was not there so we never actually met, but the room was very cosy and the location beautiful, right in front of a picturesque park in Newtown and a very short walking distance to the main street with an almost endless choice of great bars, restaurants and cafes, would definitly stay here again :)

I had a lovely stay in Isabella's house. The room was beautifully set up and very, very comfortable. The facilities were easy to find and were clean. The location is perfect and the house is located on a gorgeous inner-city street across from a park. Unfortunately I was unable to meet Isabella, as I was out and about during much of my short stay, but she made it very easy for me to let myself in and find everything I needed. I felt very welcome and at home.

Perfect if you enjoy your own company which I do.  Ideally situated for my shopping trip to Ikea.  Really comfy bed. Couple of minutes walk to King Street for shops, bars , restaurants.  On street parking was a bit of a mission later in the evening due to diners but earlier on its a breeze.

Isabella communicated very well and made the entry in her absence very easy. Housemates were more than lovely and hospitable. House itself is beautiful, clean and very central to newtown in a great area. Room was excellent. Had a great stay! Would definitely go back and recommend to others if available. Thanks!

Nice place close to Kings street in Newtown.
The house and the bedroom are really nice.
Don't hesitate to spend time in this house.
The house mates are really kind

Isabella was so lovely from the point of booking and until my stay. Her response to my messages were prompt and thorough. Her instructions were detailed on where things are in the house and where nice eateries are around Newtown, I think this was very kind of her to do so. 

Isabella's house is in a very convenient location, and moreover her bedroom is an inspiration, so tidy and quaint! I was made to feel like I was at home, and the bath tub in the bathroom is an absolute treasure! I will definitely stay here again!

Room was comfortable.  Put suitcase on floor and sleep well. Cool nightlight and nice breeze. Cute kitty cat will try to come in, but you can simply close door. I was here 3 days and saw roommates a few times. So glad they didnt party there. I had peaceful Christmas and that is what I wanted. Fair price and good location.
had a 2 nights reservation at Isabella's room. it's really nice, the house also. area is very cool. best bars and food I've found in Sydney and within walking distance to the center.

name: Condo rénové, moderne et ancestral
summary: - 2 chambres fermées avec immense terasse avec BBQ . -possibilité d'ajouter des personnes au salon sur divan lit au besoin. -tous les services sont près du condo -accès au réseau Wi-Fi illimité  -Salle de bain avec douche vitrée et un bain séparé

name: A+ Fun HK- Central of Asia
summary: Hi everyone,   Welcome to Hong Kong, that one of the world's most compelling cities and an exciting melting pot. It's my pleasure to have the opportunity for hosting you, please tell me about you :) Also, please read "SiMPLE RULES" in below section CAREFULLY before booking.
space: The room is simple and adequate. perfect for backpackers, people travling w/ light baggages.  The room is NOT suitable for more than one travelers due to its limited space.
description: Hi everyone,   Welcome to Hong Kong, that one of the world's most compelling cities and an exciting melting pot. It's my pleasure to have the opportunity for hosting you, please tell me about you :) Also, please read "SiMPLE RULES" in below section CAREFULLY before booking. The room is simple and adequate. perfect for backpackers, people travling w/ light baggages.  The room is NOT suitable for more than one travelers due to its limited space. Feel free to walk around in the house. I am available to be contacted any time. Supermarkets, convenient stores and Lan Kwai Fong (Night Life) are all just around the corner, along with all the other Hong Kong topest rated bars/clubs and famous local delicacies. Victoria Peak and the ferry terminal to other Hong Kong islands are also just mins. of walk away, don't forget to take your advantage for a hike up while you still can. :) My place's 3 min. away from Sheung Wan Sta. Exit E2, and 4 min. away from the Street Cart and the bus stops which can
neighborhood_overview: Supermarkets, convenient stores and Lan Kwai Fong (Night Life) are all just around the corner, along with all the other Hong Kong topest rated bars/clubs and famous local delicacies. Victoria Peak and the ferry terminal to other Hong Kong islands are also just mins. of walk away, don't forget to take your advantage for a hike up while you still can. :)
notes: ***** Please read the following CAREFULLY before booking ***** SIMPLE RULES When Booking 1. CLEARLY present yourself on your profile image, any request from an anime character, animal, landscape, sky, sea, or a car will not be considered 2. no booking on anyone’s behalf, bookings will be accepted only for the very same individual's request Prior to Arrival 1. confirm your check-in time THE LATEST THE NIGHT BEFORE Checking In 1. TAKE OFF YOUR SHOES when entering apartment, and REMAIN SHOES OFF on all  indoor premises all time 2. keep bathroom floor DRY all time Checking Out 1. READ CAREFULLY on check-out instruction sheet on the back of entrance door
transit: My place's 3 min. away from Sheung Wan Sta. Exit E2, and 4 min. away from the Street Cart and the bus stops which can easily take you across the Hong Kong. And the Ferry Terminal to Macau and rest of the Islands of Hong Kong is also about 10 min. of walk.  My spot will get you around the most sightseeing hot spots in HK easily, and i've been a prompt and responsible host so please book w/ confidence. :)
access: Feel free to walk around in the house.
interaction: I am available to be contacted any time.
house_rules: Please take off your shoes when entering the apartment.

host.host_about:
Hi, I am Wesley! Hope to get to know some of ya'll during your stay and I'd love to be of your company to show you around town. 

Please don't forget to shoot me a feedback after, your booking's valuable to me and is the motivation for my improvement. :)

address.street: Shueng Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Excellent stay in Hong Kong. The accommodation proposed by Wesley is exactly the announcement : very well located, at the exit of MTR , close to lively places . Despite of the usual size of flats in Hong Kong, the home and the room are enough for few days, even for a couple.
Traveling as couple, we were very well received by our host. Wesley made us feel very welcome , offered us hospitality and kindness as if we knew each other a long time. If we made our in couple visits in the day, Wesley took us out for evenings, eating and drinking. Wesley is a very interesting person, very open and who deserves to be known ! Really and sincerely highly recommended, for alone travelers or for couples, and for everyone who wants to meet a great guy ! Thank you for everything and see you soon Wes ! Friendships from France. L&K

It's really a great experience on my first use of airbnb. Wesley is handsome,super nice and responsible. he picked me up and help me take my luggage when I arrived in HK station. While the location is at the central of HK, and only 2min to MTR. The room is cozy and clean. I really like it, and I want to live there again next time.

Wesley was there to link up with me when i reached exit E2 of Sheung Wan station.
He offered to carry my luggage for me, so nice of him.
It was about 5 mins walk to his apartment. Although it was just a small room without door but cover with curtain; it was comfortable enough to have a good night rest.
He also explained in detail the door locking system and operating procedure for the water heater !  
Overall it was a very good experience for me as it was my first time trying Airbnb.
Thanks Wesley
房東Wesley 是入住當天到門口接我,是個有電梯的單位,地點就在后大道中的新世紀廣場旁邊,離上環地鐵站約3-4分鐘｡房間里簡單有桌子､檯燈､冷氣,共用的有吹風機､冰箱､廚房｡他也很健談,需要幫忙的時候都可以問他｡
Very comfortable and with such a friendly and accommodating host!

The place is well-located and cosy for a lone traveller like me. I had a problem with my phone, and Wesley was incredibly patient with me so I thank him for that. It was a short stay, but I would have enjoyed it if I had to stay longer as well. Cheers Wesley.

Location is amazing, 10 mins walk to bar and club area of lankwaifong, 2 mins to metro station and various bus/tram stops. Lots and lots of nice places to eat around. 
The room is exactly like in the pics. There is no door in the room, so might feel quite uncomfortable for girls. The flat is quite clean and cosy, air conditioning is available as it might be quite noisy to sleep with an open window. Wesley is a very friendly host, he met me near the metro and brought to the apartment after I wrote to him through airbnb platform (I didn't have connection on my phone) which was really nice of him. Definitely recommend the place!
I stayed 2 days at Wesley's place and he was an amazing host, I recommend him to all of you! Thanks Wes!
Wesley is a great person. The place is clean and cozy.
I enjoyed my stay at Wes's place (16nights). I can feel I'm at home. Wes was always there when I needed him a few times. The appartement had everything you need and very clean. Thumbs up for Wes!

I stayed 2 nights at Wesley'splace and he was very nice. His home is cozy and there was no inconvenience to be there. It's very close to and you can walk around a lot of sights such as Soho street and Causeway Bay. It takes only five minutes to go to Lan Kwai Fong on foot. Thank you Wesley:-)

숙소설명은 정확했습니다. 위치는 셩완 역 E2번출구로 나오면 3분정도밖에 안걸릴정도로 가까워요. 소호랑 란콰이펑이랑도 가까워요. 최고의 장점은 위치인 것 같아요. 
방의 컨디션은 사진과 같아요. 다만 거실로 연결되는 문은 없어요. 천으로만 가려져있으니 참고하세요.
Wesley 는 배려심있고 잘 챙겨주었습니다. 여행정보도 많이 주어서 덕분에 즐거운 여행이 되었습니다. 얘기도 잘 들어주어서 대화가 즐거웠어요. 가격도 저렴하고 굉장히 추천합니다.

這是一間小而溫暖的房子,床擺放的位置有變更,但不影響房間的舒適度｡
這裡的交通非常方便,若每天要去不同的地方遊玩,這裡是很好的選擇,地鐵､步行都能很快到達各個熱門景點｡
房東Wesley很好相處,他會適時關心我的旅程,給我行程安排上的建議｡我們同搭叮叮車的時候也沿途介紹,讓我對香港有更進一步的認識｡
推薦這間房子給大家,你會有一趟滿意的旅程｡謝謝Wesley : )
Good to live.
perfect location. walking distance from soho, LKF, PMQ and central. the nearest station is Sheung Wan (one stop from central) which is literally 1 min away on foot. highly recommended!

listing is in a super convenient location that's close to loads of awesome food (Michelin starred, old 'da pai dangs' and a few others that you'll find on food blogs etc.) and literally just a stone's throw from the bars in SoHo and LKF.

I've really enjoyed my stay at Wesley's place in Sheung Wan. 

The Location is prime. Surrounded by a variety of local restaurants and bars, I could always walk to many reputable restaurants for food. Literally 2 minute walk from Sheung Wan MTR station exit. 

During my stay, I felt like staying at an old friend's place, Wesley's friendly and understanding. Not only he picked me up from Sheung Wan MTR station, he also made sure I felt as comfortable as possible during my stay. Although there's only a curtain dividing the bedroom and living room, Wesley respected my privacy well. 

Overall, I definitely would recommend Wesley's place for anyone who's looking for a place with convenient location and worth its value. Cheers Wes!!

Wes was a great host. His place was in a great location and close to all the major landmarks. Thanks again for showing me around. Will definitely need to grab drinks when I visit again. Would highly recommend this listing.
The location of this accommodation is very central and easy to navigate. Wes is friendly and helpful with information on things to see and do, food to eat and general getting around.

I booked three nights at Wes' place pretty last minute but that was no problem for him. The whole time I was there he was very accommodating and staying there felt like staying at a friends house. 

The place is basic but had everything I needed and in a great location. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
相當帥氣隨和的帥哥!房間稍小,但很乾淨｡期待下次還能住在這裡｡

Wez is easy to communicate with. The place is as described. I need to go to HKU every day so the location is optimal. It is near the MTR so travelling to other areas is easy. Food joints and shopping areas are also near so those things are not a problem.

Wes is a really awesome guy. It is coincidental that we were both in Taipei at the same time a few days prior to my trip to HK so we met up so he could give me the keys to the apartment. He's really friendly and easy to get along with.
The room itself is really comfortable and conveniently located. I had no issues. Someone mentioned some issues with there being a curtain, but as a solo female traveler, I felt quite comfortable regardless. This was the perfect place within close proximity to many great restaurants and the station. Couldn't ask for anything else.
Wesley是個很親切又有趣的大男孩,雖住宿中有小問題,但對我而言,影響不大,房子的地理位置､環境､便利性都相當不錯,必買的伴手禮,走路2分鐘即可到達,房間也乾淨舒適,如果下次仍一個人去香港,我還是會選擇住這｡

다른 후기처럼 위치가  좋습니다
호스트도 굉장히 친절해요
다만 여자분이 가신다면, 거실과 통하는 문이 문이아니라 커텐같은거라서 불편하실것같아요

위치도 좋았구 무엇보다 조용해서 괜찮았어요 ㅎㅎ
시원하구 그런데 밤새 통화해서 잠을 좀 설쳤어요 ...
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wesley was such an accommodating and friendly host! He makes sure he guides you properly to his place so that there wont be trouble finding it even if he is at work! He makes sure you have your own privacy too. I would recommend solo travelers if you want to experience a true hong kong trip!

My stay in Wesley's house was pretty nice overall. The room is definitely bigger than in the photo! Perfect location and very near to everywhere. Wesley is easy going and causal person to talk with (n handsome too ;) ). Nothing much to complain for such price.
Great location near public transit and great bars and restaurants. Very central.

Logement très bien situé proche du métro Sheung Wan au coeur de Central.
De plus Wesley est un très bon hôte qui m'a fait découvrir pleins de petits restaurants et la vie nocturne de Hong Kong.

ﾎｽﾄがとても優しく近くまで迎えに来てくれました｡

場所も観光地の駅近で徒歩圏内でもかなり満喫できます｡

部屋もﾌﾟﾗｸﾞなども用意されておりｴｱｺﾝもあるので､夏場でも快適です｡

ﾎｽﾄとのｼｪｱﾊｳｽですが､ｽﾍﾟｱｷｰを貸してくれるので､自由に出入りできます｡

ﾃﾞｨﾅｰもﾛｰｶﾙﾚｽﾄﾗﾝに一緒に行って広東語が読めない分助かりました｡
とてもおすすめです!
Wesley was an amazing host, he showed me around and helped about everything. I definitely recommend this place in the hearth of Hong Kong Island!

The airbnb flat is well located, the closest metro station is Sheung Wan, you can walk to there in 1-2 minutes. Wesley is a great host, he made me feel like I was at home, treated me like a friend as soon as we met. I really appreciated that. 
It is a good value for its price, I can only recommend this place to other guests ! Next time, I will stay here for sure. 

Yours, 

Lyna

Wesley was an amazing host. He was quick to answer any questions I had and is overall just a great conversationalist. His residence is located minutes away from the Sheung Wan MTR, making it super convenient to come back to after a day of exploring. He provided all the basics for a comfortable stay. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks Wes!

Wes is not only a great host but he became a friend I would keep for life. Even though he has work, he came to pick me up at the Hong Kong station and took me around the area to eat some good local foods like a friend or family member. He is very good and thorough in showing me directions (I have no sense of direction and I’m lost all the time when traveling) including back to the station, how to open his doors and gate.  He even helped me to get my laundry done in time. The room is clean, no dirt and not dusty. Even though is small, he gave me a lot of privacy. He also has all the amenities ready for me, which I appreciate and not all Airbnb has it like in Bali. Thank you Wes for making my first Hong Kong experience one of the best highlights of my many trips and I can’t wait to come back!!!

It was fun staying at Wesley's place. It's exactly as in the pictures, so no surprises there - that there is a curtain instead of a door separating the rooms was already mentioned in the other comments. The location was superb. Wesley was a chill and well organized host. I'd stay with him again ;)
Wesley is a very nice and accommodating guy! Great stay and fantastic location!
Great location. Really close to the station. Perfect for 1 person.

Wesley 的房子很棒!離上環站約3分鐘,走去碼頭也是10分鐘內,這對最後一天一早要搭船回澳門的我來說非常方便!房內有熱水器可以煮水喝,有自己的帶鎖房間,可以保有一些隱私,轉接插頭也有提供!
另外Wesley是個很棒的人,我們一起喝了拿鐵,在晚上時邊喝啤酒邊聊天,Wesley是個貝斯手,他分享一些喜歡的音樂和他們樂團的歌給我聽,也會聊聊各地文化差異和我的旅程,這次就像到一個朋友家住宿的感覺,Wesley和他的房子是有溫度的!

Very quick response. I booked this place for my mom to crash for a night after a long flight from San Francisco. Wesley helped me and my mom as much as possible to achieve a smooth check-in. Thank you so much! 100% recommended!!

It is a nice place for me to stay in Hong Kong.Very good location for tram ,bus and MTR.you a can go everywhere form this room easily. The room is small but have everything traveler need. Quiet for sleep.
Very good consumer performance for one to stay.
It a pity that I do not meet Wes this time,but he responses email very fast like he always be with me. Thank you Wes. Hope see you next time

Great location, with a great host. Wes is an amazing host and really helped me out while I was in a tough spot due to a typhoon. Also had many great conversations with Wes as we had many of the same interest :). The apartment is in a great location close to many places and there is a lot of space and privacy especially for Hong Kong. Totally recommended!
表白房东Wesley!房子位置很不错!住的很舒适!还有房东人也非常好!下一次来香港一定还去这里住!性价比超级高!!!!

Wesley’s apartment is a cozy home full of character located conveniently close to the Sheung Wan Metro station. He met me at the station upon my arrival, and showed me around during my brief stay in the city. Wesley is a fun host who wants to make sure you have a comfortable stay and good time while in Hong Kong. Wesley's apartment is a great home base for a solo traveller while in HK and I hope to be back next time I’m in the city. Thanks again, Wesley.

Wesley and I weren't able to meet during my entire stay, but he was very accommodating and gave me clear instructions on how to get to the place. The actual room is ideal if you only need to crash for a night or will be spending more time outside. It's close to a lot of good spots in Sheung Wan and Central too. If there's any minor issue, it's opening locks. It was pretty tricky, but other than that, it's all good. :)
Thank you Wes for being such an incredible host! Had a blast getting to know you and  I wish you the best in your endeavors!

I would recommend staying at Wesley’s! It is wonderfully located for exploring the city, just a short walk from Central. And Wesley is super kind, helpful, and interesting to talk to! I was glad to stay here :)

위치가 교통편도 매우 좋고 여행다니기에도 매우 좋았어요. 
또 다른 에어비앤비와 달리 현지인이 어떻게 사는지 볼 수 있었던 좋은 기회였던것 같아요. 다음에 방문해도 또 이용하고 싶어요

Wesley is an amazing friendly hosts! He picked me up from the station and show me the way to his place. He was all the time very helpful and I had such a great time at his place. I learned a lot of Hongkong in the few days. He was showing me around for Noodle soup for breakfast & Hong Kong beer in the evening. Fantastic - Thank you a lot!
An excellent bnb experience for solo travellers - Wesley is an awesome host and you can't go wrong with the location. Definitely would love to come back next time!
it's in the central of Hong Kong , close to everywhere , Wesley is willing to give advise, walking distance to famous restaurants and Lan Kwai Fong, but with reasonable price!

Wes是一位很熱情細緻的房東,全程與我普通話溝通｡因為我的check in時間不確定,抵港前即發送了全套帶標註和細節的入住指示圖給我｡房間內有提供長排插,一個電源轉換頭,檯燈,面巾紙,小化妝鏡,床頭櫃,落地床墊,一客一換的床單枕套和浴巾;空間並不逼仄,有一股很好聞的洗衣粉香味｡浴室雖有年代但潔凈,熱水充足,提供吹風機,記得自備洗護用品｡房源地理位置優越,在皇后大道中,距港鐵上環站步行兩分鍾,晚上拉開窗簾看看街景也極愜意｡性價比很高,適合單人旅客入住｡
Great host who introduced me the best spots to eat and drink. Treated me like a long time friend.
Clean flat in amazing location and very responsive and friendly host. Thanks Wes, I loved my stay in HK!
Perfect for solo travelers looking for a local Hong Kong experience! Wes helped me make the most of my short stay.

雖然只有見到Wesley一天,但是個很熱情､友善的host
整體房源位置良好､到哪裡都很方便
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房东人很好,答复很快,也给了我很多帮助,房源临街,街外有声音,在寸土寸金的香港也难得

Wesley is a cool  guy and he tried hard to make my stay enjoyable at his place. He wasn't in when I arrived, but he left me clear instructions about how to get in. He even sent me photos of the different steps on how to get to his place. Much appreciated, Wes. :) I can only recommend his place, especially if you are in Hong Kong for a few days only. The location is superb, the area is safe. A bit busy even at night, but at least everything is near. Thumbs up! :)

Perfect for a quick stay in a Hong Kong dilapidated-chic tong lau flat! Very well located in Sheung Wan near the mid-levels escalator with bars, boutique restaurants/shops downstairs and 7-Elevens offering cheap Tsingtao. Essentially Wes offers you his bed whilst he sleeps on the sofa, which is fine but it’s just something to bear in mind especially when crossing the living room to use the bathroom. The flat/room is a typical size for aging housing in Hong Kong, but it’s quite cosy, and nice seeing the skyscrapers through the window! You can hear the traffic a lot so it’s worth bringing earplugs. It’s more of a place to crash for a night or two, but Wes is very friendly! Location is a big advantage for the backpacking tourist looking for an authentic cramped Hong Kong weekend stay!

If there are anyone who curious about HKG pp’s life in real, stay with Wesley’s place! He was so kind and helpful for my whole journey in Hongkong. He is one of a business man(?) who we can meet on the street during our traveling but he is fun, genuine, outgoing, has a sense of humor and understanding. It was such an honor to meet him! Location is also great. Close from everywhere. Transportations, tourism spots, famous restaurants or snack shop. If you have any requests, he would handle it im sure! Have great time in hongkong as I had!

name: Studio in Chelsea
summary: Fabulous sunny studio apartment located in west Chelsea.  Luxury doorman building with ‏washer and dryer in the apartment.  Fabulous organized roof top.  Big new gym . Few minutes walk from the High Line.  Close to the A, C and E line (Blue) penn station .
space: Experience New York City like a local and stay in one of Manhattan's most desirable neighborhoods.  My clean and modern studio apartment is steps away from the Highline and from Meatpacking. It is newly furnished, full of light, and available for you to enjoy while I'm traveling.  The bedroom includes a queen-sized bed,   You'll have full access to my kitchen and wireless high-speed internet also there's a washer machine and a dryer in the apt .

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

name: The Wielingen
summary: Are you looking for a comfortable and clean place while visiting the city but don't want those manhattan hotel prices.. Does a 3 minute train walk and 15 minute train ride to times square sound appealing to you? Well come stay at     "The Wielingen".
