space: This space is like a guest room at a friend's place. The apartment is very spacious and was newly decorated by my father and myself! You'll have access to the bedroom, Bathroom and dining space if you bring food back to your home!
description: Are you looking for a comfortable and clean place while visiting the city but don't want those manhattan hotel prices.. Does a 3 minute train walk and 15 minute train ride to times square sound appealing to you? Well come stay at     "The Wielingen". This space is like a guest room at a friend's place. The apartment is very spacious and was newly decorated by my father and myself! You'll have access to the bedroom, Bathroom and dining space if you bring food back to your home! Don't be discouraged by the busy neighborhood or building I've lived here for years and have never had any issues. Im sure once your inside you will undoubtedly feel very comfortable in the space. See you Soon :)
neighborhood_overview: Don't be discouraged by the busy neighborhood or building I've lived here for years and have never had any issues. Im sure once your inside you will undoubtedly feel very comfortable in the space. See you Soon :)
house_rules: No Smoking No Pets No parties

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: My host Jermain went out of his way to make things really comfy for me during my stay. The listing was as described if not better. Neighborhood is plenty safe. Again, awesome family, awesome experience and will be back some where down the road im sure :)

The listing was accurate, the rooms are newly decorated and refurbished.  The rooms are 5 star quality, it has A/C, the TV has Netflix, and the location is close to the Prospect Park subway station, there are numerous restaurants close by.  Jurmain was an awesome host and was very quick to respond to any questions.  Towels, soap, toothbrushes, and toothpaste were provided.

The entire place is immaculately clean.  It was a great experience! A+++

Jurmain is very friendly and courteous. Me and my friend got delayed by traffic and checked in 3 hours later than planned. The room is spacious and clean. The apartment is very close to the subway station.  We enjoyed our stay in Jurmain's place!

Apartment is located a short 5 minute walk from the the nearest train station. As far as the neighborhood for those whom haven't been to NYC its as safe as can be. Never once felt uncomfortable walking late at night back to the room . Host was very attentive to neatness and cleanliness which is a major plus so don't worry about any critters. Host also would also check on you if you needed anything or to simply ask how the stay was so far. Very nice gesture. Room has wifi, a/c and you have access to the kitchen if needed. Bathroom supplies are also provided for use. I would stay there again for sure on my next visit. Stadium is also very near yankee stadium for those planning to attend games which was my main reason visiting nyc.

It was a great experience. The apartment is clean, well-stocked, and super close to the subway station. Jurmain was very nice and he helped us however he could with navigating the city , making us feel comfortable, giving us air conditioning, etc..

The listing is so accurate. The house is so neat and spacious. Jurmain and his dad are amazing hosts; they gave directions and suggestions of where to go and how to get there. There's a big supermarket where you can get all the groceries you want.

The train is just few minutes walk and links to Manhattan and Brooklyn easily. The host was so nice to let us use his landline to call for cab. He even gave cab numbers and addresses.

My sister and I had a great time staying at this apartment and will surely stay there again next time I'm in the States if it's available.

Jurmain and his dad were really nice the house is super clean they made sure my husband and i feel like at home they always ask if we neede it anything i would recomend them
Anytime the room is super big the decoration is perfect 5star the neighbor hood is safe the train is super close to the house!!!

We came back from a wedding really late and needed to stay in the city because we live far. It is also our first time using this app as well so I had no idea what to expect and it was a great experience and he was very very accommodating to say the least. I felt very welcome and comfortable and he even offered us water when we got there which was definitely on my mind lol. Overall the night went great and the toothbrush soaps etc. provided were an unexpected plus for us. Also everything was simple and really clean I'd definitely stay there again anytime highly recommend this place

My husband and I wish we could give Jurmain six stars!  Not only was he fantastic, but the room was beautiful, comfortable, and private.  His father is charming and Jurmain is just the nicest person.  And travel is so easy!  We were in Central Park about twenty minutes after stepping out his front door.  Honestly, if you have the option to book here, do yourself the favor and make it happen!  Would book again in a heartbeat!

Have you ever been to a hotel you felt welcome and at home in? Well that's the Wielingen! 
On a serious note, we had a great time and Jurmain and his father were wonderful hosts. Everything in the description is precise and Jurmain went above and beyond to make our stay as pleasant as possible. The neighborhood is quiet, the main subway across Manhattan is 6min walking distance, and even late at night the Bx6 bus stops within 30 metres of the apartment. Everything was clean and well equipped  (including fresh towels toothbrushes etc. if needed), the bed was very comfortable, the room is cool by itself even though it was scorching outside (but has AC), and most of all... the kind nature and ready availability of our hosts made for a great stay.

We just stayed for one day at The Wielingen, but we could not have found any better host than Jurmain. He waited patiently, even though we were around one hour late, made sure every thing was nice and clean, offered us refreshments and generally was a perfect host.

If you ever visit NYC, stay at the Wielingen, and don't be discouraged by its location in the Bronx, we felt save and secure, for our stay!

Jurmain was lovely and accommodating. He left chocolates under the pillow which was so sweet. The neighborhood is pretty deep into the Bronx, if you take a cab calculate in about 40 dollars from Manhattan to your budget
Although we only stayed one night it was perfect .  The room was so clean and had everything we needed. 5 mins walk to the subway.  Would defiantly recommend this place to anyone . Thanks again !

Super nuit chez Jurmain. 
La chambre est très propre, décorée avec goût, la salle de bain privé est tres fonctionelle. Jurmain est tres aimable, et serviable. Je recommande

This place is awsome! We really enjoyed our time there. Jurmain and his dad are great hosts and they made us feel like at home. The location is safe, I felt a little bit scared at the beginnig but never felt uncomfortable walking back during night. We will stay there again when we come back to NYC.
Very nice room and very nice hosts. 5 min from train, easy to find. I would stay there again.

Hi Jurmain,
I just wanted to let you know that your place was awesome, you are a very welcoming person and a great host. The room you provide for the hostess is probably one of the nices rooms I ever been in it. Thank you very much, I really enjoyed the time at your place.

Llegamos a la casa de Jurmain y nunca nos abrió la puerta, luego le llamamos muchas veces a su celular y nunca contestó, aparte de esto el sitio parece inseguro, mucha gente fumando marihuana en las esquinas y de mal aspecto. Pasaron los días y nos toco conseguir hotel en otro lado con unos precios elevados, Jurmain nunca mas volvió a aparecer y nos quedo debiendo el dinero que pagamos por esta aplicación.
Jermain was a wonderful host and made me feel welcome. The house was super clean and comfortable. The location was great and I'd definitely recommend.

Jurmain was very welcoming and communication pre-stay was good. The heat in the apartment was very difficult to cope with throughout our stay and wasn't able to be altered. We found our interactions with Jurmain's father to be uncomfortable at times and he was very particular about the rules in the house. We were aware that he would go into our room while we were out which we were not particularly comfortable with. During our stay the curtain rail came out of the wall in the bedroom and a bedside ornament was broken. Jurmain and his father were not accommodating of these incidents despite us replacing the ornament to the best of our abilities. Generally we felt uncomfortable in this setting and chose to leave earlier on our final day than anticipated.

Jurmain was very responsive to all my questions. The room was as depicted and very clean, spacious for my purposes. The neighborhood was a little intimating at first, but found it to be a safe place to walk, with the bus stop only two blocks away.
Jurmain was very friendly and helpful, the room was bed and clean, very close to the subway, great location.

It's a very nice apartment, Jurmain and his father are very kind people, willing to help :-) The description of the apartment is correct and has everything a traveller might need. The location is good, two subway lines are close to the apartment that lead right into the city. I would definitely stay here again, and I recommend it to anyone staying in New York.

Jurmain is an excellent host - he warmly welcomed me into the house. I loved Jurmain responsiveness and instant interaction. He is just up there - responding to any question within a matter of minutes. The room matches the description. Bathroom is clean, with clean towels. The location is excellent - the ideal walking distance to public transportation: buses and trains. After Jurmain had checked me in and assured I had everything I needed he quietly disappeared giving me whole of privacy. I would definitely book his place again or recommend it to a friend traveling to NY and wanting to stay in the Bronx.
Thanks a lot for this great stay. It was perfect at all and we had a wonderful time. It was a pleasure to meet you and your family. When we come back to NYC we would take the same place to live.

This place is awesome! 
Although it's in Bronx and the train ride to Times Square is about 30min, its worth it. 
Jurmain, his brother and dad were super helpful and welcoming. 
The room was so cute and the walk to the subway is less than 5min plus my boyfriend really wants to go back there lol! 
Before the stay I read the comments of some ppl saying that the neighborhood can seem a bit sketchy (and it can seem like that especially for someone like me - a Scandinavian first time in NY)
but my boyfriend and I thought that there's really nothing to worry about. 
All in all -  i totally recommend it!

We had a wonderful time with Jurmain at his Bronx apartment! The apartment was spacious, super clean and well equipped with everything a guest might need :) The room was large, the bed was comfy, the shower was strong and hot and the location was convenient and easy to find!

Jurmain was a warm host who shared his experiences of NYC with us and who was always up for a chat or to answer NYC questions. The only thing a guest might need to be aware of is the five or so flights of stairs to get to the apartment. We had backpacks so we were fine but guests with suitcases may struggle when they first arrive. 

Thanks for a a wonderful stay! Let Nick and I know if you are ever in Australia!

My stay here was great.There house is beautiful and you can tell they take pride in the cleanliness of it.The room was very spacious and the bed was extremely comfortable me and my boyfriend where joking about moving in.We definitely intended on going back some time soon

The house was very clean other than the bath tub needs a good scrubbing I wish there was a TV in the room also there was no coffee treats watering anything provided the host was very nice and very accommodating only advice I would give is to not look this place at short notice

Jurmain  and his dad were pretty understanding with our last minute reservation request. They were very accommodating not to mention the place is super cozy and warm. Would def recommend this place and stay again if I ever needed to.

Jurmain is a very nice host. We felt very welcome at his house and the room was very clean (just sometimes a bit too hot in it haha). 
If we needed help with anything he was here to help us. He showed us everything we wanted to know on a map and was very kind. When the Phone of my friend was stolen, he helped a lot even after we left New York. He even drove us to the Newyark Airport for only 50$ (a taxi would have been 100$ or even more). Just start early enough - I nearly missed my flight :P 
Thanks for this great accomodation. We would definitely recommend to stay there.
Awesome stay! Awesome dude! Awesome house! What else can I say?
Jurmain is truly a professional, he made sure the space was warm and very welcoming. Job well done

This was my first experience with Airbnb. I was unsure about how it would be staying at another persons home. But as soon as me and my girlfriend arrived, I felt at ease. Jurmain, is a wonderful host, he even gave us complementary toothbrushes and soap, and we had our own silverware and bowls. Jurmains hospitality, and natural and easy going personality along with the energy of the house made it feel like a getaway. Two thumbs up for this place.
Very nice and warm place! Loved the stay at Jurmain's. The room was very clean and comfortable.
Jurmain was great host and so helpful. Everything was clean and place was nice! Definitely 5 star place!

My stay at Jurmain's was great! I loved the neighborhood and it's proximity to the Subway. I loved the apartment and it spaciousness. Although I did not meet Jurmain, his constant contact was much appreciated. He and his brother, Quincy, were very hospitable. I look forward to staying there again the next time I'm in NYC.

I was a last minute, late Sunday night booking and Jurmain took very good care to accommodate my emergency need.

During my stay he made sure to check in with me and made me feel like I was at home.

I felt pretty at home. At first I felt strange because This was my first time experiencing Airbnb, and I did nit except the residents to be present through oUT our stay. However, after a few moments that feeling left I was completely comfortable. The experience made me feel like I knew them, or as if I was visiting family. They were very nice, conversational and peace. I really appreciate how clean and organized the place was. The location was perfect for what I needed, very closet to public transportation and less than 15 minutes away from Momma's Hip Hop Kitchen  event that I was attended, so that was great.

My stay was pretty comfortable and relaxing. My friend and I enjoyed the room. She was able to enjoy NYC for the first time considering where we stayed was closer to Manhattan. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to stay in The Bronx.

Just a 5 minutes walk from the metro station (prospect ave) and 35 minutes ride to downtown.  We felt really safe in the neighbourhood. Jurmains father makes sure that the flat is clean all the time :) also Jurmain is a very friendly host who makes you feel very welcome. The room is exactly as described -  cozy and quiet spacious. Thank you for giving us such a nice space during our nyc stay!

As other folks have said, Jurmaine and his dad are very friendly and accommodating and the room and bathroom are spotless. This was a great place for us to stay.

It might be helpful for folks to know that the apartment is a 4th floor walk up and, for the night-owls, the directly east facing.

The apartment was beautiful and the all of the hosts, Jurmain, his brother, and his father, were all incredibly accommodating. The room feels safe and private and is stocked with everything you might need when traveling: towels, soap, and a toothbrush. The room and apartment are very clean.

The only downside is the heat: the heater in the apartment seems to never turn off. But there are ways around that: the window can be opened and there is a cooling unit in the room that can be used. 

Overall, this is a great place to stay and I highly recommend it.

Wonderful host. Jurmain was excellent in communicating and very flexible given my unpredictable schedule on the day of arrival.
Space was as advertised; clean, comfortable and spacious.

Definitely recommend.

We had a wounderful stay at the Wielingen. I strongly recommend this place for any stay in NYC. You won't get a better value for your money! The place is nice, neat and spacious and Jurmain and his dad are great people to meet. Walking through the Bronx ain't a problem since the metro station is close by - the way takes only five minutes on two main streets. Been here with my girlfriend after living for three months on the upper eastside and, sure, it is different - but i didn't feel afraid aboy my girlfriend and me at any time. Jurmain is a superb host - always nice, friendly, calm and super-responsive prebooking AND during your stay. You can ask him or his dad about anything you like and they will always make your stay even more comfortable than it already is. This includes tips for your stay, but also the possibility to use their personal pc and printer; his Dad even offeres me to borrow his car and, for a low wage, Jurmain would even bring you to the airport when your stay ends. All in all i can state: i had a lot of doubts about staying in the bronx with my gf. but they all turned out to be unreasonable and i am more than glad that i stayed with my decision to spend my vacation at The Wielingens - great place, great people!

We had a pleasant stay at Jurmain's place. The place was very well-kept and clean. When Jurmain wasn't there, his father kept the appartment. Jurmain was very courteous by texting us to  ensure we were all right.
The appartment is 5/10 min away from the metro station, however, it took us often 1 hour to get to midtown/lower mahattan as express trains were not always available.

Jurmain apartment was big and clean, bad was comfortable.
Also bathroom was claen and nice.
Surroundings is safety.
There is a subway nearby (5 minutes by walk).
Jurmain and his family were very friendly and kind, there was no problem.
Thank you for spending a great time in NY.

Probably the cleanest and best kept house I have seen in my Airbnb experience. Kudos to jurmain and his dad especially for dealing with my tardiness and being there to show me around. Pleasant experience which is hotel-like I must say. 2 and 5 trains were the bane of our existence though- they were doing lots of track work which made getting back at night tough

Jurmain and his dad were very nice and staying in their place was good and clean. We didn't have any problems. Jurmain showed us everything on the map and he recommended us the best places which we should visit what was very helpful.

Jurmain and his dad we're extremely pleasant. Overall our visit was great and they were excellent host. The only thing was the five flight walk-up. With luggage that can be a bit hectic.  They are extremely clean and neat! Overall we enjoyed our stay and it was hassle free.
Jurmain was very welcoming and extremely helpful! His listing was true to its word and he was able to assist with suggestions and directions throughout our stay! The space was very clean as well.

We spent in NYC only 3 days so we were looking for calm and clean place to sleepover. The Jurmain's place provided us everything and even more. The photos which you can find here, are pretty accurate, the room offers everything one can need, including towels, soaps and even toothbrushes. The bed was really comfortable.

The neighborhood is safe. We asked a few people for direction there, and everyone was very nice and willing to help. It takes a few minutes to a subway station (where you can get a direct connection to Lower Manhattan), just like is written in the description. To sum it up, Jurmain, his father and their place made our stay really pleasant. We definitely recommend.

It was generally okay. The neighborhood was not looking like very safe. We had to go there around 11pm and we didn't feel safe. Subway station is very close, 3 blocks.. Host was helpful and the place was silent. However, our bed sheets weren't clean. Host told us repeatedly that he will replace it but when we get in our rooms at night there were hairs of previous guest. The other thing that prospective guests should consider is that the apartment is at the  5th floor and there is no elevator.
Jurmain and his father's apartment provided a spacious and clean space to spend the night in the Bronx. Each were very helpful and gave us good advice on how to get around NYC the best.

Nous avions prévu de visiter une partie de la ville avant d'aller pour la première fois dans la chambre. Jurmain nous a laissé la possibilité d'arriver à l'heure que nous voulions. Il nous a ensuite laisser les clefs pour que nous puissions aller et venir comme bon nous semblait : grâce à cela, nous avons pu visiter Manhattan de nuit. Jurmain et son père sont très accueillants et chaleureux. Son appartement est à proximité d'une bouche de métro avec une ligne directe vers Times Square. Cet appartement est vraiment très intéressant pour ceux qui veulent visiter Manhattan ou même voir le Yankee Stadium.
Jurmain was a great host. Room is exactely as described and shown in the pictures. The apartment is kept neat and tidy and its only a short walk and ride by train into manhatten

Jurmain and his Dad were very kind and accommodating when our flights were cancelled and put our arrival time 8hrs later than planned which meant we arrived around midnight. Their apartment is spotless, as was our room, they made us feel very welcome.  Unfortunately we did cut our stay short as the neighbourhood and travel distance to main sightseeing areas of NYC was too far for our liking. This is absolutely no reflection on Jurmain as the room was exactly as described, and he was absolutely lovely. Pack light, no lift in the building.

Jurmain was great. Very informative & promptly responded to all of my messages. He was good about making me & my gf feel like we had our own space. He was quiet & stayed around only when you needed him. I'd definitely stay here again.

We had a great time! 
Jurmain and also his dad were great hosts! 

The apartment was super clean and neat! 

The subway is just a short walk away which is great to go to Manhattan in about 20 minutes! 

Thanks to Jurmain and his dad
We had such a great time in New York at Jurmain's! The house was very tidy and neat. The access to the subway was pretty good, too. I definitely recommend this room and thanks again for having us.

Non abbiamo incontrato Jurmain personalmente perchè era fuori per lavoro, ma siamo stati accolti da suo padre e suo fratello, che sono stati fin da subito molto disponibili ed amichevoli. L'alloggio era molto pulito ed in una posizione comoda, vicino 5-10 minuti dalla fermata della subway, con linea che porta direttamente a Manhattan.
Il quartiere dà l'impressione di non essere molto sicuro di notte, anche se devo ammettere che c'è sempre qualche pattuglia della polizia nei dintorini e che a me ed al mio compagno non è mai accaduto nulla di male in 5 giorni di soggiorno.
Nel complesso l'esperienza è stata molto positiva.

I am a 4th year medical student, and I did a rotation in nearby Bronx-Lebanon Hospital, and I stayed with Jurmain and his family for 30 days. Over the course of that time, I felt right at home as if I was part of the family. The space was as described and listed, and the home is kept immaculately clean by Jurmain and his father. They are attentive to anything you may need, and have been very helpful to me throughout a difficult hospital rotation. The neighborhood is safe and I had no issues in the time I was there, and I was often coming and going early in the morning and late at night. The location is a quick 10 minute walk to the 5 train for easy access to Manhattan. I would recommend this place to anyone without hesitation.

Mis padres se alojaron alli por 5 noches, la experiencia fue buena, el cuarto cumplio con lo prometido, facil acceso al metro, el padre de Jurmain muy atento a las necesidades de mis padres!!!, la zona es segura, en general buen sitio para vivir la experiencia de conocer NEW YORK!!!

Great clean apartment and great space. Jurmain's dad had a plethora of information to help us get around! There is no elevator and they are on the 5th floor, so recommend packing light. Bed was a little extra firm, but we slept well.

I only stayed one night, but it was a very clean, nice space. Only complaints were the 5 flights of stairs I had to climb and the firm mattress. The room is exactly as pictured and the hosts made sure that I had what I needed.

I never got to meet Jermain but his father was very welcoming when we reached the house. He was an amazing person and very informative. the house was better than what I expected and we felt comfortable and at home. The privacy was very well in the house and we did not feel uncomfortable at all.

This was one of the greatest trips I ever had. The reason why, the host Jurmain treated us very kindly and gently. The room and house were very tidy, and clean. Me and my girlfriend were extremely satisfied with kindness of he and his father. Thank you Jurmain. God bless you!
Jurmain place was a nice found in one of the busiest weekend for NYC, the marathon's one. The place is nice and the host thoughtful.
Although, there was a limited communication , we enjoyed staying. The host and his father are so sweet and well- mannered.  I would recommend anyone to spend at his place.

This was my very first time using this service and my stay was AMAZING! The hosts were genuine and kind, making my stay that much more enjoyable. I recommend Jurmain's home to anyone looking for a cozy, welcoming AND affordable stay in the city.

It was awesome to stay at Jurmain's. Really clean apartment and close to the subway. His family made us feel welcomed, specially his father whom with I had many pleasant talks about Football (soccer) and basketball.

Jurmain's place was in great condition and both he and his dad were very friendly and accommodating. The place is just a 5 minute walk from the subway station, so you can be in DT Manhattan in 40 minutes.
This room in the Bronx is a great value for staying close to New York city. The facilities are clean and tidy and the hosts are polite.
Jurmain and his father were very welcoming. I had everything I needed for my stay. The room is very clean and overall I enjoyed my stay. Much recommended.

This was ours first experience with Airbnb. The Wielingen (father  and two sons) are very kind,helpful and pleasant. Jurmain was such a great host,easy going,ready to answer any ours questions about NYCity. The appartement is impecable - clean,warm,cozy...Our room was big,well heated and bed super comfy ! With a little luck we found parking on the street.Location and neigborhood is quiet,safe and subway station is about  less then 10 min walking distance. Thank you for having us !! We would like to stay at your place again for our next trip to NYC ! Highly recommended !!!!

I had a wonderful stay with Jurmain and his father! The entire apartment is spotless! They were so welcoming and kind and made me feel very much at home. I'm so grateful for their incredible hospitality and would definitely stay with them again if my travels ever bring me back this way!

It was a lovely stay at Jurmains place. He, his father and brother were very kind and accomedating. And were happy to give suggestions or help out if we got any questions. What has to be mentioned is how clean everything is. All in all: Lovely place and you can't beat this price performance ratio.
The host was lovely. The accommodation was pretty good.
It's really good and clean

Jurmain was one of the best persons I ever met. He went out of his way to make me and my cousins feel safe. I was in Bronx for an interview and everything ran really smooth. The house was super clean and house rules were followed appropriately. 
I was so very thankful to him for coming all the way downstairs to get us. If you are staying in this area, Jurmain offers the best accommodation and a real sense of home! All the best to Jurmain for his future guests.

This is amazing place. Its very clean and the host is so nice. The house smell good as well. I came in very late at night because my flight was delayed but they stayed up and waited for me.  Highly recommended!

The place is ok if bathroom is not the cleanest thing you want during your stay. The room was clean. My main issue during the stay was the bad conversation I had with Jurmain's father and overall bad experience i left the place with due to this. Before i booked this place, I had confirmed with Jurmain that if it would be ok if I collect my bags late in the night on the checkout day as my bus back home was at 12 am. He had agreed with that saying it should be perfectly fine if I checkout on time. And hence i booked his place. However his father kept arguing that how it is not correct to do that as his place would look dirty because of this! And I should pay extra if i have to keep the luggage after checkout. He kept arguing even after I told him that jurmain had agreed for this. Ultimately, i had to carry my luggage with me and put it in another storage by paying 40$. While i was completely polite during this conversation, I didn't feel the same. He kept rudely talking to me about that. Overall, i would not recommend this place and would rather pay 20 bucks more to stay at a decent hotel. My first bad experience while booking through airbnb!

The place was ok, Jurmain and his father where helpful.The main issues where the neighborhood, bathroom and the bedsheets. There was only one bathroom for everyone (5 people) and the bedsheets where not changed for the whole time of our stay (10 days)!
A very suitable place to stay. A lovely host and the place is comfortable, clean. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the place
i came super late and Jurmain was ultra accommodating. he was also personable yet respectful of privacy, overall great host and also a great place. highly recommend.

I didn't get to stay at his room that was available but air bnb still charged my credit card and I couldn't get the refund back but jurmain was good enough to meet up with me and give me my money back cash which was greatly appreciated. The man knows how to keep his clients happy lol! I will definitely rent again from jurmain!
Very clean room near the bathroom, downside is its on 5th floor and there's no elavator and the host guest interviend my stay quite often.
Great price, super clean place and very friendly host thanks a lot.
The stay was great. Exactly what we needed for a quick bday weekend getaway. Jurmain and his father were gracious hosts!
Great air bnb

The home was immaculate and Juryman and his father were very friendly. As others have said, it is a walk up 5 flights of stairs, there is no access to coffee in the morning, so keep that in mind if you NEED coffee in the morning. Other than that it was a great experience.

Enjoyed the stay here; the place was clean and the host was great to communicate with. It was great to use a private bedroom/ bathroom at this reasonable price, especially in NY area. The only thing to note is that personally it did not seem like the safest neighborhood, but the place itself was safe and clean.
The Host was very welcoming and attentive to our needs.
Great spot!
I loved it here , very quiet and nice , the area ohk but the room is very nice and clean and the hosy was great

Es war ein sehr sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt. Jurmain und sein Vater sind sehr hilfsbereite und nette Menschen. Sie sorgen sich für deine Sicherheit in New York und das Appartement war sauberer als viele Hotels in Manhattan. Im grossen und ganzen war das bis jetzt der sauberste und netteste Anbieter auf airbnb, welche ich besuchen durfte.
Nice place to stay , clean, near the Subway . We recommand this place

Stephan und ich hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Jurmain. Die Wohnung entspricht den Bildern-alles gut. 5 Stock ohne Lift. max 10 min zur U Bahn. Der Bruder und der Vater waren auch ab und zu da. War supernett und unkompliziert. Gute Lage um New York zu erkunden.

Jurmain, his father, and his brother keep up beautiful, clean, welcoming place to stay! The surrounding area does not feel particularly safe, but once you've come inside (and walked up to the 5th floor), you will feel safe and comfortable.
Jurmain and his father were very nice! The apartment and the room was super clean and organized.
Lovely place, very welcoming which is great when staying in someone else home. Although the flat is not on the island of New York it is only a 15 minute subway ride to Times Square.

Jurmain's place is really comfortable and well-located, very close to the subway stations with two express lines to Manhattan and beyond. Also, he was very friendly and helpful. I would definetely recomend it!
Zimmer + Bad waren sehr sauber und entsprachen vollends den Angaben. Jurmain und sein Vater waren sehr nett. Die Lage ist auch voll okay. Ich würde das Appartement auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen. :)
The place is exactly as advertised, very resonably priced and the Hosts are just that! Jurmain and his father are so hospitable and help with any questions we had about the local area.
The location is very close to all public transportation. Jurmain was very nice and welcoming. The room and the bathroom were always clean. I would definitely stay here again.

I would consider again if traveling lighter. Not ideal  with my large suitcase. Room was not cool when I arrived and weather was really warm. Room had window AC unit which worked well though when I arrived and switched it.
This is a great place to stay if you want to visit NYC for cheap. It has free parking and is about a five minute walk from the subway. The apartment is incredibly clean and pretty spacious.

If you are trying to stay near to the most famous places of NY like time square or central park and you don't want to spend thousands $ this is the perfect place to stay. Jurmain's place is very comfortable and super clean. Jurmain helped me and my wife with everything. The train station is just 3 blocks away and you can go from the house to time sq in only 20 minutes.
Jurmain was very nice. Closer to Yankees stadium and the 2 & 5 train.

Very clean and quiet space...the house rules are stated when you arrive and expected to be followed (shoes off at door, no food in the bedroom, no slamming doors, etc.). Location was nice and easy walk to the subway.
Really nice people. Love the room!!
Great location, clean and nice private room, kind and responsive host. My stay was short but I enjoyed it and I got to rest well. I would recommend to travelers looking for room at this price.
Great place

Jurmain was a perfect host, he made our stay so easy to and comfortable, he helped us a lot and was ready to answer any of our questions. His father and brother were so warm and welcoming, the place is very clean and the room very quiet. 
Definitely recommend this place
Get place to stay

Jurmain makes you feel right at home when you arrive. He was very kind and attentive to any needs you may request. Even though the area around his apartment is a little sketchy, I still rate my overall stay a five-star rating!!!
Great host and a beautiful home. A good commute from Manhattan and Brooklyn, we enjoyed taking the subway and seeing the city.
Really great
We were much early than the expected time but Jurmain and his brother were kind enough to let us in. Great hosts who allow you privacy. Thank you for the warm welcome.
the place was clean, modern and communication with host was great, we had everything what we needed.
Cozy and clean room to come home to after spending all day in the city! Convenient location for transit access, and short affordable drive if you're planning on using a ride share app!
Good place, VERY clean

Excelente place great host,clean,and neat.
The only thing is that need to walk 5 floors no elevator.

Jurmain's place was well cared for and made for an enjoyable stay. Sure the neighborhood might not be perfect, but we found that most everyone was very friendly and helpful. It's close to Yankee Stadium, so that was great! Really a good place for the price! Jurmain and his family were very welcoming and accommodating.

Jurmains place is located in a busy part of the Bronx. The inside of the apartment is very nice and tidy. Jurmain is a gracious host who made sure I had everything I needed and took interest in what I would be doing in NYC. When it was time to check out Jurmain offered to get a drink in the city  if I ever returned.

The room was clean and comfortable and the hosts made it even better. Very hospitable and I was surprised by a welcome note! Great people who went above and beyond for the stay. I definitely recommend if anyone wants a quick stay that’s flawless.
Very clean and nice place in Bronx. Amazing prace, considering you are just few miles from downtown. Great place for travelers !

Très bel appartement chez Jurmain et son papa. 
Propreté impeccable, chambre très spacieuse. Pour les repas, nous disposions d'un micro-onde afin de nous faire à manger. 
Accessible facilement en métro. 
A recommander !

Jurmain is a very nice host. Only one thing that bugged me during the time was parking. I know it's tough for parking inside NYC, if you come early enough, there will be some space for you, but if you are late like us (9pm), it was really impossible to find a parking spot. I still think Jurmain's place is a nice getaway for NYC.
Was very clean and tidy, close walk to the subway and he was very nice! Good price for the service!
Very friendly and welcoming host!

Absolutely delightful stay! In a great neighborhood and the apartment was beautiful! The apartment was so clean and homey. Jurmain and his father were exceptionally accommodating and sweet aka amazing hosts. This place is a wonderful find for all travelers to the city.
Jurmain is very nice. A good place to stay.
Great place to stay, although the father was a little brash at times regarding house cleanliness, and not allowing to bring food into the room.
Excelente

Was an amazing host, this was a wonderful and quiet place. Even though it’s in New York I was still able to sleep the night away. Very spacious, very clean and comfortable. Was able to do late check out with no hassle. Will book again.

The Weilington is a spacious, well decorated home just two blocks away from the subway station. This was my first airbnb experience, and Jurmain and his brother went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. We immediately felt at home at the cozy apartment. The place is located just a few blocks from the subway station making daily trips to Time Square and the rest of NY easily accessible. Jurmain gave us great tips on what to see and was very helpful when we asked to check in early. His response time was also quick. Overall, we had a great trip made even better by our amazing hosts. I'd definitely stay again during my next NY trip! Thanks guys!
Awesome short stay. Jurmain was very nice and helpful. My daughter and I felt very comfortable. Transportation was easy and the space was very clean. I highly recommend this Airbnb!

Jurmain and his brother were greats host and I recommend their place! Very clean space and comfortable. Good location near a Subway station "only 4 blocks", there are bakery, market, restaurants everything you need near.
I really enjoyed the place and was very clean and calm, the neiborhood is ok and he is very kind person.
Great stay
Clean, comfortable, cozy. Jurmain's place is situated in a working-class neighborhood, the kind of place that most turists don't see. That makes it a unique place!
Everything was great not a single problem with this place and for a very decent price.

Superbe emplacement,proche du métro à moins de 10 minute à pied, tout plein de commerce à proximité ,chambre très correct avec toilette privé
Hôte très sympathique et très discret à la fois.
Superbe appartement très bien entretenu et propre je vous le recommande sans aucune hésitation.
Jimmy was very cordial and open to accommodating our needs!
Very nice home
非常干净的房间,离地铁站很近,地铁站旁边也有Starbucks和dunkin donuts 之类的咖啡店,房东也很友好｡
Großartiger Aufenthalt und durchwegs angnehm. Nur zu empfehlen :)

To compare to other places I been to other places were better quality.  No soap, no paste, no towels, no tv in room, no extra blanket, blanket was looking too old, nothing to (Website hidden by Airbnb) only thing he offer is bed but he cool. Those little stuffs I mention matters.

Nous recommendons fortement ! Rapport qualité/prix au top !
Jimmy est un hôte très sympathique, discret et accueillant. La chambre ainsi que l’appartement en entier sont impeccables. Nous avons apprécié découvrir un autre quartier que Manhattan pendant nos quelques jours à New York, d’autant plus que l’emplacement est très bien desservi par les transports en commun.

The room and apartment was neat and clean. The shared bathroom was very clean with towels, soap, toothpaste and toothbrush provided if needed. No coffee or breakfast provided, but use of the kitchen and dining room was available. Jimmy and his father were kind and accommodating. We were asked to remove our shoes once we entered the apartment. The apartment is up five flights of stairs with no elevator. We would stay here again. The price was reasonable.
Jimmy’s place is very reasonable. He is a good host and makes us comfortable with our stay. It’s a thumbs up
i enjoy it and i like that place
Jimmy is a ten star host!!
Jimmy is a great host. His place is very convenient and minutes away from the metro. The room is clean and quiet. Great find for the price.
Very nice apartment, very clean, nice hosts.
Jimmy was great. Very good communication (within 3 minutes), house was very clean, bed was comfortable, and host helped with last minute accommodations.

Really nice place to be ! 
Everything was clean, close to the city (20 min by subway), and the hospitality was amazing.

Thanks a lot!
We didn't meet Jimmy in person, but we had a fine communication. The room is comfortable and clean and close to a metro station. Recommended overall!

If you are looking for a place to sleep, then you will find it here. The room was basic and the hosts kind and mostly kept to themselves. There are 5 flights of  stairs, that I am not sure were mentioned in the listing.  The bedding could use a more thorough cleaning as well as a full set of sheets.  In general we were comfortable and the wifi worked well.
Muy buen hospedaje
Great little place to stay and wonderful host!

My first experience with Airbnb was very interesting. Jimmy's space is welcoming and provided me with well-being and comfort. The space is close to supermarket, laundry and subway station. Coming by car and arriving before 6 pm you park close to the place. Jimmy is your father are communicatives and welcoming.

The space offered is comfortable and welcoming, very close to the subway station, which in less than 30 minutes takes you to the heart of Manhattan. Between the space and the subway station there are small shops for private supply.
I will go back next time
Great host and great communication
This was a very good stay. From the time I arrived until I left the host was kind and gracious.

Jimmy's father welcomed us even if it was late.
The room is large and clean.
We really liked our stay

Jimmy was great! Very hospitable, welcoming, and a genuinely good guy. Welcomed me and my girlfriend with open arms into his stylish apartment, and everything was comfortable and ready. Easy access for store visits, and in a great part of the Bronx. Great host, and definitely a perfect place for skeptical first timers!
I highly recommended Jimmy’s place. Quiet place and very clean.

Jimmy and his father were very gracious hosts. We were greeted by jimmy and immediately offered a glad of water. The bedroom, bathroom, and apartment were very clean. We were supplied towels and soap and We used the fridge for our left overs and the over to heat them up. jimmy invited us to use his dining and living areas and let us watch Netflix! The area looks questionable if you are not from New York or are unfamiliar with the Bronx, however, the neighbors were beyond friendly and we always felt safe walking to the metro stop. The metro stop is a few blocks away. We ordered food from a few places on line and everything was AMAZING. Overall an awesome stay, thanks jimmy!

Not as advertised. Host was not there and had his brother haphazardly set up the room. Floor is dusty, there was no fitted sheet on the bed! I had to sleep on top of the comforter as a result. No SOAP and toiletries as advertised, big black spot on the wall. Could have been nice if care was taken to set up the room as advertised. I brought my cousin to the city for her birthday and was embarrassed. I only had a one night stay and didn't realize the extent of it ( like no fitted sheet) only when I was literally about to get in the bed. Host my typically do it right per older review. But it was extremely sloppy. If you book here make sure you check these things first and I'd suggest his brother not set up the room as it was clear he didn't know the expectations listed on the Airbnb.
Not all the informations are listed
Pretty sweet place in the Bronx.
Everything is clean and really nice designed. Jimmy was really nice and helpful. Only can recommend it.
You can expect a quiet, clean room to stay in.
Great host
Clean place, very warm during winter

Clean place room as in picture but no tolietries drugs sold down stairs in the building and didn’t give me no keys had to wait outside with my daughter was ask to remove my shoes and felt so uncomfortable ended up leaving and getting a hotel my daughter felt safer

Overall - the apartment is clean, the room satisfactory. The residence is on the 5th floor with no elevator (for anyone who has reasons to avoid the climb). Beware of the man of the house (not Jimmy), do not expect a cheerful, pleasant personality...
Jimmy is a nice guy.
Jimmy est très accueillant, l'appartement est très beau et propre. Les propriétaires habitent l'appartement. Situé à environ 45 minutes de métro de Time Square.

name: Nice apartment near Camp Nou - A/C and Wifi
summary: Enjoy your stay in Barcelona in this little and confortable apartment for 3 guests. Its close to Camp Nou (5min walking), and between 2 metro stations.  You have everything you need, wifi, Smart TV, 2 beds (1 double), towels, shower gel, etc.
space: Air conditioner, WIFI, Smart TV 42" in the living room, and small TV in the bedroom,  equipped kitchen with stuff and some drinks for your wellcome, bathroom equipped with clean towels, shower gel and shampoo. Desktop for your bussiness and a small balcony.
description: Enjoy your stay in Barcelona in this little and confortable apartment for 3 guests. Its close to Camp Nou (5min walking), and between 2 metro stations.  You have everything you need, wifi, Smart TV, 2 beds (1 double), towels, shower gel, etc. I will always be available on the telephone for any problem, doubt, tourism information, etc. I will help all I can. Nearest metro to go to the center is "Badal", 3 minute walking and you are there. To get to the downtown, 10 minutes by metro. To go to the airport take metro Collblanc (5 minute walking) and take L9. It takes 20 minutes to go to the airport. HUTB-014518
neighborhood_overview: The apartment its 5 min walking from Camp Nou, the biggest stadium in Europe where football club Barcelona plays every week. You can feel it every saturday when the streets get the joy of people going to the match. Its in the middle of two metro stations (2 min. walking), and you can be in the center of Barcelona in just 10 minutes or less. The area is full of live, markets and bussinesses. Everything you need is here.
transit: Nearest metro to go to the center is "Badal", 3 minute walking and you are there. To get to the downtown, 10 minutes by metro. To go to the airport take metro Collblanc (5 minute walking) and take L9. It takes 20 minutes to go to the airport.
interaction: I will always be available on the telephone for any problem, doubt, tourism information, etc. I will help all I can.
house_rules: I expect you to respect the neigbours and the apartment. Just be like you are in your house :)

host.host_about:
Hi! I'm Nil, 30 from Barcelona.
I like travelling, nature, animals and sports. 
I will help you in anything you need!

reviews.comments: First of all, i would like to say Nil is a very cool dude. Communication was fantastic. He was patient with our requests and our slight delay to his AMAZING apartment. Seriously, he provided everything i could think of. His apartment is complete. Very clean, nice,tidy and sooo comfortable. He even left his xbox 360 with games and a few cans of coke/beers with CHIPS!. His apartment is the best place to stay if u wanna catch a live Barca match. Thank you nil for the wonderful airbnb experience

Спасибо! Все было просто замечательно! Квартира соответствовала описанию и фотографиям. Нил всегда был готов помочь, за что ему отдельное спасибо, он был очень отзывчивым. Метро в 5 минутах ходьбы. А для любителей футбола, стадион Камп Ноу в 10 минутах ходьбы. Вокруг достаточно продуктовых магазинов, есть аптеки, пекарни. 
Рекомендую.

Très bien reçu par nil , les photos sont exactement comme l'appartement et le quartier est très bien placé à 10 mins de tous aussi bien les plages, centre ville.
Merci encore pour cette semaine.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Barcelone. L'appartement de Nil était très propre, fonctionnel, et idéalement placé pour la visite du Camp Nou et du métro. L'accueil de Nil était très agréable et positif.

We arrived by car with our 2 bicycles and we stayed only 4 nights.
Nil not only greeted us but also helped us bring some things upstairs.
He is not only kind and gracious but really thoughtful.
Communication before, during and after our stay was excellent

The apartment is clean and plenty of place to put our things and the food we bought to cook. It's not a big place but we managed and really enjoyed it.

I recommend this to anyone who wants to stay in Barcelona area.
Thank you Nil.

El apartamento es tal como lo describe,tiene todo lo necesario para una agradable estancia.  Muy limpio y ordenado. Se agradece toda la información turística disponible. Un barrio muy tranquilo, con tiendas y supermercados. Estación de metro a 5 minutos andando que te sitúa en el centro de Barcelona en poco tiempo. Muy atento y pendiente de nosotros, desde antes de llegar, una muy buena y agradable comunicación. Si volvemos a Barcelona,  sin duda repetiremos.

Thanks for hosting, everything was nice, I felt myself like home, apartment was really nice, I ever will have the chance to visit Barcelona again, I will stay at this place for sure. 
the host was nice and friendly.
Nil is responsible. His apartments is cozy, clean and has all what we need. We are happy to chose Nil.

The apartment have really good localisation: close to supermarket, Camp Nou and metro station. Neighborhood wasn't too noisy, so we sleept well. Nil is really nice host, very helpfull and flexible. He povided us not only basic towel and shower gel, but also some refreshments, chips and even haribo bears! Who don't like them?! We spent really good time in his apartment, you can feel like home there.
 I fully recommend it :)

Nil was a great host! This was a last minute booking so was happy for Nil to accommodate us. His apartment is complete. Very clean, nice,tidy and comfortable.The check in process was very smooth and the apartment had all of the amenities we needed,this place showed exactly as it was advertised. Thank you very much for everything.

nil is a great guy!! he helped us with everything we asked!! the house was just like the photos and had everything that we needed inside, was very clean, realy awesome everthyning,i suggest it!!  thank you nil for everything we had a great time!!

Hôte sympa avec de délicates attentions. Appart fonctionnel, propre et très bien situé.
Je le recommande fortement
Nil est un hôte agréable, l'appartement se situe dans un quartier populaire très tranquille et plein de commerces sympathiques.

Nil is a fantastic host. Super fast reservation confirmation and great communication throughout. Greeted me at the flat despite some delays and made sure I felt comfortable, like being at home. The flat was exactly as described, really cosy and perfect for a couple. The neighbourhood itself is very peaceful (great nights sleep) and ideally located if you're in Barcelona to watch FCB. It's a 5min walk to the stadium but you also have two metro stations, Collbanc & Badal (L5), 2mins away if you wish to visit other areas of BCN. Will definetly be back to stay again.

Nous avons passé un super séjour. Nil nous a attendu malgré l'heure tardive et nous avons beaucoup apprécié. L'appartement est exactement comme il est décrit sur l'annonce. Je peux que vous le recommander. Merci Manuela
Everything was very clean, comfortable and in a good neighborhood! Thank you very much!

11 stars out of 10.  Nil is friendly, very-very helpful all the time, before/during/after the journey. His apartment is ideal: clean, well-equipped, comfortable, near the Camp Nou. A little piece of heaven. Thank you!

Il proprietario é una persona molto educata e disponibile. Per quanto riguarda la casa: dovrebbe investire di piú sulle esigenze della casa come : cuscini piu comodi . per il resto, é andata tutto bene

Nil's apartment was, yet, another wonderful experience using Airbnb.  Though not located in downtown Barcelona, the apartment was less than a 5 minute walk to easily grab the Metro for any part of the downtown area or the Renfe Train, all of which were only a few stops away.  
Nil's communication wish us was most excellent.  He stayed in contact with us prior to and upon arrival at BCN to give us instruction and assistance with where/what/how to easily get to his metro stop without spending a lot of money.  And, though the airport train was experiencing delays, Nil waited at his metro stop for us and helped us with all our luggage to his apartment. 
We found Nil's apartment to be exactly as described.  It was quaint and had everything we needed for a week's visit.  He even surprised us with a few welcoming gifts having known of our long day of flying.  He had a table full of information about the city and for getting around, points of interests, excursions, etc.  This made it easy for us to plan some activities when we first arrived.  
We found Nil's apartment to be in a safe area with lots of shopping right around the block.  It was clean and decorated nicely.  He provided all the essentials, such as soaps, shampoo, and laundry detergent.  He had pins available to dry clothes off the balcony as well as a table and chairs for having coffee.  We appreciated his Moka Pot for our morning espresso and enjoyed making our breakfast in the apartment before heading out to explore the city.  
Nil was a very hospitable host and went out of his way to make sure we got what we needed based on our personal interests.  He texted days/times/locations based on information we requested which made it easy for us to visit those things with the time we had.  He also printed tickets we needed and had them ready for us with no issue.
We didn't spend much time watching TV, but we did appreciate that there were two as we enjoyed music from the one in the bedroom. Also, we appreciated that the wifi connection was fast and reliable.  The bedding was very comfortable, and we rested well.  Nil even had extra blankets and comforters, which we prefer.  There was more than enough space for storing our belongings out of the way, and though a small space, we never once felt like we were tripping over one another.  
Nil's laid back personality made packing up to leave easy and  stress-free.  He met with us at check-out and asked for feedback/ suggestions for the apartment because he cares about the service he is providing.  He helped us carry all our luggage down the one flight of stairs and hailed us a cab and communicated to the driver our destination.  Obviously, we quite enjoyed our stay at Nil's and would definitely recommend his place to others.  Lori & Chris

Gleich vorweg: das Apartment war für uns perfekt und wir würden es jederzeit wieder buchen. Nil ist sehr sympathisch und hilfsbereit und hat immer sehr schnell auf unsere Anfragen reagiert.
Das Apartment war sehr sauber und hat alles, was man braucht. Wir fühlten uns sofort wie zuhause. Nil dachte sogar an eine "Grundausstattung" von verschiedenen Sorten Bier (was wir Deutsche natürlich sehr hoch anrechnen :-)), leckere Knabbereien und Sekt und Trauben für die Silvesternacht!!!
Die Wohnung ist sehr ruhig, man hört nichts vom Straßenlärm.

Von uns gibt es eine uneingeschränkte Empfehlung! Für ein Paar die perfekte Wohnung und guter Ausgangspunkt für Unternehmungen in Barcelona.
Vielen Dank, Nil!


First of all: the apartment was perfect for us and we would rent it again. Nil is very sympathic and helpful and always responded to our messages immediately.
The apartment was very clean and has everything you need. We felt like home. Nil even thought of basic equipment like different sorts of beer (which we Germans appreciate, of course :-)) and delicious munchies, sparkling wine and grapes for New Year's Eve!!!
The apartment is very quiet , you hear nothing from the traffic noise.

We recommend this place without any restrictions! A perfect apartment for a couple and a good starting point for trips to Barcelona down town.
Thank you very much, Nil!

Nil is so kind, when we have some problems and questions,he always give us some ideas and help. The room is clean and comfortable, the most important thing is it is so convenient to anywhere in this city. Barcelona is a lovely and full of enthusiasm.

Très agréable week-end à Barcelone. Nil est très gentil et très attentionné envers ses hôtes. L'appartement est agreable, propre et bien situé dans un quartier tranquille et proche du métro. Je recommande à tous cette location.

Petit studio pratique,  propre et très calme. 
A refaire!

Nil is a great host. He was very flexible with us when deciding a check-in time and he had bought some drinks and snacks for us upon arrival. The apartment was very clean and nice and Nil provided us with extra blankets and an electric heater in case we got cold. The apartment is very well organized and even though it is small, there was plenty of room to store our things away. We are glad to recommend Nil as a host any time.

A wonderful host, extremely helpful. Good information on Barcelona and happy to share her local knowledge of the area. The apartment was well situated, close to public transport and Camp Nou stadium. Would recommend staying with Nil to all travellers going to Barcelona or Camp Nou. Thank you Nil for a wonderful stay

Nil is a great host and the apartment is really nice. it is as described and have everything you expect: TV, 2 beds, fully equip kitchen and even a washer.
Nil was easy to communicate with and helped us to find the apartment easily.
He even surprised us with extra things in the apartment which i will not reveal :-)
i cannot believe that anyone will be disappointed after visiting Nil's apartment.

It was a very nice stay at the studio of Nil. A clean appartment, everything we needed. We even got a little surprise when we arrived, it was much appreciated, thank you Nil. 
We had a tiny disadvantage, it is an old building and the isolation wasn 't that great. So we heard a lot of noise, but we solved it with earplugs. Problem solved. 

Thank you. Greetings, Elie en Lisa from Belgium.

Pasamos muy bien en Barcelona. NIl nos recibió con calidez y respondió a nuestras preguntas. Durante la estadía le hice consultas y respondió rápido y con buena información. 
El apartamento es tal cómo está descripto. Es muy práctico y está bien equipado. La zona nos resultó muy cómoda, porque fuimos a ver un partido del Barca y fuimos y volvimos del Camp caminando en unos 10-15 minutos.

El alojamiento es tal y como figura en la descripción y en las fotos, todo muy limpio, una zona muy tranquila y cercano al metro para ir a cualquier parte. Además Nil es un gran anfitrión que te ayuda en todo lo que necesitas y muy detallista también. Sin duda repetiriamos.

Our host Hil, stayed in contact with us prior to and upon arrival at BCN to give us instruction and assistance with where/what/how to easily get to his metro stop without spending a lot of money. And, though the Metro was experiencing delays due to strike. We found Nil's apartment to be exactly as described. It was quaint and had everything we needed for a three days visit. He even surprised us with a few welcoming gifts having known of our long day of flying. He had a table full of information about the city and for getting around, points of interests, excursions, etc. This made it easy for us to plan some activities when we first arrived. We found Nil's apartment to be in a safe area with lots of shopping right around the block. It was clean and decorated nicely. He provided all the essentials, such as soaps, shampoo, ... 
I would recommend this accommodation to others.

L'appartement de Nil est formidable, dans un quartier avec tous les commerces de proximité et proche du métro, qui mène au centre-ville et directement à l'aéroport El-Prat. L'appartement est confortable et propre et Nil reste à disposition de ses hôtes. 
Nous y avons vraiment passé une super semaine.
Nil was having been very kind to disposition for anything that was needed. The apartment eh very nice and very well equipped. Very close to two metro stations and Camp Nu!!!

Nil is a perfect host, very nice and HELPFUL. Thanks to him and his apartment it was a great time for me and my boyfriend! I will recommend  this apartment everybody, who wants to have a wonderful time in Barcelona!!!

Wir wurden von Nil sehr freundlich empfangen und er hat angeboten, 24 Stunden telefonisch für Fragen zur Verfügung zu stehen, was aber nicht nötig war - wir sahen ihn erst wieder pünktlich zur Übergabe. 
Die Wohnung ist wie beschrieben, gemütlich klein, aber gut mit allem Nötigen und sogar einigen Extras ausgestattet, viele Geschäfte sowie zwei Metrostationen in unmittelbarer Nähe. Man kann sich dort richtig zuhause fühlen, ist durch die gute Anbindung aber auch schnell an den unzähligen tollen Plätzen, die Barcelona zu bieten hat.

Wonderful and very helpful host Nil was very kind to guide us over local places. Though apartment is little cozy, its just perfect for 2-3 days getaway. Clean, neat and with all amenities as mentioned. Camp nou is very close by and apartment is not very far from Train station. We loved our stay !
The apartment was great and very clean!

I booked Nil's apartment and he was so great in getting in contact from the moment I requested until I came back to England. Unfortunately due to an issue in his apartment the day before I was due to arrive, I was unable to stay at Nil's apartment. He contacted me immediately and arranged anther air bnb apartment for me to stay in from another host. He even met me at the metro station to introduce me to the host and checked that I was ok. Although I can't comment on Nil's apartment, I can comment on how amazing he was at helping me and I am confident that he is a brilliant host to those who stay at his place! Thanks Nil! :)

Great city, Great weather, amazing apartment. First time via air BnB and we really enjoy it. The Apartment was better than some four stars hotels. Perfekt for every City hopper. Nil is great, everything is easy and he arange what ever you want. Brilliant holiday

Très bon accueil, l'appartement est tel que décris nous n'avons eut aucune mauvaises surprises.
Métro très accessible, Camp Nou pas très loin, encore merci Nil pour ton accueil nous avons été très bien reçu. séjour à refaire

It was amazing. Nil's apartment is small, but perfect for two people. In apartment is everything you need - towels, shampoo, tv (netflix)... And for Barca fans, Camp Nou is just a few minutes away. 
And also Nil is great, he even left us some nice present in the fridge :)
So, in the end, we highly recommend Nil's place. 
Thank you, Nil ;)

Nil is really great host and his apartment is very nice and cosy. We've stayed there for 5 days and we had absolutely no problems. The apartment is very-very clean! It's close to 2 metro stations (one of them is on the metro-airport line, that's really convinient), there's a lot of supermarkets and cafes. Nil also left us some welcome treats in the fridge. Highly recommend!
Nice place! Everything we needed!

Небольшая,но очень уютная и очень чистая квартира.
На кухне есть вся посуда для длительного проживания.Недалеко от дома есть супермаркет и рынок.Несложно добраться из аэропорта и обратно,а так же в центр города.
Хозяин квартиры - Nil - просто необыкновенный парень!
Он охотно отвечал на наши вопросы о Барселоне ещё до нашей поездки.После нашего прибытия встречал у метро,помог донести багаж.
В апартаментах нас ждал ещё приятный сюрприз от хозяина- это много всяких испанских вкусностей.
Спасибо,Нил!
Thank you, Nil ! You're a great guy, and a good host.
 Good luck to you!

Nil es un anfitrión amable y atento, que recibe muy bien a sus huespedes. Cava, cerveza y tapas son algunas de las bondades que ofrece en la llegada.
Su piso es perfecto para una pareja, con todos las comodidades para una buena estada. Y la ubicacion es muy interesante tambien.

Nill is a real host, he had us waiting on arrival at the Metro .Nill does everything to make your stay as comfortable as urbanization, it says something to drink in the refrigerator , there is provided a candy and a bag of chips .His apartment is really nice and clean and located in a safe and friendly neighborhood . The metro is 5 minutes walk . there are also shopping and dining options nearby . I can heartily recommend Nills apartment for visiting Baracalona .
Nil est très gentil et très arrangeant. L'appartement était impéccable. Parfait !

Voltamos ao apartamento do Nil, depois de termos passado quase duas semanas. Desta vez, ficamos só sete dias. E, mais uma vez, tudo correu muito bem.
Nil continua um anfitrião gentil, que sabe receber e agradar os hóspedes. O apartamento não é grande, mas do tamanho ideal para um casal. Tem duas tevês, a principal até com Netflix, e possui acessórios básicos para quem quiser cozinhar em casa.
Perto do apartamento, há vários supermercados, padarias, estação de metrô e ônibus à vontade. Não é Barcelona, mas é como você estivesse nela, pois está pertíssimo de todas as atrações. E tem a vantagem de não estar num local altamente turístico. Você convive com as pessoas do bairro.
Recomendo!

Nil é um proprietário gentil, pontual e disponível.
A localização do apartamento é muito boa: É possível acessa-lo diretamente por meio do metro que parte do aeroporto;
O apartamento fica próximo de uma estação de metro dando acesso aos pontos turísticos; Muito próximo do apartamento se encontram dois supermercados.
O apartamento é muito  limpo e moderno. A cozinha é bem equipada e a ducha é muito boa. O apartamento nos proporcional uma agradável estadia em Barcelona.
房间还是干净的,离地铁站大概有10多分钟的路程,离球场很近大概15分钟的步行时间,附近也有很多中国人开的餐馆,楼下还有一家很棒的红酒店,物美价廉｡房东人很也很好｡

Встретил лично хозяин. Все показал по дому, рассказал где ближайшие супермаркеты и рынок Collblanc. Хорошее расположение относительно аэропорта. Линия L9 от аэропорта до станции Collblanc, дальше пешком минуты 4. Супер. Относительно города все тоже хорошо прямая ветка до станции Diagonal и вы в центре , в начале улицы Passeig de Gracia. Фото квартиры совпадают с реальностью. Спать все-таки лучше в большой комнате так как диван раскладывается и он реально больше кровати в спальне. Недавно сделан ремонт, все чистенько. Соседи не шумят. Спали отлично. Спасибо. Всем советую.

Our stay at Nil's apartment was relaxing and enjoyable. The apartment was clean, well equiped, more spacious than we anticipated. Nil provided some extra goodies in the kitchen that were much appreciated. The wifi worked extremely well. The apartment had great access to public transportation, and is in a quiet neighborhood of working locals. It was exactly what we were looking for, and was a good value. Upon arrival, Nil was gracious in helping me return my rental car to Sants. During our stay, Nil was available for questions and responsive.

It was a very good experience. The apartment was near to the metro, small but very nice, clean, silent, new and with everything what you need. Nils was very friendly, we met him personally and he let us feel at home. Even during our staying he asked us if we need something and answered very quickly. I would recommend this apartment to every couple.
Es war super! Nil ist ein toller Gastgeber, der sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich ist! Die Unterkunft ist wärmstens zu empfehlen!
The apartment was in a great location! Nil already had the fridge stocked with a few essentials, couldn't have asked for a better host :)

Beautiful apartment, easy to access, and very chill host.
This is a perfect apartment for visit and chillin in barcelona ! 
Hope to come again ! 
Thanks Nil !

We feel like home in Nil's house and he made our stay so comfortable being always possible to communicate with him.
Also the house is very well equipped and at a short distance by foot from the subway.
We absoluletly recommend Nil apartment and we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

We had a good 2-night stay at Nil's apartment.

o Nil met us for checkin and answered all our questions.
o Nil was very responsive to our text messages.
o The apartment was clean, modern and updated.
o The wifi was excellent.
o Nice shower.
o The neighborhood felt safe.
o The apartment is an easy walk from a metro station.
o The clothes washer worked well, laundry detergent was supplied, and there was a clothesline off the deck with clothes pins.

Nil ist ein toller Gastgeber!
Die Wohnung ist perfekt, sehr sauber und ordentlich. 
Die Wohnung ist mit allen ausgestattet, was man für den täglichen Bedarf benötigt. 
Ruhige Lage und alles schnell zu erreichen mit der Bahn, die alle 5min. fährt.
5 Sterne!☆☆☆☆☆
Nil was very quick to respond and met us on the street to insure we had no problems finding the place. His flat was very modern, clean and comfortable. We wished we could have stayed longer!
Had a great time staying at Nil's place, walking distance to Camp Nou and the Metro for easy access to the city and lots of shops and bars in the area

Das Appartement war zwar nicht sonderlich groß, aber sehr sauber und gemütlich, man hat sich sofort zu Hause gefühlt. Es gab alles, was man für den täglichen Bedarf benötigte. Die Anbindung an die Metro sowie ein Supermarkt sind sehr gut in etwa 10 Min. zu erreichen  Als wir ankamen erwartete uns Nil bereits in der Wohnung, er war sehr nett und zeigte uns gleich die Wohnung. Er gab uns noch ein paar nützliche Tipps mit auf den Weg und signalisierte direkt seine Hilfsbereitschaft, u. a. hinterließ er seine Nummer. Alles in allem eine klare Empfehlung!

Nil was very friendly: he texted us when we had some delay and asked if we could find it. At our arrival, he gave us a warm welcome and showed everything in the apartment. The apartment looked very nice and was everything the description said and more. There were already some things in the fridge and there was Netflix on the television.
I asked Nil to recommend us some places were we could go and he provided us with a clear list of things and the metro lines and stations we needed for that. I would definitely recommend this apartment!

Nous avons un accueil chaleureux et Nil à su s'adapter à notre heure d'arrivée. L'emplacement de l'appartement est bien indiqué mais petit soucis de place de parking lorsque l'on arrive en voiture. L'appartement correspond tout à fait aux photos du site, il est propre, fonctionnel,décoré avec goût. Le rapport qualité prix au vu son son emplacement (proche du métro) est intéressant pour un appartement situé dans une grande ville. Nil reste disponible à tout moment. Appartement que je recommande vivement! Très bon séjour!!!

Nil was there waiting for us late at night when we arrived from the airport, and had stocked the fridge with drinks and snacks, before showing us round and providing the WiFi password and telling us important information about the Metro and such. We really enjoyed our stay in the apartment, which was clean and spacious (though very warm!) and was well-equiped with a washing machine, powerful shower and comfy bed! While the apartment is a little way away from the centre area of Barcelona, it was close to two Metro stations (Colblanc and Badal) that this was never a problem. 

All in all we had a great stay, and would definitely return/recommend the apartment - thank you to Nil for having us!
Hôte très sympa, l'appartement était propre.

Everything was great with Nil's flat. It was immaculately clean. He communicated well so we always knew what was going on, the flat was close to the metro, supermarket and a bakery so had everything we needed for a home away from the crowds of Barcelona. The smart TV and ability to use the kitchen and washing machine were great extra touches. We'd definitely look him up again if we are lucky enough to come back. Thanks Nil.

---

Tot estava molt bé amb pis de Nil. Es comunicava bé, així que sempre sabíem el que estava passant, el pis estava a prop del metro, un supermercat i un forn de pa així que tenia tot el necessari per a una llar lluny de les multituds de Barcelona. La televisió intel·ligent i la capacitat d'utilitzar la cuina i la rentadora eren bons detalls addicionals. Definitivament el que buscaria de nou si tenim la sort de tornar. Gràcies Nil.
Nil's apartment was cool and quiet, plus pretty close to 3 subways. It's a good price/quality balance.

Nils met me outside the building and showed me into the apartment. It was even better than advertised and in a great location! Super close to the metro, and a bunch of great bars/restaurants just 10 minutes walking. I hope to stay here again!

Sweet appartement, nice neighborhood and a friendly host! 
We've had a great stay in barcelona!

Nil antwortete bereits vor dem Aufenthalt innert Sekunden auf Fragen unsererseits. Als wir ankamen mit dem Taxi, stand er bereits vor dem Haus obwohl es schon fast Mitternacht war. Das Appartment war sauber und im Kühlschrank hatte es bereits Wasser, Cola, Bier, Salami und Chips. Frottetücher, Haarföhn, Kaffemaschine und tonnenweise Bücher, Karten etc von Barcelona waren im Appartment vorhanden. Nil war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit trotz später Stunde.

Nil's place is big enough for family of three people. It is five minute walk to Collblank metro station which is on the intersection of line 3 and line 5. Access from airport is very easy also. We easly reached any attraction in Barcelona by using these lines. Kitchen and bathroom are well equipped.

We had a great time in Barcelona and were very happy to stay at Nils apartment. Nil is a great host, so kind and the communication was always easy and quick. The apartment was clean and cozy, we had everything we needed and would definetly come again.
Mieszkanie super, czyste i schludne. Bardzo blisko Camp Nou (ok.6 minut piechota), stacji metra i w cichej i spokojnej okolicy. Nil przesympatyczny, doskonały kontakt, gorąco polecamy!

Nil met us outside the apartment as we had arranged and was a very polite host. He chatted to us about our plans in the city and offered us advice for sightseeing, he could not have been more helpful! I would definately recommend staying at Nil's apartment and would to stay there again. It is in a good area that is close to at least two metro stations: Badal and Colblanc, restaurants, bars and supermarkets as well as being ideally situated for Camp Nou.

L'accueil est très agréable. Il a été discret et a répondu a toutes nos sollicitations. le quartier et le voisinage sont calmes. Pour un couple c'est vraiment une bonne adresse que je recommande. Très romantique et décoré avec gout.

Nil met us, even though our flight was very late, showed us where everything was and told us we could call him anytime. The apartment was spotless and comfortable. A 10 min stroll to Camp Nou, perfect for football fans, and within easy reach of lots of lovely food places and supermarkets. A really good location for travel, close to several metro stations. All in all we had a fantastic stay and will definitely use this apartment again if we return to Barcelona. Thanks Nil
Все отлично, спасибо!!!

Je recommande vivement l'appartement de Nil, vraiment super, il y a tout le confort nécessaire.
Nous nous étions perdu Nil est venu à notre rencontre gentillement. L'appartement est situé à côté d'une station de métro.

Piso pequeño para dos, en una finca muy antigua pero el piso esta muy bien ya que esta reformado. ideal para parejas que vayan ha hacer turismo a barcelona, no recomendable el coche poco aparcamiento y caro (como en casi toda barcelona)
Good place to stay in Barcelona.Nil is a very helpful person and easier to contact.We had a  wonderful stay in his lovely apartment.
지하철 역은 2블럭 정도만 걸어가면 있고, 바로 근처에 슈퍼마켓도 있습니다. 큰 침대가 두개(하나는 소파배드)있어서 두명이서 안락하게 잘 수 있습니다. 매우 만족스러운 숙소였습니다. 무엇보다 호스트가 너무 착하시고 메세지 답장도 칼답이라 걱정없이 잘 쉬다 갈수있었습니다!!

This place was great and had everything we needed. The master bedroom comfortably fit two people, while the living room had a nice pullout bed for an additional guest. There was lots of room to store our bags and get settled over our three day stay. Nil did a great job of communicating with us before we moved in and was in communication with us during our stay as well.
최고입니다. 완벽해요 캄프누 근처의 최고의 숙소 깔끔하고 편안합니다.

Super appartement très bon week end ! tous était très bien  appartement proche de toute les commodité, pas loin du Camp Nou , propres , bien équipée je le conseil à tous ceux qui veulent visité Barcelone, Nil à était parfait et nous à très bien accueillie malgré notre difficulté à parler anglais et espagnol  merci encore
El piso pequeño, pero perfecto para dos personas, muy bien equipado y cerquita del transporte público. Hemos estado muy agusto y volveriamos a repetir en el piso. Nil muy amable y agradable.

We had a great time in Barcelone in Nil's apartment (4 nights), we felt like home. It was well situated, between 2 metro stations. Everything was as described. We really appreciated the cleanliness. Just smelling bad in the public stairs of the building but of course it's not Nil's fault.
Nil's was really friendly. We'll stay here again next time.

Amazing days in Barcelona. :)
The flat is near from the underground.. and there are some markets and coffes just a few meters. 

Nil was very nice. He was watting for us :) :)

Thank you ... Obrigada :)
Ok
best place to get if you are a barcelona fan
