Nil was very friendly and accomodating. Place is in good location, and a great option for 2 people.
Les photos correspondent à la réalité.
Nil, thank you very much for everything, you received us very well and we had such a great time in Barcelona, your apartment was perfect and we would return there for sure. Muchas Gracias !
Very nice flat, everything we need was here. Nil is very kind and helpful person.
Très pratique près du métro et au calme.

Just two blocks away from Badal L5 station, 10-min walk distance from Collblanc L9 station which directly connects to Barcelona airport. Really nice, cosy place to stay for 3 people. (4 people would be also possible)

Badal, Collblanc 역하고도 가까운 곳에 위치하고 있어서 교통이 편해요. 그리고 숙소도 정말 깔끔하고, 3명 혹은 4명이서 편하게 쓸 수 있어요. 사진보다 시설이 더 좋습니다.

Great place to stay in Barcelona! Location was good and it only took 10-15 on the metro to get to city center depending on where you get off. Nil's place was clean and comfortable! We enjoyed our stay here.
The appartment is very clean, nice and near everything (airport, center, supermarket). Nil was a very good host, he waited for us even though our flight was delayed. I recommand this appartment a lot
Nil's place was great! Extremely clean, easy to get to, close to the Metro that takes you to attractions, and very responsive. Overall, wonderful experience!

Prima basic appartement op loopafstand van Camp Nou stadion en vlak bij 2 metrohaltes, waarvan 1 een directe verbinding naar luchthaven heeft. Nil is zeer behulpzaam. Ondanks dat onze vlucht vertraging had en de metro's staakten en we daardoor veel later aankwamen is hij ons op blijven wachten. Hij had zelfs wat te eten en te drinken klaar gezet!

Respecto a Nil, encantados, rapidez a la hora de cerrar la reserva, disponibilidad para concertar la llegada inmediata y como llegábamos antes de lo previsto, para dejar las maletas mientras limpiaba (aunque al final no hizo falta). También nos dio flexibilidad en la salida. De 10.
En cuanto al alojamiento, hay muchas cosas mejorables: el aislamiento del ruido es nulo, y los vecinos no son prácticamente silenciosos: el vecino de enfrente tiene afición por la carpintería sin ir más lejos (que además te ve perfectamente si no corres la cortina, la intimidad es muy limitada). No descansamos mucho
El piso carece de calefacción ni estufas o calefactores, teniendo que ponernos capas y capas por la noche.
La ducha carecía de soporte, cosa que es de agradecer.
Por otro lado, a modo de sugerencia, cambiaría los cojines por almohadas, ya que acabamos con dolor de cuello.
A la hora de cocinar, tampoco tuvimos sartenes, con lo que hicimos huevos revueltos en una olla.
No todo era malo ni mucho menos: la limpieza ejemplar. El botiquín nos salvó la vida (debido a rozaduras y ampollas).
La ubicación, sin estar en todo el barullo, está a 20 minutos del centro de la ciudad, muy bien comunicado (lástima que el ruido del bloque no nos permitiera disfrutar de la tranquilidad de la zona).
Alrededor del piso hay de todo: súper, farmacias, tiendecitas, panaderías...
En resumen: un edificio antiguo que da hasta donde da

It was great choice to stay at Nil's apartment. In apartment you can find everything that you can imagine  The app placed in authentic district of the city so you can see the typical live in there, find authentic cafe and restaurant

Nil is always available to answer any questions and is very helpful. The apartment is within walking distance to Camp Nou, 30-40 minutes via metro to the centre, and 40-50 min via metro to the airport (door-to-door times). I would recommend it for a short term stay but it is not the best equipped for a longer term. The apartment is in a residential area but the walls are thin, so be advised that it can be quite loud if you are a light sleeper.
Hermoso departamento, tiene todas las comodidades y super organizado para pasar los mejores dias en esa ciudad.
Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Nil. Il est fonctionnel, calme et correspond bien à l'annonce. Je recommande !

This place was perfect for getting in and out of Barcelona being right by the airport metro and the main metro going right across the city. Nil has thought of every detail; laundry soap drying rack, fan, and even water, a couple of beers and pop in the fridge when you arrive. Highly recommended.
We had a great time at Nil's place. He was very helpful (helped us with the luggage and everything). The place is perfect for a citytrip and very close to the bus and metro station.

Das Appartement war wirklich super, es war alles da was man braucht! Und sogar ein kleiner Balkon zum rauchen! Die Lage war ruhig und in guter Anbindung zum Bus oder zur Metro. Supermärkte und kleine Restaurants in direkter Nähe. Und eine sehr nette Nachbarschaft! Empfehlenswert!

Piso pequeño pero acogedor, bien equipado y reformado. Muy bien comunicado, tanto en metro como en autobús. Limpio y con todo lo necesario.
Formalidad y eficacia por parte de Nil.

Nil was a great host. He was very responsive at all times and was willing to help with anything. The apartment was nice for a couple and had everything you need, although not too big. There are many ways of public transportation within several minutes walk of the apartment. All in all, I would recommend this apartment to anyone.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié cet appartement. Très propre et conforme aux photos. Parfait pour les fans de football, mais aussi très près du métro pour voir la ville. Nil a été d'une très grande aide, il est venu nous rencontrer dans la rue lors de notre arrivée et nous a dépanné très rapidement lors de notre départ.

Nous recommandons ce logement pour un couple, c'est certain.
Très bon logement, bon accueil et tout ce qu'il faut sur place.
Apartment is in a good location near metro and also walking distance to the stadium. It was clean and tidy, and would definately recommend to anyone who is visiting Barcelona.

Nil was very understanding, I had to change my reservation twice, once for personal issues, and then because my flight has been cancelled). I arrived at 2am and Nil was there to show as to the apartment. So thank you Nil!
The place is ok, except the fact that in the mornings you will hear noises from the neighbours. If you don't mind that, then everything's fine.
The apartment is in walking distance from Camp Nou, but to get anywhere else you have to take the metro (there is a station nearby). All in all, it was as expected.

Appartement fonctionnel et très propre, idéalement situé à 5 minutes du métro.  L'hôte est super, disponible. 
Nous recommandons cette adresse sans problème. Excellente prestation.

Ev tam iki kişilik temiz duzenli (Website hidden by Airbnb) sekiz gün kaldık. Metro istasyonlarına yakın olması işimizi kolaylaştırdı. Ayrıca ev sahibimiz bizim için içecekler hazırlamıştı. Lokal insanlarin olduğu nir bölge de oluşu Barselona da Barselona lı gibi yaşama fırsatı verdi. Nil bizi kapıda karşıladı yerleştirdi. Güvenilir bir (Website hidden by Airbnb) çok memnun kaldık.

Nil found us at a Vodafone store on our way to the apartment and helped us with our luggage the rest of the way. He was accessible when we had questions. The apartment was clean and had all the basic kitchen utensils and as Americans we appreciated the large shower with plenty of hot water. The WiFi worked very well and there were two televisions which we wished we could have understood more of the language. The apartment was in a neighborhood so we got a true feel for the real Barcelona!
Thanks Nil, really cool apartment, we love the decorations and your convenienent kitchen and dining place!

It was nice week. Nil’s home was perfect, very nice and clean apartment. Location is good in pretty area. In nearby is Camp Nou (for football fans this will be important and lovely). Metro station is on 5 minutes walking. Two lines - L9 which one is direct to the airport and L5 direct to Sagrada Familia. Thanks again, Nil! It was pleasure to meet you :) 
We will back again...soon ;)
Nil provided a great help to us and his apartment is absolutely cozy and the located in the strategic area, close to L9 airport line and the main metro line able to get in city centre very easily.

L appartement est super. Cosy et bien équipé pour un couple seul ou avec un enfant. Il est situé à proximité du métro qui relie le centre de Barcelone. C'est propre et neuf. On y est bien! Parfait pour un séjour dans la capitale catalane sans être dérangé par les nuits caliente de BCN.  Nous avons adoré !

Nil was the perfect host. Great spot to catch the game and avoid the big crowds of the metro after. We were able to take the Metro anywhere we wanted to go which was close by the flat. Perfect for what we needed.
Perfect place to stay if you're visiting the Nou Camp. Close to a main metro station and supermarket etc.

Der Aufenthalt bei Nil war anstandslos! Die kleine Wohnung ist super durchdacht und lädt durchaus dazu ein auch länger zu bleiben. Die Ubahnstation ist nur ein paar Straßen weiter, alles andere das man braucht sowieso um die Ecke. Vielen Dank für Alles Nil - top, gerne wieder :)

Nil's place is a very sound choice for easy accessibility to Barcelona and the airport. Although the flat is not directly central, everything you would want to see is within a half hour metro trip with the nearest station a couple of blocks away, and the main centre is only a few stops away. Local shops include basic but ample grocers if you want to cook in. Nil is a great host who responds quickly to enquiries and is keen to help out in any way. The apartment is comfortable and well appointed. We were two friends who slept separately and there was plenty of space for this (one of us is over 6 foot/180cm!) with a big and comfortable folding bed in the living room. One thing to bear in mind if you are a light sleeper is to bring ear plugs as noise from the neighbouring flats was quite intrusive in the evenings and night time. Otherwise highly recommended as a home from home. Enjoy!

I would highly recommend this apartment if you want to experience Barcelona as a local. The neighbourhood of L'Hospitalet de Llobregat has a great vibe and it is only a short walk to the bus and Metro which will take you quickly to any part of the city. Nil provided a warm welcome and kept me up to date on things to do and places to visit.  He even kept 12 grapes to celebrate the new year, it was very thoughtful of you Nil. The apartment itself has a contemporary feel and was exceptionally clean and had all the necessary items to make for a great stay. Thank you!

가격이 저렴하고 호스트가 친절하다
지하철과 가까운 편이고 바로 근처에 축구장이 있다. 
온풍기와 전기 난로가 있지만 겨울에 공기가 차갑다. 이층에 위치했는데 반지하 느낌이 드는 것은.. 왜인지 잘 모르겠다...
주방도 편리하며 인테리어는 깔끔하다
방음은 잘 안된다.. 온수는 1인용 샤워정도로 가능하다.

El departamento es pequeño pero bien distribuido, funciona todo muy bien. El único punto en contra sería que el balcón es pequeño y da al interior de la cuadra. No falta nada, habia para lavar la ropa, para planchar, dos televisores, el baño u la cocina completos, muy recomendable!

Die Wohnung hatte für uns ein günstige Lage, war zwar nicht sehr gross, aber ausreichend. Wir waren in der 1. Februarwoche dort, und da die Wohnung  über keine Heizung verfügt, konnte man sich wirklich nur zum Schlafen dort aufhalten. Und das auch nur bedingt, da das Bett direkt an einer kalten Aussenwand mit Einscheibenfenster liegt. Man konnte nicht duschen, da auch das Mikrobad ungeheizt war. Es gab keinen Kaffeekocher und keinen Wasserkocher. Da spielte es schon keine Rolle mehr, das es keine Geschirrtücher gab. Die Wohnung war sehr hellhörig, für Geräusche von den vielen Nachbarn war in der kältebedingt kurzen Nacht ausreichend gesorgt. Da diese gravierenden Mängel in der Beschreibung nicht erkennbar waren, stelle ich airbnb generell in Frage und gehe davon aus, dass bei unserem nächsten Besuch in Barcelona eher ein Hotelzimmer in Betracht kommt.

The apartment was ok. It was clean and it had everything we needed (iron, hairdryer). But I wouldn't recommend this apartment for winter season because it was too cold (even if the host had 2 radiators). But because they had to be turn off when we went out each time we came back home it was cold. And the hot water is limited. So if you are 2 people you need to wait a while to have enough hot water for the second shower). The walls are very thin and the neighbors made a lot of noise.
But I would recommend the place because of the price and because it was close to metro station.

I really enjoyed my stayed at Nils place. He was a create host, he helped me and friend get our tickets to a soccer match. The place was just like the pictures. I would definitely stay at Nils again and I would recommend everyone to stay here.

Appartement en parfait état, et situé à 5 minutes du camp nou et du métro. Logement propre, bien équipé, et conforme à la description. Nil était également un parfait hôte (joignable par téléphone si besoin). Je recommande

Great spot for two. No view off the balcony but a great source of fresh air. The location is very accessible from either the collblanc or badal metro stops. About 30 minutes away from the most visited sites in Barcelona, other than Montserrat and Park Güell. Had a comfortable week long stay here. The neighbors can be heard up till midnight but I otherwise slept easily. Nil is a great host and responds to any questions immediately.
Very easy to reach everywhere. It great for two people staying.

Nil’s place is compact and well situated for being outside the city centre. The subway is only a 5 minute walk away and central landmarks are no more than a 20 minute ride. Nil is a prompt and responsive host. The building was a bit noisy but aside from one night of disturbance from the upstairs neighbours our stay was peaceful. We had a great time.

Logement bien situé pour visiter Barcelone, à quelques minutes à pied du métro. Le logement est très propre. Nous avons juste été un peu dérangés par les voisins( mal insonorisé) mais nous étions beaucoup sortis donc a recommander tout de même.

L'appartement de Nil est propre, bien agencé, proche du métro Collblanc (ligne directe vers l'aéroport, et accès rapide au centre de Barcelone), et proche du Camp Nou (pour les amateurs de foot...). Bon rapport Qualité/Prix. Nil est un hôte agréable, réactif et disponible pour ses hôtes. Le point négatif est le voisinage un peu bruyant.

Merci à Nil pour cet accueil chaleureux et sa disponibilité. L’appartement est conforme aux photos et très bien desservi par les transports en communs. Cependant, le voisinage est très bruyant et chiens qui aboient le soir ... ce n’était pas vraiment gênant pour nous, mais pour notre bébé de 7 mois,  difficile de dormir. 
Je vous recommande ce logement pour les personnes sans enfants.

Nil war ein sehr zuvorkommender und netter Gastgeber. Er hat uns sogar an der U-bahn Station abgeholt und war jederzeit erreichbar. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer sehr guten Lage und bietet einen guten Ausgangspunkt für jegliche Besichtigungen! Wie bereits auch andere Gäste in ihren Bewertungen geschrieben haben: die Wohnung ist extrem hellhörig.
Wir waren zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt in Nils Wohnung und haben unseren Urlaub sehr genossen!
Lovely apartment and beautifully presented. Walls are very thin so neighbours can be heard quite easily. Well connected on the metro and buses. Good local amenities.

El depto es tal cual a las imágenes, la ubicación excelentemente conectada para no ser en el centro de la ciudad, la comunicación con nil muy buena . Faltan utensilios de cocina muy deficiente. Y lo peor de todo los ruidos molestos de los vecinos incluso en horarios de noche o madrugada, no lo recomiendo si la intención es un lugar tranquilo y de descanso

A casa do Nil é tal e qual como mostram as fotos... Simples, mas com as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia confortável. O único senão é o ruído que provém dos demais andares do prédio. A comunicação ocorreu com toda a facilidade e atenção. Muchas Gracias, Nil!
별 기대안하고 갔었던 바르셀로나가 진짜 저의 최고의 여행지가 됬어요. 호스트가 너무 좋고 위치도 너무좋고 마트도 바로앞이고 날씨도 좋고 그냥 좋네요 너무ㅋㅋㅋ 유럽여행하면서 처음으로 아쉽고 또와야겠다는 생각이 들었어요 바셀 짱짱맨!

The apartment was ok. The upsides for it were:
- clean
- close to metro station/busses and direct line from airport
- local amenities
- prompt and responsive host 

Downside:
- no air conditioning. It had two ventilators but it was not very pleasant 
- tiny boiler. Only one person could take a shower
- medium sized bed. I'm used to king size
- the balcony was extra small with a view in other, very close, balconies. We kept the curtains drawn all the time.
Good location close to metro, about 25 minutes to main attractions. No AC, killer hot in the summer.

키친타월이 거의 남아있지 않아 부족했지만,
그 외에는 모두 만족스러웠고 친절한 호스트가 가장 좋았습니다!
Appartement agréable dans un quartier calme. Nil nous a très bien accueilli à notre arrivée malgré notre retard.

Нормальная квартира, жить можно.
Немного далеко расположено от центра, на метро до пляжа где то минут 25-30.
В квартире вроде чисто, посуды не много, масло подсолнечное покупали сами, мыло дали по одному кусочку маленькому на человека.
Очень шумный дом, было слышно почти всех соседей.

Hello,
It was nice to stay in Nil’s flat.
Unfortunately we didn’t meet but I’m thankful that Nil met my friend that arrived before me. He took time to explain how everything worked. Flat is clean, you have small balcony that helps to dry things after beach. Metro station and bus station is not far . Nil was always in touch. The bus D20 goes directly to the beach . I would recommend !

We had a great time in Nils cozy apartment with everything, you need while being on vacation.
Even though it is not near the city center, the neighborhood is nice. 
Thank you very much :)
Nil is a really kind and helpful host. The appartement is a little dark and the kitchen is poorly equiped but good to spend a few days in Barcelona. The train connection to the city is really good.

We had a great time in the apartment which was super tidy and clean. The location is good as close to the métro station and supermarkets and grocery stores are close by. I came the second time and enjoyed it again. Nil is always communicative and fast in responding, much appreciated. Thank you, I will come a 3rd time for sure
Nice, cosy and tidy apartment. Really close to Camp Nou and metro stations.

Уютная и чистая квартира, есть все необходимое. Все соответствует фотографиям и описанию.  Рядом с домом огромное количество магазинов и кафешек. Хозяин квартиры очень гостеприимный! Спасибо ему огромное за разные вкусности, а также за карту метро, путеводитель по Барселоне на русском языке, скидочные купоны на экскурсии. Рекомендую!

Bei Nil war es sehr schön. Die Wohnung liegt in einer etwas untouristischen Umgebung, wodurch man sehr viel von den Menschen mitbekommt. Die Wohnung ist für zwei Personen ausreichend ausgestattet und auch angemessen groß. Nur die Wende sind extrem hellhörig, man hört jedes Wort der Nachbarn.
Wir haben uns allerdings richtig zuhause gefühlt und waren jeden Abend froh wieder „zuhause“ zu sein.

This is a neat, compact apartment, just minutes walk from a Metro station with good connections to all of Barcelona‘s attractions. There were 2 of us, and it was just the right size for us. Nil‘s communicated well, and was always quick to reply to queries.

Great place to stay, the location of the flat is good, close to the metro, so you can go wherever you want to. We appreciate that Nil waited for us almost to 2:30 am. He's a great host with very cozy flat. We will definitely choose this place one more time!

If you're going to watch a Football game this is THE apartment. It's walking distance to Camp Nou. Only, 6 mins to metro station. Very comfortable setting, Nil replies very fast to messages. My girlfriend and I loved the stay.
Great location, very close to metro.

Our stay at Nil’s place was amazing! We had a great time in Barcelona, also thanks to the choice of accommodation which was well located. Only 5 minutes walk from Collblanc, it was easy for my parents to reach the airport through the L9 line. Many food shops around and the Mercat of Collblanc only 3 minutes walk. Thank you again Nil!

Appartement très bien situé, à deux pas du métro Badal, vous permettant de vous rendre dans le centre en 10 mn, très propre et bien équipé, Nil est très sympathique, seul point vraiment noir, une isolation phonique inexistante, on a vraiment l'impression que les voisins se trouvent dans l'appartement, c'est assez incroyable...
Muy agradable y disponible, lo recomiendo
Je vous recommande nous avons passer un bon moment chez Nil

Easily reachable from the airport
Nice hospitality
Grocery stores nearby
Nice, clean and comfy place and very friendly host

name: Central comfort flat
summary: The location is central . It is very close to public (website hidden) is less than ten minutes away from the METRO and METROBUS STATİON (by walk) and less than 5 minutes bus station from where a single bus ride will take you to Taksim
description: The location is central . It is very close to public (website hidden) is less than ten minutes away from the METRO and METROBUS STATİON (by walk) and less than 5 minutes bus station from where a single bus ride will take you to Taksim Familiy neighborhood quit and safe
neighborhood_overview: Familiy neighborhood quit and safe
house_rules: No party. Smoking only in the kitchen and no pet I am allergic

host.host_location: Brno, South Moravian Region, Czech Republic

name: Belle chambre calme
summary: Ce que j'aime dans ce logement, vraiment très proche du métro Viau, environnement calme, il se trouve dans un triplex au dernier étage, les plafonds sont haut, et le plancher d'origine en bois franc lui donne son aspect chaleureux, et luxueux.
description: Ce que j'aime dans ce logement, vraiment très proche du métro Viau, environnement calme, il se trouve dans un triplex au dernier étage, les plafonds sont haut, et le plancher d'origine en bois franc lui donne son aspect chaleureux, et luxueux.

host.host_about:
Aurélien,
travaillant dans le service a la clientèle, je saurai bien vous recevoir vous aider au besoin a vous suggérer mes places favoris dans Montréal. Je serai discret mais n'hésitez pas a me demander des renseignements et ou conseils a faire sur Montréal il me fera plaisir de vous aider.
Au plaisir de vous recevoir!

Aurélien

reviews.comments: Chambre très agréable, comfortable et propre dans un quartier calme proche du métro et du parc olympique. Je recommande!!
Soucieux, attentif et accommodant, Aurélien est un hôte parfait.  L'appartement était très bien situé pour nos besoins et la chambre des plus confortables.

Aurélien's room was perfect for me and my partner. The bed is comfortable and the room is spacious enough to feel relax and comfortable. The apartment is just next to the subway in a interesting neighborhood; near the Biodome, Olympic Park and Botanic garden.

Dear Aurélien,
I would like to thank you for all your attention.
Your place is great and very close to Viaux Metrô Station which made my life much easier.
Hope I could come back to Montreal someday and have te chance tô book your room again.

Best regards, 
Ketlin
Rien à redire, logement propre, correct et calme. Bien placé, près du métro. à recommandé. . .

La chambre est juste parfaite et on souligne particulièrement la grande propreté de l'appartement .Très très bien situé juste à côté du parc olympique et d'un métro .Aurélien est très attentionné . On recommande vivement
Chambre très tranquille et confortable, je reviendrai avec plaisir :)

Très bon rapport qualité prix. 

La chambre est grande et très calme, très proche du métro avec des parkings gratuit dans la rue adjacente. 

Je recommande définitivement cette chambre. 
Je n'ai pas vu très longtemps Aurélien, mais il avait l'air très sympathique. 

Encore merci !

We had a great time at Auréliens place. He's a very nice and caring host. When we were late on our arrival due to traffic jam in Montreal he was flexible with the "check-in". 
The room is even more spacious and beautiful than I expected from the pictures. Comfy bed, whole apartment very beautiful and clean, nice neighborhood. Thanks for this great experience. Would definitely stay again with you! :)
We had a good experience staying in Aurélien`s room. The description was accurate, room was clean and cozy

Aurelien was a great host, very welcoming and professional. The room was very clean and spacious as was the bathroom and kitchen. The area is a little far from downtown, but not much of a problem if you use the metro.
A phenomenally prices and beautiful apartment in the heart of Montreal. Would stay again

Aurélien was super nice and accommodating during our stay. His house is really nice inside and is really close to the metro and stade Olympic which was great. The room was very cosy and I had a great sleep. Overall my stay was excellent. Great price too! You should stay here :)
The room is lovely and the location is great. Right next to a subway stop, movie theater, biodome, and planetarium.
I needed a place close to the arena and this place worked out perfect.  Place was clean and close to the metro.

Aurélien est un bon hôte. Il était occupé mais il a tout de même réussi à se libérer pour venir nous remettre les clés :-) la chambre est vraiment très cosy, et on s'y sent comme chez soi ! Tout était vraiment très propre.
Aurélien's place is amazing and we had a great stay there. Aurélien was very helpful and I highly recommend his place.

Aurelien made me feel like I had the entire place to myself! 
It was a great location across from the Olympic stadium.

We had a nice vacation in Montreal, Aurélien was a nice host, he suggested us some places where to eat, and if you love pizza you defintely have to go to Pizzeria dei Compari, as he told us. He had the room ready by the time we arrived, and we had everything we need. The house is located near to some of the places we had in our agenda to visit,like the Olympic Park, Biodome and Botanical Gardens. If you come by car there's enough free parking around, and if you plan to move by public transport, there's a subway station 5 mins walking distance.
If we will go again to Montreal, we will probably stay at his house.

I was really happy that aurelien was very flexible on my time of arrival. I checked in really late since my bus from Toronto got delayed and he would find a way to check me in. Unfortunately due to conflicting schedules we never met but I had no problems at all. The stay was nice... In a very quiet neighbourhood despite being quite a distance from downtown. There is a lovely local market nearby which was very nice too. Thanks aurelien!

The room is everything as described in the listing. A very convenience location which is a couple minutes walk from the Viau Metro station and is next to the Olympic Stadium. I got a C$18 metro pass and I could go almost everywhere in Montreal. One tip is if you arrive late, you better get something to eat at the airport before coming, since there is NOTHING open after 9pm... well, later I found there is a diner about 20min walking which open till 3am, but definitely nothing for personal cares like soap or shampoo. I had to took the Metro back to UQAM (7 stations) to get MacDonald, but still couldn't find those cleaning products...

Use (Hidden by Airbnb) Map wisely...

Aurelien is nice but I only met him twice in the 6 days stay... Once when I arrived and the next was the night before leaving, when I was doing laundry... 

The only thing I didn't feel comfortable is there's no lock on my room door... As coming to a new place and I don't know the people inside the apartment, I felt not quite secure...

The place is really nice, the neighborhood was really quite, the location is really convenient to most of the places, movie theater, corner stores etc. I had a blast staying there for the couple nights I was there. Thank you.

Staying at Aurelien's was great. Super close to metro Viau, and with a spectacular view of the Olympic Stadium. The room I stayed in was lovely spacious and clean. Highly recommended. On parle Français aussi.
He was an excellent host. I have no complaints whatsoever. The neighborhood was quiet, and his apartment was maybe one block from the metro. Very convenient and very clean.
Lovely space, was very kind and generous. Would definitely chose this quiet location again

Aurélien is a great host, very friendly and helpful!
The location is excellent, very close to the subway station, and the description and photos are very accurate. The place war very clean and the room was spacious.
It was an excellent experience to stay at Aurélien's place, and I definitely recommend this to everyone.

Everything was as advertised. The room was clean and comfortable with plenty of space. Bathroom/shower was also nice. This place is in a nice quiet neighborhood but easy access to downtown if you are driving. Also it's walking distance to the Olympic park with the Biodome and botanical garden. Fantastic value for the price.

Un accueil parfait de la part d'Aurélien, qui s'est montré disponible, discret, et soucieux que nous passions un bon séjour. La chambre est belle, propre, spacieuse, au calme. Tout ce dont nous avions besoin après de bonnes journées bien remplies de visite de la ville.  L'appartement est à quelques arrêts de métro du centre-ville, ça se fait très bien. Merci à Aurélien et à refaire si nous devions revenir à Montréal!
Very nice stay! Aurelien was an amazing host that made me feel at home and as a local in Montreal.
Awesome location near subway planetarium bio dome ... Clean simple set up
Very nice room. Aurélien did great in organising my entry as I was late and he was working.

Super chambre dans un appartement sympathique. Très proche du métro ce qui permet de ce déplacer rapidement. Aurélien est un hôte génial qui vous conseillera super bien malgré le fait qu'il soit peu présent. Une chambre à loué sans hésité.
We had a very good stay. Aurelien was present to welcome us. The room was clean and comfortable. the location was great to discover the biodome area.

Aurélien was there to meet me when I arrived, and we had a chat about what there is to do in Montréal when you have a few days to spare. Whenever I had a question during my stay, he would get back in touch with me very quickly.

The room is very spacious and the bed so comfy you'll need an alarm to wake up! The bathroom and kitchen are well-equipped.

Aurélien's place is in a quiet neighbourhood 3 minutes away from Viau metro station, taking you downtown in around 15 minutes. It's also next door to the Olympic stadium.

I had a great stay at Aurélien's, and I recommend it for solo travelers or couples who want to explore Montréal for one day, one week or more.

L'appartement d'Aurélien se trouve dans un quartier un peu éloigné du centre de Montréal, il est néanmoins bien connecté par le métro qui y conduit en 20 minutes. La chambre est spacieuse et sur une cour-arrière calme. Je n'ai vu Aurélien qu'une seule fois quand il m'avait accueillie, mais il était disponible pendant mon séjour.

Aurelien a été très accueillant et aimable. La chambre est très spacieuse (j'y ai mis plusieurs valises). Son appartement est très calme et a quelques minutes de la station Viau. La chambre et les lieux communs sont également impeccables (la cuisine et la salle de bain). De plus, Aurelien a su rester discret.

Aurelien was very helpful and kind. The room is very spacious since I was able to store several suitcases in it. The apartment itself is in a quiet and low key area of Montreal and is very to Viau station. The bedroom and common areas were spotless. Above all, Aurelien is low key and I have hardly seen him during my stay.

La chambre est spacieuse, confortable et très jolie. L'appartement est dans un quartier calme, idéalement placé à 2 pas du métro, ce qui permet de rejoindre facilement le centre ville. Nous n'avons malheureusement pas pu rencontrer Aurélien mais il a tout fait pour faciliter notre séjour.

Tout est juste dans l'annonce, rien ne manque. Aurélien a été très discret (probablement plus que nous), sympathique et de bon conseil. La proximité du métro est un vrai avantage pour parcourir facilement Montréal.

Nous venons de passer une nuit chez Aurélien. 
Il a été très accueillant. 
La chambre est très bien et le lit très confortable. 
Les lieux sont calme et nous avons pu nous garer assez prêt de l'appartement.
Nous recommandons sans hésitation. 
Merci pour ton accueil.

Aurélien was very quick to respond to my messages and very cordial and helpful. His place was very clean, comfortable and convenient to the metro (literally a very short stroll to Metro Viau. Aurélien was helpful and was there to greet me, a very good host. I would recommend him. It was quiet, which is what I needed for a night. Thanks
Like he was there if I needed anything
Aurélien présent sur place et disponible. Accueil amical, puis tranquillité absolue. Endroit parfait quand on a un rendez-vous au Planétarium juste à côté tôt le matin.
Clean and spacious room located close to the Metro Dome and a short walk from the train station.
Fantastic room. Great location, easy to get too. Easy communication, very private. A+++
Aurélien était très accessible pour l'organisation de notre séjour. La chambre était très bien.
La chambre était vraiment très belle. J'ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour.

Aurelien was very hospitable and the room was clean and perfect for our night in Montreal. Walking distance from the bio dome and nice neighborhood. 

Definitely would recommend!
Super.

This place was very private and cozy. Downtown, old Montreal and the Casino are only 20 mins away. It is right beside the Olympic Stadium and there are many food places nearby. Aubrelin was a great host!!!

Appartement propre et calme. Très proche du métro. Egalement proche du parc olympique.
J'ai passé très peu de temps dans l'appartement mais il répondait exactement à mon besoin.
Thank you I had a great stay! The place was clean, the price was right, and location perfect. Highly recommended.
Great
Tres bien
Really tidy and comfortable place, big room. Really close to metro stop. Aurélien messaged me a few times to make sure everything was ok. Really enjoyed my stay here.
Great room for a great price. Aurelien made me feel welcomed while still getting my privacy. I would highly recommend this listing to a friend.
Enjoyed staying at this place! Aurelien's been a great host. Other than weird odours in bathroom and the blanket, everything else was really clean!

Aurélien’s place is at a convenient location, 5 min walk from the biodome and botanical gardens - must see spots in Montreal. It is 2 min walk from the metro station which made our travel around the city a lot easier. Aurélien guided us in finding free street parking and was prompt in replying to all out texts.
It was cheap price but It's really clean, comfortable place to stay! Highly recommend!

He was super helpful. He had an emergency come up, so couldn't be there, so he had his friend at the last minute let me in. I had the place to myself, it was in a convenient area and nice and spacious.
It's a very quiet and lovely place for my 3-day stay in Montreal. A little bit far from the downtown though, it's still convenient to reach by Metro, and very close to the Metro Station "viau ".
Beautiful place right next to Olympic stadium!

This is a great place if you want to live the charm of Montreal in cozy neighborhood. Aureilen is a great host and really cool guy to talk with . 
The place is spotless, quiet and you get a welcome message when you come in what else can you ask for :)
Very accommodating and easy going. Pleasant stay. Recommend if you're traveling solo and on a budget!

Easy check-in, was able to park my car nearby. Room and place was clean and quiet, perfect for getting a good night sleep after being out in the city all day. 
So close to the metro, you can get to Berri-Uqam in a short amount of stops. Aurélien was very welcoming too. Overall it was a pleasant stay for my first Airbnb rental, and I would recommend this one very much.
Amazing experience! Great place - very clean and neat. Close to metro. Aurelien is very helpful and nice!
Un super séjour, propriétaire discret et très agréable. Quartier calme un plaisir
Très bien accueilli par Aurélien! Pour un court passage improvisé c'était parfait :)

This was a great airbnb. It was so close to the metro - maybe a minute and a half of a walk - and right on the edge of the Olympic park. My only issue was that I recently had hip surgery, and to get into the airbnb you have to go up two flights of very steep stairs. So for me that wasn't always easy - but it was clean, practical, and quiet. I hardly knew if my host was around which is how I like it. He was very courteous of my privacy. In addition he made check in easy as my flight to Montreal had been delayed, and he was able to accommodate.
Great place in good area  ( close to downtown ) . Room was very clean . Room had enough place for two persons .
Aurèlien was outstanding. He was very accommodating. His place was clean and quiet and met every expectation. I would definitely stay there again.
clean, close to a metro and friendly host!
Set in a quiet residential neighbourhood near the Olympic Stadium. Also practical, being near Viau Station.
Perfect location for Olympic Park, arena Maurice Richard, and Viau metro station.
Chambre très confortable et agréable
Nice place near Olympic Park, free parking 100m away. Responsible host. Recommend.
Really close to the subway station and only walk less than 5 minutes. Easily falling asleep because of quiet environment
Très bon séjour, description fidèle à la réalité. Merci pour tout !
Nice place - very clean. Nice view to Olympic Stadium - Aurelien  keep messaging me to make sure I am OK..  He does care !  Quick response time, when you messaged him.
Emplacement calme et très bien situé avec le métro station Viau à 2min à pied.  Très calme et vue sur le stade olympique depuis la cuisine

Aurélien is a wonderful host!  Easy to contact and very helpful.  The apartment is on a very quiet street and a 5 minute walk from the metro.  Very clean place with large kitchen and closet.  Note that it is up two flights of stairs.
La chambre est grande, agréable avec de grands rangements et très propre. L'appartement est situé à côté du biodome et à deux pas du métro dans un quartier calme.
Appartement conforme au description bon rapport qualité et hôte sympathique et discret.

Aurelien est un super hôte. La chambre est très grande. Nous sommes restés 7 nuits et tout était parfait. Très proche du parc olympique et de l'arrêt de métro Viau (moins de 5 min à pieds) ! C'est le top pour aller en centre ville également !! Vraiment rien à redire !

The bedroom and apartment are comfortable and quiet indeed. Close to the metro, buses and city bikes.
Aurélien is great host, although we did not see much each other he is very responsive and with some good recommendations!

Je vous le recommande absolument! 
Superbe appart, propre, près de tout et du stade olympique en plus !!!
Great host, always attentive and the place has a very well location. I definitely recomend it...

Bon rapport qualité prix , la chambre proposée est extrêmement calme ce qui m'a permis de dormir comme un bébé pendant toute la durée de mon séjour.
Le lit est confortable et la chambre est bien aménagé
Bonne location également , le logement se situe tout prés d'une station de métro et permet de se rendre au centre ville très rapidement.
En résumé très satisfaite de la chambre proposée par Aurélien .
Aurélien was so kind accepting my request at the last minute, he was in communication all the time and the house and bedroom are nice and clean.
Tres accueillant !

Very pleasant stay. The perfect location for the Olympic stadiums. Nice price. Spacious room. Warm. 

But the bathroom needs to be cleaned more often. It smells bad a bit.
房屋干净整洁,距离地铁站三分钟,出行非常方便｡旁边就有小超市,生活也极为方便｡如果下次过去,一定还会定他家房子｡
Logement très bien situé, tout près du métro et du stade Olympique. Chambre confortable et bon rapport qualité-prix.
Looking for a great place in Montreal that is affordable, clean and well laid out, look no further.  Great host.  Would visit again.
Had a great two nights here. No complaints of any kind. The bed was clean and comfortable which is always the main thing. Thanks agian.
Great host, location, and comfortable bed. Definitely would recommend.
A quiet, clean space and very close to the metro!
Nice, clean and quiet place
Good location and welcoming host

Aurelien welcomed us very warmly. He waited for us and gave us good recommendations the night we arrived.
The apartment was clean, good for 2 persons who spent a few days in Montreal.

name: Leilani Loft, walk to Anini Beach
summary: Gorgeous, spacious, bright & airy 2nd story end unit studio with loft, overlooking Princeville Golf Course & path to Anini Beach (15 min walk/hike). Ideal North Shore location; walk to shops & restaurants; enjoy great trade winds, large lanai, pool and mountain views.
space: Leilani Loft is a gorgeous, spacious, bright & airy second story studio with a loft, overlooking Princeville Golf Course, path to Anini Beach and the mountains. Ideal North Shore location; walk to Anini Beach, shops & restaurants.  Enjoy all the comforts of Kauai's premier resort community on the stunning North Shore, while still being away from the crowds, secluded to the backdrop of green meadows and mountain views.    Leilani means heavenly flower and the studio is decorated in earthy elegance with  Cumara Teak flooring, Ipe wood stairs, terra cotta tile, large & comfortable bamboo sectional couch, wood furniture and exquisite wood carvings.  Expansive windows with dreamy white curtains bring a cooling breeze and the experience of Kauai's incredible nature inside!  From the spacious lanai enjoy views of the lush green vastness of the golf course, tree lined pathway to Anini Beach and distant mountain views.  The spacious Loft opens up to the living and dining areas, allowing natural
description: Gorgeous, spacious, bright & airy 2nd story end unit studio with loft, overlooking Princeville Golf Course & path to Anini Beach (15 min walk/hike). Ideal North Shore location; walk to shops & restaurants; enjoy great trade winds, large lanai, pool and mountain views. Leilani Loft is a gorgeous, spacious, bright & airy second story studio with a loft, overlooking Princeville Golf Course, path to Anini Beach and the mountains. Ideal North Shore location; walk to Anini Beach, shops & restaurants.  Enjoy all the comforts of Kauai's premier resort community on the stunning North Shore, while still being away from the crowds, secluded to the backdrop of green meadows and mountain views.    Leilani means heavenly flower and the studio is decorated in earthy elegance with  Cumara Teak flooring, Ipe wood stairs, terra cotta tile, large & comfortable bamboo sectional couch, wood furniture and exquisite wood carvings.  Expansive windows with dreamy white curtains bring a cooling breeze and the e
neighborhood_overview: The studio is located in the beautiful resort community of Princeville on the legendary North Shore of Kauai.  Majestic mountains and gorgeous beaches are minutes away.  Perfectly situated to enjoy all the beauty of the North Shore- with the convenience of being walking distance to shops and restaurants.    The Princeville shopping center is about 1/2 mile away (about 10min walk) and Anini Beach is also 1/2 mile away and about a 15min walk/hike.   The studio is located in the quieter part of the complex and has the benefit of fronting the golf course- so there are no neighbors at the back side- just trees and lush green open space.   Take the short hike down the bluff to the beautiful, reef protected Anini Beach.  This northernmost section of Anini is very secluded with warm, clear water and great views.  The pathway to the beach is just outside the studio and offers great views of the coastline.   Also great to be able to walk to the Princeville  Shopping center, where you will find r
notes: Please Note: The "Management Fee" is actually the county taxes we are required to collect and pay.
transit: We recommend renting a car so that you are able to explore this beautiful island freely.  We offer free designated parking.
access: Guests have access to all areas of the loft.
interaction: We are available during your stay if you need any assistance.  Our local manager and housekeeper, Jennifer is also available, her contact info is in the guestbook.

host.host_about: I'm from Southern California.  I enjoy nature, yoga and healthy food.  Absolutely love the magical island of Kauai and feel excited to share it with our guests.

reviews.comments: Mana was really helpful and ofered lots of ideas and resources to us. she is available and gets back to you right away. the loft is in a pretty town. the beach is fminutes walking away walking distance from the loft. really clean and confortable place. We felt like home.

The Leilani Loft is a beautiful loft and is very welcoming.  It's very clean and was perfect for the two of us.  Diana is very very sweet and really helpful. I called her with a few questions. She answered every call and every question happily.  There were only a few things that could have made the stay better, which I think were out of her control. There was no propane for the community grille and the wifi wasn't working.  Overall the stay was nice!
My fiancé and I stayed at mana's place and it was very clean. It is located close to the a nice private beach which was one of the nicest beaches in Kauai. Mana was a very helpful host.
Mana was extremely responsive and made everything very easy. The loft was wonderful and was a great to call home for the week we were on this beautiful island.

Kauai é um lugar extraordinário! 
Leilani Loft é um ótimo lugar para um casal desfrutar dessa ilha.
O loft está bem perto do Princeville center, onde há supermercado e outras lojas.
O loft possui todo o necessário e é muito confortável.

We really enjoyed staying in the Leilani Loft. It was beautiful, clean, and comfortable. The bed was so amazing. My husband and I loved cooking dinners (when we didn't want to go out) and doing laundry on some days. If you're looking for a place to stay that's close to Hanalei Bay and Foodland, this is it! Hanalei is about 10 minutes away and you could walk to Foodland. This location is also very close to the Queens Bath and the St. Regis hotel. If you're interested in going to other places on the island it will be a drive from here. The only small things I wish would have been provided in the kitchen were a toaster and oven mitts.

This was an absolutely amazing place to stay. It was located on the north end of the island, close to the St. Regis without the hyped expense. It was clean, easy to get to and decorated appropriately.  My wife and I loved it for our 3 nights in Kauai. It helped that Kauai, was an absolutely enchanting island. It was close to everything we wanted to see and explore and very close to the grocery store.  Food is expensive on the islands but we got away with cooking a few nice meals.

I think it helped that we went at the right time of the year, the nights were cool and the fans helped.  This place is perfect for a romantic get-away for two. 

Mana was easy to get a hold of, the doors are all electric so worrying about lost keys. 

We did not use the pool because well, you are in Hawaii and the ocean was our pool, but it looked nice and kept up.

We are already talking about coming back, and if is just the two of us returning.

We loved our stay at Leilani Loft! We honeymooned in Kauai for 6 nights and the condo was the perfect fit for us! We'd been told by several family members and friends that the North Shore was the place to stay in Kauai, and now we couldn't agree more. Although it's the rainier side and is a less central location, it is, in our opinion, the prettiest side! We enjoyed the Princeville Center (Lei Petite was an excellent coffee/breakfast stop) and our favorite town on Kauai was Hanalei - about 10 minutes from the condo. We drove all over the island and although it was a bit of a trek to the west side we were still able to easily do it all in one day at a leisurely pace. The condo itself looks just as the photos depict. The loft is larger than I thought, although you have to watch your head on the beams on one side of the bed. It's airy and comfortable for 2 people. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the bedding was cool for those warm evenings. There is no ceiling fan in the loft but two table top fans keep it cool enough (as long as you don't mind the noise of them, which we didn't). There are two ceiling fans above the living area. The kitchen was fairly well equipped and had a dishwasher (although there was no dishwasher soap, just Dawn dish soap for hand washing) and we made a few meals while we were there easily. The knives really need sharpening and a toaster would be handy. We had a few ant issues near the trash can but I think that's probably typical for the island. The TV comes with a Roku for your Netflix/Hulu/Sling TV viewing pleasures and the wifi worked well. The bathroom is a good size but could use a hair dryer for forgetful ladies like myself! I thought the proximity to the neighbors might be a problem (especially with all the doors and windows open all the time) but we didn't have any issues. The walking trail back near the golf course is just lovely for watching the sunrise or stargazing in the evenings. The lanai is large and has a great greenery view. I do wish there was a small table and chairs for breakfast out on the lanai. We never went to the pool - who needs a pool when you're on an island?! The electronic lock on the door was being finicky when we arrived and had to be replaced. We were able to get a hold of the host easily when we were having issues. It was replaced the next day but we weren't notified that they'd be coming. We came back from the beach to someone fixing the lock. Probably would have been good to know they were coming first but it wasn't a big deal and we were happy to not have any further issues getting in after the new...

We absolutely loved Leilani Loft! Mana was very welcoming from the first email, and sent us some great suggestions of hikes and things to do. She was very easy to communicate with. The loft itself was very clean, and really felt like home. It really does have everything you need. Being an end unit, the living area has a lot of windows which provide plenty of air flow, making it cool and refreshing in most of the apartment. The bed is very comfy, and we slept well. Plus, the location was just superb - we became big fans of Foodland which is very close. It's very easy to drive from Princeville to many other parts of the island. And the hike up Hanakapi'ai falls is just amazing - not to be missed if you are physically able and have the time to do it. It didn't take us long to drive to the start of the trail from the apartment, which is important when you need to get there early to find a parking spot!

The path to the local beach is great and right behind the loft, although it is steep at the end and can be muddy - wear your sneakers! And then you'll need to wade across the stream to get a beach you can actually sit on. So it's not quite an easy stroll that you can make with flip flops and massive beach bags, but still super cool.

I was scanning everyone else's reviews for reports about rooster noise, so here is mine - you can hear roosters sometimes, if they wander close by. But I never got woken up by one, so all is good, and it doesn't seem like any were living right under the windows. I will say that the fans in the sleeping loft are a bit loud, and we were using them partly for white noise (you can hear people in the neighboring apartment otherwise) so that may have helped us also with not being woken by roosters. The airflow and fan noise in the sleeping loft might be my only slight complaint - as there are no windows upstairs it can get warm up there without the fans going. Still, even with that very small issue, I would not hesitate to go back.

Beautiful loft - we really enjoyed our stay here. It was a short walk to our favorite beach (Anini) on the island. The beach is perfect for all ages - our 9 month old baby loved being able to crawl around in the shallow water and sit under the trees. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

Great place to stay in Kauai! The loft is even larger and nicer than it seemed from the photos. Was spacious, very clean when we arrived and well equipped. Location is a short walk to shopping and dining in Princeville. Would highly recommend this listing!

The place was great, perfect for our 10 day stay on the island. We would recommend it to anyone. Spacious, quiet, clean, stocked with the basics, nice pool. It was good to be able to cook, do laundry, make our own cocktails, watch Netflix  or sit on the patio - when we were at home. Helped us save money and time. Well worthwhile.

I highly recommend staying at Mana's place in Princeville on Kauai! We loved staying on the north shore for our honeymoon and the place was just as described. Mana sent us a very detailed welcome letter prior to our arrival that made the entire trip seamless. Thanks for everything!

The apartment was very nice - clean with all appliances and furniture in great shape. The deck out back is private and was pleasant for a cup of coffee or glass of wine. We also appreciated the proximity to Princeville Center to stock up before heading out for the day. The only drawback for us was that the walls upstairs in the loft are pretty thin and you can hear the neighbors. Overall, it's a good spot if you're looking to stay on the North Shore.

The condo was spacious and had a wonderful kitchen.
The pool was nice and it was close enough to the beach to walk.
Over all I was very happy with our stay.

The apartment is very well decorated and is complete with all the things that we needed for a lovely stay. The apartment is a short drive from lovely local beaches, and is well located to explore the north of Kauai.
The host was very responsive to our requests, and the check in information was very good.
Overall I would recommend the apartment.

The Leilani Loft was wonderful.  Our host gave us a great list of suggested hikes.  In addition, the condo was beautifully appointed.  It was pristine and we had all the amenities we needed.  It was great to have access to laundry.  That was a big plus.  The path down to the beach was a pretty hike and the beach was secluded.  It was a lovely experience staying there.

Te Leilani Loft and Mana are both amazing.  The later even more so.  We had actually booked 2 days later than we had ended up needing at the last minute and Mana was perfectly accomodating and got us in with about 30min notice saved us from being stranded. The space itself is fantastic with every amenity and more you could want.  The location is perfect, wonderful access to Hanalei and all of Princeville and a very cool private(ish) beach.  Couldn't recommend more strongly
The loft was easy to find and the directions were helpful. The condo pictures on the website present the loft exactly as it is. The decor is open and fresh.

This was a nice place to stay for our five day visit to the north shore of Kauai. The apartment was clean and comfortable, and having the washer/dryer and a stocked-enough kitchen was nice. We really enjoyed the proximity to Na Pali coast, great hikes, and the nice beaches within walking distance.

Our biggest complaint was being disturbed by loud music and our neighbor's intimate moments over four of the five days. This woke us up on multiple occasions, including 10 p.m.-ish, middle of the night, and 7:15 a.m. All of which was a big disappointment for us because we were recovering from being sick and looking for a quiet, relaxing environment.

Leilani Loft was a lovely relaxing place to stay...perfectly suited for a couple. It was clean and well appointed. We did find the kitchen and bathroom lighting on the dim side since only half the light bulbs were functional. An energy saving tactic , maybe? Overall a very good experience.
excellent

We felt very welcome at the Leilani Loft! It was as described and clean. We liked that it was nicely located on the north shore, about 10-15 mins from Hanalei Bay, which is where we tended to spend our time. We had a friend who lived in Honolulu, who hopped over to Kauai for a couple of days to visit us, we were incredibly appreciative that this wasn't an issue for our host. The only drawback to the loft was that we could hear our neighbors in the loft next door (we had read about this in the reviews) it was not a big deal for us, since we were generally out and about all day..but I'm guessing for guests sensitive to sound this could be bothersome. We appreciated that the host was accessible by email if we needed anything! Overall, we had a wonderful time in Kauai, and the Leilani Loft was comfortable and safe. Mahalo!

We enjoyed our stay at the studio very much and hope to return and stay again. Kaua'i is great. You definitely need a rental car. Highly recommend doing some guided hikes. Swimming and boogie boarding at the beach is great, too. The studio is as-advertised... very nice place and centrally located on the North Shore.

The loft was awesome. Perfect for two people! It was nice and clean and I definitely felt really comfortable there. Mana had even helped me with some questions I had about the wifi and made sure everything was as it should be. Also the beach that was near the loft was awesome.

The loft was a wonderful spot to stay in Kauai - bright with lots of fresh air, very clean, great ammenities with easy check-in and access.  Minutes from Hanalei and very close to the Napali trails; a car is definitely necessary from this location.  We did notice that you could hear neighbours easily from the loft, but had no problems at all.  Would definitely stay here again.

It was our first time using Airbnb and we have to say....Our first stay at Mana's loft was awesome. From the time of check -in to check out. Everything went so smoothly. Her home was more than what we expected. All the amenities we needed were available. The location was far more than what we wanted. A 5-6 minute walk path lead you to one of Kauai's secluded and beautiful beaches. A perfect choice for honeymooners like us. Hanalei bay was only just a few minutes away, which had wonderful restaurants and entertainment. I mean, I can go on and on...We highly recommend this loft. Parking was right in front of your building and the neighborhood was quite and peaceful. We really enjoyed it all. The overall feng shui of this loft was relaxing. We truly felt at home.

The loft is a great base from which to explore the north side of Kauai. It is more spacious than I had imagined, and the kitchen is perfect for preparing a quick meal before a hike. The king-size bed is very comfortable. The bedroom loft wall abuts the next unit ("Bali Hale, walk to Anini Beach" here on Airbnb) and sounds come through as others have mentioned. It kept us up at first, however, we wrote a polite note to our neighbors and then everything was cool.

The host was helpful and everything went according to plan, so overall a very nice stay.

Great open spacious place in a awesome location. Super clean and has everything you need. Wall between units is paper thin so if you don't want to hear every word spoken and noise made from the next door bedroom run both bedside fans on high!

We felt very welcome at this beautiful apartment, with good instructions left on how to use everything. The apartment is as described, spacious, clean and comfortable, with a well equipped kitchen and nice additional things like coffee and laundry detergent. The location is great, with a supermarket near and in such a beautiful setting. It was a perfect base for all the activities we did, but also great for relaxing or having dinner in. We had friends staying near by and cooked together most mornings and in the evening which was lovely. Things to be aware of, it is the more lush tropical side of the island so there are bugs, though we followed instructions and saw none in the apartment, so definitely stick to this. As people have mentioned you can hear roosters throughout the night and general traffic but this seems typical of all of Kauai and we didn't find it bothersome. You can't here the neighbours below or next door in the main part of the apartment. In the bedroom you can hear the apartment next door quite clearly, but as we were only sleeping here and our neighbours were quiet at this time it wasn't a problem, and we knew we could contact someone if it was. Overall this was a wonderful place to stay, and much better than a hotel. We would certainly recommend staying here and would return again.

Had a great time - Kauai is an incredible place and I enjoyed staying on the northern side of the island.  I really appreciated the recommendations for things to do, places to eat, etc. that were provided.  Thank you!

Apartment was clean, spacious, and beautiful.  In a super convenient location on the North shore-- close to all the great beaches.  Mana was super responsive throughout our trip.  Definitely recommend a stay here!

Enjoyed our stay in Leilani Loft.  This unit is located in a small apartment complex made up of mostly 2 story buildings.  The unit backs up to a golf course.  The view is obscured through the trees, but that didn't bother us much.  The trail to Anini Beach passes right behind the building, and definitely worth a look.  The apartment itself is comfortable for two adults, with a full kitchen as well as a washer & dryer.  The kitchen has had a refresh, and looks good.  Everything we needed was there, and the appliances we used worked just fine.  It has a TV, which we were happy to say we never turned on.  Kauai is outside, why would you want to watch TV?  :)

One thing to note, this is not a hotel.  That's great in lots of ways, but less great in others.  The downstairs neighbors are residents, and they had a huge fight while we were there (about a library card of all things).  You can pretty much hear every word.  I'd still choose to stay here again on my next Kauai visit, just keep in mind that this is an actual apartment complex and not a hotel.

Altogether, we really enjoyed the place.  Apart from that one blip, this was perfect for our needs.  Mana and Jennifer were helpful with the one issue that did pop up (missing parking permit), and after that it was smooth sailing.  Recommend it for couples that want a place that feels like home.

We loved this beautiful lofted apartment! Mana left great instructions on how to use everything. The apartment was very spacious, clean and comfortable, with a fantastic kitchen that we utilized as much as possible (thank you for that blender). We also greatly appreciated the extra amenities such as extra laundry detergent and extra coffee. The location is fantastic, it's right as you enter on the road to St. Regis so it's easy to spot. It's a quick and easy drive to Anini beach and other north shore beaches such as tunnels and ke'e. It was a perfect base for all the activities we did, but also great for relaxing. We also loved how we could keep the windows and backdoor open since it there are screens throughout the apartment. When it would rain at night or in the morning, we felt like we were in the jungle with the sounds of birds (beware of  roosters but those are everywhere), wind, and rain. In the lofted bedroom, you can hear the apartment next door quite clearly, but as we were only sleeping here and our neighbours were quiet at this time it wasn't a problem, and we knew we could contact someone if it was. Overall this was a wonderful place to stay, and so much better than a hotel. We would definitely recommend staying here!

Our stay at the Leilani Loft was wonderful.  The apartment is clean and nice.  The location is great, as we were able to access so many nice beaches.  We walked to Anini, which was the calmest ocean water I've ever seen.  It is warm, but we kept the fans on and the lights off.  It was a nice place to come home to after a day of exploring the island.
This place is a real score! It was an amazing value especially when you couple it with a costco membership for groceries and gas. I really can't say enough about this spot. I absolutely recommend it!

We enjoyed our stay at Leilani Loft! It was conveniently located with easy access to the grocery store and other shops and restaurants and a quick ten minute drive to Hanalei. The loft is well maintained and very clean. The fans and trade winds in the loft kept us cool both during the day and at night.

Just what we were looking for and exactly as described. Very clean, bright and airy. Great value and great location. Loved having the full kitchen so that the majority of our meals could be prepared from locally sourced tropical fruits and vegetables. Farmers Markets close by twice a week or more if needed. Thank you for a wonderful experience!!

Mana's Leilani Loft is perfectly located on the North Shore of Kauai. It's so easy to get around from her place. If you don't feel like driving it's a short walk to Anini Beach which is a beautiful small beach. Her home is also close to grocery stores and shops. Beware though, there is no AC so if you need constant cold air this is not the place. The bed in the loft area can get a bit hot even with two fans going, but I loved the feeling so I'm not complaining! Definitely would stay here again!
Spacious place in a good location. Tastefully decorated. Good proximity too all North Shore Activities. We really enjoyed keyless locks on all doors.

The loft was beautiful and extremely clean. There were plenty of fans to help direct the fresh air and keep us cool. It was a short drive to the store for groceries. I will say the walk to the Beach was a little closer to a hike, the downhill bit was a little rough on my wife since she recently sprained her ankle however once we got to the beach it was SOOOO worth the hike. It was beautiful and secluded, it felt like our own private beach. Also the last day our flight was pushed back later in the evening and the host adjusted the check out time for us, THANK YOU!!

We had a great time at Leilani Loft! It was a great base for exploring the North Shore of Kauai, and the loft itself was very clean and comfortable. We contacted Diana with a few minor things, and she was incredibly fast getting back to us. Overall, a great stay!

The loft was beautifully decorated and a relaxing place to stay. The walls are thin in bedroom area, so you can easily hear the conversations of others. Anini beach is a half mile walk away, part of the trail is steep and slick after rain.

We stayed here for 3 nights on our honeymoon after being at a resort for 5 nights. The place was very nice inside. Clean, and decorated beautifully. The towels were nice hotel quality, and it was awesome being able to do laundry. But there was no AC which made it hard for us to sleep at night. The kitchen was equipped with the basic tools we needed, but they don't keep any cooking spray or oil for the pans so make sure to get some if you plan on cooking. we really enjoyed watching for all the lizards, but if you don't like lizards this isn't the place for you. Also, the loft upstairs had a low, angled ceiling and my husband knocked his head a few times. All in all this was a nice place to stay for a few nights after being in a hotel room at a resort for a week, but I probably wouldn't have wanted to be here for more than the 3 nights we were here.

Perfect neighborhood, and lots of communication. I would just say that the 10 minute walk to Anini Beach is more like a 20 minute hike, culminating in a hill that locals referred to as "no breath hill" ... if you're up for it though, Anini is beautiful. All in all I would absolutely stay here again.
Great location, comfortable place with everything you could need. We loved our stay.

This place is AMAZING, I would highly recommend it. The pictures are accurate, and actually its even better in person. The location in great and the grounds of the property are perfect. We had an amazing stay!!
I had such a great time staying in Leilani Loft. It was everything as advertised, and getting around was easy. I would most certainly stay here again, thank you!
Great stay!! Very spacious and clean, great location, amazing hospitality!
We loved staying here. Cozy loft, close to the beach and Princeville Center. The big kitchen and grill by the pool were great for cooking fresh fish. Everything we needed was provided. Thanks!

The place is spotless and beautiful. Perfect for a couple. We stayed in November so heat was not an issue. We loved how convenient it was to everything we wanted to see and do. The trail to the beach was not an easy stroll but it was fun! 
Mana was very nice and when we hit a snag with the parking pass she called me back immediately on Thanksgiving. My husband and I would love to stay here again!

We were visiting for the weekend from our home on the Big Island....a little island hopping.  The location of this unit was fantastic. We get up and go all day when visiting the other (Website hidden by Airbnb) this is a great place to crash and go! Very clean and very livable for the two of us on our short stay.  The neighbors were respectably quiet as sound transmission between units is clearly a challenge    All the essentials were provided....we would stay there again and recommend it to other like minded explorers...

This little loft was perfect for my boyfriend and I.  We had stayed at the Westin in the past and liked how close this place was to the resorts and to the restaurants / shops on the  North side.
Although some of the reviews said they experienced noisy neighbors we did not encounter any noise from the adjoining units.
The kitchen was well stocked with tea and coffee included.  Laundry soap and dryer sheets were provided. the bathroom is stocked with hair products and body wash etc.
Perfect place for visitors who are active during the day and need a comfortable place to crash at night.
Amazing place to stay, undoubtedly best value for the money. The apartment is up to date and exceptionally clean. Jennifer was an awesome help and so nice. 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
The weather was great, neighbors friendly and the window washers were polite and efficient.
Location was goid
Great place, clean, spacious and well-furnished. It is a quiet  residential area. About 15min walk to the beach and shops/restaurant. Access to the house and area almost requires a car.

We loved our stay at Leilani Loft.  The place is lovely, comfortable and well-equipped. There's a beautiful ocean view just steps from your door, and it's close to Hanalei (2.5 miles) and lots of great beaches (though the walk to Anini Beach is pretty steep and doesn't take you to the best part of  the beach. We drove to Anini Beach Park and liked that better.)  We especially liked the deck, which has comfortable furniture and looks out on a wooded walking path which is filled with birds singing.  We also enjoyed the pool a lot.  Diana was very accessible, including when we had to call her to get the code to the door again after getting locked out right away by a gust of wind!   One caveat - the ceiling is very low on one  side of the  loft, so  the person sleeping on that  side of the bed is at risk of hitting their head on some low beams.   We had no problems with noise from the  other units.  There were a lot  of roosters crowing at all hours, but they didn't bother us.  We found them charming.  Overall, we were very happy with the place and would happily return.

The condo was clean and easy to find. There were kitchen tools, but no extras (cooking oils, etc). The bed was comfortable! We didn't make down the path to the beach because it always seemed to be raining when we had a free moment. Keep in mind that you'll need to drive out of Princeville to find most things, but over all it was a pleasant stay.
Very nice and would stay there again.
Beautiful house in a cool, accessible part to Kauai

Great place! Loved the location and the overall feel of the place. It was a great place to return to after a day of exploring. The lofted bedroom is cute but it does get pretty hot up there. This ended up working in my favor so I didn't spend my vacation sleeping in. Mana is quick to respond to any questions and truly set the place up to be welcoming. She even allowed us to check out a little later due to our flight being late in the evening. I was so sad to leave this place that felt like home. I recommend this over a hotel or resort any day!

Mana's place was great. It was one of the few units we saw in the Princeville area that had a full kitchen and was reasonably priced. It made a big difference to be able to have some meals at home. The trade winds keep the place cool, but it was a bit warm in the loft. Mana does provide fans upstairs, but we chose not use them because of the noise. The walk to the beach is about 15 minutes- slippery when rainy,  but totally worth it. There are nice routes for morning runs, followed by a dip in the pool. It is a close drive to Hanalei, and there's a grocery store about 2 minutes away. A great place to stay!

This place is awesome! It's very hip and chic. The kitchen is big with all the amenities needed. However, there is no cooking oil, butter, sugar, etc so make sure to bring stuff to cook with! It gets hot up in the loft, but with both fans on and all the windows open it stayed a comfortable temperature. The studio is also close to a shopping center with a grocery store and breakfast places! This studio is big with a large lanai! Another great plus is the washer and dryer - there were even 2 laundry detergent pods and 2 dryer sheets left for us to use! Highly recommend this place. We wish we could have stayed longer!
Lovely place to stay on Kaua'i.

We had a great stay! The space was clean and exactly as pictured. The north shore location was great. Close to great beaches and Hanalei Bay. Small quiet pool for a late afternoon cool off. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for the perfect little place to call home on our trip.

There wasn't much of a description for this space so there was a lot of room for clarification. For example, the main reason we went with this space was because of the "walk to Anini Beach" - this was not accurate. It was a short hike (not a walk, as it was super steep) and it got us to Wyllie's Beach - not Anini Beach. There also was lack of amenities in order to cook including no oil, tongs, etc. There was also no water filtering system - like a Brita. 

The key code was super confusing when we first checked in. I really wish there were actually keys, as I had to search my inbox each time we came and went. It was also not clear what unit was ours once we got into the main door.

I felt like this was overpriced - the loft had no windows upstairs so it got super warm and muggy, and didn't put the trade winds to use. We also had to do a bunch of cleaning although we were charged a cleaning fee.

We loved the Leilani Loft! It's probably been our best AirBnb experience so far. It is very clean, no bugs at all, which is quite a feat in Hawaii. It is also just a lovely space. The walk to the beach was really beautiful and we loved being on the northern part of the island. There's no AC, but it was not really a problem (we were there in July). We put one of the fans by a window pointing up towards the loft and that created a really pleasant airflow. I highly recommend this place!

Our stay at Leilani Loft was perfect! The location is great, centrally located for short drives to all the beautiful north shore beaches. The short walk to the shops & restaurants down the paved path was really convenient. We loved relaxing on the quiet shady back balcony with the cool wind & trees. The fans in the loft helped keep the loft nice & cool at night for comfortable sleeping. This place is a great find & we highly recommend it! Chris & Kelly

Mana's place is lovely. We really enjoyed our stay. The loft is super nice, the pictures don't do it justice (much nicer in person than expected).
The location is also great. Anini beach is located very close, about a 15 min walk, and the way to the beach is beautiful.
Hanaley bay is located very close too, about a 10 min drive, and you'll be able to find some hip places to eat close by as well, about a 5 min drive. 
We highly recommend this place, and would definitely love to stay here again on our next trip to Kauai :)

Ejona

For those, like me, unfamiliar with Kauai, Princeville isn't really a "town." It's more of a strip mall cum gas station. The loft is super close to the cute town of Hanalei -- about 5 to 10 minutes by car. Also, the better way to Anini Beach is to drive the 10 minutes to the beach park, rather than walk along the path behind the loft. The path is sketchy at night.

The condo is lovely, cool, and clean. Great kitchen, comfortable bed. Roomy! No real view to speak of, lots of trees. Great location. Easy to get to great restaurants , shopping, and markets. We really enjoyed staying there.

The loft was amazing! Everything we needed was there including dishes, soaps, and even beach chairs. The beach nearby is a bit of a trek but very worth it and secluded. The loft had plenty of airflow and was fresh, only feeling a little warm at night upstairs which was remedied by the 2 fans provided. Grocery store is across the street and there is everything you could ask for within 2 minutes of the loft. 10/10 will come back!

We had an amazing stay. Mana's comms leading up to and during our stay were stellar and we were made to feel right at home. The space is open, clean and well lit. You're close to both popular sights, good restaurants and stores. Hoping to be back again one of these days!
This is a great place to stay!  We were a little concerned about the lack of AC bit it actually stayed pretty cool at night with the windows open.  I would highly recommend staying here!

Mana's place was beautiful! A short drive to neighboring town and a little bit longer drive to some other places, but the area was very quiet and peaceful. Communication was great! She always got back to us right away when we had a question. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Firstly, I have to say, we loved this place and would definitely revisit.  Leilani Loft is situated on the north side of the island in Princeville which in my opinion is the most beautiful side of the island - very green, mountainous, beautiful calm seas and beaches etc. Here are my highlights: (in no particular order!)

- Loved the TV with NETFLIX, Amazon Prime etc. 
- The kitchen was great and we saved money (slightly) by buying food at Foodland and cooking in. The kitchen provided all the utensils required to cook etc.  NOTE: Food out / food in general is very expensive in Kauai...! 
- The bedroom was very cosy although we kept bumping ourselves on the wooden beams.  
- The appartment got quite hot, especially at night but Mana provided bedside fans and the silky bedsheet made for a perfect night sleep. 
- Princeville is a short drive from Hanalei Bay which has a great beach and great places to eat.  A highlight was Kalypso - nice bar and decent, not overpriced food as can be said about the majority of places on the island.
