- Waimea Canyon is superb and the trails are worth walking
- Wailea Waterfall kayaking is a fantastic day out.
- Kalalau Trail is awesome.  There's also a beautiful beach right next to it.
- Note to those fearing bugs! - I hate bugs and after all the hiking etc. I had expected to see a lot of big tropical spiders but I saw a total of 2 spiders in my whole stay and they were pretty small 1.5" across... NONE in the house, one cockroach... but the Raid spray under the kitchen sink put an end to that b**** very quickly.
- Oh and the pool is super close by, no one was using it, it was clean and perfect for relaxing!  
- The beach nearest the appartment is a 10 minute walk... it is a very peaceful beautiful, calm beach.  Not many people there although with the lack of people there are numerous crabs running about - if you can handle that.  

 Thanks Mana, we loved it!

Mana's place was perfect for the 4 nights we spent on the north shore. It's location was convenient for all of our activities on the north shore and it's a short walk from a couple of restaurants, a grocery store, and a lovely beach.

We loved staying at this place!   Mana was great with her communication before, during and after.   It was a very pretty, clean place.  There was a nice breeze running through with the fans, windows, and screen door.   I liked the 2 small fans on each night stand in the loft.  The locations was great!  We hiked to Anini Beach and enjoyed the view of the beautiful beach.    Another time we drove there and and did some snorkeling.  We saw a lot of sea turtles and beautiful fish.   It's a short drive away from shops and good places to eat.  We loved eating at Chicken in a Barrel, Piazza, and L & L Hawaiian BBQ.  We had plenty of room in the kitchen to stock up on food for breakfast/lunch.  This was a great place to come back to at night to relax and get ready for the next day.  I highly recommend booking this place.  Thanks Mana!
Other than a tiny little issue with some bugs, we had a great stay! Local grocery store is a stones throw away, very convenient. Love the loft floor plan!
Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Manas Loft, hat unsere Erwartungen übertroffen! Wir können es uneingeschränkt empfehlen!
What a beautiful space! We weren’t here much because of our short stay but we looked forward to coming back to this space every night.
Everything was exactly as described. Close to the beach and close to places to eat and shop. Provided great tips on local attractions.
Great place to stay, appliances all full size and great to cook dinner an breakfasts in. Couch is comfy and so is the bed, fans make the nights nice an cool.

사진과 똑같은 좋은 장소였습니다
가까운곳에 편의시설이 있고
동네가 조용하고 깨끗했습니다

What a great space!  We loved staying at Leilani Loft!  Clean, uncluttered, open space and everything you'd need for a comfortable stay.  Great location in Princeville, close to Princeville Shopping Center, golf courses, and jogging trail.  Host was gracious and quick to respond to our inquiries.  We highly recommend this place, and will look to stay here again!  Thank you for your hospitality :)
Great place in every way. The beach right out back was a great surprise

This place was stylish and conveniently located. It was nice to be in a quiet area away from the main drag but close enough to access shops, bars, and a market. Great for couples looking to stay on the North side of the island.
Erholung ist bei der Lage sichergestellt. Mitten im Grünen, Natur pur. Nicht weit zum Supermarkt,  nur freundliche Menschen.

Great & clean loft! Great walking distance to restaurant, bar and store with great poke. Also an easy walk to the beach- yes it’s a trail but it’s beautiful and so easy. It’s even in the same neighborhood as Queen’s Bath! Super clean, comfy bed, yes there are roosters but nothing ear plugs can’t fix- otherwise get up and go see the sunrise! Would definitely stay again :)

We had a great stay! We used the kitchen every morning to cook breakfast and have coffee to save a little on going out. The laundry was also a great option as we like to hike and things were a little muddy after all the rains. We found a walking path that led to the grocery, food and tiki bar or its a quick 5 min drive. The place was spacious for 2 people and had everything we needed.

Great space with a great vibe. Perfect for two people. Close to Hanalei bay. There's also a great walk down to Anini beach. The beach feels like you are in your own movie! The roosters were beautiful with their hens and baby chicks. They are everywhere! Peaceful place to rest at the end of the day.
Buen departamento y amplio en Princeville. Zona tranquila. Todo ha estado muy bien.
Kitchen is lovely! The walk to the beach is steep and muddy. A car is a must.

This was our 2nd stay at Leilani Loft, and we loved it as much as our stay last year! It is spacious and clean, with a breezy deck looking out over bird filled trees and a quiet golf course. The loft cools down at night for a comfortable nights sleep. The location is great, as it is a short pleasant walk to many dining options, grocery store, and gift shopping. This is a great find!!

This is a wonderful home base for a stay on the north shore. There are enough shops and restaurants nearby to keep you satisfied after a day of taking in the island’s beauty. Bring your hiking shoes for the walk to Anini beach or drive a bit to the tranquil beach access just to the south. The washer and drier were awesome for saving suitcase space for souvenirs. Overall, we would absolutely stay again!

So I booked the loft for a honeymoon trip and it was wonderful. Being from Oregon it was definitely warm for me but after a few days I adjusted. The loft cooled down at night quickly whenever the Tradewinds blow. One night they didn’t blow enough but it still vented out and cooled by 10pm. I really enjoyed the hike down to the beach. It was steep but if you take your time and bring water it’s pleasant. I surf fished Annani beach from the rocks and caught many different kinds of fish. I left 3 fishing poles and tackle hopefully whoever stays there has good luck. 
Thank you for a lovely stay it won’t be one I will forget.

Mana's loft was the perfect place to be our 'home' for the week while exploring and adventuring around Kauai.  Close to restaurants, grocery store and farmer's markets. Amenities were great and check in couldn't have been easier! Thanks for hosting our amazing trip!
Die Unterkunft war sehr geräumig und hatte eine Waschmaschine, was top war. Leider war es in der Nacht zum Teil sehr warm in der Unterkunft (keine Klimaanlage).
A nice place and location. Barebones amenities. Found the lanai to unusable. The loft and bed arrangement can be hard on your head.

Dear Mana, thank you so much for the perfect stay in your apartment. It was extremly clean, very spacious and cosy and we loved the lanai. The bed was also very comfortable. 
Thank you so much for your hospitality!

Annika and Julian
The best place that we ever rented

This is a special gem! We were so happy with  our stay, we felt like home, nothing but great accommodations. The place is enough room for a couple getting away. Has all the amenities if wanting to cook or hangout in the condo. We didnt use everything but it was nice to know those things were there to use if needed. Diana was great at answering any questions we had and was super insightful. 
This place is at the North side of the island so if you want see more of the south this isn't the place. It's about 1 hour away or more. But it's ideal so you can drive around and get a well rounded experience. A lot of beaches on the way. There's so much to see and food to taste. Great stay overall!!

This is a really spacious loft that had a cozy feel. The location is walking distance to shops and restaurants.  The chickens were charming and the surrounding area was really nice. The path to the beach wasn’t an easy one, be prepared for a kinda steep rough walk.
Staying at Mana's place was awesome! Close to a shopping center with great restaurants- easy check in process and everything you could need for some fun at the beach in Kauai.

Was a good little loft, only did thing that bothered me was all the bugs that we found. The small “hike” to the beach is pretty steep up and down. Beach wasn’t the best but it is a 15 minute walk from the loft.

First off, they were very accommodating with the early check in as our flight landed very early in the morning. Communication was very easy, kind and professional! This lovely loft exceeded our expectations on every level. The loft was very spacious for the two of us and extremely clean. This made our honeymoon very memorable. We will definitely book this exact same loft when we return to Kauai.
Très joli endroit. Facile d'accès, nous avons eu de bonnes indications pour s'y rendre. L'endroit est très bien situé.
Mana is very effective at solving any issues that arise. We applaud how she puts herself in your shoes if an issue arises and solves it in a timely and appropriate manner. Thank you.

Great loft at an awesome location in Princeville. Having a full kitchen was so helpful in saving money and eating healthy. We cooked in it every day. 

Thank you for a memorable trip!
Nice location! Beaches are minutes away. Clean house , with everything you need. Only thing I had a issue with the neighbors were kind of loud but other than that place was perfect! ✅

Our stay was peaceful and relaxing. We felt right at home. Great location. We were able to walk to the Queens bath.  The best part was Anini beach, short fun hike. If you don’t mind a little mud, but well worth it. The beach is so beautiful and peaceful. It felt like our own private beach
Cozy space in the center of Princeville. Comfertable and stylish. Free chickens outside.

Nice condo in Princeville. Clean and well taken care of. Designated parking is a definite plus. Easy access to the highway from here. The host provided towels for the shower and the beach, toilet paper, paper towels,  beach chairs,  kitchen supplies, a washer and dryer with soap and dryer sheet, a dishwasher and soap, shower supplies and more.
The beach is down a large,  muddy hill.   It's not a long walk but was difficult. The beach is lovely.

This is a wonderful place to be, especially if you want to cook for yourself - very well laid-out kitchen with pretty much all of the implements you'll need. Nice space - very comfy. The washer/dryer on premises is also quite handy. Easy check in/out.

We had a very nice stay at Diana's place.  The condo was exactly as shown.   Very clean and comfortable.  It was really easy to get in and out.   We went at Christmas time so we did not have any need for heating or AC as it was comfortable all the time inside.  We were able to walk to Amini Beach via Wylie road and the foot path with little problem.  However, it might be a bit challenging for people with mobility issues.

Perfect place to stay!very comfortable and clean. host was super hospitable and quick to respond.loved having the pool and bbq combo for a refreshing swim and easy dinner after a busy day. Pool is very close to the loft and hardly ever anyone there!great location, very close to everything you need !

name: 4BR family home nr beaches and park
summary: Four bedroom house with open plan living / dining and additional TV/play room. Close to beaches, park and cafes in a quiet residential area well suited for families.
description: Four bedroom house with open plan living / dining and additional TV/play room. Close to beaches, park and cafes in a quiet residential area well suited for families.
house_rules: We are in a quiet residential neighbourhood with lots of families. We would like our guests to fit well in this environment.

reviews.comments: Sharon has a lovely home. It's centrally located with buses nearby. Her home is very well presented and clean with plenty of bedrooms and room to move. As a host she went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed and was very responsive to any questions (even though she was overseas!). We had a great time and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

Our stay at Sharon's home was delightful. Her home is lovely, clean and well presented and we were pleasantly surprised at how roomy it was. It is located in a fantastic spot, we were easily able to access Sydney's beautiful southern beaches as well as the city and many of Sydney's major sights. Sharon was lovely to deal with and happily accommodated our last minute request for additional guests and even went out of her way to return items that we had left behind. We had a lovely stay and we would happily stay again (I highly recommend this home for young families - my children just loved the chickens!).

Sharon's place was clean, bright and spacious! It was a perfect home-away-from-home for us! The house was very clean and modern, inviting and warm. It is much larger than the photos show. Very family friendly (we had several kids similar in age to Sharon's), with a separate play room full of toys, DVDs and books! The house is at the end of a small residential street central to everything. Great restaurants and grocery store within walking distance. There is no dedicated parking spot, however we never had to park more than a block away so it was never any trouble.

Sharon was great! Even though she was traveling she made sure we had everything we needed and made sure we had a means of contacting her should we have needed anything. She was great with our last minute request to change check-out date, allowing us to extend our stay at her lovely home!

Thanks again Sharon for sharing your wonderful home with our family! It made our summer (Sydney's winter) down under so enjoyable!

name: Beautiful spacious room!
summary: Super nice, cool and comfy bedroom on the Lower East Side, one of the coolest areas in Manhattan. Walking distance from Soho and a few steps from the East Village. The apartment is really nice and ideal for a NY experience. You will love it.
description: Super nice, cool and comfy bedroom on the Lower East Side, one of the coolest areas in Manhattan. Walking distance from Soho and a few steps from the East Village. The apartment is really nice and ideal for a NY experience. You will love it.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: easy going, clean, friendly..

reviews.comments:
Pilar was the best host, incredibly nice and easy going. It really felt like home to me.
The location is great, near stations and walking distance to almost all the places I needed to go. If you love LES like I do, staying here is an important part of a happy NYC visit.

Pilar was an absolute angel! She accepted me last minute when my other accomodation had fallen through and was so welcoming. Her apartment is so clean, so well decorated and in such a nice location. Had such a great time staying here :)

Pilar was so lovely and kind.
Room is cozy and nice decorates.
Location is convenient for me.   
My favorit Experimental Artist space"the Stone" is very near.
My stay was short but I appreciate very much.
I can't wait next visit.

ﾋﾟﾗｰﾙはとても素敵で親切でした｡そして可愛いくてお洒落｡
またすぐに滞在したいです｡
ありがとう｡

This was definitley one of my best experiences yet with airbnb. Pilar was truly a delightful host; so helpful, enthusiastic and thoughtful. Everything was perfectly prepared and I felt welcomed. She was also very flexible with my check-in and check-out times which was greatly appreciated. 

The apartment is exactly as it appear in the pictures, if not nicer. It's super clean and creative, colorful, comfortable and convenient. It's a lot of fun just being there. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the room was large and well furnished.

The location is hard to beat too. I mean come on,... a five block walk to Katz's? Does it get much better than that. It's super convenient and there are plenty of great restaurants, cafes and even a couple of bakeries all within walking distance. The building is very well maintained.

I teased Piliy that I might stay - that she might have trouble getting me to leave. For just a moment, I may not have been joking,... I would have liked to stay. In all seriousness, this really ranks there and I can not recommend this place or this host highly enough.

Pilar was such a lovely host, so welcoming and great to have a chat with. Her apartment is super cute and so peaceful and calm. The bedroom is super big and the double bed is comfy. 

The location is great too and you can walk to most places in the East Village and Soho is close by too. I would definitely recommend anyone stay at Pilar's apartment.

This whole experience at Pilar's apartment was incredible. Pilar is very friendly and the whole place is kept extremely clean. The room was incredibly spacious and beautifully lit, and the apartment itself was cozy but wonderfully decorated. I highly recommend the area as well, it was safe and had so many good options for food and entertainment. The bed was comfy and the location can't be beat. I would love to stay at Pilar's apartment again. Thanks so much for having me!

Pilar was great during our stay, my flight was cancelled and I ended up arriving on a later one in the middle of the night and she stayed in contact and was able to check me in no problem at all which was lovely at the end of a stressful journey!
The neighborhood is amazing, with great bars, restaurants and easy travel routes to other parts of NY like Manhattan, Brooklyn, Williamsburg etc. 
The apartment was clean, spacious and cool in the New York summer heat.
I'd recommend this place, 7 stars :)
The room was nice and clean when I got there and the host had a lot of advice as to where to go in the city

Beautiful home! Very comfortable and well decorated, it really makes you feel at home right from the beginning.
Very well located, only a short walk to almost anything you could want.
Bed is very comfortable and room is very light and spacious.
Host is absolutely lovely and is always happy to give recommendations on things in the local area or recommendations in general for NY.
I recommend very highly and I hope to be back soon.
Better than advertised! Great location and fun decor. Would certainly book here again.

El alojamiento es tal cual lo descripto en la publicación. Un departamento con mucho estilo en una zona tranquila lejos del caos de Manhattan pero muy conectado en pocos minutos con todo.
La atención de Pilar fue muy buena, estuvo siempre pendiente a nuestras consultas y todo lo que necesitábamos. 
Definitivamente recomendamos este lugar para quedarse!

name: EIXAMPLE DELIGHT - Cozy & Bright Apartment
summary: Cozy 70 m2 apartment with inner balcony oriented to the sea, located in a typical inner large courtyard of the Eixample. Very sunny and warm, with capacity for 4 people. Fantastic location in the heart of Barcelona, next to the famous Rambla de Catalunya, 2 minutes from the elitist commercial avenue of Passeig de Gràcia, very close to the wonderful architectural work of Casa Batlló and La Pedrera by Maestro Gaudí. Also located a short walk from La Palça de Catalunya and Les Rambles.
space: Delight apartment is a spacious place decorated elegantly with cheerful colors and functional furniture, which makes it a warm and cozy place. Bathed generously by the sun for most of the day, Delight apartment, is nourished powerfully in the light that floods its rooms, reflecting to nourishing brightness, capable of inject the well-being of all its guests. The internal location of this quiet apartment, away from the hustle and bustle of the main street, invites you to rest and guarantees a pleasant and refreshing sleep after an intense day of work or tourism.
description: Cozy 70 m2 apartment with inner balcony oriented to the sea, located in a typical inner large courtyard of the Eixample. Very sunny and warm, with capacity for 4 people. Fantastic location in the heart of Barcelona, next to the famous Rambla de Catalunya, 2 minutes from the elitist commercial avenue of Passeig de Gràcia, very close to the wonderful architectural work of Casa Batlló and La Pedrera by Maestro Gaudí. Also located a short walk from La Palça de Catalunya and Les Rambles. Delight apartment is a spacious place decorated elegantly with cheerful colors and functional furniture, which makes it a warm and cozy place. Bathed generously by the sun for most of the day, Delight apartment, is nourished powerfully in the light that floods its rooms, reflecting to nourishing brightness, capable of inject the well-being of all its guests. The internal location of this quiet apartment, away from the hustle and bustle of the main street, invites you to rest and guarantees a pleasant and re
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample district is one of the best rated in the center of Barcelona. It is formed by buildings of exquisite modernist construction. Area equipped with all the necessary facilities to make your stay comfortable, supermarkets, municipal market with fresh food, pedestrian street with playground, great variety of fabulous restaurants, bars and shops. Ideal for couples, families of 4 or small groups of friends who would like to stay right in the center of Barcelona in a safe neighbourhood, close to places to see.
notes: On the ground floor of the building is a private parking. The price of the parking is not included in the price of the reservation, this will be charged to the guest. Please notice there is a late Check In fee, 20€ arriving after 21:00 hr - 30€ after 23:00 - 40€ after 24:00 - 50€ after 01:00  We don't accept any Check In after 02:00hrs.
transit: On one of the walls of the living room there is a large mural with a map of the most important areas and places of interest, as well as nearby establishments and services. It is a valuable tool very well valued by all the guests.
access: Delight apartment welcomes you in a small hall that offers access to a short corridor that leads, on the right hand side, to a double bedroom which has 2 single beds and a window to a inner patio. On the left is located the bathroom with a large and comfortable shower, here there is a window to a small inner patio, next to the bathroom is the laundry room. Now we access the dining room, and on the left side there is the kitchen with window to a inner patio. Next to the dining room is located the living room with access to the balcony, on the left is the main double bedroom, with a double bed and also access to the balcony.
interaction: I give my guests independence, but I am available if they need me.
house_rules: No se permite la celebración de fiestas en el apartamento. Holding parties in the apartment is not allowd. Please notice there is a late Check In fee, 20€ arriving after 21:00 hr - 30€ after 23:00 - 40€ after 24:00 - 50€ after 01:00  We don't accept any Check In after 02:00hrs.

host.host_location: Sant Pere de Ribes, Catalunya, Spain
host.host_about:
Dear visitor, I honor your curiosity.

I'm an emotional shaman in love with this beautiful land that surprises us generously with so many beautiful expressions of the most striking beauty.
I am a spiritual warrior armed with a multicolored laser illuminating the deepest darkness.
I am the carrier of a germinating seed of Love to help our Beloved Mother Earth creating a better world.
I honor the liquid that rocks the creative essence, by the rhythm of the waves of the immense Big Blue.
I have the courage to imagine the Paradise on Earth. Do you dare with this vision?

Believing is creating, we are Humanity, waiting for you ...

Estimado visitante, honro tu curiosidad.
Soy un chamán emocional enamorado de esta hermosa Tierra que nos sorprende generosamente con tantas y tan hermosas expresiones de la mas sorprendente belleza.
Soy un guerrero espiritual armado con un láser multicolor iluminando la oscuridad mas profunda.
Porto una semilla de Amor germinando para ayudar a nuestra Amada Madre Tierra creando un mundo mejor.
Honro el líquido que mece la esencia creadora al ritmo de las olas del inmenso Gran Azul.
Tengo el coraje de imaginar el Paraíso en la Tierra. ¿Te atreves con esta visión?
Creer es crear, somos la Humanidad, te estamos esperando...

reviews.comments: Very nice reception and the apartment was beyond our expectations. We couldn't ask for a better location. It was a very nice place to start your day with.

We had a lovely stay in the apartment. All you need for a city break . The location was really great. A lot of nice shops in the area and nice restaurants. Coffee shop next door (great for breakfast). We can recommend restaurant vinitus close by. Fantastic tapas. Easy access from apartment to Metro and buses. You can walk to many tourist attractions if you don't mind walking ;) Just and Sergio were great. I will contact them again next time I plan trip to Barcelona. Gracias :)
L'appartamento è ben posizionato, in due minuti si raggiunge la stupenda Casa Batlò e anche la Pedrera. Il quartiere è tranquillo e non mancano pasticcerie e ristoranti.

We had a good stay here. The location is perfect for exploring, dining and shopping. Communication with the host was excellent. We were met by Sergio at the apartment on our arrival, he showed us the main features of the apartments, gave us information on the city and answered any questions we had. 
The apartment is in an old building that does not appear to have heating, so they make up for it by having a window ac/heat unit and also an additional electrical heater for the inside room. This was enough to warm the apartment during our stay.

Great apartment. Super quiet and central to all Barcelona sights. Apartment was well appointed and had all that was needed.Just coped with our earlier than anticipated arrival and was friendly and welcoming.

L’appartement est très ensoleillé et calme.
Idéal pour une escapade en famille, avec tout le confort souhaité pour décompresser et visiter cette ville magnifique, a pied ou en métro.
L’accueil est top et les infos fournies pour le Parking auto en bas de l’immeuble sont très utiles.
La casa es comoda y agradable y el trato fue cordial y facil. Recomendable.

The apartment was super nice, very clean and comfortable. The location is perfect, we could walk everywhere and also had the metro very close by. Just was an amazing host, super nice guy, always reachable and helpful; in the end of our stay he arranged a taxi for us take us to the airport. We have no complains!

The apartment is super located - we could walk everywhere. Further the lovely apartment was clean and comfortable! The host is really nice, always reachable! We had an lovely stay there - next time I will contact them again, if I plan a trip to Barcelona. :-)

Just was a really friendly host and the apartment is fantastic and is in a great location. They were flexible with check-in and out times and provided us with lots of resources about the city. Would highly recommend for anyone looking to sightsee in Barcelona as its walking distance to many great tourists sights and restaurants

We arrived about midnight. our host was waiting for us in the apartment as promised. The apartment is nice and and convenient. Good WIFI. The location of the apartment is great. very near to the Rambles Catalonia square but not to near  - 5 minutes walking. Near to many great tapas and other best restaurants and bars - walking distance.
Right near the apartment there is a very nice cafe for breakfast.
We had a really great stay, the apartment is very clean and comfortable. Our hosts were very friendly and the area is perfect I totally recommend staying here. :)

My party and myself truly enjoyed our time at the apt. It was clean and equipped, like discribed. Location was excellent and communcation was fast and easy. Would recommand it to other guests visting Barcelona.

A centrally located, surprisingly spacious apartment, stylish and well-maintained. Sergio was on hand to greet us, and supplied us with plenty of helpful information regarding Barcelona's attractions and food options. With balcony overlooking rear of building, and very effective air conditioner.

10 puntos.  Impecable limpieza,  perfectos y completos los energéticos tridimensional, buen gusto en decoración, camas muy buenas para el descanso,  aire acondicionado suficiente y muy espacioso.  
Por estar en contrafrente es silencioso,  el edificio es tranquilo y se siente seguro   hay divide puerta y llave de seguridad. Hay un pequeño balcón muy agradable para salir a fumar y tender la ropa lavada. 
Fuimos con nuestras hijas adolescentes y estuvimos muy cómodos con espacio suficiente para que cada uno haga su plan. 
Un detalle que me llevo: antes de dormir,  en la cama principal,  con la ventana abierta ver el cielo   mi primer cielo Barcelona. 
Si volvería?  Claro! Sin dudarlo volvería al apartamento de Just!

Just was really nice and helpful. All the conversations were really easygoing.  The house is just like the pictures. The location is perfect for sightseeing. Also very important to say, the flight was late on the day and it was not a problem to leave the bags in the house and pick them later. Great experience and recomend.

Fue mi primera experiencia con Airbub y   ha resultado muy positiva gracias a la amabilidad y atención de Just y Sergio.
Fueron pacientes con nuestra llegada tarde. Nos brindado mucha información útil que ha facilitado nuestra estadía. El apartamento está ubicado en un lugar seguro y cercano a muchos lugares de interés turístico. La zona es muy linda y con muchos medios de transporte. El apartamento en si ,es amplio para 4 personas, limpio, agradable, cuenta con todo lo publicado para una estadía y descanso agradable. Gracias por todo.

Large and spacious, exactly as described. Plenty of space for 4 adults. Apartment was in a great location next to multiple subway lines. Away from the crowds but convenient to get to anywhere in the city. Only negative was the check-in -- we were waited nearly 40 minutes for our host to meet us outside the apartment (we were on time).
The place was in a perfect location as it was within walking distance of many hip restaurants, bars and shops.  Would definitely stay again the next time I'm in Barcelona!

O apartamento é muito aconchegante e a localização é excelente! O único ponto negativo do apartamento é o banheiro! Achei muito pequeno, o box é coberto com cortina de plastico e as toalhas de banho estão muito antigas. 
Fora isso foi uma experiencia fantástica!
Just perfect! Location spectacular, the best. Parking downstairs, all the shops and best restaurants just a couple of feet away. We would not change it for anything! Totally recommend it!

Communication with Just and Sergio was very easy and timely. The apartment is well maintained. The location is very central and near the aerobus stop at plaça catalunya for easy transportation to the airport. We love the custom map on the wall with all its recommendations. We were able to check in early, so that was a plus. All amenities were in working order.

We enjoyed our stay at Just'a apartment. The description and photos accurately portray the apartment. It is clean, spacious and quiet. The bed in the master bedroom was very comfortable. We also liked the apartment location, proximate to restaurants and the city's popular attractions. Just's friend, Sergio, met us at the apartment and graciously oriented us to the apartment and the neighborhood. He went far out of his way to answer our questions and make helpful recommendations.

The apartment was the perfect location for our 4 night stay in Barcelona. It is located very near major transportation lines. We did not meet Just, but his friend Sergio graciously waited for us after our plane delayed. Just provided EVERYTHING a visitor will need. A huge map on the wall, tourist guides, and nearby recommendations. Apartment is spacious and super clean. It has cute balcony facing elementary school, for a truly local experience. Kitchen is equipped for making dinner every night and dishwasher to do the dishes.  Just included instructions in all languages for guests.  Washer equipped and strong WiFi.  Great modern elevator to get to the apartment floor.  We walked everywhere from the apartment. I highly recommend Just's apartment.

Appartement bien situé, métro, bus et divers restaurants à proximité.
La grande chambre est très confortable mais la petite chambre est plutôt pour des enfants et non pour des adultes.
Un effort sur le prix serait le bien venu.
The host canceled this reservation 209 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Just's place was in perfect location.  Easy check-in and very comfortable for four persons.  Thank you Just!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. L'appartement est très bien situé. Très calme mais tout près de vieux Barcelone, des restos, des visites. Sergio nous a accueillis et tout expliqué. Super appartement pour visiter Barcelone. En famille (comme nous avec deux enfants) ou entre amis. Merci pour tout.

Just's place is simply wonderful. Everything about the experience was great... the booking, the communication, the welcoming and of course the apartment itself. It's very nicely decorated with everything you need to feel at home, very clean and super conveniently located in the center of the city. Just was very accommodating with any changes and Sergio gave me great tips on what to explore in the city. I will be back for sure. Muchas gracias Just y Sergio!
Nice, spacious apartment located in the heart of Barcelona. Had everything we needed and Just provided plenty of info on how to get there and suggestions while in Barcelona.

Exactly as advertised.
Great location, larger than the regular sized flat. Well stocked pantry.
A little downside is that there are a few steps to get to the lift. Host was very helpful and assisted us in carrying our luggages to the lift : )

L'appartamento è a dir poco stupendo:accogliente,curato nei minimi dettagli,pulitissimo. Ha tutto il necessario per farti sentire a casa tua. È a cinque minuti da Casa Batlló, e nonostante sia una zona trafficata, l'appartamento è silenzioso. Fantastico. Lo consiglio!!È perfetto e ci tornerei subito!

If you are still looking for an apartment, look no further! Just's Eixample Delight is truly one of the most luxurious, well located and beautifully situated apartments I or any of my friends have ever been too! You are literally a stone throw away from some of Barcelona's most beautiful attractions but you could literally spend your whole holiday exploring Eixample's wonderful restaurants and parks! It really is the best area in Barcelona! Furthermore both Just and Sergio were excellent hosts, both extremely easy to get in contact with and both willing to do whatever they can to ensure you a beautiful visit, from recommending one of best restaurants we had eaten in our entire stay too giving us discount tokens for Luggage storage due to our late flight. In all honesty this is by far 5/5 Star Rated and even close to a 6/5. I couldn't expect any more from the hosts, the area and the town. Truly astonishing and I would like to thank both Sergio and Just!

The flat is really nice, and located in the perfect area (trendy restaurants and bars, shopping) and you can visit Barcelona by walk easily from the flat. The flat is comfortable with two bedrooms perfect for couple of days in Barcelona ! Thanks again Just ! We recommend the flat.

Just's apartment is perfect for a family of 4 people.
We had an amazing time in Barcelona and the apartment played a main role in it. 
The place is very central and you can easily explore the city by foot or by the public transport.
In the apartment we could find everything we needed: a well equipped kitchen, useful tourist's information, comfortable dining room, etc.   
Sergio was very nice, welcoming and available.
He also shared many useful tips with us.
Thank you for a great experience!

El departamento de Just nos ha sorprendido por superar nuestras espectativas de la imagenes que se ven en las fotos. Como Just no se encontraba en la ciudad,  nos recibio SERGIO puntualmente, y con mucha amabilidad nos mostro el departamento, su funcionamiento, y nos hizo muchas recomendaciones para conocer Barcelona, nos atendio sin apuro.  El departamento es moderno, luminoso, limpio, bien equipado, y con excelente ubicacion cerca del metro de Paseo de Gracia. Es de destacar, que cuando nos retiramos a las 6:45 AM, nuestro hijo se olvido su campera de abrigo en el cuarto, y habiendo llamado a Sergio a esa hora, el nos resolvio el problema a la brevedad. Fue muy atento. Estamos muy contentos de nuestra estadia en el el departamento de Just y volveriamos a alojarnos en el sin dudarlo !!!

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, de fácil acceso y en una zona muy linda de Barcelona! Muy cómodo, limpio, y muy bien equipado. Nos recibieron muy bien y salio todo perfecto!! Muchas gracias por todo!! Lo recomiendo!

El departamento es tal cual se lo ve en la publicacion, la zona es muy centrica y cómoda para pasear y conocer Barcelona, lo recomiendo sin dudas! Just y Sergio fueron muy atentos en todo momento! Volveremos!!
Just's apartment was perfect for my friend, her daughter and I. We loved the location, design sense and easy communication with him and Sergio.
We enjoyed our stay at this well appointed apartment.  It was spacious and clean with shopping and restaurants close by. Highly recommend!

The apartment was as bright and beautiful as the pictures in the listing. Everything we needed was there, it was spotlessly clean and we had a fantastic stay. Lots of brochures and information available including a massive, custom-designed local map on the wall with all recommended restaurants, bars and shopping shown for easy planning. We loved the area and we're delighted not to be in a more touristy part of town. The surrounding neighbourhood is stylish and elegant with wonderful tapas restaurants full of locals within 5 minutes walk. The hosts were super easy to deal with and already sent us loads of local information before we came. We would highly recommend it!

Apartamento reformado en El Barrio del ensanche , ubicación perfecta. Rodeado de bares, tiendas y supermercados. 
Sergio, el chico que nos recibió, muy amable. Nos dio todo tipo de explicaciones y comodidades .
Totalmente recomendable.
La amabilidad de Sergio, quien nos recibió, es digna de destaque. El departamento es mejor que en las fotos, sumamente limpio y muy bien ubicado.
Great location, convenient apartment and nice host.

Sans aucune hésitation nous reviendrons chez Just. Idéalement situé, tout se fait à pieds, au calme car ne donne pas sur la rue. Décoration super sympa, agencement chaleureux, entre copains, en famille tout est possible car immeuble avec ascenseur et appartement spacieux. C était notre 1 re séjour à Barcelone, top génial, encore plein de choses à voir, on reviendra chez Just. 
Ne pas rater le quartier gothique et pour manger une bonne paella conseil le restaurant Senyor Parellada rue Parellada quartier Del Mar, par contre tapas Rambla de Catalunya à côté de l appartement attrape touristes.
Great location and very true to photos.  Clean and great communication. We didn't meet Just but Sergio, who met us at the apartment. Would definitely recommend.

Wir waren 3 Nächte in dem Aparment und es ist wirklich alles da was man nur so braucht. Decken, Kissen, Waschmaschine, sogar Öl, Essig und Zucker, ... Im Bad waren auch einige Artikel. Es ist eine riesige Karte mit Empfehlungen an der Wand und auch sonst viele Karten und Broschüren über Barcelona. Wenn wir nochmal kommen, werden wir wieder hier her gehen und definitiv länger bleiben, da es so viel zu sehen gibt.

The flat was perfect! Clean, bright, very well kept, the location was great, close to metro, in a nice area away from all the buzz of the central part of Barcelona, but still a few minutes metro ride the popular attractions, and 15-20 minute walks to Las Ramblas, la Boqueria, Cathedral, and more.
It was so close to everything that we would even go back to the flat mid-day to relax and take a siesta, and then go out in the evening.
Communication with the owner was great. Lots of information about the area provided on check-in and there were a bunch of useful flyers about touristic areas. 
The flat had all the basic kitchen necessities and cooking tools.
I would highly recommend this place. We had a wonderful time!

For my family of 4 the place was perfect. It's location cannot be beat. It's close to major streets, public transportation, shops, and restaurants.
Checking in and out was a breeze and Just gave us a wealth of information for our stay in Barcelona. I can't wait to come back again and stay here.

Das Apartment liegt perfekt gelegen, sehr zentral. Es liegt zwar an einer stark befahrenen Straße, aber davon bekommt man nichts mit, da die Wohnung nach hinten raus geht. Im Apartment war alles vorhanden was man braucht. Sogar Kaffepads, Gewürze usw. stehen kostenfrei zur Verfügung. Wir waren sehr zufrieden und können es mit gutem Gewissen weiterempfehlen. 
Just und auch Sergio, der uns die Schlüssel übergeben hat, sind sehr zuvorkommend. Sie haben an alles gedacht und wertvolle Tipps gegeben.

What a wonderful stay. Such a lovely apartment so close to everything you need! Sergio met us late on Friday due to a delayed flight and showed us round the apartment and gave us some great tips for our stay. Definitely will be going back!
Apartment was a good size and in a great location for us with lots of restaurants nearby. Sergio was very welcoming and helpfully explained everything about the apartment when we arrived.
Everything was great!

The location is super. So close to public transportation and good restaurants and fab shopping. It is a 25 ish minute walk to any of the other districts. The street noise doesn't filter up to the apartment. I slept like a baby. 
The amenities are lovely and Just and Sergio were always accessible to answer questions. 
I highly recommend this apartment.
Very nice flat, well located and nicely decorated. The host was sympatic. I strongly recommend this appartment

Very clean and comfortable.
So perfect to get to every place you want to go! The breezes on the terrace makes the place s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) relaxing. 
Having a kitchen to
Make some simple meals makes for a much more pleasant trip, when you need a break from eating almost every meal at restaurants. 
Very very quiet!
It has great location
Perfect location! Almost everything availabe in only max 10min. Cant imagine a better spot for exploring this lovely city.
位于格拉西亚商业区,逛街吃饭非常方便,步行600米就是巴特约之家,900米就是米拉之家,到加泰罗尼亚广场也可以步行,地铁､公交都很方便｡就是房主没有准备什么早餐,需要自己去买一些｡热水器不是天然气的,是电热水器,四个人用的话,最后一个人热水有些不够,洗头洗澡最好分开｡
This apartment was spacious and well equipped. A very nice location away from the busier areas.

Great apartment in a very good part of town. Near some wonderful restaurants like Teleferic and Cinc Sentits. Elevator in the building definitely helps (it's a 3rd floor unit technically, but by US standards is actually more like 6 flights up).

Great location next to more local spots as well as the tourist attractions. Comfy, quiet, all you need for a bit of cooking- coffee machine sugar etc. 

Would definitely stay again next time in Barcelona
cozy, nice location. highly recommand :)

This apartment is in a perfect location just steps from Rambla Catalunya in the heart of the L'Exaimple district. Bright airy and well equipped for cooking, with a little supermarket, bakery, and the great Colmado Quílez within steps of the apartment. We would definitely stay again.

My wife, 8-month old and I stayed here for a week. The small second bedroom is perfect for 2 children.

We did have some issues with the wifi access during our stay.

Just's apartment was perfect for our trip. The location is amazing, everything you could want to see is in walking distance - about 20 minutes to the Gothic Quarter, and loads of great bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk. There's a huge map on the wall showing the location of all key attractions and restaurant suggestions which was a great touch. Also really easy to get to from the airport, just 30 minutes on the metro!

The apartment was clean, modern and had everything we needed. Aircon and wifi worked well, and we didn't hear any noise from other apartments or the street. Thankfully there's also a lift, because it's lot of stairs otherwise!

Just was easily reachable via (Hidden by Airbnb) for any questions we had before or during our stay, and always replied quickly. He also sent us lots of suggestions of places to visit ahead of our stay, which was really helpful.

Great location for this spacious apartment, that has what you need for both a short or longer stay in Barcelona.

The service was perfect and no problem in getting keys, check-in and check-out.

Would stay here again.
Just has a great and centrally located apartment. The coffee shop next door can be recommended.
Very good location, walking distance to major attractions like casa batlo & casa mila. 24hr Carrefour express just round the corner. Clean and big apartment. Surrounded by good tapas bars nearby.

Excellent, spacious and stylish apartment in a fantastic location for visiting the tourist sights of Barcelona. The metro is just round the corner and it's a great location for shopping and restaurants.  We took Just's advice and took the train at Passeig De Gracia metro station to the seaside town of Sitges. Very simple to do and well worth a visit. I would highly recommend this apartment. Plenty of room and space for four people.
Max score!

We loved our long weekend in Just’s beautiful apartment. It has been tastefully decorated and has thoughtful touches throughout.. from a big wall map of the city guiding us to everywhere we wanted to go to the comfy furnishings that greeted us every time we returned for a breather from sightseeing.  The flat is really well located, close to the metro, buses and easy to walk to great restaurants, tapas bars and many of the sights we came to see.  We highly recommend this apartment!

We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona at Just's place.  The location is great and we walked all over town, returning for a siesta mid afternoon and then heading back out.  Many restaurants and markets nearby.  A smoker in the next apartment meant it was a little smoky near the front door but it didn't bother us too much.  Very spacious and cute apartment with everything we needed.  Great bed in master bedroom.

Tanto Just como Sergio, quien nos ha recibido a nuestra llegada, han sido sumamente amables y han respondido a todas nuestras dudas. La ubicación es inmejorable y sumamente tranquila. El departamento es tal cual se lo ve en las imágenes. Lo recomendaríamos sin dudarlo.

So many thoughtful touches, including a fabulous map of Barcelona on the wall. Very cool decor, spotlessly clean and a very comfy king size bed! 
Amazing location - so central and literally everything (shops, bars, restaurants, small supermarkets) within minutes. Our children loved it too (3 and 5 years old).
We hope to come back soon!
Easy check-in and great host

Excelente departamento. Lugar inmejorable, muy bien atendidos por Sergio que recomendo lugares para visitar. Muy limpio y preparado para facilitarle todo a los turistas. Tuvimos algunos problemas con el agua caliente para bañarnos mas de 2 personas seguidas (el agua alcanza justo para 2 personas rapidas). Volveriamos al mismo lugar. Gracias!

We absolutely loved our stay at the delight apartment! From the moment we contacted Just - our host, he was very friendly and informative, and quick to response. The apartment itself was spotless, exactly as described and seen in the pictures, and even better. Fully equipped with all the amenities a traveller could ask for. Furthermore, due to a late flight we were able to stay at the appartment until the late evening with no extra cost. Beautiful apartment, great location, excellent host. All you can ask for really!

The apartment is a great base for Barcelona. Walkable to all the tourist areas and there are bars and restaurants close by. There is also a supermarket next door. Wifi is good and there is everything you need for a short stay. Would use again.
Just 的房子地段极佳,离巴特略之家只2分钟的路程,但却极其安静｡Just非常热情,当我们需要帮助时也能及时响应｡由于住宿用的是电暖式热水器,洗澡时需间隔长些时间｡

Great location.  Lots todo in the area.  Metro nearby.
Very comfortable and quiet.  Internet worked great.

Appartement impeccable, très central, pas besoin de transport en commun ! 
Très calme et très ensoleillé, il Est exactement comme décrit !
Idéal pour 2 couples ou 1 famille avec 2 enfants...
Nous reviendrons, c’est sur !!

This is a perfect location and I highly recommend this apartment to anyone planning a trip to Barcelona.  The photos of the apartment are very accurate and it is as good as it looks.  It is quiet, comfortable and had everything we needed.  Just, our host, was very thorough in preparing for our arrival and Sergio took good care of us once we arrived.  I cannot stress enough how fantastic this location is and I would not hesitate to stay here again.

Muchas gracias!! nos encanto el departamento, ubicacion inmejorable, uno puede moverse a pie y en zona segura y linda, y destaco la  atencion de Sergio nos brindo un monton de info y siemrpe estuvo disponible, nos olvidamos plata y un documento y ocupo su tiempo para poder acercarlos!!!
The flat is great with everything you need for a longer stay in Barcelona!

The apartment is very attractive and set up well for travellers. Sergio welcomed us and was very helpful. Casa Battlò is a few minutes away yet the apartment is quiet, situated at the back with a wide open view of balconies and local life. It's well located for everything.

Nos enviaron info antes de nuestra llegada, con todos los precedimientos claros, departamento super completo, amplio, cómodo , con estilo propio, muy agradable, con balcón pero tranquilo, seguro y con los hospedadores  atentos permanentemente a nuestras necesidades. Todos los detalles en cuenta. Nos hicieron sentir muy a gusto. hasta nos pidieron el taxi para el traslado al aeropuerto. nos manejamos con wats app  sin problema, ...Sergio y Just GRACIAS!!
Ravis par les conseils de Just avant l’arrivee, l’accueil de Sergio, l’appartement est comme en photo idéal pour un couple avec 2 enfants, l’emplacement Est idéal merci encore  :-)
Very good service!

I'll add on to previous comments that this place is worth to stay in. My parents 70+ + uncle 60+ never used airb&b before and were really satisfied with location, tidines, spacious apartment and price. They really recommend it. Greeting from Czech Republic.

The apartment is really great equipped and close to sights, shops, great restaurants and bars. Although located at a busy street its really quiet. You have a tasteful interior to relax from sightseeing as well a large balcony to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning. 

We were greeted really friendly on our arrival and got some really great restaurant suggestions etc.

Thanks again for your great hospitality. 

Andrea

Just’s apartment is centrally located in Eixample, really close to all kinds of attractions and shopping and cool bars and restaurantes. It’s also easy to get to all the other parts of town like El Born and El Raval. 

Just and Sergio were EXCELLENT hosts! This was such an A+ place to stay. Clean and it felt like home.

Il s’agit d’un appartement qui est très bien situé. On peut aller à pieds à bon nombre d’attractions touristiques. Il y a beaucoup de restaurants très près. L’appartement est propre et fonctionnel et surtout très calme vu qu’il donne sur une cour intérieure. Nous y retournerions sans hésiter.
Excellent host, great flat, centrally located! I am very happy with our overall experience and I would be delighted to recommend Just to any other users who are contemplating a holiday in Barcelona.

The apartment is excellently located in the heart of the city and ideal for 4 persons. It is very clean and has all amenities required for a short stay. 
The apartment is on the 4rth floor of a building but it has a small lift if mobility is an issue. We would recommend a stay at this apartment.

We did not meet Just, but checkin went smoothly wth Sergio, who kindly allowed us to leave our bags at the apartment early, and gave lots of useful local advice. The location is second to none, with so much of interest within easy reach. The apartment offered a comfy base for the four of us. The outside clothesline off the balcony was much appreciated.
Fantastic tips and service. Adorable apartment and great location.

The host was very responsive.  Immediately took care  of a lock situation we had with the door. The place has all the appliances  you can think of, from dishwasher to washer. The apartment was spacious and bright. The only drawback is that, it is in the fifth floor but it has an elevator.  It is also in  a good location.  10 minutes walk to Ras lamlas,  10 minutes drive to beach,  train station and La Sagrada. Enjoyed our stay.
Great location and very nice communicacion. Pictures a little too nice compared to what the piso really looks like but it has been a very pleasant stay :)

This apartment is a gem. It is located at a walking distance to the city center and surrounded by cafes and numerous shops. 
We really enjoyed our stay in this comfortable and clean apartment and recommend it highly.
We will return. 
Thank you Just & Sergio.
We loved the location and Just and Sergio were so lovely and welcoming. We had a great time and walked everywhere!  Supermarket close by! The city is fantastic!

Muy buena ubicación, cerca del metro, comercio y restaurantes. Es como se ve en las fotografías. Sergio, quien nos recibió, extremadamente amable.
Muy bien equipado. Volveríamos felices a pasar otros días.

A stunning apartment in a perfect location.  Just could not have done more.  ALL communication from booking up until the end of our stay was beyond prompt. The apartment was comfortable, stylish and perfect for what our family of 4 was looking for.  We will definitely be back.  Thank you Just and your team.
Great location / comfortable accommodation - fully recommend

Just’s place is amazing! A great location —walking distance to just about everything! Under 10min walk to Casa Batlló, La Pedrera & Plaza Catalunya, and about 15min to Las Ramblas. Sergio met us at the apartment and gave us a great suggestions on restaurants, transportation and everything in between! Would highly recommend staying here!! 
Only thing to note-be sure and clarify what time check out is. We’d planned on check out at noon (as listed) and the next family was in the lobby as we were leaving so that was a bit awkward.

Spotlessly clean two bedroom apartment in a very quiet location, within 5 minutes walk of a metro station. Perfect location (10 mins walk from top of la rambla) for exploring the city.
Just provides a lot of useful information about barcelona and responds quickly to any messages.
My family and I had a great stay, highly recommended.

Fabulous place and location. This place looks exactly like the photos and has everything you need and more. The host was flexible with check in and responded quickly. Anyone looking to explore Barcelona should check this spot out.
The best location.  Great apartment.

Great place in the heart of the city at the safest location. Without hesitation will recommend this place to any traveler. Wish we had more time to spend in Barcelona. Would definitely go back again. 
One tip: please make your reservations for Sagrada Familia towers or Park Güell monument visits ahead of time. Thank you Just and Sergio for an immaculately clean and stylish accommodations.
Central location, easy check in and lots of local tips. Would highly recommend.

A wonderful stay in Barcelona for my three friends and I - everything was perfect from the pre-trip information from Just, the communication on arrival and the apartment itself. It was spacious, modern, full of useful amenities and local guides. The location was ideal, very easy to find on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. Would highly recommend this apartment.

基本上一切都很好,位置超级方便,离巴特罗之家走路都不到十分钟,周围都是逛街的和吃的｡房间内却很安静,超级适合一个家庭或者朋友同学出来游玩的时候住,厨房设备也很全｡应该是房东之一的Sergio等在公寓给我们开门,很贴心地介绍各种房间设施和周围的景点餐厅等,回复问题也很及时,建议下个 (Hidden by Airbnb) 联系,回复超快的｡唯一要说有什么问题的也就是热水器可能是烧气的那种,三个人洗澡等到最后一个人就洗着变冷水了,其他的都很好｡

This apartment is in a great location. We literally booked this hotel 20 minutes before we arrived due to a problem with another Airbnb in Barcelona that we had to cancel for inaccurate listing. Just and Sergio responded within minutes and had the apartment ready within 1.5 hours. Quality hosts and a quality place. They gave us great tips. Thank you guys so much.
Read the one I just wrote
Just apartment is in a great location, close to la Rambla and other sights are all in walking distance.
The apartment is very clean, hugh and very quite. There are a lot of opportunities around to do and everything is quick to reach.

Me and my boyfriend had an amazing time in Barcelona staying at Apartment Delight. Although we never met Just, he was always quick to respond to my messages and his friend Sergio made check in quick, friendly and easy! The apartment is in a really central location with loads of shops and restaurants right on your doorstep. The apartment is large, clean and with loads of helpful local tips. We particularly loved the huge map on the wall! Thanks again!

This apartment is in a wonderful location, conveniently  close to public transport, restaurants and shops. It is walking distance to many major sites. Even though it is on a major road, it faces the inner courtyard and is very quiet.
The beds were very comfortable, including the children's beds. It was clean and tastefully decorated and a wealth of information is provided on what to do and where to eat.
Sergio and Just went above and beyond, with easy check-in,  late check out, and going out of their way to help us find a doctor for our son.
I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment.

Fuimos 2 adultos por 5 noches. No conocí a Just. Se ocupó de todo Sergio, incluida la limpieza, con excelente disposición.
El departamento es antiguo, prudentemente remodelado. Sin lujos, con lo necesario para una estadía confortable. Relativamente tranquilo, gracias a ser un contrafrente con un cerramiento adicional. El precio se justifica si se valora significativamente la ubicación supercentrica.
Really attractive and spacious apartment with lots of original features. Well kept and clean and in a great, central spot very close to the metro.
Great and clean apartment, a very kind host and very nice location for a first visit in Barcelona

Just is a great host, reply within minutes and very kind. We asked a late checkout and he said Yes, we had a problem with the internet and it was fixed immediately 
The apartment is in a great location. The apartment is very clean and well organized. We highly recommend!

Really nice apartment (clean and comfortable) in a great location. Just’s friend, Sergio, greeted us when we arrived and took the time to explain about access to the building and how things worked in the apartment. I was travelling with my son and we loved the neighbourhood. Perfect for walking to la Rambla and only minutes away from tube stations. Lots of great tapas bars and Cerveserias in the area but the apartment is quiet as it’s at the back of the building, overlooking an enclosed square. We felt very safe. Would definitely stay again; didn’t want to leave!

We had a wonderful stay at Just's. It is spacious, clean, bright, and perfectly located in a beautiful part of the city. Check-in was very simple and communication with Just was fast and clear. Just offers abundant information about great restaurants, sights, and transportation- all of which are easily accessible by walking. I will absolutely stay here when I return to Barcelona!
We loved waking up to kids playing in courtyard. Great location. Nice bright apartment.
Lovely, clean , centrally located apartment!

The apartment is amazing, very stylish, bright and spacious. Excellent location, 3 minutes walk to Plaza de Catalunya. Small supermarket right next to the entrance of the building. Apartment was clean with coffee, soap and cleaning utensils provided.
The only thing to notice are super steep steps with a very tiny elevator, so not really great if you are afraid of small spaces or have issues climbing stairs. The wifi is not the best, but we didn't really need it.
Just was a very pleasant host, he greeted us at the arrival and didn't bother us afterwards. Would highly recommend this place.

The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed.  The location is excellent with many surrounding restaurants and a subway stop just 1.5 blocks away.  Just was very helpful giving suggestions on what to see when we checked in.  Overall this was one of the top air bnbs I've stayed at.

Just’s place is a delight indeed. Sergio was kind enough to check us in early as our flight got in early, he was available promptly via messages!  Apartment is beautiful And centrally located.  Lots of valuable information about Barcelona. They definitely make you feel welcome!  Glad they have the elevator. I used the stairs a lot but is quite a workout!  I will be back! 

Gracias Just. Volvere!!
Si buscas una excelente ubicación en Barcelona en un lugar con todos los servicios y funcional, este es el sitio.

Just and Sergio were great hosts and provided lots of tips on where to go visit and eat. The location could not have been better and the space is beautiful. If I had to knit pick then I would have to say the water pressure for the shower is a bit weak. Otherwise, it was a fantastic stay.

Just’s apartment is so conveniently located, we walked to everywhere within a few minutes.  It is surrounded by shops, cafes, and restaurants.  Just also provides us great tips about local places, so we a voided those tourists traps.  The apartment is very quiet, and with all the amenities as advertised.
We would definitely stay here again next time when we are in Barcelona.

This appartment was perfect for our stay in Barcelona with my mother, sister and her son. 
The communication with Just was perfect. 
We had a warm welcome with extra info about the city. 
The location is great to explore the city centre, we did almost everything on foot. The appartment is light, with a perfect terrace for a sunny breakfast. 
We can really recommand this appartment.

name: TsimShaTsui Wellyet Guest House Long Stay @ Room 8
summary: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc. The room equipped with toilet/bathroom, tv, air-condition, hair dryer and essentials.
space: Cozy little space which located at the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, where you could taste the oriental beauty with the most convenient transportation.
description: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc. The room equipped with toilet/bathroom, tv, air-condition, hair dryer and essentials. Cozy little space which located at the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, where you could taste the oriental beauty with the most convenient transportation. For check-in, please attend Flat F3 14th Floor of Mirador Mansion first. We will guild you to your room after check-in. Please ensure to keep your ID with you as always. We have almost 24 hours Assistance just a phone call away. I've you need travel recommendation, travel assistance, ticketing, we are phone call away. We also provide Towels, tooth brush, toothpaste,  shower gel and all-in-one shampoo for your convenient (free of charge, but one request per day for environment). We are 15 mins walk to Victoria Harbor, Star Ferry, Star Avenue,
neighborhood_overview: We are 15 mins walk to Victoria Harbor, Star Ferry, Star Avenue, Harbor City, and all amenities at door step, with super market, 7-eleven. Famous Hong Kong bakery, traditional restaurant, Michelin's Restaurant all near by.
notes: Our Check in time is from 2pm, Check out time is 12pm. We provide luggage keeping for same day, overnight keeping will be charged.
transit: 1. If you are travelling from Hong Kong International Airport, you could take the Airport Bus Route A21, take the stop [K11, HSBC Bank], walk along Nathan Road for 250 meters, you will find Mirador Mansion 2. If you are travelling from ShenZhen Luo Hu/Fu Tian, take the MTR to Hong Hum, change line to Tsim Tung Station, find Exit N5, Mirador Mansion just next to it. 3. If you are travelling with MTR, we are located right next to Tsim Sha Tsui Station Exit D
access: For check-in, please attend Flat F3 14th Floor of Mirador Mansion first. We will guild you to your room after check-in. Please ensure to keep your ID with you as always.
interaction: We have almost 24 hours Assistance just a phone call away. I've you need travel recommendation, travel assistance, ticketing, we are phone call away. We also provide Towels, tooth brush, toothpaste,  shower gel and all-in-one shampoo for your convenient (free of charge, but one request per day for environment).
house_rules: 1.No Smoking 2.No Pets 3.Please keep the voice down between 11:00PM to 8:00AM. If there are any visitors, please make sure they will leave the space before 11:00PM. We are sorry for any inconvenient. 4.No extra person stay, will be charged 5.Please keep all equipment and bedding in room in good condition, if broken, dirty or lost, customer need to pay the amount of each damage goods in full price. 6.Please keep the room tidy and clean; please throw all rubbish into the rubbish bin. 7.Not allowed gambling, drinking wine, fighting inside the hotel area. 8.Cooking is not allow in the space

host.host_about: Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

reviews.comments: Natalie was wonderful !

Natalie was such a good host. Whenever I have a questions regarding about one location she answered me immediately. She's kind and  she frequently smiling that makes anyone feel that your welcome to stay in her place. I highly recommend to others. I will definitely go back to her place because its very convenient to find all nearest means of transportation.
Natalie was very helpful. She helped print out tye passes I left at home in the US.
房间和网上介绍的一样,干净､整洁,房东人很好,服务非常好｡而且真人明显比照片好看

My boyfriend and I stayed with Natalie in Mirador Mansion our entire stay in Hong Kong, which was from 5/5 until 5/9.

We arrived 30 minutes before check-in time, but since our room was already vacant, she allowed us to check in. She was very helpful in getting us oriented with some key landmarks in the area, including the nearest MTR station, some nearby restaurants, and how to get to the museums. 

From the nearest Airport bus station, it was only a 2 block walk to get to Mirador Mansion. Its very close to The Hong Kong Museum of Art, Avenue of the Stars/Symphony of Lights, and a 10-15 minute walk to the Outer Harbour Ferry to Macau and the Museum of History and Science.

The room itself was adequate. Don't expect too much space in the rooms. Patrick and I were only concerned about having our own bathroom and having a place to sleep at night. To that extent, the room was enough (there's only 2 channels on the tv though, both local Cantonese... Theres free wifi to surf the internet, though it may at times be slow if all the other rooms are using it as well).

All in all, it was a pleasant experience. Hassle free check in, Natalie was very helpful, and we got our HK$100 deposit right after checking out. We will consider coming back here again when we return.

숙소의 위치가 정말 좋고 방도 깨끗하다. 공항버스 정류장과 매우 가깝다.
그리고 호스트가 매우 친절하시고,
나의 메세지에 매번 빠른 응답을 주셨다.

방이 조금 작은편이긴 하지만, 혼자 머물기에 안성맞춤.
Natalie was a great host!
尖沙咀地铁D1出口对面商铺进去就是美丽都大厦的侧门,问一下店员很快就能找到上楼的电梯｡弥敦道出口斜对面就是机场大巴A21,离海港城很近,地段很方便
房东很热情,房间里打扫得很干净,就在地铁站旁,而且靠近维多利亚港,交通比较方便｡
Great location, lovely people, excellent value

Natalie the host, is such a wonderful person and will go out of way to make you feel at home, giving you suggestions, ideas about the places to visit or a better way to do it. The room was always clean, bed was really comfortable and spacious for two people. The location is close to restaurants, the MTR and just a few steps to buses that go everywhere in the city and to/from the airport. Also, just 15 minutes easy walk to Victoria Harbor. I will definitely recommend Natalie to budget conscious travelers. Location, location, location. If I ever go back to Hong Kong, will be staying at Natalie's place again.
It was more than what we expected. They cleaned the room everyday. Awesome stay. Natalie wad very kind to us. Will definitely go back there. :)
The hostess is nice. You can get easy access to the MTR. The price is affordable. Rooms are small but clean. I think it is safe and quiet to live here.
位置很赞,尖沙咀K11购物中心对面,交通便利,价格适中,适合单人背包客选择入住,房间不大但是很干净｡房东不在家但是其他工作人员很热情,夜间也比较安全,除了自己房间的门之外,还有最外面一扇铁门,工作人员一直会在岗到夜间11点｡

생각보다는 좁았지만
친절함과 깔끔함에 만족했고,
교통도 편리했다. 
다음 출장에도 이용하고 싶다.
Natalie's place is so perfectly located.  Walk easily to many points of interest, food, shopping, etc.  it is a tiny place as it states but a great value.

This place is central and easy to get to from anywhere including the airport. My fiance and I enjoyed our stay. Our host greeted us every morning and evening and made us feel welcomed. All our basic needs were met - fresh towels and cleaning every day, good water pressure for showering.
房屋位置在尖沙咀附近,离地铁､重庆大厦很近｡房间比较小,适合单人入住｡
Everything as described, great value for the money. If you want a place to spend the night and if you plan to be out the whole day, than his is exactly what you need.
Great spot, will be here again on my next trip to HK
房间位置真的好,真的特别方便,随便逛逛都能看到维港夜景,房间很小但是什么都有,我一个人住觉得略小,房间很卫生,房东很热情,什么都愿意帮我解决^_^
房东人很好,除了房间小了点挖坑,其它都挺好的,性价比j挺高的. 下次去还住~

Location is great! 
Very responsive host! 
Room might be small but clean and is just right for sleeping, You may hear sound from the other side of the room but overall it was nice.
We had a great stay, and will definitely book this again. :)

The room was awesome! Super clean, walking distance to City Harbor, Ladies Market, and so much more! Great location, super safe, easy checking in, and near the Airport! Natalie is a wonderful host! We highly recommend everyone to stay here! And we hope to come back very soon!
我觉得大床两个人还好,就是两个人用被单不够宽,整体感觉不错,房东很热情｡地理位置很好,出门就可以乘坐港铁｡
The place is very convinient. Also, the staffs are very accommodating to the guest.

Perfekte Lage, das Zimmer wurde täglich gereinigt und wir haben uns willkommen gefühlt.
Uns war es schon zu klein für zwei Personen mit Gepäck aber es ging, da wir die meiste Zeit eh unterwegs waren. Als Alleinreisender in Hong Kong aber in Ordnung.
Wir hatte eine super Zeit, und wie schon erwähnt vor allem dank der super Lage auf Kowloon Seite! :)

Für den Preis gibt es keine schönere oder zentralere Lage. Die Unterkunft ist schlicht aber wie beschrieben, und Natalie ist eine der gastfreundlichsten Vermieterinnen, die ich je getroffen hab. Gerne wieder!

Great location, but elevator going up will always have a line. There are other elevators though  which pass through lesser floors so they're much faster (just explore! hard to give directions haha). Space is super tight, only enough for 1 luggage that you can't even fully open, but if you're out most of the time in HK, it's great! Toilet and bath area als quite small but sufficient. They provide towels and toothbrush, plus liquid soap, shampoo and tissue. Wifi access great. Just don't know how often they change beddings and curtains or it just looks old.
Overall good stay, may consider coming back again because location is tough to beat.
침사추이역 바로앞에 있다. N21,A21,N21A 갯가 같은 버스를 타고 침사추이에 내리면 5분 거리이다. 그리고 골목 사이가 아닌 큰길에 위치해 있다
The room was as the description on Airbnb. It's a small room but everything was super clean and functional. Small rooms are the norm in HK. Thanks Natalie!
性价比很高,看到很多背包客过来｡地点很棒,离尖沙咀码头很近,晚上很随意就可以去维多利亚港溜达,天星小轮坐个来回｡跟店家沟通也很好,很亲切的感觉,香港的房间都是那么小,但是需要的东西都有｡下次去尖沙咀附近,如果需要住的地方,应该还会找这里｡
位置非常好,房东很热情
位置很好,房间确实小小小,但是麻雀虽小五脏俱全,对于每天出去耍只是睡觉的地方还是可以了

Отличный вариант, чтобы просто переночевать, привести себя в порядок. Здание немного специфическое, внизу тусят индусы(?) и пытаются что-то впарить  туристам, но при отказе вежливо отходят, не наглеют. Сама комната действительно маленькая, пространства буквально три шага от двери до кровати. Ванная комната представляет собой туалет с душем и раковиной, т.е. отдельного пространства для принятия душа нет. Особо крупным и неповоротливым товарищам может быть неудобно. У меня рост 175, но я быстро наловчилась. Для меня самое главное - все довольно чисто. Вай-фай, кондиционер работают. Расположение очень удобное - прямо рядом со зданием вход в метро, легко и быстро можно дойти до паромов. Хозяйка Наталья всегда улыбается, очень приветливая, не досаждает, проблем никаких не возникло. Рекомендую

早上8点到深圳,9点开始过关,11点才过关成功上的地铁,也不知道为什么,人超多,可能是暑期带孩子来香港玩的大陆客太多了?下午1点半到达预定的尖沙咀民宿,是在美丽都大厦里面14楼的一个宾馆,有的单人间双人间三人间,400-500之间,后来发现这个大厦里面真的是好多的宾馆,14楼几乎全是各种各样的宾馆｡住的房间不大,十平米的样子,有独立卫生间和浴室,提供免费的卫生纸,衣架,插座转换器,拖鞋,沐浴露,洗口杯,吹风机,不提供洗衣机｡大堂有冰箱可以放水果和饮料,还有热水机和冷水壶,可以自助泡茶和打水喝,我基本每天在这能喝两到三瓶水,口感不错,哈哈｡宾馆要求2点后入住,11点前退房,退房后可以免费寄存行李一天,押金一百港币,问路线的时候老板还很有耐心｡

The place of Natalie is in a great location that makes it super easy to go to all sorts of different places and explore Hong Kong. The room was clean and although very small, it was big enough for us two and our suitcase. The only think is that the WiFi was a little weak in our room at times, but perfectly fine other nights. If we were to visit Hong Kong again we would definatelly stay here again.
Near all kinds of transportation
Easy check-in, nice small room and in the center of Hong Kong. Was happy with the room :)
We had a nice stay in Natalie's place, overall. Its amenities, superb location and decent space were exactly what I expected, nothing more. I'd recommend this room for budget seekers.
great location
조금 좁긴한데 숙소가 매우 깨끗하고 수건이랑 치약 칫솔 샴푸 바디샤워 등도 구비되어 있어서 좋아요

name: Ocean View Condo in the Heart of Kihei!
summary: 2bd/2ba Ocean view, top floor condo conveniently located in the heart of Kihei, at Pacific Shores. A short walk to beaches, shopping, grocery, public transportation, surfing, activities, & restaurants.  Decorated with Hawaiian treasures!
space: We have decorated our space with Hawaiian treasures to make it a unique and memorable Hawaiian experience!  Everything about this condo is convenient. A short walk to everything, an ocean view, and amenities. We have provided beach accessories, everything you need to cook, relax and enjoy.  Amenities include:  Air Conditioner Beach chairs Beach toys and accessories Pool Hot tub BBQ/grill picnic area cooking supplies TV Wifi Private balcony with ocean view Master bedroom has queen bed with ensuite bathroom & walk in closet Guest room has 2 twin beds, reach in closet and adjacent bathroom Sofa has a pull out queen hide a bed
description: 2bd/2ba Ocean view, top floor condo conveniently located in the heart of Kihei, at Pacific Shores. A short walk to beaches, shopping, grocery, public transportation, surfing, activities, & restaurants.  Decorated with Hawaiian treasures! We have decorated our space with Hawaiian treasures to make it a unique and memorable Hawaiian experience!  Everything about this condo is convenient. A short walk to everything, an ocean view, and amenities. We have provided beach accessories, everything you need to cook, relax and enjoy.  Amenities include:  Air Conditioner Beach chairs Beach toys and accessories Pool Hot tub BBQ/grill picnic area cooking supplies TV Wifi Private balcony with ocean view Master bedroom has queen bed with ensuite bathroom & walk in closet Guest room has 2 twin beds, reach in closet and adjacent bathroom Sofa has a pull out queen hide a bed Two parking spaces available.  BBQ area, pool and jaccuzzi on site.  Tennis courts available. We have a fabulous manager who has be
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, extremely well maintained community!
notes: Amazing views and location. This is a NO smoking condo and complex except there is a designated “smoking area”  on a grassy area across the parking lot
transit: You are within walking distance of the bus stop, the beach, lots of restaurants, a super market and gift shop.
access: Two parking spaces available.  BBQ area, pool and jaccuzzi on site.  Tennis courts available.
interaction: We have a fabulous manager who has been managing properties for years.  She lives on the next street and is always available!
house_rules: Please treat our house as if it were your own.  Our complex is non-smoking. If you smoke, there is a designated smoking area downstairs under the tree by the pool with tables and chairs.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Overall, we really enjoyed our time at Cindy's condo. The location is top-notch, as it's located right in the heart of Kihei and the tourist district in Maui. We loved being just across the street from the beach and able to walk to a wide variety of restaurants and attractions up and down the coastline. The condo itself was fine; I'd call it average. Neither amazing nor underwhelming. it was very large and felt airy, with lots of comfortable living room furniture. The queen bed was great; however, the smaller twin beds were pretty uncomfortable. Definitely recommended for kids over adults. The kitchen appliances were modern and there was plenty of space. The unit was extremely clean. Our biggest problem with the unit is that it's advertised as having AC--which it does--but the AC is permanently set to not go lower than 78 degrees, which is just too warm. We ended up using the AC and keeping the windows open and fans on at night and still didn't feel like there was proper airflow or ventilation in the bedrooms, even though the outdoor air was cooler than the AC was allowed to cool to.

Had a wonderful time in Maui!  Cindy's place was perfect!  Great location and had everything we could need!  Lots of extras - spices, hair dryer, coffee, laundry soap, etc.  Fully stocked - even a cooler and ice packs which we used on our trip to Hana.  Thanks for everything!

Cindy was extremely responsive and very friendly. She was flexible in working around our flight schedule, which was a big plus! The condo was great. It's got a decent view of the ocean, and is within walking distance to a few beaches, shops and restaurants. Plenty of room for four people and you can't beat the location for that price. Lots of beach supplies/towels which was also a bonus. I'd recommend this condo for anyone looking to stay in Kihei, Maui!

Cindy's place is charming and cozy, and it is located within walking distance to many of the great activities Kihei has to offer. Cindy was a very considerate and communicative host. We stayed for three months in her condo, and we definitely hope to be back someday!

This is a very central location in Kihei. Nice and clean, very bright, all you could ever need! Hosts were very responsive. Snorkel gear and boogie boards provided. If we'd known that we wouldn't have brought all of ours. The two bedrooms are very conducive to families. 

Pool area is great.
