Kitchen needs some reworking but still has all you need.
Clean and comfortable. If you're looking for value, this is a good deal. Every thing you need for the beach, just a short walk across the street.
Perfect Location!

Excellent location.  Across street from beach and walking distance to shops and restaurants.   We loved the condo ,  clean and lots of space.  Everything we needed  for the beach.  Would stay here again.

We loved the Kihei condo. It was across the street from Charley Young beach (about a half a block distance), just down from the three Kam beaches and there were many restaurants, food trucks,  shops, bars AND gelato/shave ice places nearby (walking distance).  Also, It was really nice for two couples to have two separate full bathrooms. We really enjoyed the welcome basket and made use of all the snacks and coffee. There are plenty of beach towels, beach chairs and even snorkel gear to use. The condo is on the fourth floor so if you are hauling groceries, luggage or are tired or unable to climb stairs, there is an elevator. We also enjoyed the small lanai where we could see the sunrise over the side of Haleakala, see a bit of the ocean and the stars at night. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Maui.
Awesome clean condo with everything you need for the beach, snorkeling, etc. Decor was so fun and everything you need for cooking, laundry, and relaxation. I totally recommend this place.
The location of this condo is perfect. You can walk to the beach right across the street and the paddleboard/surf rental place is a short walk away. I would definitely stay here again.

The Pacific Shores condo complex has it all. It's in a fantastic location just a short walk from the beach, and a short walk to lots of stores and popular areas. But it's still quiet and calm at night. The complex has a great heated pool and BBQ area, and we spent a lot of time there -- there's a good mix of residents and vacationers, and everyone seemed friendly and eager for conversation. The units themselves are not generously sized, but definitely have everything you need. The complex is older and not fancy, but comfortable, friendly and clearly cared for by its residents.

Pam's unit is lovingly maintained and she includes lots of helpful extras to make the stay extra comfortable, such as beach gear, lots of beach towels, cleaning supplies and more. To be honest, we spent some time at the Grand Wailea, and felt so much more at home at the Pacific Shores condo. We appreciated the air conditioning and how it's able to be controlled by room, and made ample use of the bathroom fans and supplied drying rack. We super appreciated the presence of a removable showerhead in one of the bathrooms, as that makes cleaning kids and rinsing saltwater off of swimsuits so much easier. We enjoyed near-nightly live music from the hotel next door, which we could hear from the lanai. The assigned parking spots add a level of security and make it stress-free to park. I would go back in a heartbeat. 

Just a couple tips for fellow travelers - there isn't much pantry space, so don't overbuy items that need pantry storage. Which brings me to my next point... the complex has a problem with sugar ants (sooooo common in Hawaii, not blaming them at all), so you probably don't want to leave anything out anyway. We put everything in the fridge and kept the kitchen meticulously cleaned. A few wipes with a bit of Raid (supplied) in strategic places every now and then kept the problem at bay. If you have mobility issues, bring your patience or ask for a unit on the 1st floor as the elevator is very slow. (But it makes for a fun "beat the elevator to the 4th floor" game for kids.)

Overall, great stay; would absolutely recommend to families traveling with kids as well as others.
Great location right by the Kihei beaches and dining options. Definitely would stay again.
Die Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gepasst. Ruhige Lage, gratis Parkplatz, super Ausstattung & alles weitere was für eine top Bewertung nötig ist.

We had never stayed at a condo before so we were not sure what to expect.    It was fabulous. It had everything we needed and more. It was super clean.  The beds in the bedrooms and the pullout bed were all very comfortable. The breeze flowing thru the condo was wonderful.  The location was great.  There were many beaches within walking distance, along with parks, restaurants, grocery stores, and other shopping.  So convenient.
amazing hospitality. offered everything we needed for all the beach days. would recommend to anyone looking to stay in Maui

Pam's place is only a couple steps away from the beach, restuarants and groceries. Our family of 5 stayed here comfortably. There is AC and a ceiling fan in every room. We enjoyed live music from the hotel next door from the balcony. This place had everything we needed and more, from snorkel gear to zip lock bags. There was also a lovely welcome basket with snacks and coffe. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Pam's place was a very nice place to stay in Maui.  Nice beaches across the street and very convenient with restaurants and grocery store close by.   Having split ac units in thru out the house was great for our summer stay.  Pool was very nice too.

Place was fantastic, very clean and provided items such as beach towels, snorkeling equipment and many other items for recreational activities.  A wonderful goody basket was provided upon our arrival was a nice touch. Air conditioning was also nice to have on the warm nights during our stay. Thanks for the hospitality.
Nice place.  Great area.

Pam us amazing host.
she help us out every time we need it.
for sure we will come and stay again
Host was quick on responds and keep posted on hurrican notice. Would stay there again in the future.

The condo is in a very good location. The beach is only a few minutes walk away. A small shopping area with shops, restaurants and bar is also a short walk (10-15 minutes) away. We loved walking to the beach and to the restaurants/bar from the condo. The condo's kitchen had plates, silverware, pots, pans and appliances we needed to make a quick breakfast. The condo also had beach gear (mats, towels, chairs) which was nice to borrow and take to the beach. The living area was very pleasantly decorated with a beach theme and the beds were very comfortable.

The only thing that we did not like during our stay was that someone entered the condo to pick some things when we were out without informing us. We realized this when we noticed that some beach gear that we saw on the first day was not there after we came back from our day out. I am not sure if that is normal when renting a condo via air bnb, but, I did not expect it and made me feel a little uneasy the rest of the trip.
Walking distance to a great sandy beach. Grounds are constantly being groomed and cleaned. Pool area is nice. Good place to stay if your on a budget.
Really great place to stay with a family!!  Beach is right across street and pool is great too.

A very nicely appointed and welcoming home away from home! Snorkeling gear, coolers, beach chairs, beach towels, pool noodles, all available for use during our stay. What a nicely surprising touch! The air conditioners were a bit tricky at first. It seemed like only one room at a time, out of the three rooms, was being cooled down by the a/c. But after reading the a/c manual, we learned that all 3 remotes had to be set to "cool" (for some reason, one of them was set to "heat") in order for all 3 air conditioners to function at the same time. Until we found that out, only the first one that was turned on would actually cool the room. The other 2 were "on", but not blowing any cool air! We also really enjoyed the welcome basket that contained local goodies and a fresh pineapple!

Amazing setup never been in  a Condo with so much incidentals items. Too many to write.
 Made cooking so much easier.
Beach items a plenty. 
Would rate this 6 out of 5
Thanks so much for making our holiday so enjoyable.

It was a great location just a short walk from the beach. We appreciated how much Pam helped us be ready to arrive late with small twins and older children. 6 people would fit comfortably, but the two more babies made it a bit cramped. Overall it was a great place to stay with thoughtful help from the host.

We loved the condo and recommend it! It’s a great location, across from a beach where we spent lots of time. It is easy access to the highway for day trips to other areas of the island. The condo was sparkling clean. There was reserved parking. Keyless entry was a plus. We appreciated the welcome basket with coffee and other treats. We were impressed with quality of what was provided (good shampoo) and the available items in the kitchen and to use at the beach. The hostess was available and accommodating. The beds were comfortable. We will be back!

Cindy’s place was fabulous. It had everything we needed and more. We were impressed by the wonderful welcome basket. Our family of 4 enjoyed this condo. I would definitly stay here again. Thanks for your hospitality, Cindy.
Great location, close to beaches, restaurants, grocery stores and the condo contains everything that you need!
Nice, private space a few minute walk away from the beach and amazing sunsets. The apartment had everything we'd need upon arrival. Would stay again!

name: Bohemian 4BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the open-concept living space, vibrant decor, and fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in the Plateau, known for its laid-back eateries and busy bars.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the open-concept living space, vibrant decor, and fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in the Plateau, known for its laid-back eateries and busy bars. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Arepera or O. Noir for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Boul- St-Laurent on Laurent Boulevard. To discover the rest of the city, take the metro at Saint-Laurent & Prince-Arthur station.  For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out wi
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Arepera or O. Noir for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Boul- St-Laurent on Laurent Boulevard. To discover the rest of the city, take the metro at Saint-Laurent & Prince-Arthur station.  For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, cafés, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: This Sonder has seasonal air conditioning available from June 1st to September 30th. Air conditioning units are removed in the off-season. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments: Can't say enough about how easy it was to book this place. Easy to find, flatbook was incredibly accommodating and responsive. The place looks just like the pictures. It is clean, with everything you need for a weekend trip.
The host was on time and very pleasant. The flat was very clean and as described. The neighbourhood was extremely quiet although very close to great shops, restaurants, parks and downtown.

The location and apartment were perfect! We loved the cleanliness and coziness of the entire place. Shane contacted us directly the morning upon arrival, he was professional and helpful and provided all information we needed. We do wish that our unit had air conditioning as we felt very hot and muggy through out the night.
Great experience overall!

Flatbook hospitality team did a great job with frequent emails and follow-ups to make sure we were greeted at the home. We were running late, so they shared the key code for the main door. The home was nicely maintained, fresh linens on the beds and towels and toiletries were provided. There were 3 queen beds and a twin day bed which was more that enough for our party of 6. Living room was small, but that was fine, since we were out most of the day. The place is in a great location, walking distance to the main walking streets and restaurants (st. Laurent blvd, st. Denis, etc.).

The area does remain rather active late into the night, so there's street noise coming in (people talking/shouting, police cars, etc.) to the unit if you leave the windows open at night. There's no central air (we were there in the summer), but fans were provided in every room. It was still fairly hot inside with the windows open. 

Overall the stay was pleasant, location is great. Parking is not provided, you have to go to the closest main street (Sherbook st) to find parking for the day/night.

Comfortable, modern, clean, well-equipped place to stay for our family of four. Great location, with lots of restaurants, shops, etc. in easy walking distance. All the fixtures and appliances are new and in very good condition. Would absolutely stay here again.

Note that the apartment is on the second floor, accessed by an exterior metal curved staircase.

Great place for our group of four.  Excellent location, close to restaurants, depanneurs, patisseries and all the good stuff you can find in Montreal.  Apartment is as advertised, attractive, comfortable, clean, well equipped, nice linens and towels. Flatbook people are very helpful.  Would definitely book it again.
Great place. Enough space for all the people. However, the front stairs were a bit on the precarious side (steep and not entirely sturdy).

This apartment was perfect for our party of four. There were four small bedrooms, each with a comfy bed (three queen beds and one twin), and the living room area was perfect for a rest after a long day exploring the city. Boulevard Saint-Laurent is just a block over and has a ton of nice cafes, restaurants, and bars, and the Vieux-Port is a 20-30 minute walk from the apartment. The area seemed to get pretty crowded with a teenage party crowd on the Friday and Saturday nights we were there, which made the two front bedrooms a little noisy as their windows face the street.

The Flatbook team was very responsive and organized. They got in touch with me right away to exchange details and to make sure all was arranged before our arrival. The apartment was clean, and the Flatbook guidebook that was provided was a nice resource. Overall, a great stay. Thank you!

The apartment was as described. Flatbook gave us plenty of supplies like shampoo, extra kleenex, etc. Everything was clean and nice like you would expect at a hotel. We were pleased with our experience and would stay here again.

Adresse à recommander! quartier hyper sympa, charmant, commerçant, à pied ou à vélo!  appartement très propre, fonctionnel, très calme, convivial. Escalier d'accès extérieur un peu raide.  L'équipe de Flatbook aux petits soins. Très bonne première expérience avec Airbnb!

We booked a flatbook apartment a month before our trip to Montreal. We chose that specific apartment because it has four separate bedrooms for the four of us and because of the proximity to the McGill university. The problem was that there was not hot water in the shower!!! In the Canadian weather of -2 to 10 degrees it did not make any sense to us. We asked for it to be repaired and although they tried it did not change at all. We were offered to move to different apartment but the apartments that were offered were not as close to the university and had only 3 bedrooms. We do want to mention that in all other aspects the apartment was great and flatbook also helped us get a big taxi to go the the airport. But at last we had a week of cold showers which made a really bad experience to us overall. When we book an apartment that is a basic thing that we expect.

This apartment was great. It was just as advertised, very clean, and for the most part well-equipped. Its location was absolutely perfect. It is right in the heart of the plateau and an easy walk to Parc Mont Royale, Ave. St. Denis, Ave. St. Laurent, and even to McGill University. A truly central location.
The heat in the main room did not work when we arrived in the evening but Flatbook was very responsive and it was fixed by mid-day the next day. 
This is a great apartment for a group who needs several bedrooms. The key code entry was also wonderful as we did not need to share a key. People could come and go.
Great place! Fantastic location. This space was perfect for our family who needed space. The steps are steep (and icy in winter) so be careful.

The Flatbook team was excellent in accommodating us. The place was very clean and was well equipped with the necessities of a weekend stay. There was issues with the heating at the beginning which was quickly resolved and any request was answered and satisfied by the Flatbook team. Very close to the downtown life and attractions. Amazing and comforting for the 6 of us that stayed here.
Everything was great with the booking! Nice and tidy place and no surprises.
Place was well kept and ready on time. Only issues were no cable tv, the water in shower would not get hot, and parking could sometimes be difficult on street.

Overall positive experience, however there were some complications post-checkout. Just make sure to inspect the apartment and take photos of anything that may not look right, and be sure to leave the apartment spotless at checkout.

I travelled to Montreal and stayed in Flatbook with 5 friends. It was PERFECT! Best location. Super comfortable. When I return to Montreal, I would definitely stay here again! The Flatbook team was very helpful. Thank you!
Great location and a nice place - perfect for a weekend in Montreal!

I was in Montreal with my lab group for a biomaterials conference. The flat is cute and in a safe neighborhood near McGill and the convention center. It was fantastic! Everything was new and very clean. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

Great location! Very helpful host. The apt was neat and orderly. Only small downside was the living room had no direct sunlight, but was still cozy to hang out in.
Overall a great place to stay for 3-4 people.

O apartamento é uma graça e bastante confortável! Quando chegamos, estava tudo limpo e arrumado e ainda tinha alguns mimos, como geladinhos no freezer. A localização é muito boa! Acesso fácil e rápido a diversos restaurantes na Rue st. denis. Ficamos entre a old Montreal e a zona comercial. Excelente estada. Recomendo!!!
Apartment seemed small for the price, but worked out just fine for our close-knit family of six.
Everything was done right which was expected.

Check in was very easy with a keypad entry.  The room was as described.  There were a few things that were not perfect: lamps with no good location to plug them in, and a dining chair that looked whole but had obviously been broken before.  None of it was enough to be a real problem.  

We had hot water in the shower, AC, a washing machine that worked (and detergent packets) four cute little bedrooms, and a kitchen.  The kitchen had enough pots and pans to cook a feast, a blender, a toaster, and a coffee maker.  It was so convenient and easy with the kids.  I loved that there wasn't a lot of stuff in it.

It was easy to walk to the train, restaurants, and shops.  We found free street parking.

If we were to go back, I would be happy to go back to this place.
The apartament had great locación, amazing deco, and was very clean. Amazing experience... I will stay here if O come back.
the location is good. There are many restaurants around house.
Great space for our family of 5. Clean and very comfortable. Within 3 blocks of subway, but we walked everywhere including Old Montreal, Chinatown, Notre Dame Basilica, and Miles End.
This was a very nice spot to stay if you are looking to be near downtown. Quiet street but very close to lots of restaurants and activities.
Lovely apartment in an excellent location close to great restaurants, bars and shopping!

I had experienced an issue with the AC, and the team was prompt to send someone over to provide us with fans and help resolve our concerns. The apartment is as described and the location was great to busy restaurant filled streets! The sheets were comfy, and overall we enjoyed our stay. Thank you Sonder! The

The apartment was very nice and in an awesome location. It was clean and comfortable. The only downside was that the air conditioning was broken so the nights were a little hot. There were ample fans though and the neighborhood was safe enough for us to sleep with the windows open. Amazing bars and restaurants were easily walkable and the city bike station was only a block or so away.

This place is right in the middle of an amazing area. Alot of food and clubs are literally 10 steps around the corner. Easily walkable to everything and the bikes. If your driving parking is right outside perfectly available every day and night. There are a lot of fans. The air-conditioning at that time wasn't working but it's okay. Great 4 rooms for 4 buds. Great area it was worth every penny.

L'appartement est bien situé et très propre. Il est proche d'un appartement hôtel en terme de présentation. Les chambres sont confortables et la salle de bain contient une grande douche. L'unique point à améliorer reste pour nous la luminosité de la pièce à vivre qui reste sombre même en pleine journée.

The location of this place was great and generally a close walk to attractions, food, and entertainment. There was just no heads up about the no air conditioning situation from the time of booking (when it indicated there is A/C) to check-in and we noticed how hot it was. The fans provided were okay despite the few days we stayed were especially hot and often times, it was hotter inside than out making the 6 of us quite uncomfortable at night even when we shut off all the lights except the lamp to cool down. Overall it was good place to stay for groups with the amount of bedrooms and is accessible to a lot of places by foot.

The flat is in a very lively area( but street quiet) and an easy walk for all areas. It had some nice shops and places to eat nearby. We could park in the street. The flat is very hot as mentioned in other reviews and the fans didn't really help. There is little natural light in the flat and not possible for air to circulate.  Only two bedrooms have windows to open.
I recommend this apartment, good experience
Great location and easy checkin.  Sonder was very responsive to questions weeks before.
Place is in a great location, and the check in check out process was very smooth and easy! Worth noting that two of four bedrooms do not have windows.
As advertised, clean and host went above and beyond.
Our stay at our Sonder was very pleasant. Check-in was easy and communication with the team was very prompt and informative. Location was perfect!

The apartment has everything a traveler will need. Location is very good and the rooms are comfortable and clean. The apartment is at a second floor and sometimes there are some noise from the people who live in the third floor but nothing that could really disturb us.

Le logement est très bien placé et fonctionnel.
Un peu de bruit les soirs du jeudi au samedi à cause de la fête du côté de Prince-Arthur.
Super communication avec Sonder.
Great location. Location and apt are Bohemian, lots of students, just around the corner from a great pedestrian street. Endless fantastic restaurants within a short walk.
très bien placé, bonne literie et propre, seuls bemols: manque de luminosité et de chaises pour 6 personnes
Great location, very good communication.

Good place with ok value but had trouble communicating with the host since this is run by a company, not a private host. Late checkout, even by an hour, was difficult to arrange and did not end up happening.

Great place,
Better then expected and good location. 
Not pictured is a decent sized entry.
However I did not like that I had to sign up for another online rental website called "Sonder" in order to book this place through Airbnb.

Les atouts: Appartement propre et pratique pour un court séjour. Déco minimaliste type ikéa mais efficace et bien chauffé. Literie confortable. Quartier central très agréable, calme et proche des commerces et du métro.
Les points faibles : Manque de lumière naturelle (photos du site un peu trompeuses sur la luminosité). Porte d’entrée pas très sécurisée et certainement à revoir.
Really great neighbourhood. The beds are also really comfy. Slept like a baby!
Great location, comfortable living area spacious rooms, no AC but they provide enough fans, overall gets the job done ! Would stay again
It is a nice apartment with a good atmosphere in a great neighbourhood full of lively restaurants and bars. Recommendable!

L'appartement est très sombre et l'environnement bruyant (rue et immeuble).
Il y a la TV mais sans aucun branchement à une box internet donc celle-ci ne marche pas (juste un câble Hdmi qui pend).
Aucun contact avec l'hôte, il s'agit plutôt d'une société qui gère plusieurs appartements, juste un code délivré pour accéder à l'appartement.

Great location.  This is not really Bohemian  but it is a very functional for a larger group that each gets a bedroom. It was terrific for six of us.  The refrigerator made a large noise but hopefully they will fix it.  All in all, a wonderful place to stay in a fantastic neighborhood.
Very good!
Great spot.

Our host was very helpful in accommodating our group for the weekend. We were able to cook, clean, and do our laundry with ease. The best part about the property is the location - walking distance from restaurants , grocery stores , and nightlife. Would gladly stay at this property again.
Nice place in close proximity to St-Laurent Street.

name: Single room Flushing G/ Lorimer JMZ
summary: 1930 sewing factory converted apt, 1 room available in a 3 bdrm, Easy access: Williamsburg/Manhattan/ Bedstu/Bushwick/ Ft Greene/Greenpoint, Lorimer JMZ Flushing G, Laundry in the building, Queen sized bed! Dining table, Full kitchen w/appliances
space: Amazing communal space! Nice sized kitchen, dining room and living room. One shared bathroom and laundry on the first floor.
description: 1930 sewing factory converted apt, 1 room available in a 3 bdrm, Easy access: Williamsburg/Manhattan/ Bedstu/Bushwick/ Ft Greene/Greenpoint, Lorimer JMZ Flushing G, Laundry in the building, Queen sized bed! Dining table, Full kitchen w/appliances Amazing communal space! Nice sized kitchen, dining room and living room. One shared bathroom and laundry on the first floor. We are close to many neighborhoods within a short walk, bike ride uber or train. My favorite spots in the shortest distance: coffee shop - Myrtle and Marcy, and local restaurant - Moloko, dive bar - project parlor
neighborhood_overview: We are close to many neighborhoods within a short walk, bike ride uber or train. My favorite spots in the shortest distance: coffee shop - Myrtle and Marcy, and local restaurant - Moloko, dive bar - project parlor

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Sean is an adventurous and spirited fellow. Interested in travel, photography, design, food, and the rest of the goodness life has to offer.

reviews.comments: I can highly recommand! I didnt get to meet Sean but his 2 roommates who were super nice and helpfull in all kinds of ways! The room is nice and the bed comfortable, and the rest of the loft-like apartment is very spacious and stylishly furnished!

Sean was an incredible host. I had to come in on a red eye and he was kind enough to let me into his place in the morning despite the usual check in time. I was able to rest and shower before seeing the city. He made himself available to me throughout the stay while giving me advice on restaurants. One night I was tired and decided to stay in - he was kind enough to show me how to work his projector so I could watch some TV before going  to bed. The room is very quiet and perfect - clean sheets, towels... the room is a nice size to simply sleep and plan the day. The common space is expertly decorated as Sean has true style. I wanted to stay with someone similarly minded to myself with a good vibe and he was exactly that. He had one roommate who I didn't see but once during my three night stay. I saw Sean once in a while and he was nothing but friendly. The neighborhood is Hasidic while central to different hip areas of Brooklyn. I really enjoyed the common area as well - clean, stylish, and relaxing. He also let me leave my luggage at his place my final day so I didn't have to carry it around the city until my flight. I hope to stay again when back in NY!

Sean is the BEST Airbnb host I've ever had. He, and the other housemates, are wonderful and I felt immediately surrounded by friends. 
The room itself is small in itself , but good for one or two people. I stayed here with my girlfriend and we had plenty of space. The common area is stylish, quite large, with super comfy couches. 
It's close to two different subway stations and it takes less than 30mins to get into Manhattan. 
Highly recommend! :)

Super nice and trendy apartment, the room is cozy and comfortable. It has enough space for the luggage and a place to hang your clothes. 
The living room is very big and with comfortable couches. This place is perfect for an authentic Brooklyn experience.
The bathroom is big and clean.

The area is safe and quiet, it has super markets around and there is a metro station (line G) one Block away and many buses are available too. 

We love it and would definitely repeat!!!

This apartment is a stylish oasis just 1/2 block away from the subway, and hitting the trains, we landed in Union Square in 20 minutes!  The bedroom is facing the back alley, so quiet.  The bed is on the soft side, if you like soft. The apartment has a spacious open-concept common area, tastefully and artistically appointed, with old oak floors and an old brick wall.  Be prepared for a few flights of easy stairs. Overall, very comfortable, and much prettier than the pictures!!

name: Basement Beach Apartment, Rockaways
summary: Private basement apartment. Extremely close to the beach, 5 minutes walk to boardwalk/ beach; 20-30 minutes away from the JFK airport by subway, 3 blocks from subway, great restaurants nearby! Note: Be mindful of your head, as we have only 6ft tall ceilings. Although we try to curb movement while we have guests, we have two children who wake early!
description: Private basement apartment. Extremely close to the beach, 5 minutes walk to boardwalk/ beach; 20-30 minutes away from the JFK airport by subway, 3 blocks from subway, great restaurants nearby! Note: Be mindful of your head, as we have only 6ft tall ceilings. Although we try to curb movement while we have guests, we have two children who wake early! The entry to the basement is from the side of the house through the gate. Stairs lead down to a separate entrance to the basement. Rockaway Beach is a laid-back alternative to the Hamptons. The coast of Queens holds some of the best beaches in NYC. Beach goers can enjoy the sand and water, the variety of concessions, and the city's only legal surfing beach. Newly rebuild boardwalk offers wide variety of outdoor activities, bars and street food. ***Some parts of the apartment have low ceilings, therefore it may not be 100% comfortable for people taller than 5.9ft (180cm).  *** This apartment has a small fridge, microwave, hot plate and an ele
neighborhood_overview: Rockaway Beach is a laid-back alternative to the Hamptons. The coast of Queens holds some of the best beaches in NYC. Beach goers can enjoy the sand and water, the variety of concessions, and the city's only legal surfing beach. Newly rebuild boardwalk offers wide variety of outdoor activities, bars and street food.
notes: ***Some parts of the apartment have low ceilings, therefore it may not be 100% comfortable for people taller than 5.9ft (180cm).  *** This apartment has a small fridge, microwave, hot plate and an electric kettle. It does not have a full kitchen. *** Our family does live above and we have small children. We will do everything in our power to keep them quiet in the early morning hours, but they are energetic and our floors are creaky. Hence we don't recommend this house for people who sleep all morning/day. *** No windows in the common space and bedroom. Just one little window in the bathroom.
access: The entry to the basement is from the side of the house through the gate. Stairs lead down to a separate entrance to the basement.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My stay was very pleasant. I arrived later than expected and Vanda communicated with me on my way to the destination and we arranged my check in verbally. My privacy was respected all through out my stay. I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs to travel to this area.

Vanda and her husband were very warm and welcoming hosts!  They live right above the basement and were there to greet me when I arrived.  Vanda was very flexible with my check-in time.  Vanda was also very accommodation of an additional guest joining the reservation at the last minute! The apartment looks just like the photos in the listing, and the wifi works very well.  There is not a full kitchen - a hot plate, microwave, 1/2 fridge, and sink are provided.  The only problem with the apartment is that the roof is not well insulated, and you can hear all activity on the floor above.  Vanda and her family are not up late or extremely early, but when they are up and about, it is easy to hear in the basement.
For a two nights ok, bed could have been more comfortable. Hosts very friendly and helpful. Cool beachbar around the corner. A bit subway and subway beach nearby

Vanda and her husband were super accommodating hosts and were very responsive to texts and messages. The location is near public transit, within walking distance to Rockaway beach, and there is on street parking. There is also a really neat surf bar/restaurant called Rockaway Beach Surf Club half a block away that makes you feel like you stepped into a bar somewhere in Cali. It was a nice surprise and they have great Tacos.
As mentioned in the listing, the ceilings are pretty low, so if you're above six foot just be careful not to hit your head going down the stairs etc. The bed is firm but comfy, and the shower had amazing water pressure.
The apartment is simply furnished but has everything you need to have a comfortable stay.

Vanda was a wonderful host! She was very understanding of our late check in and was very responsive whenever we tried to contact her. Her home is lovely and very clean! The shower also had hot water (A+). I thought the ceilings would be too low but my boyfriend (who is 6ft) felt comfortable enough to walk around ok (he just avoided the lower parts). Unfortunately I didn't meet Vanda but her husband checked us out and he was lovely! Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay in the Rockaways if you are planning on spending the day at the beach and just needs a place to sleep in. Very easy to communicate with Vanda.

Vanda and Andrew are a lovely couple, happy to assist with any request or question. The Rockaways are magical, especially the Rockaway Beach Club, right around the corner from this rental. If you're seeking basic, budget accommodations that offer privacy and close beach access, this is it.

Apartment is exactly as described. No frills but you can't beat the fact that it is walking distance to the beach, some cool bars and restaurants and of course the surf club around the corner. Extremely clean and check-in/check-out was a breeze.
This is the perfectly located beachside apartment for fun in the Rockaways. Vanda and Andrew are excellent hosts and we had a lovely time!
Nice inexpensive basement apartment.  Easy walk to the beach, restaurants, and bars.
Great hosts! The place was a great crash pad for a long weekend at the beach. Nicely positioned for all that the beach offers.

Great location near the beach and close to lively spots. Communicating with the host was easy and they were friendly. The apartment has a separate entry which is good. The apartment was clean and the host had a lot of helpful details, travel size lotion, shampoo, etc, fruits. I would definitely stay here again.

We loved staying at this basement apartment. It was very close to JFK and easy to get to. We wanted to go surfing in New York, which was easy because the  beach was 5 minutes walk away. There are some cool bars and breakfast places nearby, and it was just an hour on the ferry to Manhattan. We walked to the ferry about 20 minutes away and it was a great way to see  the statue of Liberty. My boyfriend is 6ft but he was fine walking around it the basement. It had a nice big shower and cooking facilities. Vanda was helpful responding to all my messages and made us feel at home. I would really recommend staying here:)
Nice basement apartment walking distance from the beach. Quiet weekend away very well spent. Vanda and Andrew are great hosts.

Vanda is a great host.  She suggested that we take the ferry from Wall St. to Rockaway which turns out to be a really good way to get there.  We enjoyed a day at the beach and talking to her neighbors.  We also had a good time walking the new boardwalk in the evening.

Vanda was super helpful and responded in great time.  She made check-in and check-out easy and we appreciated her providing some extra's for us when asked.  This room is private and very large.   We loved being just a couple of blocks from the beach side and some of the restaurants there.  Great burgers at Rippers, but get your organic juice on 96th on the bay side.  The room is in a basement as noted and the only window is in the bathroom so the room is on the dark side and probably great for day sleepers!  If your sensitive to mildew I would not suggest a basement room.  The room was sufficient for the type of trip we planned since we planned to be on the beach or out and about most of time.
Clean and exactly as described. Wifi, lotion, shampoo and even a toothbrush was a plus. Great value and close to the best restaurants and bars Rockaway Beach has to offer. Would stay again:)

I'm 6'5 and I walked around without a problem; the ceiling is there but I'm just used to bending my head over around doorways anyway. Bed was comfortable and shower was nice. Close to literally everything and easy area to navigate. Next door is literally the best fish taco ever at the Surf Club.
thanks!!
This place was great! Super close to the beach and really cool places to eat! The ceiling is low so definitely taller people should watch their heads. Definitely would come here again!
Great place. I will definitely new york and use the place again.

Vanda and her family were all very sweet.

The location was just perfect, just a walk away from boutiques and the beach!

Vanda"s place has great location, 5 min walking distance to the beach. Vanda is a great host - there was some fruits, coffee and tea, and even tooth brushes available for guests. Vanda was very responsive during our stay there. Everything was as described. THANK YOU!

This is such a great spot if you want to be close to a lot of neat things near the beach.
Its right around the corner from the surf club, down the street from great coffee shops and food. And Vanda couldn't be nicer. Highly recommended.
It's a great place. Thanks Vanda
This place is nice and clean. Close to the subway. I enjoyed my time It’s nice and comfy. I will book again for my next trip!
The place was clean and great. Exactly as it looks. The owners were quick to response and wonderful. Very nice place and beautiful
Cute and small apartment. Great locations. The hosts were very accommodating.

Very recommend to you all!
Vanda’s apartment is perfect and cozy place for a single or a couple. Me and my boyfriend stayed there for a month and everything was great. You have your own entrance and privacy. Although it was winter and very cold, there was always hot water in the shower and in the sink. And as well, the apartment always stayed warm, even without a heater. 
Vanda and her husband helped us at anytime in any need. They are both very kind and good people. We even got a little present for the New Year, which was very thoughtful.
The apartment is very close to the subway, bus stations, laundry mat, pharmacy and supermarket- every thing you will need for your staying. 
The WiFi was perfect and strong and worked all the time. 

Thank you Vanda and Andrew. 
Hope to come again someday. 

Gidi &Eli.
Great place. Clean and cozy. I enjoyed my stay didn’t want to leave.
vanda place was an amazing stay felt at home and was very comfortable , had great privacy and the place was clean!!! I loved It so much I booked It for 5 extra days ill be back
Place was great, simple and very close to the transit system. Located in a quiet part of NY and right next to the beach. Vanda made everything easy with communication.

Viaje con mi esposa para visitar e ir de compras en Nueva York. Si paras en Manhattan esta todo mas cerca pero por el triple del precio. En el alojamiento de Vanda, es mucho mas económico, y como quien va de visita a Nueva York, solo va al alojamiento a descansar, el lugar de Vanda me pareció espectacular con relación al precio y comodidad. Si bien es cierto que esta en la parte de abajo de su casa, es cómodo, tiene un estar y un dormitorio separados, un pequeño baño y una cocina para desayunar. Lo de los techos bajos, no es así ya que nos movimos con total comodidad. Si bien es cierto que se escuchan los pasos del piso superior, nos ayudaba para levantarnos temprano y tomarnos el metro, que transbordo por medio lleva al corazón de Manhattan (recomiendo adquirir por 30 dólares la tarjeta ilimitada de una semana. La playa esta a unos 300 metros (no sabia que había playa en Nueva York) Hay muchos deli y supermercados muy cerca. Fue increíble la predisposición de Vanda para recibir paquetes que había encargado por Amazon y Ebay. Muchas gracias y volverla a ir.
Communication and check-in was easy. The space was super clean. Nice little spot to crash in Rockaway - good value!

Vanda is a great host and always reachable. The place was exactly as described and Vanda has put a lot of thought into making the place comfortable with a lot of small amenities, for eg, list of places to eat around, the map for how to get around, well equipped kitchenette etc. The place was clean and private. Highly recommend.

Our host was very thoughtful and accommodating to our needs. Check in and out was a breeze. Our host description of her place was very accurate and it was a great value for the price, additionally, having our private entrance and private bath was a huge bonus!

We would definitely stay at Vanda’s place again!

Sam & Luda.

Perfect for a quick getaway at the beach! The private entrance makes you feel more comfortable and less intrusive. Vanda was flexible with check in which was very helpful for our schedule. Would recommend!
Had an interesting stay in this basement. Pretty close to the beach and to nearby eateries but the basement itself need some TLC.
Great location to the beach!  Awesome basement layout, very clean and roomy.
Communication with Vanda was excellent. The AirBnB is nothing fancy but is exactly as described - recommended for budget stay.

We had a good stay. The location is convenient to a restaurant/bar, a grocery and a pharmacy.
The photos depict the unit accurately,  but there is no bathroom sink.
Unless changes are made, the unit smells mildewy like the basement that it is  and towels fail to dry adequately.
If you like to get up early and get out sightseeing, the children upstairs will wake you up promptly at 7:00 am.  :-)
The TV is Firestick; no cable or local channels.
The parking is first come/first served street parking.  We used Uber/Taxi or walked.
For a Rockaway home base location, it is an OK choice.
Vanda's place is affordably priced and comes with everything you need for a great weekend away. Location right next to the beach is great!

Highly recommend for solo travelers/couples. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed staying at Vanda's basement apartment. It was very clean and cozy. The bed was super comfortable. The location is great too. Close to the beach and many restaurants/shops. There is also a strip mall nearby for food and groceries. Overall, we had a pleasant stay. Will totally recommend and go back to Vanda's place next time we stay in Rockaway.

Basement crash pad very close to the subway, restaurants, the beach. Great water pressure in the shower. Nearby Rockaway Bakery has the best breakfast/coffee. Quick responses by Vanda. Super accommodating. Met Vanda’s husband, he was friendly to us and gave us great local recommendations. The price is right!
Perfect getaway from the city! Conveniently located a short walk to the beach and eateries. Recommend Vanda's place for a quick and easy weekend stay!
Great value for a Rockaway Beach visit.

This place is such an awesome value! The price can’t be beat for somewhere to crash so close to the beach and the other great places in the Rockaways. Vanda and Andrew were incredibly lovely and helpful, and gave us wonderful tips in the neighborhood.

Bring a flashlight to get into the place - very dark. Be aware there are no deadbolts on the door. Ask host to communicate checkin well before the trip. Anyone with difficulties with steep stairs should not use this place. Not well lit.

We enjoyed our stay at Vanda's. The flat is very clean and all the basics one would need are there, as well as special touches- chocolates and brochures.I was concerned about not having A/C as it was very hot,but it was completely comfortable in the flat with the fans. Vanda offered self check in and out and was responsive to all of our questions. Her husband helped us with the TV and gave us advice about the area. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a budget accommodation near the beach and restaurants.
Vanda is great! Home is in a great location. Wonderful stay. Close to all. Great food and bars close by. Get the fish tacos at rockaway surf club or get a beer at Epstein’s bar.
Plumbing wasn’t up to par, shower flooded with the toilet water and left a smell. Other than that, not a bad place to stay for 2-3 days.
Great location for a quick getaway to Rockaway Beach! We could walk everywhere we wanted to go.
Very close to everything you’d want to see and be a part of at the Rockaways. Great atmosphere for a good sleep.
A no-nonsense place for a night or two right by the beach in Rockaway. Great value place!

Vanda a été super sympas notamment en nous indiquant comment rejoindre Manathan mais aussi sur les bonnes adresses locales. L’appartement est correctement équipé et rien ne manque pour le séjour.  Mais ne convient pas aux gens de grande taille
Nice place to stay for the weekend. Vanda is great at responding to your messages and makes suggestions of things to do locally as well.
Had a great stay, place was small but perfect size for myself and my girlfriend to spend the night. Overall satisfied with everything. Would recommend to everyone.
Great place, great value.
great place to stay like I did for a layover. vanda was very responsive and appreciate her accommodating my late arrival. plenty of space and a great value for staying near jfk!
The place was adorable and very clean.
place was well put together and was a very convenient ride to and from JFK definitelyrecommend if your flying out of JFK.

name: 旺角旅馆,三人至4人房,2 分钟到地铁
summary: 2mins walk to mongkok MTR station, frEE WiFi, and 24hr hot bath available
description: 2mins walk to mongkok MTR station, frEE WiFi, and 24hr hot bath available

host.host_about: Variety is the spice of life.

reviews.comments: 房东太太人很好,去的时候其实有点担心来着,结果Jie提前联系了我,当时还在国内机场候机,接到电话还是很意外哈哈｡到香港已经很晚啦,Jie的先生李先生来接的我们,李先生人也很好,虽然普通话不太流利,也是极力回答我们的问题,给了我们很多帮助,房东的儿子也很热情｡在此感谢给忘了密码的我们开了门哈哈｡房子虽然小但是很干净,装修设施都很新,环境很不错,大厦的环境也挺好的,交通很方便,下次来还会选择Jie的房子｡The house is very good !Jie and Jie’s family also very nice !!
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
the host is very nice and easy to approach whenever you have troubles.The room is tidy and clean,good location.recommended!!

房东太太人超好的!会时时提点我们哪里有好吃的,好逛的,好玩的,让我们省了不少时间｡

房东的儿子更贴心的为我们准备了有关【港澳攻略】的书籍,好让我们在香港这段时间“穿梭自如”

We enjoyed the convienience and affordability of our stay in Jie's hostel. The room was clean and cosy, which made up for its small size. The beds provided were pretty comfortable as well! Overall, we had a pleasant experience staying in the mongkok area and I would recommend others to give this place a try:)
地方虽小但是蛮干净的,位置很好｡房东很热情,服务也很周到｡谢谢William把我们接到hostel又把我们送上去机场的巴士｡

房主很客气,也很有耐心,有点邻家阿姨的感觉,第一次到香港,第一次用airbnb(内地不太流行这个软件,在香港读书的朋友推荐的,看网上说最好用双币信用卡支付,我用支付宝扣好多手续费,我支付700多扣了81元,有人说双币信用卡还款时需要在银行先兑换美金,一个省钱麻烦,一个费钱省事,自己权衡吧,其实兑换外币也很简单的｡)具体地址是弥敦道739号金轮大厦,离旺角地铁的A1出口比较近,几分钟就到,等到E1出口附近有朗豪坊,翠华餐厅(注意看好､主弥敦道两侧分单双号的!),房间很干净,比较安静,空间和其他香港的宾馆酒店一样,比较小(和内地的不一样,游客要提前做好功课),我们两个大人还有一个两岁宝宝住得感觉还可以,退房很方便,房卡放在桌子上就可以,附近的金御海鲜酒家的粤语式早茶很棒,强烈推荐(内地朋友不要用内地海鲜酒楼对比,不一样的就餐方式,香港海鲜酒家基本都有早茶,不是很贵,三个人早餐平均120港币左右),房间整体入住感觉满意,有第一次去香港的内地朋友可以向我咨询,走得匆忙没来得及和阿姨道别,以后有机会再去住:)
房间虽然比较小 但是真的很棒哟~热水超级给力 位置也方便 楼下的药房基本上什么生活用品都有 巴士 地铁什么都近~也很安全 两个女生去也完全不用担心 房东每天都会更换垃圾桶 在香港用这个价格住到这种房间真的很值!
房东非常好,一直指导我们怎么到住处,而且很贴心,住处还不错,经济实惠,下次去肯定还选这家!谢谢房东了!
无窗,超小
交通非常方便,离地铁站巴士站也近｡房间很干净,还有独立卫浴,隔音也很好｡住着很安心｡
交通便利,想玩的地方都在附近｡房間CP質高,整潔乾淨設備齊全,高度推薦!
The place is clean and nice ! The place is so convenient since it is near to MRT. The host is friendly too =)
房间虽然小,但是五脏俱全,地理位置也很不错,距离地铁站就5分钟左右,楼下2分钟左右到超市,唯一不好的就是,不能开窗,不能通风｡
条件还可以,环境挺干净,人也很好
房间很不错,冷气够冻室内装修得很舒适｡可惜无窗透唔入光以及不可以通风,令人觉得有些少压抑｡运气不佳楼下正在修路行人需要绕路,因此要比平常多走两分钟路程,离最近地铁口的确很近｡楼下有超市和药房便利店｡总体感觉OK
性价比很高 位置就在旺角金轮大厦 从旺角站A1出口向左后方走三分钟左右就能到达 非常方便 三个女生住刚刚好 也不会太挤 屋子虽然不大但很干净整洁 冷气也超足!提供了洗浴用品 但是没有毛巾和牙刷 记得自带 总之是一次非常愉快的入住体验 下次去香港还会考虑来住的!多谢款待^_^

阿姨人很热情,她的儿子服务也很好｡
房子很小,和内地旅馆来说,不过住久了还是挺舒服的｡
最让人喜欢的是地址,离地铁站真的很近,到旺角地铁站,走几分钟就到了｡
下次去还住这边,希望刘阿姨能给优惠｡嘻嘻
Very good!
方便,安静,舒适!
位置很赞,旺角中心,离地铁近,好吃的也多,房间虽然不大,但是价格给力,性价比还是很高的｡住了两天,中间没有给收拾房间,床单太破旧｡总体来说不错!
The host was very quick to response and basically I had everything I need in the room. There were construction going on right next to the place and the noise was too much...

當初房東跟我講說有孕婦客人,不方便搬,所以希望我們從原先的11樓(此房源)改安排樓下(10樓)的房間,拜託我們改住那間,我們想說沒關係,那我們就改房間,給孕婦方便｡但我們最後一天離開時,跟10樓的阿姨聊天,才發現我們住的那間根本不是我們房東的房源,是房東跟她｢借｣的房間｡房東也沒有老實跟我們說｡房間我們住的非常的不習慣,因為真的很髒,除了有奇怪的味道之外,被單､床單都有黃色的污漬,我們覺得非常的恐怖,是出國有史以來住過最糟糕的房間｡原先想說忍2天就好,就算了,但是離開那天去樓上找房東兒子寄放行李,發現我們原本要住的房間跟我們後來改的房間,根本天差地遠,我們不相信11樓的房價跟10樓的那間價格一樣｡回國後我問了房東兩間價格是否一樣,房東跟我說價格一樣,但我們不相信,於是我上網查了位於10樓的星彩旅館一晚的價格是港幣327,我們在Airbnb上面訂的房間兩晚價格是港幣1135｡我把網站貼給房東,請他解釋之後,他說他有付款給10樓房東的收據(但也沒提供)他真的付了1000多港幣給10樓的房東,但有少了幾十塊港幣(差價當下也沒退我們,現在也沒有要退的意思)
我們花了1000多港幣住到港幣600多的房間這樣是合理的嗎?房東從頭到尾也沒跟我說我們是要去住別的房東的房間｡把我們透過Airbnb支付給他的租金,又支付給了別的房東｡
今天如果我們沒發現,房東是不是就這樣算了?
房東這樣欺騙我們是對的嗎?
我們真的有受騙上當的感覺｡這種感覺真的很差!!房東到現在也沒有認錯,沒有跟我們道歉｡我們花了那樣的錢,卻被換到那麼糟的房間!真的是很誇張!這次的住宿經驗非常的糟糕!
Airbnb真的有在把關房東的品質嗎?真的讓我們非常失望!覺得不值得相信!
我給此房東最差勁的評價,是因為房東欺騙我們｡這種欺騙､隱瞞的行為,跟Airbnb要建立一個互相信任的基礎根本背道而馳｡讓人無法再信任!要選擇此房源的人,請謹慎考慮清楚｡
Place is near Mongkok Station and 1 station away from Temple Street. Eat HK Style Fried Noodles below the apartment @ night!!! <3

It was located in Mongkok and was good to see the night market.
and the facility was better than I thought.

The room is clean and close to shopping, food and mtr. It was a good stay. We just had a problem contacting them at first due to Chinese New Year but they also helped us get wifi sim and give directions on strategic locations.

离地铁旺角站挺近的,港铁旺角东站过来也很好找｡入住当天房东会主动打电话联系,了解是否到港,从 (Hidden by Airbnb) 发位置图､怎么走告诉我们｡附近就餐的餐厅挺多的,离波鞋街也不远,大厦楼下就有间小吃店｡
图片拍的跟现场一模一样,没有窗会比较闷,不过开了空调后就不会觉得了｡房间虽然比较小,但是也够用了,毕竟香港寸土寸金｡虽然现在大厦的外立面在装修,不过没有窗户的关系,一点都听不到声音,很安静｡据说今年刚重新装修过,装修大气不压抑｡
房间内配有烧水壶､电风吹､没带电源转换器的也可以跟房东借｡

The place I booked is legit and licensed.  She (and her son who speaks good English) was super helpful.  She even helped me get my personal dry cleaning laundry back to my room while I went out.  She was super accommodating.  Sheets were clean and room was clean. Night before I left she even told me which bus to take and where the bus stop was.  Very pleasant host.
房间很干净,位置也好,性价比很高,阿姨人也好好,非常不错的一次入住体验｡
阿姨人很好,很亲切｡
性价比真的很高,刚开始嫌小,后来了解了一下香港房价,觉得简直不能再高了｡没有窗,但是开空调所以不会觉得闷,地段黄金,旁边就有万宁屈臣氏莎莎等一堆,地铁站步行1分钟｡就是稍微有点难找,希望以后可以在Airbnb上标明一点11楼和中文名字,也可以私信告诉密码｡但房东儿子很热情｡另外房间里的洗发水沐浴露没了,希望下次可以检查一下｡总的来说很棒!

The room was a small windowless box - we named it "the cell". It was adequate, functional but without charm. The location is excellent- the bus to the airport is outside the building and the metro is very close.  And the beds are comfortable.
Pretty good place for the price. It might be the old plumbing but i'm not sure. Off the toilet ventilation if there's a weird smell.
非常好,房东热情推荐,房子也整齐干净｡
地理位置很方便 靠近地铁站 旺角站b1口出来就找到啦 周围也有商场之类的 房东阿姨和那个哥哥很热情的~房间也很干净 喜欢
Jie and her son are very friendly and supportive. The place is very convenient , tidy, and clean.

The place was a bit small but very affordable. It was really convenient for us to go wherever we want since the MTR station is very near and also the ladies market was just minutes away from the apartment. Jie was very kind and hospitable. I would definitely booked his place whenever I come back to hong kong.
非常好岁说有点小 但是房东的服务很热情
中心地带,逛街吃喝很方便,交通方便｡
This place it's good for take a rest, when you come to HK You need to take here :) The host they will takecare you like a family .
交通十分的便利,周圍很繁華,房間的大小也OK,也很乾淨,總之性價比很高,而且房東阿姨人超棒的,很熱心,有不懂的可以問阿姨,總之是一次非常滿意的住宿體驗｡
不错的地段
出行方便,在房间附近就有很多逛街的地方,离金华冰室很近
挺不错的,交通很方便
还不错,房东很热情

The room is a little bit small but clean, and has every basic thing we need. Cold shower, refrigerator, hair blower, towels, wifi, and they even provided us with a socket converter ( which I believe that it should be my initiative to bring my own, lol ). William ( Jie's son ) was attentive, when we ask for something he makes sure he gives it to us right away. The location is also perfect since it is near to a convenience store or 7/11, the ladies market, the mrt station, and restaurants.
被换房了,,不是图片的房间,,香港房子小能理解,,但是床垫是凹下去的,,我舅舅睡的不大舒服｡房东服务很不错,沟通也比较顺畅｡
地理位置还是很不错的,离地铁旺角和太子站都很近~除给我更换了房间(后来也有主动和我积极协调房间事宜)和房东回复比较慢以外其他都挺好的,房东儿子比较热情,有什么问题问他都会都会给你解答｡房间也挺干净的,就是香港寸土寸金的地方房间还是有点小的,不过这也是没办法的｡以后去香港还是会考虑入住的~

the place is more than airbnb! The host (jie and willy) are so great, helpful, caring, friendly, great hospitality from them. Heard that newly apartment will be ready soon, cant wait for the next trip, definitely will contact Willy again.
房间地理位置非常好,在旺角中心,距离地铁站和公交站都只有一两分钟的距离,逛街购物吃饭都红方便｡房间设施很齐全,空调和热水效果都很好,有密码锁,也十分安全｡房东很热心,交流也很通畅!

罗湖过关坐到旺角东,在旺角东下的车,一开始很迷茫,瞎跟着人流走错了两次,后来问路的时候大爷表示不知道金轮大厦,但问弥敦道他就清楚…地图推荐高德地图,上边有金轮大厦的标志｡其实只要找对了方向是真的挺好找的｡房大门有点挑战性,难开｡我的妹妹调侃说这个监控不知道记录了多少次我们在这个门前咬牙切齿的表情｡房间很小,真的小,但是据听说在旺角,就这么大的一个房间三百万都不一定买的到,如此一想也就对这个与大陆这边同样条件的民宿相比较贵的住宿费释怀了不少｡洗手台很小也很低,洗脸的时候还可以顺便洗个脚…房东阿姨非常的热情,和我们聊了很多东西｡住的地方交通也很便利,楼下就有一个小饭馆,这几天基本上都在那儿吃的,出了大门口旁边还有麦当劳和饺子馆,每天晚上妹妹们都要去下边买个冰淇淋｡旁边还有一家小百货,偶尔会在里边买水果和饮料｡如果朝着麦当劳的相反方向走拐弯处有家7仔,维他柠檬茶375ml的只要6.5!这几天在香港,喝维他柠檬茶都喝了100块｡距旺角地铁站真的挺近,刚来那会是找不到路只懂去旺角东站乘车,走的相对较远了｡后来机缘巧合迷路了两次,才发现出门过个红绿灯上个天桥就是旺角站…距离朗豪坊也不远,金鱼街女人街什么的也很近｡附近有很多家万宁屈臣氏SaSa卓越等这一类的购物商店,无聊的时候逛进去出来的时候钱包肯定会扁一点｡冰室,街头小吃也不少吧,不过肠胃不好很多小吃都没能尝一下也是非常遗憾｡总的来说,这次的香港行挺愉快,住的地方虽然小,但是床铺很软,加上每日1.5w步的运动量睡的还是很香甜｡比较抱歉的就是走的匆忙,没能整理一下房间里的狼藉,这点要和房东还有房东阿姨说句对不起｡如果还有下次,会再考虑继续住在这儿,因为是真的方便(^_^)☆

房东超赞,还是一加粉丝,遇到同好还是蛮开心的☺️
下次如果有机会再来hk玩还会选择这里的
很喜欢阿姨还有小哥哥,位置在旺角站附近,交通很方便,去朗豪坊啥的都很近,刚去的时候很热情｡房间没有想象的小｡就是回复会慢一点(可以打电话会快一点),其他的都很好
放假住3个妹子刚好 ,要是个子高点 床应该有点短 性价比最高啦 很满意 有吹风机 空调 热水器
房间的地理位置非常好 离朗豪坊步行只有10分钟左右 地铁站也非常近 屋子虽然小了点 但是设施非常全 是个好选择
位置可以说是很好,但是确实很小了,毕竟是香港｡另外,房间不是很通风,空气不好

Firstly the hostel name is Reli Inn instead of Hostel Mongkok . The place is worse than expected , it’s basically a small house slot with 5 small rooms inside , leaving a narrow corridor for you to pass . When we arrived at 4 p.m. the room was not ready for check-in yet, we were already tired but were asked to wait for an hour for the owner to move out someone’s stuffs from the room . And I saw another group also faced the same problem ! Also the room is small , just good for 3 pax , if 4 ppl you won’t have space to put your luggages . Lastly ,the owner wasn’t there most of the time so if  you need anything you will have to make a phone call .
nice place to stay,  very near to mongkok.  william is very helpful and easy to communicate
位置不错
比预想中要好很多!下次还会再来
住宿位置非常好离地铁非常近,去哪里都很方便｡下楼就很热闹,小吃､便利店什么都有｡房间很干净,每天都有来打扫｡房东一家人都很热情,问到景点会很热心地指给我;说有点感冒会告诉我要去喝一碗感冒茶;最后一天没带房卡要进房拿行李赶车,告知房东后立马打车过来给我们开门｡非常感谢!很愉快的体验,下次来香港还会住这里

name: Apartment Sleep 4 by the beach
summary: Fabulous fully furnished apartment just 200 meters to the beach: 2 bedrooms, living room with couch, dining table and cable TV and internet wifi; fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, coffemaker, toaster.
description: Fabulous fully furnished apartment just 200 meters to the beach: 2 bedrooms, living room with couch, dining table and cable TV and internet wifi; fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, coffemaker, toaster.

host.host_about: Porto

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments: Buen apartamento y buena y rápida comunicación. La única pega que faltaban cosas, como la tostadora y el microondas, que según anuncio estaban disponibles pero no estaban en el apartamento, tampoco había mucho menaje para cocinar. Está alejado del centro pero en una zona muy muy tranquila.

An unserem Anreisetag kamen wir erst relativ spät am Abend an. Manuel hat uns bereits am Gartentor empfangen. Er hat uns kurz die Wohnung gezeigt ohne dabei zu aufdringlich zu sein. Sehr schnell haben wir bemerkt, dass die Wohnung leider keine Waschmaschine hatte, obwohl diese im Profil angegeben war und für uns mit zwei Kleinkindern wichtig war. Manuel hat sich sofort angeboten öffentliche Waschsalons ausfindig zu machen und uns die Adressen zu nennen. Das hat er auch prompt getan und uns dazu noch einige andere Cafes, Restaurants und nette Plätze in der Umgebung genannt. Erfreulicherweise gab es eine besonders liebe Nachbarin im Hause, die sich angeboten hatte die Wäsche unserer Kinder zu waschen. Die Nachbarschaft war sehr kinderlieb und freundlich. Wir haben uns in dem Haus und in der Umgebung sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung war sauber und zweckmäßig. Der Garten war besonders für unsere Jungs ideal.
Am Abreisetag mussten wir früh am Morgen los. Manuel war so freundlich und hat uns ein Taxi bestellt. Die Wohnungsschlüssel haben wir im gegenseitigen Einvernehmen liegen lassen dürfen.

Nous souhaitons remercier Manuel pour son accueil. Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans ce magnifique appartement qui se situe dans un quartier très sympathique. Merci également de nous avoir transmis un email contenant les adresses des lieux, monuments et restaurants à ne pas manquer. Nous avons suivi vos conseils et avons été ravis.
Nous conseillons vivement cet appartement situé au bord de la mer et proche des transports en commun. 
Gildas et Justine

la location est très bien équipée, et la décoration est agréable. le logement est un peu sombre, mais il faut reconnaitre que le temps était pluvieux durant notre séjour; Bon accueil de la part des hôtes, plan et renseignements touristiques à disposition.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour. L'appartement est bien décoré dommage que le mauvais temps est un peux gâcher notre séjour et la lumière dans l'appartement. Il est très  bien situé pour aller se promener au bord de mer. Bonne adresse

o apartamento é muito central, sossegado e com uma decoração simples mas simpática.
As camas são confortáveis. O atendimento simpático e prestável.
Na cozinha fez falta faca de pão e chavenas de café. Na casa de banho o tapete para por os pés.
Voltarei concerteza

Our stay in Porto was amazing, although we didn't meet Manuel personally, his communication was great and made was only a message away if we had any troubles 

The house was exactly as it looks in the pictures and the courtyard out the back was real handy for relaxing or hanging out clothes 

The beds were very comfortable and the lounge room/ kitchen was very spacious for cooking and relaxing, although there was no pots and pans in the kitchen the old lady above was so friendly giving us pots and pegs and anything else we needed 

It's a 5 minute walk to the beach, the supermarket and a fresh fruit shop, and across the road from a fresh fish shop, gym and surf school. The neighborhood was incredibly friendly and would highly recommend this place if you are looking for a place in Porto 

Cheers Manuel
Really nice place, good position, very big house...everything was perfect!

Staying in Porto we remember very nice. Apartment clean and having a lot of amenities: dryer, toaster, TV, WIFI, etc .. Beds comfortable, no noise from the street. Very nice and helpful neighbors. Manuel did not show up personally, but contact with him was good and sent us a lot of useful information regarding your stay in Porto. The apartment is close to the ocean and has a well-developed infrastructure (shops, a bakery, restaurants). I recommend this place.

We had a pleasant time in the apartment. The envirement was lovely. Ir was a nice apartment, lot of room for both of us. We think that it needs Some maintenance, especcialy the bathroom. The bed was good. One pan wood be nice, we can't cook an egg.

Nous avons passé de très bonne vacances manuel à été un très bonne hôte il a su nous renseigner nous guider lorsque nous en avions eut besoin la appartement est bien equipe le seul truc c est qu il manque une machine à laver à part sa c était impeccable
Appartement calme, très bien situé et proche de la plage. Manuel est très disponible par sms pour nous donner toutes les informations utiles pour le bon déroulement de notre séjour.

l'hôte n'était pas présent à notre arrivé pour nous donner les clefs! grosse galère... quartier calme, malgrés les chiens du voisinage qui aboient la nuit... appartement sympa et spacieux, la salle de bain mériterais un coup de rénovation( moisi au plafond, sol s'écaillant sous les pieds, cuvette non fixé...). la porte d'entrée m'ériterais d'être ajustée elle est très difficile à ouvrir. 
a 30 min en bus du centre ville si pas trop de circulation. 10min à pieds de la plage et d'un petit market. une boulangerie au bout de la rue.

The appartement has a great location: close to the beach and public transport to get downtown. There are good beds and a nice terrace to relax outside. 
It's a  quiet place, so you can sleep with the windows open.
It's spacious and with a lot of light. 
So, lots of positive things about this place.  
Besides that, when we arrived we had to wait for more than half an hour to get in, the place wasn't very clean and  few things were broken .
De buurt is super leuk, je kan naar het centrum lopen. Het appartement is goed verzorgd. Een fijne plek voor een gezin.

Appartement très spacieux et agréable, quelques travaux de rénovation seraient nécessaires sur les problèmes d'humidité et sur la porte d'entrée difficile à ouvrir. Boulangerie, pâtisserie et supermarché à proximité, plage à 10 mn . Très bon accueil

We hadden een prettig verblijf in het appartement van Manuel. Goede locatie dichtbij het strand en winkels en restaurants. De tips van Manuel waren allemaal goed. Heerlijk gegeten op leuke plekjes in de buurt en strandtent praia da luz is een heerlijke plek voor een drankje met goede muziek en de prachtige zonsondergang. Het appartement ligt heerlijk rustig. De foto's kloppen met hoe het is op enkele verbeterpunten na ten aanzien van het renoveren van de badkamer en betere ventilatie. Afstand naar het centrum van Porto prima te doen met de taxi of de bus, is tevens goed betaalbaar en vertrek om de hoek bij het appartement. Al met al een prima plek voor een verblijf in het prachtige Porto.

El apartamento no tiene lavadora-secadora como decía en el anuncio. La playa está a bastante más de 100m. El cuarto de baño estaba sucio y con mucha humedad y arañas. Los electrodomésticos estaban sucios (horno, campana extractora...). Lo mejor es que admiten mascotas.

Nice apartment and great service. When you miss something in the apartment you can always ask Manuel and he will help you. We have also had a lot of information about great restaurants and places to visit. The only thing we didn't like was the ceiling in the bathroom because it wasn't really clean. But in general this is a great location to stay and we have really enjoyed our trip to Porto!

Manuel's apartment was awesome. Clean and decent. It has everything you may need. We really enjoyed staying here. 

Really close to the sea, shops, supermarket, restaurant. Tip "Tavia" to breakfast. There are 2 in the area. Great coffees and breakfast. Manuel send us also tips. We would recomend it. Greetings from the Netherlands.
Die Wohnung liegt super gelegen am Rande Portos direkt am Meer. Alles nötige ist fußläufig zu erreichen. Die Wohnung ist gut eingerichtet und gemütlich, leider war sie nicht total sauber.
Een prima ligging om Porto te bezoeken dicht bij de zee en busverbinding.
Adoramos estar em casa do Manuel! Fomos super bem recebidos!
Wij hebben een perfecte tijd gehad in een prima appartement gezien prijs en kwaliteitsverhouding Vlak aan zee beloop- berijdbaar naar het historisch centrum Rustige buurt
Appartement agréable et bien équipé (photos conformes). Manuel nous a très bien reçu. Trés bon rapport qualité/prix.
El apartamento muy bonito y todo muy limpio. Esta preparado y tiene todo lo que puedes necesitar. La estancia en Oporto ha sido fantastica
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour dans cet appartement qui nous permettait, une fois nos visites en ville terminées, d'aller à pied sur la plage en fin de journée pour se reposer!

Manual is great and the place could not have been in a better location. It was an amazing experience for my friend and I, I completely fell in love with Porto. 

Manual is super accommodating and extremely easy to get a hold of if you need anything. He sent me a list of recommendations for the area that was very much appreciated!

Very easy communication and nice flexibility in the check in and out. The flat is quiet and well situated in a cosy area.
Thanks

Angenehme Wohnung mit guter Ausstattung in einer ruhigen Wohngegend mit netten Cafes, Restaurants und hübschen Shops. Super Bäckerei gleich um die Ecke, Supermarkt 10 min zu Fuß. Schöne Strandcafes 10-15 min entfernt. Bus ins Zentrum fährt vom lokalen "Hauptplatz" (5 min entfernt), Fahrtzeit in die Altstadt 15 min. 
Die Küche ist ziemlich gebraucht, aber alles da. Betten neu und bequem. Tolles Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.

The apartment is in a very good location and the price is reasonable. Nevertheless, we did not enjoy our stay, as the apartment was not cleaned at all. Even after the fast cleaning, there was a lot of dirt in the bathroom and the bed sheets were stained.
Thanks for easy communication and a good stay:)
Everything was quite ok.

Nous n'avons pas vu Manuel mais nous avons été accueilli par sa voisine. L'appartement est conforme à la description. Il faut 30 min en bus (arrêt à 5 min) pour rejoindre le centre de Porto et 10 min à pied pour la plage. Manuel nous a envoyé un mail très détaillé pour nous aider dans Porto. Merci

Manuel is very professional.
I had a problem with the shower and he fixed immediately.
The house is at the ground floor with space for a dog in front and in back side. The position is really good.

name: Sunny studio in Williamsburg
summary: This south-facing, light-filled studio is a 3 minute walk from the Bedford L stop, right in the heart of Williamsburg! Our building has a gym and roof with fantastic views of the Manhattan skyline.
description: This south-facing, light-filled studio is a 3 minute walk from the Bedford L stop, right in the heart of Williamsburg! Our building has a gym and roof with fantastic views of the Manhattan skyline.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Studio confortable et superbement situé dans Williamsburg entre les stations Bedford Av et Métropolitan, accès direct à Manhattan ou Brooklyn, Quartier vivant et sympathique, appartement calme sur rue calme, 
Excellent contact avec notre hôte par plusieurs échanges courriel. 
Ce logement agréable a contribué à ce que notre semaine à NYC soit parfaite!
The Studio was perfect for a NY trip, nice location, just 5 minutes away from the Subway. Clean, quiet and spacious.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location and beautiful space.  The place has wonderful books around, is modern, and very close to the subway.  Clean, kitchen is great, and cool rooftop.   I could easily have stayed longer.
beautiful spot and a pleasure to deal with allie.
Ottima soluzione per vivevere un lato meraviglioso di New York..!
Absolutely loved this place. And Allie left us a fantastic guide and was great to communicate with. Stay here!

I loved this apartment and the location is great. Close to the station and the coolest street (Bedford). It was a pleasure staying in this place. Allie left some tips that were very useful! The apartment is better than in the pictures. Lovely!! Hope to come back soon!!

We had a wonderful stay at Allie's place. Allie was at all times very helpful and offered us a clean and beautiful place. She also left us a long list with nice bars and restaurants in the neighborhood of Williamsburg. Thank you for hosting us!

name: Classy Apartment in Boavista
summary: Classy apartment in the heart of Boavista.
space: Welcome to Porto!  You’ll find our studio in the historical center of Porto, in Boavista district. In a few minutes’ walk, you’ll be in the Arts District, Casa da Música or the Bom Sucesso Market. It is located on the lower floor of a XIX century building, with direct access to a big and sunny terrace overlooking the garden. The bright studio features a large kitchen, fully equipped with various appliances, a bathroom, a living area and a bedroom area.  It is appropriate for families, couples or business travelers; but most of all, we want you to feel welcome in Porto.
description: Classy apartment in the heart of Boavista. Welcome to Porto!  You’ll find our studio in the historical center of Porto, in Boavista district. In a few minutes’ walk, you’ll be in the Arts District, Casa da Música or the Bom Sucesso Market. It is located on the lower floor of a XIX century building, with direct access to a big and sunny terrace overlooking the garden. The bright studio features a large kitchen, fully equipped with various appliances, a bathroom, a living area and a bedroom area.  It is appropriate for families, couples or business travelers; but most of all, we want you to feel welcome in Porto. The apartment has 40 square meters. It features a double or twin bedroom (ask for your preference), living room area with a sleeping sofa that turns into a comfortable double bed, kitchen and bathroom. The building doesn't have an elevator. Children up to 12 years old free of charge. There are several extra services you can request: - Transfer (by shuttle or private taxi) to and
notes: The apartment has 40 square meters. It features a double or twin bedroom (ask for your preference), living room area with a sleeping sofa that turns into a comfortable double bed, kitchen and bathroom. The building doesn't have an elevator. Children up to 12 years old free of charge. There are several extra services you can request: - Transfer (by shuttle or private taxi) to and from the airport; - Babysitting; - Rent-a-bike; - City tours; - Tours in Northern Portugal Please let us know at the time of the booking if you will be requesting any of the above mentioned services or other special services. These are provided by business partners therefore are subject to availability. We'll need you to provide your check-in time in advance, to make sure we have everything ready upon your arrival. Your satisfaction is our bigger priority! If requested and possible, check in could be made earlier. When early check in is not possible, the guests can always leave their luggage with us until check
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in all property. We provide two cards for your stay. The loss of each card is subject to a surcharge of 20€. We will need the documentation of all the people that is going to be staying at the apartment for the registration. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us. Please take care of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment’s equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment’s appliances and equipment please contact. Our guests appreciate some peace and quiet, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 9h. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
This is truly an amazing place to stay! From the warm reception at check in, to the beautifully furnished apartment, to the great location and astonishing garden. 

The building is located close to the artistic neighborhood of Porto, which is a great location; walking distance from the most important places to see, while still being able to enjoy some peace and quite. 

I was warmly received at check in and was given some great tips for even some vegetarian options in the city.

The apartment is very comfortable; homely arrangement as well as very practical use of the space, clean and with everything one would need for a comfortable stay.

One of the best parts of the stay (besides the very kind welcome and helpfulness of Daniela) was the garden! The majestic tree gives the garden an amazing ambiance and there are many comfortable places to enjoy a book, drink a coffee or lie in the sun.

Already planning to come back to stay next time I'm in Porto! Would highly recommend a stay at this beautiful place in an even more beautiful city!
Daniela was very welcoming and helpful, and the apartment was lovely. We were very delighted to stay at Baumhaus. Highly recommended.
Tres bon accueil, recommande pour visite de Porto !

Óptimo estúdio, com tudo o que é necessário e muitíssimo confortável, mesmo tendo em conta que se trataram dos dias mais frios do ano!
A Daniela foi atenciosa, prestável e muito amável.

name: Oporto Best View
summary: In the heart of the city of Porto and a few minutes from the historical center and downtown Porto. The privileged view of the Douro River is enchanting. PortoBestView is cozy and has all the facilities to enjoy a good holiday.
space: The apartment is cozy, has all the amenities and the decoration was designed so that the host can enjoy to the maximum his stay, his ex libris is the balcony that has a privileged view on the river Douro from where you can relax in the late afternoon With a beautiful sunset.
description: In the heart of the city of Porto and a few minutes from the historical center and downtown Porto. The privileged view of the Douro River is enchanting. PortoBestView is cozy and has all the facilities to enjoy a good holiday. The apartment is cozy, has all the amenities and the decoration was designed so that the host can enjoy to the maximum his stay, his ex libris is the balcony that has a privileged view on the river Douro from where you can relax in the late afternoon With a beautiful sunset. Guests will have full access to the apartment. In the apartment you will find all the information about the city, through the flyers that we leave, we also do tours around the city and surrounding areas and we are always available for any questions that may arise The apartment is located in the historic center of Porto, in a quiet and friendly area. The apartment is located in the historic center of Porto, in a quiet and friendly area. We would like to inform you that as of March 1, 2018, the
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the historic center of Porto, in a quiet and friendly area.
