notes: We would like to inform you that as of March 1, 2018, the city of Porto will apply the Tourist Tax to all bookings in all hotels. To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city. Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight nights per person and per stay.  Who is exempt from paying the tourist tax? a) People traveling for medical treatment, and continuing therapy in medical facilities. Family members and / or companions are exempt also. Documentary evidence of medical and care service has to be provided (or equivalent document). b) People who are disabled to a degree of 60%. Supporting documents must be presented. Tourist Tax rates? 2 € per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of € 14 (Seven straight nights per overnight stay / person).  How to pay the tourist tax? The tourist tax is paid a single amount in the ¬nal bill. Onde? Tourist tax payment is due to the management of the

access: Guests will have full access to the apartment.
interaction: In the apartment you will find all the information about the city, through the flyers that we leave, we also do tours around the city and surrounding areas and we are always available for any questions that may arise

Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight nights per person and per stay.  Who is exempt from paying the tourist tax? a) People traveling for medical treatment, and continuing therapy in medical facilities. Family members and / or companions are exempt also. Documentary evidence of medical and care service has to be provided (or equivalent document). b) People who are di

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
The appart is great 
- in the towncenter
- very convenient and calm
-  ... with a great view 
Moreover Jorge and family are very kind and helpfull 
Do not hesitate to try it !

Existent des lieux qui restent en mémoire, familiers dès quelques jours, devant lesquels s'étend une identité au goût de Porto, de poisson; au long cours desquels coulent le Douro et une hospitalité tranquille . 
L'appartement de Jorge fait, nous en sommes certains, partie de ceux-ci.

Alice et Alex

Jorge y su familia nos esperaban con una sonrisa en casa, son muy amables y nos recomendaron lugares para visitar la bella ciudad de Oporto. 

La casa tiene unas vistas espectaculares y se encuentra bien situada en el centro, está limpia, es amplia y espaciosa, aunque aún pueden mejorar en algunos detalles.  

¡Prepara tus piernas para subir y bajar cuestas! Una casa para disfrutar Oporto

Superbe séjour à Porto ! 
L'appartement de Jorge et Wanda est super ! Très bien placé et refait à neuf. Tout est là pour se sentir chez-soi.
La vue du balcon est magnifique et vous donne un avant goût de la beauté de cette petit ville. 
Jorge et Wanda nous ont très bien reçus et sont restés très disponibles tout au long du séjour. 
Les hôtes nous ont même proposé une leçon de surf (tout compris) pour 20€, ils viennent vous chercher à l'appartement et vous ramènent.  Tout est très bien organisé pour vous permettre de passer un excellent séjour. 
Je recommande vivement.
O Jorg (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa extraordinária!
Amazing apartment, great location and the hosts were very attentive and kind. Would definitely recommend! :)
Thank you that you have received us at night-time. We have really enjoyed the time in Porto. Especially the breakfast on the balcony with this great view.

Accueil chaleureux et gentillesse de Wanda et Jorge , malgré notre arrivée tardive. Merci pour leur effort en français. Merci pour leur sympathique attention que nous avons dégustée le soir sur le balcon en regardant se coucher le soleil. L'appartement est très agréable , fonctionnel et bien situé entre les quartiers de Ribeira et Clérigos. Très beau panorama sur le Douro. Excellent souvenir pour une première au Portugal.

The apartment is a great little place with fabulous views over the river and the terrace makes it the perfect place to relax and escape from town. Nicely decorated and our hosts were kind and helpful throughout our stay. Definitely recommend!
Beautiful appartement, great location, clean,  and a great view on the balcony. Jorges was very friendly.

Sehr schöne Unterkunft mitten in der Altstadt Portos. Ein wunderschöner Balkon lädt zum entspannen ein. Ansonsten alles da was man braucht und noch mehr. Sehr sauber. Und dazu ein netter Empfang mitten in der Nacht!
Wir empfehlen diese Unterkunft ohne Einschränkungen weiter.

We had a lovely weekend at this place!
Jorge is a very welcoming person and the apartment is incredibly well situated.

The view is wonderful, the apartment very well supplied. Would definitely recommend.
L'accueil de Jorge a été très chaleureux. L'appartement est impeccable, la vue fidèle à sa description. Nous avons adoré le quartier, central et authentique !

Logement très bien situé pour découvrir la ville, très confortable et très bien équipé.
La vue sur le Douro depuis le balcon est vraiment un plus et nous en avons vraiment bien profité.
Accueil parfait avec en prime une bouteille de vin à déguster ! 
Jorge est très sympathique et répond très rapidement.

Merci Jorge pour ce tres bon accueil et notre sejour a ete merveilleux. Votre logement est tres agreable, vraiment ideal pour bien profiter de Porto.
Bonne continuation

What a view !! Having a breakfast with such a view was wonderful. 
Jorges was really nice, he explained everything we had to know.
Thanks for the Wine !

Staying at Jorge's apartment was great! We were 4 people and it was ok to sleep for 2 nights. Jorge replied very fast to my last minute request and answered all the questions I had promptly. The view of the balcony was amazing and the wine we received as a gift was much appreciated. Thanks also for the tourist information provided.
Taberna Santo Antonio is really close to the apartment and it's totally worth to have lunch/dinner with an affordable price and a exceptional chocolate cake.
Thank you Jorge and Vanda for the hospitality!

Merci beaucoup Jorge pour votre accueil très chaleureux et votre attention à notre arrivée ! L'appartement était réellement idéalement situé et nous a donné entière satisfaction ! Le temps nous a permis de déjeuner sur le balcon ! C'était top ! Merci également à Rui pour son accueil à l'aéroport. Je ne manquerai pas de conseiller votre appartement à mes proches qui souhaiteraient visiter Porto ! Bonne continuation !
Thanks Jorge, very nice flat! Also, very nice view on Porto

Jorge is an amazing host, one of the best. Very reliable and welcoming, with a great sense of hospitality. The apartment is perfectly located, and indeed has the best view in Porto. The house is impeccable, quiet, clean, and with all necessary equipment - great value for money. I warmly recommend this place for discovering Porto.

Le logement correspond aux photos et est idéalement situé. C'est un appartement qui ne sert que pour la location touristique, mais il y a un petit fond de cuisine, une machine à café et des capsules à disposition.... et une bouteille de vin local (toujours délicieux) en signe de bienvenue
Nous avons été accueilli à l'aéroport (15.00 Euros) et amenés sur place par Wanda la collègue de Jorge.
Tous s'est bien passé. Il faut savoir que c'est une ville de bord de mer et les goélands sont très bavards dès l'aube et ils ne savent pas parler doucement !!

We were welcomed and well looked after staying in Jorge's apartment.  The apartment is really cute and is in an amazing location in the centre of town with incredible views along the river - particularly at night.  It was very clean.
Un très bel accueil de la part de Jorge. Le lieu est sympathique et accueillant. Je recommande vivement. L'emplacement est également très appréciable !

Jorge and his brother, Rui, were most welcoming, friendly and helpful.  We enjoyed staying in their sunny apartment, its grand view of the river, and its convenient location.  The apartment was pleasantly quiet even though it's in the central district.
Thanks Jorge and Wanda for the warm welcoming. Nice flat connected to the Ribeira, clean and cosy.

Le frère de Georges et sa femme sont venus nous chercher à l'aéroport. Très sympathiques, nous avons fait une rapide visite touristique dans Porto, qu'ils ont commentée. L'appartement est situé dans le vieux Porto, il est d'une propreté irréprochable, et chaleureux (aidé en ce sens par la bouteille de Porto laissé à disposition dans le salon, et par la bouteille de vin offerte par nos hôtes). Rien ne manque dans le logement (bouilloire, machine à café, sèche-cheveux, couvertures supplémentaires...). Le lendemain Jorge et son frère nous ont amenés à l'aéroport gracieusement. Vraiment vous êtes personnes généreuses, souriantes et joyeuses, nous ne manquerons pas de revenir. Bonne chance à vous, très bonne année 2016.
It's been a true delight for us to stay at Jorge's flat; super located in the center of the city, well equipped and so chic. Highly-reccomended!

Very nice apartment, clean and well located. The hosts were very welcoming as well. In general we really enjoyed our stay. A little remark though: it was a bit too cold in the apartment in January, as there is only one little heater for the whole apartment.

Très bon accueil, appartement très fonctionnel et très bien situé. Merci beaucoup à Jorge et Wanda.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse. 
Séverine & Romain
Jorge's house was great! The balcony was particularly beautiful with a lovely view over the river Duoro. Very dreamy!!

We had a lovely stay in this rental. The views are incredible and the location is perfect! The host is super friendly and professional, we even got a pickup from the airport (for a fee) that was really convenient. The apartment itself is beautiful and had everything we needed. We would definitely recommend this place to our friends and family.
The apartment is lovely and really well located. The view is great and the house is fully equipped. The hosts are really friendly and helpful as well. It was overall a nice experience.
The flat was in a great location and the view was amazing! They had all the essentials there for us and the hosts were very nice as well.

El lugar es increíble, tal como lo describen las fotos. Perfecta vista del Rio Duoro, dan ganas de quedarse ahí a mirar, pero además el apartamento está ubicado en pleno centro histórico de la Cidade Invicta, a pasos de iglesias, monumentos, escaleras y miradores llenos de detalles e historias. 

Jorge y su familia son excelente anfitriones, muy amables y preocupados por sus clientes, nos ayudaron mucho a entender la ciudad y a sentirnos en casa, representan muy bien la amabilidad de los portuenses, mi familia los recordará con cariño.
Jorge's apartment is exactly as described : well situated, with a splendid view, with space & light, exactly what you need to feel at home !

Jorges place was better than expected! the pictures don’t do the view justice. 3 of us including myself had a great time there. Clean and situated at the heart of Porto. Walkable distance to not only the center and historic district but also across the river where most of Porto's wine was made. The terrace is more spacious than it looks and we spent most of our time there when we were at home. Lots of sunlight coming into the house and you can even see the sunset in the evening. I highly recommend Jorges place and would go there myself if visiting Porto again.

Jorges Wohnung liegt im alten Stadtteil Sé, kaum Touristen in dieser Gasse und doch sehr zentral. In 4 Minuten zu fuss erreicht man in jede Richtung das lebendige Porto. 
Jorge war sehr freundlich. In der Wohnung hat es alles was man braucht, das Bett im Schlafzimmer ist sehr gut. Das absolute Highlight ist die Terrasse, besonnt von morgens bis abends, mit dieser um-
werfenden Aussicht. 
Danke, Jorge! Ich komme gerne mal wieder.

Fabuloso apartamento con maravillosas vistas. Sin duda una elección inmejorable.

Gracias Jorge por tu amabilidad. Esperamos volver pronto. Un abrazo!
This is a lovely apartment, and, we were made very welcome, by Jorge and Vanda.  The view is fantastic, and well worth the three story climb!

We arrived late but Jorge picked us up and drove us to the appartment along the waterfront anyways, which we greatly appreciated. The place is cozy and perfectly sized for two, even though the bed might be a little short for the average sized male middle to northern european male ;) 
The view was great and we were received with great hospitability and warmth. I hope to come again sometime and can definitely recommend it! 
Thank you for ecerything :)

Had a brilliant time in Jorge's apartment. Jorge and his family were very welcoming and went the extra mile when they could. The apartment is in a great location and easy to get to all the main attractions in Porto. Would highly recommend staying here and great views too.

El piso de Jorge es tan encantador como las fotografías lo muestran. Oporto es un lugar increíble y sus habitantes también. Si viajan con niños es bueno saber que el piso es por escalera pero que una vez que llegas vale la pena su vista increíble al rio Duouro y la comodidad del piso. Gracias Jorge por tu recepción, esperamos volver pronto.
Guter Platz um in Porto zu übernachten - zentral, ruhig und tolle Aussicht. Die Wohnung ist gut ausgestattet. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt!
Lovely apartment with beautiful view. Jorge was an amazing host, very prompt and accommodating. He even found a bassinet for our baby boy. Best location for a great price!
Jorge gave us a warm welcome. He explained everything and left us a bottle of wine & port. The apartment was exactly as advertised, with that great view!

Very friendly host, beautiful view
Unfortunately heating systems not in all rooms.

The apartment is lovely, the terrace has a wonderful view and is well exposed so it's sunny. The apartment is well located, between the upper town and the down town. We stayed 3 days and never take the metro nor bus. Jorge is a great host that provides solutions !
The apartment is ideal for 2 people. The sofa for the 3rd one is a little bit uncomfortable. And during winter (or cold weather) the apartment is a little bit cold (even with the extra radiators). But Porto is usually warm, we didn't have chance. 
I would definitely come back in the summer !
Thanks a lot

Accueil très sympathique
La prise en charge depuis l'aéroport a été d'un grand confort

L'accueil de Rui, le frère de Jorge, a été très chaleureux. Il nous a récupéré à l'aéroport et nous a conduit à l'appartement en prenant un itinéraire nous faisant découvrir certains quartiers de Porto. 
L'appartement est très bien situé et a une vue magnifique sur le Duro. Le niveau d'équipement est bon à 2 exceptions prêt. 
Le chauffage est fait par 2 petits radiateurs d'appoint et nous avons souffert du froid dans l'appartement car le temps était vraiment mauvais durant notre séjour.
Le 2ème couchage est un canapé lit qui n'est vraiment pas confortable.
En dehors de ça, l'accueil de Jorge et son frère étaient parfaits et avec un temps clément cet appartement doit être très agréable.

Merci a Jorge rui et wanda 
Vous avez été super! 
Accueillant ,souriants , 
L'appartement Est super vue magnifique  très propre et à côté des quartier les plus sympa!  
Bref que du bonheur encore merci pour tous!

Jorge was great.  He and his brother met my travel buddy in the street.  The apartment was beautiful.  He is on the 2nd floor with no lift so we had to climb the stairs with our luggage.  Porto is quite hilly and his place is at the top of a hill so be prepared to walk up and down massive hills.  There are stairs for shortcuts but again going up, be prepared to walk.

Wanda nous a reçu avec beaucoup de gentillesse et a parlé en français, le plus qu'elle pouvait,  répondu à nos questions. Et Jorge que nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer a répondu, mais par mail , mais nous l'avons trouvé seulement à notre retour, mais Wanda nous a envoyé un sms..
L'appartement est très bien situé, mi chemin entre le haut de la ville et le fleuve Douro, juste en bas, un parking surveillé pour garder notre voiture la nuit, mais voiture inutile si l'on reste seulement sur Porto. Vue splendide sur le fleuve et les bateaux.
Merci à Jorge et Wanda pour le café, le vin , le porto.
Liliane et Alain

Ola Wanda and Jorge,

Thanks for the great pick up Service at the airport and the nice stories and good information during the tour.

We like our stay in Porto. On every corner and in every street was something interesting or beautiful. 

From your appartment everything was easily accessable by Foot. And the view of the balcony was amazing. Muito obrigado! Bram and Jolijn

excellente adresse idéalement placée au centre du vieux PORTO permettant de tout faire à pied. notre avion est arrivé très tôt le matin et , comme le check in n'avait lieu qu'à 15 heures, Jorge nous a donné rendez vous pour nous débarrasser de nos valises , que nous avons retrouvées dans l'appartement l'après midi. c'est Wanda qui nous a accueilli avec gentillesse et sourire dans ce joli petit appartement très propre, fonctionnel et avec une superbe vue de la petite terrasse sur le DOURO pour y déguster le Porto et le vin gentiment offert!
adresse à recommander ++++ tant par la qualité du lieu que par la gentillesse et disponibilité de nos hôtes! allez y les yeux fermés!
merci JORGE et WANDA

Thank you to Jorge and Wanda for a great stay in beautiful Porto! Despite the torrential rain, we had a fantastic time and it was a pleasure to stay in this apartment. The balcony is such a lovely addition to the flat, although sadly the rain prevented us from using it very much. The location of the flat is very good - walking distance to all the main sites, be prepared for the hills! Jorge and Wanda were great hosts and had lots of local knowledge and tips.

Obrigada!

Anna & Ali
Everything was exact like  advertised.

The reception by Jorge (and also his brother and sister in law) was very pleasant, he told us where to go/what to visit and we even received a welcome gift. Can you imagine a better way to start a holiday in Porto?

Jorge is very welcoming and thoughtful host. He had provided us with all the info about the area and flat itself, treated us with some local wine and port wine, wich was a very pleasant gesture. The apartment is very clean and cosy and the terrace is just lovely. The area is central, however the street is very quiet. We enjoyed staying at Jorge´s apartment and would definitely highly recommend it for other guests.

Enjoy Porto.
The apartment description was accurate and the neighborhood is nice: great small places to eat and cool bar nearby.

L'appartement est très bien placé dans Porto, la vue est en effet impressionnante. Par contre, il est idéal pour 2 personnes max car si vous êtes 4: 2 se trouveront sur le canapé de la salle petit et peu confortable.
Très bon accueil de la part de Jorge et Wanda, l'appartement est idéalement placé, tout est à proximité, propre, avec effectivement une vue imprenable sur porto et la Vila nova de gaia !
Jorge is Nice. He was out of town at the time of my arrival, but his friend told us everything and showed. it was a good  apartment with really the best  view from the window.
Vi ankom til Porto kl. 02 om natten, men det var ikke noget problem. Vi blev afhentet, som aftalt og fik en kort briefing om byen. Alt fungerede perfekt.

excellent appartement 

très bien située et très propre. la vue est magnifique et la ville de porto est fantastiques.

Wanda nous a accueillis avec beaucoup de gentillesse et notre séjour a été très agréable. Le logement était confortable et depuis la terrasse nous avons pu faire de très jolies photos ensoleillées. Nous remercions Jorge pour la bouteille de vin que nous avons dégusté sur place et nous attendons avec impatience de pouvoir retourner à Porto.

IT WAS AMAZING. THE DECOR WAS BEAUTIFUL AND I WAS VERY
WELCOMED BY THE JORGE'S  BROTHER AND HIS WIFE.
VERY CLEAN APARTMENT.

Jorge fue muy amable. Nos esperó bastante rato ya que llegamos mas tarde de lo acordado. El departamento muy lindo, bien equipado, una vista increible, buenisima ubicacion. La cama no era muy cómoda ni las almohadas, por lo que eso sugeriría que lo cambiaran, pero fuera de eso, lo recomiendo 100%. Jorge nos  guío sobre lugares que visitar además de que en la entrada del departamento tiene mapas, libros de turismo, etc

The absolute best view! Great location, nice kitchen and cozy bed. I honestly had a hard time leaving because it was so wonderful. Wanda was a great host and gave me lots of helpful tips. If I go back to Porto I will definitely stay here:)

Det var en herlig oplevelse at bo i Jorges lejlighed. Der er virkelig en fantastisk udsigt over floden, som man kan sidde og nyde i eftermiddagssolen på altanen.
Man føler sig straks velkommen og alt det praktiske med nøgler osv. fungerede bare helt perfekt. 
Wanda, som tog imod os, havde flere gode input til, hvad vi kunne se på den begrænsede tid, vi havde til rådighed. Hun foreslog bl.a. restaurant O Fado, som ligger ganske tæt på lejligheden. Det var en kæmpe oplevelse at høre traditionel portugisisk folkemusik og maden og betjeningen var også i top. Vi kommer meget gerne tilbage til Jorges lejlighed og giver den vores bedste anbefalinger.
Susan og Eric - Aarhus

Excellent séjour. L'appartement est très bien situé, dans un quartier authentique plein de charme. La vue sur le Douro est exceptionnelle. Tout est conformé au descriptif et aux commentaires des autres visiteurs. La taille de l'appartement est parfaite pour un couple. Accueil chaleureux.

Jorge made us feel very welcome with Port and a bottle of Wine. He was a great host, very responsive with email and text communication.

The location has a wonderful view and is convenient to the old town of Porto and to the Port houses across the river in Gaia.

The apartment is compact, clean and well equipped.

Excellent location, close to Clérigos. Quiet street. Regular apartment. 
But the view... Truly the best! Loved sitting in the balcony enjoying the sun, watching the birds fly, the boats passing by. Really wonderful.

Can't beat the view! It's in the heart of the city that belongs to locals which means that you aren't surrounded by tourists! It also means that there's a rooster that crows in the morning across the street, so be prepared to have early mornings.

But this place is great and Jorge's host, Andrea, greeted me right on time and was very clear with the instructions. Again, I would come back again just to pass time on that balcony! Thanks guys! Had a great time!
Très très bon accueil ! Des gens adorables qui repondent à vos attentes et savent se rendre disponible. Appartement très bien situé en bord du Douro très fonctionnel . Agréable séjour !!!!

Excellent séjour.
L’appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter la vielle ville de Porto. Situé dans un quartier authentique, plein de charme, la vue sur le Douro est fabuleuse.
Nous avons dégusté avec bonheur, en admirant le couché de soleil, la bouteille de vin de la région du Douro et de Porto, très gentiment offerte par Jorge en signe de bienvenue. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié cette délicate attention.
Le logement correspond parfaitement aux photos , il est très bien organisé et décoré avec  goût et dispose de ton le confort  nécessaire.
idéal pour un couple mais très acceptable pour une petite famille de quatre .

Fantastic couple of days in Porto at Jorge's and Wanda's apartment. The view from the balcony is incredible. Such a lovely place to stay in beautiful Porto, really really had a very good end of our holiday.

Super séjour à Porto. A notre arrivée, Wanda nous a accueilli puis s'est transformé en guide touristique en nous donnant tous les endroits phares de Porto. 
L'appartement est juste super avec une vue incroyable. Petit bémol pour le lit qui grince.
Je recommande!

Erg prettig verblijf gehad in het appartement. Het balkon is geweldig, inderdaad 'best view in Porto'! Ligging is perfect, op loopafstand van alles. De beschrijving klopt precies, alles is aanwezig zoals beschreven. Wanda heeft ons ontvangen en was ontzettend vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Omdat we 8 nachten verbleven werden er zelfs extra schone handdoeken gebracht. Appartement was ook erg schoon. Het enige minpunt was het bed. Het kraakte ontzettend en de veren staken in je rug.

Nous avons passé un séjour superbe et tout était parfait. Des l'accueil à l'aéroport par Wanda et Rui qui nous ont conduit à l'appartement en nous montrant les endroits de la ville de Porto A découvrir ce que nous avons fait.
L'appartement nous a beaucoup plu et il est conforme à la description.
Les petites attentions dans l'appartement nous ont fait très plaisir.
Nous sommes venus y feter nos 50 ans mais nous reviendrons sans occasion speciale .
Nous avons eu la chance que le soleil soit au rendez vous
La ville de Porto est magnifique et est à visiter 
La ballade sur le Douro en bateau sur la journée est à faire aussi.
Merci à tous les 3
Patricia et Alain.

Die Wohnung ist perfekt! Und super gelegen! Die Aussicht vom Balkon ist traumhaft. Sonnenuntergang auf dem Balkon inklusive :-) Jorge und seine Frau sind tolle und symphatische Gastgeber! Wir würden jeder Zeit wieder kommen.
Nous avons été bien accueilli par notre hôte qui nous a bien montré le fonctionnement de l appartement et tout ce qu il y avait à faire aux alentours

Jorge was very welcoming, making sure to let us understand everything about his property, and also providing great information about where to shop, good suggestions for things to do....and we very much appreciated the bottle of Port he left for us!
Porto is a lovely city, and we were glad that we rented Jorge's apartment for almost a week, as there is so much to do and see....we especially recommend touring the Douro valley wineries.

Wander made us very welcome and helped out with things to do and see. The apartment was great ! Fantastic views of the city below and the river . We had a great time and will be coming back soon. 

Thank you Jorge and Wander

Jorge is a very kind and attentive host, and his apartment is really special. The view to the river and the location are without compare - beautiful and far enough away from the main touristic activities. We have felt very comfortable and would love to come back - muito obrigados, Jorge!

Anja and Martin
Jorge & Wanda are very friendly. Great place with a great location and a balcony view to wake up to every morning. Fantastic :)

Amazing view, comfortable stay in the heart of Porto. Much more than expected. Free public parking near flat. 
Thank you Jorge for great 4days exploring the city.

El apartamento es una maravilla, está limpio, huele bien y para hacer turismo está ubicado estratégicamente.
Jorge y Wanda son muy amables, dispuestos a dar recomendaciones y estuvieron muy atentos a nuestras preguntas. Nos recibieron con una deliciosa botella de Oporto y todo lo necesario para hacernos sentir como en casa. 
Los recomendamos en un 100 %
Volveremos !!!
Foi tudo perfeito!

nous avons été accueilli par Vanda    qui s'est montrée très disponible .
 le logement de Jorge correspond parfaitement au descriptif avec  le nécessaire  sur place montrant que nous sommes  les bienvenus.
 ce logement est charmant et permet de se ressourcer après une bonne journée de visuite dans porto. merci à Jorge et Vanda

Sehr schöne Wohnung in perfekter Lage. Das beste ist die Aussicht von dem gemütlichen Balkon, auf dem wir im November jeden Tag unseres Aufenthaltes in der Sonne frühstücken konnten und der bis abends sonnig war. Perfekt. Wäre die Stadt nicht auch so schön, hätte man den Urlaub auch auf diesem Balkon verbringen können.
Wir hätten es noch viel länger ausgehalten. Es war eine super Zeit. Danke

Jorge was really welcoming and nice. He showed us around and  gave us good tips about Porto. He made us feel very comfortable. The flat is very well-situated, near the town centre and the view is amazing. The house is matching the description.

Por lejos una de las mejores experiencias airbnb que he tenido. Jorge es una persona muy amable y el departamento es excelente! A tan solo 10 minutos xaminando de la estacion de trenes, distancia a pie de todo lo que tienes que ver en Porto. La vista del balcon es algo que te deja sin aliento, es maravillosa. Por este precio no hay nada mejor! Recomiendo a ojos cerrados
We had a wonderful stay in Jorge's appartment. We were warmly welcomed by Wanda and Rui, the situation was great and the view awesome! We definitely recommend this place!

Jorge was very helpful from the beginning on. I got the keys at the time I suggested. He was right on time and brought my extra wine and coffee as a welcome present. The apartment is very clean and equipped with everything you need. The bed is very comfy and you find every furniture that is necessary. The view from the balcony is awesome. Jorge took time to introduce me to everything and he offered his help 24/7. All in all a high recommendation from my side! I really enjoyed my stay and would come back every time!

Padrone di casa veramente gentile e disponibile, appartamento carinissimo e pulito in ottima posizione, vicinissimo al centro e con splendida vista sul Douro. Ci sono stati forniti asciugamani, lenzuola e ricambi, ci è stata anche offerta una bottiglia di Porto di benvenuto..=) Soggiorno davvero soddisfacente, consigliatissimo per brevi (4 giorni nel nostro caso) , ma anche per più lunghi periodi.. Grazie Jorge!
This was an amazing stay. such a cool location and a beautiful apartment. A lot of really amazing charm and made me feel like I've lived in Porto. A great time overall!

We met with Wanda when we arrived, she was warm and very informative. We loved the view of this place and it is located in a great location. Jorge and Wanda were communicative and accommodating. Wanda stopped by when we had issues with something. Overall, the place could use some updating though.
È andato tutto bene..tranne per l'acqua calda che finisce un po in fretta. Jorge e Wanda gentilissimi. Vista stupenda.

nous avons passé un court séjour a porto et sommes trés heureux de l avoir passé chez Jorges. Appartement avec une vue remarquable sur la douro. Accueil parfait de Jorges et Wanda qui parle tres bien francais. Bref.. que du bonheur. Fanny et Eric.

Beautiful apartment and amazing view!  Quiet neighborhood within 5-10 minute walk to prime tourist locations.  We were a little later than we thought coming in and Jorge and Vanda made sure we were taken care of.   We loved our stay at Jorge's and are looking forward to making it a tradition!
Perfeita estadia, recomendo muito esse apartamento com uma linda vista!!!

O apartamento Oporto Best View é fantástico. Adorámos a nossa estadia nesta cidade maravilhosa com gente fantástica. O Jorge e a Vanda são muito simpáticos e sempre disponíveis para ajudar. A localização do apartamento não podia ser melhor. Tem das melhores vistas a cidade e tem tudo o que precisamos para passar uns dias fantásticos. Excelente para ir em família. Os meus filhos adoraram! Quem puder venha passar a festa de fim de ano na Av. dos Aliados. Top! Top! Vamos recomendar a todos os amigos que queiram visitar o Porto.

Nous avons aimé ce lieu très charmant au centre de Porto.
Jorge était très gentil et disponible.
Le petit balcon rend l'appartement très cosy.
Nous recommandons cet appartement

Merci à Jorge qui nous a laissé un appartement très propre avec tout le nécessaire. 
Le quartier est super (quoique un peu bruyant le soir) dans le vieux centre Ville plein de charme. Idéal pour tout faire à pied!
Siempre recordaré las increíbles vistas del Duero desde el balcón cuando piense en Oporto. Gracias Jorge y Wanda.

Thank you Jorge for your warm welcome! We had a very pleasant stay in this apartment, which is perfectly located to visit the city. We especially loved the amazing view on the Douro from the balcony.  We really recommend this place!

Very nice place as expected. Beautiful Porto view. Was welcomed on time by Jorge. The neighborhood is very typical and you are minutes away from the sightseeings. Will book again with pleasure when we will come back.

Excelente departamento, ubicado en una zona muy pintoresca y con una vista preciosa! Si bien el departamento es un poco frío para el invierno, estaba muy bien equipado con frazadas y estufas. No nos faltó nada, Jorge muy cálido y servicial!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Jorge, le logement est très sympa, très bien équipé, une vue remarquable, et est à proximité de tout.
Je recommande !
We had a great few days. The view is really good, and there are two seperate beds. The apartment is withing walking distance of everything you need!

The room was great! Very good location, very cozy and comfortable rooms, and amazing view from the balcony!!! You cannot expect a host who is better than Jorge, seriously! He's very helpful, polite and we had very good communication. Super nice stay, I would like to give 6 stars rather than 5
Incredible view and location. Definitely worth every penny!

The location is fantastic and the view is even better. Our hosts were helpful with the check in and everything you need is in the apartment. In good weather its great enjoying a drink on the balcony looking over the ribiera.
Simplesmente fantástico.
Todo muy bien!

Jorge is he best!  He is super helpful and extremely passionate about his city (which is amazing!). Great local recommendations, beautiful flat, and hands down best view in all of Porto! Highly recommend if you are lucky enough to have the opportunity to stay here!

It was a really nice apartment, which was very well located. You need a lot of power in your legs, if you want to buy something for your breakfast :) 
The view was fantastic, and the apartment very comfortabel. We would come back...

O espaço tem mesmo uma vista impressionante! Aproveitamos a varanda para um refeição à noite com um bom vinho português. 
Embora aconchegante, faltam cuidados com o apartamento, as coisas são um pouco improvisadas. O anfitrião não foi quem nos recebeu e sim sua cunhada. Ela foi gentil e simpática, não havia café e ficou de levar no dia seguinte, o que não aconteceu.
O apartamento fica perto de tudo sim, mas se preparem para ladeiras e escadarias. Nós adoramos Porto e a localização da casa do Jorge, mas não foi minha melhor experiência.
We ha a very nice stay at the appartment. Jorge was the nicest host and the appartment was top! Thank you!

Very nice location. stunning view. better than on the pictures. perfect located to see all the hot spots of porto in walking distance.
very friendly and supporting host. 
highly recommended for a stay in porto.

Had such a lovely experience staying here.  The location is fabulous - very walkable to the neighborhood coffee shops/restaurants, close to public transportation and of course that view, it can't be beat!  Will definitely stay here again the next time we're in Porto.
Nice apartment, with a beautiful view on the river

This apartment is absolutely perfect; really a true gem.  Beautifully designed, centrally located and a SPECTACULAR view.  We stayed in 3 different apartments with water views in Lisbon and Porto during this trip and while the other two were lovely, this apartment just blew the others away.  Note: the apartment is at the top of a hill (Porto is very hilly) so wear comfortable shoes.  

Jorge and Vanda were super helpful as well.  They left us port wine and coffee and an umbrella, just in case.  Luckily it was nothing but sunshine during our 5 days in this apartment. 

We highly recommend this apartment and would stay at again over and over.

Llegamos a las 16:30 de la tarde y el propietario ya estaba en el piso, cuando llegamos todo olía a limpieza profunda, hasta las sabanas al dormir olían a suavizante, sin duda alguna la experiencia nos encantó, no le faltaba un detalle, tenía una cocina completamente equipada para pasar unos días (vajilla, tostadora, exprimidor, una cocina eléctrica, etc), el baño disponía de geles, velas, toallas, y otros detalles, tenía un armario con ropa de cama al completo, y sobre todo disfrutamos de la terraza con unas vistas impresionantes, era súper romántico. Nosotros éramos 3 personas, pueden dormir tranquilamente 4 personas, porque tiene una cama y un sofá cama. Es un segundo piso sin ascensor, en ningún momento notamos a los vecinos y las gaviotas nos hacían compañía (eso sí, lleva tapones si dormirás en el sofá cama y si tienes el sueño ligero porque hacen ruido jeje) sin embargo se callaban del todo a eso de las 00horas, nosotros dormimos muy pero muy bien. El propietario estuvo en contacto con nosotros durante toda la estancia, tiene un libro de sitios turísticos a recomendar, un libro de sugerencias, en el piso no está permitido fumar, y tenía colgado el resguardo que informaba que es un piso turístico autorizado, Sin duda alguna lo recomendamos al 100%.

We spent a great moment in Porto. Jorge was very nice. Thanks a lot for your hospitality. The apartment is close to the city center. We visited Porto almost by walk. The view of Porto by the balcony in the Appartement was just amazing. Thanks Jorge for the wine. It was great to drink it at the end of the day in the balcony while enjoying the view of the sunset. I hope we can back in this very nice city.
The flat is beautiful, close to local shops and main attractions. The vue is absolutely stunning over Duoro River. Jorge, thank you for your hospitality!
La vue est superbe

Idéalement situé 
L'appartement dispose de tout (seche cheveux, serviettes de toilette donc inutile d'en emporter...) , l'hôte est toujours a votre ecoute le balcon est un vrai plus avec sa vue

Jorge est un hôte très gentil et qui prend le temps de vous expliquer et de vous donner des informations pour profiter de Porto au maximum.
Merci
Jorge was a great host. The apartment is situated in a strategic position in the city center with a beautiful view on the Douro to river. Absolutely, an excellent experience.
Excellent located to explore Porto

We had a very plaisant time in Jorgés apprtement. The view from the balcony is amazing! After a long day walking in Porto it's just what you need!
Jorge s wife helped us very well when we arrived. I definitly recommend!

Unser Aufenthalt war absolut toll. Das Apartment ist toll in der Altstadt gelegen, um die Ecke gibt es viele gute Restaurants (u.a. das "As 7 Maravilhas" oder das "Torreao"). 
Jorge war super nett, hat uns alles erklärt. Der Ausblick vom Balkon ist der pure Wahnsinn, in Hotels würde man dafür viel Geld bezahlen, nicht jedoch hier in diesem Apartment. Wir werden wieder kommen! Obrigado Jorge!
Amazing view of Porto, perfect location and very nice flat! It wasn't an unforgettable experience and we want to come back soon to Porto just to stay in this beautiful apartment!

이 숙소의 가장 훌륭한 점은 바로 베란다에서 보이는 강의 전망입니다. 도우 강이 한눈에 내려다보여서 숙소 안에서도 아름다운 포르투를 즐길 수 있어요. 또 모든 시설이 깨끗하고 정돈되어 있어서 아무런 불편이 없었습니다. 손님들에 대한 애정이 큰 것 같다고 느낀게 게스트북을 남겨달라고도 하고 또 포트 와인도 준비해 주어서 베란다에 앉아 기분좋게 한잔 할 수 있었답니다. 경사가 조금 있어서 숙소까지 가는데 조금 쉽지 않을 수 있으니 꼭 편한 신을 신으세요. 그러나 그럴 만한 가치가 있습니다. 추천하는 숙소입니다.
그리고 남편이 실수로 모자를 놓고 왔는데
친절하게도 우편으로 보내주겠다고 했어요. :)
Eine tolle Wohnung mitten in Porto! Super Gastgeber, tolle Kommunikation und Service. Gerne wieder!!!

Jorge's place is in a terrific location for exploring Porto, being a short walk either down to the river or up to the central sights and shopping area.  The view from Jorge's balcony is truly the best in Porto - absolutely magical both during the day and at night.  The facilities in the apartment are very comfortable and the area is very quiet.  Local people we met in the street and in the shops were extremely friendly and helpful, making us feel very welcome.  Jorge was the perfect host, meeting us exactly as arranged and even organising a taxi to collect us early on our last morning to catch an early flight.
Jorge gave us a truly wonderful and memorable time in Porto.  We highly recommend his place.

I booked Jorges apartment for my parents and they absolutely loved it. The view is - of course, amazing and unforgettable, the location is very good, the apartment is cosy and a great place to stay after a long sight seeing day. Would highly recommend Jorges apartment!
Accueil chaleureux et passionné de Jorge. Très bon emplacement et vue panoramique sur Le Douro. A recommander.
Wonderful place in a great location and, yes, the view!!!

Jorge's apartment is ideally placed .., you can pretty much walk to all of the main tourist sites.. you don't have to walk too far to find good restaurants and bars and it was lovely to come back after a pretty full on day and just sit on the balcony and watch the world go by! The apartment had everything we needed and we were welcomed by a smiling, friendly Jorge and a carafe of good port. Would happily return.

Der Balkon ist in der Tat grossartig! Zusätzlich zur Aussicht noch lauter Mövenbabys auf den benachbarten Dächern - süss. Die Wohnung ist sehr sympathisch und entspricht genau den Bildern und Beschreibung. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt! Man hört von überall her etwas Geräusche.
Great location, awesome view!
Fantastisk sted med en super beliggenhed.
Wonderful location in the city center of Porto. Wonderful place and Hostage to stay with an nice few to Porto. Jorge's flat is wonderful and on the spot side from Port. 100 points from 100...

We had an amazing stay in Jorges flat! The balcony is just as stunning as in the pictures. When we arrived at the flat, Jorge was there to show us around, and tell us about the City. I would deffinatly recomend this flat!
Great location with amazing view. Jorge helped arrange taxi pick up after late flight in. Communicating with Jorge was very easy and he is very friendly. Would highly recommend his apartment.
We had a great time at Jorge's apartment. The view and location is amazing. The communication with him and his sister very easy and reliable. Hope to come again.

Das Besondere an Jorges Wohnung ist vor allem der Balkon und der wunderschöne Blick über den Fluss. Im übrigen ist es eine praktische, nett eingerichtete kleine Wohnung, in der man sich gut aufhalten kann, es ist ruhig und die Kommunikation mit Jorge sehr angenehm.

Velmi blízko centra. Nádherný výhled z balkonu na řeku, racky. Naprosto skvělé pro dva. Ale i ve čtyřech se to dalo v pohodě. V noci klid, žádný ruch z ulice. V bytě bylo vše co jsme potřebovali. Velmi dobrá lokace. Můžeme doporučit

Wat betreft het uitzicht een absolute aanrader. Heerlijk zon op je terras tot dat hij onder gaat en met een prachtig zicht op de port bedrijven aan de overkant van de rivier. Bij aankomst ook een heerlijke karaf port gekregen.Het appartement is ok. Het is verouderd en een beetje opgelapt maar dat is niet zo goed gedaan. Voor een kort verblijf een aanrader, zeker als je niet wilt koken (klein elektrisch vuur met maar twee pitten).

We had two wonderful days in the appartment. It is exactly like on the pictures and the view, especially the sunset, from the balkony is amazing! We would definately recommend this appartment! The hosts were also really nice and made us feel very welcome.
Wunderbare Wohnung mit phänomenalem Ausblick - mehr kann man sich ncht wünschen
Bonita vista del rio. Las sabanas del sofá cama tenían pequeños agujeros. El resto estuvo bien.
Das Apartment ist sauber und gut ausgestattet. Es ist ruhig gelegen und eignet sich ideal, um Porto zu Fuß zu entdecken.

A dream come true!!!! Our stay at Jorge's apartment was absolutely AMAZING!!!! We practically spent all the time outside on the balcony with that lovely view over the Douro river... It was an absolute privilege that we had the opportunity to stay in this unique apartment, and we also immediately felt at home, very cosy. Jorge is a wonderful and kind person. We did not know if we would even make it to Porto in the evening due to flight delays, but he kept waiting patiently and in the end we were lucky to arrive at 1:30 in the morning. Jorge was so welcoming then and truly wonderful. Hope to come back very very soon.

Great place in a great location. Had to wait a little bit to get inside the home due to a traffic jam and a small error to leave the key inside so we could enter an hour later than expected but that wasn't a big problem because the host kept us up to date and we had a drink in a local pub nearby. Also good communication in advance. Great view from his terrace. Certainly recommended to stay.

We really enjoyed the appartment of Jorge and Wanda during these 4 days. The appartment was clean with good equipments. It is ideally located and the view on the caves and Douro is extraordinary. Jorge and Wanda take care of our needs and their attentions were really appreciated. I strongly recommend them !
Very nice apartment with great view and location. Not easy to find. I recommend this apartment.

Jorge's flat is in a brilliant location. Almost everything you want to do is within a 10/15 minute walk. The little balcony is great for breakfast or evening drinks.
The transfers Jorge arranged for us were excellent.

We don't want to leave.  What a beautiful place.  We hope to come back and stay here again.  A week was just not long enough.  The hills are steep, but we got lots of exercise and the grand prize at the end of the day was coming back to watch the sunset from the terrace.  That view is the best in all of Porto!

Our stay in Oporto best view was amazing, brilliant apartment close to the many bars and restaurants porto has to offer. Walk up the hill for the best options! We particularly enjoyed the healthy eateries Zenith and Noshi for breakfast, followed by many sangrias and cocktails around town! Lunch by the beach was beautiful and just a short taxi ride away. Thank you Jorge and Wanda for being lovely hosts and providing a great apartment, we would love to come back!
The apartment is beautiful and described accurately. The view is exquisite too. Porto is a lovely city. Thank you Jorge.
Magnificant view, centered location and good price makes it a must be. You must be physically fit to get to the apartment

Don't hesitate, take this :) Perfect location to explore Porto, indeed great view to have Port on the balcony, its really clean and professional :) I really only can recommend. Great price to value ratio.

The view is amazing. The apartment is clean and lovely. We were unlucky being there while the neighbor was renovating, so there was a little noisy in the morning. But other than that, the place is absolutely lovely

L appartement de Jorge est idéalement situé. La gentillesse de notre hôte nous a permis de profiter au mieux de cette belle ville de Porto ( commande des taxis notamment). L appartement etait très propre. Merci encore pour cet accueil Jorge.
Perfect host and perfect location. The apartment has everything you need. The flat is like shown in the pictures and the view is amazing!!! I definitely recommend this apartment!

Hi everyone!
Jorge place is just nearby the center of Porto.
You can just walk around and easy to find.
The beautiful view from the terrace of the apartment is a perfect one.
It's highly recommend!

We had a wonderful stay! Check in and check out couldn't have been easier. We enjoyed wandering around the hilly, twisting streets, experiencing a port tasting, riding up the teleférico, eating delicious food, sipping espresso on the balcony and watching the sun set over the hill. The apartment was in a great location, clean, had everything we needed, and that view really was the best! We loved our visit to Porto and all of the lovely, friendly people there. Thank you, Jorge!
The views from the apartment were incredible and it's a great location within walking distance of all the sights and places to see. Thank you for a lovely stay, I would highly recommend!
Very nice Apartment with a amazing view! Thank you, we had a really nice time there.

Gorgeous city and gorgeous flat in great location! We loved being able to see all the port cellar signs from the balcony :) There was some demolition work going on next door while we were there - but it was mostly while we were out exploring...
Thanks Jorge - we'll be back!

Quem está a procurar hospedagem em Porto já pode parar e reservar este local! Eu e minha amiga estivemos no apartamento de Jorge por 1 semana e não poderíamos ter escolhido melhor! 
As fotos não fazem jus à realidade! O local tem um excelente espaço e é tudo confortável, com ótimo espaço, muito bem decorado e funcional. Tudo estava primorosamente limpo e perfumado! A visão do Douro que se tem da sacada é espetacular a qualquer hora do dia e é fantástico beber um vinho apreciando tudo de lá! Mas o que realmente completa o paraíso é a recepção e suporte que Jorge e sua irmã, Wanda, oferecem!
O local fica no segundo andar e não há elevador, mas Jorge, de pronto, ajudou a carregar as malas. Explicou tudo sobre o local e nos agraciou com um bom vinho do porto, mantimentos e capsulas de café. Também sempre estiveram presentes para todas as dúvidas e a simpatia era cativante!
Anfitriões como eles fazem toda a diferença!
Encontramos nosso porto seguro em Porto!

Wanda and Jorge provide excellent hospitality and the apartment is wonderful. The balocony is lovely, just as advertised. The hosts go out of their way to accommodate guests. This was a great way to expirience Porto.

This apartment was in a wonderful location and was very comfortable. Jorge was so hospitable and met us during check-in to show us around and make us feel at home. Would highly recommend this spot for your trip to Porto!

Appartement très propre et idéalement situé pour découvrir cette superbe ville. Cet appartement est calme avec une vue splendide.
Jorge est un hôte très conciliant, je recommande chaudement cet appartement.
The apartment offers a great view to the river. We were fortunate to see the three kings day fireworks show from the balcony!
Excelente ubicación y una vista maravillosa!!! Agradecemos la hospitalidad de Jorge y los tips que nos dio para descubrir la ciudad. Muy Recomendado!!!

Jorge is very kind. 
Airport transfer to the flat was awesome!
Excelente localização! Vista maravilhosa

Notre semaine à PORTO a été une totale réussite. Merci à Jorge pour la qualité de son accueil, son sérieux, son amabilité. La vue de son appartement donnant sur le Douro est panoramique et unique. Nous nous sommes sentis bien dans ce quartier central où tout est disponible à pied. Nous sommes partis à regret et conseillons vivement notre hôte pour d'autres voyageurs. Si nous retournons un jour à PORTO, nous choisirons Jorge sans hésitation !
I would recommend Jorges place
Nice comfortable flat with wonderful views over the river. Great location with good cafes and restaurants nearby. We loved Porto and Jorge's flat and hope to visit again.

Un séjour superbe à Porto chez Jorge.
Un appartement très agréable, idéalement situé pour tout découvrir à pied et une vue imprenable sur le Douro!
A quiet spot with a great view of the river and port district. Jorge was a great host. Thanks for the sampling of port!
Zoals beloofd was het uitzicht geweldig! De gastvrijheid was ook super. Er stond al port en koffie voor ons klaar. Ook was het appartement heel schoon. Ik zou dit zeker aan iedereen aanraden!

Appartemment bien situé pour découvrir le centre proche des restaurants typiques et très belle vue sur le Douro.Facile de s y rendre en métro de l aéroport juste 30 minutes puis 15 minutes de marche.Acceuil agréable.merci Jorges

Il y a tout ce qu'il faut dans l appartement de Jorge pour passer un bon séjour. Jorge a pense au café, porto, savon etc.....ces petits détails sont importants surtout quand on arrive en avion avec le strict minimum. Le service du transfert de l aéroport a porto est tout à fiable et économique. La vue sur le douro   est magnifique.

Jorges apartment had everything we could have wanted for our trip. Perfect location in the old town with a great view from the balcony - Unfortunately it rained quite a lot during our stay but we’d love to come back in the summer to take full advantage of it!

Die Unterkunft ist wirklich toll und die Aussicht ist fantastisch!! Es hat an nichts gefehlt und man ist sofort im Stadtzentrum zu Fuß. Eine wirklich tolle wohnung um Porto zu erkunden. Jorge ist auch sehr nett und die Kommunikation war einfach. Wir würden sofort wieder buchen!
The place looks like on the photos and the view is really amazing.

L'appartement de Jorge et Wanda est extrêmement bien situé pour séjourner à Porto. La vue est bien évidemment magnifique. 
On s'y sent très bien et le niveau de confort est très satisfaisant. 
L'accueil réservé par Jorge est chaleureux.
Nous recommandons cette adresse.
House with a wonderful view on the city, literally 5 minutes wolking from the Ribeira and 10 minutes walking from Sao Bento train station. A really good place to be hosted!
The views are more beautiful than you can imagine. This apartment is cozy and comfortable! Jorge is a wonderful host. We had a great stay!
Ne pas manquer d'aller dîner à la taverne San Antonio à deux pas de l'appartement
Petit appartement idéalement situé au cœur de Porto, plutôt calme, avec vue magnifique sur le Douro.
We would recommend this apartment to anyone.

Jorge’s place is AMAZING. Hands down, one of the best Airbnb’s we have stayed at across Europe (we’ve been traveling for about 2 months now). The view is incredible and we had a hard time deciding whether to stay in to enjoy the view or go out. Great to have the best view in Porto right on our private balcony. Jorge was so thoughtful with all the nice touches and helped us with our bags, explained everything very well and gave us local tips. Also of note, this apartment is on the second floor and there are no elevators :) would love to stay here again!

I have been using airbnb for many years when I have traveled. Generally I have had good experiences with sweet hosts. But Jorge is by far the best host I have ever had. Totally amazing. Jorge meets all the expectations I have for a good host - Period. OK the apartment is also fantastic and Porto is one of the best cities I've been to. Jorge gets 6 big stars from here.

Wir hatten eine wundervolle Zeit in der tollen Wohnung von Jorge. Die Lage ist einmalig und der Blick vom Balkon einfach traumhaft. Es ist die perfekte Wohnung für einen Aufenthalt in Porto. 
Die Lage ist absolut zentral und alles, was man braucht liegt in der Nähe. 
Absolut empfehlenswert!

Appartement agréable idéalement situé et offrant une vue imprenable sur le Douro… dans une petite rue escarpée très calme et pourtant si près du centre. Bon accueil, appartement propre avec kitchenette et litterie correcte.  Validé avec deux enfants de 5 et 6 !! ☑

Die Wohnung ist sehr günstig gelegen. Man kann von dort aus das Flussufer und viele Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichen. Die Wohnung ist einfach eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Das Schönste ist der wunderbare Blick vom Balkon. Mann hat dort von vormittags bis abends bei schönem Wetter Sonne. Dort zu frühstücken ist einfach toll. Jorge war immer zu erreichen und hat für uns die Abholung vom Flughafen gut organisiert. Uns hat es rundherum gefallen. Kommen bestimmt wieder.

Departamento con excelente vista al río y muy buena ubicación. Jorge nos recibió muy amable, nos dio todas las instrucciones y recomendaciones necesarias. Buena comunicación durante nuestra estadía. 
El departamento tiene buen tamaño y con equipamiento básico. Sin embargo, las fotos del interior  no corresponden exactamente a su estado actual. Dada su linda vista y ubicación sugerimos algunas mejoras como renovar los muebles del balcón que son incómodos y están deteriorados; mejorar el piso y los azulejos del baño.

The apartment is very charming and very well equipped. The view is really fascinating. We enjoyed it together with the beautiful seagull, which was making us company. The neighborhood is the best in Porto, close to the famous Clérigos Church. Local restaurants are amazing.

Jorge and Wanda are great hosts, fully dedicated to their guests. If we come again to Porto, we would definitely like to stay here again.
Jorge was easy to communicate with and we loved his comfortable apartment with an amazing view! We had a fantastic time in Porto. Just a small thing - we couldn’t find a kettle? Thank you Jorge.

A lovely flat with a balcony offering the best view of the River Douro. Porto is a fantastic and rapidly
developing place - visit it before it gets too expensive!

The apartment is great. Be prepared to carry your bags up a couple of flights of stairs but you will be well rewarded when you see the view from the deck. The kitchen was well supplied just be aware that there is no oven. There are some nice restaurants just around the corner and it's an easy walk down to the river front. Check in was easy Wanda was very helpful and informative.
La vue est superbe l appartement très mignon et propre avec toutes les commodités. Wanda est adorable et très accueillante.
Beautiful spot with an incredible view. Jorge is a wonderful host, and you can’t go wrong with this rental!

Great place to stay! Everything is walkable from here, it’s really the perfect location. 

Plenty of space for two people. Coffee and some port wine were provided, which was such a nice touch!

The guest book is worth looking through. We picked our restaurants based on prior guest reviews, and we had some amazing meals!!

I would definitely recommend staying here! Thanks Jorge!
What a stunning view! The pictures do not do it justice. The location is excellent as well. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Jorge is an excellent host and very responsive.
Great appartment! Jorge is very helpfull. All good!!!!! We come-back if we go to porto. Amazing view
Wonderful place with incredible views and moments walk from everything. Seagull season can make it difficult to keep windows and balcony doors open. Everything else was great.

Jorge is a five star host!   The apartment is just beautiful . Loved that he left us Port to enjoy on the terrace. It was wonderful to find coffee and sugar!!  The view is drop dead beautiful and the terrace was comfortable to sit on.  Loved the sound of the seagulls too!!!!   Incredibly clean !!!!!!!   If you’re planning to stay in Porto ........this is the place to (Website hidden by Airbnb) was simply perfection !!!!!  Thanks Jorge you made our stay so beautiful !!!!!!!
T

We spent a very good stay in Jorge's appartment :) the view is awesome, the flat is not very big but big enough for 2 adults and 2 children. Jorge is very communicative and sympatic and we thanks him again for all his advice on porto!

I highly Recommend this apartment, for a short stay in Porto.
Centrally located, with an excellent view over the River .

Auch in diesem Jahr kamen wir in der wundervollen Wohnung von Jorge in Porto unter.
Die gute Lage , die Möglichkeit unseren Wagen vor dem Haus zu parken, aber vor allem der tolle Ausblick vom Balkon haben uns aufs Neue überzeugt!
Monika aus Bonn

We enjoyed staying at Jorges apartment. Especially, the balcony and the location was great. The kitchen facilities are not the most advanced  (a small electric stove and no oven), but with all the great restaurants in Porto, we didn’t mind. Thanks a lot for the stay :-)

Leuke knusse plek, met aardige huisbaas! Prachtig uitzicht!!
Typische Portugees huis met leuke gebruiksaanwijzingen, in een super steile straat. Dichtbij bezienswaardigheden en restaurantjes.

Simple but clean and a great location - very central, just 5 mins walk from Clerigos Tower. Lovely and quiet. Balcony watching the sunset was heavenly. Jorge and Wanda were brilliant hosts and very quick to respond with any queries.

Superbe emplacement dans Porto. Nous avons pu tout faire à pied avec une petite fille de 6 ans. Accueil tres agréable les conseils de Wanda nous ont permis de nous repèrer rapidement dans Porto, merci beaucoup! plusieurs restaurants typiques et tres bons à moins de 5 mn. Un bémol sur le bruit des mouettes la nuit mais c'est un petit défaut pour avoir cette vue magique sur le Douro et Gaia. C'était parfait !
Great host with great/stylish apartment. very close to airport

If you're looking for a cozy apartment with an incredible view, Jorge's place is perfect. Everything we needed was provided and the view at sunrise and sunset was so stunning it made it hard to leave. Upon check-in make sure to ask how the toilet and hot water for showers works as that can be alittle tricky.

Jorge was a very nice host. Fast in replying and very easy to handle. No issues. 
The appartment was super nice - an incredible view over the river. Amazing. Also the overall appartment was great, too. It is also well placed in between the upper city and the river area. I highly recommend this place for a perfect stay in Porto.

Absolutely fantastic stay
An address we recommend 
We adored it 
Jorge is lovingly inviting and caring
Very nice apartment. Extremely well located. Super host, very welcoming and reactive. Nice hospitality touches (port wine, good espresso coffee). Superb view from the balcony. Highly recommended!

This apartment is absolutely fantastic. The bed is comfortable and the rooms are a good size. It’s the balcony that makes the whole place so special. There’s nothing better than sitting on the balcony with a nice coffee from the coffee machine watching the city wake up. The sunsets are fabulous too! The balcony get the sun all day so it’s great to catch some rays after a day of walking around Porto. The apartment is about five minutes walk from the centre of Porto and there are plenty of fantastic restaurants close by to try out Taberna d’Avo was our favourite. Jorge is fantastic host, he met us at the apartment when we arrived even though it was very late, showed us round and gave us some recommendations for the local area. He had left us some lovely port wine for us to try and was always quick to respond to any questions we had. We loved our stay and were gutted when it came time to leave. We will definitely be coming back, thank you so much Jorge!
Really amazing view and easy walkable access

This is a fantastic place to stay! It is located right in the heart of Porto and has an outstanding view of the city. The owner, Jorge, was very responsive and helpful. The check in was smooth and he also helped us arrange a taxi to the airport the day we left. Highly recommend this place.

We enjoyed the stay at Jorges place. The view toward the Douro and the balcony with all day sunshine were great!  Wanda gives us good information about Porto and we loved the Port wine they offered us! If we come back to Porto one day we would like to stay again at this place!
Elli&Michael

Wer zentral und angenehm in Porto unterkommen möchte, ist in Jorges Apartment genau richtig. Es fehlt an nichts, liegt mitten in der Altstadt, so dass man alles zu Fuss erreichen kann. Das absolute Highlight: der ganztägig besonnte Balkon mit phantastischem Blick. 
Jorge ist ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber, der sich sehr um unser Wohl gekümmert hat.
Danke, Jorge!

Très bel appartement bien situé avec tout ce qu il faut ,très confortable ,Jorge est un super hôte très serviable il nous a attendus jusqu’à 00h00 pour le chekin il nous a recommandé de superbes endroits à porto ,nous avons apprécié le porto à l arrivée et le café à disposition 
A recommander vivement
It was a really nice accomodation with a picturesque view to Porto. Jorge was a fast and good communicator!

I spent a great time at Porto and at Jorges place, which is all cozy. It is located in a great area and u reach everything by foot, so it was just perfect to discover Porto by foot. Everything went well and smoothly and I definitely would come again!
Un apartamento bien situado, con unas vistas inmejorables desde su encantador balcón. Desayunar al sol con vistas a la Ribeira no tiene precio.

Very nice and cosy apartment, excellent location and the balcony view with fresh brewed cofee and the glass of port wine is all you need after a full day of walking around. Jorge is the best host, very patient (we arrived about midnight) and gives you the utmost practical guide to the city and its culture.
A stunning view of a beautiful city, in a location which would be hard to match. Can not recommend highly enough.
appartement au top pour quelques jours à Porto! Très bien situé, le balcon c'est un bonheur!! Merci beaucoup pour l'accueil chaleureux, appartement fortement conseillé

name: Spacious apt in the heart of EV
summary: Come stay in this spacious, light-filled East Village studio! It's a beautiful apartment with a separate kitchen area. AMAZING location close to many subway stations, Union Square, Washington Sq. Park, and lots of great nightlife and restaurants!
space: This is truly a wonderful apartment. High ceilings, exposed brick, plenty of kitchen space make it a wonderful option. There is a queen sized bed + pull out couch, that can very comfortably sleep 3.
description: Come stay in this spacious, light-filled East Village studio! It's a beautiful apartment with a separate kitchen area. AMAZING location close to many subway stations, Union Square, Washington Sq. Park, and lots of great nightlife and restaurants! This is truly a wonderful apartment. High ceilings, exposed brick, plenty of kitchen space make it a wonderful option. There is a queen sized bed + pull out couch, that can very comfortably sleep 3. The whole apartment will be yours. I'll leave you my phone number for any questions you might have. The East Village is a really special, vibrant area of the city.
neighborhood_overview: The East Village is a really special, vibrant area of the city.
access: The whole apartment will be yours.
interaction: I'll leave you my phone number for any questions you might have.
house_rules: Please treat my home as if it was yours! Just be respectful and use your best judgement and I think we'll be okay :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi, I'm Emma! Originally from California, I made the jump to this amazing city almost three years ago. I work in tech and am a big fan of chocolate, Netflix, and exploring new places.

I love hosting on Airbnb because I can help others get a true New Yorker experience while visiting the city.  Not to mention, it helps me fund my own adventures :)

reviews.comments: Very good experience,  the apartment was clean and very nice. Perfect position to visit NYC.

Awesome Airbnb ! We spent one week in this apartment to visit New York and it was perfect. The apartment is really nice and convenient ! Furthermore, it is so easy to visit New York as it is really well situated, in East Village which is really cool neighborhood. You can find everything close to the apartment (grocery, starbuck, shops and the subway) Emma was really kind to us, she explained us everything and was very reactive. At the end of our trip, as our flight was in the night, she let us stay until 2-3am.

Great location, close to Union Square and surrounded by nice bars and restaurants (with terrace on the street !!). Emma is easy going, 
communicates nicely and efficiently and ensure check in/out that you couldn't dream better. Apartment is exactly as pictured, comfortable for a couple, just a little bit noisy as main room windows look onto 2nd avenue (if your city heard about double glazing :-P ). Bed is comfortable and there is aircon which was very helpful during our stay in the "end of may high summer" in NYC. We had a great stay at Emma's and in NYC as well. I would definitely recommend Emma.
Emma was always available to help and very gracious. Her apartment couldn't be better situated to explore the East Village.

Emma's flat was a little gem in the middle of Manhattan! Ideally situated  to discover all NY, it has all the place and the comfort you need. 
It's in the middle of a lively street, with cool bars and great places for breakfast.
The AC was more than welcome for the Indian summer.
The flat was clean and Emma had everything ready for us. She was easily reachable before we arrive. We recommend strongly the  flat and would go back with no hesitation!

Emma's place is the perfect spot to explore the city like a true New Yorker. The location couldn't be better. It's just a few blocks from SoHo and has many amenities like bars, restaurants, and shops nearby. 
The place was clean and it's great for a solo traveler or a couple. I went with a friend for a girls weekend and we had plenty of room. It's a large studio! 
Emma was very nice and even gave us some ideas and recommendations of what to do around the area. Would definitely stay here again!

Emma was a great hostess and very easy to communicate with. Her apartment is a great size and very comfortable for a couple. There is building heating too so it's nice and toasty when you get back from the chilly fall/winter. 

Perfect location in East Village - TONS of great bars and restaurants nearby, a very short walk to the subway, and a corner store next door for any of your sundry needs. 

The apartment is right on 2nd Ave, so there is a decent amount of street noise. We didn't mind at all (it's NY!) but sensitive sleepers may want to take note since the bed is right by the window.

We had a great time and would definitely stay at Emma's again!

Muy buena experiencia! El departamento es perfecto para 3, muy cómodo y con excelente ubicación. Muy buen barrio, cerca del metro, buenos bares y restaurantes. 
Gracias a Emma por su preocupación!

Great sunny and stylish apartment in an amazing location in the heart of the East Village.  Steps away from everything you’d ever need for a New York experience.  Great comfy double bed, wonderful hot shower and a great kitchen space if ever you need.  Emma was always very responsive and helpful.
Just one tip - as it’s the city that never sleeps - do bring eye plugs!
Great place for the price. Bit noisy, but perfect location

name: ExtendALL, PORTO Studio 1
space: Located in downtown Port the EXTENDALL * offers two studios and a loft with high quality and comfort. The building was rehabilitated by brunosales architecture studio in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Its facade was preserved and its architectural references, the interior was completely redesigned for local accommodation, all the furniture was designed for the use of each space. The studios have an area of about 35m2, with kitchenette, bathroom and balcony. The loft has 50m2 in a kitchen, bathroom, cloakroom, balcony and a beautiful view of the River Douro. Both are equipped with electronic access control, air conditioning, television, washing machine-machine, microwave, refrigerator, internet, music, hair dryer, crockery and utensils. Here you will feel at home: Location It's in the center of Porto, steps from historic heritage and meters from public transport, car parking, shopping centers and 15 km from Sá Carneiro Airport (international). Security It is provided with an electronic
