house_rules: No smoking in the apartments only on balcony.

host.host_location: Leça da Palmeira, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about:
I'm a young architect. I love travel and meet new people.
I open my best work projects to the tourist people for show my design and for you can give me the best suggestions for i upgrade.

I hope to see you soon in my house!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We had an excellent stay in Porto. The room is beautiful, very comfortable with all the necessary things we needed. Thanks for everything Bruno. We definitely recommend your place.
Sincerly

Accueil digne d'un 5 étoiles, très bon emplacement dans la ville, appartement fonctionnel, magnifique salle de bain, excellent rapport qualité/prix... que demander de plus ? Si, peut-être, des lits "1 place" un peu étroits...

Bruno rents private rooms which are completely new designed! You enter the flat by a code instead of a key. The flat offers all to you what you need (even a short breakfast) and the flat is located in the beautiful center of Oporto... In total it was perfect!!

Just keep attention if you arrive by car: Take a look for a safe car park!

Great place to stay for a visit to Porto. We stayed with three people here for  a weekend. Great location. Clean good beds and great service.

Michiel

Our stay at ExtendALL was nothing less than perfect.
Bruno is a great host and will surely transmit his passion on to you.
Totally recommendable and worth the money paid.
Hope to repeat the experience in a near future!

Our stay at ExtendALL was great, the studio is in a very good state with a lovely bathroom and it offers all you need for a week in Porto. The location is Brilliant and the price is very good for what it offers. The only negative thing that could be said is that the street can be quite busy, but it did not ruin our stay at all. Would love to come back!

Our stay was AMAZING!The apartments is super cute, conveniently located and the decoration with designed furniture just enhanced the whole experience. The neighbourhood was very authentic. I will repeat and recommend it
Perfect location, perfect host. I really recommend!

Our stay in Porto was really great. The apartment is very well located and beautiful. Everything is decorated with style, we really enjoyed it! Thanks to the Extendall team for everything, they're so kind! :)

As soon as we arrived, we were welcomed with a nice smile, a glass of Port Wine, chocolate and with such professionalism. At the entrance we found everything we needed to know about the city like city maps, restaurants suggestions, shopping locations, boat cruisers, bike rental, etc. Everything in the apartment was meticulously designed by Bruno, well equipped and decorated, it was such a nice experience. Located in the central area was very easy to walk around and enjoy beautiful scenes of O Porto. 
We recommend EXTANDALL for anybody who wants to stay in a nice, clean and affordable apartment. But be aware of the rules, no loud music after 11 pm.
Thank you so much guys, R+K Toronto
Het appartement was helemaal volgens verwachting. Prachtig ingericht, op een mooie locatie en een vriendelijke ontvangst van eigenaar/architect Bruno en zijn assistente Barbara. Een echte aanrader!
Nice place, Bruno is an excellent host. Can recommend this apartment to anyone!

Hemos pasado unos días estupendos en Oporto con nuestro perro Coco.
El personal muy agradable, nos recibieron con vino de oporto y chocolate. El apartamento es precioso, grande y muy luminoso; esta bien equipado y su ubicación es genial para ir andando a cualquier sitio del centro. El coche lo pudimos aparcar en un aparcamiento público gratuito al lado del apartamento.

Very pleasant welcoming and time. The studio is clean, well furnished and the location is perfect to enjoy Porto.
Thank you Bruno!

Very nice, well designed appartement in a perfect location to discover Porto. Also very nice hosts who organised a pick-up from the airport and welcomed us with Portwine and chocolate before giving us a great introduction into the main sight of their city. Thank you for a great time. Really recommandable place!
Excelente apartamento y muy bien ubicado, nos encantó

We had a great time in Extend all. Very nice modern apartment in the middle of the centre and everything was perfectly arranged by Bruno! He checked all the time if everything was okay! I would recommend staying in ExtendAll!

Vi ble ønsket velkomne av en meget informativ vert som ga oss en god innføring om byen, severdighetene, anbefalte turer og spisesteder. Nabolaget er charmerende men gaten har gjennomgangstrafikk. Leiligheten er svært smakfull og veldig pent innredet med moderne og kreative løsninger.

Quarto muito grande e bem mobilado e casa de banho espaçosa. Bem localizado. Fomos também bem recebidos pelo Bruno. Única coisa a apontar é que como quarto era no 1ro piso havia um pouco de barulho da rua (por isso até davam tampões para ouvidos).
Je le recommande! L’appartement est situé dans un super endroit! Très accessible pour les points d’intérêts importants! C’était un très grand appartement avec plusieurs commodités!

name: Room in very central apt in Kadıkoy
summary: A spacious room in a dublex penthouse. Very central location, walking distance to ferry, metro and metrobus as well as a lot of cafes, shopping and nightlife district of Istanbul Asian side, Kadıkoy.  Located on a nice street with a lot of cafes and no traffic.  Open kitchen, the living room and the bathroom, all on the first floor of the apartment, is usable by the guests.
space: The apartment is a penthouse dublex. The room is large with a desk, a double and a single bed, two closets. The entrance floor is all for the use of the guests.  Apartment is as central as it gets, walking distance to all transportaion and attractions in the area.
description: A spacious room in a dublex penthouse. Very central location, walking distance to ferry, metro and metrobus as well as a lot of cafes, shopping and nightlife district of Istanbul Asian side, Kadıkoy.  Located on a nice street with a lot of cafes and no traffic.  Open kitchen, the living room and the bathroom, all on the first floor of the apartment, is usable by the guests. The apartment is a penthouse dublex. The room is large with a desk, a double and a single bed, two closets. The entrance floor is all for the use of the guests.  Apartment is as central as it gets, walking distance to all transportaion and attractions in the area. Open kitchen, the living room and the bathroom, all on the first floor of the apartment, is usable by the guests. I live on the second floor of the apartment, and rarely use the entrance floor. So you can enjoy your private floor as you like. I am open and willing to help you out with all sorst of questions and tips about the city.
access: Open kitchen, the living room and the bathroom, all on the first floor of the apartment, is usable by the guests.
interaction: I live on the second floor of the apartment, and rarely use the entrance floor. So you can enjoy your private floor as you like. I am open and willing to help you out with all sorst of questions and tips about the city.
house_rules: House is smoking free, tho if you are a non-smoker, then the entrance floor is going to be non-smoking area durğing your stay.  I have a cat so if you are allergic, or afraid, can be a problem.

host.host_about: I am a very chill out, easy going guy who loves to meet with new people. I work in 2 different culture/music magazines as an editor.

name: Manhattan Club (1 bedroom/Sleeps 4)
summary: Time sharing spacious serviced appartment with one bedroom, 2 bathrooms, 1 living room with kitchenette and sofa bed (which can sleep comfortably 2). Location is perfect as it's close to Central park, Times Square, Broadway, Museums, Lincoln Centre, Carnegie Hall and 5th avenue.
space: The guests can use the entire space of the suite.
description: Time sharing spacious serviced appartment with one bedroom, 2 bathrooms, 1 living room with kitchenette and sofa bed (which can sleep comfortably 2). Location is perfect as it's close to Central park, Times Square, Broadway, Museums, Lincoln Centre, Carnegie Hall and 5th avenue.
interaction: I am available to answer any questions over the phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) , email.

reviews.comments:
La description de l'appartement hotel et de sa localisation a été parfaitement conforme aux informations données.
Kleon nous a pris l'initiative de nous appeler suite à la réservation pour vérifier que nous avions toutes les informations nécessaires et pour nous proposer son aide si besoin.

Le Manhattan Club où nous avons résidé est une adresse fantastique pour profiter pleinement d'un séjour à New York : idéalement situé sous Central Park (300m) et également très proche de Broadway, Time Square, 5th Avenue, Rockefeller Center.
Impossible de faire plus central et pus facile à vivre à pied.
Enfin l'appartement possede un coin cuisine avec réfrigérateur parfait pour le petit déjeuner et les plats à emporter le soir quand pas de sortie prévue.
Place was amazing!
Perfect spot for short stays

name: Quality apartment, Quality location
space: Large, bright, fantastic Art Deco apartment located in the vibrant and popular inner-city cosmopolitan suburb Potts Point, with plenty of bars, restaurants, cafes and life to keep you entertained. Ultra-convenient & within walking distance of the central business district & all tourist sites such as:  Royal Botanic Gardens  Sydney Opera House  Art Gallery of NSW  Australian Museum  Circular Quay  Darling Harbour  Museum of Contemporary Art  Sydney Museum  Hyde Park  Chinatown  Paddy's Markets  Chinese Gardens  Paddington (& the Saturday markets)  The historic Rocks area (& the markets on Saturday & Sunday) It’s a 10 minute walk to the Kings Cross train (Metro) station & buses which will take you to the beaches including Bondi. The bus to/from city leaves from across the road (and it takes about 15-20 minutes to walk to Circular Quay and the Opera House). The bus to Chinatown leaves from in front of the building. Restaurants, coffee shops & supermarket are at your doorstep.  Use of kitc
description: Large, bright, fantastic Art Deco apartment located in the vibrant and popular inner-city cosmopolitan suburb Potts Point, with plenty of bars, restaurants, cafes and life to keep you entertained. Ultra-convenient & within walking distance of the central business district & all tourist sites such as:  Royal Botanic Gardens  Sydney Opera House  Art Gallery of NSW  Australian Museum  Circular Quay  Darling Harbour  Museum of Contemporary Art  Sydney Museum  Hyde Park  Chinatown  Paddy's Markets  Chinese Gardens  Paddington (& the Saturday markets)  The historic Rocks area (& the markets on Saturday & Sunday) It’s a 10 minute walk to the Kings Cross train (Metro) station & buses which will take you to the beaches including Bondi. The bus to/from city leaves from across the road (and it takes about 15-20 minutes to walk to Circular Quay and the Opera House). The bus to Chinatown leaves from in front of the building. Restaurants, coffee shops & supermarket are at your doorstep.  Use of kitc
house_rules: 1. Keep the place neat and tidy 2. Smoking only permitted on the balcony

host.host_about: I'm a working professional  from Australia, I've traveled all over the place and am always happy to meet new people

reviews.comments: Mike is a great host! we felt home from the first second. It is clean and very nice in his appartment. He knows nearly everything about Sydney and has an answer for all your questions. We would definitely go back to him for a second stay, once back in Sydney. The appartment has also an amazing view on the city from the roof top. within 10-15 min walk you are at the centre. You have all facilieties you need around. We liked it a lot!

Great guy, Great location ;)
As he said "the best view of all sydney" and it's true!!
Easy going and always ready to give one hand!
If you want to enjoy KingsX life this is the place for you!
Thank you Mike!!
Location is very convenience. Big dining room. Unfortunately, there isn't internet service.
Mike is such a great guy and made my stay so easy. Great apartment which is clean and the area has everything you need. Make sure you check out the view from the roof. Cheers Mike..

Mike is respectful, friendly, accommodating and easy going.  The location of the flat is great and the views from the roof are spectacular.  Within walking distance to Kings Cross, the CBD and major tourist attractions.  I would gladly stay with Mike again in the future.

Staying with Mike is like staying with an old friend, very easy to communicate and to live with. It is the first time I share a place with somebody and it was very pleasant, thanks to Mike. Actually he is never home, you will miss him! Great location, very easy to reach the city or the train station in Kings Cross. Highly recommended.

Mike is a fantastic host and did everything possible to make my stay enjoyable. Everything was perfect and above all I have a genuine friend as a result of this experience. The rooftop view was a spectacular way to take in the panoramic views of the CBD, opera house and Sydney harbor. I have no hesitation in recommending him to fellow AirBnB members! Six stars out of five!
Great apartment in a great location. Stunning views from the roof terrace and a cool host to boot!

Mike is a great guy, he will make you feel welcome. He was good to chat to.
I had a pleasant stay - as I had finished work earlier, I had a nice break, and being in Potts Point is the best place for a holiday. The flat is in a great location, near some of the best restaurants and cafes in Potts Point. Its a beautiful area for walks around the neighborhood, near the wharf. The flat is older style, but in excellent condition. There are magnificent 360 degree views on the rooftop! I recommend this place for your stay!

Mike is one of the most easy going guys ever and immediately makes you feel at home! He is all to happy to let you into his world and introduce you to the cool places to go, things to see and his love for art, music and culture definitely shines through with the tasteful art-deco furniture he has in his flat. The flat is in a great location to explore Sydney and the Potts Point scene and minutes from Kings X. I had a wonderful time during my stay there and made a friend for life!

I had a great stay with Mike! He's very friendly and a wonderful host. Truly a local around Potts Point/Kings Cross neighborhoods and have great recos for food and nightlife - even knows a great $5 pizza spot! 

The apartment is clean and spacious, and the location can't be beat! Super convenient to walk into CBD or up to shops in Paddington. 

I would recommend Mike's place to anyone visiting Sydney!

Awesome week in Sydney at Mike's apartment for me and my friend! Mike is a really nice person always here to help if you need information and make you feel home the first second you're at his place! and the plus is the view from the roof, just perfect ! also if you like walking everything is pretty close , KingCross station is not far by walk so easy to go to Bondi beach or anywhere else.
you can choose this place without a doubt!

Mike is a very easy going, friendly host and gave me plenty of privacy. The apartment is good value and very well located: just a thirty minute walk to the CBD / Opera House or a $15 cab fare. This is an old but clean building and clean apartment. It is fairly noisy from the street traffic in the morning and early evening but I found I got used to it quickly. There a lots of places to eat and a supermarket is very convenient. I cooked for myself in Mike's kitchen with no dramas. Overall, this is excellent value. I would stay again, definitely.

Mike is a friendly and great guy. The apartment is clean and in a great location. Lots of nice cafes and restaurants near by. Room isn't great with sound proof against the street noise and the place does not look as new as the pictures but overall good value.
It's a beautiful place and Mike is the perfect host! Thank you!

Mike was very nice and helpful to us. We stayed at Mike's place for 10 days and really felt at home. The appartment is spacious, conveniently located and the view from the rooftop is certainly one of the best you can get in Sydney. Potts Point is furthermore a very nice area with a wide choice of restaurants and bars. We would love to come back!

Mike is a great host and a great guy. He made us feel very welcome and gave us lots of advice on everything from where to eat, to things to do on the weekend and areas of the city to property hunt in!

The apartment is in a great location - easy to get to everywhere in the city and out to the coast. It has everything you need and plenty of privacy (Mikes hardly ever there!).

There's no Wi-fi in the apartment, which we were a little worried about, but Mike gave us a list of cafes / libraries etc to go to and we also found a few others. We also get a Optus PAYG sim with 1.5GB of data for $30 (£15GBP) which worked out quite well. 

Would definitely recommend and v happy to have made a friend through AirB&B!

Mike is an awesome host: very hospitable, warm, knowledgeable about his city and neighbourhood (he could wven advise on yoga classes;-) The apartment is beautiful and comfy, in the Manhattan if Sydney. I had to change the dates of my stay and he was ever so generous and understanding.
Mike is a very friendly and relaxed host. The apartment is a spacious Art Deco style in a very vibrant area. I highly recommend as its great value for this area.

Mike was friendly, very helpful and easy to communicate with. The apartment is such perfect location for whoever wants to spend a bit of time visiting Sydney - with a awesome view up there! We had a lovely weekend, and now are in love with Potts Point :)

I had a fantastic stay with Mike. The house is nice and so is the room. The rooftop terrace has amazing views! Mike is an extremely easy going and friendly guy. He showed me a few good places and made me feel home immediately. Potts Point is a great area to stay in and I can recommend Mike’s place to anyone visiting Sydney!

Staying at Potts Point was brilliant. It's close to anything you could need, the neighborhood is calm and the bay is very pretty.

Mike was very warm and welcoming; being an excellent host all around. I can definitely recommend spending at least a few nights in Potts Point.

The apartment is simple, roomy, comfortable and in a very convenient location. The area has lots of things to do and is 10-15 minutes walking from King's across station. The rooftop on the 10th floor gives you amazing and unobstructed views of the city! 

As for cleanness and luxury don't expect too much, it's a man's place, so be prepared for a little anarchy.. But on the other hand you will get a nice sense of comfort and freedom, which I personally enjoyed very much!

Mike is a talented young guy, extrovert and easy going, multicultural and well educated so talking to him fills you with lots of positive energy! He will also give you all kind of hints and information you might need about the city and make sure you will feel like home!

I had a great week staying at Mike's beautiful apartment in Potts Point.  It's a fantastic location, walking distance to the city centre and with everything you could need right on your door step. Mike was a friendly and relaxed host and it was a very easy stay. The apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would recommend Mike's place to anyone coming to Sydney, and as an area Potts Point is ideal.
Mike was really friendly. Gave lots of advice about where to go. Very hospitable!
Mike is extremely nice and hospitable. He made my stay extremely easy. The apartment is in a very convenient area.

Mike ist ein sehr herzlicher, offener und sehr entspannter Gastgeber. Er gab mir viele Tipps, was ich in Sydney unternehmen und anschauen kann.
Die Wohnung ist wie beschrieben und liegt sehr zentral in Potts Point, einem Stadtteil, von dem man aus gut alles zu Fuß machen kann und in ca. 15-20 Minuten auch zu Fuß am Sydney-Operahaus ist (Weg durch den Botanischen Garten). Potts Point selbst ist ein lebendiger Stadtteil mit einer anregenden Kneipen- und Lokaldichte.

name: Grande chambre double -Plateau
summary: Belle grande chambre double (salon et chambre) sur la magnifique rue Fabre dans le Plateau.  Accès aux transports en commun et aux attraits touristiques de Montréal.  Vielle maison rénovée avec cachet. Accès aux balcons. Quartier tranquille.
description: Belle grande chambre double (salon et chambre) sur la magnifique rue Fabre dans le Plateau.  Accès aux transports en commun et aux attraits touristiques de Montréal.  Vielle maison rénovée avec cachet. Accès aux balcons. Quartier tranquille.

name: Bright, Cozy room in Brooklyn
summary: Large cozy room in a big apartment in a historic neighborhood! Clinton Hill has a real neighborhood feel. It's relaxed, charming and feels like home immediately.  Its a vibrant, diverse place that has so much to do without a lot of hyper activity.
space: Modern, minimal and cozy.
description: Large cozy room in a big apartment in a historic neighborhood! Clinton Hill has a real neighborhood feel. It's relaxed, charming and feels like home immediately.  Its a vibrant, diverse place that has so much to do without a lot of hyper activity. Modern, minimal and cozy. Wifi, cable television, roof top. I interact with guests as necessary to fill them in on neighborhood details and any questions they have about the space. It's a classic Brooklyn neighborhood with beautiful architecture and loads of diversity. G Train at Classon Avenue is the nearest  subway stop a 10 minute walk away. The B48 and B61 bus stop are a one minute walk from the apartment. The apartment is equipped with professional kitchen tools, and a Berkey water filtration system. Iron and ironing board are available as well.
neighborhood_overview: It's a classic Brooklyn neighborhood with beautiful architecture and loads of diversity.
notes: The apartment is equipped with professional kitchen tools, and a Berkey water filtration system. Iron and ironing board are available as well.
transit: G Train at Classon Avenue is the nearest  subway stop a 10 minute walk away. The B48 and B61 bus stop are a one minute walk from the apartment.
access: Wifi, cable television, roof top.
interaction: I interact with guests as necessary to fill them in on neighborhood details and any questions they have about the space.
house_rules: Guests should feel free to enjoy the space as they like and be mindful of making loud noise late at night.  If the kitchen is used, guests are to leave the kitchen and appliances clean and ready for use. Examples of this is are: clean off countertops and stove top after cooking.  Only the guest (s) listed on the reservation are allowed in the apartment.  If you have questions about any other house rules please feel free to ask.

host.host_about:
Hi. I'm Edgar. I'm from NY and travel whenever I can get away from work. I love food and exploring cities. Foreign cultures are very interesting to me. I like to enjoy different places as the locals do. 
I am also an air bnb host and have been for a couple of years. I understand what it's like to have guests and always do my best to be a great guest as well.

reviews.comments: Probably this apparat has the best bed in all NYC!!!! Best dreams ever! Thank you Edgar for the warm hosting!

Thank you SO MUCH Edgar for your kindness and all your help during my stay. I really enjoy my wonderful big bed and my cosy and clean room. Very practical and well furnished with a lamp, a huge dressing, two nigthstands, a big mirror, a huge drawer...
Most of all, I'm very glad to know Edgar because he was very helpful (with my arrival and the cab, with my glove, with my last day... Private stuffs :) ).
And I will miss our conversations! Thanks a lot Edgar, really, hope to see you soon for what you know, I won't forget :)
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Edgar is a wonderful and very considerate host. In every location in the apartment he has thoughtfully saved a space for his guest. The guest has their own space in the fridge, shower and medicine cabinet to put food and personal items. He takes care of the little details that make you feel at home. The room is very big and spacious. In addition to a chest of 6 drawers there is a closet and a bookcase for storage. The room is actually bigger than it looks in pictures!
Edgar was on point for food recommendations in Brooklyn and Williamsburg as well. He knows his city inside-out so he is a great resource and always willing to help.

I had a fantastic stay at this place! Edgar will really go out of his way to accommodate you. Everyone in that apartment is incredibly nice!

I'd say this place is perfect for people coming to Brooklyn for business and students coming to Brooklyn/NYC to do internships. It's also great for anybody visiting Brooklyn that wants to live like a local.

Overall: friendly people, accommodating host, decent location, great value

I'd definitely be willing to stay again!
Edgar is a very accommodating host. He left work early to meet me, let me in and show me around. He was easy to communicate with and compromising.
The stay was great, Edgar was very welcoming. Really thankfull for an extra blanket and hair dryer. Clean room and comofrtable bed. 10 min walking to metro.
Alex was accommodating and his listing is quite accurate. His space is very clean and the bed is ridiculously comfortable :)

Really glad I stayed here, Edgar was really helpful and welcoming. His apartment is really warm and cozy to escape that NYC winter! Incredibly comfortable bed, loads of storage space, super clean and relaxed. Would definitely stay here again.

My stay at Edgar's place was great. He is very welcoming and answered all my questions. 
His place is in a local part of Brooklyn with the MTA 10mins walk away. The area is nice with local shops, Deli, Diner close by. 
The room was nice and clean with a view of the Manhattan skyline in the distance. 
The bed is one of the most comfortable I've slept on in a while.
Edgar is super friendly and we had excellent conversations he is a cool cat to get on with. He even offered his WiFi hotspots account to help me out when travelling around the city. 
If you want to live like a local stay here, its chill and the bedroom is comfortable. I'd stay here again.

This place has been the best one I've ever stayed at in Brooklyn. It is centrally located between downtown, Williamsburg, Bushwick, Forte Green...Etc. Myrtle Avenue and the Pratt area have a lot to offer round the clock.
The host Edgar is super cool, friendly, communicative, helpful and creative. A generous soul whom I had the great pleasure to meet. 
The room it self is very clean, bright and tidy and the bed is super comfy.
I would strongly recommend this room to anyone coming to Brooklyn!
comfy bed, great views from window. Otherwise, basic room in a simple 3 BR apartment. Rustic, authentic. 10-15 min walk to subway. Manhattan by subway 30 min.

Edgar was extremely helpful!  He gave me various directions and even let me come back and look for an item I misplaced. The home is clean and his system is very well managed. Access to the kitchen was a very nice bonus. Bathroom is well kept. Neighborhood is safe. Apartment is located one block from the B62 bus line-which can easily transport you to subway lines to Manhattan.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Edgar does an excellent job, I would recommend booking with him to anybody. The apartment is keep clean, modern, and simple. Great experience.
Nice room. Had an issue with a locked door late at night and Edgar handled it quickly. I appreciate his hosting.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very clean place and accommodating host
Edgar is a very nice and understanding host.  I made a reservation last minute and he promptly responded.  His bedroom is spacious with a comfy bed.  He is friendly and easy to get along with.

I had a fantastic time staying at Edgar's place. He is a great host and helps you wherever he can. 
He really does his best to make it a comfortable stay. He had put a desk and a chair into my room, because I was there for my study for 3 weeks. 
He also knows good restaurants and places to go to. 
The house was cleaned up and the bed was amazing. 
I would defenitely come back.
Edgar was a great host, very helpful and friendly. The bed was comfortable and the room was light and airy!

Edgar's place is awesome! I felt like at home. Really close to grocery stores, restaurants, bars, etc. He was super nice and helped me a lot providing tips, directions, places to go, etc. I will definitively stay there again!
The journey has been amazing! Edgar is very friendly and helpful.Thouse is nice, very clean, comfortable and you can easily join Manhattan.

Edgar was very welcoming when I got to his place. He gave me great directions for getting around. There's a train nearby (maybe ~15 minute walk), as well as several bus routes. It's easy to get places from Edgar's place, but the place itself is in a nice residential area.

The room was very comfortable, especially the bed. Although I didn't really use the kitchen that much, it's nice to know that it's there for use.

If I came back to NYC, I'd definitely stay at Edgar's place again!
Good location, ridiculously comfortable bed! Edgar is a great host

Great place. comfy bed. Lock on your door. Clean. Lots of Jewish families and schools close by so it does seem family friendly and safe even late at night. I Did not see a lot of police in the area. Cab rides here are fairly priced. The bars close by all seem to have the same kinds of items with different themes for basically the same price....I would venture further to eat even for breakfast. Close to Brooklyn bridge and Williamsburg Bridge.
Trendy, clean and big room with lots of sunshine! Bed was super comfortable and the air conditioning worked smoothly! Would recommend it to anyone!

I'd definitely recommend Edgar's place. I didn't actually get to meet Edgar until I was checking out as our schedules didn't match but he always responded quickly to my messages. And when I did finally meet him he seemed pretty cool! Checking in was easy and the room was as described - pretty big with lots of storage. One big plus was the air conditioning in the room which was definitely appreciated as NYC was pretty hot when I was there.
Edgar's place is clean, quiet, and an easy walk to a few subway stops. He was really friendly and quick to communicate with. Definitely recommend.

I stayed at Edgars place a couple of weeks ago and it's really good -the bed always get's good reviews and they are all true its so comfortable-. Its a bright airy room and quiet. Met Edgar only the once he's very friendly and told me little of the history of the area. I was also able to check in to suit me. 
Myrtle St 2 streets away is full of shops, takeaways.restaurants an organic supermarket as well as a normal one. You must eat at Thai Myrtle, or Myrtle Thai whichever way it's written it's superb.
    Subway is 5 mins walk, one change to Manhattan line. You can also walk to Williamsburg Bridge.
   Yep great place to stay, Richard.
Ps Ignore the (Hidden by Airbnb) map picture it really dosent do the area any favour's its a very nice residential area with several parks.

It was a great place, very clean and spacious. Just like the pictures.
Edgar always helped me with some advices and information

I really enjoyed my stay here and would highly recommend it. The room is large, bright and clean. Edgar is a great host. Clinton Hill is really diverse area. Good coffee and great supermarkets--Myrtle Avenue is fa has everything you'll need. Classon street station is close. Manhattan is between 35-49 minutes away.
Minimalistic

Staying with Edgar was a fantastic experience. It was exactly as described and he left very detailed notes on how to enter the building and what to do in case he wasn't home when checking in. I checked in late Wednesday evening and left early Saturday night. I only interacted with him in person, Friday morning, but I had a wonderful conversation. I was worried it would be awkward because I'm not the best around new people, but he was welcoming and very friendly. He offered great advice on things around the area when I had questions. I highly recommend staying with Edgar to anyone. Plus the bed was super comfy.
Great spot, clean, minimal feel. Comfortable. Edgar is a very hospitable host.
His place is so cozy and comfortable that I really enjoyed my stay in Brooklyn.

I would definitely stay at Edgar's place. The entire process from check-in to check-out was extremely smooth and the room was very comfortable and exactly as advertised. I had everything that I needed.

Todo fue perfecto desde el inicio hasta el final
Muchísimas gracias a ti
Very positive experience. Big, quiet room and nice apartment. Edgar was very helpful with directions as well. Strongly recommended.

This is very cost-effective place that you'll be satisfied with unless you're expecting too much. The room and the shared space is quite bigger than I had thought (cozy doesn't always mean 'small'). Though I was supposed to share bedroom/kitchen with others but I felt like I took the whole place to myself. Edgar is super-friendly and made sure I got checked in with ease. The neighborhood was very safe - I could see children play around till late. At first walk it may feel a bit distant from the nearest subway station with your heavy suitcase dragging you back but it actually is not that far. Close to many restaurants/grocery stores. Highly recommended if you are planning a budget travel and you know what typical apartments in Brooklyn/Queens are like.
I liked the place as a good place to spend the nights. The location had a good conection to the subway and bus system which made it easy to get to manhatten to look at everything

Edgar was very accommodating! I literally was there for less than 24 hours and it was one of the best rooms I've had in awhile with Airbnb! Edgar's communication was perfect made my day trip run ten times smoother! I will be booking his room very soon!
Clean apartment. Edgar was a great host.

Edgar's place is super clean and easy to find! Even though that I did not meet him personally, but his direction was very clear so it's easy to access his apartment. Surely a great choice if you want to stay in Brooklyn.
Edgar was a perfect host ! The room was exactly as described, and I had a very pleasant stay. Highly recommended !

Safe building near many transit options, coffee shops, bars, restaurants, and grocery stores. Lovely room with plenty of drawers/closet space. Great bed and lots of natural light. Great water pressure in the shower. Fantastic rooftop! Edgar was very communicative when it came to check in and check out- very flexible to my schedule, and offered great suggestions for things to do in the area. A wonderful stay altogether.
Edgar's place was really clean same as photos. And his instruction was really easy to find his place. It was great place for me.

The room is perfect and comfortable. Wonderful bed, awesome rooftop, great hosts, flexible check-in, great communication, great location. Apartment had everything I needed to feel like home. Would HIGHLY recommend Edgar's place.

Highly recommend. Room was spotless, well decorated, and super big. First Airbnb where the photos actually look exactly like the space, if not better. Didn't meet the host, but he was repsonsive. Would definitely stay again.
This was the perfect room for my very short stay overnight. Clean, cozy bed, and the check-in was easy.

The room was exactly as pictured, the bathroom was wicked clean and there's a lovely view from the roof! While I didn't meet Edgar, he was easy to reach and periodically checked in via messenger to make sure everything was going well. Such a lovely place, would definitely recommend! Thanks Edgar!
Great stay - good value for money in a safe area of town.
Clean, nice room.

Loved my stay here! I was shocked at how quiet the neighborhood was. Felt very safe but close enough to some very nice bars and restaurants. Edgar was very warm and welcoming, and made my trip so much better.
Great space...better than expected . easy check-in, great communication

Edgar is a great host, very kind, helpful and easy to talk with and even though he was quite busy, he would always get in touch and ask if everything was all right and give great food/coffee recommendations. 
The room was clean, spacious and had plenty of room to put away your clothes and stuff, which is always nicer than having to live out of your suitcase, plus the bed was really comfortable.
The apartment is 10 min away from the G train and there are several bus stops to e.g, Williamsburg/Greenpoint even closer by, so getting around and exploring the city was really easy. 
All in all another great AirBnb experience and I can only recommend staying with Edgar and hope I'll have the chance to come back soon!

Check in & Check out was a breeze as he provided detailed instructions. The room was clean and contained everything I needed for a short stay. Edgar and his flatmate were so lovely and welcoming, they truly made it feel like a home away from home. I would absolutely stay here again!

For a trip to new York a great Place to stay! The Area is Safe + very Quiet. A nice little goody is, that One of the best donut Stores in nyc is just 10 minutes away and close to the Metro that takes you to Manhattan. Definetly would stay here again

Even though a family emergency called me back home much earlier than expected, I had a most pleasant stay at Edgars very comfortable and spacious place! The self check in/check out is super easy, and while I didn't meet Edgar in person, he was very responsive to any messages and checked in periodically to make sure everything was ok.
The room itself has a great bed and plenty of space to leave your belongings. The neighborhood is safe and quiet, with lots of nearby shops, cafes, and restaurants, and good connections to Subway and buses. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

Lovely, quiet area. I'm from Manhattan but my boyfriend was coming into town so I got a bnb for more space and privacy as I'm between moving. Edgar was super available to me although I didn't meet him until the end. He clears a space for you in the fridge and medicine cabinet, provides extra towels, etc. his roommate was also super sweet and friendly when I met him once. Other than that I saw or heard from no one and had complete privacy. I would highly recommend it if you want a more residential type area that's also very close to the middle of everything. It's a good balance of busy and quiet and they were great hosts.
Zimmer war genau wie beschrieben, gut ausgestattet und sauber. Der Gastgeber Edgar war hilfsbereit und freundlich. Hat alles wunderbar gepasst, klare Empfehlung für diese Unterkunft in Brooklyn.

A one-of-a-kind find. My stay here has been one of the comfiest in my experience on here. Super clean, tasteful, minimal room with everything you’d need to have a great trip in New York. Edgar is quick to respond to any lingering questions and is extremely friendly. I ventured into Manhattan every day of my stay here by subway and was able to visit the most areas on foot. Definitely recommended!

Merci Edgar pour ton hospitalité, appartement parfait à Brooklyn à 5min à pied d’un station de métro, et le quartier est plutôt tranquille !
A la prochaine !!

Edgar is a really great host. He's flexible, helpful and very accommodating. The place is very clean and the bedroom is very comfortable. Although I was only there a night, the area wasn't really much compared with say, Williamsburg, where I had stayed previously. It felt kinda rough.
Edgar was a very accommodating host and his place was extremely spacious and quiet. Great value and overall great stay.

Edgar was very responsive and friendly, providing clear communication. He keeps the place clean and well kept. The room is sizable and the bed is comfortable, with plenty of closet space and drawers to house your things. A nice value for this spot! Will consider again when returning to NYC.
I had a pleasant stay at Edgar’s place - great value for money, plus the convenience, comfort and safety I wanted for my accommodations while visiting NYC. Thanks  to Edgar for hosting.
I‘ve really enjoyed the stay! Edgar is great!
I had a great stay at Egars. The room was really nice and clean!
Great place!

Edgar and his roomie were both great dudes. And I commend them for trying out the Malort I brought from Chicago. That takes guts. Edgar was really friendly, and even invited me and my friends to his bar. He went out of his way to make me feel comfortable and made me feel at home. It was the first time I ever booked an Airbnb room, and not the entire home, and I was a little weary of what the experience would be like, but I am happy to say it was excellent and I felt like I moved in and these were my two new roommates. They were great.  I will likely always stay at Edgar's when I visit New York, if the room is available.  Thanks for being so nice, Edgar!
Great hosts and value. Friendly, easy going hosts.  Definitely would recommend.
Edgar was friendly and quick to respond to communications, left clear check-in instructions, and provided a spacious, clean, comfortable room. I'd recommend him to anyone.
Nice place, about a ten minute walk from the subway. Edgar is helpful.
Edgar is very nice and helping, I had a great time staying at his place. I totally recommend.
A lovely room with shared bathroom. Approx 10 minute walk to Classon Ave G Train station.

Edgar’s apartment is in a great location, just fifteen minutes away from the Classon Avenue Subway stop. He is also very helpful, with speedy responses, and generous. I had a slight problem with noise on my second night, but that was no fault of his and he was great at acknowledging my concerns. Besides that, my stay was quiet and trouble-free (I never even met him in person!). Thanks Edgar!
Always love staying at Edgar’s!

Nice big room at Edgar’s place! Good detailed instructions for lockbox and keyed entries. Sweet view of night lights in Manhattan from 3rd floor room. Friendly, quiet roommate. Excellent drinking water filter system.

I really enjoyed my stay at Edgar´s place! He and his room mate are sweet down-to-earth guys. The apt has an airy serene atmosphere and the guest room is just perfect with ample space for all your stuff and a huge super comfortable bed. I´d love to stay again when I´m back in NYC.
I love Edgar's place. It's neat and quiet, and Edgar provides everything you may need. Besides, he is a very kind man, and replies messages quickly.
Edgar was so helpful the few times I did talk him! The room was super comfy loved it! It was easy to get to places from the room!

Great room in Brooklyn with a self check-in. 

Thank you Edgar!

The space is comfortable and clean, and Edgar is very friendly, making me feel at home. He was flexible and understanding when my travel plans went awry! The apartment is 10 mins walk from the local subway, overall about 30 minutes trip into Manhattan and close enough to local Brooklyn amenities and sights.
Very clean!!

Edgar was kind and available to answer questions. The place was simple and humble. It was correct. The room is big and clean. The bed was very confortable. The environnement is not noisy. You sleep well. 10mn from the train station. A bit far from Manhattan but a close enough to Williamsburg.

Edgar’s place is wonderful! I totally enjoyed my stay there and can absolutely recommend this place to everybody who wants to visit New York! 

P.S. skyline view in bed
Great experience from start to finish.   Very communicative and the room was in great condition.
Great place to chill and unwind after a long day.
Edgar was a really great host! I would recommend this stay to all of you!
Clean room in a quiet neighborhood, good communication with the host.
Great host, perfect communications, perfect location for visit Brooklyn and Manhattan.
Really comfy place and great place albeit a bit secluded from everything.
Great location, great apartment.

The bedroom is great, really spacious with a partial view of Manhattan and a very comfy bed. The bathroom is tiny especially when being shared with 2 other people and wasn't particularly clean. There isn't anything to do in the area and the nearest subway is 15mins but then again that is reflected in the price which I would say was very good value. Edgar seemed nice I met him only briefly. There was one night when Edgar and his roommate were up up at 3am and his roommate was talking really loudly and swearing, which I found annoying as it woke me up.
Edgar was very communicative and the check in instructions were clear. The room looked exactly like the pictures. I did not know that he had another roommate in the appartment until the morning.

Reviews are so accurate. Edgar and his roommate were so hospitable. Clean, easy to talk with, friendly, and offered great recommendations. The area is safe due to it being an Orthodox Jewish neighborhood, so very quiet. Will be staying again for sure :)

Edgar's place is really well located, close to a lot of shops and restaurants. His place is really beautiful and really cozy. The room was spacious and comfy, and there is everything you need. Edgar is really friendly and always here if you need anything. Highly recommend!
Nice guy, great communication.
Todo perfecto. Volveria sin ninguna duda. Barrio tranquilo y edgar siempre disponible para cualquier cosa

Camera spaziosa e pulita, a 5/10 minuti a piedi dalla fermata della metro. Edgar é molto disponibile, risponde velocemente ai messaggi, mi ha fornito indicazioni dettagliate per trovare l'appartamento e fare il check in quando sono arrivato (tarda notte) oltre ad avermi dato consigli e chiarito dubbi sulla mia permanenza a New York. Consigliato!

Edgar's place was great. I arrived super late and the self check in was easy and throughly described in the instructions. It was a quite, quaint and solid stay for the evening. Wish I stayed a few more nights! Its the simple things when everything works as you think it should that really help ease you in on your stay. Recommend the stay!

I occupied one of two guest rooms and I found the accomodation safe, quiet, and comfortable. I didn't use the kitchen but the shower had great water pressure. During my 3 day visit, NY was experiencing a heat wave, but the A/C in the room worked great. I had a great night sleep very night, totally undisturbed by any noise from outside. Great bed and ample space to move around the room. Highly recommended. If you will depend on the subway, ita a bit of a walk, maybe 15 minutes from the G train.
Edgar’s place is clean, tidy, and well kept. Very close to all the public transport that you will need. Overall a great stay and I would highly recommend to anyone.
My stay at Edgar’s was awesome! He made everything easily accessible; from check-in, my stay, to check-out, I have no complaints! I’d stay here again. Thanks a lot Edgar!

This is a great apartment to stay in. The subway is a short walk away and connects you to all of NYC. Can see the NYC skyline from the room which is a great bonus. Edgar is a great host, with helpful tips for the Brooklyn area! A great place to stay!
A great place in a vibrant neighborhood. A considerate and very responsive host. Highly recommended.

The place was clean and well taken care of. Edgar responded to my messages promptly. The location is meh but you get what you pay for. There isn’t anything downstairs and it’s a 15-minute walk to restaurants/bars/coffee shops
I stayed one night and it was heavenly sent.  Close to cool bars and an amazing coffee joint.

Edgar s place was all I needed. Very easy to get in using a lockbox ! Nice and spacious room equipped with an airco which is, at this time of the year, quite appreciable in New York. The neighbourhood is safe and calm. And 5-10 min walk from the apartment there is a street (Myrtle st.) with bars and restaurants !
You will have a great host.
I would like to thank Edgar and his roommate for their heartwarming welcome!  I had a wonderful time in their appartement and I felt completely at home. Very convenient location. I recommend it 100%
It was a good experience
Bed was incredible and the room air conditioning worked great on very hot NYC days. Edgar was super helpful and was easy to get a hold of, and gave recommendations. Definitely recommend!
Good place to stay in NYC. Highly recommend !!!
Edgar and his roommate are great guys! The room was exactly like the pictures. I enjoyed my stay and would highly recommend it to others.
edgar is a perfect host! he and his roomate are adorable, always friendly and helpful. favorite place in nyc!

The staying room is cozy and Edgar is kind. He have experience to go Japan.
The staying area is safety but the distance from nearest station is 10mins and at night it’s less pedestrian traffic. So you may be use UBER or Lyft, Example:women.
Generally, you should use bus, the bus stop exists from 3mins distance.
Overall, Edagr's house is so nice! Please stay!

A lovely large, bright, comfortable bedroom in Brooklyn. On the edge of Clinton Hill, the area is fairly quiet, but it's only a 12 minute walk to the Metro, or a half hour walk into Williamsburg. BKG Coffee Roasters is a great coffee spot just 5 mins walk away too.

Edgar was super friendly whenever we did cross paths, and although we didn't spend a lot of time in the shared spaces of the flat it felt well kept and well equipped.  All in all we found it an excellent value and comfortable spot for our few days in the city.

Totalmente recomendable. La comunicación con el anfitrión es muy rápida y fluida. Está ubicado en una zona muy tranquila del que no hay problema de acceso para moverse a otras zonas de NYC, bien por metro y autobús. La habitación es bastante espaciosa y luminosa. Volvería a repetir.

Edgar's place is a delightful haven in Brooklyn. Space is clean and stylish with all the amenities you need. Shops are close on Myrtle Av. and the walk to the G train is not too far.  Check in was really easy and the stay was totally relaxing! Everything about this room is great and I really enjoyed my stay. Thank you!
All is exactly as in the description! We had a great stay! Thanks Edgar!

Very nice place. Clean, spacious, plain in a very good way! Conveniently located for exploring Brooklyn/the Pratt Institute neighborhood. Public transportation in walking distance. Great communication before and during the stay with Edgar, the host.
I had a great stay. Edgar is awesome!

The room was massive compared to what you normally get from Airbnb and the bed was the best I've ever slept on! Edgar is very helpful and quick to respond, unfortunately I didn't get to meet him in person during my stay. The area around the flat was not very much to my liking but it was easy enough to get the subway and travel around. Good value for the price overall!
Good person to talk to
Did not get to meet Edgar due to conflicting schedules, but communication was outstanding despite not physically meeting. Outstanding room, great place to stay.

Great value clean accommodation in Brooklyn walkable to both the trendy Williamsburg district and Brooklyn bridge. Also handy for buses and subway. 
Communication with Edgar (the host) was efficient and his easy going nature made it easy to feel comfortable at his apartment.

It was better than I expected. Clean, large, quiet space. Two huge windows with a view of the bridge from a distance. Great bed, in a nicely sized room. And easy communication with Edgar. I highly recommend!
Very easy to have a self check in.  It was a very private space, and did not have any issues with roommates. Very comfortable bed and room.

We had a great time staying at Edgar's place. He was very helpful, always responded quickly and gave us some extra tips. Room was clean with an amazing view on Manhattan. Check in was also super easy. Thanks for everything Edgar!
Acomodação muito confortável, cama grande e quarto muito limpo,  superou minhas expectativas.
Well kept, clean, easy to find . Nice quite area . Enough local places to grab food and drinks without the noise that comes with that normally
