Easy to find, comfortable room, worth the price.

It was a pleasure meeting you Edgar. And it is certainly a pleasure to say how wonderful our stay in your apartment was. It turned out to be exactly as depicted on the website. The living room and dining room were large and comfortable, the kitchen well-equipped, the bedrooms great, the building well-maintained and quiet. All was spotlessly clean and the linens and towels generously supplied. Thank you also for letting us leave the luggage for couple hours after we checked out. Also the roommate is super friendly and happy person. Thank you and I hope to book the same accommodation in the future.
Edgar was super friendly and hospitable! I only stayed one night, but would definitely recommend his place and come back.
Great location and value and felt so welcome. Highly highly recommend if you need a place to stay in New York.

Very clean and easy to get to other parts of Brooklyn/Manhattan from apartment. Fairly quiet and the bed/pillows were super comfy! My mom and I literally just crashed every night after being gone all day and it was perfect for that!
I would stay at Edgar’s place again. Very clean and tidy and good value.

Everything was 100% accurate, and the pictures don’t even make justice to the beautiful lighting that comes thru the windows in the bedroom. The apt is truly 10 min away (walking distance) from the G train which made the location perfect to easily get everywhere. The area is so quiet thats impossible not to relax after a long day. There are really good coffee shops and places to eat near by (around 1-2 blocks away) worth the try to check them out. The apt is super clean and it has everything that you may need during your stay. The bedroom is huge!! I had a lot of space which was great. Edgar was amazing. I have never had such a nice host. He made everything super easy along with his roommate and made me feel home the whole time that I stayed there. He also gave me so many recommendations! Thank you so much for making sure I was having a good stay.
Worked perfectly for my needs. No frills but comfortable, I slept well.
A large, comfortable room and and attentive host. If it was a bit closer to a subway station, it would be even better value.
amazing place would stay again
Nice position in Brooklyn.
Edgar is very kind & this apartment is great for a weekend stay. The bed & pillows are very very comfortable. The common area is beautiful as well.
Edgar's apartment was really great for the price, in a great location and the rooms are large and spacious. Would definitely stay again!

name: Excellent Location Gramercy Studio
summary: Charming & cozy studio apartment.  Steps away from Madison Square Park, Grammercy Park, and Irving Street with lovely bars and restaurants.  Recently renovated Apartment has full kitchen and laundry.  Steps away to N,R,6 trains, and Union Square.
space: Lofty open and fully furnished studio with 12-foot ceilings and Oak hardwood floors.  Open kitchen and living area with island, which includes: LG laundry / dryer machine, dishwasher, microwave, oven, stovetop and wine refrigerator.   All kitchen necessities are provided so you are able to cook a fabulous dinner.  Extra towels and linens for a queen size bed are provided.  Very comfortable couch for 3rd person does not pull out.  Heat, A/C,  HD TV with basic, basic cable via a hi-def antenna, and electricity are all also included in monthly rental fees.  Keyed elevator access to floor for added security.
description: Charming & cozy studio apartment.  Steps away from Madison Square Park, Grammercy Park, and Irving Street with lovely bars and restaurants.  Recently renovated Apartment has full kitchen and laundry.  Steps away to N,R,6 trains, and Union Square. Lofty open and fully furnished studio with 12-foot ceilings and Oak hardwood floors.  Open kitchen and living area with island, which includes: LG laundry / dryer machine, dishwasher, microwave, oven, stovetop and wine refrigerator.   All kitchen necessities are provided so you are able to cook a fabulous dinner.  Extra towels and linens for a queen size bed are provided.  Very comfortable couch for 3rd person does not pull out.  Heat, A/C,  HD TV with basic, basic cable via a hi-def antenna, and electricity are all also included in monthly rental fees.  Keyed elevator access to floor for added security. Guest access is for studio apartment only.  This is not a shared space.  You are renting your own studio apartment with a bathroom, kitchen,
neighborhood_overview: Best hood ever!  You are a block away from the famous Shake Shack and Madison Square Park (MSP) and within walking distance from Flatiron, Gramercy, Chelsea, Murry Hill, East Village and even lower Midtown from this perfectly-located Manhattan apartment! In the immediate vicinity, there are always activities going on in and around MSP: Concerts, lounging on the lawn, and Madison Square Eats food tents in the summer and fall.  Eately is also across the street from MSP and you can purchase some of the freshest ingredients to cook in your huge kitchen or eat in their amazing mini restaurants or those in in the surrounding neighborhoods.  If you want some awesome dining recommendations then head over to Irving street in Gramercy, just four blocks away.  My absolute favorite is Casa Mono.  Pete's Tavern is also a great place for burgers and beer.  There is also Ichabods and Yama sushi.  Molly's on 3rd ave. is also an very old authentic Irish Bar that you should check out for a beer or to es
notes: We have a keyed elevator for security.  Nobody can access our floor except for those who live on it.  The key is a pain to replace so if the keys are lost, there will be a $50 replacement fee.  So try not to loose those keys:)
transit: One of the best benefits of this centralized location is how close you are to public transportation that will easily get you to anywhere in New York City. You are steps away from the 6 train at 23rd street.  The 6 will get you everywhere on the east side.  If you just walk to Madison Square Park at 23rd you can jump on the N and R trains which take you up and down central Manhattan and the upper west side.  Union Square is walkable and from there you can get on almost any train going anywhere.  Take the L from union square to the bedford stop to explore Williamsburg, Brooklyn or take the L to 8th avenue to explore the meatpacking district in Manhattan.
access: Guest access is for studio apartment only.  This is not a shared space.  You are renting your own studio apartment with a bathroom, kitchen, and bedroom area.  Elevator building 5th floor apartment.
interaction: I live next door and Im around to help out with anything under the sun and can also assist with tenants getting acclimated and acquainted with the City to the extent that it's helpful but I will otherwise stay out of your hair.
house_rules: Our building is somewhat small with very few neighbors who live in the building year-around.  I just ask that you are respectful of others during your visit.  ***Please let me know in advance of your arrival and departure times.  Early check in and late check out must be arranged in advance***

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Enjoying living in NYC and want to share with others.   I love using Airbnb for traveling and so now I am also a host.  I hope to explore as much of the world as possible- love friends and family, design, traveling, & NYC.

reviews.comments: This studio is just great!. Great location as well, close to everything and with the 6 metro line at just one block.  There is plenty of space for a studio in Manhattan and you get everything you need including dishwasher and washer/dryer. I will definetely consider this studio for my next stays in NY. Julia, the host,  is lovely. You can count on her in case you need of help,but the studio is so perfect that you will not need anyhing else other that the keys:-).

Julia was very responsive and made sure we had everything we could possibly need.  Great host.

Her apartment is, hands down, the best place I've stayed at in New York.  The apartment is beautiful, extremely clean, and spacious, and the location can't be beat!  I will definitely be booking this place for my next trip to NYC.

Just back from a long weekend in NYC at Julias place.  The flat is super nice, spotlessly clean, quiet + very spacious (rare for NYC!) and has everything that you would need.  The building itself is very typical New York loft style, and the location is exceptional - in the middle of Manhattan - so everything is easy and quick to get to!
Our interactions with Julia were really easy. She is responsive on-line and very welcoming in person, and even let us check out late so that we could spend the day roaming the city before our night flight (thanks J!).
All in all a great place to stay in the city, and a great host!
Julia was an awesome host, very accommodating. The apartment is cozy, very nicely outfitted, and in a great central location.
Julia was extremely helpful. The place was very clean, and had everything one would need in a home away from home.
Julia was a great host. She was accommodating and quick to respond to my messages. I would highly recommend staying in this apartment, especially if you want to be in the heart of the city.

Julia was great and the apartment felt like home right from the first moment. The apartment was very clean and had everything needed. Julia was always available if anything was ever needed. The convenience factor of the location combined with the quality of the apartment makes this a top pick for manhattan.

L'appartement de Julia est très bien situé, à quelques minutes du métro dans un quartier sympa. Il était propre et spacieux. Literie confortable (et propre!). Il était très appréciable d'avoir un lave linge, un lave vaisselle, fer et planche a repasser...etc...
Beaucoup de rangements également. 
L'accueil par Julia fut bon. 
Malheureusement, pour notre départ, nous avons mis 1h30 pour réussir à la joindre alors que nous l'attendions depuis tout ce temps pour lui remettre les clés. 
Très bon séjour néanmoins, à recommander.

Julias apt was perfect! We had an amazing time there and everything was just like the pictures shows. The apt location is impecable and strategic to move around the island. Julia was always available during my stay and super helpfull. Surely recommend the apt and i  hopefully can come back soon!! Thank you Julia!!! :)
Very clean and nice apartment, Park avenue stores were very convenient and the Gramercy Park activities for kids were perfect for us. The host was very friendly and efficient. Highly recommended!

Julia's apartment is very comfortable, clean and has a well equipped kitchen. It is located close to subway, parks and shops. Perfect for 1 or 2. I have rented it for a 2 weeks working visit in NYC. Julia is very friendly, and her instructions for stay, checking in and out, and communications about this was very clear. I will certainly look for renting her apartment for my next working visit and will recommend it to friends and colleagues.

Great little studio in the heart of Manhattan. Communication was fantastic, check-in was smooth. Julia lives right next door but we had no need to contact her for our stay. The apartment is in a secure building also, which is important for NYC

Great location - probably the most convenient location one could be in when visiting Manhattan. The apartment was of a very good size and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. It made our visit to New York a better experience as we were glad to return to it each night after loads of walking each day. 
Not too much noise except for sirens (that cannot be helped) as it did not face a street.

Julia was friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again if we came back to New York.
uma excelente estadia, com todo o conforto e harmonia como se estivessemos em nossa propria casa! um apartamento com todos os itens necessarios e em excelente estado!
Great location. Apartment is as advertised. Host was very responsive and helpful. Can't ask for anything more than that!
The apartment is great for living as a local; great location and very helpful appliances (washing machine!!). Julia is very kind and always responds promptly. Definitely would stay here again.

Very accomodating host, flexible with leaving our luggage and checkout time. Awesome location and good sized studio, very clean. Lots of appliances: Iron, washer-dryer were a blessing after weeks of travel driving through Italy.

Overall we had a terrific stay here. The flat was clean and well presented but with some building works going on towards the rear of the building. The location is a perfect base to explore all of NYC and there are plenty of local coffee stops for breakfast as well as relaxed bars for a drink in the evening after a long day out. Julia was very helpful and looked after our bags after we checked out for our last day until the later flight.
Wonderful apartment in an excellent location. Julia is great to work with. You won't be disappointed.

Julia's place was amazing and we loved the vibe of the entire apartment, definitely did not feel like a studio. It was extremely clean and the location was super convenient to all the main lines. Julia was also very prompt and responsive throughout all communication. We loved the 5 star hospitality, cant wait to stay here again !

Julia's place is better in person! Her home is very well maintained, clean and convenient for people like us who like to vacation with home conveniences (i.e. kitchen, washing machine). There are a variety of art pieces strewn throughout the home, which makes lounging around the house a true delight. It truly seemed as though each furniture piece and even the towels and plates were carefully selected and well curated for the "Julia Home" experience. Fun to eat and live in! She also left us breakfast (coffee and oatmeal) and snacks to enjoy in the morning so it was truly a bed and breakfast spot! Location is conveniently located by the 6 subway stop and a walk away from one of my favorite coffee spots, Gregory! As a previous New Yorker, it was truly a pleasant stay! Sad to be leaving the city, but was so pleased to have stayed at Julia's!

The location is truly convenient and you can get anywhere in the city by subway reasonably fast. The neighborhood is quiet and safe.  Although the price is slightly higher, you're really paying for location here.  My only complaint would be the hot water in the shower - the hot water tends to run out halfway through the second shower.
Fantastic, perfect apartment and amazing host. Julia's communication was great. Will definitely look to stay here again when next in NYC. Was the perfect location for our stay. Thanks again.

Magnífico todo. Excelente ubicación, muy cerca varias paradas de metro. Incluso para ir andando, a escasos 15 minutos de sitios tan emblemáticos como Time's Square. 
El apartamento es tal cual se aprecia en las fotos, espacioso, muy limpio y todo nuevo. La cama increíblemente cómoda, lo cual se agradece después de un largo día caminando. 
Julia se mostró amable y dispuesta a ayudarte en todo lo que pudieras necesitar. Sin duda alguna recomendamos este apartamento a todo aquel que quiera disfrutar de unos días en esta maravillosa ciudad.

Julia's NYC apt was in a great location, and very accomodating.  Very clean, comfortable, & quiet!
Highly recommended.
She was very easy to communicate with, and even provided snacks and morning coffee.  5 stars!
Julia was a fantastic host.  The apartment is clean and stylish, just as in the photos.  Location is outstanding.  Close to restaurants and a walk from the subway.  Highly recommended.

Great apartment in an excellent location in Grammercy.   The subway stop is literally on the street corner and the line brings you downtown or uptown so a great base for getting around the city.  The apartment itself is spacious with all the facilities that one could want and Julia was super helpful throughout.  Highly recommended.

Julia is an excellent host, the photos really reflect what the apartment is like! The cleanliness is superb and Julia has thought of everything to make the stay comfortable! She is obviously very proud of her apartment in the way it's presented to guests! We spent our honeymoon here and the location is just brilliant for getting around the city and also staying local for a great bite to eat and fab drinking spots.
Great studio in a great area. I'd happily stay again and I recommend it to others. Thanks much!
I really enjoyed staying here. A great apartment and a great host as well. Everything is as described. I would hope to come back in the future.
Excellent location, very functional, beautiful kitchen

Appartement très bien situé, proche transports.
Appartement très propre et bien équipé.
Merci à Julia pour son accueil

Perfect location for both work and visit. Close to everything and metro. Julia is a great host for communication and made it extremely simple for check in and check out. Would definitely recommend and go back again.

We had such a comfortable stay at this apartment - excellent amenities, lovely touches of art on the walls, tastefully decorated and most importantly - in an amazing location. Julia has been a gracious and generous host and we definitely recommend this apartment to any traveller in NYC.
Great place to stay. The location was perfect for us. Julia was excellent to communicate with. Her apartment is really better than what the pictures show. We hope to be able to stay again sometime!
The apt was wonderful and the location was great for getting around the city  very clean and comfortable. Would definitely come back

Apartment is fabulous - big for NYC and facilities in the kitchen really great. 
Location is is fantastic and easy moving around either walking or very close to subway.. 
Restaurants and bars in the area provide excellent options and would recommend after trying, Gramercy Tavern, Eatlay, Rouge Tomate (chelsea but not far) and for great beer list the Taproom. 
Julia communication was fast, easy and helpful. 
Would recommend and would love to stay again.

Julia's place is perfectly situated to get anywhere in the city quickly and easily. Check in and check out were a breeze, and the apartment was spotless. The place had the feel of a place where someone lives and was very welcoming. Highly recommended

Julia has been an absolutely fabulous host from the moment we made the bookings through to when we checked out.    

Between our first enquiry and check-in, Julia has always been very responsive to our questions and request.  

Once checked in, she is ever so helpful with questions and local recommendations and yet fully respect privacy of the guests - for example, she requested for our consent before showing the place to a repairman to get a job quote.  

The apartment is conveniently located and all amenities, F&B and transportation are easily accessible.  

All in all, the excellent apartment combined with Julia as the very kind and hospitable host makes it very good first time AirB&B experience for us.

We had a wonderful stay at Julia's place. The apartment had tons of space. It was very clean and secure. Really liked that it was a very short walk to the subway. Julia was very friendly and super responsive. I would love to stay here again!

This was a great location. It was close to everything, but not crowded. The area was very walkable with convenient access to public transit. Also, there were so many food options (restaurants, grocery stores, Eataly, etc.) within walking distance. The apartment was exactly as shown on the website. Julia was friendly and accommodating. I recommend this apartment highly.

A great place, photos don't even do it justice. All upgraded, super high ceilings. 

You know those Airbnb places that aren't as nice as your apartment at home? This is not one of those places. It rocks.

It was my first time in NYC and I couldn't have best stay as in Julia's apt.
Everything was amazing! Good location and the flat was more large than in photos. 
Thank u Julia!
What a place! Pictures don't even do it justice. All upgraded and really fantastic. Will stay here every time I come to NYC.

I had a very nice stay at Julia's apartment. The apartment is very nice inside - comfortable, spacious, clean, and deluxe. Communication with Julia was great, and check-in and check-out were easy. The neighborhood is also nice, very close to Madison Square Park. Would love to stay here again!
Great location, comfortable flat, modern and stylish.  Efficient host.  What's not to like?
Top location top size top clean top equipment and top assistance from lovely Julia . Highly recommend with no hesitation .

El departamento es hermoso, comodísimo y totalmente equipado; se tiene todo lo necesario para pasarlo excelente; la ubicación es espectacular, con acceso muy cercano a todos los medios de transporte y con gran variedad de casas de comida cercanas, más un supermercado muy próximo.
Nuestra experiencia ha sido sobresaliente por lo que recomiendo éste departamento a todos los usuarios de éste servicio.
Muchas gracias y saludos a Julia y Pete!
The place was great, exactly as advertised. Would recommend.

Literally no better Airbnb in the neighborhood. So much so that I don’t want to write this review and give away my secret! Julia is great, the apartment is amazing and fully stocked and I literally would never stay anywhere else.

The apartment looked exactly as the pictures, very well equipped and very confortable. It had everything you could need, really spectacular location, close to everything,  it was very clean. Julia was an excellent hostess, very friendly and always  available. I definitely recommend it, and for my next trip to New York I will try to rent it again.
Thanks Julia for you attention!

Amazing place in a perfect location. Clean and comfortable. One block from Madison Park and Shake Shack; two blocks from Eataly. Two block walk to the subway: both East and West side are accessible via the nearby subway lines. Fully equipped you could easily cook in. Coffee available for the mornings. Wonderful place to base yourself in Manhattan.

Julia's place is in a great location and a safe area, we walked everywhere, even late at night with no problems.
The apartment is secure and has a lift.
Plenty of eating places around too.
Washer and drier great when you are travelling light.

Julia’s apartment was fabulous. Don’t be fooled by the “studio” description - the space is open and comfortable with all the modern amendities to make you feel at home. It’s stylishly decorated with cool artsy and urban details. And very important for me - clean and safe. The beautiful and large kitchen island was just what I needed to enjoy breakfast, dessert and spread out all that work “stuff.” Location was perfect: close to train and ample food options. Definitely on my list to come back to on one of my next trips.

Awesome apt - it is a lot nicer than the pictures. Great bed, excellent facilities. It was a tad dark for me with limited light from the windows. But this would not be a problem if you are going to be out. It is a lovely apt and Julia and her mum are super nice and very good with responding.
Great place, great stay
This is a great space. Looks great, plenty of room, good amenities. Julia and her husband were easy to communicate with and checkin was easy. Will be back!

Julia's place couldn't have been better. I booked the studio for the weekend to explore NYC and stayed a few extra days for work and her place was perfect! It's centrally located so getting around the city is easy and it's close to the subway in case you're planning to go to Brooklyn or coming from Newark Airport. The apartment was spacious and had everything we needed. Julia was very responsive throughout our stay. DEFINITELY booking this place when I come back!

Truly an excellent location in midtown Manhattan.  Newly remodeled with every item you would need in a well functioning home.  Great communication from host, loved this home-away-from-home studio apartment.

Overall a great stay - great neighborhood, lots of restaurants and subway nearby. Only thing was construction literally right outside the window at 6-7AM during the week- this happens, but was not clear up front as it impacts a decision to stay at a place. 

Would have given 5 stars if the accuracy and communication on this piece was more transparent.
é  a segunda vez que nos hospedamos neste espaço! é tudo muito limpo e bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) otima localização e uma otima recepção! tudo excelente!

As pictured, great space. Very convenient location with lots of restaurants. Julia very prompt in all responses. Washer / dryer in unit very helpful. Not a lot of natural light if that matters to future guests. Big kitchen. Slept well. Thank you Julia !

Julia responses my messages very quickly. She greeted us and checked us in the apartment right after we arrived at the building. The location is really the best, close to many landmarks, great restaurants, walkable to east village. The bed is very comfortable. The kitchen is well equipped and very clean. Neighbours on the same floor are very polite and nice too. We had a fantastic stay at Julia's place!

The apartment was extremely clean, quite modern, comfortable and uncluttered. I especially appreciated the comfie bed. It’s amazing how often I have stayed in really appealing ABB’s and the bed is kind of a “ow my back” (I mean isn’t the bed a critical part of this whole thing:) The memory foam bed sleeps two and the couch can be used as a bed as well. We enjoyed our stay and the host was responsive with any questions. Recommended.
Very nice location, friendly host and good apartment. I really enjoyed my stay and look forward to staying again next time I'm in New York.

Julia’s place has all you need in a great central location, close to plenty of restaurants and the subway. 
Julia was the perfect host, great communication, left us to it, giving advice when we asked. 
We’ll stay again when we come back. 
Thanks Julia.

Julia's place it's amazing! Every photo it's 100% true. The unit is fully equipped with everything you need for daily basis. It was a great stay taking into account that we were with our 2 year-old son and had everything we needed for him. Julia and her husband were kind, warm, very communicative when needed and really flexible with check in and check out. Location it's unbeatable, a few steps from different metro stations, lots of restaurants and shops! Neighborhood is one of the most beautiful in midtown. We would not hesitate to come back to this great apartment!! Thank you Julia for being such a great host!!!

Julia is among the best communicating hosts I've ever had. She accommodated our rather inconvenient check in request without a question. Her place is spotless clean and fully equipped - even has plenty of closest space with hangers! And you can't beat the location. Super convenient to Union Sq, Gramercy Park, Madison Square Park, etc.
Our citytrip to NYC was absolutely perfect thanks to our stay at Julia’s apartment. Good location, cosy and clean place. Everything you need, so much more than just a place to sleep!
Julia’s apt was very stylish and extremely well The kitchen was awesome for anyone wanting to eat in more. . Julia was very prompt to all our queries. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Great place to stay. Fabulous location, clean and spacious
Great location, central and quiet. Perfect space for 2
Exceptional studio, great location, well appointed, great communication.  Julia is a tremendous host and the place far exceeded expectations.
Beautiful flat with a great layout in an excellent location. Would definitely stay here again.

Julia’s apartment was amazing!  The location to the Madison square park and the subway station was perfect!  Having laundry in the apartment was so useful for our busy stay!   The beds (even the couch) were so comfortable!  I can’t wait to come back to New York, and I would definitely stay here again!

I stayed in Julia's place for a week, it was a great experience. The location is great, the apartment looks exactly like the photos, and has everything to make the stay enjoyable.

Pros:
 - The location is great
 - Julia greeted me personally and showed around the apartment
 - There is a manual for the apartment with various information and instructions on all the appliances. Very handy
 - The apartment is nice, clean, well designed and decorated
 - Surprisingly quiet despite being in the center of Manhattan
 - There is a wide selection of appliances, including a washing machine with a supply of detergent
 - Speaking of supplies, there were coffee pods and granola bars in the kitchen. Nice touch

Cons:
 - The only window faces the opposite building, so the view is far from spectacular, and the apartment is quite dark in general. Makes for better sleeping though.
Very nice, comfortable apartment in a great location. Would definitely recommend.

the apartment is very recommended. Everything that was promised, was there. We had everything we needed. We felt very safe in the building. The location was wonderful, there are lots of restaurant in the area. The subway station is very close and we enjoyed our time there very much!

We stayed at Julia’s place for 9 nights.  We could not have asked for a better place to stay. It became our home away from home. The apartment was very clean, comfortable, efficient, cozy, and a great location for metro, pharmacy, salad place on the corner, and market. There is a locking elevator for security. Julia made herself available for any questions we might have. Thank you Julia
Lovely trip, everything as expected.

Julia's place was exactly as pictured. Very stylish, and also very neat. 

Comfortable bed, spacious kitchen, spotless overall, with plenty of sheets, towels, and whatever you needed. Also very convenience central locations. Would definitely stay at Julia's place again. Thank you!
Julia’s place was clean, stylish and comfortable. Plenty of space and a great location.

This is a fantastic rental. The location couldn’t be better in that it’s very central, close to amenities and great restaurants, and minutes from the subway. The unit itself is way roomier and better laid out than an average studio, and it’s full of modern appliances that make an apartment stay preferable to a hotel. The bed is comfortable, and there is lots of space to put your things. Julia was a patient and helpful host, and I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Wow! Such a wonderful place to stay for a great value!!! Thank you so much for a beautiful stay
Great place!  Julia met us to tell us all the details of using her place.  Very comfortable bed and stylish accommodations!

We stayed 3 nights in Julia's apartment for my Wife's 40th Birthday celebration in NYC, the location was perfect for us, Julia is lovely and extremely helpful and quick returning contact which made our stay even more relaxing. We will definitely be back again. Thanks so much xxx
Fabulous apartment that is centrally located. Really quiet for NYC and a very comfortable bed. Thank you!!
Julia's place was exactly as described. It was plenty quiet, and in a great location. Close to all necessary subway lines to get uptown or downtown in no time at all.

Julia's studio is spacious with a roomy and clean, airy feel and good security. It has a very well appointed kitchen with modern dishwasher and clothes washer/dryer facilities. It is very quiet and private and in an excellent location close to the subway, restaurants and shops. We loved staying here and it was a true home away from home. It is value for money and we would willingly use it again when next in NYC.
You won’t be disappointed in this condo. It’s location, cleanliness and Annemarie’s make it the perfect Manhattan experience. Food within walking distance. Subways 1.5 blocks away.

My husband, 4-month-old son and I had a wonderful stay at Julia’s place. The location is great, and the numerous amenities like a washer/ dryer, many fresh linens and full kitchen made it so comfortable for our family. Julia was a very attentive host, responding instantly to questions. I would definitely recommend this apartment to others looking to enjoy NYC!

Julia was a great host.  She was very responsive and accommodating.  The studio apartment was exactly as described and the location was ideal.  Short walking  distance to Gramercy Park, Union Square, Madison Park.  We would not hesitate to rent again from Julia.

name: Large Lofted Brooklyn Studio
summary: This is a very large, studio that is best for a couple or a single.  It's in a very hip, up & coming neighborhood of Bushwick (border of Bedstuy) which is the next Williamsburg!  The neighborhood is changing literally every week
space: This is a very large studio with exposed brick walls, wood floor and decent light. There is an upstairs loft that has a queen sized bed (a third person could sleep on couch downstairs -extra charge), but it is best suitable for 1 or 2 people.   The space is cool, comfy and super charming!  Anyone who visits my place says they love it! -You have to climb the small wood stairs to get to loft bedroom but no one seems to mind and there is a whole other room up there for luggage, clothing, etc. *The subway (JMZ line,  Myrtle/Broadway stop) is only one block away and   *is 15 minutes in to the city (Soho/Chinatown, LES and 10 minutes from Williamsburg) *The neighborhood is being called the next Williamsburg and although this particular stop is not super built up yet, it has definitely started and I have found myself staying in this neighborhood more and more this past year. Many cool businesses have popped up and many people are coming over to this subway stop to go out and/or eat/drink. (es

The neighborhood is changing literally every week This is a very large studio with exposed brick walls, wood floor and decent light. There is an upstairs loft that has a queen sized bed (a third person could sleep on couch downstairs -extra charge), but it is best suitable for 1 or 2 people.   The space is cool, comfy and super charming!  Anyone who visits my place says they love it! -You have to climb the small wood stairs to get to loft bedroom but no one seems to mind and there is a whole other room up there for luggage, clothing, etc. *The subway (JMZ line,  Myrtle/Broadway stop) is only one block away and   *is 15 minutes in to the city (Soho/Chinatown, LES and 10 minutes from Williamsburg) *The neighborhood is being called the next Williamsburg and although this particular stop is not super built up yet,
neighborhood_overview: I have some favorite hangout spots that I will link here asap!
notes: please note that this is a grittier part of town and very urban. You get a little bit of a feel of what most of Brooklyn was like before gentrification. -although even this stop is changing so fast. (but note that I do feel very safe in apartment!  But I do suggest women taking cab home after midnight unless with other people.)  There are a lot of new trendy/hip bars and restaurants right near this stop (I will leave a list in apt.)  and also it is an easy commute to so many other great neighborhoods in Brooklyn and city as well.
transit: Only 1 block to subway and great train line -JMZ into NYC! (15-20 minutes away!)
access: The entire large, lofted apartment.
interaction: I will be there to check you in!
house_rules: please be respectful of property and if anything breaks or anything happens, just text me. I will always be on call!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I had a great time at Christine's place.  The location was convenient for me since I have a lot of friends living not too far away.  The place itself is clean, stylish, and the bed's super comfortable.  When I got in Christine had left me a note with some recommendations for places nearby and also a few beers in the fridge.  Much appreciated!  Would definitely stay again.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Christine’s loft is a hidden gym in Brooklyn. Great area to commute to many cool areas in Brooklyn like Williamsburg and Greenpoint. Not to bad of a train ride into Manhattan. Very cozy vibes and very happy to had spend my Christmas here and create memories ❤️

name: Sea View
summary: I think the location is good, next to the Metro, sea view, close to the beach and the Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Quiet and wooded street. High floor. Whole apartment remodeled. Beautiful decorations. next to pharmacy, Commerce, hospital, etc.
description: I think the location is good, next to the Metro, sea view, close to the beach and the Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Quiet and wooded street. High floor. Whole apartment remodeled. Beautiful decorations. next to pharmacy, Commerce, hospital, etc.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Apartamento organizado com uma localização ótima, do lado da Farme de Amoedo, com restaurantes, bares a praia. A Inês muito receptiva e nos acolheu muito bem. O único problema foi o wifi que não funcionou, mas quase não ficamos no apartamento e não sentimos muita falta.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia. 
O apartamento tem localização ótima, a vista é linda e não nos faltou nada. A Inês é muito atenciosa e prestou ajuda inclusive para se localizar no Rio quando estávamos perdidos. 

Pontos a melhorar, nas fotos o apto parece mais "moderno" e maior do que realmente é. A cama tem o colchão muito duro, e o colchonete para a sala é muito fino e desconfortável. 
Para ficar confortável o ideal são 4, máximo 5 pessoas.

Fora isso tudo ok.
Adorei o tempo que passei na casa de Ines! Recomendo!

Foi ótima a nossa estadia no apartamento da Ines. A principio tínhamos reservado o apartamento dela em Copacabana, mas por um problema ela teve que nos mudar para o Apto de Ipanema que esta em uma ótima localização. O apartamento eh lindo, limpo e bem arrumado. Único ponto negativo eh a cama de casal que eh super dura. Mas por ter sido uma noite não teve problema. Obrigada por tudo Ines, agradeça a Inah também. Quando formos ao Rio com certeza reservamos novamente com você.

O primordial é o atendimento e recepção, a Inês nos acolheu muito bem no seu apartamento e nos deu dicas para aproveitarmos o Rio. O apartamento fica bem localizado e próximo da praia, além de ser bem aconchegante, arrumado e decorado. A única coisa que deve ser melhorada é a cama de casal do quarto, pois é um pouco dura. Próximo ao local tem vários barzinhos, padarias, lojas e restaurantes. Recomendo e irei mais vezes.

Minha família e eu estamos muito felizes com esse passeio ao Rio e um dos fatores que contribuíram foi a localização do ap da Ines. Muito bem localizado entre a lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e a praia de Ipanema. Fácil acesso aceso a restaurantes e bares. Ruas bem movimentadas inclusive a noite. Metrô próximo. O ap é  igual a foto só que ainda mais aconchegante  pessoalmente. Gostamos da dormida  acomoda 6 pessoas tranquilamente. Ines estava esperando na chegada pessoalmente. Muito hospitaleira. Recomendo com certeza.

O apartamento é como descrito nas fotos e até surpreendeu um pouco pelo aproveitamento do espaço...perto da praia de Ipanema, da para ir andando. Limpo e organizado com todos os utensílios que precisamos. Recomendo pela localização, receptividade e comunicação com a proprietária. Valeu!
Ótima localização, apartamento bem arejado, ideal para 5 pessoas.
Entregar o apartamento limpo na medida do possível
Ótima localização, com espaço e decoração interessantes!
Well located and spacious. The beds are a bit small, although that's normal in Rio. Ines was a great host, and communication with her was quick and efficient.
Apartamento bien ubicado, zona tranquila, tiene muy buena ubicacion con respecto al metro, playa de ipanema, laguna freitas y supermercados y negocios, bancos restaurant, etc. muchas gracias Ines.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nuestra estancia en la casa de Ines fue muy buena. El departamento, si bien es pequeño, es muy cómodo, moderno y limpio. Contamos con todo lo necesario durante los 9 días que estuvimos alojadas. Inés nos ayudó a solucionar un inconveniente que nos sirgió antes de viajar cuando no era su obligación. 
Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable.

name: Private room in artsy Brooklyn home
summary: Large and whimsical apartment in diverse Brooklyn neighborhood. Bohemian, tasteful and simple decor- this home was created with love and care. Our main pride is the back yard, built from scratch and features a patio and a vegetable garden.
space: Our large and spacious apartment is a relaxing and quiet oasis in the midst of busy Brooklyn. Tasteful and eclectic design with a Scandinavian simplicity. Your room has a large bed citable for 2, a desk, arm chair, closet and toilet. Bedrooms are far apart, with kitchen and living room between them. It's very quiet. The back yard adds another room in the warmer months where you can enjoy your morning breakfast or evening beer. It's especially glorious when the lights get turned on at night.
description: Large and whimsical apartment in diverse Brooklyn neighborhood. Bohemian, tasteful and simple decor- this home was created with love and care. Our main pride is the back yard, built from scratch and features a patio and a vegetable garden. Our large and spacious apartment is a relaxing and quiet oasis in the midst of busy Brooklyn. Tasteful and eclectic design with a Scandinavian simplicity. Your room has a large bed citable for 2, a desk, arm chair, closet and toilet. Bedrooms are far apart, with kitchen and living room between them. It's very quiet. The back yard adds another room in the warmer months where you can enjoy your morning breakfast or evening beer. It's especially glorious when the lights get turned on at night. - Access to kitchen, living room, bath room and back yard. - Well-equipped kitchen with washer and dishwasher. We prefer that you use the kitchen for breakfasts and light cooking and leave the heavy cooking to the thousands of exceptional cooks that dazzle the NYC
neighborhood_overview: Crown Heights is a diverse and ever-changing neighborhood with lots to offer in terms of good food, street life and all that comes with a typical Brooklyn neighborhood. Within the same block you can find authentic Caribbean cuisine, a hipster coffee shop, a gospel church/barber shop and a Rastafarian nick-nack shop.  We are walking distance from the wonderful Brooklyn museum, Botanical Gardens and Prospect Park, which features a farmer's market on weekends.  In your room you will find a binder full of recommendations of good local eats, bars and sights in both Crown Heights and Brooklyn in general.
notes: We have a baby girl who is very sweet and relaxed. We hope you are comfortable around babies and happy to see one greet you in the mornings!
transit: We are a couple of blocks from the A express train (Nostrand stop), which will take you to Manhattan in 20 minutes.  The 2 & 5 trains are about a 15 minute walk down Nostrand Avenue.
access: - Access to kitchen, living room, bath room and back yard. - Well-equipped kitchen with washer and dishwasher. We prefer that you use the kitchen for breakfasts and light cooking and leave the heavy cooking to the thousands of exceptional cooks that dazzle the NYC culinary scene.  - You have your own ensuite bathroom with a toilet.   - You are also welcome to borrow our bikes (upon availability) for rides within Brooklyn. Prospect Park has lovely bike lanes. We ask for a $50 repost fee for bike loan.
interaction: We are happy to answer any questions regarding your travels in New York.  Upon your arrival- you will find a welcome package in your room that contains a lot of information on how to get around and what to do.
house_rules: - Be respectful of us and our neighbors - No loud music or late night parties - No smoking inside (Back yard is fine) - Help us keep the kitchen neat and clean! - Maximum 2 people (Baby possible on case by case basis) Thanks!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hey hey-

We are a Brooklyn couple with a baby (fear not: the bedrooms are far apart) who work as theater artists in the city and love to garden and BBQ in our tranquil and magical back yard. 
Stephanie is originally from Sweden, but came to the US to study theater and to meet her San Franciscan husband Andrew, who is a freak for jazz, gardening and good food. He works as an actor, producer and bartender. Stephanie is currently mothering their new baby, acting in films and making theater. She likes to hike and swim in the wild. We both love to watch movies and eat ice cream. 

We love living in New York and are happy to share our knowledge good food, interesting theater and cultural events. 

Whatever your NYC trip may be, our place is ideal as it is both an easy ride to Manhattan and located in one of the most interesting, diverse and fastest changing neighborhoods in New York. 

Welcome!

reviews.comments:
AMAZING ! Stephanie and Andrew were really nice with us and made our stay very comfortable. The room is very we'll decorated like all the flat (more bigger than we see on the photos !), very clean. Beautiful backyard !!  
The perfect place

"Feel you at home" said Stephanie and Andrew when we arrived. All was perfect! 
A peaceful place, a great area, just next to supermarkets, Prospect Park, subways... It's very easy and quick to go to Manhattan and others side of New York.
The house and our bedroom was so lovely, comfortable and clean! Breakfasts outside were nice in the little garden.
Stephanie and Andrew are very interesting and open minded. It was so nice to meet them! And the baby is so quiet :)
If you want to live the real New York, if you want to have a great time, you have to go to Stephanie and Andrew's place. They are really welcoming! 
We really felt at home! :)

Really enjoyed my time at Stephanie and Andrews beautiful home! I was made to feel very welcome and comfortable in their space. The room and apartment is lovely, and the outdoor area/garden delightful! It is in a great location close to subway, shops and local eats/cafes.

Step y Andrew nos recibieron increible, tienen una familia y una casa hermosa. Siemrpe fueron super atentos con nosotras inclusive el día que llegamos que era madrugada.
El cuarto esta tal cual en la foto y la ubicación es muy buena a solo 5 min del metro. 
Sin duda ha sido una de mis mejores experiencias en Airbnb, muchas gracias por recibirnos!

Stephanie and Andrew are very welcoming and friendly hosts! A lovely room, beautiful apartment and amazing back yard/garden – we really enjoyed our stay and had a great time. A very peaceful place in a lively and interesting neighbourhood with great shops and restaurants (perfect recommendations by Stephanie and Andrew!), close to subway stations and beautiful Prospect Park. Thanks again and all the best!

Stephanie und Andrew waren sehr hilfsbereit und sympathisch und haben mir meinen Aufenthalt sehr nett und bequem gestaltet.
Das Zimmer und die Wohnung sind genau wie in den Fotos zu sehen, sehr sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Zur Metro sind es nur 5 Minuten und um die Ecke gibt es nette Cafés, Restaurants und viele "Green Organic Delis". Ich habe mich super wohl gefühlt - vielen Dank für eure Gastfreundlichkeit!

We really enjoyed our stay with Stephanie and Andrew!  Really great couple with a cute (quiet and sweet) baby.  Their place is a lot of fun and comfortable to hang out in and the room we stayed in was very pleasant. The neighborhood is still up and coming, but fun to explore during the day. We were out exploring so much that we only saw them a few times, but they were always wonderful and the room was exactly as pictured. Plus they have a lovely backyard! Thanks for the awesome experience guys!

This place is a GEM, we loved, loved, loved it. Stephanie and Andrew definitely are one of a kind hosts! To us, they really are part of what made our trip to NYC so amazing, and they make the AirBnb experience perfect ; their family is absolutely charming, they were very welcoming, and always very helpful with lots of good insights about their neighborhood... 

Their apartment made us feel home immediately and the room was cosy and so beautifully decorated! It is exactly how it is described. It was our first time staying in Brooklyn and we loved the area -- Crown Heights -- so much ; it is a vibrant neighborhood that really gives you a good view on another side of New York and offers so many possibilities in term of fine groceries, cafés and restaurants.

This is a place we would definitely come back again! We strongly recommand this spot if you're planning to go to NYC.

name: Private outdoor shower, minutes from the beach!
summary: Get your Zen on at Zen Lite! This finely crafted studio home is located in Kehena Beach Estates on Hawaii's Big Island. Walk to Kehena, the area's clothing optional, picturesque black sand beach. Private and surrounded by lush tropical foliage, this Asian-inspired hale is a perfect getaway for a couple or single traveler. Queen bed, high speed wifi, small but functional kitchen. Did we mention the GREAT price?
space: Located in Pahoa, this quaint vacation rental has everything you need to get away! Spend the day at the beach or explore many of the local attractions the island has to offer.  What's Nearby: The Kehena area is on the south east coast of Hawaii Island, and it is home to Kehena beach, a clothing optional black sand beach.  You can drive 10 minutes away to the Kalapana lava viewing area that has been flowing for over 30 years. Have a day of snorkeling in the Wai Opae Tidepools at Kapoho Vacationland.  Things to know:  Free wifi Full kitchen (including dishwasher) Private washer & dryer Private outdoor shower Things to know:  Free wifi Full kitchen (including dishwasher) Private washer & dryer Private outdoor shower

neighborhood_overview: The Kehena area is on the south east coast of Hawaii Island and encompasses several small, residential neighborhoods. Located along ‘Red Road’, named for the red cinder that used surface it, this is easily one of the most beautiful coastline routes you’ll ever drive. This area is home to Kehena black sand beach, sometimes called Dolphin Beach for the spinner dolphins that frequent it, where you can enjoy a refreshing swim or relax on the sand.   To the south, lava has been flowing for over 30 years and is often visible from the Kalapana lava viewing area, less than 10 minutes away by car. Head north on Red Road to find some of the area’s other unique attractions:  Pohoiki Bay at Isaac Hale Park is the local surfing hot spot, and also the boat ramp for lava cruises; Ahalanui Park has a georthermally heated ocean-side lagoon that is close to Jacuzzi temperature;  the Wai Opae Tidepools at Kapoho Vacationland provide some of the best snorkeling in the entire state, where dozens of tidepoo
notes: Hawaii Tax ID: W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: The neighborhood is rural and public transportation is slim to none, so you'll need a car. Parking in driveway.
access: Single family residence that never rents to more than one group at a time so your privacy is assured. Make yourself at home!
interaction: Hawaii Holiday Vacation Rentals is here 7 days a week to assist you. Our office is open from 8:30am until 5pm daily, and we have a 24 hour answering service for any after-hours emergencies.
house_rules: - The responsible renter must be at least 21 years of age to book. Guests under 21 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian for the duration of the reservation. - No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval. - The property shall not be used by more than the number of adults and children listed in your reservation. - All guests shall abide by Vacasa’s good neighbor policy and shall not engage in illegal activity. Quiet hours are from 10 p.m. to 8 a.m. - If early check-in is available for your reservation, you will be notified by 9am on the morning of your arrival by email. Late check-out is offered whenever possible for a small fee. - No smoking of any kind is permitted anywhere on the premises. - No commercial photography or filming is permitted on the property. Tents or other structures may not be erected. - Renter is liable for any damage to the property and agrees to accept charges to the card on file should damage occur

host.host_about:
"Greetings from Team Vacasa! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)

We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 

Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway."

reviews.comments: The Zen Lite space was even more then I could hope for for my Hawaii birthday adventure. This pace is even better then the pictures. It is clean, open bright, the check in process was superb, the space is quiet yet filled with amazing jungle sounds, the outside shower is to die for! You are also walkable to one of the best black sand beaches down the street. Overall this place surpassed all expectations and was a completely amazing place to stay. I would 100% come back here again!

The Len Light House was ideal. No issue finding the home and check in was a breeze with a lock box check in system. We had no need for a tour from the owner as the house was simple and perfectly appointed. There were other homes nearby, but the house was very private. We did not see any direct neighbors during our 4 day stay. There were ample linens and towels which smelled beautifully fresh. The house was spotlessly clean. The bed was comfortable for two and the house was cool during the evening with just the use of a ceiling fan and small desk fan provided. The outdoor shower was a dream as the sun was rising or after a long day of exploring the island. Plenty of hot water for two to take a comfortable shower. There was a great washer/dryer set off the back of the house; pack less and wash in the comfort of your home. The kitchen has a 2 burner cook top, no oven, small fridge, and outdoor grill. A good amount of dishes and appliances for cooking. We did not cook at the house; there were so many great places to eat in the town of Pahoa just an easy and beautiful 20 minute drive away. We had no issue with bugs or mosquitos in or around the house. There were plenty of geckos to watch scurry about and a symphony of frogs to listen to each night. From time to time you can hear the ocean but cannot see it from the house. Beautiful landscaping which made it nice to just relax on the porch and watch the wind blow. There were coolers and snorkeling gear at the house available for use. Lava viewing, hot springs, night market and black sand beach are all an easy drive away. The people we met around the neighborhood were so nice. We stayed at this location and another much more reviewed, much more expensive, much more popular location with AirB&B and the Zen Light house far exceeded our expectations. We won't bother staying anywhere else on the Big Island again.

The Zen Lite accomodation is a really awesome and special place to stay. Everything was exactly as described and clean and we felt very comfortable there. The furniture and decoration were really beautiful. Also one has to mention the beautiful garden. We absolutetly  recommend this accomodation and would come back anytime.
Great place to stay. Amazing falling asleep to the sound of frogs, birds, ocean and rain.

We arrived quite late to Zen Lite so was pitch black when we got there. As it is very remote we were a bit apprehensive of where we were but when we found it it was amazing. The night was filled with the sound of frogs when we go there. The flat is a studio flat with a small kitchen which was perfect for what we needed - managed to cook spag bol no problem. The outdoor shower was fun too - and very much needed after visiting Black Beach a short walk away (a which we 100% recommend doing). Location-wise this place is perfect for seeing Lava too - just up the road (plus an 8 mile trek) is where the lava was flowing into the ocean.

Un  endroit calme et paisible pour s endormir avec le bruit de la foret, le chant des grenouilles qui nous accompagne dans notre sommeil... 
Petite cabane authentique, semblable aux photos, 
Sejour très apprécié
Fortement conseillé pour vouageur en quete d'evasion et de depaysement

Zen Lite is beautiful. We loved the location. When can you visit tide pools one day and see lava following the next?! Uncle Roberts market on Wednesday was great. Thank you for the comfortable accommodation.

Zen Lite was a dream!! The home was very peaceful, clean and exactly what we were looking for. I am very happy there was no TV. The bed was super comfy and being sung to sleep by the frogs was a dream come true! I would highly reccomend staying here, as long as you want to be outside of the busy city and in a quiet jungle atmosphere :) We will be back again!
Excellent place to stay had a great time !

Appartamento indipendente immerso nella jungla ma a due passi dal mare, con spiaggetta raggiungibile anche a piedi. Perfetta per chi sa adattarsi e vuole trascorrere dei giorni di pace e avventura, la casa infatti è vicinissima ai luoghi di partenza per i lava tour, sia in bici che in barca. Il patio all'aperto e' il valore aggiunto della casa.
3 min walk to the most perfect beach. Fruit trees in the yard. Great decor and fully equipped kitchen. Perfect place for a getaway!

Very nice place, peaceful, if love nature, stars and frogs.  Well place to visit Volcano park and east coast. It is an hour away from the park. We love the shower out side and the room is nicer than the photos. Nice black sand beach five minutes walk away.

Nice location. No hot water at all for 4 days. Hot water restored to outdoor shower after 4 days. No hot water inside in bathroom or kitchen for my entire stay of 28 days. Host slow to tespond to my requests to be kept informed. Drinking water comes from well instead of catchment and even after provided filtration still tastes salty.

A beautiful cabin-style accommodation near a black sand beach... with all the comforts of home included. The kitchen is small, but has all the pots, pans, and utensils you should need. The WiFi works well... no downtime during my stay, even when it was raining cats and dogs. And, the tap water is filtered, so no running to the public spigot near Kalapana for drinking water. Speaking of water - there’s also a great outdoor shower (a must-have in Hawaii). 

Keep in mind, this is a subdivision with several houses within eyesight and earshot — the host is not at fault, obviously. There will be noise from traffic and people, maybe even power tools such as leaf blowers — why these unnecessary implements are not banned in such a place, I have no clue. Other than those external noises you have no immediate control over, the place is fantastic. It’s the ideal spot to base out of while exploring the Red Road and all that Puna has to offer.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I am thankful for Dins who accepted our request at the last moment to help make our family NYC trip a success.  She was very accommodating even though she was out of town and ensured the process happened smoothly. Her place is perfectly located on 116th street in Harlem and is next to everything you need. The 2/3 subway train is less than a block away and was able to get 5 kids to Times Square in under 15minutes with no issues. You have CVS, a good Grocery store and many mom/pop shops around you, all less than 2minute walk. I went to the Grocery store to get Breakfast and it was worth it but you are literally across the street from a great soul food icon restaurant and can not pass up a good plate of chicken & waffles. Dins place was able to accommodate my family easily as the apartment has a queen bed, two twin beds, a day bed, and a sofa bed/futon. I would definitely recommend Dins place for any family making a NYC trip and will be happy to go back when we visit again.

Dins really takes care of us, she did a lot to help  ( our situation was a little bit special as we move to NYC for one year).
The apartment is near the subway and a walk to central park so very convenient. Dins let us use the bicycles and Internet works really well.
Big enough for a family 5 and the kitchen is well equiped. There is plenty of supermarket nearby.
The only thing that annoyed us a little bit is the cleaning because the floor of the apartment was dirty.

name: Best location in manhattan
summary: My 1 bedroom aparment has everything you need for a perfect stay in NYC. Close to parks, transit, restaurants and shopping you can explore the city or stay in safe and relax.

reviews.comments: Apartment was just as described, and surprisingly bigger than expected. The location is absolutely spot on as it was only a 15 minute walk from time square. Nice and tidy and a Starbucks was located beside the apartment which was a bonus. Furkan was polite, professional and friendly, would definitely book again.

name: Spacious Family Home in Coogee
summary: This Sydney Semi is ideally located between Coogee beach and ‘The Spot' in Randwick. It is a spacious 2 story house with  3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 lounge rooms, plus study. It has a generous sized garden & deck offering expansive district views.
space: This traditional Red Brick Semi Detached has had extensive renovations with an entire new level built. The house is built to capture as much natural light as possible with over sized windows and doors that bring in the outside so that you enjoy summer. With consideration of  Sydney temperatures the house is designed to allow for maximum airflow, keeping it cool during the hot months. Downstairs level is a modern and well appointed open plan kitchen. The dining area has an extendible table that fits 10 people.  The downstairs lounge has 3m bifold doors that opens up onto a specious deck and garden. There are district views from the downstairs level that go out as far as the Blue Mountains on the horizon. There is also a new bathroom, laundry and study on a split level giving you that little bit extra space to sit and plan your day.   We have a  perfect size garden for kids to play in, And you can have lots of Aussie style BBQ on the 3 burner natural gas (not bottled) hooded bbq.   Upsta

neighborhood_overview: 'The spot'  with its gentle heritage ambiance is a easy 10 minute stroll away. It offers a wide range of restaurants and cafes. It has the Ritz cinema which shows new release movies.  Coogee beach is an easy 15 minute down hill walk. (1.4 km) Climbing back up the hill might be not be quiet as easy. A 3 minute  car drive down to the beach might be a better option if you are pushing a pram.
notes: We are a family of 4 with 2  young boys and understand the importance of adult space.  The TV room is designed to be sound proof when the door is shut so the parents can sit and enjoys the view while the kids watch their TV upstairs. The Xbox is wired in so feel free to bring your favourite games or you are most welcome to use ours.  Alternatively you may use the upstairs lounge as a fourth bedroom. However please note that this room has the only TV in the house.  You will have access to Netflix and with unlimited wifi you may watch as many movies as you like. ***Please note, at this stage ideally we prefer quests who are looking for a minimum of 7 nights  accommodation over new year period. Thank you for understanding.
transit: Rainbow St is very central there are several bus stops all around. Fortunately none stop out side our house. However there are a few options depending on where you would like to go. Just (Hidden by Airbnb) Sydney buses to see alternate options.
access: You will have access to the whole house and garden. At the far end of the block is a shed and a small sandy area that we ask guests to please stay away. This area will be developed next year and is currently not suitable for use.
interaction: you can contact us any time via email or phone. There will also be numbers available in case of an emergency.
house_rules: We are a non smoking family and pet free home.  Please respect our preferences for no smoking and no pets. The Xbox and Wii are all wired up and ready for your kids to use. Please do not unplug these. The cables are hidden through conduit and difficult to get in or out. The house is designed to allow maximum light and air to flow to keep the house cool during the Sydney summer months and filled with light during the winter. The flip side to this, is that the house is very exposed to wind and rain when left open.  We therefore ask that you please ensure that the south facing doors and windows are closed during any rain or strong winds. Please do not leave the house with the south facing door and window open. and please do not sleep with the south facing doors or window open. There are many other windows in the house that can be left open for ventilation at all times.   If it rains while these windows or doors are left open there will be significant water damage to the interior of the ho

reviews.comments:
Anat was a fantastic host from the very beginning. She was very responsive during the booking process and flexible with my family's arrival, which helped us greatly arriving in a new country. 

The house is a beautifully renovated 3 bedroom in South Coogee with tons of natural light and outdoor lounge space. The kitchen was well supplied for us to cook and bake, and we were surprised to see the BBQ was hooked up to the main gas line. Very cool!

We drove most of the trip, but there are also nearby bus lines that take you into Sydney proper in 45 mins or so. I highly recommend this BnB and am excited for all that have the opportunity to stay here :).
